anya-e0401n:11_1: Paramatthadīpanīti ettha attho duvidho padhānatthoca pariyāyatthoca. Tattha padhānattho
anya-e0401n:11_2: paramatthonāma, padhānatthotica padavākyānaṃ mukhyattho ujukattho. Pariyāyatthopi
anya-e0401n:12_5: Tatthajanānāma idhabodhaneyyasattā adhippetā, yesabbaññudesanaṃ sutvā catussacca
anya-e0401n:12_7: janambujamahāsare. Tattha jātikkhettaṃ nāmadasasahassa cakkavāḷaṃ, yaṃ ekaṃ buddhakkhettanti
anya-e0401n:12_8: vuccati. Yattha ca mahābodhisattānaṃ buddhabhāvatthāya pathamamahābhinīhārakālādīsu
anya-e0401n:12_10: Jātikkhettemahāsareyassa ekassa saddhammaraṃsijālino mahāsūrassa udayā tasmiṃ jātikkhette
anya-e0401n:13_1: mohatamaṃnūdati apaneti, saddhammaraṃsijālaṃ vissajjanto antaradhāpetīti mahāmohatamonudo.
anya-e0401n:14_0: Evaṃ buddhassapaṇāmaṃ katvā attanā icchitaṃ paṇāmappayojanaṃ pariṇāmento “sañjāta”ntiādimāha.
anya-e0401n:14_2: suṭṭhujātaṃ, anamataggesaṃsāre daḷhaṃ pavattanti attho. “Tamokhandha”nti mahāmohatamokhandhaṃ.
anya-e0401n:14_4: saṅgahitāni eva. Tathā rogādayo antarāya dhammāpi tamojātikāevatamotamaparāyanotiādīsu.
anya-e0401n:15_0: Evaṃ sappayojanaṃ paṇāmaṃ katvā idāni sanidānaṃ ganthappaṭiññaṃ karonto “porāṇakehī”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n:15_1: Tattha nidānaṃ nāma ganthappaṭiññāya āsannakāraṇaṃ. Katadhaṃpanatanti, sāratthābhimānīnaṃ
anya-e0401n:16_0: Tattha dvīhi gāthāhi sakāraṇaṃ yācanaṃ dasseti. Puna dvīhi gāthāhi saupamaṃvipulatthataṃdasseti.
anya-e0401n:16_1: “Tasmā”tiādinā ganthappakāra ganthaguṇehi sahaganthappaṭiññaṃ dasseti. Tattha ādigāthāyaṃ
anya-e0401n:16_3: yojanā. “Vaṇṇanā”ti porāṇaṭīkāyo vuccanti. Evañcasati kasmā abhinavaṃ vaṇṇanaṃ yācantīti.
anya-e0401n:16_4: “Ye sāratthābhimānino, te tāhibahūhi porāṇavaṇṇanāhituṭṭhiṃ navindanti. Tasmā taṃ
anya-e0401n:16_5: yācantī”tiyojanā. Etena appasāratthā eva tāporāṇavaṇṇanāyotipi dīpetiyeva. Tattha
anya-e0401n:17_0: Sāratthameva abhimānenti, visesena nandantisīlenāti sāratthābhimānino. Tenavindantītipurimenasambandho.
anya-e0401n:17_1: Puna “te”ti tāhi tuṭṭhiṃ avindantā tejanā. “Ma”nti attānaṃ niddisati. “Saṅgammā”ti
anya-e0401n:17_2: samāgantvā. Yasmā paramatthassadīpanaṃ yācanti, tasmā imissāṭīkāya “paramatthadīpanī”ti
anya-e0401n:17_5: tattakaṃvīti adhippāyo. “Dajjeyyuṃ”ti dadeyyuṃ. Kāmaṃ dadantūti attho. Eyyādivacanānaṃ
anya-e0401n:17_7: Kasmā, aparimāṇa ratanādhiṭṭhānattā mahāsamuddassa. Yato so sāgaroti vuccati, sānaṃdhanaratanānaṃ
anya-e0401n:18_2: kāmaṃvaṇṇentu. “Pariyādinnā”ti parito anavasesato ādinnā gahitā. Parikkhīṇāti vuttaṃ
anya-e0401n:18_3: hoti. “Nahessare”ti nahessanti nabhavissanti. “Tasmā”ti yasmāca yācanti, yasmāca
anya-e0401n:18_7: nātisaṅkhepaṃnātivitthārañca. Mandā buddhi yesaṃ te mandabuddhino. “Mandā”ti mudukā.
anya-e0401n:18_8: “Buddhī”ti ñāṇaṃ. Mandabuddhino sotujane pabodheti vikāseti, ñāṇa vikāsaṃpāpetīti
anya-e0401n:18_10: yojanā. Paṭunobhāvopāṭavaṃ. Paṭunoti byattassapaṇḍitassa. Pāṭavena attho yesaṃ te
anya-e0401n:18_11: pāṭavatthino. Itisaddo parisamāpanajotako. So hi ganthārabbhavidhānassa idhaparisamāpanaṃ
anya-e0401n:18_12: pariniṭṭhānaṃ ñāpetuṃ ganthārabbhavākyassapariyante yojito. Avayava vākyānaṃ piyojīyatiyeva. Esanayosabbattha.
anya-e0401n:20_0: 1. Evaṃ ganthārabbhavidhānaṃ katvā idāni ādigāthāya sambandhaṃ dassento “abhidhammatthasaṅgaha”ntiādimāha.
anya-e0401n:20_1: Sambandhanti kāraṇapphalasaṃyogaṃ. Tattha gāthāpavattanaṃ kāraṇaṃ nāma. Pañcapiṇḍattha
anya-e0401n:20_2: dassanaṃ phalaṃ nāma. Kāraṇapphalasaṃyogo sambandhonāma. “Sappayojane”ti phalappayojanasahite.
anya-e0401n:20_3: Ganthena abhidhātabbo kathetabboti ganthābhidheyyo. Nipatassa kammaṃ nipaccaṃ. Nipacca
anya-e0401n:20_4: kiriyā, nipaccākāro, nipaccakārassakaraṇanti samāso. “Sā”ti ratanattayavandanā. Dassitātisambandho.
anya-e0401n:20_6: adhippāyo. Duvidhohi atthovacanattho ca abhidhānatthoca. Tattha gacchatīti gato,
anya-e0401n:20_7: purisoti vuttegacchati padena vutto yokoci gacchanto vacanatthonāma. Purisoti padenadassito
anya-e0401n:22: Cittaṃ cetasikaṃ rūpaṃ, nibbānamiti sabbathā. ti
anya-e0401n:23_0: Evaṃ vuttā abhidhammatthā. Evaṃ vuttattāyevaca tecattāro abhidhammatthā eva idhapadhānatthabhūtāti
anya-e0401n:23_1: ca, - padhānatthāeva idhaganthābhidheyya bhāvena adhippetāti caviññāyatīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:24_0: Kecipanavadeyyuṃ, teabhidhammatthā saṅgahappakaraṇaṃ pattā visuṃ saṅgahatthānāmabhaveyyuṃ,
anya-e0401n:24_1: naabhidhammatthā nāma. Idha ca saṅgahatthā eva abhidheyyabhāvena adhippetāti vuttaṃ
anya-e0401n:24_2: abhidheyyo abhidhammattha saṅgahappadenāti. Vuccate. Teabhidhammatthā saṅgahappakaraṇaṃ
anya-e0401n:24_3: pattāpi abhidhammatthā evanāma honti, na visuṃ saṅgahatthānāma. Tattha vuttābhidhammatthātihi
anya-e0401n:24_4: vuttaṃ, natuvuttaṃ tattha vuttāsaṅgahatthāti. Evañcasati saṅgahitabhāvamattaṃ visiṭṭhaṃ
anya-e0401n:24_5: hoti. Tadeva idha abhidheyyo nāma siyāti vuttaṃ “saṅgahitabhāvopi abhidheyyo yevā”tiādi.
anya-e0401n:24_7: saṅgahitehi dhammehi aññā nahoti. Tesvevadhammesusaṅgayhatīti vuttaṃ “saṅgahitabhāvopi
anya-e0401n:24_8: abhidheyyo yevā”ti. Kiñcāpitehi aññānahoti, te sveva saṅgayhati. Sāpana ganthassapadhānattho
anya-e0401n:24_9: nahoti. Idha ca padhānatthova adhippetoti vuttaṃ “taṃnasundara”nti. Kasmā nasundaranti
anya-e0401n:24_10: āha “nahiso”tiādiṃ. Etthacahisaddo imassa vākyassahetuvākyabhāvaṃ joteti. Esanayoparatthapi.
anya-e0401n:24_13: katāparamatthamañjūsānāmaṭīkā. Sā brammaraṭṭhe tiriyapabbatavāsinā therenakataṃ cūḷaṭīkaṃ
anya-e0401n:25_0: Ganthappakāroca pakāravantehi dhammehi sahevasijjhati, vinā nasijjhatīti adhippāyena
anya-e0401n:25_1: “soabhidhammatthapadenā”ti vuttaṃ. Kāmañca so tehi sahevasijjhati, vinānasijjhati.
anya-e0401n:25_2: Abhidhammatthapadaṃ pana saṅgahaṇakiriyāpakāraṃna vadatīti vuttaṃ “taṃ nasundara”nti.
anya-e0401n:25_3: Duvidhaṃ nāmaṃ anvatthanāmaṃ ruḷināmanti. Tattha, atthānugataṃ nāmaṃ anvatthanāmaṃ,
anya-e0401n:25_4: yathā sukhitassajanassa sukhotināmaṃ. Attharahitaṃ āropitaṃ nāmaṃ ruḷināmaṃ, yathā
anya-e0401n:25_5: dukkhitassajanassa sukhoti nāmaṃ. Idha pana anvatthanā mantidassetuṃ “atthānugatā”tiādi
anya-e0401n:25_7: hoti. “Ganthasamaññā”ti ganthasammuti. Ganthassanāmanti vuttaṃ hoti. Saṅgahaganthonāma
anya-e0401n:25_8: pāḷiyaṃtattha tattha vippakiṇṇedhamme ekattha sabhāgarāsikaraṇavasena pavatto gantho.
anya-e0401n:25_10: tassauggahoca paripucchācāti dvando. Ādisaddena dhāraṇādīni saṅgaṇhāti. Tattha pāṭhassavācuggatakaraṇaṃ
anya-e0401n:25_11: uggahonāma. Uggahi tassapāṭhassa atthaggahaṇaṃ paripucchānāma. “Anāyāsato”ti niddukkhena.
anya-e0401n:25_13: lakkhaṇāvabodho rasāva bodhotiādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Anupādāparinibbānaṃ anto pariyosānaṃ
anya-e0401n:25_17: Payojetīti “payojanaṃ”. Payojetīti niyojeti. Kiṃ niyojeti. Phalatthikaṃjanaṃ. Kattha
anya-e0401n:25_18: niyojeti. Phalanibbattakekamme. Kimatthāya niyojeti. Tassakammassa karaṇatthāyāti.
anya-e0401n:25_21: phalaṃpidīpeti. Phalavacanaṃ kāraṇaṃpidīpeti. Yathātaṃ asukasmiṃ raṭṭhe sammādevo
anya-e0401n:25_22: vuṭṭhoti vutte taṃ raṭṭhaṃsu bhikkhanti viññāyati. Asukaraṭṭhaṃ subhikkhantivutte
anya-e0401n:25_23: tasmiṃ raṭṭhe sammādevo vuṭṭhoti viññāyatīti. Payojanaṃ pana abhidhammattha saddena
anya-e0401n:25_24: dassetabbaṃ natthi, saṅgahavacanasāmatthiyeneva siddhaṃ hotīti adhippāyena “saṅgahasaddenā”ti
anya-e0401n:25_25: vuttaṃ. Sāmatthiyadassane pana suṭṭhu paripuṇṇavacanaṃ icchitabbaṃ hoti. Itarathā
anya-e0401n:25_26: aniṭṭhatthappasaṅgopi siyāti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “taṃ na sundara”nti vatvā “nahī”tiādinā
anya-e0401n:26_0: 2. Evaṃ sappayojane pañcapiṇḍattheti ettha pañcapiṇḍatthe dassetvā idāni tesaṃpañcannaṃ
anya-e0401n:26_2: piṇḍatthesu. Nasaṅkhyātabbanti asaṅkhyeyyaṃ. Saṅkhātuṃasakkuṇeyyanti attho. Napametabbanti
anya-e0401n:26_3: appameyyaṃ. Pametuṃ asakkuṇeyyanti attho. Evaṃ kiccapaccayānaṃ katthaci sakkattha
anya-e0401n:26_4: dīpanaṃ hoti. Sakavacanaṃ pāḷivacanena sādhetuṃ “yathāhā”ti pucchitvā pāḷigāthaṃ
anya-e0401n:26_5: āhari. Tattha “yathāhā”ti kathaṃ āha iccevattho. Anantare vuttassa atthassa sādhakaṃ
anya-e0401n:26_6: vacanaṃ kathaṃ pāḷiyaṃ āha, kathaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āha, kathaṃ ṭīkāyaṃ āhāti evaṃ yathārahaṃ
anya-e0401n:26_7: attho veditabbo. “Tetādisenibbute akutobhaye pūjayato”ti yojanā. Tattha “te”ti buddha
anya-e0401n:26_8: buddha sāvake. “Tādise”ti tathā rūpesī lakkhandhādiguṇa sampanne. “Nibbute”ti kilesa
anya-e0401n:26_9: nibbānena nibbute. Natthi kutoci hetuto bhayaṃ yesaṃ te akuto bhayā. Anāgāmi khīṇāsavā.
anya-e0401n:26_13: saṅgahetvā abhinava aṭṭhakathāyo karonti. Tasmā sabbāabhinavaaṭṭhakathāyo saṅgahā
anya-e0401n:26_14: nāma honti. Te ca ācariyā saṅgahakārā nāma. Tena vuttaṃ “saṅgahakārāti buddhaghosa.
anya-e0401n:26_15: Pe… vuccantī”ti. Te antarāya nīvāraṇameva icchantīti kathaṃ viññāyatīti ce. Tesaṃ
anya-e0401n:26_16: vacanena viññāyatīti dassetuṃ saṅgahakāra gāthaṃ āhari. “Ratanattayekatassa etassanipaccakārassa
anya-e0401n:26_17: ānubhāvena antarāye asesatososetvāti yojanā. “Hī”ti ñāpakahetu jotako. “Vutta”nti
anya-e0401n:27_0: 3. “Kathañcahotī”ti sambandho. Iti ayaṃ pucchā. “Vuccate”ti visajjanā kathīyate.
anya-e0401n:27_2: vāre”ti accanta saṃyogatthe upayoga vacanaṃ. “Puññābhisando”ti puññābhisoto, puññappavāhoti
anya-e0401n:27_3: tasseva vevacanaṃ. “So ca puññātissayo hotī”ti sambandho. Kasmā so puññā tissayo
anya-e0401n:27_4: hotīti. Khetta sampattiyā ca ajjhāsaya sampattiyā ca hotīti dassetuṃ “anuttaresū”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n:27_7: Paribhāvitassa bhāvo paribhāvitattaṃ. Ubhayatthāpi hetu atthe nissakkavacanaṃ. “Mahājutiko”ti
anya-e0401n:27_9: mahānisaṃso. Ānisaṃsapphalanti ca paramparā phalaṃ vuccati. Aññaṃ puññaṃ atikkamanto
anya-e0401n:27_10: sayati pavattatīti atissayo. Puññañca taṃ atissayocāti puññātissayo. Atissayapuññaṃ,
anya-e0401n:27_11: adhika puññanti attho. “So anubalaṃ deti, okāsalābhaṃ karotī”ti sambandho. Kathañca
anya-e0401n:27_12: anubalaṃ deti, kathañca okāsalābhaṃ karotīti āha “sayaṃ payoga sampattibhāveṭhatvā”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:27_13: Tattha payogasampattināma atīta puññakammānaṃ balavataraṃ upatthambhakakammaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:27_16: kāyacittānaṃ sappāya paccayā. Cattāro paccayā ca upaṭṭhākakulāni ca ārakkha devatādayo
anya-e0401n:27_17: ca sukhuppatti paccayā. Tehi paccayehi pāmojja bahu lassa therassa santāne rattidivaṃ
anya-e0401n:27_18: pītipassaddhisukhasamādhīnaṃ pavattiyā ajjhattabhūtā utucittāhārā ca ati paṇītā honti.
anya-e0401n:27_19: Tehi samuṭṭhitā sarīraṭṭhakadhātuyo ca atipaṇītā eva hutvā upabrūhanti. Tattha sarīraṭṭhakadhātuyo
anya-e0401n:27_22: kāleti attho. “Balavabalavantiyo hutvā”ti pakati balato atibalavantiyo hutvā. “Tasmiṃ
anya-e0401n:27_24: ghanena pūrite. “Okāso nāma natthī”ti patiṭṭhānokāso nāma natthi. “Itī”ti tasmā.
anya-e0401n:27_25: “Dūrato apanītāneva hontī”ti sambandho. Iṭṭhapphalasantānaṃ vibādhanti nīvārentīti
anya-e0401n:27_27: akusala janaka kammāni, apuñña kammānīti tānitividhāni akusalakammāni dūrato apanītāneva
anya-e0401n:27_28: honti, tesaṃ vipākassa anokāsakaraṇenāti adhippāyo. Tenāha “nahī”tiādiṃ. “Tato”ti
anya-e0401n:27_29: tasmā apuñña kammānaṃ dūrato apanītattā. Abhivādetabbānaṃ mātāpitu samaṇabrāhmaṇādīnaṃ
anya-e0401n:27_30: abhivādanakammegaruṃkaraṇaṃ abhivādana sīlaṃ nāma. Taṃ assa atthīti abhivādanasīlī.
anya-e0401n:27_31: Guṇavuddhavayavuddhe apaceti attānaṃ nīcavutti karaṇena pūjetisīlenāti vuddhāpacāyī.
anya-e0401n:27_32: Ubhayatthāpisampadāna vacanaṃ. Evantiādini gamana vacanaṃ. Nigamanti ca niṭṭhaṅgamanaṃ.
anya-e0401n:27_33: Tasmātiādi laddhaguṇa vacanaṃ. Laddhaguṇoti ca taṃtaṃpasaṅga visodhanaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ
anya-e0401n:27_34: katvā laddhovisuddho attho vuccati. Tathā vacana sāmatthiyena laddho atthantaropi
anya-e0401n:27_35: ayamidha adhippeto. “Nakevalañca therasseva anantarāyena parisamāpanatthaṃ hotī”ti
anya-e0401n:27_36: yojanā. “Sotūnañcagahaṇa kicca sampajjanattha”ntisambandho. Suṇantīti sotāro. Tesaṃ.
anya-e0401n:27_38: Javanavinicchaye yasmā antarāya nīvāraṇaṃnāma diṭṭhadhamme icchitabbaṃ phalaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:27_39: Diṭṭha dhammo ca pathama javanassa vipākakkhettaṃ. Tasmā upatthambhana kiccaṃ patvāpi
anya-e0401n:27_40: pathama javana cetanā eva idhapariyattāti adhippāyena “diṭṭhadhammavedanīyabhūtā”ti
anya-e0401n:27_41: vuttaṃ. Sā pana pathama javana cetanā upatthambhana kiccaṃ patvāpi sabbadubbalā evasiyā.
anya-e0401n:27_42: Kasmā, aladdhāsevanattā. Sesa cetanāyo eva balavatiyo siyuṃ. Kasmā, laddhā sevanattāti
anya-e0401n:27_43: daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Sattajavanapakkhe adhippetattā upaladdhabbattā taṃ nasundara”nti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:27_44: “Itī”ti vākyaparisamāpanaṃ. “Yathā appamattakaṃ hoti. Evamevaṃ appamattakaṃ hotī”ti
anya-e0401n:27_45: yojetabbaṃ. “Tathāhī”ti tato evāti attho. Paṭṭhānepi=kabaḷīkāroāhāro imassakāyassa
anya-e0401n:27_47: rūpānaṃ āhārapaccayena paccayo’ti vibhatto siyāti. “Adhunāvā”ti imasmiṃ bhave eva.
anya-e0401n:27_48: Evaṃ vandanāyapayojanaṃ dīpetvā idāni sesānaṃ piṇḍatthānaṃ payojanaṃ dīpetuṃ “yasmāpanā”tiādi
anya-e0401n:27_50: sutvā viññātesati, “ussāhojāyati”. Imaṃ uggahetvā sudullabhe abhidhammatthe ca anāyāsena
anya-e0401n:27_51: jānissāma, tammūlakassa ca anupādā parinibbānantassa payojanassabhāgino bhavissāmāti
anya-e0401n:29_0: 4. Padatthe. “Bujjhī”ti aññāsi. “Etthā”ti etasmiṃ pade. Ca saddo vākyārambha jotako.
anya-e0401n:29_1: Vākyā rambhoti ca mūlavākye yaṃ yaṃ vattabbaṃ avuttaṃ, tassa tassa kathanatthāya
anya-e0401n:29_3: sammāsaddo asesa byāpanaṃ dīpetīti pucchāya purimatthame vabyatirekato ca anvayato
anya-e0401n:29_4: ca puna vitthārento “tathāhī”tiādimāha. Tattha, “tathāhī”ti tassa vacanassa ayaṃ
anya-e0401n:29_5: vitthāroti joteti. “Aviparīta”nti kiriyāvisesana padametaṃ. “Attano visaye evā”ti
anya-e0401n:29_6: attano ñāṇavisaye eva tesaṃ visayocāti sambandho. Yasmā ekopi dhammo kāladesasantānādibhedena
anya-e0401n:29_7: ananta bhedo hoti. Tasmā padesañāṇikā paccekabuddhādayo ekadhammaṃpi sabbākārato
anya-e0401n:29_8: jānituṃ na sakkonti. Tenāha “tehī”tiādiṃ. Tattha “sabbākārato”ti sabhāvato, hetuto,
anya-e0401n:29_9: paccayato, phalato, nissandato, kālato, desatotiādinā ākārena. “Yatthā”ti yasmiṃ
anya-e0401n:29_10: avisayedhamme. “Te viparītaṃ bujjheyyuṃ, so avisayo nāmadhammonatthī”tiyojanā. Taṃ
anya-e0401n:29_13: dhammā”tiādi pāḷisādhakaṃ. Tattha, “āpāta”nti abhimukhaṃ patanaṃ. Ābādhantipi pāṭho,
anya-e0401n:29_15: pacchimabhave paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya pavattaṃ aṭṭhasu mahāvipākesu pathamamahāvipākaṃ
anya-e0401n:29_16: bhavaṅga cittaṃ. “Tatthā”ti tasmiṃ mahābhavaṅge. “Niccakālaṃ upaṭṭhahantī”ti sabbakālaṃ
anya-e0401n:29_17: upaṭṭhānākāra pattā hutvā tiṭṭhanti. Kasmā, kassaci āvaraṇassa abhāvato. Idaṃpihi
anya-e0401n:29_18: ekaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ nāmāti. “Āvajjanāyā”ti manodvārāvajjana cittena. Dhammā mahantā.
anya-e0401n:29_19: Bhavaṅgaṃ parittakaṃ. Tasmā parittakaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ ekakkhaṇe mahantānaṃ dhammānaṃ napahotīti
anya-e0401n:29_21: ettha “ukkaṃso”ti accuggamo accuttaro. Paramo ukkaṃso paramukkaṃsotiviggaho.
anya-e0401n:30_0: Evaṃ sammāsaddassa atthaṃ vicāretvā idāni saṃsaddassa atthaṃ vicārento “saṃsaddopanā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n:30_2: Natthi ācariyo etassāti anācariyo. Samāsante kakārena saha anācariyako. Anācariyakassa
anya-e0401n:30_3: bhāvo anācariyakatā. Taṃ anācariyakataṃ. Tatīyā ruppasamāpatti nāma ākiñcaññāyatanajjhānaṃ.
anya-e0401n:30_4: Taṃ bhagavā āḷārassa santike uggaṇhāti. Catutthāruppasamāpatti nāma nevasaññā nāsaññāyatanajjhānaṃ.
anya-e0401n:30_6: analaṅkaritvā. Anāsevitvāti vuttaṃ hoti. “Chaḍḍitattā”ti etāsamāpattiyonālaṃ bodhāya,
anya-e0401n:30_7: atha kho yāvadeva tatīya catutthāruppabhavappaṭilābhāya saṃvattantīti evaṃ ādīnavaṃ
anya-e0401n:30_9: tā kuto paṭivedhadhammā honti. Paṭivedhadhammā eva ca buddhabhāvāyapadaṭṭhānāhontīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:31_0: Pāḷiyaṃ. “Pubbe ananussutesudhammesū”ti imasmiṃ bhave ito pubbe kassacisantike ananussute
anya-e0401n:31_2: vuttaṃ. Tadeva ñāṇaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇassa padaṭṭhānaṃ hoti. Tappaccayā tadanantarā
anya-e0401n:31_3: evasabbaññutaññāṇaṃ pātubbhavatīti vuttaṃ “tattha ca sabbaññutaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti. “Tadanantarā”ti
anya-e0401n:31_4: ca arahatta maggavīthiyāca catunnaṃ paccavekkhana vārānañca anantare kāleti attho.
anya-e0401n:31_6: Tāsu hi paccattavacanaṃ, upayogavacanaṃ, karaṇa vacanaṃ, sampadāna vacanaṃ, nissakkavacanaṃ,
anya-e0401n:31_7: sāmivacanaṃ, summavacananti evaṃ anukkamena sattannaṃ vibhattīnaṃ nāmāni āgatānīti.
anya-e0401n:32_1: attano vasaṃ vattetuṃ samatthatā saṅkhātosatti viseso vasonāma. Vaso etassa atthīti
anya-e0401n:32_2: vasī-vasigaṇehītiādīsuviya. Vasino bhāvo vasibhāvo. Taṃ vasibhāvanti attho. Tenāha
anya-e0401n:34_1: iti tasmā dutīyena atulapadena kiṃ payojanaṃ atthīti attho. “Nana samatthā”ti nasamatthā
anya-e0401n:34_2: na hotīti yojanā. Samatthā evāti adhippāyo. “Mattakārino”ti pamāṇakārino. “Thero
anya-e0401n:34_3: ca tesaṃ aññataro”, tasmā mattaṃ na karoti, dutīyaṃ atula padaṃ āharīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:34_4: “Apicā”ti kiñci vattabbaṃ atthīti attho. “Nakevalaṃ vandanāya antarāyanīvāraṇameva
anya-e0401n:34_5: icchi tabbaṃ hotī”ti yojanā. “Vandanāyā”ti vandanāhetu. Sopi paññāpāṭavādi attho.
anya-e0401n:34_6: “Ganthapārisuddhiyā”ti ganthadosānāma padadosa vākyadosa atthadosādayo atthi. Tehi
anya-e0401n:34_7: dosehi imassa ganthassa pārisuddhiyā. Kathaṃ pana vandanāya paññāpāṭavādi atthosambhavatīti
anya-e0401n:34_8: vuttaṃ “anussatiṭṭhānesū”tiādi. Anussatiṭṭhānāni nāma buddha dhamma saṅghasīlādīni.
anya-e0401n:34_10: attha byañjana padesu amandā vissaṭṭhā hutvā vahati. “Tadatthāyapī”ti paññāpāṭavādi
anya-e0401n:34_11: atthāyapi. Guṇanāmapadānaṃ guṇatthonāmaviggaha vākyesu pākaṭo, siddhapadesu apākaṭo.
anya-e0401n:34_12: Tasmā tāni viggahatthaṃ ajānantānaṃ santike nāma mattāni sampajjantīti vuttaṃ “yathāvutta
anya-e0401n:34_14: jānantānaṃ. Māgadhabhāsāhi mūlabhāsāti ca ariyabhāsāti ca māgadhabhāsāti ca pāḷibhāsāti
anya-e0401n:34_15: ca dhammaniruttīti ca sabhāvaniruttīti ca vuccati. “Bhāvatthasuñña”nti ettha guṇanāmānaṃ
anya-e0401n:34_16: guṇattho bhāvattho nāma. So evasakatthoti ca vacanatthoti ca viggahatthoti ca vuccati.
anya-e0401n:34_18: bhavituṃ nārahati. Tathāhi anāthapiṇḍikoseṭṭhi rājagahaṃ anupatto buddho loke uppannoti
anya-e0401n:34_19: sutvā udānaṃ udānesi=ghosopi kho esodullabho lokasmiṃ yadidaṃ buddho=ti. Tasmā buddhoti
anya-e0401n:34_20: nāmaṃpi loke mahantaṃ sudullabhaṃguṇapadaṃ hoti. Sammāsambuddha nāmevattabbamevanatthīti.
anya-e0401n:34_21: “Sabhāvaniruttiṃ ajānantānaṃ pana padasahassaṃ vuccamānaṃpī”ti tiṭṭhatu ekaṃ atulapadaṃ,
anya-e0401n:34_22: padasahassaṃpi vuccamānaṃ satthusamaññāmattameva sampajjati. Tādisāhi janā idaṃ loke
anya-e0401n:35_0: “Atulo”ti aññena so asadisoti vā, añño vātena sadisotassanatthītivā, - dvidhāpiattholabbhati.
anya-e0401n:35_1: Sādhakagāthāyaṃ “paṭipuggalo”ti yugaggāhīpuggalo. Kiñcāpi makkhali pūraṇādayo visuṃvisuṃ
anya-e0401n:35_2: - ahaṃ sabbaññū sabbadassāvī - tica, ahaṃ sammāsambuddho-tica paṭijānantā yugaggāhino
anya-e0401n:35_3: hutvā vicaranti. Dhammato pana sineru pabbata rājassa santike sakkhara kathalāniviyasampajjantīti.
anya-e0401n:35_5: bhūtassapattassa. “Yaṃ buddha bhūtassa atulattaṃ, etaṃ anacchariya”nti yojanā. Yadi
anya-e0401n:35_6: cetaṃ anacchariyaṃ hoti, katamaṃ pana tāva acchariyaṃ bhavatīti āha “sampatijātassā”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:35_7: Tattha “sampatijātassā”ti ajjevajātassapi assa bhagavato. Kathaṃ atulatā paññāyatīti
anya-e0401n:35_9: atimahanto obhāso pātubbhavati. = Uḷāro obhāso pāturahosi atikkammadevānaṃ devānubhāva=ntihi
anya-e0401n:35_10: vuttaṃ. Tena obhāsena pharitā sabbe pathavi pabbatādayo jātiphalikakkhandhāviya suppasannā
anya-e0401n:35_11: honti. Dasasahassa cakkavāḷāni ekatalaṃ hutvā paññāyanti. Tena vuttaṃ “anekāni cakkavāḷasahassāni
anya-e0401n:35_13: sattalokato. Evaṃ acchambhi vācaṃ nicchāresi dhammatāya sañcoditattāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:35_14: Tattha “acchambhivāca”nti visāradavācaṃ. Āsabhiṃ vācantipi pāṭho. Uttamavācanti attho.
anya-e0401n:35_15: “Nicchāresī”ti udāharati. Idampi anacchariyaṃ, aññaṃ pitato acchariyataraṃ atthīti
anya-e0401n:35_16: dassetuṃ “yadāpanā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Pāramitā guṇehi tena sadiso kocinattheva thapetvā
anya-e0401n:35_17: aññe ca mahābodhi satteti adhippāyo. “Assā”ti tena sadisassa. “Natthibhāvo dīpetabbo”ti
anya-e0401n:35_19: satasahassaṃ sakkhissatī”ti yojanā. Pāramiyo pakārenavicinanti etenāti pāramipavicayo.
anya-e0401n:35_20: Ñāṇaṃ. Taṃpanañāṇaṃ mahābodhisattānaṃ eva uppannaṃ nahoti. Paccekabodhisatta sāvakabodhisattānaṃpi
anya-e0401n:35_21: uppannameva. Tadeva ca sabbesaṃpi bodhisattānaṃ niyatabyākaraṇappaṭilābhe padhānakāraṇanti
anya-e0401n:35_23: nāmaṃ. Bodhimhisajanti laggantīti bodhisattā. “Laggantī”ti tappaṭilābhatthāya niyata
anya-e0401n:35_24: cittā hontīti attho. Bodhi atthāya paṭipannā sattā bodhisattātipi yujjati. Buddha
anya-e0401n:35_25: suññepiloke kammassakatāñāṇe ṭhatvā vaṭṭadukkhato mokkhadhammapariyesino sattāti
anya-e0401n:35_26: vuttaṃ hoti. “Sambhāra dhamme”ti dasavidhe pārami dhamme. Vaṭṭaṃ anusaranti anugacchantīti
anya-e0401n:35_27: vaṭṭānusārino. Pathaviyaṃ paṃsucuṇṇāni viya pakatiyā vaputhubhūtājanāti puthujjanā.
anya-e0401n:35_28: Mahantāputhujjanāti mahāputhujjanā. Vaṭṭānusārino ca te mahāputhujjanācāti samāso.
anya-e0401n:35_29: Tesaṃ bhāvoti viggaho. Ayaṃ bhāvoyeva tesaṃ bhūmīti ca vuccati. Atthato pana mokkhadhammanirapekkhatā
anya-e0401n:35_30: eva. Acchandikatātipi vuccati. “Okkantā”ti paviṭṭhā. Tayoniyatā, bodhisattaniyato
anya-e0401n:35_31: ca cūḷasotāpannaniyato ca ariya sotāpannaniyato ca. Tattha bodhisattaniyato bodhisambhārabalena
anya-e0401n:35_32: siddho. Cūḷasotāpanna niyato paccayākārānubodhaññāṇabalena. Ariyasotāpanna niyato
anya-e0401n:35_33: sotāpatti maggaññāṇa balena. Tesu bodhisattaniyato idha adhippetoti vuttaṃ “ekena
anya-e0401n:35_34: pariyāyenā”tiādi. Vattabbamevanatthitesaṃ dvinnaṃ bodhisattānaṃ pārami pavicayaññāṇa
anya-e0401n:35_35: sampattiyā vinā niyatabyākaraṇa lābhā saṅkāya eva abhāvatoti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:36_0: Padasiddhivicāreyaṃ vuttaṃ vibhāvaniyaṃ=tulāyasamitotulyo. Tulyo eva tuloyakāra lopavasenā=ti.
anya-e0401n:36_3: Tattha “tulāyā”ti loke dhāraṇatulāsadisāya paññāyāti attho. “Samīto”ti samaṃ kato.
anya-e0401n:36_4: Nahi tulasaddo bhavituṃ nayutto. Yutto evāti adhippāyo. Kathaṃ viññāyatīti āha “tulayitu”ntiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:36_6: pubbe-tulayitabbo aññena saha pamitabboti tuloti evaṃ idhavuttena kamma sādhana vacanattheneva.
anya-e0401n:36_7: “Tadatthasiddhito”ti tassa vibhāvaniyaṃ vuttassa duvidhassa atthassa siddhito. “Tato”ti
anya-e0401n:36_8: tulasaddato. Cintāya kiṃ payojanaṃ atthi. Natthiyevāti adhippāyo. Vadati sīlenāti
anya-e0401n:36_9: vattā. Vādī puggalo. Vattuno icchāvatticchā. Vattuṃ icchāvatticchātipivadanti. Vatticchaṃ
anya-e0401n:36_10: anugato sammuti saṅketavohāra siddhattāti samāso. “Eta”nti etaṃ dvidhāsiddhavacanaṃ.
anya-e0401n:36_11: “Ce”ti cevadeyya. “Nā”ti nayuttaṃ. “Yathāsuta”nti tula iti sutaṃ. “Yutta”nti yathāsuta
anya-e0401n:36_13: Tatoyevayakāra yuttassatulyasaddassa ca assutassa. Itthiliṅgesati, tatopi eko akāroti
anya-e0401n:36_14: katvā samītatthe dutīyo taddhita akāropi assutoyevanāmahoti. “Parikappanāyā”ti parikappetvā
anya-e0401n:37_0: 6. Evaṃ dvinnaṃ padānaṃ padattha saṃvaṇṇanaṃ katvā idāni tesaṃyeva atthuddhārasaṃvaṇṇanaṃ
anya-e0401n:37_2: nāma” samatiṃ sapāramīnaṃ paripūraṇaṃ. “Mahāvajiraññāṇa”nti bhagavato āsavakkhayaññāṇampi
anya-e0401n:37_3: vuccati. Tassa pubbabhāge buddhabhāvatthāya anupadadhammavipassanāvasena chattiṃsa
anya-e0401n:37_4: koṭi satasahassa saṅkhānaṃ devasikaṃ vaḷañjanakapphalasamāpattīnaṃ pubbabhāga vipassanāñāṇampi
anya-e0401n:37_5: mahāvajiraññāṇanti vuccati. Sabbampetaṃ mahāṭīkāyaṃ vuttaṃ. “Mahābodhiyā”ti sabbaññu
anya-e0401n:37_6: buddhānaṃ abhisambodhi saṅkhātassa aggamaggaññāṇassa. Pahiyyanti pahātabbā dhammā
anya-e0401n:37_7: etenāti pahānaṃ. Pajahanti pahātabbedhammeetenātivā pahānanti katvā taṃ aggamaggaññāṇampitaṃ
anya-e0401n:37_8: vipassanāñāṇampi pahānanti vuccatīti iminā adhippāyena “pahānasampadāyaṃ vā sā saṅgahitā”ti
anya-e0401n:37_9: vuttaṃ. Pañcasīlāni. Pāṇātipātassa pahānaṃsīlaṃ, veramaṇisīlaṃ, cetasikaṃsīlaṃ, saṃvarosīlaṃ,
anya-e0401n:37_10: avītikkamosilantiādīsuviya etthahi pahānasīlaṃ nāma yathā vuttena atthena veramaṇisīlamevāti
anya-e0401n:37_11: yujjati. Pahānaṃ nāma kocidhammo nahotīti adhippāye pana satipahāna sīsena pahānasādhakaṃ
anya-e0401n:37_12: tadevañāṇadvayaṃ upacārenapahānanti gahetabbaṃ. Itarathā pahānasampadā nāma asārā
anya-e0401n:37_13: aphalāti āpajjeyyāti. Paccekabuddha buddhasāvakā kilese pajahantāpi vāsanāya saha
anya-e0401n:37_14: appajahanato citta santāne mohavāsanāya vijjamānattā sabbaññu bhāvaṃ nagacchanti.
anya-e0401n:37_15: Tasmā yathātesaṃ kilesappahānaṃ pahānasampadā nāma nahoti. Natathāsabbaññubuddhānanti
anya-e0401n:37_16: āha “sahavāsanāyā”tiādiṃ. Vibhāvaniyaṃñāṇasampadā pathamaṃ vuttā. Tato pahāna sampadā.
anya-e0401n:37_17: Ṭīkāyaṃ pana pahānasampadā pathamaṃ vuttā. Tato adhigama sampadānāma vuttā. Tato
anya-e0401n:37_18: ñāṇasampadā. Pahānasampadāyañca aggamaggaññāṇaṃ dassitaṃ. Adhigama sampadāti ca sabbaññutaññāṇappaṭilābho
anya-e0401n:37_21: sabbaññutaññāṇassapadaṭṭhānaṃ, āsanna kāraṇaṃ. “Na hi maggaññāṇato aññā pahānasampadānāma
anya-e0401n:37_22: atthi”. Paramatthato natthīti adhippāyo. Idañca visuddhimagge=pahānanti koci dhammonāma
anya-e0401n:37_23: natthi aññatra vuttappakārānaṃ pāṇātipātādīnaṃ anuppādamattato=ti āgatattā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:37_24: Pahāyakadhammasamādānena pana pahātabba dhammānaṃ anuppādo nāma ekopaṇīta dhammohoti.
anya-e0401n:37_25: Ekaṃ santi padaṃ hoti. Tathāhi vuttaṃ paṭisambhidā magge=uppādo bhayaṃ, anuppādo
anya-e0401n:37_26: khemanti santipade ñāṇaṃ. Pavatti bhayaṃ, appavatti khemanti santipadeñāṇa=nti. Tadaṅgappahānaṃ
anya-e0401n:37_27: panatadaṅgaanuppādo nāma. Vikkhambhanappahānaṃ vikkhambhana anuppādo nāma. Samucchedappahānaṃ
anya-e0401n:37_28: samuccheda anuppādo nāmāti vattabbaṃ. Idha pana anuppāda sampāpakaṃ vipassanā ñāṇañca
anya-e0401n:37_29: maggaññāṇañca upacārena pahānanti adhippetaṃ. Kasmā, upariñāṇa sampadādīnaṃ paccayattāti
anya-e0401n:37_31: āgataṃ. “Sīlādiguṇehī”ti sīla samādhi paññā vimutti vimuttiññāṇadassana guṇehi. “Iddhidhammehī”ti
anya-e0401n:37_33: mahāpurisalakkhaṇehi ca asīti khuddakalakkhaṇehi ca paṭimaṇḍitassa. “Āsayo”ti citta
anya-e0401n:37_37: dvepahāna sampadā ñāṇasampadā. Sammāsambuddhapade. “Sāmaṃ saccāni abhisambujjhī”ti
anya-e0401n:37_38: ettha abhisambodhisaṅkhātaṃ aggamaggaññāṇaṃ gahitaṃ. Tañca pahānakiccappadhānaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:37_39: “Tattha ca sabbaññutaṃ patto”ti ettha sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ. “Balesu ca vasibhāva”nti
anya-e0401n:37_40: ettha dasabalaññāṇāni gahitāni. Tena vuttaṃ “dve…pe… sammāsambuddhapadenavibhāvitā”ti.
anya-e0401n:39_1: samavāyatthattā ahaṃlokanāyakañca saṅghañca namassissanti evaṃ samavāyattho viññāyati.
anya-e0401n:39_2: Tathā idhapi sammāsambuddhañcasaddhammañca gaṇuttamañca abhivādiyāmīti evaṃ kiriyāsamavāyattho
anya-e0401n:39_3: sahasaddena dīpitoti dassetuṃ “dūratohaṃ…pe… evamidaṃ daṭṭhabba”nti vuttaṃ. “Ida”nti
anya-e0401n:39_4: sasaddhammagaṇuttamapadaṃ. Ettha ca“samavāyo”ti dvinnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ bahūnaṃ vā atthānaṃ
anya-e0401n:39_5: ekasmiṃ dabbevā guṇevākiriyāyavāsamaṃ avecca ayanaṃpavattanaṃ samavāyo. Paccānutāpa
anya-e0401n:39_6: paccānumodanādiṭhānesu=ahaṃ pubbedānaṃ nadadissaṃ, sīlaṃ narakkhissaṃ. - Anekajāti
anya-e0401n:39_7: saṃsāraṃ sandhāvissa=ntiādinā atītepikāle anāgatavacanaṃ payujjatīti āha “namassissa”nti
anya-e0401n:39_9: Abbhūta tabbhāvecāyaṃ īkāro. Yathā, kāko setī bhavati, bako kaṇhībhavatīti. Ettha
anya-e0401n:39_10: ca “setī bhavatī”ti asetapubbo setobhavati. “Kaṇhībhavatī”ti akaṇhapubbo kaṇhobhavatīti
anya-e0401n:39_11: attho. Tathā idhapi. Buddhaṃ dhammañca saṅghañcavanditvā-tiādīsu visuṃvisuṃ padhānattā
anya-e0401n:39_12: aguṇabhūtāpi dhammasaṅghā idhasamāsapade aññapadatthassaguṇabhūtāhonti. Ayaṃ abbhūtatabbhāvattho
anya-e0401n:39_13: nāma. “Abhivāditabhāvo”ti vutte tapaccayassa bahulaṃ atītakālavisayattā pubbeganthārambhakāle
anya-e0401n:39_14: dhamma saṅghānaṃpi therassa vandanāsiddhi dassitā hoti. “Abhivādetabba bhāvo”ti vuttepana
anya-e0401n:39_15: tabbapaccayassakālasāmaññavisayattāna tathā dassitā hoti. Dānaṃ dātabbaṃ, sīlaṃ rakkhitabbantiādīsu
anya-e0401n:39_16: viya dhammasaṅghānāmasabbakālaṃpi abhivādetabbāti. Evaṃ dhammasaṅghānaṃ sabbakālaṃpi
anya-e0401n:39_17: abhivādanārahaguṇo eva dassitoti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “tatthā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha,
anya-e0401n:39_18: “abhivādana”nti idaṃ kiriyāsamavāyadassanato vuttaṃ. Kālavisesaṃ pana nadīpetiyeva.
anya-e0401n:39_19: “Attano nidassanenā”ti saputtadāro āgatoti attanā nīharitvā dassitena payogena. Sohi
anya-e0401n:39_20: payogo kiriyā samavāyasseva. Naguṇasamavāyassāti. Ettha ca therassa vandanāvacane
anya-e0401n:39_21: thero imehi yevapadehi ratanattayaṃtīhidvāre hivandatīti gahetvā “abhivādiyā”ti ettha
anya-e0401n:39_22: abhivādiyādhīti ca atthaṃ nīharanti. Appadhāna kiriyāpade pana tadattha nīharaṇaṃ
anya-e0401n:39_23: asambhāvento “apicā”tiādimāha. Tattha “apicā”ti kiñci vattabbaṃ atthīti atthajotane
anya-e0401n:40_0: Vacanatthe. Sadhano puriso, dhanavāpuriso-ti ādayo samāsataddhitasaddā yebhūyyena
anya-e0401n:40_1: atissayattha dīpakā honti. Nahi appakena dhanena tathā voharanti. Tasmā idhāpi tathā
anya-e0401n:40_2: rūpaṃ atissayatthaṃ dassetuṃ “attanānimmitena…pe… saraṇabhūtenā”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha,
anya-e0401n:40_5: gaṇuttamanti thomanaṃ. “Idaṃpī”ti dutīyattha sampiṇḍane ayaṃpikāro. Nakevalaṃ purimapadadvayameva
anya-e0401n:40_6: satthu asādhāraṇaguṇapadaṃ hoti. Atha kho idaṃpi padaṃ satthu paccekabuddhādīhi asādhāraṇa
anya-e0401n:41_2: dhammo nāmā”ti kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu nissaraṇappahānameva nibbānassa kiccaṃ, idañca
anya-e0401n:41_4: hutvā”ti ārammaṇādhipatibhūtaṃ ārammaṇū panissayabhūtañca nibbānaṃ attano patiṭṭhaṃ
anya-e0401n:41_5: katvāti adhippāyo. Apica, samucchedoti ca nissaraṇanti ca atthato samānagatikaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:41_6: Tasmā nissaraṇaṃpi mukhyadhāraṇa mevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Nissaraṇamevavā padhānadhāraṇanti
anya-e0401n:41_8: “Etepañca pariyāyadhammāyeva”. Kasmā, nibbānassaviyamaggānaṃ samuccheda kicce asahāyattāti.
anya-e0401n:41_9: Ettha ca “sāmaññapphalānī”ti samaṇassa bhāvo sāmaññaṃ. Ariyamaggassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Sāmaññassaphalaṃ
anya-e0401n:41_10: sāmaññapphalaṃ. Dutīyavikappe akicca paccayabhūtāpi kecikitakapaccayā kammatthegatā
anya-e0401n:41_11: kiccapaccayānaṃpi atthaṃ dīpeti. Yathā, diṭṭhaṃ, sutaṃ, mutaṃ, viññātanti vuttaṃ
anya-e0401n:41_13: “Kecī”ti cattāro maggā. Puna “kecī”ti nibbānameva. Bahuvacana sotepatitattā ettha
anya-e0401n:41_14: bahuvacanaṃ ruḷaṃ. Puna “kecī”ti cattāro sāmaññapphala dhammā. “Kecī”ti pariyatti
anya-e0401n:41_15: dhammo. Etthāpi bahuvacanaṃ sotapatitameva. “Dhārenta”nti dhārentaṃ puggalaṃ. Tatīya
anya-e0401n:41_16: vikappe “apatamānaṃ vahantī”ti apatamānaṃ katvā vahanti. Catuttha vikappe “etthā”ti
anya-e0401n:41_17: etasmiṃ dhamme. Dhammovadīpaṃ etesanti dhammadīpā. Dhammova paṭisaraṇaṃ etesanti
anya-e0401n:41_18: dhammappaṭisaraṇā. Dhammadīpā bhikkhave bhavatha dhammappaṭisaraṇā, anaññappaṭisaraṇā
anya-e0401n:41_19: tihi vuttaṃ. Laddhā patiṭṭhā etesanti laddhappatiṭṭhā. Yujjatiyeva. Dhammadīpapāṭhānulomattāti
anya-e0401n:41_20: adhippāyo. Dhammavicāraṇāyaṃ, codakopaṭipatti dhammaṃ dasavidha dhammato aññaṃmaññamāno
anya-e0401n:41_21: “kasmā”tiādinā codeti. So pana paṭipatti dhammo tato aññona hoti, tattheva antogadhoti
anya-e0401n:41_23: ambapupphaambapphalassa patiṭṭhā bhāvena pubbabhāga nissayo hoti. Kasmā, itoyevatassa
anya-e0401n:41_24: pupphapphalassa jātattā etthevasaṃ vaḍḍhitattā ca. Tathā paṭipatti dhammopi ariyamaggapphalassapatiṭṭhābhāvena
anya-e0401n:41_25: pubbabhāgūpanissayappaṭipadāhoti. Kasmā, itoyeva tassajātattā etthevasaṃ vaḍḍhitattā
anya-e0401n:41_26: ca. Vuttañhetaṃ mahāvagga saṃyutte. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave yekeci mebījagāmabhūtagāmāvuḍḍhiṃ
anya-e0401n:41_27: viruḷiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjanti. Sabbete pathaviṃ nissāya pathaviṃ patiṭṭhāya. Evameva
anya-e0401n:41_28: kho bhikkhave bhikkhusīlaṃ nissāya sīlepatiṭṭhāya ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgīkaṃ maggaṃ bhāvento
anya-e0401n:41_29: vuḍḍhiṃ viruḷhiṃ vepullaṃ pāpuṇāti dhammesūti. “Pubbacetanāviyadāne”ti yathā tividhaṃ
anya-e0401n:41_30: puññaṃ, dānamayaṃ puññaṃ sīlamayaṃ puññaṃ bhāvanāmayaṃ puññanti vutte dānavatthu
anya-e0401n:41_31: pariyesanato paṭṭhāya dānaṃ ārabbhapavattā sabbā pubbabhāga cetanā dānavacane saṅgahitā
anya-e0401n:41_32: dānantveva saṅkhyaṃgatā. Evaṃ so paṭipatti dhammo ariya maggavacane evasaṅgahito,
anya-e0401n:41_33: ariyamaggo tveva saṅkhyaṃ gatoti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:42_0: Imasmiṃ dhammasaṃsandane aparampi vattabbaṃ vadanto “apicā”tiādimāha. Tattha “yadaggenā”ti
anya-e0401n:42_1: yenakāraṇakoṭṭhāsena dhāraṇūpāyotiādinā kāraṇabhāgenāti attho. Vandanaṃ araha tīti
anya-e0401n:42_2: vandaneyyo. Tasmiṃ vandaneyye. “Puthujjanakalyāṇako”ti ettha tividho kalyāṇako vinayakalyāṇako
anya-e0401n:42_3: suttantakalyāṇako abhidhammakalyāṇakoti. Tattha vinaye paññattāya kalyāṇappaṭipattiyā
anya-e0401n:42_4: samannāgato bhikkhu vinayakalyāṇako nāma. So idha bhikkhu pātimokkha saṃvarasaṃvuto
anya-e0401n:42_5: viharati ācāra gocara sampanno, aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī samādāya sikkhati
anya-e0401n:42_6: sikkhāpadesūti ettha veditabbo. Tattha vinaye paññattākalyāṇappaṭipattiduvidhā, ādi
anya-e0401n:42_8: ādibrahmacariyakaṃ nāma. Khandhakapariyāpannaṃ sīlaṃ abhisamacārikaṃ nāma.
anya-e0401n:43_0: Suttantesu vuttāya kalyāṇappaṭipattiyā samannāgato gahaṭṭho vā pabbajito vā suttanta
anya-e0401n:43_1: kalyāṇako nāma. So catūhi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato ariyasāvako sabbaṃ duggatibhayaṃ
anya-e0401n:43_2: samatikkanto hoti. Katamehi catūhi. Idha bhikkhave ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena
anya-e0401n:43_3: samannāgato hoti iti piso bhagavā…pe… satthādevamanussānaṃ, buddho, bhagavāti. Dhamme
anya-e0401n:43_4: aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo…pe… paccattaṃ veditabbo
anya-e0401n:43_5: viññūhīti. Saṅghe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti suppaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho…pe…
anya-e0401n:43_6: anuttaraṃ puññakkhettaṃ lokassāti. Ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato hotīti ettha veditabbo.
anya-e0401n:43_7: Tattha buddhe aveccappasādo nāma arahaṃ, sammāsambuddho, tiādikānaṃ guṇapadānaṃ attha
anya-e0401n:43_8: jānanaññāṇena yutto pasādo. Ariyehikāmīyanti icchīyantīti ariyakantāni. Suparisuddhassa
anya-e0401n:43_9: ājīvaṭṭhamakasīlassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Cattārimāni bhikkhave sotāpattiyaṅgāni. Katamāni cattāri.
anya-e0401n:43_10: Sappurisasaṃsevo, saddhammassavanaṃ, yoniso manasikāro, dhammānu dhammappaṭipattītiādīni
anya-e0401n:44_0: Abhidhamme vā suttantesu vā vuttāya kalyāṇappaṭipattiyā samannāgatogahaṭṭho vā pabbajito
anya-e0401n:44_1: vā abhidhammakalyāṇako nāma. So idha sutavā ariyasāvako ariyānaṃ dassāvī ariya dhammassakovido
anya-e0401n:44_2: ariyadhammesu vinīto. So rūpaṃ attato na samanupassatīti ettha veditabbo. Tattha,
anya-e0401n:44_3: “sutavā”ti ettha khandhā, yatana, dhātu, paṭiccasamuppāda, satipaṭṭhānā, dīsu uggaha
anya-e0401n:44_4: paripucchā vinicchayaññāṇa samannāgato gahaṭṭho vā pabbajito vā suta vā nāmāti aṭṭhakathāsu
anya-e0401n:44_5: vutto. So eva puthujjana kalyāṇakoti ca vuccati.
anya-e0401n:46: Andho puthujjano eko, kalyāṇeko puthujjano. ti
anya-e0401n:47_0: Ca vuttaṃ. Aṅguttare pana catukkanipāte katamo puggalo appassuto sutena upapanno
anya-e0401n:47_1: hoti. Idhekacco dhammaṃ suṇāti ekāyapi cātuppadikāya gāthāya attha maññāya dhamma
anya-e0401n:47_2: maññāya dhammā nu dhammappaṭipanno hoti. Ayaṃ appassutosutena upapannoti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:47_3: Sutavāti ca sutena upapannoti ca atthato ekanti. Puthujjana kalyāṇako saṅghe sekkhesusaṅgahito.
anya-e0401n:47_4: Vuttaṃhetaṃ parivāre ke sikkhantīti. Puthujjana kalyāṇakena saddhiṃ satta ariyapuggalā
anya-e0401n:47_5: sikkhanti. Arahā khīṇāsavo sikkhitasikkhoti. Dakkhiṇa vibhaṅgasutta aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
anya-e0401n:47_6: pana. Ti saraṇa saraṇaṃ gato upāsakopi sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanne saṅgahitoti
anya-e0401n:47_7: vuttaṃ. Tattha, sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannonāma sotāpatti maggaṭṭho ariyapuggalo.
anya-e0401n:47_9: saṅghaṃsaraṇaṃ gacchāmīti ca, suppaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅghoti ca, evarūpesu
anya-e0401n:47_10: ṭhānesu āgate saṅgha vacane asaṅgahito. “Na hitaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchantassasaraṇagamanaṃ
anya-e0401n:47_11: sampajjatī”ti idaṃ saṅghaṃsaraṇaṃ gacchāmīti ettha saṅgha vacanetassapuggalassa asaṅgahita
anya-e0401n:47_12: bhāvasādhanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Tenāha “taṃ paṭikkhittaṃ hotī”ti. Sace pana sabbaṃ bhagavato
anya-e0401n:47_13: sāvakasaṅghaṃ anuddhissatameva puggalaṃ saṅghaṃsaraṇaṃ gaccheyya āyasmantaṃ saraṇaṃ
anya-e0401n:47_14: gacchāmīti. Saraṇa gamanaṃ na sampajjatiyeva. Atha sabbaṃ bhagavato sāvakasaṅghaṃ
anya-e0401n:47_15: uddissa tassa santike saraṇaṃ gaccheyya saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmīti. Sampajjatiyeva.
anya-e0401n:47_16: Idañca daharakāle sabbappathamaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Idañhi saraṇa gamanaṃ
anya-e0401n:47_17: nāma sakiṃ gahetvā ratanattaye saddhaṃ ajahantassa yāvajīvaṃpi na bhijjati. Punappunaṃ
anya-e0401n:47_18: gahaṇa kiccaṃ natthi. Punappunaṃ gaṇhantepi dosonatthi. Punappunaṃ puññaṃ vaḍḍhati.
anya-e0401n:47_19: Sabbappathamaṃ gahaṇakāle ca aññena dinnattā laddhaṃ nahoti. Attanovacī bhedena laddhaṃ
anya-e0401n:47_20: hoti. Tasmā aññassa santike aggahetvā sayameva vacībhedaṃ gaṇhantassa gahaṭṭhassa
anya-e0401n:47_21: saraṇa gamanaṃ sampajjatiyeva. Tathā sabbāni gahaṭṭhasīlānīti. Sāmaṇera saraṇa gamanampana
anya-e0401n:47_22: bhikkhunādinnameva labbhati. Tañca kho ubhinnaṃpiṭhānakaraṇa sampattiyā sati evāti
anya-e0401n:47_23: daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Vo”ti tumhākaṃ. Yodhammo ca desito yovinayocapaññatto. “Mamaccayenā”ti
anya-e0401n:47_24: mamātikkamena. Mayi parinibbuteti vuttaṃ hoti. Satthā bhavissatīti pāṭhaseso. “Saṃvaṇṇito”ti
anya-e0401n:47_27: adhippāyo. Visesato pana vinayappaṭipatti eva idha pariyattāti daṭṭhabbā. “So”ti
anya-e0401n:47_28: sodussīlo pāpadhammo. Attanopi saraṇaṃ nahoti. Avassaṃ apāyagāmīyeva so hotīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:47_29: “Kuto saraṇaṃ bhavissatī”ti yojanā. “Anekesu suttasahassesū”ti vinayepi bahūni garahasuttapadāni
anya-e0401n:48_0: Saddhammavacanatthe. Kilesesamenti vūpasamentīti santoti vacanatthaṃ sandhāya “samitakilesāna”nti
anya-e0401n:48_1: vuttaṃ. Santa saddo pana pasattheca, pūjiteca, sappuriseca, paṇḍiteca, dissatīti
anya-e0401n:48_3: yojanā. Etena sabhāvato atthisaṃvijjatīti santoti dasseti. “So”ti aññatitthiya dhammo.
anya-e0401n:48_5: yebhuyyena duggati vipākattāti adhippāyo. “Ayaṃ panā”ti satthu saddhammo pana. “Tathā
anya-e0401n:48_6: dhārentassā”ti ayaṃ me hitoti dhārentassa hitoyevasampajjati, sugati nibbāna sampāpakattāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:49_1: janā gaṇīyanti etthāti gaṇo. Saṃhanīyanti ekatokarīyanti etthāti saṅghoti imamatthaṃ
anya-e0401n:49_2: dīpeti. Saha ekato dhammaṃ carantīti sahadhammikā. Ekassa satthuno dhamma vinaye
anya-e0401n:49_3: pabbajitā. Tesaṃ sahadhammikānaṃ. Bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho uttamagaṇo nāma. Ye keci
anya-e0401n:49_4: loke saṅghāvā gaṇāvā. Tathāgatassa sāvakasaṅgho tesaṃ aggamakkhāyatīti hi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:49_5: Soyeva idha gaṇuttamoti vuccati visesana para nipāta vasenāti adhippāyo. Uttamasaddassa
anya-e0401n:49_6: guṇanāmattā “guṇamhiyeva pavattatī”ti vuttaṃ. “Tenā”ti uttama saddena. “Gaṇoti saṅghoyeva
anya-e0401n:49_7: vuccati” saṅghasaddassapi samūhaṭṭhe niruḷhattā, “so vinayakammesu pasiddho”ti pañcasaṅghā
anya-e0401n:49_9: catuvaggakaraṇīyaṃ kammaṃ, pañcavaggakaraṇīyaṃ kammantiādinā pasiddho pākaṭo. Dakkhiṇā
anya-e0401n:49_10: vuccati kammañca kammaphalañca saddahitvā āyatiṃ vipākapphalappaṭi lābhatthāya dinnaṃ
anya-e0401n:49_11: dānakammaṃ dakkhanti vaḍḍhanti sattā etāyāti katvā. Taṃdakkhiṇaṃ paṭiggaṇhituṃ arahatīti
anya-e0401n:49_12: dakkhiṇeyyo. “Arahatī”ti ca anuttara puññakkhetta visesattādāyakena icchita patthitassa
anya-e0401n:49_13: āyatiṃ phalassa suṭṭhusampādanavasena dāyakassa ca avirādhanato asaṅkhyeyyāppameyyavaḍḍhi
anya-e0401n:49_14: āvahanato ca paṭiggaṇhituṃ arahati. Evarūpaṃhidānaṃ nāma uḷāradānaṃ hoti. Taṃ yesudussīlesudiyyati.
anya-e0401n:49_15: Tesaṃ khetta duṭṭhattā dāyakena icchitapatthitaṃ phalaṃ na sampādeti. Nipphalaṃ vā
anya-e0401n:49_16: hoti. Appapphalaṃ vā. Evaṃsati, te dāyakañca virādhenti nāma. Puññapphalāni ca vināsenti
anya-e0401n:49_17: nāma. Sayañca taṃdānaṃ paṭiggahaṇato vā paribhogato vā saddhādeyyaṃ vinipātanato
anya-e0401n:49_18: vā duggati bhāgino honti. Tasmāte evarūpaṃ dānaṃ paṭiggaṇhituṃ nārahantīti. “Upasampadākammaṃ
anya-e0401n:49_19: sammuti nāmā”ti ekena pariyāyena sammuti kammaṃ nāma. Tañhi kāmaṃtera sasusammuti
anya-e0401n:49_20: kammesunāgataṃ. Ñatti catuttha kammavācā saṅkhātāya pana saṅghasammutiyā siddhattā
anya-e0401n:49_21: tena pariyāyena sammuti kammanti vuccatīti. “Upasampannabhūmiṃ patvā”ti upasampannabhūmi
anya-e0401n:49_22: saṅkhātaṃ upariṭhānantaraṃ patvā. Tathā hi vuttaṃ vinaye bhikkhu vibhaṅge. Ñatti
anya-e0401n:49_23: catutthena kammena akuppena ṭhānārahenāti. Tattha, “ṭhānārahenā”ti upasampanna bhūmisaṅkhātaṃ
anya-e0401n:49_24: ṭhānantaraṃ pāpetuṃ arahenāti attho. “Upasampannabhūmī”ti ca upasampanna sīlaṃ vuccati.
anya-e0401n:49_25: “Vinayakammesu pasiddho”ti. Suṇātumebhante saṅgho tiādīsu pākaṭo. Apica “sammuti
anya-e0401n:49_26: saṅgho”ti, devasaṅghāsamāgatātiādīsu viya bahūnaṃ samūhanaṭṭhena lokasammutiyā siddhosaṅgho
anya-e0401n:49_27: sammuti saṅghotipi yujjati. “Ariyapuggalasamūho”ti puthujjanakalyāṇako bhikkhu pubbe
anya-e0401n:49_28: vuttanayena sotāpatti maggaṭṭhe saṅgahitoti, tena saha aṭṭhavidho ariya puggalasamūho.
anya-e0401n:49_29: “Sammuti saṅghe antogadhoyevā”ti etena dakkhiṇeyyasaṅgho nāma visuṃ navattabbo. Tasmiñca
anya-e0401n:49_30: navattabbe sati, sammuti saṅghotipi vattabba kiccaṃ natthi. Bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho
anya-e0401n:49_31: tveva vattabbaṃ hotīti dasseti. Saccametaṃ. Idha pana saṅghavacanena āgataṭṭhānassa
anya-e0401n:49_32: duvidhattā saṅghassa duvidhatā vuttā. Tattha sammuti saṅghassa āgataṭṭhānaṃ vinayakammesūti
anya-e0401n:49_33: vuttameva. Idāni ariyasaṅghassa āgataṭṭhānaṃ dassento “tathāpī”tiādimāha. Tattha
anya-e0401n:49_34: saraṇa gamana…pe… anussatiṭṭhānesu upasampannabhūto bhikkhusaṅghova gahetabbo. Dakkhiṇāvisuddhiṭṭhāne
anya-e0401n:49_35: pana puggalikadānesu catūhi sotāpattiyaṅgehi samannāgato upāsakopi sāmaṇeropi yujjati.
anya-e0401n:49_36: Saṅghika dānesu pana bhikkhusaṅghova. “Tathā tathā saṃvaṇṇetvā”ti āhuneyyo, pāhuneyyo,
anya-e0401n:49_37: dakkhiṇeyyo, añjalīkaraṇīyyo, anuttaraṃ puññakkhettaṃ lokassā, tiādināsuṭṭhu thometvā.
anya-e0401n:49_38: So dakkhiṇeyya saṅgho. “Puthujjana saṅgho”ti idaṃ ariya saṅghena vinākevalaṃ puthujjanasaṅghaṃ
anya-e0401n:49_39: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Ettha ca saṅgha vacanena saṅgha pariyāpanno ekopi bhikkhu gahetabbo.
anya-e0401n:49_40: So sace puthujjano hoti, anuttaraṃ puññakkhettaṃ nahoti. Yadi ariya puggalo hoti,
anya-e0401n:50_0: Dakkhiṇavibhaṅgasutte saṅghikadāne bhavissanti kho panānanda gotrabhuno kāsāvakaṇṭhā
anya-e0401n:50_1: dussīlā pāpadhammā. Tesaṃpi saṅghaṃ uddissa dānaṃ dassanti. Tadāpānanda saṅghagataṃ
anya-e0401n:50_2: dakkhiṇaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ appameyyanti vadāmīti vuttattā saṅghikaṭṭhānaṃ patvā koci
anya-e0401n:50_3: bhikkhu dakkhiṇeyya saṅghe asaṅgahitoti natthīti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0401n:51: Khettaṃ dūsentīti khettaduṭṭhāni. Tiṇāni. Khettaduṭṭhā kilesā. Vuttañhidhammapade.
anya-e0401n:58_0: Idha pana sātissayato khettaduṭṭhe kilese dassetuṃ “sakkāyadiṭṭhivicikicchānusayāna”nti
anya-e0401n:60_0: 8. “Abhivādiyā”ti sukhīhohisappurisāti evaṃ abhivadāpetvā. Abhivādanañca nāma vandanāmevāti
anya-e0401n:60_1: vuttaṃ “vanditvā”ti. Vandantohi vandaneyye vuddhe tathā vadāpeti nāma. Tathā vadanañca
anya-e0401n:60_4: bhikkhūhi avanditabbe sunavakatarādīsu. “Guṇapadānī”ti guṇadīpakāni arahaṃ sammāsambuddhotiādipadāni.
anya-e0401n:60_5: Etthacakāyenavandatītiādi upacāra vacanaṃ hoti. Yathā cakkhunā rūpaṃ passatīti. Tathāhi
anya-e0401n:60_6: vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvāti karaṇavasena cakkhūti laddhavohārena rūpadassana
anya-e0401n:60_7: samatthena cakkhu viññāṇena rūpaṃ disvā. Porāṇā panāhu cakkhu rūpaṃ na passati, acittattā.
anya-e0401n:60_8: Cittaṃ na passati, acakkhuttā. Dvārārammaṇa saṅghaṭṭane pana sati cakkhu pasādavatthu
anya-e0401n:60_9: kenacittena passati. Īdisī panesā kathā dhanunā vijjhatītiādīsu viya sasambhāra kathānāma
anya-e0401n:60_10: hoti. Tasmā cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvāti cakkhu viññāṇena rūpaṃ disvāti ayamevettha atthoti.
anya-e0401n:60_11: Etthahi “kāyenā”ti kāya viññattisaṅkhātaṃ dvāra rūpaṃ karaṇaṃ hoti. Tasmā cakkhunāti
anya-e0401n:60_12: vacane upacāra vacane sati kāyenāti vacanaṃpi upacāra vacananti viññāyati. Tathā
anya-e0401n:60_13: cakkhunāti pade cakkhuviññāṇenāti atthe sati kāyenāti padepi kāyakammenāti attho
anya-e0401n:60_14: viññāyati. Vācāya vandati, manasāvandatī,ti padesupi esanayo. Evañca sati, kāya kammenavandāmi,
anya-e0401n:60_15: vacīkammena vandāmi, manokammena vandāmi, tīhi kammehi vandāmīti idameva mukhyavacananti
anya-e0401n:60_16: siddhaṃ hoti. Sabbamidaṃ indriya saṃvarasīlaṭṭhāne aṭṭhakathāsu āgatattā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:60_17: Cakkhunāti idaṃ pana mukhya karaṇa vacanameva sambhavati. Kasmā, cakkhussa dassanasaṅkhātassa
anya-e0401n:60_18: cakkhuviññāṇassa vatthu purejātindriyapaccayavisesattā. Sotena saddaṃsutvātiādīsupi esanayo.
anya-e0401n:61_0: Kāyenavandati, vācāyavandatī,ti ettha taṃkāyavacīviññatti rūpa dvayaṃ kiñcāpi sahajāta
anya-e0401n:61_1: cetanā kammena jātaṃ hoti. Na taṃ cetanākammaṃ viññatti dvayenajātaṃ. Evaṃ santepi
anya-e0401n:61_2: taṃ rūpa dvayaṃ tassācetanāya kāyavandanākamma, vacīvandanākamma siddhiyā upanissaya
anya-e0401n:61_3: paccayaviseso hoti. Yathātaṃ mātito jāto putto vuddhi patto taṃ taṃ kammesu mātuyā
anya-e0401n:61_4: bala vūpanissayo hoti. Evañca katvā taṃ rūpadvayaṃ abhidhamme dvārarūpanti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:61_5: Tasmā ‘kāyena, vācāyā,ti idaṃpi mukhya karaṇa vacanamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kāyenāti pana
anya-e0401n:61_6: kāyakammenāti atthe sati, tassakammassa vandanākiriyāya saha abhedo āpajjatīti ce.
anya-e0401n:61_7: Nāpajjati. Kasmā cetanāhaṃ bhikkhave kammaṃ vadāmi, cetayitvā kammaṃ karoti ‘kāyena,
anya-e0401n:61_8: vācāya, manasāti imasmiṃ sutte yathāhi “cetayitvā”ti purimacetanāhi ceta yitvā. “Kammaṃ
anya-e0401n:61_9: karotī”ti pacchimaṃ sanniṭṭhāpana cetanā kammaṃ karotīti attho. Tathā idhapi purimapacchimacetanā
anya-e0401n:61_10: sambhavatoti. Ettha hi “kāyakammenā”ti purimacetanā kammaṃ gayhati. “Vandatī”ti pacchima
anya-e0401n:62: 9. “Racayanto”ti vidahanto. “Racayissatī”ti apaccakkhe atīte anāgatavacanaṃ. “Potthakāruḷha”nti potthaka pattesulikhanavasena āruḷhaṃ.
anya-e0401n:63_2: pāḷidvayaṃ abhidhammo nāmāti vuttaṃ “tañcā”tiādi. “Yathāpavatte”ti attano paccayānurūpaṃ
anya-e0401n:63_3: pavatte. “Paramatthadhamme evā”ti dve me bhikkhave puggalā, tayomebhikkhave puggalātiādinā
anya-e0401n:63_4: paññattivohārena pavattāpi desanā paramattha dhammehi vinā napavattati. Paramattha
anya-e0401n:63_5: dhammānaṃ nānattavaseneva puggalānaṃ nānattasambhavato. Tasmā paramatthadhamme eva
anya-e0401n:63_6: dīpeti. Na āṇāvidhānaṃ dīpeti. “Dvīsudhammesū”ti niddhāraṇe bhummavacanaṃ. “Yoitarato”ti
anya-e0401n:63_7: niddhāraṇīyaṃ. “Yo”ti yo dhammo. “Itarato”ti itara dhammato suttanta dhammato. “Evañca
anya-e0401n:63_8: katvā”ti iminākāraṇenāti attho. Aṭṭhakathāsu vuttanti sambandho. Desetabbappakārānaṃ
anya-e0401n:63_9: anavasesavibhattivasena atirekatā, suddha dhammādhiṭṭhāna desanā pavattivasena visesatā
anya-e0401n:63_11: hoti. Kasmā devesu eva desentīti āha “na hi manussā”tiādiṃ. Tattha “na hi manussā
anya-e0401n:63_14: dhammātiādikaṃ ekaṃ abhidhamma mātikaṃ anugatā. “Tassā”ti abhidhammassa. Atireka
anya-e0401n:63_15: visesatanti sambandho. “Tatthā”ti tissaṃ aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ. Ādimhiyevatattha kenaṭṭhena
anya-e0401n:63_16: abhidhammo, dhammātireka dhammavisesaṭṭhe nā-ti vatvā tadatthaṃ vitthārento suttañhi
anya-e0401n:63_17: patvā pañcakkhandhā ekadeseneva vibhattā, nanippadesena. Abhidhammaṃ patvā pana nippadesatova
anya-e0401n:63_19: santepī”ti aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ evaṃ vicāritepisati. “Sabbajeṭṭhako”ti tiṇṇaṃ piṭakānaṃ
anya-e0401n:63_20: majjhesabbajeṭṭhako. Kasmā sabbajeṭṭhako siyāti āha “vinayaṃ vivaṇṇentassahī”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:63_21: Tattha “vivaṇṇentassā”ti garahantassa. Carati pavattatīti cakkaṃ. Lokasmiṃ kenaci
anya-e0401n:63_22: samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā paṭinivattituṃ asakkuṇeyyaṃ
anya-e0401n:63_23: āṇāvidhānaṃ āṇācakkaṃ nāma. Tathā asakkuṇeyyaṃ desanā vidhānaṃ dhammacakkaṃ nāma.
anya-e0401n:63_24: Tattha, yo pana bhikkhu methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevati, pārājiko hoti asaṃvāso-tiādinā
anya-e0401n:63_25: nayena pavattaṃ āṇāvidhānaṃ āṇācakkaṃ nāma. Cattārimāni bhikkhave ariyasaccānī-tiādikaṃ
anya-e0401n:63_26: desanāvidhānaṃ dhammacakkaṃ nāma. Tadubhayaṃpi koci bhindituṃ pārājikaṃ vā bhikkhuṃ
anya-e0401n:63_27: apārājikaṃ kātuṃ catussaccaṃ vā dhammaṃ asaccaṃ kātuṃ nasakkoti. Atha kho karontoyeva
anya-e0401n:63_28: devadattoviya āpāyiko hoti. Pārājikoca bhikkhu attānaṃ suddhaṃ akaronto apāyagāmīyeva
anya-e0401n:63_29: hoti. Evaṃ sabbesu vinaya sikkhāpadesu. Evaṃ kenaci paṭinivattituṃ asakkuṇeyyattā
anya-e0401n:63_30: tadubhayaṃpi appaṭivattiyaṃ cakkaṃ nāma hoti. “Vinayo nāma sāsanassa mūla”nti vinaye
anya-e0401n:63_31: ṭhite bhikkhusaṅgho paññāyati. Bhikkhu saṅghe paññāyante tividhopisaddhammopaññāyati,
anya-e0401n:63_32: tividhaṃpi satthusāsanaṃ tiṭṭhati. Evaṃ vinayo tividhassasāsanassa mūlaṃ hotīti.
anya-e0401n:63_33: Kathañcapariyattisaddhamme paññāyante tividhaṃpi sāsanaṃ tiṭṭhatīti. Vuccate. Tattha
anya-e0401n:63_34: sāsanaṃ tiṭṭhatīti kittakaṃkālaṃ tiṭṭhatīti. Pañcavassasahassāni tiṭṭhatīti porāṇaṭṭhakathāsukathayiṃsu.
anya-e0401n:63_35: Micchāvādinopanavadanti vinaye cūḷavaggebhikkhunikkhandhake sace ānanda mamasāsanemātugāmo
anya-e0401n:63_36: pabbajjaṃ nalabheyya. Vassasahassaṃ saddhammo tiṭṭheyya. Idāni mātugāmassa pabbajjā
anya-e0401n:63_37: anuññātā gotamiyā punappunaṃ āyācanaṃ upādāya. Pañcevadāni ānanda vassasatāni saddhammoṭhassatīti
anya-e0401n:63_38: vuttaṃ. Tasmā buddhasāsanaṃ pañcavassasatāni eva tiṭṭhati. Tatoparaṃ ekadivasaṃpi
anya-e0401n:63_39: na tiṭṭhati. Idāni sāsanappaṭi rūpakamattaṃ hotīti. Taṃ tesaṃ micchā vacanamattaṃ.
anya-e0401n:63_40: “Pañcevavassasatānī”ti idaṃ pana sanniṭṭhāna vacanaṃ nahoti. Mātugāmānaṃ ādīnava
anya-e0401n:63_41: dīpanamattavacanaṃ. So ca ādīnavo aṭṭhagarudhamme saṇṭhapetvā satthārā eva paṭibāhito.
anya-e0401n:63_42: Puna “vassasahassa”nti idamevasanniṭṭhāna vacanaṃ jātanti. Etthapikecivadanti vassasahassameva
anya-e0401n:63_43: sāsanaṃ tiṭṭhati, tatoparaṃ ekadivasa mattaṃpi na tiṭṭhati, antaradhāyati. Tadā sīmāyopi
anya-e0401n:63_44: asīmā honti. Pacchātāsu upasampāditāpi anupasampannā honti. Idāni sāsanappaṭi rūpakamattaṃ
anya-e0401n:63_45: hotīti. Idaṃpi tesaṃ atthañcakāraṇañca adisvā ajānitvā vuttattā micchā vacanamattaṃ
anya-e0401n:63_46: hoti. Ayaṃ panettha attho. “Vassasahassaṃ saddhammo tiṭṭheyyā”ti vassasahassameva
anya-e0401n:63_47: saddhammo aparihāyamāno tiṭṭheyya. Tatoparaṃ pana na tiṭṭheyya, anukkamena parihāyamāno
anya-e0401n:63_48: gaccheyyāti. Kathaṃ pana aparihāyamāno tiṭṭhati, kathañca parihāyamāno gacchatīti.
anya-e0401n:63_49: Vuccate. Pañcasaṅghā veditabbā. Yesu saṅghe susaddhammo tiṭṭhati. Katame pañca. Khīṇāsavasaṅgho,
anya-e0401n:63_51: vassasahassabbhantare sabbepañcasaṅghā paññāyanti. Evaṃ vassasahassaṃ saddhammo aparihāyamāno
anya-e0401n:63_52: tiṭṭhati. Tatoparaṃ khīṇāsavasaṅgho na paññāyati. Sesāni cattārivassasahassāni anukkamena
anya-e0401n:63_53: sesānaṃ catunnaṃ saṅghānaṃ khettāni jātāni. Evaṃ tatoparaṃ parihāyamāno gacchatīti
anya-e0401n:63_54: ayamettha attho. Kāraṇaṃ vuccate. “Saddhammo tiṭṭheyyā”ti ettha tividho saddhammo
anya-e0401n:63_55: ‘pariyattisaddhammo, paṭipattisaddhammo, paṭivedhasaddhammo,ti. So eva tividhaṃ sāsananti
anya-e0401n:63_56: ca vuccati. Tattha, pariyatti saddhammo nāma sāṭṭhakathānitīṇipiṭakāni. Soca etarahi
anya-e0401n:63_57: paripuṇṇo tiṭṭhati. Kathaṃ pariyatti sāsanaṃ paṭirūpakamattaṃ bhaveyya. Bhikkhū ca
anya-e0401n:63_58: pariyattikammikā aneka satasahassamattā paññāyanti. Kathañcidaṃ sāsanaṃ tatoparaṃ
anya-e0401n:63_59: ekadivasaṃpi na tiṭṭheyya. Te ca bhikkhū sīlappaṭipattiyaṃ ṭhitā aneka satasahassamattā
anya-e0401n:63_60: etarahi sandhissanti. Kathañca paṭipatti sāsanaṃ tatoparaṃ na tiṭṭheyya. Pariyattiyāca
anya-e0401n:63_61: paṭipattiyāca tiṭṭhamānāyapaṭivedhasaddhammopi na tiṭṭhatīti na vattabbo. Yathāhi-eko
anya-e0401n:63_62: dhanaseṭṭhi nāma atthi. So puttadhītu paramparānaṃ atthāya mahantāratananidhayo bhūmiyaṃ
anya-e0401n:63_63: bahūsuṭṭhānesu nidahitvā ṭhapitā honti. Potthakesu ca tesaṃ pavattiṃ paripuṇṇaṃ likhitvā
anya-e0401n:63_64: ṭhapeti. Tattha nimīsu ca potthakesu ca akkharesu ca dharantesu tenidhayo nassanti
anya-e0401n:63_65: antaradhāyantīti na vattabbāyeva. Evamidaṃ sāsanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tatthahi nidhīnaṃnidhānabhūmisadisaṃ
anya-e0401n:63_66: tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ, dhanaratanasadisāni dhammaratanāni. Yathā ca seṭṭhivaṃsejāto
anya-e0401n:63_67: balasampanno puriso potthakaṃ passitvā suṭṭhu khaṇanto tāniratanāni labhissatiyeva.
anya-e0401n:63_68: Evamidhapi balasampanno bhikkhu desanādhammaṃ sutvā suṭṭhu paṭipajjanto tānidhammaratanāni
anya-e0401n:63_69: labhissatiyeva. Labhamāne ca sati, kathaṃ tānidhammaratanāni antarahitāni. Sīmānañca
anya-e0401n:63_70: pavattivānivatti vā āṇācakkasseva visayo hoti. Na dhammacakkassa. Yañca vuttaṃ-pañcevavassasatānisaddhammo
anya-e0401n:63_71: ṭhassatīti ca, - vassasahassaṃ saddhammo tiṭṭheyyāti ca. Idañca vacanaṃ dhammacakkameva
anya-e0401n:63_72: hoti, na āṇācakkaṃ. Baddhasīmāyo ca nivattamānā dvīhi kāraṇehi nivattanti antaradhāyanti.
anya-e0401n:63_73: Āṇācakkabhūtāya kammavācāya samūhananena vā, sāsanassa vā antaradhānena. Tattha vassasahassapariyante
anya-e0401n:63_74: kammavācāya samūhananañca natthi. Sāsanantaradhānañca nāma anāgate dhātuparinibbānena
anya-e0401n:63_75: paricchinnaṃ hoti. Dhātuparinibbānehi jāte sabbaṃ āṇācakkaṃ vigataṃ hoti, antaradhāyati.
anya-e0401n:63_76: Dhammacakkaṃ pana devalokesu yāvānāgatabuddhakālāpi pavattissatiyeva āḷavakapucchāgāthāyo
anya-e0401n:63_77: viya. Apicayo vo ānanda mayā dhammo ca vinayo ca desito paññatto. So vo mamaccayena
anya-e0401n:63_78: satthā-ti vuttaṃ. Socati piṭakabhūto dhammavinayo satthā etarahi tividhaṃpi sāsanaṃ
anya-e0401n:63_79: lokassa dīpento pakāsento tiṭṭhati. Yatobuddhabhāsikānaṃ devamanussānaṃ nānā bāhirakehi
anya-e0401n:63_80: janehi asādhāraṇo mahanto ñāṇāloko etarahi vijjotamāno pavattati. Tehi sabbaññutaññāṇena
anya-e0401n:63_81: desitāni etarahidharamānāni caturāsīti dhammakkhandha sahassāni sutvā anamataggesaṃsāre
anya-e0401n:63_83: sutamayaññāṇena jānanti. Āyatiñca saggatthāya ca maggaphalanibbānatthāya ca nānāpuññakiriyavatthūni
anya-e0401n:63_84: ārabhanti, pabbajanti. Pariyattiṃ pariyāpuṇanti. Paṭipattiṃ pūrenti. Bhāvanaṃbhāventi.
anya-e0401n:63_85: Idaṃ sabbaṃ sāsanappaṭirūpakamattaṃna hoti. Ekanta sāsanaṃ hoti. Kasmā, yathā dhammaṃ
anya-e0401n:63_86: yathā vinayaṃ paṭipajjanato. Imāya ca paṭipattiyā āyatiṃ saggamaggaphala nibbānappaṭilābhāya
anya-e0401n:63_87: saṃvattanikattāti. Ettāvatā sabbaṃ micchāvādīnaṃ micchāvacanaṃ vidhamitaṃviddhaṃsitaṃ hotīti.
anya-e0401n:65_2: dīpite teabhidhammatthe. “Tatthā”ti tissaṃ dutīyagāthāyaṃ. “Natu vutta”nti napanapakaraṇaṃpi
anya-e0401n:65_3: pubbevuttaṃ hoti. Abhidhammatthā kutopubbevuttā hontīti yojanā. Evaṃtīsu atthavikappesu
anya-e0401n:65_4: pathamassa kālavirodhaṃ dassetvā idāni dutīya tatīyānaṃ saddatovirodhaṃ vattuṃ “nacā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n:65_5: Tattha “ādimhi yevā”ti etena yadākadāci paccāmasanaṃ appadhānanti dasseti. “Appadhānapadānī”ti
anya-e0401n:65_6: abhidhammatthasaṅgahanti imasmiṃ ekasmiṃ samāsapade purimāni visesana padāni. Tattha
anya-e0401n:65_7: sabbathāpi vuttāti yojite sati, tasmiṃ abhidhammatthasaṅgahappakaraṇe tasmiṃ abhidhammattha
anya-e0401n:65_8: padevā sabbathā mayā vuttāti attho hoti. So na yujjati. Tasmiṃ abhidhamme buddhena
anya-e0401n:65_9: bhagavatā sabbathā vuttāti attho yujjati. Appadhānapadaṃ paccāmasatīti dosopana āpajjateva.
anya-e0401n:65_10: Tenāha “evañhisatī”tiādiṃ. Tattha, “evañhisatī”ti aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ viya idha abhidhammatthasaṅgahapadaṃ
anya-e0401n:65_11: paccāmasante sati. Hisaddo phala vākyajotako. Laddhaguṇajotakotipi yujjati. “Paṭikkhittā
anya-e0401n:65_12: hoti” tasmiṃ abhidhammatthasaṅgahapade mayā sabbathā vuttāti atthassa sambhavato.
anya-e0401n:65_13: Na kevalaṃ so eva doso āpajjati. Aparopidoso atthīti dassetuṃ “sāhī”tiādimāha. Dhātukathāyaṃ
anya-e0401n:66_0: 12. Paramatthapadavaṇṇanāyaṃ. Visesanapadaṃ nāma katthaci bhūtakathanatthāyavā payujjati
anya-e0401n:66_1: kaṇhokāko, setobako,ti. Katthaci aññanivattanatthāya vā payujjati nīlopaṭo, nīlaṃpuppha,
anya-e0401n:66_2: nti. Idha pana añña nivattanatthāyāti dassetuṃ “duvidhānihisaccānī”tiādimāha. Paññāpīyatītipaññatti.
anya-e0401n:66_3: Paññāpanañca nāma samaggānaṃ janānaṃ vohārena ca sampaṭicchanena cāti dvīhi aṅgehi
anya-e0401n:66_4: sijjhatīti āha “tecamahājanā”tiādiṃ. “Tasmāte sammuti saccanti vuccantī”ti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:66_6: vacīsaccaṃ nāma musāvādarahitaṃ saccavacanaṃ. Viratisaccaṃ nāma sammāvācāvirati.
anya-e0401n:66_7: Sāhi musāvādādīhi vacīduccaritehi viramaṇamattena vacīsaccanti vuccati. “Vatthubhūtattā”ti
anya-e0401n:66_8: adhiṭṭhānabhūtattā. Sammutisaccanti vuccanti, sammatattā sammuti ca, sā saccānaṃ
anya-e0401n:66_9: vatthubhūtattā saccañcāti katvā. Sammutiyā siddhaṃ saccaṃ sammutisaccantipi yujjati.
anya-e0401n:66_10: “Sammāpaṭipajjantā”ti pāṇo nahantabbo, sabbesattā averā hontūtiādinā sammāpaṭipajjantā.
anya-e0401n:66_14: “Evaṃ mahantaṃ sammuti sacca”nti etena ahaṃ paramattha saccamevagaṇhāmīti sammuti
anya-e0401n:66_15: saccaṃ nabhinditabbaṃ. Bhindantohi sabbasampattīhi paribāhiro assāti dasseti. Kathañca
anya-e0401n:66_16: taṃ bhindatīti. Satto nāma natthi. Sattassa bhavatosaṅkanti nāma natthi. Bhavanibbattakaṃ
anya-e0401n:66_17: kusalākusalakammaṃ nāma natthīti gaṇhanto ucchedadiṭṭhiyaṃ tiṭṭhati. Sabbasampattīhi
anya-e0401n:66_18: paribāhiro hoti. Apāya pūrako bhavatīti. “Vijjamānantveva gaṇhāpetī”ti saññā cittadiṭṭhi
anya-e0401n:66_20: sammutisacca”nti etenasammuti saccamevadaḷhaṃ gahetvā paramattha saccaṃ nabhinditabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:66_21: Bhindantohi tāhi diṭṭhīhi namuccati. Kathañca taṃ bhindati. Khandhe vā khandhamuttakevā
anya-e0401n:66_22: attajīve gahetvā teca attajīvā parammaraṇā ucchijjantīti gaṇhanto ucchedadiṭṭhiyaṃ
anya-e0401n:66_23: tiṭṭhati. Te ca attajīvā bhavābhavesusassatā hutvā bhavatobhavaṃ saṃsaranti sandhāvantīti
anya-e0401n:66_25: sabhāvasaccaṃ pana. Anubhavanabhedamattaṃ upādāyeva vedanā sukhāti vuttā. Sabbākārato
anya-e0401n:66_26: sukhabhūtattā vedanā sukhāti vuttā nahoti. “Sabbāpivedanā dukkhā evā”ti padhānattho.
anya-e0401n:66_27: Tattha anubhavanabhedo tividho. Sātato vā anubhavanaṃ, assātato vā, majjhattato vā.
anya-e0401n:66_28: “Dukkhā evā”ti bhayaṭṭhena dukkhā eva. Bhayaṭṭhenāti ca saṃsāra bhayadassīhibhāyitabbaṭṭhena.
anya-e0401n:66_29: Sukho vipāko yesaṃ te sukhavipākā. Tebhūmakakusalā. “Kusalasammatā”ti etena sabhāvasaccepi
anya-e0401n:66_30: etevohārā lokasammuti nissitāti dīpeti. “Sāsavatā”ti āsavehi sahitabhāvo. “Saṃkilesi
anya-e0401n:66_31: katā”ti saṃkilesa dhammehi saṃyuttabhāvo. Oghehi ca yogehi ca upādānehi ca pattabbabhāvo
anya-e0401n:66_33: attānāma sāraṭṭhena. Sākhāyaṃ rūpadhammā sākhāya attānāma sāraṭṭhena. Sattasantānapariyāpannā
anya-e0401n:66_34: pana rūpārūpadhammā taṇhāpariggaha daḷhaṭṭhena tato bahiddhā attato adhikā attāti
anya-e0401n:66_35: atthena ajjhattāti lokasammuti hoti. Tenāha “ajjhattatikañcā”tiādiṃ. Dukkhanirodha
anya-e0401n:66_36: maggabhāvo ca, iti idaṃ catukkaṃ ariyasaccaṃ nāmāti yojanā. “Idamevā”ti idaṃ catukkameva.
anya-e0401n:66_37: “Acalamāna”nti etena ariyasaddassa atthaṃ dīpeti. Tebhūmaka dhammānaṃ sukhatā nāma
anya-e0401n:66_38: calā hoti. Kasmā, anicca dhammattā. Te dhammesukhāti gahetvā attano ajjhattaṅgaṃ
anya-e0401n:66_39: karontā acireneva dukkhaṃ pāpuṇanti. Te dhamme dukkhāti ñatvā tehivimuttā puna dukkhaṃ
anya-e0401n:66_40: pāpuṇantīti natthi. Esanayo sesaariyasaccesu. “Tesū”tiādimhi duvidhānihi saccānīti
anya-e0401n:66_41: vuttesu dvīsu saccesu. “Tena vutta”ntiādi laddhaguṇavacanaṃ. “Yo vinā aññāpadesenā”ti
anya-e0401n:66_42: ettha aññāpadeso nāma aṭṭhadhamma samodhānaṃ nissāya ghaṭasaṇṭhānaṃ paññāyati, paṭasaṇṭhānaṃ
anya-e0401n:66_43: paññāyati, taṃ saṇṭhānaṃ attano sabhāvena vinā aññāpadesena siddhaṃ hoti. Yāpanacintana
anya-e0401n:66_44: kiriyā nāma atthi. Yaṃ cittanti vuccati. Sā aññāpadesena siddhā na hoti. Attano sabhāvenevasiddhā.
anya-e0401n:66_45: Esanayo phusanakiriyā, vedayitakiriyā, dīsūti. Imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “yovinā aññāpadesenā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n:66_46: “Cittenaparikappetvā”ti manoviññāṇa cittena avijjamānaṃ saṇṭhānaṃ vijjamānaṃ katvā.
anya-e0401n:66_47: “Saviggahaṃ katvā”ti sarīraṃ katvā. Vatthu dabbasahitaṃ katvāti vuttaṃ hoti. “Cittamayocittanimmito”ti
anya-e0401n:66_48: supinante diṭṭharūpāni viya cittenapakato cittena nimmito. Kasmā sabhāvasiddho paramattho
anya-e0401n:66_49: nāmāti āha “sohī”tiādiṃ. “Santī”ti etena asadhātu vasena atthoti siddhaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:66_51: “Paramo”ti adhiko. Tenāha “ukkaṃsagato”ti. Etena paramasaddassa adhikatthaṃ vadati.
anya-e0401n:66_52: Idāni tassa uttamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādivuttaṃ. Tattha, imasmiṃ buddhasāsane
anya-e0401n:66_53: pañcasāsana kiccāni mahantāni abhiññeyyānaṃ dhammānaṃ abhijānanaṃ. Pariññeyyānaṃ
anya-e0401n:66_54: parijānanaṃ. Pahātabbānaṃ pahānaṃ. Sacchi kātabbānaṃ sacchikaraṇaṃ. Bhāvetabbānaṃ
anya-e0401n:66_55: bhāvanāti. Tattha sabbepi paramattha dhammā abhiññeyyā nāma. Dukkha saccadhammā pariññeyyā
anya-e0401n:66_56: nāma. Samudaya saccadhammā pahātabbā nāma. Sāmaññapphalāni ca nibbānañca sacchikātabbā
anya-e0401n:66_57: nāma. Maggasaccadhammā bhāvetabbā nāma. Tesu dhammesu tesaṃ kiccānaṃ siddhiyā imasmiṃ
anya-e0401n:66_58: sāsane sāsanakiccaṃ siddhaṃ hoti. Niṭṭhānaṃ gacchati. Te ca dhammā eva rūpānaṃ sāsana
anya-e0401n:66_59: kiccānaṃ avirādhakattā avisaṃvādakattā uttamaṭṭhena paramatthā nāma hontīti imamatthaṃ
anya-e0401n:67_0: “Taṃ nasundara”nti byañjanato nasundaraṃ. Nakevalaṃ byañjanatoyeva nasundaraṃ, atthatopi
anya-e0401n:67_1: nasundarameva. Catusacca dhammāhi paccekabuddhaññāṇassapi gocarā honti. Pañcañeyya
anya-e0401n:67_2: dhammā pana sabbaññutaññāṇasseva. Tattha catusacca dhammā nāma paramattha dhammā
anya-e0401n:67_3: eva. Pañcañeyyadhammā pana sabba paññattiyā saha sabbaparamattha dhammā. Sabbaññubuddhānaṃ
anya-e0401n:67_4: catusaccābhi sambodho dhamma paññattiyā saha sijjhati. Paccekabuddhānaṃ catusacca
anya-e0401n:67_5: sambodho dhammapaññattiyā saha nasijjhati. Tasmā te sayaṃ paṭividdhaṃ catusacca dhammaṃ
anya-e0401n:67_6: nāma paññattiṃ nīharitvā paresaṃ desetuṃ na sakkonti. Tesaṃ catusaccasambodho mūgassa
anya-e0401n:67_7: supinadassanaṃ viya hotīti aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ. Tasmā paññattiyā saha pañca ñeyya
anya-e0401n:69_0: 13. Cittavacanatthe. Nahi sā ārammaṇenavinā labbhati. Cintetīti vutte kiṃ cinteti,
anya-e0401n:69_1: ārammaṇaṃ cintetīti evaṃ ārammaṇabhūtena kammapadena vinā asambhavato. Tasmā idha
anya-e0401n:69_2: cintanāti daṭṭhabbā, tasmā assa nāmaṃ siddhanti daṭṭhabbanti sambandho. Sutamayaññāṇaṃ,
anya-e0401n:69_3: cintāmayaññāṇa, nti ettha ārammaṇassa bhūtasabhāva cintāpi atthi, sāpaññāevāti taṃ
anya-e0401n:69_4: nivattetuṃ “ārammaṇa…pe… ṇūpaladdhiyevā”ti vuttaṃ. Cittaṃ, mano, mānasaṃ, viññāṇa,
anya-e0401n:69_5: nti sabbaṃ cittassa nāmaṃ. Ārammaṇa paccayappaṭibaddhaṃ hoti. Na aññapaccayappaṭibaddhaṃ.
anya-e0401n:69_6: Na ca aññapaccayena laddhaṃ nāmaṃ. Evarūpassa ārammaṇa vijānana saṅkhātassa atthantarassabodhakaṃ
anya-e0401n:69_7: nahotīti dassetuṃ “santesu cā”tiādivuttaṃ. “Etenā”ti idaṃ kattuno kiriyāsādhane atissayūpakārakaṃ
anya-e0401n:69_8: karaṇa sādhanaṃ vadatīti dassetuṃ “tañhī”tiādivuttaṃ. “Cintanamatta”nti ettha mattasaddo
anya-e0401n:69_9: visesanivatti atthoti, tena nivattitaṃ atthaṃ dasseti “sabbepihī”tiādinā. “Viggaho
anya-e0401n:69_10: vā”ti sarīraṃ vā. Paccayena āyattā paccayāyattā. “Āyattā”ti sambandhā. Vattanaṃ vutti.
anya-e0401n:69_11: Uppajjanaṃ vā ṭhiti vā. Paccayāyattā vutti etesanti “paccayāyatta vuttino”. “Thāmenā”tiādi
anya-e0401n:69_12: aññamaññavevacanāni. “Ekaṃ bhāvasādhanameva padhānato labbhatī”ti idaṃ dhammānaṃ
anya-e0401n:69_13: taṃ taṃ kiriyā mattabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Kiriyāmattabhūtāpi pana te dhammāsayaṃ
anya-e0401n:69_14: nānāpaccayā vatthāyaṃ ṭhitā vā honti nānāpaccayuppannāvatthāyaṃ ṭhitā vā. Tasmā paramattha
anya-e0401n:69_15: padesupi yathārahaṃ tadaññasādhanānaṃ paṭilābho avārito hoti. Itarathā hetu paccayo,
anya-e0401n:69_16: ārammaṇa paccayo, sahajātapaccayo, nissayapaccayotiādīsu kathaṃ bhāvasādhanaṃ yuttaṃ
anya-e0401n:69_18: cittantikataṃ kattusādhanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. “Silāputtakassā”ti bhesajjamūlānaṃ pisanasilāpotakassa.
anya-e0401n:69_19: Tassa sarīraṃ nāma visuṃ aṅgaṃ natthi. Abhinnaṃpi bhinnaṃ katvā vuccati “silāputtakasarīra”nti.
anya-e0401n:69_20: Idaṃ abhedassabhedakaraṇaṃ nāma abhūtarūpaṃ hoti. Payojane sati vattabbaṃ, asati
anya-e0401n:69_21: na vattabbanti āha “tathākaraṇañcā”tiādiṃ. Tattha “paraparikappitassā”ti parehi aññatitthā
anya-e0401n:69_22: cariyehi paricintitassa. “Satihi…pe… kappanāyā”ti sace attā atthi, attā cinteti,
anya-e0401n:69_23: tasmā attā cittonāmātiādi vattabbaṃ. Na vattabbaṃ cintetīti cittanti, cittassa kiriyāmattattā.
anya-e0401n:69_24: Na pana attādiko kattā nāma atthi. Tasmā kiriyā mattameva kattāraṃ katvā “cintetīti
anya-e0401n:69_25: citta”nti vuttaṃ. Tena viññāyatiloke attādikokattā nāma natthīti. Idaṃ abhedassabheda
anya-e0401n:69_26: parikappanāya payojananti vuttaṃ hoti. “Attappadhāno”ti kiriyāsādhane bahūnaṃkārakānaṃ
anya-e0401n:69_27: majjhe sayaṃpadhāno sayaṃjeṭṭhako hutvā. “Taṃkattubhāva”nti lokesiddhaṃ kattubhāvaṃ.
anya-e0401n:69_28: “Puna karaṇabhāva”nti puna loke siddhaṃ karaṇabhāvaṃ. Evaṃ cittassa vacanatthaṃ dassetvā
anya-e0401n:69_29: idāni tassa abhidhānatthaṃ dassento “apicetthā”tiādimāha. Yathayidaṃ ye ime tiracchānagatā
anya-e0401n:69_30: pāṇā cittāvicittā. Evaṃ cittaṃ vicittaṃ yaṃ aññaṃ atthi, taṃ aññaṃ ekanikāyaṃpi nasamanupassāmī-ti
anya-e0401n:69_32: karaṇavacanaṃ. Etena tato caraṇato cittatoti atthaṃ vadati. Gāthāyaṃ. “Taṃ taṃ sabhāvo”ti
anya-e0401n:69_33: vijānanaphusanādiko sabhāvo, aggissauṇhoviya. “Kiccasampattiyoraso”ti tena tena dhammena
anya-e0401n:69_34: karaṇakiccañca, taṃ kiccaṃ katvā laddho sampattiguṇo ca. Aggissa vatthumhi paripācanakiccaṃ
anya-e0401n:69_35: viya, obhāsanaguṇoviya ca. “Gayhākāro”ti ñāṇena gahetabbo tassa tassa dhammassa dhajabhūto
anya-e0401n:69_36: ākāro. Sampatti rasoyeva vuccati. “Phalaṃvāpī”ti kāriyapphalaṃ vāpi, aggissa dhūmoviya.
anya-e0401n:69_37: “Āsannakāraṇa”nti attano anantare phalanibbattakaṃ kāraṇaṃ, aggissa aggikāraka puriso
anya-e0401n:71_0: 14. “Cetasi bhava”nti cittasmiṃ pātubhūtaṃ. “Etena siddhā hontī”ti sambandho. “Sā
anya-e0401n:71_1: eva phassādīnaṃ jāti. Yācittassajarā, sā eva phassādīnaṃjarā”tiādinā yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:71_3: ekajātikathā divasena upanibandhā. “Ce”ti cevadeyya. “Nā”ti na vattabbaṃ. Gāthāyaṃ.
anya-e0401n:71_4: “Dhammā”ti nāmakkhandha dhammā. “Manasā evā”ti kattubhūtena manena eva. “Pakatā”ti
anya-e0401n:71_5: pavattitā. “Nimmitā”ti nipphāditā. “Cittakiriyā bhūtā evā”ti ārammaṇaṃ vijānantaṃ
anya-e0401n:71_6: cittaṃ phusanākāraṃ janetvāva vijānāti. So phusanākāro phassoti vuccati. Avasesā
anya-e0401n:71_7: pana sabbepi cetasikadhammā phassaṃ paṭicca uppajjanti. Phasso hetu phasso paccayo
anya-e0401n:71_8: vedanākkhandhassa upādāya. Saññākkhandhassa. Saṅkhārakkhandhassa upādāyāti hi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:71_9: Evaṃ santepi cittamūlakattā cittanissitattā ca tepidhammā cittakiri yābhūtā eva hontīti.
anya-e0401n:71_10: “Etenā”ti etenagāthāpadena. Vibhāvaniyaṃ pana ekālambaṇatā mattena vibhāveti. Paripuṇṇāni
anya-e0401n:71_11: ce tasikaṅgāni upari therena sayameva vakkhamānattāti adhippāyo. Idha pana padatthavibhāvanaṭṭhānattā
anya-e0401n:71_12: paripuṇṇehi aṅgehi vibhāvetuṃ vaṭṭatīti āha “taṃ nasundara”nti. “Vatthumhī”ti paṭakoṭṭhakādimhi.
anya-e0401n:71_13: “Nānācittakammānī”ti hatthi assarūpādīni. Vijānanamattaṃ cittaṃ, kusalanti vā akusalanti
anya-e0401n:71_14: vā vattabbaṃ natthi. Nānācetasike hi yuttattā eva tathā vattabbaṃ hoti. Vuttaṃhetaṃ
anya-e0401n:71_15: bhagavatā. Pabhassaramidaṃ bhikkhave cittaṃ. Tañca kho āgantukehi upakkilesehi upakkiliṭṭhanti.
anya-e0401n:73_0: 15. Ruppatīti padaṃ kattarivāhetukammanivāsiddhaṃ. Ruppanañcavikārāpatti evāti dassetuṃ
anya-e0401n:73_2: Dhātukkho bhavasenāti vuttaṃ hoti, “kenaruppatī”ti ettha “kenā”ti hetu atthevā hetu
anya-e0401n:73_3: kattarivā karaṇavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tathā sītenātiādīsupi. Ḍaṃsamakasā nāma sūcimukhā
anya-e0401n:73_4: khuddakamakkhikāceva mahanta makkhikā ca. Vātā nāma puratthimavātādayo. Ātapo nāma
anya-e0401n:73_5: sūriyātapo. Sariṃsapānāma ahi vicchika satapadikādayo. Tesaṃ samphassehipi ruppati.
anya-e0401n:73_6: Maraṇaṃ vā gacchati, maraṇa mattaṃ vā dukkhaṃ. “Ye dhammā”ti dvādasavidhā sappaṭigharūpadhammā.
anya-e0401n:73_8: Idāni pāḷiyā saddhiṃ mukhyaruppanaṃ saṃsandento “samāgamo cā”tiādimāha. Samāgamo
anya-e0401n:73_9: ca nāma aññamaññābhighaṭṭanaṃ vuccatīti sambandho. Āpātāgamanañca ārammaṇakaraṇañca
anya-e0401n:73_10: ṭhapetvāti yojanā. “Mahābhūtānameva vā”ti āpodhātu vajjitānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ mahābhūtānameva
anya-e0401n:73_11: vā. “Vikāraṃ āpajjatī”ti vatvā tamevatthaṃ vivaranto “yasmiṃ khaṇe”tiādimāha. “Sayaṃpi
anya-e0401n:73_12: vikārapattā hontī”ti temahābhūtāsayaṃpi pakatiṃ vijahitvā omattādhimattabhāvaṃ pāpuṇantīti
anya-e0401n:73_14: vuttaṃ. Evaṃ pāḷinayena vipattivasena ruppanaṃ vatvā idāni vipatti vā hotu, sampatti
anya-e0401n:73_15: vā. Purimapacchi masantatīnaṃ visadisappavattibhūto vikāropi ekena pariyāyena ruppanaṃnāmāti
anya-e0401n:73_16: katvā puna taṃ ruppanaṃ dassento “apicetthā”tiādimāha. “Ghaṭṭanavasena ruppana dhammāna
anya-e0401n:73_18: rūpadhammānameva siddhanti pucchā. “Saviggahā hontī”ti dabba saṇṭhānākārasahitā honti.
anya-e0401n:73_20: Arūpadhammāhi saṇhasukhumasabhāvā ca honti. Sace anekasatasahassānipi ekato pavatteyyuṃ.
anya-e0401n:73_21: Dabbasaṇṭhānabhāvaṃ nagamissantiyeva. Ekasmiñca sattasantāne ekakkhaṇe eka kalāpova
anya-e0401n:73_22: pavattati. Kasmā, anantara paccayūpanibandhena pavattattā. Tasmāte saviggahāna honti.
anya-e0401n:73_23: Rūpadhammā pana oḷārika sabhāvā ca honti. Bahūnaṃ sannicayesati dabbasaṇṭhānatthāya
anya-e0401n:73_24: saṃvattanti. Ekakkhaṇe ca bahukalāpāpi ekābaddhāhutvā pavattanti. Tasmā tesaviggahāhontīti.
anya-e0401n:74_0: “Sītādiggahaṇasāmatthiyenā”ti sītenapi ruppati, uṇhenapi ruppatītiādinā lokassa paccakkhato
anya-e0401n:74_1: pākaṭassa sītādivacanassasāmatthiyena. Tañhi vacanaṃ lokassa apākaṭaṃ arūpadhammānaṃ
anya-e0401n:74_2: ruppanaṃ idhanādhippetanti dīpetīti adhippāyo. “Vohāro nāmā”ti nāmasaññā nāmāti vuttaṃ
anya-e0401n:74_3: hoti. “Lokopacārenā”ti bahujanassa upacārena vohārena kathanena. “Pākaṭa nimittavasenevā”ti
anya-e0401n:74_5: sītādiggahaṇasāmatthiyenapīti dīpeti. Evaṃ santepi pāḷisādhakaṃ nāma na sakkāsabbattha
anya-e0401n:74_6: laddhuṃ. Pākaṭanimitta vacanameva sabbattha sādhāraṇanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Tappasaṅganivattī”ti
anya-e0401n:74_9: “Idaṃ panā”ti idaṃ rūpaṃ pana. “Anuggahānaṃ sītādīnaṃ vasenā”ti kiñcāpipāḷiyaṃ sītādivacanaṃ
anya-e0401n:74_10: upaghātakānaṃ sītādīnaṃ vasena vuttaṃ. Teca brahmaloke natthi. Anuggāhakā eva atthi.
anya-e0401n:74_11: Tesaṃvasenāti adhippāyo. “Pāḷiyaṃ niddiṭṭhānī”ti sañjānātīti kho bhikkhave tasmā
anya-e0401n:74_12: saññāti vuccati. Kiñca sañjānāti. Nīlaṃpi sañjānāti, pītampi sañjānātī-tiādinā ca,
anya-e0401n:74_13: vijānātīti kho bhikkhave tasmā viññāṇanti vuccati. Kiñca vijānāti. Madhuraṃpi vijānāti,
anya-e0401n:76_0: 16. Nibbānapade. “Khandhāvā”ti bhavantare apāyādīsu bhavissamānā khandhāvā. Na hi
anya-e0401n:76_1: atīta dhammā, nibbāyanti nāma, satte pīḷetvā niruddhattāti adhippāyo. Paccuppannā
anya-e0401n:76_2: ca dhammā etarahi pīḷenti, avassaṃ uppajjamānā anāgatadhammā ca anāgate pīḷessanti,
anya-e0401n:76_3: kathaṃ te nibbāyanti nāmāti āha “paccuppannesu…pe… vattabbameva natthī”ti. “Visayebhumma”nti
anya-e0401n:76_4: visayādhārebhummaṃ. Visayādhāro nāmamanussābhūmiyaṃ gacchantītiādīsu viya mukhyādhāro
anya-e0401n:76_5: nahoti. Tena pana vinā aññattha taṃ kiriyaṃ kātuṃ nasakkoti. Tasmā ādhārabhāvena
anya-e0401n:76_6: parikappito ādhāroti dassetuṃ “yathāākāse”tiādivuttaṃ. Yathā sakuṇānaṃ pakkhana kiriyā
anya-e0401n:76_7: nāma ākāsena vinā aññattha nasijjhati. Tathā vaṭṭadukkhadhammānaṃ nibbuti kiriyāpi
anya-e0401n:76_8: nibbānena vinā aññattha nasijjhatīti dassetuṃ “yehite”tiādimāha. Tattha “ye”ti yetividhavaṭṭadukkhasantāpadhammā.
anya-e0401n:76_10: nāma natthi. Tasmā nibbānaṃ tesaṃ nibbuti kiriyāya visayā dhārohotīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:76_11: Yathā ayaṃ padīpo nibbāyati. Tathādhīrā nibbantīti yojanā. “Taṃ taṃ kilesānaṃ vā”ti
anya-e0401n:76_12: te saṃtesaṃkilesānaṃ vā. “Khandhānaṃ vā”ti anāgatabhavesu khandhānaṃ vā. “Punaappaṭisandhikabhāva”nti
anya-e0401n:76_13: santānassa puna paṭisandhānābhāvaṃ pāpuṇanti ariyā janā. Yathā magge karaṇavacanaṃ
anya-e0401n:76_14: dissati addhā imāyapaṭipattiyā jarāmaraṇamhā parimuccissāmītiādīsu. Na tathā nibbāneti
anya-e0401n:76_16: Asesaṃ uparujjhatītiādīsu. Tasmā nibbāne karaṇa vacanaṃ na dissati, karaṇa lakkhaṇasseva
anya-e0401n:76_17: abhāvatoti dassetuṃ “na ca nibbāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Karaṇa lakkhaṇaṃ nāmakattuno sahakārī
anya-e0401n:76_18: paccayabhāvo. Nanu anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā nibbāyantīti dissatīti. Saccaṃ, tattha
anya-e0401n:76_19: pana visesane karaṇa vacanaṃ. Na karaṇakārake. Tañhi saupādisesanibbānadhātuyānivattanatthaṃ vuttanti.
anya-e0401n:79_1: āgataṃ. “Tekāmīyantī”ti te avīcinirayādayo icchīyanti. “Tattha uppannānampī”ti avīcinirayādīsu
anya-e0401n:79_2: uppannānaṃpi sattānaṃ. “Bhavanikanti nāma hotī”ti bhavasaṅkhātaṃ attano khandhaṃ
anya-e0401n:79_3: etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, esome attāti gaṇhantī taṇhā bhavanikanti nāma. Sā nerayikasattānaṃpi
anya-e0401n:79_4: atthiyeva. “Kāme avacaratī”ti kāmepariyāpannaṃ hoti. Kāme antogadhaṃ hoti. Rūpārūpabhūmīsu
anya-e0401n:79_5: uppannaṃpi rūpārūpasaṅkhyaṃ nagacchati. Kāmasaṅkhyameva gacchati. Kāmagaṇanamevagacchatīti
anya-e0401n:79_6: attho. “Tīsubhavesu uppannānipī”ti kāmarūpārūpasattasantānesu uppannānipi na tatrapariyā
anya-e0401n:79_7: pannāneva honti. Tatra apariyāpannāneva hontīti adhippāyo. “Kāmāvacaratāpattidoso”ti
anya-e0401n:79_8: kāmāvacara dhammāti vattabbatā pattidoso. “Rūpāvacaratādimuttidoso”ti ime rūpāvacara
anya-e0401n:79_9: dhammā na honti, arūpāvacara dhammā na honti, lokuttara dhammā na hontīti evaṃ vattabbatāpatti
anya-e0401n:79_10: dosoti vuttaṃ hoti. Esanayo “rūpārūpāvacaratāpatti doso kāmāvacaratāmutti doso” tipadesu.
anya-e0401n:79_11: Avacarasaddassa uppannatthe gahitepi etedosā nāpajjanti. Kasmā, loke yebhūyyanayatabbahulanayānaṃpi
anya-e0401n:79_13: kesañci puggalānaṃ vā dhammānaṃ vā. Yathāmigaluddako gāme carantopi vane caraṇabahulattā
anya-e0401n:79_14: vanacarakoti nāmaṃ labhati. Rājahatthī aññattha carantopi saṅgāme caraṇabahulattā
anya-e0401n:79_15: saṅgāmāvacaroti nāmaṃ labhati. Ayaṃ yebhūyyanayo nāma. Yasmiṃ vane ambarukkhāpi atthi,
anya-e0401n:79_16: aññarukkhāpi atthi. Ambarukkhabahulattā pana taṃ vanaṃ ambavananti nāmaṃ labhati.
anya-e0401n:79_17: Evaṃ simbalivanādīsu. Ayaṃ tabbahulanayo. Idha pana bhūmiyo tabbahulanayena kāmarūpārūpa
anya-e0401n:79_18: nāmaṃ labhanti, dhammā yebhūyyanayena kāmāvacarādi nāmaṃ labhantīti. Evaṃ gahite
anya-e0401n:79_19: sati, te dosānā pajjantīti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “tasmā idhapi…pe… dosotī”tiāha. “Nā”ti
anya-e0401n:79_20: na kocidoso natthi. Atthi evāti adhippāyo. “Tasmāssā”ti ettha “assā”ti avacarasaddassa.
anya-e0401n:79_21: “Tathā atthaṃ aggahetvā”ti uppajjanatthaṃ aggahetvā. “Pariggāhiniyā kāmataṇhāya kato”ti
anya-e0401n:79_22: tathā pariggāhiniyā kāmataṇhāya gocaravisayattātāyataṇhāya katonāma hoti. Etena kāmetīti
anya-e0401n:79_23: kāmo, kāmataṇhā. Avacarati etthāti avacaraṃ. Kāmassa avacaranti kāmāvacaraṃ. Kāma
anya-e0401n:80_1: pariyāpannabhāvena pavattati. Arūpe avacaratīti arūpāvacaraṃ. “Arūpe”ti catubbidhāya
anya-e0401n:80_2: arūpabhūmiyā. “Avacaratī”ti tattha pariyāpannabhāvena pavattatīti imamatthaṃ vadati
anya-e0401n:80_3: “rūpārūpāvacaresupi ayaṃnayo netabbo”ti. Rūpe bhavo rūpaṃ. Rūpataṇhā. Arūpe bhavo
anya-e0401n:80_4: arūpaṃ, arūpataṇhā. Rūpassa avacaraṃ rūpāvacaraṃ. Arūpassa avacaraṃ arūpāvacaranti
anya-e0401n:80_5: imamatthaṃ dīpeti “tesu panā”tiādinā. “Atrā”ti imasmiṃ ṭhāne. Yadipi lobho, rāgo,
anya-e0401n:80_6: kāmo, taṇhā, tisabbampetaṃ lobhassavevacanaṃ hoti. Rūparāgo arūparāgoti pana visuṃ
anya-e0401n:80_7: vibhattattā idha kāmasaddena taṃ daññolobho gayhati. “Sabbopi lobho”ti etenasassatuccheda
anya-e0401n:81_0: 19. “Rūpārūpasaddā tāsu bhūmīsu niruḷhā”ti animittā hutvā niruḷhāti adhippāyo. Idāni
anya-e0401n:81_1: sanimittaṃ nayaṃ vadati “apicā”tiādinā. “Nissayopacāro”ti ṭhānūpacāro, yathā sabbogāmo
anya-e0401n:81_2: āgatoti. “Nissito pacāro”ti ṭhānyūpacāro. Yathā dhajā āgacchantīti. “Yaṃ etasmiṃ
anya-e0401n:81_3: antare”ti ye etasmiṃ antare khandhadhātu āyatanā. Yaṃ rūpaṃ, yā vedanā, yāsaññā,
anya-e0401n:81_4: ye saṅkhārā, yaṃviññāṇanti yojanā. “Suvisada”nti yebhūyyādi nayehi anākulattāsuvisuddhaṃ.
anya-e0401n:82_4: Nibbānaṃ pana idha na labbhati cittasaṅgahādhikārattāti adhippāyo. So ca apariyāpannabhāvo,
anya-e0401n:84_1: pāpadhammehi yuttattā sabba cittehi hīnataraṃ. “Tadattho”ti uparimānaṃ cittānaṃ sobhaṇasaññākaraṇasukhattho.
anya-e0401n:84_2: “Ādito”tiādimhi. “Vīthicittavasenāti etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, esome attāti evaṃ pavattassa
anya-e0401n:84_3: bhavanikanti javanavīthicittassa vasena. Evañcasati, kiṃ kāraṇaṃ lobhamūlacittassapathamaṃ
anya-e0401n:84_4: vacaneti āha “akusalesu panā”tiādiṃ.“Dvīhivaṭṭamūlehī”ti lobhamohasaṅkhātehi dvīhi vaṭṭamūlehi.
anya-e0401n:85_1: vutte kāyikasukhavedanāyapi pasaṅgo siyāti vuttaṃ “mānasika…pe… nāma”nti. “Sumanābhidhānassā”ti
anya-e0401n:85_2: sumananāmassa. “Pavattinimitta”nti pavattiyā āsanna kāraṇaṃ. Kathaṃ pana bhāvo pavattinimittaṃ
anya-e0401n:85_3: nāmahotīti āha “bhavanti…pe… katvā”ti. Nimitte bhummaṃ. Tathāhi bhāvo nāma saddappavattinimittanti
anya-e0401n:85_4: vuttaṃ. Idāni nimitta lakkhaṇaṃ dassento “yathāhī”tiādimāha. “Tatthā”ti tasmiṃ payoge.
anya-e0401n:85_5: “Danta nimitta”nti dantakāraṇā. “Taṃ vedanā nimitta”nti taṃ vedanākāraṇā. Ettha siyā,
anya-e0401n:85_6: “etasminti nimitte bhumma”nti vuttaṃ, nimittañcanāma akārakaṃ asādhanaṃ, taṃ kathaṃ
anya-e0401n:85_7: sādhanaviggahe yujjatīti. Adhikaraṇa sādhanānurūpattā saddappavattinimittassāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:85_8: Etenāti ca etasmāti ca hetu atthe ubhayavacananti vadanti. Āsannahetu nāmasādhanarūpo
anya-e0401n:85_9: bhavatīti tesaṃ adhippāyo. Suṭṭhu karoti, pakatipaccayena anipphannaṃ kammaṃ attano
anya-e0401n:85_10: balena nipphādetīti saṅkhāro. “Pubbābhisaṅkhāro”ti pubbabhāge abhisaṅkhāro. Payojeti
anya-e0401n:85_11: niyojetīti payogo. Upeti phalasaṅkhāto attho etenāti upāyo. “Āṇattiyāvā”ti pesanāyavā.
anya-e0401n:85_12: “Ajjhesanena vā”ti āyācanena vā. “Tajjetvā vā”ti bhayaṃ dassetvā vā. “Taṃ taṃ upāyaṃ
anya-e0401n:85_13: pare ācikkha”nti. Kathaṃ ācikkhantīti āha “akaraṇe”tiādiṃ. “Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kamme payojetītikatvā
anya-e0401n:85_14: idha saṅkhāro nāmā”ti yojanā. “Paccaya gaṇo”ti pakatipaccayagaṇo. “Tenā”ti saṅkhārena.
anya-e0401n:85_16: vā upāyena vā. “Yo pana tenasahito”tiādinā pubbevuttamevatthaṃ pakārantarenapākaṭaṃ
anya-e0401n:85_18: paccayagaṇasseva visesa nāmanti vuttaṃ hoti. Uppannatthe ikapaccayoti kathaṃ viññāyatīti
anya-e0401n:85_20: iccevattho. Sabbametaṃ nayujjatiyeva. Kasmā, pāḷiaṭṭhakathāhi asaṃsandanattā, atthayuttibyañjanayuttīnañca
anya-e0401n:85_24: Etenapaṭikkhittā hotīti sambandho. Gāthāyaṃ. “Cittasambhavī”ti cittasmiṃ sambhūto.
anya-e0401n:85_25: Viseso saṅkhāro nāmāti yojanā. Salomako, sapakkhakotyādīsuviyāti vuttaṃ. Sāsavā dhammā,
anya-e0401n:85_26: sārammaṇā dhammātyādīsuviyāti pana vutte yuttataraṃ. “Pāḷiaṭṭhakathā siddha”nti pāḷiaṭṭhakathāto
anya-e0401n:85_27: siddhaṃ. Apicayatthavisuddhimaggādīsu asaṅkhāraṃ cittaṃ, sasaṅkhāraṃ cittanti āgataṃ.
anya-e0401n:85_28: Tattha ayaṃ pacchimanayo yutto. Upāyasamuṭṭhitassa anekasatasambhavato “idañca nayadassanamevā”ti
anya-e0401n:85_29: vuttaṃ. “Udāsinabhāvenā”ti majjhattabhāvena. “Yato”ti yasmā. Vikārapatto hoti. Tato
anya-e0401n:86_1: pana te bhedavantā hontī”ti kasmā vuttaṃ. Na nu tepicakkhu samphasso, sotasamphasso,
anya-e0401n:86_2: tiādinā ca, kāmavitakko, byāpādavitakko, tiādinā ca, dukkhe aññāṇaṃ, dukkhasamudaye
anya-e0401n:86_3: aññāṇa, ntiādināca bhedavantā hontīti. Saccaṃ. Te pana bhedā imaṃ cittaṃ bhinnaṃ
anya-e0401n:86_4: na karonti. Tasmā te bhedavantāna hontīti vuttā. Na ca tesaṃ ayaṃ vikappo atthīti
anya-e0401n:86_5: sambandho. “Imasmiṃ citte”ti lobhamūlacitte. “Katthacī”ti kismiñci citte. Yevāpanāti
anya-e0401n:86_6: vutte sudhammesu āgatāniyevāpanakāni. “Aññehī”ti dosamūlamohamūlehi. Nanutānipi idha
