anya-e0401n:86_7: gahetabbānīti sambandho. “Nā”ti na gahetabbāni. Kasmāti āha “tesuhī”tiādiṃ. Tepi
anya-e0401n:86_8: idha nagahetabbā siyuṃ. Na pana na gahetabbā. Kasmā, vedanāya ca sayaṃ bhedavantattā,
anya-e0401n:87_1: taṃ sahagata cittuppattiyāpikāraṇaṃ siddhaṃ hotīti katvā tameva vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:87_2: Tenāha “somanassappaṭisandhikohī”tiādiṃ. Hīnena vā…pe… ārammaṇena samāyogo, tena
anya-e0401n:87_3: samāyuttassāpi cittaṃ uppajjamānantiādinā vattabbaṃ. Tathā byasanamuttiyaṃpi. Upekkhākāraṇe
anya-e0401n:87_5: gehaṃ. Diṭṭhisaṅkhāto ajjhāsayoyassāti diṭṭhajjhāsayo. Tassa bhāvo diṭṭhajjhāsayatā.
anya-e0401n:88_0: “Imesaṃ pana cittānaṃ uppattividhānaṃ visuddhimaggegahetabba”nti visuddhi maggekhandha
anya-e0401n:88_1: niddesato gahetabbaṃ. Vuttañhitattha. Yadā hinatthikāmesu ādīnavotiādinānayena micchādiṭṭhiṃ
anya-e0401n:88_2: purekkhitvā haṭṭhatuṭṭho kāmevā paribhuñjati, diṭṭhamaṅgalādīni vā sāratopacceti
anya-e0401n:88_3: sabhāva tikkhena anussāhitenacittena. Tadā pathamaṃ akusala cittaṃ uppajjati. Yadā
anya-e0401n:88_4: mandena samussāhitena cittena, tadādutīyaṃ. Yadā micchā diṭṭhiṃ apurekkhitvā kevalaṃ
anya-e0401n:88_5: haṭṭhatuṭṭho methunaṃ vā sevati, para sampattiṃ vā abhijjhāyati, parabhaṇḍaṃ vā harati
anya-e0401n:88_6: sabhāvatikkheneva anussāhitena cittena. Tadā tatīyaṃ. Yadā mandena samussāhitenacittena,
anya-e0401n:88_7: tadā catutthaṃ. Yadā pana kāmānaṃ vā asampattiṃ āgamma aññesaṃ vā somanassahetūnaṃ
anya-e0401n:88_8: abhāvena catūsupi vikappesu somanassarahitāhonti, tadāsesāni cattāri upekkhāsahagatāni uppajjantīti.
anya-e0401n:90_0: 25. Dosamūlacitte. “Virūpa”nti duṭṭhaṃ, luddaṃ. Dummanassa bhāvoti vutte kāyikadukkhavedanāyapi
anya-e0401n:90_1: pasaṅgo siyāti vuttaṃ “mānasika…pe… nāma”nti. Paṭihaññati bādhati. “Santatte”ti santāpite.
anya-e0401n:91_1: honti. Domanassaggahaṇaṃ pasaṅganivattanatthaṃ gahitanti yojanā. Pasaṅgoti canānappakārato
anya-e0401n:91_2: sajjanaṃ lagganaṃ. Kathaṃ pasaṅgoti āha “yadāhī”tiādiṃ. “Tuṭṭhiṃ pavedentī”ti tuṭṭhāmayaṃ
anya-e0401n:91_3: imesaṃ maraṇenātiādi cikkhanti. Evaṃ sahagatappasaṅgaṃ nivattetvā sampayuttappasaṅgaṃ
anya-e0401n:91_5: natthi. Ādikappato paṭṭhāya manussānaṃ yathākāma paribhogatthāya lokissariyenathāvaraṭṭhāyinā
anya-e0401n:91_6: nimmitattāti adhippāyo. “Vissaṭṭhā”ti anāsaṅkā. “Aññevā”ti aññe vā jane. Vimati eva
anya-e0401n:91_7: vematikaṃ. Vematikaṃ jātaṃ yesaṃ te vematikajātā. Purimacittassalobhasahagatabhāvo
anya-e0401n:91_8: imāniaṭṭhapi lobhasahagatacittānināmāti iminā cūḷanigamane neva siddhoviyāti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:91_10: yevāti katvā “tesaṃ gahaṇaṃ”ti vuttaṃ. “Tesa”nti donassapaṭighānaṃ. Imasmiṃ citte
anya-e0401n:91_11: issāmacchariyakukkuccānicathinamiddhāni ca aniyatayogīni ca honti yevāpanakāni ca.
anya-e0401n:91_12: Tenāha “purimacitte”tiādiṃ. Domanassaṃ imasmiṃ citte atthi, aññacittesu natthi, tasmā
anya-e0401n:91_13: asādhāraṇa dhammo nāma. Anaññasādhāraṇa dhammotipi vuccati. “Yathātaṃ”ti taṃ nidassanaṃ
anya-e0401n:91_14: tadudāharaṇaṃ yathā katamanti attho. “Upalakkhetī”ti saññāpeti. Ātapaṃtāyatirakkhatīti
anya-e0401n:91_15: ātapattaṃ. Setacchattaṃ. Laddhaṃ ātapattaṃ yenāti laddhātapatto. Rājakumāro. So ātapattaṃ
anya-e0401n:91_16: laddhoti vutte sabbaṃ rājasampattiṃ laddhoti viññāyati. Tasmā idaṃ upalakkhaṇa vacanaṃ
anya-e0401n:91_17: jātanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Ubhinna”nti dvinnaṃ domanassa paṭighānaṃ. Pubbe domanassasahagatanti
anya-e0401n:91_18: vatvā nigamane paṭighasampayuttacittānīti vuttattā “imassa…pe… siddhito”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:92_0: 27. “Aniṭṭhalokadhammehī”ti alābho ca, ayasoca, nindāca, dukkhañcāti catūhi aniṭṭhalokadhammehi.
anya-e0401n:92_1: “Taṃ kutettha labbhā”ti ahaṃ alābhādīhi māsamāgacchīti patthentassapi kutomeetthaloketaṃ
anya-e0401n:92_2: patthanā pūraṇaṃ sabbakālaṃ labbhāti attho. “Labbhā”ti ca kammatthadīpakaṃ pāṭipadikapadaṃ.
anya-e0401n:92_3: Imesaṃ uppattividhānaṃ visuddhimagge saṅkhepatova vuttaṃ tassa pāṇāti pātādīsu tikkhamandappavattikāle pavattiveditabbāti.
anya-e0401n:94_1: Evaṃ nu kho, aññathānu khoti evaṃ dvidhā erayati kampatīti attho. Vikkhipatīti vikkhipamānaṃ.
anya-e0401n:94_2: “Niyamanattha”nti idaṃ vicikicchāsampayuttaṃ nāmāti niyamanatthaṃ. Idañhi paṭighasampayuttaṃ
anya-e0401n:94_3: viya nigamanena siddhaṃ na hoti. “Idha laddhokāsaṃ hutvā”ti mūlantara virahattā eva
anya-e0401n:94_4: idhaladdhokāsaṃ hutvā. Pakati sabhāvabhūtaṃ, iti tasmā natthīti yojanā. “Anosakkamāna”nti
anya-e0401n:94_5: pacchato anivattamānaṃ. “Asaṃsīdamāna”nti heṭṭhato apatamānaṃ. Ubhayena abbocchinnanti
anya-e0401n:94_6: vuttaṃ hoti. “Atisammuḷhatāyā”ti mūlantara virahena mohena atisammuḷhatāya. “Aticañcalatāyā”ti
anya-e0401n:94_8: ārammaṇesu. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ saṅkhāra bhedena avijjāya duvidhabhāvova vutto. Kathaṃ
anya-e0401n:94_9: vutto. Avijjā appaṭipatti micchā paṭipattito duvidhā tathā sasaṅkhā rāsaṅkhāratoti
anya-e0401n:94_10: vutto. “Tividhabhāvovā”ti imasmiṃ cittesaṅkhāravimuttāya avijjāya saddhiṃ tividhabhāvova.
anya-e0401n:94_11: Imesaṃ dvinnaṃ cittānaṃ uppattividhānaṃ visuddhimaggesaṅkhepatovavuttaṃ tassaasanniṭṭhānavikkhepakālepavatti veditabbāti.
anya-e0401n:95_0: 29. “Sabbathāpī”ti nipātasamudāyo vā hotu aññamaññavevacano vā, visuṃ nipātovāti
anya-e0401n:95_1: evaṃ sabbappakāratopi. Akusalapade akāro viruddhattho. Yathā amitto, asuro, tidassetuṃ
anya-e0401n:95_4: okkamantāpī”ti pañcānantariya kammabhāvena niyatamicchādiṭṭhibhāvena ca niyāmaṃ okkamantāpi.
anya-e0401n:95_5: Apāyaṃ bhajantīti apāyabhāgino. Kammakārakā. Tesaṃ bhāvo. Tāya. “Vaṭṭasotaniyate”ti
anya-e0401n:95_6: saṃsāravaṭṭa sotasmiṃ niyate. “Thiratarapattā”ti samādhivasena thiratarabhāvaṃ pattā.
anya-e0401n:95_7: Idāni tamevatthaṃ pakārantarena vibhāvetuṃ “apicā”tiādimāha. “Siyu”nti padaṃ dhātupaccayehi
anya-e0401n:95_8: siddhaṃ nipphannapadaṃ nāma nahoti. Kasmā, idhaparikappatthassa asambhavato. Nipātapadaṃ
anya-e0401n:95_9: hoti. Kasmā, anekatthatā sambhavato. Idha pana bhavanti saddena samānattho. Tenāha
anya-e0401n:97: 30. Ahetukacitte. “Sabbanihīna”nti sabbacittehi hīnaṃ. Puna “sabbanihīna”nti sabbāhetukehi hīnaṃ. “Ta”nti akusala vipākaṃ.
anya-e0401n:98_1: “Thusa”nti vīhisuṅkaṃ. “Saṅkāra”nti kacavaraṃ. Cakkhuñcarūpe ca paṭicca yaṃviññāṇaṃ
anya-e0401n:98_2: uppajjati. Taṃ cakkhuviññāṇantveva vuccatītiādinā yojetabbaṃ. Tattha “rūpe”ti rūpārammaṇāna.
anya-e0401n:98_3: “Sadde”tiādīsupi esanayo. Ettha ca viññāṇāni ekavatthu nissitāni honti. Tasmā vatthu
anya-e0401n:98_4: dvāresu ekavacanaṃ vuttaṃ. Ārammaṇāni pana ekaviññāṇenāpi bahūni gahitāni. Tasmā
anya-e0401n:98_5: ārammaṇesu bahuvacanaṃ. “Dukkhayatī”ti dukkhaṃ karoti. Nāmadhātu padañhetaṃ. Yathā
anya-e0401n:98_6: attānaṃ sukheti vīṇetīti saddavidū. Dhātupāṭhesu pana sukhadukkhatakkiriyāyaṃti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:98_7: Takkiriyāti ca sukhakiriyā dukkha kiriyāti attho. Sātakiriyā assātakiriyāti vuttaṃ
anya-e0401n:98_8: hoti. Ca saddo okāsatthoti katvā “dukkaraṃ okāsadāna”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:99_2: “Ālokasannissayappaṭilābho”ti cakkhu ca ālokesati kiccakārī hoti. Asati nahoti. Tathā
anya-e0401n:99_3: rūpañca. Tasmā āloko tesaṃ visayavisayībhāvūpagamane sannissayo hoti. Tassa ālokasannissayassa
anya-e0401n:99_4: paṭilābho. Esanayo ākāsasannissayādīsu. Imesaṃ aṅgānaṃ yutti dīpanā uparirūpasaṅgahe
anya-e0401n:99_5: āgamissati. “Aṭṭhakathāya”nti aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ. Tattha “tasmiṃ pana āpātaṃ āgacchantepi
anya-e0401n:99_6: ālokasannissaye asati cakkhuviññāṇaṃ nuppajjatī”ti vacanaṃ asambhāvento “taṃ vinā
anya-e0401n:100_0: 33. Vipākavacanatthe. Vipaccatīti vipākaṃ. Vipaccatīti ca vipakkabhāvaṃ āpajjati.
anya-e0401n:100_1: Pubbe katakammaṃ idāni nibbattiṃ pāpuṇātīti vuttaṃ hoti. Idāni tadatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ
anya-e0401n:100_2: karonto “ayañca attho”tiādimāha. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āyūhana samaṅgitāpi āgatā. Idha panasā
anya-e0401n:100_3: cetanā samaṅgitāya saṅgahitāti katvā “catasso samaṅgithā”ti vuttaṃ. Samaṅgitāti ca
anya-e0401n:100_4: sampannatā. “Taṃ taṃ kammāyūhana kāle”ti pāṇāti pātādikassa tabbiramaṇādikassa ca
anya-e0401n:100_5: tassa tassa duccaritasucaritakammassa āyūhanakāle. Samuccinanakāleti attho. “Sabbaso
anya-e0401n:100_6: abhāvaṃ patvāna nirujjhatī”ti yathā abyākata dhammānirujjhamānā sabbaso abhāvaṃ patvā
anya-e0401n:100_7: nirujjhanti. Tathā nanirujjhantīti adhippāyo. “Sabbākāra paripūra”nti pāṇātipātaṃ
anya-e0401n:100_8: karontassa kammānu rūpābahūkāya vacīmano vikārā sandissanti. Esanayo adinnādānādīsu.
anya-e0401n:100_9: Evarūpehi sabbehi ākāra vikārehi paripūraṃ. “Nidahitvā vā”ti saṇṭhapetvā eva. “Yaṃsandhāyā”ti
anya-e0401n:101_0: Gāthāyaṃ. “Sajjū”ti imasmiṃ divase. “Khīraṃ vamuccatī”ti yathā khīraṃ nāma imasmiṃ
anya-e0401n:101_1: divase muccati. Pakatiṃ jahati. Vipariṇāmaṃ gacchati. Na tathā pāpaṃ kataṃ kammanti
anya-e0401n:101_2: yojanā. Kathaṃ pana hotīti āha “dahantaṃ bālamanvetī”ti. “Bhasmāchannovapāvako”ti
anya-e0401n:101_3: chārikā channoviya aggi. “So panā”ti kiriyā viseso pana. “Visuṃ eko paramattha dhammotipi
anya-e0401n:101_4: saṅkhyaṃ na gacchatī”ti visuṃ sampayutta dhamma bhāvena saṅkhyaṃ na gacchatīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:101_5: So hi kammapaccayadhammattā paramattha dhammo na hotīti na vattabbo. Tenāha “anusayadhātuyo
anya-e0401n:101_6: viyā”ti. “So”ti kiriyāviseso. “Ta”nti kammaṃ vā, kammanimittaṃ vā, gatinimittaṃ vā.
anya-e0401n:101_7: “Tadā okāsaṃ labhatī”ti vipaccanatthāya okāsaṃ labhati. Okāsaṃ labhitvā paccupaṭṭhātīti
anya-e0401n:101_10: arūpasantānaṃ eva vuccati. “Ye panā”ti ganthakārā pana. “Tesa”nti ganthakārānaṃ.
anya-e0401n:101_11: Āpajjatīti sambandho. Tesaṃ vādeti vā yojetabbaṃ. Yañcaupamaṃ dassentīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:101_12: “Tatthā”ti tasmiṃ vacane. Na ca na labhantīti yojanā. “Tadā”ti tasmiṃ pariṇatakāle.
anya-e0401n:102_0: 34. “Sambhavo”ti pasaṅgakāraṇaṃ. Abhivisesena caraṇaṃ pavattanaṃ abhicāro. Visesa
anya-e0401n:102_1: vutti. Na abhicāro byabhicāro. Sāmañña vutti. Pakkhantarena sādhāraṇatāti vuttaṃ
anya-e0401n:102_2: hoti. Pakkhantarena sādhāraṇatā nāmapakkhantarassa nānappakārato sajjanameva lagganamevāti
anya-e0401n:102_3: vuttaṃ byabhicārassāti pasaṅgassa iccevatthoti. Etthacātiādinā sambhavabyabhicārānaṃ
anya-e0401n:102_4: abhāvameva vadati. Akusalahetūhi ca sahetukatā sambhavo natthīti sambandho. “Tesa”nti
anya-e0401n:103: 35. “Pañcadvāre uppanna”nti pañcadvāravikāraṃ paṭicca uppannattā vuttaṃ. Tenāha “tañhī”tiādiṃ. Esanayo manodvārāvajjanepi.
anya-e0401n:104_0: Yadi hi ayamatthosiyā, evañcasati, ayamattho āpajjatīti sambandho. “Tesa”nti vīthicittānaṃ.
anya-e0401n:104_1: Uppādasaddoniyatapulliṅgoti katvā “ṭīkāsu pana…pe… niddiṭṭhaṃ” siyāti vuttaṃ. “Vuttanayenā”ti
anya-e0401n:104_2: sampayuttahetuvirahatoti vuttanayena. Vipaccana kiccaṃ nāma vipākānaṃ kiccaṃ. Vipākuppādanakiccaṃ
anya-e0401n:104_3: nāma kusalākusalānaṃ kiccaṃ. “Taṃ taṃ kiriyāmattabhūtānī”ti āvajjana kiriyā hasanakiriyāmattabhūtāni.
anya-e0401n:104_5: dubbala kiccāni honti. Pañca viññāṇāni ca asārānaṃ abalānaṃ pasādavatthūnaṃ nissāya
anya-e0401n:104_6: uppannattā dubbalavatthukāni honti. Sampaṭicchanādīni ca pañcaviññāṇānubandha mattattā
anya-e0401n:104_7: dubbala kiccaṭṭhānāni honti. Tasmā tāni sabbāni attano ussāhenavinā kevalaṃ vipaccanamattena
anya-e0401n:104_9: laddhapaccayaṃ hoti. Voṭṭhabbanaṃ pañcaviññāṇādi vipākasantānato laddhapaccayaṃ.
anya-e0401n:104_11: khīṇāsavasantāne. “Ussāharahitāni evā”ti yathā rukkhānaṃ vātapupphāni nāma atthi.
anya-e0401n:104_12: Tāni phaluppādakasineharahitattā phalāni na uppādenti. Tathā tāni ca vipākuppādakataṇhāsineharahitattā
anya-e0401n:105_1: viya upādārūpānañca aññamaññasaṅghaṭṭanaṃ dubbalamevāti yojanā. “Tesaṃ ārammaṇabhūtāna”nti
anya-e0401n:105_5: asambhavato”ti abyākata cittesu yujjituṃ asambhavato. Kammānubhāvato ca muñcitvā
anya-e0401n:105_6: yathāpurimaṃ vipākasantānaṃ kammānubhāvena pavattaṃ hoti. Tathā appavattitvāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:105_8: citta santānena visadisaṃ kusalādi javana cittasantānaṃ parato āvaṭṭā pana vasena.
anya-e0401n:105_9: Tathāhidaṃ cittadvayaṃ pāḷiyaṃ āvaṭṭanā, anvāvaṭṭanā, ābhogo, samannāhāroti niddiṭṭhaṃ.
anya-e0401n:105_11: vasenā”ti attano pacchā pavattaṃ cittaṃ paṭicca na vattabboti adhippāyo. “Attano
anya-e0401n:105_12: paccayehi eva so sakkā vattu”nti attano paccayesu balavantesu sati, balavā hoti.
anya-e0401n:105_13: Dubbalesu sati, dubbalo hotīti sakkāvattunti adhippāyo. “Visadisa cittasantāna”nti
anya-e0401n:106_2: sasaṅkhārika asaṅkhārikabhāvānaṃ abhāvo. “Tānipi hi aparibyattakiccāniyevā”ti ettha
anya-e0401n:106_3: āvajjana dvayaṃ javanānaṃ purecārika kiccattā aparibyattakiccaṃ hotu. Hasituppādacittaṃ
anya-e0401n:106_4: pana javanakiccattā kathaṃ aparibyattakiccaṃ bhaveyyāti. Tampi sabbaññutaññāṇādīnaṃ
anya-e0401n:106_5: anucārikamattattā aparibyattakiccaṃ nāma hotīti. “Aṭṭhamahāvipākesu viya vattabbo”ti
anya-e0401n:106_6: mahāvipākānaṃ sasaṅkhārikā saṅkhārikabhāvo purimabhave maraṇāsannakāle ārammaṇānaṃ
anya-e0401n:106_7: payogena saha vā vinā vā upaṭṭhānaṃ paṭicca vutto, tathā vattabboti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:107_0: 38. “Dubbala kammanibbattesū”ti paṭisandhi bhavaṅga cutikiccāni sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:107_3: hutvā. “Kappaṭṭhitikaṃ” nāma saṅghabhedakammaṃ. Chasuvatthu rūpesu hadayavatthumeva
anya-e0401n:107_4: suvaṇṇarajataṃ viya sāravatthu hoti. Itarāni phalikāniviya pasādamattattā asārāni
anya-e0401n:107_5: hontīti vuttaṃ “cakkhādīsu dubbalavatthūsū”ti. Dassanādīni ca kiccāni javana kiccassa
anya-e0401n:108_0: 39. Idha dīpaniyaṃ iccevanti padaṃ aṭṭhārasātipadassavisesananti katvā “sabbathāpīti
anya-e0401n:108_1: padassa…pe… veditabbo”ti vuttaṃ. Vibhāvaniyaṃ pana taṃ sabbathāpīti padassa visesananti
anya-e0401n:110_0: 40. Sobhaṇacittesu. Avuttāpi siddhā hoti. Yathā aṭṭhacittāni lokuttarānīti ca vutte
anya-e0401n:110_1: avuttepisijjhanti sesacittāni lokiyānīti ca sauttarānīti cāti adhippāyo. “Attasamaṅgīno”ti
anya-e0401n:110_2: attanā pāpakammena samannāgate. “Anicchante yevā”ti sacepi avīcinimittassādavatthu
anya-e0401n:110_3: viya keci icchantu. Ajānantānaṃ pana icchā appamāṇanti adhippāyo. “Sobhagga pattiyā”ti
anya-e0401n:110_4: ettha subhagassa bhāvo sobhagganti viggaho. Subhagassāti ca susirikassa.
anya-e0401n:111_0: 41. “Yāthāvato”ti yathā sabhāvato. Ettha siyā jānātīti ñāṇanti vuttaṃ, kiṃ sabbaṃ
anya-e0401n:111_1: ñāṇaṃ yāthāvato jānātīti. Kiñcettha. Yadi sabbaṃ ñāṇaṃ yāthāvato jānāti. Evaṃ sati,
anya-e0401n:111_2: ñāṇena cintentānaṃ ajānanaṃ nāma natthi, virajjhanaṃ nāma natthīti āpajjati. Atha
anya-e0401n:111_3: sabbaṃ ñāṇaṃ yāthāvato na jānāti, katthaci jānāti, katthaci na jānāti. Evañcasati,
anya-e0401n:111_4: yattha jānāti, tattheva taṃ ñāṇaṃ hoti. Yattha na jānāti, tattha taṃ ñāṇameva na
anya-e0401n:111_5: hotīti āpajjatīti. Vuccate. Ñāṇena cintessāmīti cintentānaṃpi yattha yattha yāthāvato
anya-e0401n:111_6: jānanaṃ na hoti, tattha tattha ñāṇa vippayutta cittaṃ hoti. Ñāṇappaṭi rūpakā ca dhammā
anya-e0401n:111_7: atthi cittañca vitakko ca, vicāro ca, diṭṭhi ca. Etehi cintentāpi ahaṃ ñāṇena cintemīti
anya-e0401n:111_8: maññanti. “Deyya dhammapaṭiggāhaka sampattī”ti deyyadhamma vatthu sampatti, paṭiggāhaka
anya-e0401n:111_9: puggala sampatti. “Abyāpajjalokūpapattitā”ti ettha abyāpajjaloko nāma kāyikadukkha
anya-e0401n:111_10: cetasika dukkha rahito uparidevaloko vā brahmaloko vā. Upapajjanaṃ upapatti. Paṭisandhivasena
anya-e0401n:111_11: upagamananti attho. Abyāpajjalokaṃ upapatti yassa so abyāpajja lokūpapatti. Tassa
anya-e0401n:111_12: bhāvoti viggaho. “Kilesa dūratā”ti samāpatti balena vā, aññatarappaṭipattiyā vā,
anya-e0401n:111_13: vikkhambhita kilesatā vā, ariyamaggena samucchinna kilesatā vā.
anya-e0401n:112_0: Tesaṃ uppatti vidhānaṃ visuddhi magge khandhaniddese evaṃ vuttaṃ. Yadāhi deyyadhamma
anya-e0401n:112_1: paṭiggāhakādi sampattiṃ aññaṃ vā somanassahetuṃ āgamma haṭṭhatuṭṭho atthidinnantiādinayappavattaṃ
anya-e0401n:112_2: sammādiṭṭhiṃ purekkhitvā asaṃsīdanto anussāhitoparehi dānādīni puññāni karoti, tadāssa
anya-e0401n:112_3: somanassasahagataṃ ñāṇa sampayuttaṃ cittaṃ asaṅkhāraṃ hoti. Yadā pana vuttanayena
anya-e0401n:112_4: haṭṭhatuṭṭho sammādiṭṭhiṃ purekkhitvā amutta cā gatādivasena saṃsīdamāno vā parehi
anya-e0401n:112_5: vā ussāhito karoti, tadāssa tadeva cittaṃ sasaṅkhāraṃ hoti. Imasmiñhi atthe saṅkhāroti
anya-e0401n:112_6: etaṃ attano vā paresaṃ vā vasena pavattassa pubbappayogassādhivacanaṃ. Yadā pana
anya-e0401n:112_7: ñāti janassa paṭipatti dassanena jātaparicayābāladārakā bhikkhū disvā somanassa jātāsahasā
anya-e0401n:112_8: kiñci deva hatthagataṃ dadanti vā vandanti vā, tadā tatīyaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati. Yadā
anya-e0401n:112_9: pana dethavandathāti ñātīhi ussāhitā evaṃ paṭipajjanti, tadā catutthaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0401n:112_10: Yadā pana deyyadhamma paṭiggāhakādīnaṃ asampattiṃ aññesaṃ vā somanassahetūnaṃ abhāvaṃ
anya-e0401n:112_11: āgamma catūsupi vikappesu somanassarahitā honti. Tadā sesāni cattāri upekkhāsahagatāni uppajjantīti.
anya-e0401n:113_0: 42. Aṭṭhapīti ettha pisaddena imāni cittāni na kevalaṃ aṭṭheva honti. Atha kho tato
anya-e0401n:113_1: bahūnipi bahutarānipi hontīti imaṃ sampiṇḍanatthaṃ dīpetīti dassetuṃ “tenā”tiādivuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:113_2: Dasasu puññakiriyāvatthūsu diṭṭhuju kammaṃ nāma ñāṇa kiccaṃ. Taṃ kathaṃ ñāṇa vippayutta
anya-e0401n:113_3: cittehi karontīti. Vuccate. Ñāṇa sampayutta cittehi diṭṭhiṃ ujuṃkarontā tesaṃ antarantarā
anya-e0401n:113_4: ñāṇasote patitavasena ñāṇavippayutta cittehipi karontiyeva. Sabbesattā kammassakātiādinā,
anya-e0401n:113_5: buddho sobhagavā, svākkhāto so dhammo, suppaṭipanno so saṅgho, tiādinā cāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:113_6: Tenāha “imāni aṭṭha cittānī”tiādiṃ. Tattha dasapuññakiriyavatthūni nāma ‘dānaṃ, sīlaṃ,
anya-e0401n:113_7: bhāvanā, apacāyanaṃ, veyyāvaccaṃ, pattidānaṃ, pattānumodanaṃ, dhammassavanā, dhammadesanā,
anya-e0401n:113_8: diṭṭhuju kammaṃ,. Tehi guṇitāni vaḍḍhitāni. Tāni ca aṭṭhachasu ārammaṇesu uppajjanti.
anya-e0401n:113_9: Tīṇi ca kammāni karontā te heva aṭṭhahi karonti. Tāniyeva ca sabbāni atthi hīnāni,
anya-e0401n:113_10: atthi majjhimāni, atthi paṇītāni. Tasmā puna anukkamena ārammaṇādīhi vaḍḍhanaṃ karoti.
anya-e0401n:113_12: katvā”ti iti manasi karitvā. Tathā ñāṇavippayuttāni dvesahassāni sataṃ saṭṭhi ca
anya-e0401n:113_15: ñāṇavippayutta vīthīhi visuṃ bhūtāya āvajjanāya yutta vīthiyaṃ. “Tenevā”ti vīmaṃsādhipatibhūtena
anya-e0401n:113_16: teneva upanissayaññāṇena. Evaṃ santepi na sakkābhavitunti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:114_2: etesanti aniṭṭha vipākāni. Tesaṃ bhāvo aniṭṭha vipākaṭṭho. Tena aniṭṭha vipākaṭṭhena.
anya-e0401n:114_3: “Tappaṭi pakkhattā”ti rāgādīhi paṭipakkhattā. Evaṃ pariyāyattha saṅkhātaṃ abhidhānatthaṃ
anya-e0401n:114_4: dassetvā idāni aṭṭhakathāsu āgataṃ vacanatthaṃ dasseti kucchitetiādinā. Tattha “kucchite”ti
anya-e0401n:114_5: jegucchitabbe, nindi tabbe vā. Cālenti tadaṅgappahānavasena, kampenti vikkhambhanappahānavasena,
anya-e0401n:114_8: mahāaṭṭhakathānayo. Tattha, kusalassa paṇḍitassa bhāvo ekāsallaṃ. Ñāṇaṃ. Tena sambhūtaṃ
anya-e0401n:115_1: vā dvihetuka kusala kammena vā. “Kehici ācariyehī”ti moravāpi vāsī mahādattattheraṃ
anya-e0401n:115_3: āsanne saṇṭhitapaccaya vasena. Paccuppanna paccayavasenevāti vuttaṃ hoti. Upaṭṭhitāni
anya-e0401n:115_4: kammādīni ārammaṇāni. Pavattāni mahāvipākāni. “Avipāka sabhāvato”ti avipaccanasabhāvato.
anya-e0401n:115_6: “Idhā”ti mahāvipākacitte. “Tathā appavattiyā cā”ti dānādivasena appavattito ca.
anya-e0401n:116_0: 45. Mahākiriyacitte. “Uparī”ti vīthisaṅgahe tadā rammaṇa niyame. “Sayamevā”ti anuruddhatthereneva.
anya-e0401n:116_2: arahānurūpaṃ. Bhūtakathana visesanaṃ tena nivattetabbassa atthassa abhāvāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:116_4: sabbhāvātappasaṅgassa avacchedakaṃ visesanaṃ. “Yathā sakkhara kathalikaṃpi macchagumbaṃpi
anya-e0401n:116_5: tiṭṭhantaṃpi carantaṃpi passatī”ti vacane sakkhara kathalikaṃ tiṭṭhantaṃ, macchagumbaṃ
anya-e0401n:116_6: tiṭṭhantaṃpi carantaṃpi passatīti evaṃ yathā lābha yojanā hoti. Tathā idha pīti.
anya-e0401n:117_0: 46. “Yadida”nti yā ayaṃ dīpana samatthatā, “idaṃ sāmatthiya”nti yojanā. Ayaṃ samattha
anya-e0401n:117_1: bhāvoti attho. Bhedavacane codanāyāti sambandho. Racanāgāthāyaṃ. “Etānī”ti sobhaṇa
anya-e0401n:117_2: kāmāvacara cittāni. “Puñña pāpa kriyābhedā”ti puñña pāpa kriyabhedena.
anya-e0401n:118_0: 47. Katame dhammā kāmāvacarā. Heṭṭhato avīcinirayaṃ pariyantaṃ karitvā uparito paranimmita
anya-e0401n:118_1: vasavattideve anto karitvāti evaṃ pāḷiyaṃ niddiṭṭhattā idhakāmasaddena sahokāsākāmabhūmi
anya-e0401n:118_2: vuccatīti āha “kāme kāmabhūmiya”nti. Pariyāpannāti pāṭhaseso. “Kriyā cā”ti ettha
anya-e0401n:118_3: ca saddo pana saddattho. Iti saddo iccevaṃ saddattho. Etena paṭisiddhāti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:118_4: “Idhā”ti imasmiṃ cittasaṅgahe. “Tassā”ti sabbathāsaddassa. Bhavo nāma indriya baddhasantānagato
anya-e0401n:118_5: dhamma samūho vuccati. Idha pana kāmāvacarā dhammāti pade kāmasaddo. So ca pathavi
anya-e0401n:118_6: pabbatādīhi saddhiṃ sabbaṃ kāmabhūmiṃ vadatīti vuttaṃ “bhūmipariyāyo cā”tiādi. “Indriyānindriyabaddha
anya-e0401n:118_7: dhamma samūho”ti indriyabaddha dhamma samūho sattasantānāgato, anindriyabaddha dhamma
anya-e0401n:118_8: samūho pathavi pabbatādi gato. Tattha jīvitindriyena anābaddho anāyatto anindriyabaddhoti.
anya-e0401n:120_0: 48. Rūpāvacaracitte. “Samuditenā”ti pañcaṅga samuditena. Pañcannaṃ aṅgānaṃ ekato
anya-e0401n:120_1: sāmaggibhūtenāti attho. Pañcannañhi ekato sāmaggiyaṃ satiyeva appanā hoti, no asati.
anya-e0401n:120_2: Sāmaggiyanti ca suṭṭhu balavatāya samaggabhāveti attho. “Paṭipajjitabbattā”ti pattabbattā.
anya-e0401n:120_3: Jhānaṃ duvidhaṃ ārammaṇūpanijjhānañca lakkhaṇū panijjhānañcāti āha “kasiṇādikassā”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:120_4: Idha pana ārammaṇūpanijjhānaṃ adhippetaṃ. Upanijjhānanti ca kasiṇa nimittādikaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0401n:120_5: cetasā upagantvānijjhānaṃ olokanaṃ. Jhānasaddassajhāpanatthopi sambhavatīti vuttaṃ
anya-e0401n:120_6: “paccanīka dhammānañca jhāpanato”ti. Agginā viya kaṭṭhānaṃ kilesānaṃ dayhanatoti
anya-e0401n:120_7: attho. Ekaggatā eva sātissaya yuttā appanāpattakāleti adhippāyo. Pubbabhāge pana
anya-e0401n:120_8: pathamajjhāne vitakkassa balavabhāvo icchitabbo. “Sāhī”tiādinā tadatthaṃ vivarati.
anya-e0401n:120_9: Sāhi ekaggatāti ca vuccatīti sambandho. Eko attāsabhāvo assāti ekattaṃ. Ekattaṃ ārammaṇamassāti
anya-e0401n:120_10: ekattā rammaṇā. Ekaggatā. Tassa bhāvoti viggaho.
anya-e0401n:121_0: Aggasaddo koṭi attho. Koṭṭhāsaṭṭhovā. “Tathā pavattane”ti cittassa ekaggabhāvena
anya-e0401n:121_2: vuttaṃ hoti. Sāyeva ekaggatā ekaggatā, samādhī,ti ca vuccatīti sambandho. “Samādhī”ti
anya-e0401n:121_3: padassa-saṃ-ādhī-ti-vā, samaādhīti-vā, dvidhā padacchedo. Tattha saṃupasaggo sammāsaddattho.
anya-e0401n:121_4: Samasaddo pana dhammena samena rajjaṃ kāretītiādīsu viya nāmikasaddoti dvidhā vikappaṃ
anya-e0401n:121_5: dassento “sāyeva citta”ntiādimāha. Sāyeva cittaṃ-sammā ca ādhiyatīti samādhi, sāyeva
anya-e0401n:121_6: cittaṃ-samañca ādhiyatīti samādhīti dvidhā vikappo. Tattha sammā cāti sundarena.
anya-e0401n:121_7: Ādhiyatīti ādahati. Ādahanañca ṭhapanamevāti vuttaṃ “ṭhapetī”ti. Samañcāti avisamañca.
anya-e0401n:121_8: “Tatthevā”ti tasmiṃ ārammaṇe eva. “Līnuddhaccābhāvā pādanenā”ti līnassa ca uddhaccassa
anya-e0401n:121_9: ca abhāvo līnuddhaccābhāvo. Tassa āpādanaṃ āpajjāpananti viggaho. Vividhena cittassa
anya-e0401n:121_10: saṃharaṇaṃ visāhāro. Na visāhāro avisāhāro. Sāyeva ca niddiṭṭhā. Iti evaṃ imesu dvīsu
anya-e0401n:121_11: atthesu ekaggatā eva sātissayayuttāti yojetabbaṃ. Evaṃ pana sati, ekaggatā eva jhānanti
anya-e0401n:121_12: vattabbā, na vitakkādayoti codanaṃ pariharanto “vitakkādayopanā”tiādimāha. Apisaddo
anya-e0401n:121_13: sampiṇḍanattho. Panasaddo pakkhantarattho. Tassā ekaggatāya. “Sā tissaya”nti atissayena
anya-e0401n:121_14: saha. “Osakkitu”nti saṃsīdituṃ. “Naṃ”ti cittaṃ. “Saṃsappitu”nti evaṃ nu kho aññathānu
anya-e0401n:121_15: khoti dvidhā cañcalituṃ. “Ukkaṇṭhitu”nti aññābhimukhī bhavituṃ. Āramitunti vuttaṃ
anya-e0401n:121_16: hoti. Laddhaṃ sātaṃ yenāti laddhassātaṃ. “Sātaṃ”ti sārattaṃ. “Upabrūhitaṃ”ti bhusaṃvaḍḍhitaṃ.
anya-e0401n:122_0: Evaṃ upanijjhānatthaṃ dassetvā jhāpanatthaṃ dassento “tesu cā”tiādimāha. “Tappaccanīkā”ti
anya-e0401n:122_1: tesaṃ jhānaṅga dhammānaṃ paccanīkā paṭipakkhā. “Manasmiṃ pī”ti manodvārepi. Pageva
anya-e0401n:122_2: kāyavacīdvāresūti evaṃ sambhāvanattho cettha pisaddo. Apisaddopi yujjati. “Jhāpitā
anya-e0401n:122_3: nāma hontī”ti jhānaṅga dhammaggīhi daḍḍhānāma honti. “Evaṃ santepi tesaṃ samudāye
anya-e0401n:122_4: eva jhāna vohāro siddho”ti yojanā. “Dhamma sāmaggipadhāna”nti jhānaṭṭhāne jhānaṅga
anya-e0401n:122_5: dhammānaṃ maggaṭṭhāne maggaṅga dhammānaṃ bodhiṭṭhāne bojjhaṅga dhammānaṃ samaggabhāvappadhānaṃ.
anya-e0401n:123_0: Evaṃ saṅgahakārānaṃ matiyā jhānaṃ vatvā idāni aparesānaṃ matiyā taṃ dassetuṃ “apare”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n:123_1: Apare pana vadantīti sambandho. Tattha “yathā sakaṃkiccānī”ti sassa idaṃ sakaṃ. Sassāti
anya-e0401n:123_2: attano. Idanti santakaṃ. Yāniyāni attano santakānīti attho. “Itī”ti tasmā. “Paṭṭhāne
anya-e0401n:123_3: jhānapaccayaṃ patvā…pe… sādhentiyeva”. Vuttañhi tattha. Jhānapaccayoti jhānaṅgānijhānasampayuttakānaṃ
anya-e0401n:123_4: dhammānaṃ taṃ samuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ jhānapaccayena paccayo. Maggapaccayoti maggaṅgāni
anya-e0401n:123_5: maggasampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ taṃ samuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ maggapaccayena paccayoti.
anya-e0401n:124_0: 49. “Ettha siyā”ti etasmiṃ ṭhāne pucchāsiyā. “Aṅga bhedo”ti pathamajjhāne pañca aṅgāni,
anya-e0401n:124_1: dutīyajjhāne cattāri aṅgānī tiādiko aṅgabhedo. “Puggalajjhāsayenā”ti puggalassa icchāvisesena.
anya-e0401n:124_2: Iti ayaṃ visajjanā. “So”ti so puggalo. “Hī”ti vitthāra jotako. Vitakko sahāyo yassāti
anya-e0401n:124_3: vitakkasahāyo. “Vitakke nibbindatī”ti oḷārikovatāyaṃ vitakko, nīvaraṇānaṃ āsanne
anya-e0401n:124_4: ṭhitoti evaṃ vitakke ādīnavaṃ disvā nibbindati. Tassa ajjhāsayoti sambandho. Vitakkaṃ
anya-e0401n:124_5: virājeti vigameti atikkamāpetīti vitakkavirāgo. Vitakkavirāgo ca so bhāvanā cāti
anya-e0401n:124_7: pādakajjhānasadisaṃ na hotīti sambandho. Cetopaṇidhi ijjhatīti sambandho. “Visuddhattā”ti sīlavisuddhattā.
anya-e0401n:125_0: 50. Saṅkhāra bhedavicāraṇāyaṃ. “Saṅkhāra bhedo na vutto”ti pathamajjhāna kusala cittaṃ
anya-e0401n:125_1: asaṅkhārikamekaṃ, sasaṅkhārikamekantiādinā na vuttoti adhippāyo. “So”ti saṅkhāra
anya-e0401n:125_2: bhedo. “Siddhattā”ti saṅkhāra bhedassa siddhattā. Kathaṃ siddhoti āha “tathāhī”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:125_3: Sukhā paṭipadā yesaṃ tāni sukhappaṭipadāni. Tesaṃ bhāvoti viggaho. “Yo”ti yogīpuggalo.
anya-e0401n:125_6: etthabhiyyotiādinā kāmesuādīnavaṃ disvā. Ādisaddena vitakkādīsu ādīnavadassanaṃ saṅgayhati.
anya-e0401n:125_7: “Tenevā”ti kāmādīnavadassanādinā eva. Ettha abhiññābhedena saṅkhāra bhedo na vattabbo,
anya-e0401n:125_8: paṭipadā bhedeneva vattabboti dassetuṃ “khippābhiññajjhānānaṃpī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha,
anya-e0401n:125_9: abhijānanaṃ abhiññā. Khippāsīghā abhiññā yesaṃ tāni khippābhiññāni. Dandhā asīghā
anya-e0401n:125_10: abhiññā yesaṃ tāni dandhābhiññāni. Jhānāni. “Yadi eva”nti evaṃ paṭipadā bhedena saṅkhāra
anya-e0401n:125_11: bhedo yadi siyāti attho. “Vaḷañjanakāle”ti samāpatti samāpajjanakāle. Paṭibandhakā
anya-e0401n:125_13: vipassanāyānaṃ yesaṃ te suddhavipassanāyānikā. “Suddhaṃ”ti samathajjhānena asammissaṃ.
anya-e0401n:125_14: “Satthena hanitvā”ti pare na satthena hananato chindanato. “Sahasā”ti sīghatarena.
anya-e0401n:125_15: “Marantānaṃ uppannaṃ”ti maraṇāsannakāle uppannaṃti adhippāyo. Anāgāmino hi suddha
anya-e0401n:125_16: vipassanāyānikāpi samānā samādhismiṃ paripūrakārino nāma honti. Icchante susati kiñci
anya-e0401n:125_17: nimittaṃ ārabbhamanasikāra mattenapi jhānaṃ ijjhati. Tenāha “taṃpi maggasiddhagatika”nti.
anya-e0401n:125_18: “Rūpībrahmaloke”ti idaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ samāpattīnaṃpi tattha pākatikabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:125_19: Arūpī brahmaloke pana ekā eva samāpatti pākatikāsambhavati. Upapattisiddhajjhānānaṃ
anya-e0401n:125_20: bhavantare sannihita paccayabhedena saṅkhāra bhedo vutto, so kathaṃ paccetabboti
anya-e0401n:125_21: āha “ekasmiṃ bhavepi…pe… yuttāni hontī”ti. Ekasmiṃ bhavesabbappathamaṃ laddhakāle
anya-e0401n:125_22: saṅkhāra bhedassa āsannattā vaḷañjanakālepi so eva saṅkhāra bhedo siyāti āsaṅkāsambhavato
anya-e0401n:125_23: idaṃ vuttaṃ. Tena bhavantare upapatti siddhajjhānānaṃ sannihita paccayabhedena saṅkhārabhede
anya-e0401n:125_24: vattabbameva natthīti dasseti. Idāni tāni magga siddhajjhāna upapatti siddhajjhānāni
anya-e0401n:125_25: sannihitapaccayaṃ anapekkhitvā maggakkhaṇa upapattikkhaṇesu siddhakāle jhānuppatti
anya-e0401n:125_26: paṭipadāya eva sabbaso abhāvaṃ gahetvā aparaṃ vikappaṃ dassetuṃ “jhānuppatti paṭipadā
anya-e0401n:125_27: rahitattā vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Evaṃ mahaggatajhānānaṃ aṭṭhakathāvasena siddhaṃ saṅkhāra
anya-e0401n:125_28: bhedaṃ vatvā idāni pāḷivasenāpi so siddho yevāti dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0401n:125_30: etaṃ parimāṇaṃ assāti ettāvaṃ. Ettāvantena. Ettha siyā, kasmā idha saṅkhārabhedo
anya-e0401n:125_31: na vuttotiādinā vacanakkamena siddho hotīti sambandho. Sesaṃ suviññeyyaṃ.
anya-e0401n:126_0: 51. Vibhāvanipāṭhe. Parikammaṃ nāma pathavī, pathavī, āpo, āpo-tiādikaṃ, rūpaṃ aniccaṃ,
anya-e0401n:126_1: rūpaṃ dukkhaṃ, rūpaṃ anattā-tiādikañcabhāvanāparikammaṃ adhikāro nāma pubbabhavekatabhāvanākammaṃ.
anya-e0401n:126_3: ettha tāvasaddo vattabbantarāpekkhane nipāto. Tena aparaṃpi vattabbaṃ atthīti dīpeti.
anya-e0401n:126_4: Pubbābhisaṅkhāro duvidho pakati pubbābhisaṅkhāro, payogapubbābhisaṅkhāroti. Tattha
anya-e0401n:126_5: parikamma pubbābhisaṅkhāro pakati pubbābhisaṅkhāro nāma, ayaṃ pakati paccayagaṇo
anya-e0401n:126_6: eva. Pubbe vutto pubbappayogo payogapubbābhisaṅkhāro nāma. So eva idhādhippetoti
anya-e0401n:126_8: lopabhikkhā. So parikammasaṅkhātapubbābhisaṅkhāro. Jhānāni ca sabbāni uppannāni nāma
anya-e0401n:126_10: jhānānaṃ. Na hi lokiyajjhānāni nāma…pe… atthi, imesaṃ sattānaṃ sabbakappesupi kappavināsakāle
anya-e0401n:126_11: jhānāni bhāvetvā brahmaloka parāyanatā sabbhāvāti adhippāyo. “Pubbe samathakammesu
anya-e0401n:126_12: katādhikārassā”ti āsannabhavekatādhikāraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Dūrabhave pana samathakammesu
anya-e0401n:126_13: akatādhikāro nāma koci natthīti. “Evamevā”ti evaṃ eva. Vipākajjhānesu saṅkhāra bhedassa
anya-e0401n:126_14: pubba kammavasena vattabbattā “kusala kriyajjhānesū”ti vuttaṃ. “Athavātiādiko pacchima
anya-e0401n:126_15: vikappo nāma” athavā pubbābhisaṅkhāreneva uppajjamānassa nakadāci asaṅkhārikabhāvo
anya-e0401n:126_16: sambhavatīti asaṅkhārikanti ca, byabhicārābhāvato sasaṅkhārikanti ca na vuttanti
anya-e0401n:126_17: ayaṃ vikappo. Tattha asaṅkhārikanti ca na vuttanti sambandho. “Byabhicārā bhāvato”ti
anya-e0401n:126_18: asaṅkhārikabhāvena pasaṅgābhāvato. Sasaṅkhārikanti ca na vuttaṃ. Yadi vucceyya. Nirattha
anya-e0401n:126_19: kamevataṃbhaveyya. Kasmā, sambhava byabhicārānaṃ abhāvato. Sambhave byabhicāre ca.
anya-e0401n:126_20: Visesanaṃ sātthakaṃ siyāti hi vuttaṃ. Na ca niratthakavacanaṃ paṇḍitā vadanti. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n:126_21: apaṇḍitalakkhaṇattā. Sati pana sambhave ca byabhicāre ca, tathā sakkā vattuṃ. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n:126_22: sātthakattā. Sātthakameva paṇḍitā vadanti. Kasmā, paṇḍita lakkhaṇattāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:127_1: Sukhāpana paṭipadā, pacchādandhaṃ vā khippaṃ vā uppannaṃ jhānaṃ sukhappaṭipadaṃ nāma
anya-e0401n:127_2: karotīti yojanā. “Pubbabhave”ti āsanne pubbabhave. Antarāyikadhammā nāma ‘kilesantarāyiko
anya-e0401n:127_3: ca, kammantarāyiko ca, vipākantarāyiko ca, paññatti vītikkamantarāyiko ca, ariyūpavādantarāyiko
anya-e0401n:127_4: ca. Tattha tisso niyatamicchādiṭṭhiyokilesantarāyiko nāma. Pañcānantariya kammāni
anya-e0401n:127_5: kammantarāyiko nāma. Ahetuka dvihetukappaṭisandhivipākā vipākantarāyiko nāma. Bhikkhu
anya-e0401n:127_6: bhāveṭhitānaṃ vinaya paññattiṃ vītikkamitvā akatappaṭikammo vītikkamo paññattivītikkamantarāyiko
anya-e0401n:127_7: nāma. Paṭikammepanakate antarāyiko na hoti. Ariyapuggalānaṃ jātiādīhi upavaditvā
anya-e0401n:127_8: akkositvā akatappaṭikammaṃ akkosanaṃ ariyūpavādantarāyiko nāma. Idhapi paṭikamme
anya-e0401n:127_9: kate antarāyiko na hoti. Sesesu tīsu paṭikammaṃ nāma natthi. Ime dhammā imasmiṃ bhave
anya-e0401n:127_10: jhānamaggānaṃ antarāyaṃ karontīti antarāyikā nāma. Tehi vimutto antarāyika dhamma
anya-e0401n:127_11: vimutto nāma. “Kalyāṇappaṭipattiyaṃ ṭhito”ti sīlavisuddhi ādikāya kalyāṇappaṭipattiyaṃ
anya-e0401n:127_12: paripūraṇa vasena ṭhito. “Chinnapalibodho”ti āvāsapalibodhādīni dasavidhāni palibodhakammāni
anya-e0401n:127_13: chinditvā ṭhito. “Pahitatto”ti, yantaṃ purisathāmena purisaparakkamena pattabbaṃ,
anya-e0401n:127_14: na taṃ apatvā vīriyassa saṇṭhānaṃ bhavissatīti evaṃ pavattena sammappadhāna vīriyena
anya-e0401n:127_15: samannāgato. So hi pahito pesito anapekkhito attabhāvo anenāti pahitattoti vuccati.
anya-e0401n:127_16: “Nasampajjatīti natthi”. Sace pañcapadhāniyaṅgasamannāgato hotīti adhippāyo. Pañcapadhāniyaṅgāni
anya-e0401n:127_17: nāma saddhāsampannatā, asāṭheyyaṃ, ārogyaṃ, alīnavīriyatā, paññavantatā,ti.
anya-e0401n:128_1: ca dubbalaṃ. “Nānā kiccaṭṭhānesu cā”ti dassanasavanādīsu. “Hīnesupi attabhāvesū”ti
anya-e0401n:128_3: janetītiādinā asadisaṃpi vipākaṃ janeti. “Bhavaṅgaṭṭhānesu yevā”ti ettha bhavaṅga
anya-e0401n:128_5: pathamajjhāna vipākameva janeti, dutīyajjhāna kusalaṃ dutīyajjhāna vipākameva janetītiādinā
anya-e0401n:128_6: kusala sadisameva vipākaṃ janeti. “Kusalameva…pe… kriyajjhānaṃ nāma hoti” abhedū
anya-e0401n:128_7: pacārenāti adhippāyo. Bhedampi abhedaṃ katvā upacāro vohāro abhedū pacāro.
anya-e0401n:129_0: 54. Saṅgahagāthā vaṇṇanāyaṃ. Jhānānaṃ bhedo jhānabhedo. Atthato pana jhānehi sampayogabhedo
anya-e0401n:129_1: jhānabhedoti vutto hotīti āha “jhānehi sampayogabhedenā”ti. Pathamajjhānikaṃ cittantiādinā
anya-e0401n:129_2: yojetabbaṃ. “Tamevā”ti rūpāvacara mānasameva. Vibhāvaniyaṃ pana uparisaṅgahagāthāyaṃ
anya-e0401n:129_3: jhānaṅga yogabhedena, katvekekantu pañcadhāti vacanaṃ disvā idha jhāna bhedenāti
anya-e0401n:129_4: jhānaṅgehi sampayogabhedenāti vuttaṃ. Evaṃ santepi idha jhānabhedassa visuṃ adhippetattā
anya-e0401n:131_1: Natthi jaṭā etthāti ajaṭo. Ajaṭo ākāsoti ajaṭākāso. “Paricchinnākāso”ti dvāracchiddavātapānacchiddādiko
anya-e0401n:131_2: ākāso, yattha ākāsa kasiṇa nimittaṃ uggaṇhanti. Kasiṇa nimittaṃ ugghāṭetvā laddho
anya-e0401n:131_3: ākāso kasiṇugghāṭimākāso, kasiṇaṃ ugghāṭena nibbatto kasiṇugghāṭimoti katvā. Rūpakalāpānaṃ
anya-e0401n:131_5: ananta nāmaṃ katvā bhāvanāmanasikārena pharīyati. “Devānaṃ adhiṭṭhānavatthū”ti mahiddhikānaṃ
anya-e0401n:131_6: gāmanagara devānaṃ balippaṭiggahaṇaṭṭhānaṃ vuccati, yattha manussā samaye kula devatānaṃ
anya-e0401n:131_7: baliṃ abhiharanti. “Baliṃ”ti pūjanīya vatthu vuccati. “Tasmiṃ”ti kasiṇugghāṭimākāse.
anya-e0401n:131_8: “Tadevā”ti taṃ ārammaṇameva. Kusalajjhānaṃ samāpannassavā, vipākajjhānena upapannassavā,
anya-e0401n:131_9: kriyajjhānena diṭṭhadhamma sukha vihārissavā, tiyojetabbaṃ. Anantanti vuccati, yathāpathavīkasiṇe
anya-e0401n:131_10: pavattanato jhānaṃ pathavīkasiṇanti vuccatīti. “Ekadese”ti uppādevā ṭhitiyaṃ vā bhaṅgevā.
anya-e0401n:131_11: Antarahitattā anantanti vuccati. “Ananta saññite”ti ananta nāmake. “Anantanti bhāvanāya
anya-e0401n:131_12: pavattattā”ti idaṃ pathamā ruppaviññāṇaṃ anantanti evaṃ pubbabhāga bhāvanāya pavattattā.
anya-e0401n:131_14: nayenā”ti sakatthe yapaccayaṃ katvā nakārassalopena. “Pāḷiyā nasametī”ti vibhaṅga
anya-e0401n:131_15: pāḷiyānasameti. “Anantaṃ pharatī”ti anantaṃ anantanti pharati. “Pathamā ruppaviññāṇābhāvo”ti
anya-e0401n:131_16: tassa abhāva paññattimattaṃ. “Nevatthī”ti natthi. “Assā”ti catutthā ruppajjhānassa.
anya-e0401n:131_19: “Desanāsīsamattaṃ”ti rājā āgacchatītiādīsu viya padhāna kathāmattanti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:131_20: “Tassevā”ti pathamā ruppaviññāṇasseva. Kusalabhūtaṃ pathamā ruppaviññāṇaṃ puthujjanānañca
anya-e0401n:131_21: sekkhānañca kusalabhūtassa dutīyāruppaviññāṇassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti. Arahā pana tividho.
anya-e0401n:131_22: Tattha, ekopathamā ruppeṭhatvā arahattaṃ patvā pathamāruppaṃ asamāpajjitvāva dutīyā
anya-e0401n:131_23: ruppaṃ uppādeti. Tassa kusalabhūtaṃ pathamā ruppaṃ kriyabhūtassa dutīyā ruppassa
anya-e0401n:131_24: ārammaṇaṃ. Ekopathamā ruppeṭhatvā arahattaṃ patvā puna tameva pathamā ruppaṃ samāpajjitvā
anya-e0401n:131_25: dutīyā ruppaṃ uppādeti. Eko dutīyā ruppeṭhatvā arahattaṃ gacchati. Tesaṃ dvinnaṃ
anya-e0401n:131_26: kriyabhūtaṃ pathamā ruppaviññāṇaṃ kriyabhūtasseva dutīyāruppassa ārammaṇaṃ. Tenāha
anya-e0401n:133_1: “Yathāhā”ti kathaṃ pāḷiyaṃ āha. “Seyyathida”nti so katamo. “Ayaṃ pī”ti ayaṃ ariyamaggopi.
anya-e0401n:133_2: Ekacittakkhaṇiko ariyamaggo, kathaṃ yāva anupādisesa nibbānadhātuyāsavati sandatīti
anya-e0401n:133_3: āha “ānubhāvappharaṇavasenā”ti. Pāḷiyaṃ gaṅgādīni pañcannaṃ mahānadīnaṃ nāmāni. “Samudda
anya-e0401n:133_4: ninnā”ti mahāsamuddābhimukhaṃ ninnā namitā. “Poṇā”ti anupatitā. “Pabbhārā”ti adhovāhitā.
anya-e0401n:133_6: adhomukhaṃ ṭhapito. “Nopaccāva matī”ti puna nogilati. “Na punetī”ti na puna eti nupagacchati
anya-e0401n:133_7: ariyasāvako. “Na paccetī”ti na paṭi eti. Tadatthaṃ vadati “na paccāgacchatī”ti. Evaṃ
anya-e0401n:133_8: taṃ anivattagamanaṃ pāḷisādhakehi dīpetvā idāni yuttisādhakehi pakāsetuṃ “yathā cā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n:133_11: duppaññatāya eva paggharitalāla mukha mūgā. “Tasmiṃ magge evā”ti aṭṭhaṅgīke ariyamagge
anya-e0401n:133_12: eva. So pana maggo pathama maggo, dutīya maggo, tatīya maggo, catuttha maggo,ti catubbidho
anya-e0401n:133_13: hoti. “Ādito pajjanaṃ”ti catūsu maggesu ādimhi pathama maggasotassa pajjanaṃ gamanaṃ.
anya-e0401n:133_14: Paṭilābhoti vuttaṃ hoti. “Sotāpattiyā”ti sotassa āpajjanena. “Adhigammamāno”ti paṭilabbhamāno.
anya-e0401n:133_15: Sabbe bodhipakkhiya dhammā anivatta gatiyā pavattamānā sototi vuccantīti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:133_16: Sambodhi vuccati catūsu maggesu ñāṇaṃ. Uparisambodhi eva parāyanaṃ yesaṃ te uparisambodhi
anya-e0401n:133_17: parāyanā. Parāyananti ca paṭisaraṇaṃ. Kathaṃ sotāpatti vacanaṃ maggena samānādhikaraṇaṃ
anya-e0401n:133_18: hotīti vuttaṃ “pathama magga saṅkhātāya sotāpattiyā”tiādi. “Maggetī”ti gavesati.
anya-e0401n:133_19: Mārenta gamanoniruttinayena maggoti sijjhatīti vuttaṃ “kilese mārento gacchatīti maggo”ti.
anya-e0401n:134_0: 58. Sakadāgāmi magge. “Sakiṃ āgacchatī”ti itogantvā puna idha āgacchatīti attho.
anya-e0401n:134_1: “Sīlenā”ti pakatisabhāvena. Kāmalokaṃ āgacchanti etehīti kāmalokāgamanā. Kilesā.
anya-e0401n:134_2: Tesaṃ sabbhāvena vijjamānabhāvena. Pāḷiyaṃ “ekaccassa puggalassā”ti kattu atthesāmivacanaṃ.
anya-e0401n:134_3: Ekaccena puggalena appahīnā nīti sambandho. “Sahabyataṃ”ti sahāyabhāvaṃ. “Āgāmīhotī”ti
anya-e0401n:134_4: vatvā tamevatthaṃ vadati “āgantvā itthatta”nti. Āgacchati sīlenāti āgantvā. Itthaṃ
anya-e0401n:134_5: bhāvo itthattaṃ. Imaṃ kāmattabhāvaṃ āgantvā, tasmā āgāmī nāma hotīti yojanā. “Ayañca
anya-e0401n:134_6: attho”ti paṭisandhivasena sakiṃ imaṃ lokaṃ āgacchatītiādiko attho. “Kilesa gativasenā”ti
anya-e0401n:134_7: kāmalokā gamana kilesa gativasena. Maggasahāyena jhānena vikkhambhitā kilesā maggena
anya-e0401n:134_8: samucchinna gatikā honti. Ayaṃ maggasahāyojhānānubhāvo nāma. Tenāha “na hī”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:134_9: “Devalokato”ti ettha brahmalokopi saṅgahito. Pacchimasmiṃ pana atthe satīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:134_10: Āgamanasīlo āgantvā. Na āgantvā anāgantvā. “Tenā”ti anāgamanena. “Nānatthā sambhavato”ti
anya-e0401n:134_11: dvīsu itthattasaddesu ekasmiṃ imaṃ kāmāvacara lokanti ekasmiṃ imaṃ manussa lokanti
anya-e0401n:134_12: evaṃ nānatthānaṃ asambhavato. Pāḷiyaṃ “sabyā bajjho”ti cetodukkha saṅkhātena cetasikarogā
anya-e0401n:134_13: bādhena sahito. Tenāha “tehi paṭighānusayassā”tiādiṃ. Tattha “te”ti puthujjana sotāpanna
anya-e0401n:134_14: sakadāgāmino. Sabyā bajjhānāmāti sambandho. “Pacchimassa vākyassā”ti āgantvā itthattaṃ
anya-e0401n:134_15: sotāpanna sakadāgāmino tena daṭṭhabbāti vākyassa. “Dvīsu sakadāgāmīsū”ti āgantvā
anya-e0401n:134_16: itthattanti vuttattā tena atthena sakadāgāmināmakesu dvīsu sotāpanna sakadāgāmīsu.
anya-e0401n:134_17: “Purimassā”ti sotāpannassa. “Anañña sādhāraṇe nevā”ti dutīya phalaṭṭhādīhi asāmaññeneva.
anya-e0401n:134_18: Brahmalokeṭhitānaṃ sotāpannānaṃ sattakkhattu parama tādibhāvo natthi viya dutīya
anya-e0401n:134_19: phalaṭṭhānaṃ sakadāgāmi bhāvopi natthi. Tenāha “pathama dutīya phalaṭṭhāpī”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:134_21: uparito āgantvā heṭṭhūpapatti ca, heṭṭhato āgantvā uparūpapatti cāti evaṃ heṭṭhūparūpapattivasena.
anya-e0401n:134_22: “Evañca katvā”tiādi dutīya laddha guṇavacanaṃ. “Pañcannaṃ idha niṭṭhā”ti pañcannaṃ
anya-e0401n:134_23: puggalānaṃ idha kāmaloke niṭṭhā anupādisesa nibbānapattīti vuttaṃ hoti. “So panā”ti
anya-e0401n:134_24: sakadāgāmi puggalo pana. Yesaṃ pana aṭṭhakathā cariyānaṃ attho, tesaṃ attheso sakadāgāmi
anya-e0401n:134_25: puggalo pañcavidhova vutto, na chaṭṭho puggaloti yojanā. Yesaṃ pana imaṃ lokanti
anya-e0401n:134_26: attho, tesaṃ atthe chaṭṭhopi labbhatīti dassetuṃ “mahāparinibbāna…pe… āgato yevā”ti
anya-e0401n:134_27: vuttaṃ. Tattha “sakiṃ āgamanaṭṭhena āgato yevā”ti sakiṃ āgamanaṭṭhena sakadāgāmīsu
anya-e0401n:134_28: āgatoyeva. Sabbaññu buddhāpi pathama phalaṭṭha bhūtā sattakkhattu paramatāyaṃ saṇṭhitā
anya-e0401n:134_29: viyāti yojanā. Ettha ca “sattakkhattuparamatāyaṃ”ti sattakkhattu paramabhāve. Idañca
anya-e0401n:134_30: nidassana vacanamattaṃ. Sabbaññu buddhāpi dutīya phalaṭṭhabhūtā sakiṃ āgamanappakatiyaṃ
anya-e0401n:134_31: saṇṭhitāyeva honti. Kasmā, tasmiṃ khaṇe taṃ sabhāvānati vattanatoti adhippāyo. Sabbopi
anya-e0401n:134_32: so chabbīdho puggalo idha…pe… daṭṭhabbo. Etena yaṃ vuttaṃ vibhāvaniyaṃ pañcasu sakadāgāmīsu
anya-e0401n:134_33: pañcamakova idhādhippetoti. Taṃ paṭikkhittaṃ hoti. Kasmā, pañcamako eva idha sakadāgāmipade
anya-e0401n:134_34: adhippetesati itare cattāro kattha adhippetā siyunti vattabbattā. Janakabhūto samāno.
anya-e0401n:134_35: “Ñāyāgatā evā”ti yuttito paramparāgatā eva. Tenāha “yathā”tiādiṃ. “Aviruddho”ti ñāyena aviruddho.
anya-e0401n:135: 59. Orambhāgo nāma heṭṭhābhāgo kāmaloko. Orambhāgāya saṃvattantīti orambhāgiyāni kāmarāga byāpāda saṃyojanādīni. “So”ti anāgāmi puggalo.
anya-e0401n:136_0: 60. Mahapphalaṃ karonti sīlenāti mahapphala kārino. Tesaṃ bhāvo “mahapphala kāritā”.
anya-e0401n:136_2: nirutti. Viggaha vākyanti vuttaṃ hoti. Suddhikasuññatāya tathā na vacittāni, suññatappaṭipadāya
anya-e0401n:136_3: tathā na vacittānītiādinā yojetabbaṃ. Tattha “suddhika suññatāyā”ti suddhikasuññatavāre.
anya-e0401n:136_5: sacca vibhaṅga satipaṭṭhāna vibhaṅgesu pana, sabbaṃ citta vaḍḍhanaṃ pāḷi aṭṭhakathāsu
anya-e0401n:137: 61. Phalacitte. Sotāpattiyā adhigataṃ phalaṃ sotāpatti phalaṃ. Tattha “adhigataṃ”ti paṭiladdhaṃ. Aṭṭhaṅgīka phalaṃ sandhāya “tena sampayutta”nti vuttaṃ. “Niruttī”ti viggaho.
anya-e0401n:138_0: 62. Tanubhūtepi kātuṃ na sakkoti, kuto samucchindituṃ. “Tānī”ti indriyāni. “Paṭū
anya-e0401n:138_1: nī”titikkhāni. “So”ti catuttha maggo. “Tā cā”ti rūparāga, arūparāga, māna, uddhacca,
anya-e0401n:138_2: avijjādayo ca. “Aññe cā”ti tehi dasahi saṃyojanehi aññe ahirikānottappādike, sabbepi pāpa dhamme ca.
anya-e0401n:139_0: 63. Kiriya citta vicāraṇāyaṃ. Na gahitaṃ iti ayaṃ pucchā. Abhāvā iti ayaṃ visajjanātiādinā
anya-e0401n:139_2: santānepi. “Itī”ti vākya parisamāpanamattaṃ. “Vuccate”ti visajjanā kathīyate. Puna
anya-e0401n:139_3: anuppajjanaṃ anuppādo. Anuppādo dhammo sabhāvo yesaṃ te anuppāda dhammā. Tesaṃ bhāvoti
anya-e0401n:139_4: viggaho. Vipākañca janetīti sambandho. Kathaṃ janetīti āha “kusala…pe… katvā”ti.
anya-e0401n:139_5: Tattha, “katvā”ti sādhetvā. Sacepi kareyyāti yojanā. “Kocī”ti abyatto koci ariyasāvako.
anya-e0401n:139_6: Tadā phala cittameva pavatteyyāti sambandho. “Paṭibāhituṃ asakkuṇeyyo”ti appaṭibāhiyo
anya-e0401n:140_0: 64. “Ādi anta padesve vā”tiādimhi dvādasā kusalānīti ca, ante kriya cittāni vīsatīti
anya-e0401n:140_1: ca padesu. Rūpe pariyā pannāni cittāni. Arūpe pariyā pannāni cittāni. “Pathamāya
anya-e0401n:140_2: bhūmiyā pattiyā”ti pathamabhūmiṃ pāpuṇituṃ. “Sāmañña phalaṃ adhippetanti vuttaṃ”
anya-e0401n:140_3: aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ. Atthato pana dhamma visesoti sambandho. Magga phala nibbāna saṅkhāto
anya-e0401n:140_4: dhamma viseso lokuttarabhūmi nāmāti yojanā. Avatthā bhūmi eva nippariyāyabhūmi. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n:140_5: avatthā vantānaṃ dhammānaṃ sarūpato laddhattā. Itarā okāsabhūmi nippariyāya bhūmi
anya-e0401n:140_6: na hoti. Kasmā, paññattiyā missakattā. “Dhammānaṃ taṃ taṃ avatthā visesavaseneva
anya-e0401n:140_7: siddhā”ti etena avatthā bhūmi eva padhāna bhūmīti dasseti. Kāmataṇhāya visayabhūto
anya-e0401n:140_8: oḷārikākāro kāmāvacaratā nāma. Bhavataṇhāya visayabhūto majjhimākāro rūpārūpāvacaratā
anya-e0401n:140_9: nāma. Tāsaṃ taṇhānaṃ avisayabhūto saṇha sukhumākāro lokuttaratā nāma. Hīnānaṃ akusala
anya-e0401n:140_10: kammānaṃ vasena hīnā apāyabhūmiyo. Paṇītānaṃ kusala kammānaṃ vasena paṇītā sugati
anya-e0401n:140_11: bhūmiyo. Tattha ca nānā akusala kammānaṃ vā nānā kusala kammānaṃ vā oḷārika sukhumatā
anya-e0401n:140_12: vasena nānā duggati bhūmiyo nānā sugati bhūmiyo ca siddhā hontīti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “api cā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n:141_0: 65. Gāthāya pubbaddhaṃ nāma-ittha mekūna navuti, ppabhedaṃ pana mānasanti pādadvayaṃ.
anya-e0401n:141_1: Aparaddhaṃ nāma ekavīsasataṃvātha, vibhajanti vicakkhaṇāti pādadvayaṃ. Taṃ iminā
anya-e0401n:141_2: na sameti. Kathaṃ na sameti. Iminā vacanena sakalampi gāthaṃ ekūna navutippabhedaṃ
anya-e0401n:141_3: mānasaṃ ekavīsa sataṃ katvā vibhajantī-ti evaṃ ekavākyaṃ katvā yojanaṃ ñāpeti. “Pathamajjhāna
anya-e0401n:141_4: sadisaṭṭhenā”ti lokiya pathamajjhāna sadisaṭṭhena. Yaṃ caturaṅgīkaṃ, taṃ sayameva
anya-e0401n:141_5: dutīyajjhānanti siddhaṃ. Yaṃ tiyaṅgīkaṃ, taṃ sayameva tatīyajjhānanti siddhaṃ. Yaṃ
anya-e0401n:141_6: duvaṅgīkaṃ, taṃ sayameva catutthajjhānanti siddhaṃ. Yaṃ puna duvaṅgīkaṃ, taṃ sayameva
anya-e0401n:141_7: pañcamajjhānanti siddhaṃ. “Evaṃ vutta”nti vibhāvaniyaṃ jhānaṅgavasena pathamajjhāna
anya-e0401n:141_8: sadisattā pathamajjhānañcāti evaṃ vuttaṃ. Vitakkādi aṅgapātubhāvena pañcadhā vibhajantīti
anya-e0401n:141_9: sambandho. Na itarāni lokiyajjhānāni sātissayato jhānāni nāma siyuṃ. Kasmāti āha
anya-e0401n:141_11: dahanti. Pakatiyā eva siddho hoti, na pādakajjhānādivasena siddho. “Kicca”nti pañcaṅgīka
anya-e0401n:141_12: bhāvatthāya kattabba kiccaṃ. “Tena paccaya visesenā”ti pādakajjhānādinā paccaya visesena.
anya-e0401n:141_13: “Tasmiṃ”ti paccaya visese. Yathālokiyajjhānesu upacārabhūtā bhāvanā kāci vitakka
anya-e0401n:141_14: virāga bhāvanā nāma hoti…pe… kāci rūpa virāga bhāvanā nāma. Asaññi gāmīnaṃ pana saññā
anya-e0401n:141_15: virāga bhāvanā nāma hoti. Evamevanti yojanā. “Sā”ti upacāra bhāvanā.“Upekkhā sahagataṃ
anya-e0401n:141_16: vā”ti ettha vā saddena rūpasamatikkamaṃ vā saññā samatikkamaṃ vāti avuttaṃ vikappeti.
anya-e0401n:141_17: Ādikammikakāle evaṃ hotu, vasibhūtakāle pana kathanti āha “jhānesū”tiādiṃ. Nānāsattiyuttā
anya-e0401n:141_18: hotīti vatvā nānāsattiyo dasseti “kācī”tiādinā. Yā upacāra bhāvanā. “Vitakkaṃ virājetuṃ”ti
anya-e0401n:141_19: vitakkaṃ vigametuṃ. Attano jhānaṃ avitakkaṃ kātunti vuttaṃ hoti. Tenāha “atikkāmetuṃ”ti.
anya-e0401n:141_20: Sā upacāra bhāvanā. Sesāsupi upacāra bhāvanāsu.
anya-e0401n:142_1: virāga bhāvanā nāma na hotīti adhippāyo. “Niyāmetuṃ”ti avitakkameva hotūti vadamānā
anya-e0401n:142_3: idaṃ jhānaṃ aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhena, dukkhaṃ bhayaṭṭhena, anattā asārakaṭṭhenāti sammasīyati
anya-e0401n:142_4: samanupassīyati. Taṃ aṭṭhakathāya na sameti. Vuttañhi tattha. Yato yato samāpattito
anya-e0401n:142_5: vuṭṭhāya ye ye samāpatti dhamme sammasitvā maggo nibbattito hoti. Taṃ taṃ samāpatti
anya-e0401n:142_6: sadisova hoti. Sammasitasamāpatti sadisoti atthoti. Ettha hi “yato yato samāpattito
anya-e0401n:142_7: vuṭṭhāyā”ti etena pādakajjhānaṃ kathitaṃ hoti. “Pādakajjhāne satī”ti etena ayaṃ vādopi
anya-e0401n:142_8: pādakajjhānena vinā nasijjhatīti dasseti. “Vipassanāpi…pe… pattā hotī”ti etena imasmiṃ
anya-e0401n:142_9: vādepi vipassanā niyāmo icchitabboti dasseti. Tenāha “yathālokiyajjhānesū”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:142_10: Kāmañcettha…pe… avirodho vutto viya dissati. Kathaṃ. Pañcamajjhānato vuṭṭhāya hi
anya-e0401n:142_11: pathamajjhānādīni sammasato uppannamaggo pathamattheravādena pañcamajjhāniko, dutīya
anya-e0401n:142_12: vādena pathamādijjhāniko āpajjatīti dvepi vādā virujjhanti. Tatīya vādena panettha
anya-e0401n:142_13: yaṃ icchati, taṃ jhāniko hotīti te ca vādā na virujjhanti, ajjhāsayo ca sātthako
anya-e0401n:142_14: hotīti evaṃ aviruddho vutto hotīti. Ettha pana yaṃ icchati, taṃ jhāniko hoti. Icchāya
anya-e0401n:142_15: pana asati, virodhoyeva. Tenāha “ime pana vādā. …Pe…. Virodho pariharituṃ”ti. Pāḷiyaṃ
anya-e0401n:142_16: “ajjhattaṃ suññataṃ manasi karotī”ti ajjhattasantānetaṃ taṃ jhānañca jhānasahagatañca
anya-e0401n:142_17: khandha pañcakaṃ nicca sukha atta jīvato suññataṃ manasi karoti. “Na pakkhandatī”ti
anya-e0401n:142_19: kātabbaṃ. “Samādahātabbaṃ”ti suṭṭhu ṭhapetabbaṃ. “Nissāyā”ti pādakaṃ katvāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:143_0: 67. (Ka) vādavicāraṇāyaṃ. Upacāra bhāvanā eva uparijjhāne jhānaṅgaṃ niyāmetīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:143_1: Heṭṭhā pana ajjhāsayo eva uparijjhāne jhānaṅgaṃ niyāmetīti vuttaṃ. Tattha “ajjhāsayo
anya-e0401n:143_2: evā”ti eva saddena pādakajjhānaṃ nivatteti. “Idha upacāra bhāvanā evā”ti eva saddena
anya-e0401n:143_3: ajjhāsayaṃ nivatteti. Etesu hi dvīsu saha bhāvīsu upacāra bhāvanā eva padhānaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:143_4: Ajjhāsayo pana tassa nānā sattiyogaṃ sādheti. “Ajjhāsaya sāmaññaṃ saṇṭhātī”ti magge
anya-e0401n:143_5: yaṃ laddhabbaṃ hoti, taṃ labbhatu, mayhaṃ viseso natthīti evaṃ ajjhāsaya sāmaññaṃ
anya-e0401n:143_6: saṇṭhāti. “Tasmi”nti ajjhāsaya visese. “So”ti ajjhāsaya viseso. Kasmā yuttanti āha
anya-e0401n:143_8: ca nibbattananti ca pada dvaye sambandha vacanaṃ. “Vipassanā visesatthāya evā”ti
anya-e0401n:143_9: vuṭṭhāna gāmini vipassanā visesatthāya eva. Yasmā pana aṭṭhasu samāpattīsu ekekāya
anya-e0401n:143_10: samāpattiyā vuṭṭhāya vuṭṭhita samāpatti dhamma sammasanaṃ āgataṃ, na pana aññajjhāna
anya-e0401n:143_11: sammasanaṃ. Tasmā pādakajjhānameva pamāṇanti yojanā. Pāḷipadesu “gahapatī”ti ālapana
anya-e0401n:143_12: vacanaṃ. “Viviccevā”ti viviccitvā eva. Vivitto vigato hutvā eva. “Upasampajjā”ti
anya-e0401n:143_14: susaṃ sampiṇḍitaṃ, saṃvidahitaṃ. “Tattha ṭhito”ti tasmiṃ pathamajjhāne aparihīno
anya-e0401n:143_15: hutvā ṭhito. “Mettāceto vimuttī”ti mettājhānasaṅkhātā cetovimutti, aññattha alagganavasena
anya-e0401n:143_16: cittassa pavatti. Tathā karuṇā cetovimutti. Muditā cetovimutti. “Vivekaja”nti kāyaviveka
anya-e0401n:143_17: cittavivekānaṃ vasena jātaṃ. “Pīti sukhaṃ”ti pītiyā ca sukhena ca sampannaṃ. Athavā,
anya-e0401n:143_18: vivekehi jātāni pīti sukhāni assāti vivekajaṃ pīti sukhaṃ. Majjhe niggahitāgamo.
anya-e0401n:143_19: Rūpameva rūpagataṃ, vedanā eva vedanā gatantiādinā samāso. Gatasaddo ca padapūraṇamatte
anya-e0401n:143_20: daṭṭhabbo. “Teneva dhamma rāgena tāyadhammanandiyā”ti vipassanāni kantimāha. Sahatthe
anya-e0401n:143_21: ca karaṇa vacanaṃ. Opapātiko hotīti sambandho. “Tattha parinibbāyī”ti brahmaloke
anya-e0401n:143_22: avassaṃ parinibbāya na dhammo. Tenāha “anāvatti dhammo tasmā lokā”ti. “Pādakajjhānameva
anya-e0401n:143_23: pamāṇa”nti pādakajjhānameva maggejhānaṅgaṃ niyāmessati, na sammasitajjhānanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:143_24: “Pādakaṃ akatvā”ti āsanne asamāpajjitvāti vuttaṃ hoti. “Yaṃ yaṃ jhānaṃ icchantī”ti magge icchanti.
anya-e0401n:144_0: 66. (Kha) “tathā vidho”ti tathā pakāro. Āsanne vuṭṭhitasseva jhānassa. “Cittasantānaṃ
anya-e0401n:144_1: visesetuṃ”ti sace pādakajjhānaṃ pathamajjhānaṃ hoti, tato paraṃ pavattaṃ cittasantānaṃ
anya-e0401n:144_2: vitakke ninnaṃ hoti, vitakke pakkhandati. Atha pādakajjhānaṃ dutīyajjhānaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:144_3: Tato paraṃ pavattaṃ cittasantānaṃ vicāre ninnaṃ hoti, vicāre pakkhandatītiādinā nayena
anya-e0401n:144_4: cittasantānaṃ visesetuṃ. “Yaṃ tattha vuttaṃ” tiyaṃ vibhāvaniyaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:145_0: Vedanā vicāraṇāyaṃ. “Na siddho”ti siddho na hoti. “Aññathā”ti aññena pakārena. Gahite
anya-e0401n:145_1: satīti yojanā. Pādakajjhānādīnaṃ vasena siddhoti gahite satīti vuttaṃ hoti. “Yāya
anya-e0401n:145_2: kāya ci vedanāya yuttā hutvā”ti somanassa vedanāya vāyuttā hutvā upekkhā vedanāya
anya-e0401n:145_3: vā yuttā hutvā. “Tehi niyamitāya ekekāya magga vedanāyā”ti pādakajjhānādīhi niyamitāya
anya-e0401n:145_4: magge somanassa vedanāya eva vāsaddhiṃ ghaṭiyeyya magge upekkhā vedanāya eva vāti
anya-e0401n:145_5: attho. Vedanā nāma ekaṃ jhānaṅgaṃ hoti. Tasmā maggejhānaṅga niyame siddhe magge vedanā
anya-e0401n:145_6: niyamopi siddho. Tāni pana pādakajjhānādīni majjhe vuṭṭhāna gāmini vipassanāyaṃ nakiñciniyāmenti.
anya-e0401n:145_7: Evañca sati, pādakajjhānādīhi niyamitāya magge ekekāya vedanāya saddhiṃ dve dve vipassanā
anya-e0401n:145_8: vedanāyo ghaṭiyeyyuṃ. Magge somanassa vedanāya vā saddhiṃ dve vipassanā vedanāyo
anya-e0401n:145_9: ghaṭiyeyyuṃ. Magge upekkhā vedanāya vā saddhiṃ dve vipassanā vedanāyo ghaṭiyeyyuṃti
anya-e0401n:145_10: vuttaṃ hoti. Evañcasati ekavīthiyaṃ javanāni bhinna vedanāni siyuṃ. Tañca na yujjati.
anya-e0401n:145_11: Tasmā magge vedanā niyamo pādakajjhānādi niyamena siddho na hoti, vipassanā niyameneva
anya-e0401n:145_12: siddhoti adhippāyo. Tāni pana pādakajjhānādīni majjhe vuṭṭhāna gāmini vipassanāyaṃ
anya-e0401n:145_13: na kiñci na niyāmenti. Vedanaṃ niyāmenti yevāti dassetuṃ “taṃpi na yujjatī”ti vatvā
anya-e0401n:145_15: pekkhā chasu ārammaṇesu somanassāni pajahitvā pavattattā cha nekkhammassitā upekkhā
anya-e0401n:145_16: nāma hoti. “Cha nekkhammassitāni somanassānī”ti ekaṃ vapathamajjhāna somanassaṃ chasu
anya-e0401n:145_17: ārammaṇesu cha gehassitāni pajahitvā pavattattā cha nekkhammassitāni somanassāni
anya-e0401n:145_18: nāma honti. Aṭṭhakathāyañca vuttanti sambandho. “Pathamādīni ca tīṇi jhānānī”ti catukkanaye
anya-e0401n:145_19: tīṇi somanassa jhānāni pādakāni katvā. “Suddhasaṅkhāre ca pādakekatvā”ti ārammaṇa
anya-e0401n:145_20: bhāvena pādakekatvāti adhippāyo. Ayañca pādakajjhānādīnaṃ vasena vuṭṭhāna gāmini
anya-e0401n:145_21: vipassanāyañca magge ca vedanā pariṇāmo aṭṭhasāliniyaṃpi vitthārato vutto. “Amānusī
anya-e0401n:145_22: ratī hotī”ti manussānaṃ gehassitaratiṃ atikkamma ṭhitattā amānusī nāma rati hoti.
anya-e0401n:145_23: “Sammadhammaṃ vipassato”ti sammā anicca lakkhaṇa dhammaṃ passantassa bhikkhunoti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:146_1: koṭṭhāse”ti pañcaka nayavasena vuttaṃ. Idha citta bhedassa adhippetattā jhānabhedeti
anya-e0401n:146_2: ca jhānanti ca vuttepi cittameva adhippetanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:147_0: Gāthāyojanāsu. “Aparāpi yojanā vuttā”ti athavā rūpāvacaraṃ cittaṃ anuttarañca pathamādijjhāna
anya-e0401n:147_1: bhedena yathā gayhati, tathā āruppañcāpi pañcamejhāne gayhatīti evaṃ aparāpi yojanā
anya-e0401n:147_2: vuttā. “Paṭhitattā”ti uccāritattā. Antimagāthā vaṇṇanāyaṃ. “Yathā”ti yena pakārena.
anya-e0401n:147_3: “Taṃ saṅgahaṃ”ti eka vīsasatasaṅgahaṃ. Bujjhantīti budhā. “Āhā”ti ca “āhū”ti ca vattamānakālepi
anya-e0401n:147_4: icchanti saddavidūti vuttaṃ “kathenti vā”ti. Idañca vacanaṃ pubbe “itthamekūna navuti…pe…
anya-e0401n:147_5: vibhajanti vicakkhaṇā”ti gāthāya nigamananti ñāpanatthaṃ “vibhajanti vicakkhaṇā”ti
anya-e0401n:151_0: 68. Evaṃ citta saṅgahassa dīpaniṃ katvā cetasika saṅgahassa dīpaniṃ karonto pathamaṃ
anya-e0401n:151_1: pubbāparānu sandhiñca ādigāthāya payojana sambandhañca dassetuṃ “evaṃ”tiādi māraddho.
anya-e0401n:151_2: Tattha “anupatta”ntiādimhi cittaṃ cetasikaṃ rūpaṃ, nibbānamitisabbathāti evaṃ anukkamo
anya-e0401n:151_3: vutto. Tena anukkamena anupattaṃ. Hetu visesanañcetaṃ. Yasmā cittasaṅgahānantaraṃ
anya-e0401n:151_4: cetasika saṅgaho anupatto, tasmā idāni taṃ saṅgahaṃ karotīti dīpeti. Cattāri sampayoga
anya-e0401n:151_5: lakkhaṇāni ‘ekuppādatā, eka nirodhatā, ekā rammaṇatā, eka vatthukatā,ti. “Cetasi
anya-e0401n:151_6: yuttā”ti cittasmiṃ niyuttā. Cittaṃ nissāya attano attano kiccesu ussukkaṃ āpannāti
anya-e0401n:151_7: attho. “Cetasā vāyuttā”ti cittena vā sampayuttā. Cittena saha ekībhāvaṃ gatāti attho.
anya-e0401n:151_8: “Sarūpadassana”nti saṅkhyāsarūpadassanaṃ. Siddhapadaṃ nāma pakati paccayehi nipphanna
anya-e0401n:151_9: padaṃ. “Pubbantato”ti ekassasaṅkhata dhammassa pathama bhāgato. Uddhaṃ pajjanaṃ nāma
anya-e0401n:151_10: katamanti āha “sarūpato pātubhavana”nti. Dhātu pāṭhesu-janipātubhāve-ti vuttattā
anya-e0401n:151_11: āha “jātīti vuttaṃ hotī”ti. “Sarūpa vināso”ti sarūpato pātubhavantassa bhāvassa vināso
anya-e0401n:151_12: antaradhānaṃ. “Evaṃ parattha pī”ti parasmiṃ ekālambaṇavatthukādipadepi. “Eka cittassapi
anya-e0401n:151_13: bahudevā”ti cakkhu viññāṇaṃ rūpaṃ passantaṃ ekameva rūpaṃ passatīti natthi. Anekāni
anya-e0401n:151_14: evarūpāni ekato katvā passati. Sotaviññāṇādīsupi eseva nayo. Evañca katvā pāḷiyaṃ.
anya-e0401n:151_15: Cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhu viññāṇaṃ. Sotañca paṭicca sadde ca uppajjati
anya-e0401n:151_16: sotaviññāṇantiādinā vatthudvāresu ekavacanaṃ vatvā ārammaṇesu bahuvacanaṃ katanti.
anya-e0401n:151_17: “Ekattaṃ upanetvā”ti cakkhu viññāṇe bahūnipi rūpārammaṇāni rūpatā samaññena ekībhāvaṃ
anya-e0401n:151_18: katvā ekaṃ ārammaṇantveva vuttanti adhippāyo. Saddārammaṇādīsupi eseva nayo. Taṃ
anya-e0401n:151_19: na sundaraṃ. Kasmā. Attha visesassa aviññāpanato. Kopanāyaṃ attha visesoti. Yācittassa
anya-e0401n:151_20: jāti, sāyeva phassādīnantiādiko attho. Tenāha “atha kho”tiādiṃ. Adhippetā ekuppādatā.
anya-e0401n:151_21: Esa nayo eka nirodhatādīsu. “Mūlaṭīkāya”nti rūpakaṇḍamūlaṭīkāyaṃ. “Sahevā”ti ekato
anya-e0401n:151_22: eva. “Uppādādippavattito”ti uppādassa ca jīraṇassa ca nirodhassa ca pavattito. “Uppādādayo”ti
anya-e0401n:151_23: uppāda jīraṇa nirodhā. Jātijarāmaraṇānīti vuttaṃ hoti. “Cetasikāmatā”ti cetasikā
anya-e0401n:151_24: iti viññātā. “Bhāvappadhānaṃ”ti ekuppāda bhāvo ekuppādoti vutto. Tathā eka nirodhādīsu.
anya-e0401n:151_25: Yathā idaṃpi saṅgheratanaṃ paṇīta-ntiādīsu ayaṃ ratana bhāvo paṇītoti hettha attho.
anya-e0401n:151_26: “Ye”ti ye dhammā. “Sahajāta paccayuppanna rūpāni pī”ti sahajātapaccayato uppannāni
anya-e0401n:151_27: rūpānipi. Cetasikāni nāma siyunti sambandho. “Tadā yatta vuttitāyā”ti cittāyattavuttiyāya.
anya-e0401n:151_28: “Cetoyuttānī”ti hetu visesanaṃ. Tadeva hetumanta visesananti ca hetu anto nītavisesananti
anya-e0401n:151_29: ca hetu anto gadhavisesananti ca vadanti. “Tesa”nti cittassa sahajātapaccayuppannarūpānaṃ.
anya-e0401n:151_30: “Nānubhontī”ti napāpuṇanti. “Na hi sakkā jānituṃ”ti etena bhūtakathana visesanāni
anya-e0401n:151_31: etānīti dīpeti. Bhūtakathanaṃpi samānaṃ vatticchāvasena byavacchedakaṃpi sambhavati.
anya-e0401n:151_32: “Vayopaññāyatī”ti vināso pakāsati. “Ṭhitāyā”ti tiṭṭha mānāya vedanāya. Añño pakāro
anya-e0401n:151_33: aññathā. Aññathā bhāvo aññathattaṃ. Jarāvasena pariṇāmoti vuttaṃ hoti. Yo pathavīdhātuyā
anya-e0401n:151_34: uppādo, yā ṭhiti, yā abhinibbatti, yo pātubhāvo. Eso dukkhassa uppādo, esā rogānaṃ
anya-e0401n:151_35: ṭhiti, eso jarāmaraṇassa pātubhāvoti yojanā. “Itarathā”ti ito aññathā gahite satīti
anya-e0401n:151_36: attho. Ekasmiṃ rūpārūpakalāpe nānā dhammānaṃ vasena bahūsu uppādesu ca nirodhesu
anya-e0401n:151_37: ca gahitesūti vuttaṃ hoti. “Vikārarūpānaṃ”ti viññatti dvaya lahutādittayānaṃ. Sabbānipi
anya-e0401n:151_38: upādārūpāni catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya pavattattā mahābhūta gaṇanāya cattāri cattāri
anya-e0401n:151_39: siyuṃti iminā adhippāyena “sabbesampi vā”tiādivuttaṃ. Sabbesampi vā cakkhādīnaṃ upādārūpānaṃ
anya-e0401n:151_40: ekekasmiṃ kalāpe bahubhāvo vattabbo siyāti yojanā. Kasmā bahubhāvo vattabboti āha
anya-e0401n:152_0: Yadi evaṃ, ekasmiṃ cittuppāde lahutādīnipi ekekāni eva siyuṃ, atha kimatthaṃ dve
anya-e0401n:152_1: dve katvā vuttānīti āha “kāyalahutā citta lahutādayopanā”tiādiṃ. “Imamatthaṃ asallakkhetvā”ti
anya-e0401n:152_3: etena cittena uppajjitvā teneva cittena sahanirujjhanavasena cittaṃ anuparivattissa.
anya-e0401n:152_4: “Pasaṅgā”ti cetasikatā pasaṅgo. “Puretaramuppajjitvā”ti puretaraṃ ekena cittena saha
anya-e0401n:152_5: uppajjitvāti adhippāyo. “Cittassabhaṅgakkhaṇe”ti aññassa sattara sama cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe.
anya-e0401n:152_6: Tathā rūpadhammānaṃ pasaṅgo na sakkā nīvāretuṃ tiyojanā. “Pasaṅgo”ti cetasikatā pasaṅgo.
anya-e0401n:152_7: “Alamati papañcenā”ti abhidhamme vedanāttikeṭīkāsu viya ati vitthārena niratthakaṃ
anya-e0401n:152_8: hotīti attho. “Niratthakaṃ”ti vibhāvaniyaṃ papañco niratthako evāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:153_0: 69. Phassavacanatthe. “Phusatī”ti ārammaṇaṃ āhanati, saṅghaṭṭeti. Tañca saṅghaṭṭa
anya-e0401n:153_1: naṃ nadosapaṭighassa viya ārammaṇassa vibādhanaṃ hoti, atha kho bhamarassa paduma
anya-e0401n:153_2: pupphesu pupphara saggahaṇaṃ viya vijānana matte aṭhatvā ārammaṇa rasapātubhāvatthaṃ
anya-e0401n:153_4: sampāpuṇitvā. “Upahaccā”ti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Ayamattho kathaṃ pākaṭoti āha “yato”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:153_5: Tattha “yato”ti yaṃ kāraṇā. “Tadanubhavantī”ti taṃ ārammaṇa rasaṃ anubhavantī, vedanā
anya-e0401n:153_6: pātubhavati, vedanā pātubhāvaṃ disvā ārammaṇapphusanaṃ ñāṇe pākaṭaṃ hotīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:153_7: Svāyaṃ phusana lakkhaṇo, saṅghaṭṭanaraso, sannipātapaccupaṭṭhāno, āpātā gatavisaya
anya-e0401n:153_8: padaṭṭhāno. Tattha sannipāto nāma tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ dvārā rammaṇa viññāṇānaṃ saṅgati
anya-e0401n:153_9: samāgamo samodhānaṃ. Tathāhi vuttaṃ. Cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhu viññāṇaṃ,
anya-e0401n:153_10: tiṇṇaṃ saṅgati phasso tiādi. “Saṅghaṭṭanaraso”ti ārammaṇe sammadeva ghaṭṭana kicco.
anya-e0401n:153_11: Saṅghaṭṭana kiccattā eva tiṇṇaṃ sannipāto hutvā dhamma cintāñāṇassa paṭimukhaṃ upaṭṭhāti
anya-e0401n:153_12: pakāsatīti. “Sannipāta paccupaṭṭhāno”. Paccupaṭṭhānanti vā paññāṇaṃ vuccati dhajorathassa
anya-e0401n:153_13: paññāṇanti ettha viya. Sannipātākāro paccupaṭṭhānaṃ yassāti sannipātapaccupaṭṭhāno.
anya-e0401n:153_14: Vedanāpaccu paṭṭhāno vā. Dhūmoviya aggissa. Vedanāphalaṃ paccupaṭṭhānaṃ yassāti viggaho.
anya-e0401n:153_15: Aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ pana kasmā panettha phasso pathamaṃ vutto tipucchitvā mahāaṭṭhakathā
anya-e0401n:153_16: vādotāva dassito. Cittassa pathamābhinipātattā. Ārammaṇasmiñhi cittassa pathamābhinipāto
anya-e0401n:153_17: hutvā phasso ārammaṇaṃ phusamāno uppajjati. Tasmā pathamaṃ vutto. Phassena phussitvā
anya-e0401n:153_18: vedanāya vedayati. Saññāya sañjānāti. Cetanāya cetati. Tena vuttaṃ phuṭṭho bhikkhave
anya-e0401n:153_19: vedeti, phuṭṭho sañjānāti, phuṭṭho cetetīti. Api ca ayaṃ phasso nāma yathāpāsādaṃ
anya-e0401n:153_20: patvā thambho nāma sesadabba sambhārānaṃ balavapaccayo. Evameva sahajāta sampayutta
anya-e0401n:153_21: dhammānaṃ balava paccayo hoti. Tasmā pathamaṃ vuttoti. Saṅgahakārena pana idaṃ pana
anya-e0401n:153_22: akāraṇaṃ, ekakkhaṇasmiñhi uppanna dhammānaṃ ayaṃ pathamaṃ uppanno ayaṃ pacchāti idaṃ
anya-e0401n:153_23: vattuṃ na labbhā. Balavapaccayabhāvepi phassassakāraṇaṃ na dissatīti evaṃ taṃ vādaṃ
anya-e0401n:153_24: paṭikkhipetvā idaṃ vuttaṃ desanā vāreneva phasso pathamaṃ vuttoti. Tattha “desanāvāre
anya-e0401n:153_25: nevā”ti desanakkameneva, tato aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ natthīti adhippāyo. Tesu pana dvīsu vādesu
anya-e0401n:153_26: mahāaṭṭhakathā vādo eva yutto. Yañhi tattha vuttaṃ cittassa pathamābhinipāto hutvāti.
anya-e0401n:153_27: Tattha pathamābhinipātoti idaṃ kiccappadhānattā vuttaṃ. Na panaññehi cetasikehi vinā
anya-e0401n:153_28: visuṃ pathamaṃ uppannattā. Yathā taṃ ye keci bhikkhave dhammā akusalā akusalabhāgiyā
anya-e0401n:153_29: akusalapakkhikā. Sabbe te manopubbaṅgamā, mano tesaṃ dhammānaṃ pathamaṃ uppajjatīti
anya-e0401n:153_30: imasmiṃ sutte kiccappadhānattā mano tesaṃ dhammānaṃ pathamaṃ uppajjatīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:153_31: Na pana sabbacetasikehi vinā visuṃ pathamaṃ uppannattāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Balavapaccaya
anya-e0401n:153_32: bhāvepi phassassakāraṇaṃ dissatiyeva. Phassohetu phasso paccayo vedanākkhandhassa
anya-e0401n:153_33: paññā panāya. Phasso hetu phasso paccayo saññākkhandhassa paññā nāya. Phasso hetu
anya-e0401n:153_34: phasso paccayo saṅkhārakkhandhassa paññāpanāyāti hi vuttaṃ. Tasmā sabbesaṃ cetasikānaṃ
anya-e0401n:153_35: dhammānaṃ phassappadhānattā eva phassa balavapaccayattā eva ca phasso pathamaṃ vuttoti
anya-e0401n:153_36: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ettha ca cittaṃ ārammaṇa vijānanaṭṭhena phassādīnaṃ sabbacetasika dhammānaṃ
anya-e0401n:153_37: pubbaṅgamaṃ hoti, padhānaṃ, jeṭṭhakaṃ. Phasso pana ārammaṇa saṅghaṭṭanaṭṭhena sabbesaṃ
anya-e0401n:153_38: cetasika dhammānaṃ pubbaṅgamo hoti, padhāno, jeṭṭhakoti ayaṃ dvinnaṃ visesoti. Ettha
anya-e0401n:153_39: codako phusanaṃ nāma sappaṭigharūpānaṃ eva kiccanti maññamāno “nanucā”tiādinā codeti.
anya-e0401n:153_41: Ayaṃ pana phasso. “Cittassa vikārā pattiṃ”ti calana kampana thambhana jeguccha bhaya
anya-e0401n:153_42: tāsa chambhitattā divasena vikārā pajjanaṃ. “Vedanā visesuppattiṃ”ti sukhavedanīyaṃ
anya-e0401n:153_43: phassaṃ paṭicca sukhavedanā, dukkhavedanīyaṃ phassaṃ paṭicca dukkha vedanātiādinā
anya-e0401n:153_44: nayena phassa visesānurūpaṃ vedanā visesuppattiṃ sādheti. Ettha ca phusanaṃ nāma
anya-e0401n:153_45: duvidhaṃ rūpapphusanaṃ, nāmapphusana, nti. Tattha rūpapphusanaṃ nāma phoṭṭhabba dhātūnaṃ
anya-e0401n:153_46: kiccaṃ. Nāmapphusanaṃ duvidhaṃ phassapphusanaṃ, ñāṇapphusana, nti. Tattha ñāṇapphusanaṃ
anya-e0401n:153_47: nāma ñāṇappaṭivedho. Api ca jhānamagga phala nibbānānaṃ paṭilābhopi phusananti vuccati.
anya-e0401n:153_48: Phusanti dhīrā nibbānaṃ. Yogakkhemaṃ anuttaraṃ. Phusāmi nekkhamaṃ sukhaṃ. Aputhujjana
anya-e0401n:153_49: sevitanti-ādīsu. Idaṃ upamā mattaṃ siyā, kassaci manda paññassāti adhippāyo. “Ida”nti
anya-e0401n:153_50: kheḷuppāda vacanaṃ. Viññussa pana atipākaṭa phassa nidassanena appākaṭa phassa vibhāvanaṃ
anya-e0401n:154_1: vā”ti sādhurasaṃ vā. “Assātaṃ vā”ti asādhurasaṃ vā. “Kiṃ vedayatī”ti katamaṃ vedayati.
anya-e0401n:154_2: “Sukhampi vedayatī”ti sukhampi vedanaṃ vedayati. Athavā “kiñcavedayatī”ti kathañcavedayati.
anya-e0401n:154_3: “Sukhampi vedayatī”ti sukhaṃ hutvāpi vedayati. Sukha bhāvena vedayatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:154_4: Evaṃ sesapadesupi. “Kiccantarabyāvaṭā”ti aññakiccabyāvaṭā. Adhipati bhāvo ādhipaccaṃ.
anya-e0401n:154_5: Indriya kiccaṃ. “Evañca katvā”ti laddhaguṇavacanaṃ. Rājāraha bhojanaṃ rājaggabhojanaṃ.
anya-e0401n:154_6: “Sūdasadisatā”ti raññobhattakārasadisatā. Tattha sūdo raññobhattaṃ pacanto rasajānanatthaṃ
anya-e0401n:154_7: thokaṃ gahetvā jivhagge ṭhapetvā rasaṃ vīmaṃsati. Yathicchitaṃ pana bhuñjituṃ anissaro.
anya-e0401n:154_8: Rājā eva yathicchitaṃ bhuñjituṃ issaro. Rājā viya vedanā. Sūdo viya sesacetasika dhammā.
anya-e0401n:155_0: 71. Saññāvacanatthe. “Sañjānātī”ti suṭṭhu jānāti. Suṭṭhujānanañca nāma na viññāṇassa
anya-e0401n:155_1: viya vividhajānanaṃ hoti. Na ca paññāya viya yathābhūtajānanaṃ hoti. Atha kho bhūtaṃ
anya-e0401n:155_2: vā hotu, abhūtaṃ vā. Yaṃ yaṃ cha hi viññāṇehi vijānāti, paññāya vā pajānāti. Tassa
anya-e0401n:155_3: tassa pacchā appamussakaraṇa mevāti vuttaṃ “punajānanatthaṃ saññāṇaṃ karotī”ti. Tattha
anya-e0401n:155_4: “saññāṇa”nti nimitta karaṇaṃ. Bhavantaraṃ patvāpi appamuṭṭhabhāvaṃ sādheti opapātika
anya-e0401n:155_5: puggalānanti adhippāyo. Tehi purimaṃ attano bhavaṃ jānanti. Gabbhaseyyakāpi keci
anya-e0401n:155_6: purimaṃ bhavaṃ jānanti, yejātissara puggalāti vuccanti. Tattha “appamuṭṭhabhāva”nti
anya-e0401n:155_7: anaṭṭhabhāvaṃ. Micchābhinivesa saññā nāma anicce niccantiādippavattā saññā. “Bodhetu”nti
anya-e0401n:155_8: bujjhāpetuṃ. “Dārutacchakasadisāti ca vuttā”ti dārutacchako nāma kaṭṭhavaḍḍhakī.
anya-e0401n:155_9: So kaṭṭhakkhandhesu nimittakārīhoti. Sutacchitachinditesu kaṭṭhesu nimittāni katvā
anya-e0401n:155_10: ṭhapeti. Pacchātāni oloketvā kaṭṭhāni kamme upaneti. “Hatthi dassaka andhasadisā”ti
anya-e0401n:155_11: ettha eko kira rājā keḷippasuto hoti. So jaccandhānaṃṭhāne ekaṃ hatthiṃ ānetvāṭhapento
anya-e0401n:155_12: jaccandhe āha jānātha bho tumhe hatthinti. Te hatthiṃ jānissāmāti parāmasitvā attano
anya-e0401n:155_13: parāmasitaṃ taṃ taṃ aṅgamavahatthīti abhinivisanti. Daḷhaṃ sallakkhenti. Puna rājā
anya-e0401n:155_14: te pucchi kīdiso bho hatthīti. Te rañño hatthisaṇṭhānaṃ ācikkhantā vivādaṃ āpajjanti.
anya-e0401n:155_15: Ācikkhanameva raññohatthidassananti katvā te hatthidassaka andhāti vuccanti. “Upaṭṭhitavisayaggahaṇe”ti
anya-e0401n:155_16: rattiyaṃ andhakāre rajjukkhaṇḍaṃ passantassa sappasaṇṭhānaṃ upaṭṭhāti. So upaṭṭhitaṃ
anya-e0401n:155_17: saṇṭhānamattaṃ sappoti gaṇhāti. Evaṃ upaṭṭhitavisayaggahaṇaṃ hoti. Migapotakānañca
anya-e0401n:155_18: araññekhettamajjhepurisasaṇṭhānaṃ tiṇa rūpaṃ passantānaṃ purisasaṇṭhā naṃ upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0401n:155_19: Te upaṭṭhitaṃ saṇṭhānamattaṃ purisoti gaṇhitvā so amhe pahareyyāti palāyanti. Vuttā aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ.
anya-e0401n:156_0: 72. Cetanāvacanatthe. Cetetīti cetanā. Cetanañcettha abhisandhānaṃ vā vuccati pakappanaṃ
anya-e0401n:156_1: vā āyūhanaṃ vāti evaṃ tidhā atthavikappaṃ dassetuṃ “sampayutta dhamme”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n:156_2: Tattha “abhisandahatī”ti abhimukhaṃ sandahati, saṃyogaṃ karoti. Tenāha “punappunaṃ
anya-e0401n:156_3: ghaṭetī”ti. “Ghaṭetī”ti sambandhati. “Pakappeti vāte”ti athavā te sampayutta dhamme
anya-e0401n:156_4: pakārato kappeti, sajjeti. Tenāha “saṃvidahatī”ti. “Saṃvidahatī”ti tvaṃ phusanakiccaṃ
anya-e0401n:156_5: karohi, tvaṃ vedayita kiccaṃ karohi, tvaṃ sañjānanakiccaṃ karohītiādinā vadamānā
anya-e0401n:156_6: viya saṃvidahati. “Āyūhativāte”ti athavā tesampayutta dhamme bhuso byūhayati, rāsiṃ
anya-e0401n:156_7: karoti. Tenāha “ārammaṇe sampiṇḍetī”ti. “Samosarante”ti ekato osarante. Saṅgamante.
anya-e0401n:156_8: “Sā”ti cetanā. “Tāyā”ti cetanāya. “Tasmiṃ”ti rūpādikevā ārammaṇe. Puññāpuñña kiccevā.
anya-e0401n:156_9: Pavattamānāya satiyā. Jeṭṭhasisso nāma bahūsu sissesu jeṭṭhabhūto sisso. Tasmiṃ sajjhāyante
anya-e0401n:156_10: sesā sabbe sajjhāyantiyeva. Tena so ubhayakicca sādhako hoti. Evaṃ mahāvaḍḍhakīpi.
anya-e0401n:157_0: 73. Ekaggatāvacanatthe. Ekattārammaṇaṃ nāma ekārammaṇassapi bahūsu sabhāvesu ekasabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ
anya-e0401n:158_1: “Abhibhavitvā”ti jīvana kicce attano vasaṃ vattāpetvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Citta santānaṃ
anya-e0401n:159_0: 75. Manasīkāravacanatthe. Samāsamajjhe sakārāgamo. Karadhātuyoge īkārāgamo ca daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0401n:159_1: Alutta sattamī padanthi keci. Evaṃ sati īdīghattaṃ nasijjhati. “Asuññaṃ”ti arittaṃ.
anya-e0401n:159_2: “Paṭipādetī”ti paṭipajjanaṃ kiccasādhanaṃ kārāpeti. Atthato niyojeti nāmāti āha “yojetī”ti.
anya-e0401n:159_3: “Idameva dvayaṃ”ti āvajjana dvayaṃ. “Taṃ”ti taṃ dvayaṃ. Upatthambhitaṃ hutvā ārammaṇe
anya-e0401n:159_4: ninnaṃ karotīti sambandho. “Yoniso”ti upāyena hitasukha maggena. “Ayoniso”ti anupāyena
anya-e0401n:159_5: ahita asukha maggena. “Samudāciṇṇaninnaniyāmitādīhī”ti ettha samudāciṇṇaṃ nāma āciṇṇa
anya-e0401n:159_6: kammavasena suṭṭhu punappunaṃ ācaritaṃ. Ninnaṃ nāma idaṃ nāma passāmi, idaṃ nāma
anya-e0401n:159_7: karissāmīti pubbe eva ajjhāsayena ninnaṃ. Niyāmitaṃ nāma idaṃ nāma kattabbaṃ, idaṃ
anya-e0401n:159_8: nāma na kattabbaṃ, kattabbaṃ karomi, akattabbaṃ nakaromīti evaṃ niyāmitaṃ. “Asati
anya-e0401n:159_9: kāraṇa visese”ti bhavaṅga cittaṃ vīthicittuppattiyā asati, vīthicittāni ca kāyacittānaṃ
anya-e0401n:159_10: akallādikevā adhimattassa ārammaṇantarassa upaṭṭhānevā asati. “Sādhāraṇā”ti ettha
anya-e0401n:159_11: saṃsadde bindu lopo, dīghattañcāti āha “samaṃ dhārentīti sādhāraṇā”ti.
anya-e0401n:160_1: tena tena pakārena suṭṭhu cintetvā. “Taṃ”ti ārammaṇaṃ. “Te”ti sampayutta dhamme.
anya-e0401n:160_2: “Avitakkampi cittaṃ”ti pañcaviññāṇa cittañca dutīyā dijjhāna cittañca. “Apicā”ti
anya-e0401n:160_3: kiñci vattabbaṃ atthīti attho. “Dutīyajjhānādīni cā”ti dutīyajjhāna cittādīni ca.
anya-e0401n:160_4: “Upacāra bhāvanā vasenā”ti samudāciṇṇa vasibhūtāya upacāra bhāvanāya vasena. “Kiṃ
anya-e0401n:160_5: vā etāyayuttiyā”ti savitakka cittasantānetiādikāya yuttiyā kiṃ payojanaṃ atthīti
anya-e0401n:160_6: attho. Kiñci payojanaṃ natthīti adhippāyo. Ārammaṇaṃ ārohatiyeva ārammaṇena avinābhāvavuttikattā.
anya-e0401n:160_7: “Taṃ”ti cittaṃ. Niyāmako nāma nāvaṃ icchita disādesaniyojako. “Akusalaṃ patvā”ti
anya-e0401n:160_8: vuttaṃ. Kusalaṃ patvā pana kathaṃti. Kusalaṃ patvāpi patirūpadesāvāsādivasena samudā
anya-e0401n:160_9: ciṇṇa ninnādivasena ca laddha paccaye sati cittampi saddhāsati ādayopi ārammaṇa rūhane
anya-e0401n:160_10: thāmagatā eva. Aladdha paccaye pana sati akusala bhāve ṭhatvā thāmagataṃ hoti. “Manasikāra
anya-e0401n:160_11: vīriya satīnaṃ”ti bhāvanā balapattā nanti adhippāyo. Evaṃ pana sati, vitakkassa okāso
anya-e0401n:160_12: natthīti. Atthi. Saṅkappana kicca visesattā. Tañhi kiccaṃ aññesaṃ asādhāraṇaṃ, vitakkasseva
anya-e0401n:161_0: 77. Vicāravacanatthe. “Vicaratī”ti ekamekasmiṃ eva ārammaṇe vividhena carati, pavattati.
anya-e0401n:161_1: Sabhāvākāro nāma nīlapītādiko agambhīro ārammaṇa sabhāvo ca ārammaṇassa nānā pavattākāro
anya-e0401n:161_2: ca. “Anumajjanavasenā”ti punappunaṃ majjanavasena sodhanavasena. Vitakko oḷāriko
anya-e0401n:161_3: ca hotītiādinā yojetabbaṃ. “Oḷāriko”ti vicārato oḷāriko. Evaṃ sesapadesu. “Ghaṇḍābhighāto
anya-e0401n:161_4: viyā”ti ghaṇḍābhighātena pathamuppannasaddo viyāti vadanti. Tathāhi vicāro ghaṇḍassa
anya-e0401n:161_5: anuravo viya vuttoti. Daṇḍakena ghaṇḍassa abhighāta kiriyā vā ghaṇḍābhighāto. Tathāhi
anya-e0401n:161_6: ārammaṇe cetaso pathamābhi nipāto vitakkoti ca, āhanana pariyāhanana rasoti ca vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:162: 78. Adhimokkhavacanatthe. “Saṃsappanaṃ”ti anavatthānaṃ. “Pakkhato muccanavasenā”ti evaṃ nu khoti eko pakkho, nonu khoti dutīyo pakkho. Tādisamhā pakkhato muccanavasena.
anya-e0401n:163_0: 79. Vīriyavacanatthe. “Vīrassā”ti vissaṭṭhassa. So ca kāyavacīmano kammesu paccu
anya-e0401n:163_1: paṭṭhitesu sītuṇhādi dukkha bhayato alīna vuttivasena pavattoti āha “kammasūrassā”ti.
anya-e0401n:163_2: Etena anottappiṃ nivatteti. Anottavvīhi pāpasūro, ayaṃ kamma sūroti. “Mahantaṃ pikamma”nti
anya-e0401n:163_3: kusītassa mahantanti maññitaṃ kammaṃ. Evaṃ sesesu. “Appakato gaṇhātī”ti appakabhāvena
anya-e0401n:163_4: gaṇhāti. Appakamevidanti maññatīti vuttaṃ hoti. “Atta kilamathaṃ”ti kāyacittakkhedaṃ.
anya-e0401n:163_6: bhāvasaddassa atthaṃ vadati. “Kāyacitta kiriyābhūtaṃ”ti etena kammasaddassa atthaṃ.
anya-e0401n:163_7: “Vidhinā”ti tassa pavattiyā pubbābhisaṅkhāra vidhānena. Tameva vidhānaṃ kammesu netabbattā
anya-e0401n:163_8: nayoti ca, upetabbattā upāyoti ca vuccatīti āha “nayena upāyenā”ti. Tameva vidhānaṃ
anya-e0401n:163_10: phusanādi kicca sampatti atthāya. Byāvaṭāni kāyacittāni yesanti viggaho. “Byāvaṭānī”ti
anya-e0401n:163_11: ussāhitāni. “Thūṇūpatthambhana sadisaṃ”ti jiṇṇassa gehassa apatanatthāya sāratthambhena
anya-e0401n:163_13: mūlaṃ”ti sabbāsaṃ lokiya sampattīnaṃ lokuttara sampattī nañca mūlaṃ. Kasmā, puññakamma
anya-e0401n:163_14: sampattiyā ca pārami puññasampattiyā ca patiṭṭhānattā. Satihi puññakammasampattiyā
anya-e0401n:163_15: sabbā lokiya sampatti sijjhati. Sati ca pārami puñña sampattiyā sabbālokuttara sampatti
anya-e0401n:163_16: sijjhatīti. Etena hīna vīriyo nāma sabba sampattito paribāhiyoti dīpeti.
anya-e0401n:164_0: 80. Pītivacanatthe. “Pinayatī”ti pineti, pinaṃ karotīti āha “tappetī”ti. Tosetīti
anya-e0401n:164_1: attho. “Tuṭṭhiṃ”ti tusitaṃ, pahaṭṭhaṃ. “Suhitaṃ”ti sudhātaṃ, supuṇṇaṃ, vaddhitaṃ.
anya-e0401n:164_2: Anekatthattā dhātūnaṃ “vaḍḍhetī”ti vuttaṃ. “Pinantī”ti tappanti, jotanti, virocanti,
anya-e0401n:164_3: divā tappatiādiccotiādīsu viya. Khuddikā pīti nāma lomahaṃsa na mattakārikā pīti.
anya-e0401n:164_4: Khaṇikā pīti nāma khaṇe khaṇe vijjuppādasadisā pīti. Okkantikā pīti nāma sarīraṃ
anya-e0401n:164_5: okkamitvā okkamitvābhijjantī pīti. Ubbegāpīti nāma kāyaṃ udaggaṃ katvā ākāse ullaṅghāpentī
anya-e0401n:164_6: pīti. Pharaṇā pīti nāma kappāsavattiyaṃ pharaṇakatelaṃ viya sakalakāyaṃ pharaṇavasena pavattā pīti.
anya-e0401n:165_1: vasena vuttaṃ. “Sabbakiriyā padānī”ti sabbāni tumicchattha kiriyā padāni. “Atthiko”ti
anya-e0401n:165_2: asiddho hutvā sādhetuṃ icchito attho assāti atthiko. Icchantotipi vadanti. “Ārādhetukāmatā
anya-e0401n:165_3: vasenā”ti sādhetu kāmatāvasena, sampādetu kāmatā vasena. Usuṃ saraṃ a santi khipantīti
anya-e0401n:165_4: issāsā. Ikārassa ukāro. Dhanuggahā. “Yasena vā”ti parivārena vā, kitti saddena vā.
anya-e0401n:165_6: yena kāraṇa koṭṭhāsena. Saṅgahitāti sambandho. “Vissajjitabba yuttakenā”ti vissajjitabba
anya-e0401n:165_7: yogyena. “Tena atthiko yevā”ti paduddhāro. “So na yujjatī”ti so attho na yujjati.
anya-e0401n:165_8: “Khipita usūnaṃ”ti pubbabhāge khipita usūnaṃ. “Atthato panā”ti adhippāyatthato pana.
anya-e0401n:165_9: “Hatthappasāraṇaṃ viyā”ti loke kiñci icchantassa janassa hatthappasāraṇaṃ viyāti
anya-e0401n:165_10: adhippāyo. “Thāmapatto”ti adhipati bhāva pattoti vuttaṃ hoti. Tenāha “tathāhesā”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:165_11: “Taṇhāya hatthe ṭhitā”ti upacāra vacanametaṃ. Taṇhāya pariggahitāti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:165_12: Nasakkhissantiyeva, no nasakkhissanti. Tasmā veditabbametaṃ chandoyeva taṇhāya balavataroti.
anya-e0401n:166: 82. “Pakirantī”ti pattharanti. “Samānā”ti sāvajjehi yuttā sāvajjā, anavajjehi yuttā anavajjāti evaṃ sadisā, sādhāraṇā.
anya-e0401n:168_0: 83. Akusalarāsimhi. “Muyhatī”ti ñātabbassañeyya dhammassa aññāṇa vasena sammuyhati,
anya-e0401n:168_1: cittassa andhabhāvo hoti. Caturaṅgatamo nāma ‘kāḷapakkha cātuddasi divaso, aḍḍharatti
anya-e0401n:168_2: samayo, tibbavanasaṇḍo, bahalameghacchanno,ti ayaṃ caturaṅgatamo. So cakkhussa andhabhāvaṃ
anya-e0401n:168_3: karoti. Evaṃ tassa tamassa cakkhussa andhabhāvakaraṇaṃ viya. Ñāṇagatiko hotīti daṭṭhabbo
anya-e0401n:168_4: aṭṭhakathā nayena. Tameva aṭṭhakathā nayaṃ dassetuṃ “tathā hesā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Abhidhammaṭīkāyaṃ
anya-e0401n:168_5: pana micchā ñāṇanti micchā vitakko adhippeto. So hi micchā saṅkappo hutvā nānappakāra
anya-e0401n:168_6: cintā pavatti vasena ñāṇagatiko hoti. Moho pana cittassa andhī bhūto, nānācintana
anya-e0401n:168_7: kicca rahito, kathaṃ ñāṇagatiko bhaveyyāti tassa adhippāyo. “Pāpa kiriyāsū”ti duccarita
anya-e0401n:168_8: kammesu. “Upāya cintāvasenā”ti katakammassa siddhatthāya satthāvudhādividhānesu nānāupāya
anya-e0401n:168_9: cintāvasena. Appaṭi pajjanaṃ appaṭi patti. Ñāṇa gatiṃ agamananti attho. Tenāha “aññāṇameva
anya-e0401n:168_10: vuccatī”ti. “Ñāṇagatikā”ti ñāṇappavattiyā samānappavattikā. Lobho ñāṇa gatiko māyāsāṭheyya
anya-e0401n:168_11: kammesu vicittappavattikattā. Vicāro ñāṇa gatiko. Tathāhi so jhānaṅgesu vicikicchāya
anya-e0401n:168_12: paṭipakkhoti vutto. Cittassa ñāṇa gati katā vicittatthavācakena cittasaddena siddho.
anya-e0401n:168_13: Te ca dhammā sabba sattesu ñāṇa gatikā na honti. Ñāṇūpanissayaṃ labhitvā eva hontīti
anya-e0401n:168_14: dassetuṃ “tehī”tiādimāha. Te sādhentīti sambandho. Pakatiyā viññujātikā nāma tihetukappaṭi
anya-e0401n:168_15: sandhikā. Aññappaṭi sandhikāpi bodhisatta bhūmiyaṃ ṭhitā vā paññāpasuta bhavato āgatā
anya-e0401n:168_16: vā. Sutapariyatti sampannā nāma dvihetukappaṭi sandhikāpi imasmiṃ bhave bahussuta
anya-e0401n:168_17: sampannā ca pariyatti kamma sampannā ca.
anya-e0401n:169_0: 84. Ahirikavacanatthe. “Na hirīyatī”ti nāma dhātu padametaṃ. Harāyati lajjatīti hirī.
anya-e0401n:169_1: Hare lajjāyaṃti dhātu. Na hirī ahirīti vacanattho. “Ruciṃ uppādetvā”ti gāmasū karassa
anya-e0401n:169_2: gūtharāsi dassane viya cittarocana citta khamanaṃ uppādetvā. Attānaṃ pāpakamma limpato
anya-e0401n:169_3: cittassa alīnatā ajigucchanaṃ nāma. Attānaṃ asappurisa bhāvapattito cittassa alīnatā alajjā nāma.
anya-e0401n:170_0: 85. Anottappavacanatthe. “Na bhāyatī”ti pāpakammaṃ bhayato na upaṭṭhāti. “Na utrasatī”ti
anya-e0401n:170_1: pāpakamma hetu na kampati. “Tāsū”ti pāpakiriyāsu. “Asārajjamānaṃ katvā”ti sūraṃ vissaṭṭhaṃ
anya-e0401n:170_2: katvā. Asārajjaṃ nāma sūrabhāvo. Anuttāso nāma pāpakamma hetu cittassa akampanaṃ.
anya-e0401n:170_3: Gāthāyaṃ. Ajigucchanasīlo puggalo ajegucchī. “Pāpā”ti pāpakammato. “Sūkaro”ti gāmasūkaro.
anya-e0401n:170_4: So gūthato ajegucchī. Ahiriko pāpato ajegucchīti yojanā. Abhāyanasīlo abhīrū. “Salabho”ti
anya-e0401n:170_5: paṭaṅgo. “Pāvakā”ti dīpajālamhā. Salabho pāvakamhā abhīrū viya anottavvī pāpato abhīrūti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:171_0: 86. Uddhaccavacanatthe. “Uddharatī”ti ukkhipati. Ārammaṇasmiṃ na sanni sīdati. Vikkhipatīti
anya-e0401n:171_1: vuttaṃ hoti. “Vaṭṭetvā”ti āvaṭṭetvā. “Vissaṭṭhageṇḍuko viyā”ti vissajjito sārageṇḍuko
anya-e0401n:172_1: Makkaṭaṃ ālimpati bandhati etenāti makkaṭā lepo. “Tatta kapāle”ti aggināsantatte
anya-e0401n:172_2: ghaṭa kapāle. Telassa vatthamhi añjanaṃ abhilagganaṃ telañjanaṃ. Rajjanaṃ paṭisajjanaṃ
anya-e0401n:172_3: rāgo. Telañjana bhūto rāgo telañjana rāgo. Na kilesarāgo. Ratti divaṃ pavattanaṭṭhena
anya-e0401n:172_4: taṇhā eva nadīsotasadisattā taṇhā nadī. “Sattānaṃ”ti puthujjana sattānaṃ. “Sukkhakaṭṭhasākhāpalāsatiṇakasaṭānī”ti
anya-e0401n:172_5: sukkha kaṭṭhakasaṭāni, sukkha sākhā kasaṭānītiādinā yojetabbaṃ. Kasaṭa saddena asārabhāvaṃ
anya-e0401n:173_0: 88. Diṭṭhivacanatthe. “Dassanaṃ”ti parikappanā siddhesu micchā sabhāvesu viparīta
