anya-e0401n:173_1: dassanaṃ. Tenāha “dhammānaṃ”tiādiṃ. Tattha “dhammānaṃ”ti rūpārūpa dhammānaṃ, aniccatādi
anya-e0401n:173_2: dhammānañca. “Yāthāva sabhāvesū”ti bhūtasabhāvesu. Bhūtasabhāvo hi yathā dhammaṃ
anya-e0401n:173_3: avati rakkhatīti atthena yāthāvoti vuccati. Attānaṃ paṇḍitaṃ maññantīti paṇḍita mānino.
anya-e0401n:173_4: Paṭivedhaññāṇaṃ nāma ariya maggaññāṇaṃ. Paramaṃ vajjanti daṭṭhabbā loke mahāsāvajjaṭṭhena
anya-e0401n:173_5: taṃ sadisassa aññassa vajjassa abhāvatoti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:174_0: 89. Mānavacanatthe. “Maññatī”ti bhūtasabhāvaṃ atikkamma adhikaṃ katvā ahamasmītiādinā
anya-e0401n:174_1: tena tena abhūtākārena maññati. Tenāha “ahaṃ loke”tiādiṃ. Tattha “kaṭṭhakathiṅgaro
anya-e0401n:174_2: viyā”ti sukkhadārukkhandho viya. So pana upatthambhito maññatīti sambandho. “Attānaṃ
anya-e0401n:174_3: accuggataṃ maññatī”ti puggalaṃ mānena abhinnaṃ katvā vuttaṃ. “Unnati lakkhaṇo”ti unnamana sabhāvo.
anya-e0401n:175_0: 90. Dosavacanatthe. Caṇḍena kāyavacī manokammena samannāgato caṇḍiko. Caṇḍikassa
anya-e0401n:175_1: bhāvo caṇḍikkaṃ. “Pahatāsīviso viyā”ti daṇḍena pahato āsīviso viya. “Visappanaṭṭhenā”ti
anya-e0401n:175_2: sakalakāye vividhena sappanaṭṭhena, pharaṇaṭṭhena. Idañca taṃ samuṭṭhāna rūpānaṃ
anya-e0401n:175_3: pharaṇa vasena vuttaṃ. “Asanipāto viyā”ti sukkhā sanipatanaṃ viya. “Dāvaggiviyā”ti
anya-e0401n:175_4: araññaggi viya. “Sapatto viyā”ti duṭṭhaverī viya. “Visasaṃsaṭṭhapūtimuttaṃ viyā”ti
anya-e0401n:175_5: yathā muttaṃ nāma pakatiyā eva duggandhattā paṭikulattā dūre chaṭṭanīyanti ahitameva
anya-e0401n:175_6: hoti. Puna pūtibhāve sati, dūratare chaṭṭetabbaṃ. Visasaṃsaṭṭhepana vattabbamevanatthi.
anya-e0401n:175_7: Sabbaso ahitarāsi hoti. Evaṃ dosopi taṃ samaṅgīno tasmiṃ khaṇe paresaṃ amanāpiyataṃ
anya-e0401n:175_8: āpādeti. Attahita parahita vināsañca kāreti, parammaraṇā apāyañca pāpetīti sabbaso
anya-e0401n:175_9: ahitarāsi hoti. Tena vuttaṃ “visasaṃsaṭṭhapūti muttaṃ viya daṭṭhabbo”ti.
anya-e0401n:176_0: 91. Issāvacanatthe. Duvidhā issāladdhasampatti visayā calabhitabba sampatti visayā
anya-e0401n:176_1: ca. Tattha laddha sampatti visayaṃ tāvadasseti “paresaṃ pakatiyā”tiādinā. Laddha
anya-e0401n:176_2: sampattiggahaṇena atīta sampattipi saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbā. Issāpakatikāhi keci asuko
anya-e0401n:176_3: nāma pubbe evaṃ sampattiko ahosīti vā, ahaṃ pubbe evaṃ sampattiko ahosinti vā sutvā
anya-e0401n:176_4: nasahantiyeva. Taṃ vacanaṃ sotuṃpi na icchantīti. Asukotiādinā labhitabbasampatti visayaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0401n:177_1: attanivijjamānaṃ sippavijjādi sampatti guṇajātaṃ vā. “Vatthu vā”ti dhanadhaññādivatthu
anya-e0401n:177_2: vā. “Avipphārikatāvasenā”ti aññena taṃ sippavijjādikaṃ vā dhanadhaññādikaṃ vā mayhaṃ
anya-e0401n:177_3: dehīti vutte parahitatthāya dātabba yuttakaṃ dassāmīti evaṃ cittesati, parahitappharaṇāvasena
anya-e0401n:177_4: taṃ cittaṃ vipphārikaṃ nāma hoti. Dehīti vacanampi sotuṃ anicchanto parahitatthāya
anya-e0401n:177_5: avipphārika citto nāma hoti. Evaṃ avipphārikatāvasena carati pavattatīti maccharañca
anya-e0401n:177_6: kārassa cha kāraṃ katvā. Tathā pavattaṃ cittaṃ. Puggalo pana maccharīti vuccati.
anya-e0401n:177_8: ca dvisantakaṃ vāti santakaṃ vā bhavissamānaṃ, parehi vā paribhuñjiyamānaṃ. “Nigguhanalakkhaṇaṃ”ti
anya-e0401n:177_9: rakkhāvaraṇaguttīhisaṅgopana sabhāvaṃ. Attanā laddha sampatti nāma issāya avisayo.
anya-e0401n:177_10: Labhitabbasampatti pana ubhaya sādhāraṇaṃ. Tasmā tattha ubhinnaṃ viseso vattabboti
anya-e0401n:177_11: taṃ dassetuṃ “ettha cā”tiādimāha. “Yassa lābhaṃ na icchatī”ti attanā labhatu vā māvā,
anya-e0401n:177_12: kevalaṃ para sampattiṃ asahanto yassa parassa lābhaṃ na icchati. “Citta vighāto”ti
anya-e0401n:177_13: citta vihaññanaṃ. “Attanā laddhuṃ icchatī”ti paro sampajjatu vā māvā, yattha paralābhesati,
anya-e0401n:177_14: attanā na labhissati, tattha attanāva laddhuṃ icchati. Yattha attanā ca labhati,
anya-e0401n:177_15: paro ca labhati, tattha vighāto natthīti adhippāyo. “Alabbhamānakaṃ cintetvā”ti attanā
anya-e0401n:178_0: 93. Kukkuccavacanatthe. “Kiriyā kataṃ”ti kata saddassabhāva sādhanamāha. Evaṃ vacanatthaṃ
anya-e0401n:178_1: dassetvā abhidheyyatthaṃ dassento “atthato panā”tiādimāha. “Anusocana vasenā”ti pacchā
anya-e0401n:178_2: punappunaṃ cittasantāpavasena. So kukatanti vuccatīti sambandho. “Kusala dhammesū”ti
anya-e0401n:178_3: puñña kiriyavatthu dhammesu citta pariyādānāya eva saṃvattati. Kukkucca samaṅgī puggalo
anya-e0401n:178_4: puññakammaṃ karontopi citta sukhaṃ na labhati. Bahujana majjhe vasitvā nānākiccāni
anya-e0401n:178_5: karonto nānā tiracchāna kathaṃ kathento citta sukhaṃ labhati. Tadā tassa puññakamma
anya-e0401n:178_6: karaṇatthāya cittaṃ pariyādīyati, parikkhiyyati. Cittavasaṃ gacchanto vicarati. Evaṃ
anya-e0401n:178_7: citta pariyādānāya eva saṃvattati. “Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ”ti aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ. “Katā katassa
anya-e0401n:178_8: sāvajjānavajjassā”ti pubbe katassa sāvajjakammassa, akatassa anavajja kammassa. Kammatthesāmivacanaṃ.
anya-e0401n:178_9: “Abhimukhagamanaṃ”ti ārammaṇa karaṇavasena cittassa abhimukhappavattanaṃ. Etena paṭimukhaṃ
anya-e0401n:178_10: saraṇaṃ cintanaṃ paṭisāroti dasseti. “Akataṃ na karotī”ti akataṃ kātuṃ na sakkotīti
anya-e0401n:178_11: adhippāyo. Evaṃ kataṃ na karotīti etthapi. “Virūpo”ti vībhaccho asobhaṇo. “Kucchito”ti
anya-e0401n:178_12: garahitabbo. Nanu pubbe cittuppādo kucchitoti vutto. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana vippaṭisāro
anya-e0401n:178_13: kucchitoti vutto. Ubhayametaṃ na sametīti. No na sameti, aññathānu papattitoti dassetuṃ
anya-e0401n:178_14: “ettha cā”tiādimāha. “Yena ca kāraṇenā”ti katākataṃ paṭicca niratthaka cittappavatti
anya-e0401n:178_15: kāraṇena. So cittuppādova kukatapade gahetuṃ yutto, navibhāvaniyaṃ viya katākata
anya-e0401n:178_16: duccarita sucaritanti adhippāyo. Nanu vibhāvaniyampi so cittuppādova upacāra nayena
anya-e0401n:178_17: gahitoti ce. Yutti vasena ca aṭṭhakathāgamena ca mukhyato siddhe sati, kiṃ upacāra
anya-e0401n:178_18: nayena. Tenāha “vibhāvaniyaṃ panā”tiādiṃ. Kukatassabhāvo kukkuccaṃ, akārassa ukāraṃ
anya-e0401n:178_19: katvāti ayaṃ aṭṭhakathānayo. Idāni saddasatthanayena aparaṃ vacanatthañca adhippāyatthañca
anya-e0401n:178_21: nirutti pāṭhesu. Paṭhantiyeva, no na paṭhanti. Te ca atthā cetaso vippaṭisāro mano
anya-e0401n:178_22: vilekhoti evaṃ pāḷiyaṃ vuttehi kukkuccapariyāyehi samentiyeva. Tasmā ayaṃ aparonayo
anya-e0401n:178_23: idha avassaṃ vattabbo yevāti dīpeti. Vippaṭi sāripuggalo ca taṃ taṃ puññakammaṃ karontopi
anya-e0401n:178_24: vippaṭi sāragginā dayhamāna citto puññakamme cittappasādaṃ nalabhati. Citta sukhaṃ
anya-e0401n:178_25: na vindati. Kiṃ iminā kammenāti taṃ pahāya yattha citta sukhaṃ vindati, tattha vicarati.
anya-e0401n:178_26: Evaṃ vippaṭisāro puññakammato saṅkocanaṃ nāma hotīti. Kilesasallikhanaṃ nāma santuṭṭhi
anya-e0401n:178_27: sallekhappaṭipattiyaṃ ṭhitassa tadaṅgappahānādivasena taṃ taṃ kilesappahānaṃ vuccati.
anya-e0401n:178_28: “Anutthunanākārenā”ti punappunaṃ vilapanākārena. Saṅkocatīti vatvā tassa ubhayaṃ
anya-e0401n:178_29: atthaṃ dassento “kusalakamma samādāne”tiādimāha. Namitumpi na deti. Kuto samādātuṃ
anya-e0401n:178_30: vā vaḍḍhetuṃ vā dassatīti adhippāyo. “Tanukaraṇenā”ti dubbalakaraṇena. Visesanaṭṭhekaraṇa
anya-e0401n:178_31: vacanaṃ. “So”ti dhammasamūho. Taṃ pana kukkuccaṃ. Keci pana kukkuccaṃ paccuppanna
anya-e0401n:178_32: sucarita duccaritā rammaṇampi anāgata sucarita duccaritā rammaṇampi kappenti. Taṃ
anya-e0401n:178_33: paṭikkhipanto “tenā”tiādimāha. Mahāniddesapāṭhe dvīhākārehi uppajjati kukkuccaṃ cetaso
anya-e0401n:178_34: vippaṭisāro manovilekhoti pāṭho. “Katattā cā”ti akattabbassa katattā ca. “Akatattā
anya-e0401n:178_35: cā”ti kattabbassa akatattā ca. Keci pana ayaṃ vippaṭisāro nāma kadāci kassaci kenaci
anya-e0401n:178_36: kāraṇena pubbekata sucaritampi akata duccaritampi ārabbha uppajjati. Ummattakasadisañhi
anya-e0401n:178_37: puthujjana cittanti vadanti. Taṃ paṭikkhipanto “etenā”tiādimāha. So pana kesañci
anya-e0401n:178_38: vāde vippaṭisāro nāma domanassaṃ hoti, na kukkuccanti adhippāyo. Soca kho dvidhā
anya-e0401n:178_39: bhāvo. Apāyabhayena tajjīyanti tāsīyantīti apāyabhaya tajjitā. “Na aññesaṃ”ti sucarita
anya-e0401n:178_40: duccaritaṃ ajānantānaṃ amanasikarontānañca na hoti. Kathaṃ viññāyatīti ce. Sucaritaduccarita
anya-e0401n:178_41: nāmena anusocanākārassa dassitattāti vuttaṃ “akataṃ me”tiādi. Yāthāvamāno nāma seyyassa
anya-e0401n:178_42: seyyo hamasmīti sadisassa sadisohamasmīti hīnassa hīnohamasmītiādinā pavatto bhūtamāno.
anya-e0401n:178_43: Yañcakukkuccaṃ uppajjatīti sambandho. “Akatvā”ti taṃ kalyāṇa kammaṃ akatvā. “Katvā”ti
anya-e0401n:178_44: taṃ pāpakammaṃ katvā. Idaṃ pana pubbekatā katakāle eva ayāthāvaṃ hoti. Anusocana
anya-e0401n:178_45: kālepana yāthāvameva. “Hattha kukkuccaṃ”ti ettha saṅkocanattho na labbhati. Kucchita
anya-e0401n:178_46: kiriyattho eva labbhati. Hatthalolatāhi hattha kukkuccanti vuccati. Pādalolatā ca
anya-e0401n:178_47: pādakukkuccaṃ. Tenāha “asaṃyata kukkuccaṃ nāmā”ti. Yaṃ pana kukkuccaṃ. “Taṃ”ti taṃ
anya-e0401n:178_48: vatthuṃ. Kukkuccaṃ karontīti kukkuccāyantā. Nāmadhātu padañhetaṃ. Kappati nu kho,
anya-e0401n:178_49: na nu kho kappatīti evaṃ vinaya saṃsayaṃ uppādentāti attho. “Kukkuccappakatatāyā”ti
anya-e0401n:178_50: kukkuccena apakatatāya abhibhūtatāya. “Attano avisaye”ti āṇācakkaṭhāne. Āṇācakka
anya-e0401n:178_51: sāmino buddhassavisayattā attano sāvaka bhūtassa avisayeti attho. Ye pana karontiyeva
anya-e0401n:179_0: 94-95. Thinamiddhavacanatthesu. “Cittaṃ mandamandaṃ katvā”ti cintana kicce atimandaṃ
anya-e0401n:179_1: paridubbalaṃ katvā. Cittaṃ gilānaṃ milātaṃ katvāti vuttaṃ hoti. “Ajjhottharatī”ti
anya-e0401n:179_2: abhibhavati. Ārammaṇa vijānane vā javanakicce vā parihīnathāmabalaṃ karoti. “Thiyatī”ti
anya-e0401n:179_3: padaṃ pāḷivasena siddhanti āha “thinaṃ thiyanā”tiādiṃ. “Akammaññabhūte katvā”ti kāyakammādīsu
anya-e0401n:179_4: akammakkhame paridubbale katvā. [Muggarena pothetvā viyāti vuttaṃ hoti ]. “Te”ti
anya-e0401n:179_5: citta cetasike sampayutta dhamme. “Olīyāpetvā”ti avalīne avasīdante katvā. Tenāha
anya-e0401n:179_6: “iriyā pathaṃ pī”tiādiṃ. Thinaṃ cittaṃ abhibhavati, vijānana kiccassa gelaññattā
anya-e0401n:179_7: thinassa. Middhaṃ cetasike abhibhavati, phusanādi kiccassa gelaññattā middhassāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:180_1: saṅkhata kiriyā padanti āha “ñāṇappaṭikāroti attho”ti. “Paṭikāro”ti ca rogassa paṭipakkha
anya-e0401n:180_2: kammaṃ. “Etāyā”ti nissakkavacanaṃ. Vicinanti dhammaṃ vicinantīti vicino. Dhamma vīmaṃsakā.
anya-e0401n:180_3: Kicchati kilamati etāyāti kicchā. Vicinaṃ kicchāti vicikicchāti imamatthaṃ dassento
anya-e0401n:180_5: dassetuṃ “vicikicchati vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Dvidhā eḷayati kampatīti dveḷakaṃ. Tathā
anya-e0401n:180_6: pavattaṃ cittaṃ. Dveḷakassa bhāvoti viggaho. “Buddhādīsu aṭṭhasū”ti buddhe kaṅkhati,
anya-e0401n:180_7: dhamme kaṅkhati, saṅghe kaṅkhati, sikkhāya kaṅkhati, pubbante kaṅkhati, aparante
anya-e0401n:180_8: kaṅkhati, pubbantā parante kaṅkhati, idappaccayatā paṭicca samuppannesu dhammesu
anya-e0401n:180_9: kaṅkhatīti evaṃ vuttesu aṭṭhasu saddheyya vatthūsu. Tattha “buddhe kaṅkhatī”ti itipi
anya-e0401n:180_10: so bhagavā arahaṃtiādinā vuttesu buddhaguṇesu asaddahanto buddhe kaṅkhati nāma. Svākkhāto
anya-e0401n:180_11: bhagavatā dhammotiādinā vuttesu dhamma guṇesu asaddahanto dhamme kaṅkhati nāma. Suppaṭipanno
anya-e0401n:180_12: bhagavato sāvakasaṅghotiādinā vuttesu saṅghaguṇesu asaddahanto saṅghe kaṅkhati nāma.
anya-e0401n:180_13: Tissannaṃ sikkhānaṃ vaṭṭa dukkhato niyyānaṭṭhesu asaddahanto sikkhāya kaṅkhati nāma.
anya-e0401n:180_14: Attano atīta bhavassa atthi natthibhāve kaṅkhanto pubbante kaṅkhati nāma. Attano
anya-e0401n:180_15: parammaraṇā anāgata bhavassa atthi natthibhāve kaṅkhanto aparante kaṅkhati nāma.
anya-e0401n:180_16: Tadubhayassa atthi natthi bhāve kaṅkhanto pubbantā parante kaṅkhati nāma. Imasmiṃ
anya-e0401n:180_17: bhave attano khandhānaṃ paṭicca samuppāde ca paṭicca samuppannabhāve ca kaṅkhanto
anya-e0401n:180_18: idappaccayatā paṭicca samuppannesu dhammesu kaṅkhati nāma. “Vimati vasenā”ti vematikabhāvena.
anya-e0401n:180_19: Pavattamānā vicikicchā. Vicikicchā paṭirūpakā nāma sabba dhammesu appaṭihatabuddhīnaṃ
anya-e0401n:182_1: katvā. “Dhāretī”ti evameva hotīti sallakkhaṇavasena dhāreti. Tathā ṭhapetīti. Saddahanti
anya-e0401n:182_2: vā saddhā sampannā sattā. Saddhātuṃ arahantīti saddheyyāni. Akālussaṃ vuccati anāvilaṃ
anya-e0401n:182_3: cittaṃ. Akālussaṃ eva akālussiyaṃ. Tassa bhāvoti viggaho. “Okappanā”ti ahosādhu ahosuṭṭhūti
anya-e0401n:182_5: “Vitte asatī”ti dhane asati. Dhanañhi vittanti vuccati. Yaṃ yaṃ icchati, taṃ taṃ
anya-e0401n:183_1: idāni vā pacchā vā kattabbāni. Kalyāṇa kammaṃ nāmapakatiyā cittassa ratiṭṭhānaṃ na
anya-e0401n:183_2: hoti. Pāpa kammameva cittassa ratiṭṭhānaṃ hoti. Tasmā kalyāṇa kamme eva appamajjituṃ
anya-e0401n:183_3: visuṃ satināma icchitabbā. Pāpakamme pana visuṃ satiyā kiccaṃ natthi. Sabbepi cittacetasikā
anya-e0401n:183_4: dhammā apamatta rūpā honti. Tenāha “itarāpanā”tiādiṃ. “Satiyeva na hotī”ti visuṃ
anya-e0401n:183_5: sati nāmako eko cetasikoyeva na hoti. Katamā pana sā hotīti āha “katassā”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:183_6: Tattha katassa appamajjanaṃ nāma kesañci anumodanavasena kesañci anusocanavasena
anya-e0401n:183_7: appamajjanaṃ. Kattabbassa appamajjanaṃ nāma niccakālampi kātuṃ abhimukhatā. “Katassā”ti
anya-e0401n:183_8: vā bhummatthe sāmivacanaṃ. Tathā sesesu dvīsu padesu. Sabbesu rājakammesu niyutto
anya-e0401n:183_9: sabbakammiko. “Niyutto”ti appamatto hutvā byāvaṭakāya citto. Sabbesu ṭhānesu icchitabbāti
anya-e0401n:183_10: sabbatthikā. Sā hi chasu dvāresu cittassa ārakkha kiccā hoti indriya saṃvaraṇa dhammattā.
anya-e0401n:183_11: Tasmā chasu dvāresu iṭṭhārammaṇe lobhamūlacittassa anuppajjanatthāya sā icchitabbā,
anya-e0401n:183_12: aniṭṭhā rammaṇe dosamūla cittassa, majjhattārammaṇe mohamūla cittassāti. Api ca,
anya-e0401n:183_13: bojjhaṅga bhāvanā ṭhānesu idaṃ sutta padaṃ vuttaṃ. Tasmā bhāvanā cittassa līnaṭṭhānepi
anya-e0401n:183_14: sā icchitabbā līnapakkhato cittassa nīvāraṇatthāyātiādinā yojetabbā.
anya-e0401n:184_1: Tāni hīnakammāni lāmakakammānīti hīḷetvā tato attānaṃ rakkhituṃ icchati. Tenāha “jigucchatī”ti.
anya-e0401n:184_2: “Ukkaṇṭhatī”ti virujjhati, viyogaṃ icchati. “Tehi yevā”ti kāya duccaritādīhiyeva.
anya-e0401n:184_4: kalyāṇa kammesu. “Lajjare”ti lajjanti. “Abhaye”ti abhāyitabbe kalyāṇakamme. Yasmā
anya-e0401n:184_5: pana sappurisā attānaṃ pariharantīti sambandho. “Hiriyā attani gāravaṃ uppādetvā”ti
anya-e0401n:184_6: attano jātiguṇādikaṃ vā sīla guṇādikaṃ vā garuṃ katvā mādisassa eva rūpaṃ pāpakammaṃ
anya-e0401n:184_7: ayuttaṃ kātuṃ. Yadi kareyyaṃ, pacchā attānaṃ asuddhaṃ ñatvā dukkhīdummano bhaveyyanti
anya-e0401n:184_8: evaṃ hiriyā attani gāravaṃ uppādetvā. “Ottappena paresu gāravaṃ uppādetvā”ti parānuvādabhayaṃ
anya-e0401n:184_9: bhāyitvāti adhippāyo. Tattha parānuvādabhayaṃ nāma paresaṃ sādhu janānaṃ garahā bhayaṃ.
anya-e0401n:184_10: Aññampi apāyabhayaṃ saṃsāra vaṭṭabhayañca ettha saṅgayhatiyeva. Lokaṃpālentīti lokapālā.
anya-e0401n:185_1: attho. Paṭiviruddhatā ca pahāyaka pahātabba bhāvena veditabbāti dassetuṃ “sohī”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n:185_2: Tattha so nekkhammadhātuvasena hutvā pavattatīti sambandho. “Hita saññitesū”ti idaṃ
anya-e0401n:185_3: me atthāya hitāya sukhāyāti evaṃ saññitesu. “Lagganavasenā”ti amuñcitukāmatāvasena.
anya-e0401n:185_4: Tesveva pavattatīti sambandho. “Bhavabhoga sampattiyo gūtharāsiṃ viya hīḷetvā”ti
anya-e0401n:185_5: idaṃ bodhisattānaṃ vasena nidassana vacanaṃ. Tattha “hīḷetvā”ti garahitvā. Nikkhamanti
anya-e0401n:185_6: etenāti nekkhammo. So eva dhātūti nekkhammadhātu.
anya-e0401n:187_0: 103. Tatra majjhattatāyaṃ. “Līnuddhaccānaṃ”ti cittassa līnatā eko visamapakkho. Uddhaṭatā
anya-e0401n:187_1: dutīyo visamapakkho. Līnaṃ cittaṃ kosajje visamapakkhe patati. Uddhaṭaṃ cittaṃ uddhacce
anya-e0401n:187_2: visamapakkhe patati. Tadubhayampi akusala pakkhikaṃ hoti. Tathā cittassa ati lūkhatā
anya-e0401n:187_3: eko visama pakkho. Atipahaṭṭhatā ekotiādinā sabbaṃ bojjhaṅgavidhānaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:187_4: Tatra majjhattatā pana sampayutta dhamme ubhosu antesu pātetuṃ adatvā sayaṃ majjhimappaṭipadāyaṃ daḷhaṃ tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0401n:188: 104. Passaddhādīsu. “Tattha taṃ vīndantī”ti tesu puñña kammesu taṃ citta sukhaṃ paṭilabhanti.
anya-e0401n:191_0: 111. Viratittaye. “Kathā, cetanā, virati, vasenā”ti ‘kathāsammāvācā, cetanā sammāvācā,
anya-e0401n:191_1: virati sammāvācā, vasena. Taṃ kathāvācaṃ samuṭṭhāpetīti taṃ samuṭṭhāpikā. Yā pana
anya-e0401n:191_2: pāpa viramaṇākārena cittassa pavattīti yojanā. “Samādiyantassa vā”ti musāvādā viramāmītiādinā
anya-e0401n:191_3: vacībhedaṃ katvā samādiyantassa vā. “Adhiṭṭhahantassa vā”ti vacībhedaṃ akatvā citteneva
anya-e0401n:191_4: tathā adhiṭṭhahantassa vā. Imehi dvīhi padehi samādāna viratippavattiṃ vadati. “Avītikkamantassa
anya-e0401n:191_5: vā”ti etena sampatta viratippavattiṃ vadati. “Etāyā”ti sammāvācā viratiyā. Sā pana
anya-e0401n:191_6: kattunā ca kriyāya ca sahabhāvinī hutvā samādāna kriyaṃ suṭṭhutaraṃ sādheti. Tasmā
anya-e0401n:191_7: sā karaṇa sādhanaṃ nāma hoti. Tenāha “karaṇatthevākaraṇa vacana”nti. Bahūsujavanavāresu
anya-e0401n:191_8: pavattamānesu purima purima javanavārapariyāpannā sammāvācā pacchima pacchima javanavārasamuṭṭhitāya
anya-e0401n:191_9: samādāna kriyāya paccayo hoti. Sā pana tāya kriyāya asahabhāvittā karaṇalakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0401n:191_10: na sampajjati. Hetu lakkhaṇe tiṭṭhati. Tenāha “hetu atthevā karaṇavacana”nti. Idañca
anya-e0401n:191_11: atthato labbhamānattā vuttaṃ. Sammāvācāti padaṃ pana kitasādhana padattākaraṇatthe
anya-e0401n:191_12: evasiddhaṃ. Na hi akāraka bhūto hetu attho sādhanaṃ nāma sambhavati. “Samādāna vacanānī”ti
anya-e0401n:191_13: sammāvācā samuṭṭhitāni samādāna vacanāni. “Tato”ti tatoparaṃ. “Tesaṃ”ti te saṃvadamānānaṃ.
anya-e0401n:191_14: Idañca sabbaṃ sammāvācāti vacane vacībhedavācaṃ padhānaṃ katvā vuttaṃ. Sampattavirati
anya-e0401n:191_15: samuccheda viratibhūtāya pana sammāvācāya vacībhedena kiccaṃ natthi. Virati kicca
anya-e0401n:191_16: mevapadhānanti dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ. “Pavattamānā”ti pavattamānattā. Visesana hetu padametaṃ.
anya-e0401n:193_1: Kasmā, attano paccakkhe sampatta vasenavatthussadharamānattā. “Samādiyantassa vā
anya-e0401n:193_2: uppannā”ti pāṇāti pātāpaṭiviramādhītiādinā samādiyantassayā samādānakkhaṇe uppannā
anya-e0401n:193_3: virati. “Sā pana paccuppannārammaṇā hotī”ti ettha kathaṃ paccuppannā rammaṇā hotīti.
anya-e0401n:193_4: Pāṇāti pātāpaṭiviramādhīti vadantassa cittaṃ anukkamena pāṇasaddādīnaṃ atthaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0401n:193_5: katvā pavattati. Tattha “pāṇo”ti vohārato satto. Paramatthato jīvitindriyaṃ. So ca
anya-e0401n:193_6: satto tañcajīvitindriyaṃ loke sabbakālampi saṃvijjatiyeva. Evarūpaṃ jīvitindriya
anya-e0401n:193_7: sāmaññaṃ sandhāya paccuppannārammaṇāti vuttaṃ. Adinnādānā paṭiviramādhītiādīsupi
anya-e0401n:193_8: eseva nayo. “Anāgatā rammaṇāvā”ti ettha ekadivasaṃ niyametvā samādiyantassa tasmiṃ
anya-e0401n:193_9: divase dharamāna sattāpi atthi. Uppajjissamānasattāpi atthi. Tadubhayampi pāṇavacane
anya-e0401n:193_10: saṅgahitameva. Pāṇupetaṃ katvā samādiyantassa vattabbameva natthi. Api ca anāgatakālikampi
anya-e0401n:193_11: samādānaṃ atthiyeva. Ahaṃ asukadivasato paṭṭhāya yāvajīvampi pāṇātipātā viramādhītiādi.
anya-e0401n:193_12: Evaṃ samādāna virati anāgatā rammaṇāpi hotīti. “Paccayasamucchedavasenā”ti taṃ taṃ
anya-e0401n:193_13: kilesānusaya saṅkhātassa paccayassa samucchedavasena. Sesamettha suviññeyyaṃ.
anya-e0401n:194_1: saṃsārabhave. “Pāpekali parājaye”ti kalisaddo pāpe ca parājaye ca vattatīti attho.
anya-e0401n:194_2: Sattehi kaliṃ avanti rakkhanti etāyāti karuṇā. Sattehīti ca rakkhaṇatthayoge icchitasmiṃ
anya-e0401n:194_3: atthe apādāna vacanaṃ. Yathā-kāke rakkhanti taṇḍulā-ti. Sattevā kalito avanti rakkhanti
anya-e0401n:194_4: etāyāti karuṇā. Kalitoti ca rakkhaṇattha yoge anicchitasmimpi apādānavacanaṃ. Yathā-pāpācittaṃ
anya-e0401n:194_5: nivārayeti. Ekasmiṃ satte pavattāpi appamaññā eva nāma honti. Yathā taṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ
anya-e0401n:197_0: 118. Etaṃ parimāṇaṃ assāti ettāvaṃ. “Ettāvatā”ti ettāvantena-phasso, vedanā, saññā,tiādivacanakkamena.
anya-e0401n:197_1: “Cittuppādesū”ti ettha-katame dhammā dassanena pahātabbā. Cattāro diṭṭhigatasampayutta
anya-e0401n:197_2: cittuppādā-tiādīsu cittacetasika samūho cittuppādoti vuccati. Idha pana cittāni eva
anya-e0401n:197_3: cittuppādāti vuccantīti āha “cittuppādesūti cittesu icceva attho”ti. “Sabbadubbalattā”ti
anya-e0401n:197_4: sabbacittehi dubbalatarattā. “Bhāvanā balenā”ti vitakka virāgasatti yuttena upacāra
anya-e0401n:197_5: bhāvanā balena, vuṭṭhāna gāmini vipassanā bhāvanā balena ca. “Balanāyakattā”ti bala
anya-e0401n:198_0: 119. Akusala cetasikesu. “Pacchimaṃ”ti sabbesupi dvādasā kusala cittesūti vacanaṃ.
anya-e0401n:198_1: “Purimassā”ti sabbā kusala sādhāraṇā nāmāti vacanassa. “Samattana vacanaṃ”ti-kasmā
anya-e0401n:198_2: sabbākusala sādhāraṇā nāmāti. Yasmā sabbesupi. La. Cittesu labbhanti, tasmā sabbā
anya-e0401n:198_3: kusala sādhāraṇā nāmā-ti evaṃ sādhana vacanaṃ. Yasmā pana imehi catūhi vinānuppajjanti,
anya-e0401n:198_4: tasmā te sabbesu tesu labbhantīti yojanā. Kasmā vinā nuppajjantīti āha “na hitānī”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:198_5: “Tehī”ti pāpehi. Sabba pāpa dhammatoti attho. “Tathā tathā āmasitvā”ti diṭṭhi khandhesu
anya-e0401n:198_6: nicco dhuvo sassatotiādinā āmasati. Māno ahanti vā seyyo sadisotiādinā vā āmasati.
anya-e0401n:198_7: Evaṃ tathā tathā āmasitvā. “Tesū”ti diṭṭhimānesu. Niddhāraṇe bhummaṃ. Diṭṭhi parāmasantī
anya-e0401n:198_8: pavattatīti yojanā. “Taṃ gahitākāra”nti taṃ ahanti gahitaṃ nimittākāraṃ. Sakkāya
anya-e0401n:198_9: diṭṭhi eva gati yesaṃ te diṭṭhi gatikā. Avikkhambhita sakkāya diṭṭhikā. “Ahanti gaṇhantī”ti
anya-e0401n:198_10: mānena gaṇhanti. “Na hi mānassa viyā”ti yathā mānassa attasampaggahaṇe byāpāro atthi,
anya-e0401n:198_11: na tathā diṭṭhiyā attasampaggahaṇe byāpāro atthīti yojanā. Ettha ca attasampaggahaṇaṃ
anya-e0401n:198_12: nāma parehi saddhiṃ attānaṃ seyyādivasena suṭṭhupaggahaṇaṃ. “Na ca diṭṭhiyā viyā”ti
anya-e0401n:198_13: yathā diṭṭhiyā dhammānaṃ ayāthāvapakkhaparikappane byāpāro atthīti yojanā. Tattha
anya-e0401n:198_14: ayāthāvapakkho nāma attā sassato ucchinnotiādi. Macchariyaṃ attasampattīsu lagganalobhasamuṭṭhitattā
anya-e0401n:198_15: lobhasampayuttameva siyāti codanaṃ pariharanto “macchariyaṃ panā”tiādimāha. Tattha
anya-e0401n:199_1: ca. “Sammādiṭṭhi pacchimako”ti sammādiṭṭhiyā pacchato anubandhakoti attho. Sammādiṭṭhiyā
anya-e0401n:199_2: parivā ramattoti vuttaṃ hoti. “Tasmiṃ asati pī”ti dutīyajjhānika maggādīsu tasmiṃ
anya-e0401n:199_4: sammāājīvo,ti ime tayo dhammā sīlakkhandha dhammā nāma. Sammā vāyāmo, sammāsati,
anya-e0401n:199_5: sammāsamādhī,ti ime tayo dhammā samādhikkhandhā nāma. Imesu sīlakkhandha samādhikkhandhesu.
anya-e0401n:199_6: “Eko ekassa kiccaṃ na sādhetī”ti tesu sammāvācā sammākammantassa kiccaṃ na sādheti.
anya-e0401n:199_7: Sammā ājīvassa kiccaṃ na sādheti. Sammākammanto ca sammāvācāya kiccaṃ na sādhetītiādinā
anya-e0401n:199_8: sabbaṃ vattabbaṃ. “Sīlesu paripūrakāritā vasenā”ti sīlappaṭipakkha dhammānaṃ samucchindakāritā
anya-e0401n:199_9: vasenāti adhippāyo. Musāvāda virati musāvādameva pajahituṃ sakkoti. Na itarāni pisuṇavācādīnīti
anya-e0401n:199_10: yojanā. Ettha siyā. Musāvādavirati nāma kusala dhammo hoti. Kusala dhammo ca nāma
anya-e0401n:199_11: sabbassa akusala dhammassa paṭipakkho. Ekasmimpi kusala dhamme uppajjamāne tasmiṃ
anya-e0401n:199_12: santāne sabbāni akusalāni pajahituṃ sakkontīti vattabbāni. Atha ca pana musāvāda
anya-e0401n:199_13: virati musāvādameva pajahituṃ sakkoti, na itarānīti vuttaṃ. Kathamidaṃ daṭṭhabbanti.
anya-e0401n:199_14: Vuccate. Pajahituṃ sakkotīti idaṃ pañcasu pahānesu tadaṅgappahāna vacanaṃ. Tadaṅgappahānanti
anya-e0401n:199_15: ca tena tena kusalaṅgena tassa tassa akusalaṅgassa pahānaṃ tadaṅgappahānaṃ nāma.
anya-e0401n:199_16: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti, idha sappuriso pāṇātipātā paṭiviramāmītiādinā visuṃ visuṃ sikkhāpadāni
anya-e0401n:199_17: samādiyitvā pāṇāti pātavirati saṅkhātena kusalaṅgena pāṇātipāta saṅkhātaṃ akusalaṅgaṃ
anya-e0401n:199_18: pajahati. Adinnādāna virati saṅkhātena kusalaṅgena adinnādāna saṅkhātaṃ akusalaṅgaṃ
anya-e0401n:199_19: pajahatītiādinā vitthāretabbaṃ. Ekasmimpi kusala dhamme uppajjamāne tasmiṃ santāne
anya-e0401n:199_20: sabbāni akusalāni na uppajjantīti ettha pana anokāsattā eva na uppajjanti, na pahānattā.
anya-e0401n:199_21: Na hi tasmiṃ santāne tasmiṃ khaṇe tāni akusalāni eva na uppajjanti. Athakho sabbāni
anya-e0401n:199_22: aññāni kusala cittāni ca na uppajjanti. Sabbāni abyākata cittāni ca na uppajjanti.
anya-e0401n:199_23: Tāni anokā sattā eva na uppajjanti. Na pahānattā na uppajjanti. Tadaṅgappahānādi
anya-e0401n:199_24: vasena pana pahānaṃ sandhāya idha pajahituṃ sakkoti-na sakkotīti vuttaṃ. Ettāvatā
anya-e0401n:199_25: tadaṅgappahānaṃ nāma supākaṭaṃ hoti. Musāvāda virati musāvādameva pajahituṃ sakkoti.
anya-e0401n:199_26: Na itarānīti idañca suṭṭhu upapannaṃ hotīti. “Ettha cā”tiādīsu kāyaṅgacopanatthāya
anya-e0401n:199_27: vācaṅgacopanatthāya ca pavattāni kāyavacīco pana bhāgiyāni nāma. Kāmāvacara kusalesveva
anya-e0401n:199_28: viratiyo sandissanti. “Kāmāvacara kusalesu pī”ti niddhāraṇe bhummavacanaṃ. Kāmabhūmiyaṃ
anya-e0401n:199_29: uppannesu eva kāmāvacara kusalesu sandissanti. Tividha kuhanavatthūni ca viramitabbavatthuṭṭhāneṭhitāni.
anya-e0401n:199_30: Ettha ca kuhanaṃ nāma vimhāpanaṃ lābhasakkāra silokatthāya manussānaṃ nānāmāyāsāṭheyya
anya-e0401n:199_31: kammāni katvā acchariyabbhuta bhāvakaraṇanti vuttaṃ hoti. Taṃ pana tividhaṃ ‘paccayappaṭisevanakuhanañca,
anya-e0401n:199_32: sāmantajappana kuhanañca, iriyā pathasaṇṭhā pana kuhanañca. Tattha mahicchoyeva samāno
anya-e0401n:199_33: appicchākāraṃ dassetvā ādito āgatā gate catupaccaye paṭikkhipitvā pacchā bahuṃ bahuṃ
anya-e0401n:199_34: āgate paccaye paṭiggaṇhāti. Idaṃ paccayappaṭisevana kuhanaṃ nāma. Pāpicchoyeva samāno
anya-e0401n:199_35: ayaṃ jhānalābhīti vā abhiññālābhīti vā arahāti vā jano maṃ sambhāvetūti sambhāvanaṃ
anya-e0401n:199_36: icchanto attānaṃ uttari manussa dhammānaṃ santike te vā attano santike katvā vañceti.
anya-e0401n:199_37: Idaṃ sāmantajappana kuhanaṃ nāma. Pāpicchoyeva samāno ayaṃ santavutti samāhito āraddhavīriyoti
anya-e0401n:199_38: jano maṃ sambhāvetūti sambhāvanaṃ icchanto iriyā patha nissitaṃ nānāvañcanaṃ karoti.
anya-e0401n:199_39: Idaṃ iriyā patha saṇṭhāpana kuhanaṃ nāma. “Sikkhāpadassa vatthūnī”ti surā pāna vikāla
anya-e0401n:199_40: bhojana naccagītavādita dassana savanādīni. Surāmerayapānā viramādhīti samādiyantassa
anya-e0401n:199_41: surāmerayapāna cetanā viramitabba vatthu nāma. Vikāla bhojanā viramāmīti samādiyantassa
anya-e0401n:199_42: vikāle yāvakālika vatthussa paribhuñjana cetanā viramitabba vatthu nāma. Sesesupi
anya-e0401n:199_43: eseva nayo. Lokuttara cittesu. ‘Sabbathāpī,ti ca ‘niyatā’ti ca ‘ekato vā’ti ca tīṇi
anya-e0401n:199_44: visesanāni. Lokiyesu pana ‘kadācī’ti ca ‘visuṃ visuṃ’ti ca dve dve visesanāni. Tattha
anya-e0401n:199_45: lokuttaresu ‘sabbathāpī’ti idaṃ samucchedappahāna dassanaṃ lokiyesupi tabbiparītaṃ
anya-e0401n:199_46: tadaṅgappahāna dassanaṃ adhippetanti katvā “ekeka duccaritappahānavasene vā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:200_1: “Anissukino”ti issādhammarahitassa. Thāmagatā karuṇā dosa samuṭṭhitaṃ vihiṃsaṃ pajahati.
anya-e0401n:200_2: Thāmagatā muditā dosasamuṭṭhitaṃ aratiṃ pajahatīti vuttaṃ “vihiṃsā aratīnaṃ nissaraṇa
anya-e0401n:200_3: bhūtā”ti. Ettha ca arati nāma suññāgāresu ca bhāvanā kammesu ca nibbidā. Dosa nissaraṇe
anya-e0401n:200_4: sati domanassanissaraṇampi siddhameva. Nissaraṇañca nāma paṭipakkha dhamma saṇṭhānena
anya-e0401n:200_5: hoti. Tasmā pubbabhāgepi appamaññāsu niccaṃ somanassa saṇṭhānaṃ veditabbanti adhippāyena
anya-e0401n:200_7: upekkhā sahagata kāmāvacara kusala cittesu karuṇā muditā parikammakālepi hi imesaṃ
anya-e0401n:200_8: uppatti mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ anuññātā evā-ti vuttaṃ. Tāya aṭṭhakathāyapi saha viruddho.
anya-e0401n:200_9: Sesamettha suviññeyyaṃ. “Paṭikūlā rammaṇesu pana…pe… vattabbameva natthī”ti paṭikūlā
anya-e0401n:200_10: rammaṇāni nāma somanassena dūre honti, tathā dukkhita sattā ca, tasmā tadā rammaṇāni
anya-e0401n:200_11: asubha bhāvanā cittāni ca karuṇā bhāvanā cittāni ca ādito upekkhā sahagatā nevāti
anya-e0401n:200_12: vattabbameva natthi. “Sāhivedanupekkhā nāmā”ti kāmāvacara vedanupekkhā vuttā. Vibhāvanipāṭhe,
anya-e0401n:200_13: “aññavihitassa pī”ti aññaṃ ārammaṇaṃ manasikarontassapi. Sajjhāyanaṃ sampajjati,
anya-e0401n:200_14: sammasanaṃ sampajjatīti pāṭhaseso. Iti tasmā. Ettha siyā “taṃ paṭikkhittaṃ hotī”ti
anya-e0401n:200_15: kasmā vuttaṃ. Na nu tampi upekkhā sahagata cittesu karuṇā muditānaṃ sambhavaṃ sādheti
anya-e0401n:200_16: yevāti. Saccaṃ sādhetiyeva. Tena pana paricaya vasena tesu tāsaṃ sambhavaṃ dīpeti.
anya-e0401n:200_17: Idha pana “ettha cā”tiādinā “paṭikūlā rammaṇesū”tiādinā ca paricayena vinā pakatiyā
anya-e0401n:200_18: tāsaṃ upekkhā vedanāya eva saha pavatti bahulatā vuttāti. “Yogakamma balenā”ti yuñjana
anya-e0401n:201_0: 122. Ceto yuttānaṃ citta cetasikānaṃ. “Ettha cā”tiādīsu. Heṭṭhā ca vutto ‘kadāci
anya-e0401n:201_1: sandissanti visuṃ visuṃ, kadāci nānā hutvā jāyantī’ti. Upari ca vakkhati ‘appamaññā
anya-e0401n:201_2: viratiyo panettha pañcapi paccekameva yojetabbā’ti. Issādīnañca nānā kadāci yogo
anya-e0401n:201_3: upari ‘issāmacchera kukkuccāni panettha paccekameva yojetabbānī’ti vakkhati. Mānathina
anya-e0401n:201_4: middhānaṃ pana nānā kadāci yogo idha vattabbo. “Kadācī”ti vatvā tadatthaṃ vivarati
anya-e0401n:201_6: vacanametaṃ. Tena kosajjādīnampi gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. “Akammaññatāyā”ti akammaññabhāvena.
anya-e0401n:201_7: Tehi issāmacchariya kukkuccehi. Tena ca mānena. Kicca virodhe vā ārammaṇa virodhe
anya-e0401n:202_0: 123. “Yogaṭṭhānaparicchindana vasenā”ti sabbacitta sādhāraṇā tāva sabbesupi ekūnanavuticittuppādesu,
anya-e0401n:202_1: vitakko pañcapaññā sacittesūtiādinā yuttaṭṭhāna bhūtānaṃ cittānaṃ gaṇanasaṅkhyāparicchedavasena.
anya-e0401n:202_2: “Yutta dhammarāsi paricchindana vasenā”ti anuttare chattiṃsa, mahaggate pañcatiṃsātiādinā
anya-e0401n:202_3: yutta dhammarāsīnaṃ gaṇana saṅkhyā pariccheda vasena. Sesaṃ suviññeyyaṃ. “Pāḷiyaṃ”ti
anya-e0401n:202_4: dhammasaṅgaṇi pāḷiyaṃ. “Tesaṃ nayānaṃ”ti catukka pañcaka nayānaṃ.
anya-e0401n:204_0: 125. Lokuttara viratīnaṃ lokuttara vipākesupi uppajjanato “idañca…pe… daṭṭhabba”nti.
anya-e0401n:204_1: Tāsaṃ appamaññānaṃ. Tesu mahāvipākesu. Sattapaññattādīni ārammaṇāni yassāti viggaho.
anya-e0401n:204_2: “Tenā”ti kusalena. “Vikappa rahitattā”ti vividhākāra cintana rahitattā. Appanāpatta
anya-e0401n:204_3: kamma visesehi nibbattā appanāpattakamma visesa nibbattā. Paññatti visesāni nāma
anya-e0401n:204_4: pathavīkasiṇa nimittādīni. “Api cā”tiādīsu. Na paññatti dhammehi atthi. Evañca sati,
anya-e0401n:204_6: patha majjhānika cittesu chattiṃsa. Dutīyajjhānika cittesu pañcatiṃsātiādinā saṅgahanayabhedassa kārakā.
anya-e0401n:205: 126. “Ettha cā”tiādīsu. “Pañcasu asaṅkhārikesū”ti niddhāraṇe bhummavacanaṃ. Tathā pañcasu sasaṅkhārikesūti. Sesamettha suviññeyyaṃ.
anya-e0401n:206: 128. “Bhūmi jāti sampayogādibhedenā”ti phassotāva catubbidho hoti kāmāvacaro, rūpāvacaro, arūpāvacaro cāti. Ayaṃ bhūmibhedo.
anya-e0401n:208: Chattiṃseva vipākā ca, vīsati kriyā matā.
anya-e0401n:209_0: Iti ayaṃ jātibhedo. Somanassa sahagato, diṭṭhigata sampayutto, asaṅkhāriko ca, sasaṅkhāriko
anya-e0401n:209_1: cātiādinā sampayogādibhedo vattabbo. “Cittena samaṃ bheda”nti attanā vā sampayuttena
anya-e0401n:209_2: cittabhedena samaṃ bhedaṃ. Ekūnana vutiyā cittesu vā. Ettha ca vicikicchā cetasikaṃ
anya-e0401n:209_3: ekasmiṃ citte yuttanti ekameva hoti. Doso, issā, macchariyaṃ, kukkuccanti ime cattāro
anya-e0401n:209_4: dvīsu cittesu yuttāti visuṃ visuṃ dve dve honti. Tathā diṭṭhimānā paccekaṃ cattāro.
anya-e0401n:212_1: “Bhāvo”ti vijjamānakiriyā. Yo lakkhaṇa rasādīsu lakkhaṇanti vuccati. Tenāha “dhammānaṃ”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:212_2: Pavattoti pāṭhasesa padaṃ. Etena ‘vedanā bhedena cittacetasikānaṃ saṅgaho’tiādīsupi
anya-e0401n:212_3: vedanā bhedena pavatto cittacetasikānaṃ saṅgahotiādinā sambandhaṃ dasseti. “Vacanattho
anya-e0401n:212_4: dassito”ti, kathaṃ dassitoti āha “vedanā bhedena cittacetasikānaṃ saṅgaho”tiādi.
anya-e0401n:212_5: “Tesaṃ dāni yathārahaṃ”ti ettha “tesaṃ”ti cittacetasikānaṃ, saṅgaho nāmāti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:212_6: Etena ayaṃ saṅgaho citta cetasikānaṃ eva saṅgahoti siddhaṃ hoti. Vedanā hetuto. La.
anya-e0401n:212_7: Lambaṇavatthuto saṅgaho nāmāti sambandho. Etena upari vedanā saṅgahotiādīsu vedanāto
anya-e0401n:212_8: saṅgaho vedanā saṅgaho. La. Vatthuto saṅgaho vatthu saṅgahoti siddhaṃ hoti, vedanātotiādīsu
anya-e0401n:212_9: ca vedanā bhedatotiādi atthato siddhaṃ hoti. Evaṃ channaṃ pakiṇṇakasaṅgahānaṃ vacanattho
anya-e0401n:212_10: dassito. Tenāha “vedanā bhedenā”tiādiṃ. Ādinā dassitoti sambandho. “Saṅgaho nāma
anya-e0401n:212_11: niyyate”ti vuttattā “nīto nāma atthī”ti vuttaṃ. “Niyyate”ti ca pavattīyateti attho.
anya-e0401n:212_12: Nanu tesaṃ “saṅgaho nāma niyyate”ti vuttattā dvīhi citta cetasikehi eva ayaṃ saṅgaho
anya-e0401n:212_13: netabboti. Na. Cittena nīte cetasikehi visuṃ netabba kiccassa abhāvatoti dassetuṃ
anya-e0401n:213_0: 130. Vedanā saṅgahe. Vedanā bhedaṃ nissāya imassa saṅgahassa pavattattā “nissaya
anya-e0401n:213_1: dhamma pariggahattha”nti vuttaṃ. “Saṃyuttake”ti vedanā saṃyuttake. “Ārammaṇaṃ anubhontī”ti
anya-e0401n:213_2: ārammaṇa rasaṃ anubhonti. “Te”ti tejanā. “Taṃ”ti taṃ ārammaṇaṃ. “Sātato”ti sukhākārato.
anya-e0401n:213_3: “Assātato”ti dukkhā kārato. Tato aññopakāro natthi, tasmā vedanā anubhavana lakkhaṇena
anya-e0401n:213_4: tividhā eva hotīti yojanā. “Dve”ti dve vedanāyo. Upekkhaṃ sukhe saṅgahetvā sukhadukkhavasena
anya-e0401n:213_5: vā dve vedanā vuttāti yojanā. “Santasmiṃ esā paṇīte sukhe”ti jhānasampayuttaṃ adukkhama
anya-e0401n:213_6: sukhaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Pañca bhedādīsu vitthāro vedanā saṃyutte gahetabbo. Vedayitanti
anya-e0401n:213_7: ca vedanāti ca atthato ekaṃ. “Sabbaṃ taṃ dukkhasmiṃ”ti sabbaṃ taṃ vedayitaṃ dukkhasmiṃ
anya-e0401n:213_8: eva paviṭṭhaṃ hoti. Saṅkhāra dukkhataṃ ānanda mayā sandhāya bhāsitaṃ saṅkhāra vipariṇāmatañca,
anya-e0401n:213_9: yaṃ kiñci vedayitaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ dukkhasmiṃti pāḷi. “Indriyabhedavasenā”ti somanassa
anya-e0401n:213_10: sahagataṃ, upekkhāsahagataṃ, domanassa sahagataṃ, sukhasahagataṃ, dukkha sahagatanti
anya-e0401n:213_11: evaṃ indriya bhedavasena. “Yesu dhammesū”ti sampayutta dhammesu. “Tesaṃ”ti sampayutta
anya-e0401n:213_12: dhammānaṃ. Tattha sukhasampayuttā dhammā kāyika sukha sampayutta cetasika sukha sampayutta
anya-e0401n:213_13: vasena duvidhā. Evaṃ issaraṭṭhānabhūtānaṃ sampayutta dhammānaṃ duvidhattā anubhavana
anya-e0401n:213_14: bhede tīsu vedanāsu ekaṃ sukha vedanaṃ dvidhā bhinditvā sukhindriyaṃ somanassindriyanti
anya-e0401n:213_15: vuttaṃ. Dukkhasampayutta dhammesupi esevanayo. “Api cā”ti kiñci vattabbaṃ atthīti
anya-e0401n:213_16: attho. “Tepī”ti upekkhā sampayuttāpi dhammā. Cakkhādi pasādakāyā nāma cakkhu sota
anya-e0401n:213_17: ghāna jivhā pasādakāyā. Tesu nissitā nāma cakkhu viññāṇa cittuppādādayo. “Sabbhāvā”ti
anya-e0401n:213_18: santabhāvato saṃvijjamāna bhāvato duvidhā hontīti yojanā. “Eka rasattā”ti majjhattabhāvena
anya-e0401n:213_19: ekarasattā. “Itarānī”ti somanassa domanassa upekkhindriyāni. Sesamettha suviññeyyaṃ.
anya-e0401n:214_1: Suppatiṭṭhita bhāvasādhanaṃ hetu kiccaṃ nāmāti yojanā. “Imepi dhammā”ti imepi cha
anya-e0401n:214_2: hetu dhammā. “Tatthā”ti tesu ārammaṇesu, sādhenti. Tasmā suppatiṭṭhita bhāvasādhanaṃ
anya-e0401n:214_3: hetukiccaṃ nāmāti vuttaṃ. “Apare panā”ti paṭṭhānaṭṭha kathāyaṃ āgato revatatthera
anya-e0401n:214_5: akusalabhāvasādhanaṃ abyākatabhāvasādhanaṃ. “Evaṃ sante”tiādi taṃ vādaṃ paṭikkhipantānaṃ
anya-e0401n:214_6: paṭikkhepavacanaṃ. “Yesa”nti mohamūla citta dvaye moho ca ahetuka cittuppāda rūpa
anya-e0401n:214_7: nibbānāni ca. “Na sampajjeyyā”ti sahajāta hetuno abhāvā tassa mohassa akusala bhāvo,
anya-e0401n:214_8: itare sañca abyākata bhāvo na sampajjeyya. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti. Hetu nāma sahajāta dhammānaṃ
anya-e0401n:214_9: kusalādibhāvaṃ sādhetīti vuttaṃ. Evaṃ sati, so moho sampayutta dhammānaṃ akusala
anya-e0401n:214_10: bhāvaṃ sādheyya. Attano pana akusala bhāvaṃ sādhento sahajāto añño hetu natthi. Tasmā
anya-e0401n:214_11: tassa akusalabhāvo na sampajjeyya. Tathā ahetuka cittuppāda rūpa nibbānānañca abyākatabhāvaṃ
anya-e0401n:214_12: sādhento koci sahajāto hetu nāma natthīti tesampi abyākata bhāvo na sampajjeyya.
anya-e0401n:214_13: Na ca na sampajjati. Tasmā so theravādo na yuttoti. Ettha siyā. Soca moho attano
anya-e0401n:214_14: dhammatāya akusalo hoti. Tāni ca ahetuka cittuppādarūpa nibbānāni attano dhammatāya
anya-e0401n:214_15: abyākatāni hontīti. Evaṃ sante, yathā te dhammā. Tathā aññepi dhammā attano dhammatāya
anya-e0401n:214_16: eva kusalā kusalā byākatā bhavissanti. Na cettha kāraṇaṃ atthi, yenakāraṇena te eva
anya-e0401n:214_17: dhammā attano dhammatāya akusalā byākatā honti. Aññe pana dhammā attano dhammatāya
anya-e0401n:214_18: kusalā kusalā byākatā na honti, hetūhi eva hontīti. Tasmā tesaṃ sabbesampi kusalādi
anya-e0401n:214_19: bhāvatthāya hetūhi payojanaṃ natthi. Tasmā so theravādo na yutto yevāti. Na kevalañca
anya-e0401n:214_20: tasmiṃ theravāde ettako doso atthi. Atha kho aññopi doso atthīti dassetuṃ “yāni cā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n:214_21: Tatthāyaṃ adhippāyo. Sace dhammānaṃ kusalādi bhāvo sahajāta hetuppaṭibaddho siyā.
anya-e0401n:214_22: Evaṃ sati, hetu paccaye kusala hetuto laddha paccayāni rūpāni kusalāni bhaveyyuṃ.
anya-e0401n:214_23: Akusala hetuto laddha paccayāni rūpāni akusalāni bhaveyyuṃ. Na ca bhavanti. Tasmā
anya-e0401n:214_24: so vādo ayutto yevāti. Idāni puna taṃ theravādaṃ paggahetuṃ “yathāpanā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n:214_25: “Dhammesū”ti catussacca dhammesu. Muyhanakiriyā nāma andhakāra kiriyā. Dhammacchando
anya-e0401n:214_26: nāma dānaṃ dātukāmo, sīlaṃ pūretukāmo, bhāvanaṃ bhāvetukāmo iccādinā pavatto chando.
anya-e0401n:214_27: “Akkhantī”ti akkhamanaṃ, arocanaṃ, amanāpo. Pāpa dhamma pāpā rammaṇa virodho nāma
anya-e0401n:214_28: kāmarāgaṭṭhānīyehi sattavidha methuna dhammādīhi pāpa dhammehi ceva pañcakāmaguṇā
anya-e0401n:214_29: rammaṇe hi ca cittassa virodho, jeguccho paṭikūlo. Muyhanakiriyā pana ekanta akusala
anya-e0401n:214_30: jātikā eva hoti. Ettāvatā mohamūla citta dvaye moho attano dhammatāya akusalo hotīti
anya-e0401n:214_31: imamatthaṃ patiṭṭhāpeti. “Evaṃ sante”tiādikaṃ tattha dosāropanaṃ vidhamati. Idāni
anya-e0401n:214_32: ahetuka cittuppāda rūpa nibbānāni attano dhammatāya abyākatāni hontīti imamatthaṃ
anya-e0401n:214_33: patiṭṭhāpetuṃ “yoca dhammo”tiādimāha. “Ettakamevā”ti aññaṃ dukkara kāraṇaṃ natthīti
anya-e0401n:214_34: adhippāyo. “Ahetuka cittānaṃ”ti ahetuka cittuppādānaṃ. Attano dhammatāya eva siddho.
anya-e0401n:214_35: Ettāvatā-ahetuka. La. Nibbānāni attano dhammatāya abyākatāni hontī-ti imamatthaṃ
anya-e0401n:214_36: patiṭṭhāpeti. “Evaṃ sante”tiādi tattha dosāropanaṃ apaneti. Idāni sabbopi moho attano
anya-e0401n:214_37: dhammatāya akusala bhāveṭhatvā aññesaṃ icchā nāma atthi, akkhanti nāma atthīti evaṃ
anya-e0401n:214_38: vuttānaṃ icchā akkhanti dhammānampi akusala bhāvaṃ sādhetīti dassetuṃ “tattha moho”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n:214_39: “Muyhana nissandāni evā”ti muyhanakiriyāya nissandapphalāni eva. Na kevalaṃ so lobhādīnaṃ
anya-e0401n:214_40: akusalabhāvaṃ sādheti, atha kho alobhādīnampi kusalabhāvaṃ so eva sādhetīti dassetuṃ
anya-e0401n:214_41: “alobhādīnañcā”tiādi vuttaṃ. “Avijjānusayena saheva siddho”ti tāni sattasantāne avijjānusaye
anya-e0401n:214_42: appahīne kusalāni honti. Pahīne kiriyāni hontīti adhippāyo. Idāni lobha dosānaṃ alobhādīnañca
anya-e0401n:214_43: hetu kiccaṃ dassetuṃ “tāni pana lobhādīnī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Rajjana dussanānaṃ nissandāni
anya-e0401n:214_44: rajjanādinissandāni. “Diṭṭhi mānādīnī”ti diṭṭhi māna issā macchariyādīni. Arajjana
anya-e0401n:214_45: adussana amuyhanānaṃ nissandāni arajjanādi nissandāni. “Saddhādīnī”ti saddhā sati
anya-e0401n:214_46: hiri ottappādīni. “Hetumukhenapī”ti ahetuka cittuppāda rūpa nibbānānaṃ abyākatabhāvo
anya-e0401n:214_47: attano dhammatāya siddhoti vutto. Sahetuka vipāka kriyānaṃ abyākata bhāvo pana attano
anya-e0401n:214_48: dhammatāya siddhotipi sahajāta hetūnaṃ hetu kiccena siddhotipi vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:214_49: Vibhāva nipāṭhe. “Maggitabbo”ti gavesitabbo. Atha tesaṃ kusalādi bhāvo sesasampayutta
anya-e0401n:214_50: hetuppaṭi baddho siyāti yojanā. “Appaṭi baddho”ti hetunā appaṭi baddho. “Kusalādibhāvo”ti
anya-e0401n:214_51: kusalādibhāvo siyā. “So”ti kusalādibhāvo. “Ahetukānaṃ”ti ahetuka cittuppāda rūpa
anya-e0401n:214_52: nibbānānaṃ. Idāni ‘yāni ca laddhahetu paccayānī’tiādi vacanaṃ paṭikkhipanto “yathācā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n:214_53: “Rūpārūpa dhammesū”ti niddhāraṇe bhumma vacanaṃ. “Arūpa dhammesu evā”ti niddhāraṇīyaṃ.
anya-e0401n:214_54: Na rūpa dhammesu pharanti. Evaṃ sati, kasmā te rūpa dhammā jhānapaccayuppannesu vuttāti
anya-e0401n:214_55: āha “te panā”tiādiṃ. Sesamettha suviññeyyaṃ. “Taṃ pana tesaṃ”ti tesaṃ haṃsādīnaṃ
anya-e0401n:214_56: taṃ vaṇṇavisesaṃ. “Yoniyo”ti mātāpitu jātiyo. “Abyākatānaṃ panāti sabbaṃ”ti abyākatānaṃ
anya-e0401n:214_57: pana abyākatabhāvo niranusaya santānappaṭi baddho, kammappaṭi baddho, avipākabhāvappaṭi
anya-e0401n:214_58: baddho cāti daṭṭhabbanti idaṃ sabbaṃ. “Vutta pakkhepatati yevā”ti tasmiṃ pakkhe antogadhamevāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:215_0: 132. Kiccasaṅgahe. Tasmiṃ parikkhīṇeti sambandho. “Kammassā”ti kammantarassa. Cutassa
anya-e0401n:215_1: sattassa abhinibbattīti sambandho. “Bhavantarādippaṭi sandhāna vasenā”ti bhavantarassa
anya-e0401n:215_2: ādikoṭiyā paṭisandhāna vasena. Bhavasantānassa pavattīti sambandho. Kathaṃ pavattīti
anya-e0401n:215_4: padhāna paccaya saṅkhātena aṅgabhāvena. Etena bhavaṅgapade aṅgasaddassa atthaṃ vadati.
anya-e0401n:215_5: Tenāha “tassahī”tiādiṃ. “Tassā”ti bhavaṅgassa. Āvajjanaṃ āvaṭṭananti eko vacanattho.
anya-e0401n:215_6: Taṃ vā āvajjetīti eko. “Taṃ”ti citta santānaṃ. Āvaṭṭati vā taṃ etthāti eko. Āvaṭṭati
anya-e0401n:215_7: vā taṃ etenāti eko. “Taṃ”ti citta santānaṃ. Āvajjeti vāti eko. “Voṭṭhabbanaṃ”ti vi-ava-ṭhapanaṃti
anya-e0401n:215_8: padacchedo. Vibhāvani vicāraṇāyaṃ. “Ekāvajjana parikamma cittato”ti maggena vā abhiññāya
anya-e0401n:215_9: vā ekaṃ samānaṃ āvajjanaṃ assāti viggaho. Tassaṃ vīthiyaṃ ‘āvajjanaṃ, parikammaṃ,
anya-e0401n:215_10: upacāro, anulomaṃ, gotrabhū,ti ettha parikamma javanacittaṃ idha parikamma cittanti
anya-e0401n:215_11: vuttaṃ. “Tānī”ti maggā bhiññājavanāni. “Tatthā”ti tasmiṃ vibhāvani pāṭhe. “Dīghaṃ
anya-e0401n:215_12: addhānaṃ”ti sakalarattiyaṃ vā sakala divasaṃ vā niddokkamana vasena dīghaṃ kālaṃ.
anya-e0401n:215_14: nāma visuṃ cittassa ārammaṇa bhūto eko paññatti dhammoti etena kālo nāma sabhāvato
anya-e0401n:215_15: avijjamānattā kathaṃ kiccānaṃ pavattiṭṭhānaṃ nāma sakkā bhavitunti imaṃ āsaṅkaṃ visodheti.
anya-e0401n:215_16: “Itarathā”ti tathā aggahetvā aññathā kiccaṭṭhānānaṃ abhede gahite satīti attho. “Sayaṃ
anya-e0401n:215_17: somanassa yuttaṃpī”ti kadāci sayaṃ somanassa yuttaṃpi. “Taṃ”ti somanassa santīraṇaṃ.
anya-e0401n:215_18: “Laddhapaccaya bhāvenā”ti laddhaanantara paccayabhāvena. “Āsevana bhāva rahitaṃ pī”ti
anya-e0401n:215_19: āsevana guṇa rahitampi. Tañhi āsevana paccaye paccayopi na hoti, paccayuppannampi
anya-e0401n:215_20: na hotīti. “Parikamma bhāvanā balena ca pavattattā”ti idaṃ phalasamāpatti vīthiyaṃ
anya-e0401n:216_0: 133. Dvārasaṅgahe. “Ādāsapaṭṭamayo”ti ādāsapaṭṭena pakato. “Dve evā”ti dve eva dvārāni.
anya-e0401n:216_1: “Dvāra sadisattā”ti nagara dvāra sadisattā. “Kammavisesa mahābhūta visesa siddhenā”ti
anya-e0401n:216_2: ettha kammavisesena ca mahābhūta visesena ca siddhoti viggaho. Āvajjanādīni ca vīthi
anya-e0401n:216_3: cittāni gaṇhanti. “Yamhī”ti yasmiṃ cakkhumhi. Tadeva cakkhu cakkhudvāraṃ nāmāti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:216_4: “Tesaṃ dvinnaṃ”ti rūpa nimittānañca āvajjanādi vīthicittānañca. “Visaya visayī bhāvūpagamanassā”ti
anya-e0401n:216_5: ettha rūpa nimittānaṃ visayabhāvassa upagamanaṃ nāma cakkhu maṇḍe āpātāgamanaṃ vuccati.
anya-e0401n:216_6: Āvajjanādīnaṃ visayī bhāvassa upagamanaṃ nāma tesaṃ nimittānaṃ ārammaṇa karaṇaṃ vuccati.
anya-e0401n:216_7: “Mukhappathabhūtattā”ti mukhamaggabhūtattā. Evaṃ dvāra saddassa karaṇa sādhanayuttiṃ
anya-e0401n:216_8: dassetvā idāni adhikaraṇa sādhana yuttiṃ dasseti “athavā”tiādinā. “Rūpānaṃ”ti rūpa
anya-e0401n:216_9: nimittānaṃ. “Cakkhumeva cakkhu dvāra”nti etena cakkhumeva dvāraṃ cakkhu dvāranti
anya-e0401n:216_10: avadhāraṇa samāsaṃ dasseti. “Kāraṇaṃ vuttamevā”ti heṭṭhā cittasaṅgahe manodvārāvajjanapade
anya-e0401n:216_11: vuttameva. Sabbaṃ ekūna navutividhaṃ cittaṃ manodvārameva nāma hoti. Tathāhi vuttaṃ
anya-e0401n:216_12: aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ ayaṃ nāmamano manodvāraṃ nāma na hotīti na vattabboti. “Upapatti dvāramevā”ti
anya-e0401n:216_13: upapattibhava pariyāpannaṃ kammajadvārameva. “Idha cā”ti imasmiṃ saṅgahaganthe ca.
anya-e0401n:216_14: Yañca sādhaka vacananti sambandho. “Tatthā”ti vibhāvaniyaṃ. “Tattheva taṃ yuttaṃ”ti
anya-e0401n:216_15: tasmiṃ pāḷippadese eva taṃ sādhaka vacanaṃ yuttaṃ. Itare dve paccayāti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:216_16: “Manañcāti etthā”ti manañca paṭicca dhamme ca uppajjati manoviññāṇaṃti vākye manañcātipade.
anya-e0401n:216_17: Tattha pana javana manoviññāṇassa uppattiyā catūsu paccayesu manañcāti ettha dvārabhūtaṃ
anya-e0401n:216_18: bhavaṅgamano ca āvajjana mano cāti dve paccayā labbhanti. Dhamme cāti pade dhammārammaṇa
anya-e0401n:216_19: saṅkhāto eko paccayo labbhati. Ca saddena manoviññāṇa sampayuttakkhandhā gayhanti.
anya-e0401n:216_20: Evaṃ cattāro paccayā honti. “Ettha cā”ti imasmiṃ aṭṭhakathā vacane. “Sannihita paccayānaṃ
anya-e0401n:216_21: eva tattha adhippetattā”ti paṭicca saddasāmatthiyena āsanne dharamānapaccayānaṃ eva
anya-e0401n:216_22: tasmiṃ pāḷivākye adhippetattā. “Dvārabhāvārahassā”ti visaya visayīnaṃ vutta nayena
anya-e0401n:216_23: pavatti mukhabhāvārahassa. Etena ārammaṇāni āpātaṃ āgacchantu vā, māvā, vīthi cittāni
anya-e0401n:216_24: pavattantuvā, māvā, appamāṇaṃ. Pabhassarappasannabhāvena dvārabhāvā rahatā eva pamāṇanti
anya-e0401n:216_25: dīpeti. “Niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ”ti sanniṭṭhānaṃ ettha gantabbaṃ. Dvāravikāra mūlakāni
anya-e0401n:216_26: tādisāni kiccāni yesaṃ tāni taṃ kiccavantāni. “Kammavasena sijjhantī”ti sattasantāne
anya-e0401n:216_27: pavattantīti adhippāyo. Taṃ kiccavantāni cittāni. Vibhāvani pāṭhe “manodvāra saṅkhāta
anya-e0401n:216_28: bhavaṅgato”ti manodvāra saṅkhāta bhavaṅga bhāvato ca. “Ārammaṇantaraggahaṇavasena
anya-e0401n:216_29: appavattito”ti paṭisandhi cittena yathā gahitaṃ kammakammanimittādikaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0401n:216_30: muñcitvā pavattikāle chasu dvāresu āpātāgatassa ārammaṇantarassa gahaṇa vasena appavattito
anya-e0401n:216_31: ca. Heṭṭhāpi pañcadvārā vajjana cakkhu viññāṇa sampaṭicchana santīraṇa voṭṭhabbana
anya-e0401n:216_32: kāmāvacarajavana tadā rammaṇa vasenātiādinā kiccasīseneva. La. Vutto. Etthahi āvajjana
anya-e0401n:216_33: sampaṭicchanādīni kicca visesānaṃ nāmāni honti. “Ce”ti ce vadeyya. “Nā”ti na vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:216_34: “Tathā assutattā”ti ekūna vīsati dvāra vimuttānīti ca, cha dvārikāni ceva dvāra vimuttānīti
anya-e0401n:216_35: ca, mahaggata vipākāni dvāra vimuttāne vāti ca, sutaṃ. Na pana dvārika vimuttānīti sutaṃ.
anya-e0401n:217_0: 134. Ārammaṇa saṅgahe. “Dubbala purisenā”ti gelaññābhibhūtattā vā jarābhibhūtattā
anya-e0401n:217_1: vā daṇḍena vā rajjukena vā vinā uṭṭhātumpi patiṭṭhātumpi aparāparaṃ gantumpi asakkontena
anya-e0401n:217_2: dubbala purisena daṇḍakaṃ vā rajjukaṃ vā ālambiyati. Ālambitvā uṭṭhāti. Patiṭṭhāti.
anya-e0401n:217_3: Aparāparaṃ gacchati. Evameva. Amuñca mānehi hutvāti pāṭhaseso. “Āgantvā”ti ārammaṇa
anya-e0401n:217_4: karaṇa vasena tato tato āgantvā. “Visuṃ siddhānī”ti ālambiyatīti etasmiṃ atthe sati,
anya-e0401n:217_5: ālambaṇanti sijjhati. Ārammaṇanti na sijjhati. Tāni ettha āgantvā ramantīti etasmiṃ
anya-e0401n:217_6: atthe sati, ārammaṇanti sijjhati. Ālambaṇanti na sijjhati. Evañca sati ekaṃ padaṃ
anya-e0401n:217_7: dvīhivākyehi dassanaṃ na sundaranti. “Aññāni ārammaṇānī”ti rūpārammaṇato aññāni saddārammaṇādīni.
anya-e0401n:217_8: “Āgacchatī”ti āvibhāvaṃ gacchati, uppādappavatti vasena paccakkhabhāvaṃ pāpuṇāti.
anya-e0401n:217_9: “Āgacchitthā”ti āvibhāvaṃ gacchittha, uppādappavatti vasena paccakkhabhāvaṃ pāpuṇittha.
anya-e0401n:217_10: “Anāgataṃ”ti ettha na kāro avatthā vasena paṭisedho. Yo dhammo paccaya sāmaggiyaṃ
anya-e0401n:217_11: sati āgamana jātiko uppajjana sīlo. So eva idāni āgacchati, idāni āgacchittha, idāni
anya-e0401n:217_12: āgamana jātiyaṃ ṭhito, nāgacchati nāgacchitthāti iminā atthena so anāgato nāma. Nibbāna
anya-e0401n:217_13: paññattiyo pana āgamana jātikā na honti. Tasmā āgamanappasaṅgābhāvato anāgatāti na
anya-e0401n:217_14: vuccantīti. Tenāha “uppāda jātikā”tiādiṃ. “Taṃ vicāretabbaṃ”ti vatvā vicāraṇākāraṃ
anya-e0401n:217_15: dasseti “sabbepihī”tiādinā. Te yadā vattabba pakkhe tiṭṭhantīti sambandho. Uppāda
anya-e0401n:217_16: jātikānaññeva saṅkhata dhammānaṃ. Tāsaṃ nibbāna paññattīnaṃ. “Na tathā imesaṃ”ti
anya-e0401n:217_17: imesaṃ dvāra vimuttānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ pana tathā na hotīti yojanā. “Tatthā”ti tasmiṃ
anya-e0401n:217_18: bhava visese. Vibhāvanipāṭhe “āvajjanassaviyā”ti āvajjanassa ārammaṇaṃ viya. Aggahitameva
anya-e0401n:217_19: hutvā. “Ekavajjana vīthiyaṃ aggahita bhāvo idha na pamāṇa”nti cha dvāraggahitanti
anya-e0401n:217_20: idha appamāṇaṃ. Bhavantare gahitassa adhippetattā. “Kālavimutta sāmaññaṃ”vāti yaṃ
anya-e0401n:217_21: kiñcikāla vimuttaṃ vā na hotīti adhippāyo. Āgamasiddhi vohāro nāma “kammanti vā,
anya-e0401n:217_22: kammanimittanti vā, gati nimittanti vā, pasiddho vohāro vuccati. Ajāta satturājā
anya-e0401n:217_23: saṅkiccajātakepi pitaraṃ māreti. Tasmā “dvīsubhavesū”ti vuttaṃ. “Cha hi dvārehī”ti
anya-e0401n:217_24: karaṇa bhūtehi chahi cakkhādi dvārehi. “Maraṇāsanna javanehī”ti kattu bhūtehi maraṇāsanne
anya-e0401n:217_25: pavattehi cha dvārika javanehi. “Anekaṃ sabhāvaṃ”ti anekanta bhāvaṃ. Yañhi ārammaṇanti
anya-e0401n:217_26: sambandho. “Kenaci dvārena aggahitameva hotī”ti ettha asaññī bhavato cutānaṃ sattānaṃ
anya-e0401n:217_27: kāmapaṭisandhiyā kammādi ārammaṇaṃ bhavantare kenaci dvārena aggahitanti yuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:217_28: Kasmā, tasmiṃ bhave kassacidvārasseva abhāvato. Arūpabhavato cutānaṃ pana kāmapaṭisandhiyā
anya-e0401n:217_29: gati nimitta sammataṃ ārammaṇaṃ kathaṃ bhavantare kenaci dvārena aggahitaṃ bhaveyya,
anya-e0401n:217_30: manodvāraggahitameva bhaveyyāti imaṃ codanaṃ visodhetuṃ “ettha ca yasmā paṭṭhāne”tiādi
anya-e0401n:217_31: vuttaṃ. Tato cutānaṃ sattānaṃ yā kāmapaṭisandhi, tassākāmapaṭi sandhiyā. Paccuppannaṃ
anya-e0401n:217_32: gatinimittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ etissāti viggaho. Kāmapaṭisandhi. Paresaṃ payoga balenāpi
anya-e0401n:217_33: kammādīnaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ nāma hotītiādinā yojetabbaṃ. “Suṭṭhu āsevitānaṃ”ti cirakālaṃ
anya-e0401n:217_34: saṅgha vatta cetiyavatta karaṇādivasena taṃ taṃ bhāvanā kammavasena ca suṭṭhu āsevitānaṃ
anya-e0401n:217_35: kammakammanimittānaṃ. “Hoti yevā”ti kammādīnaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ nāma hotiyeva. “Āgantvā”ti
anya-e0401n:217_36: imaṃ manussa lokaṃ āgantvā gaṇhantiyeva. Tadāpi nirayapālehi dassitaṃ taṃ taṃ gati
anya-e0401n:217_37: nimittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā cavanti. “Taṃ”ti revatiṃ nāma itthiṃ. Nanu nirayapālā nāma
anya-e0401n:217_38: tāvatiṃsā bhavanaṃ gantuṃ na sakkuṇeyyunti. No nasakkuṇeyyuṃ. Kasmā, mahiddhika yakkha
anya-e0401n:217_42: ārammaṇaṃ”ti tehi nimittārammaṇehi aññaṃ upacāra bhāvanā kammaṃ vā yaṃ kiñci anurūpaṃ
anya-e0401n:217_43: gati nimittaṃ vā. “Tāneva nimittāni gahetvā”ti vacanena tāni nimittāni maraṇāsanna
anya-e0401n:217_44: javanehi gahitānīti dasseti. Tāni ca paññatti dhammattā kāmapaṭisandhiyā ārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0401n:217_45: na hontīti. “Paccuppannagati nimitte siddhe siddhamevā”ti tasmiṃ bhave gatassa tattha
anya-e0401n:217_46: yāvajīvampi anu bhavitabbaṃ ārammaṇaṃ nāma tasmiṃ khaṇe dharamānaṃ paccuppannampi
anya-e0401n:217_47: atthi. Tato vaḍḍhamānaṃ anāgatampi atthi. Tattha paccuppanne upaṭṭhahante paṭisandhiyā
anya-e0401n:217_48: ārammaṇaṃ sampajjati. Anāgataṃ pana anupaṭṭhahantampi paccuppanne antogadhasadisaṃ
anya-e0401n:217_49: hotīti adhippāyo. Vibhāvani pāṭhena ca paccuppanna gatinimittaṃ viya āpātamāgataṃ,
anya-e0401n:217_50: kasmā, paccuppanna gati nimitteneva kicca siddhito-ti adhippāyo. Sesamettha subodhaṃ.
anya-e0401n:217_51: “Tānihī”tiādīsu. Keci vadanti. Anejosanti mārabbha. Yaṃ kālamakarīmunīti vuttattā
anya-e0401n:217_52: sabbaññu buddhādīnaṃ parinibbāna cuti cittaṃ santi lakkhaṇaṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karotīti.
anya-e0401n:217_53: Taṃ sabbathāpi kāmāvacarā lambaṇā nevāti iminā apanetabbanti dassetuṃ “tā nihi sabbaññu
anya-e0401n:217_54: buddhānaṃ uppannāni pī”tiādi vuttaṃ. “Lokuttara dhammā”tiādīsu. “Tānī”ti dvādasā
anya-e0401n:217_55: kusala cittāni aṭṭhañāṇa vippayutta kusala kriya javanāni ca. Ajjhāna lābhino puthujjanā
anya-e0401n:217_56: mahaggatajjhānānipi ālambituṃ na sakkontīti vuttaṃ “paññattiyā saha kāmāvacarā rammaṇānī”ti.
anya-e0401n:217_57: “Tāne vā”ti ñāṇa sampayutta kāma kusalāni eva. Jhānalābhīnaṃ tāneva ñāṇa sampayuttakāma
anya-e0401n:217_58: kusalāni. Heṭṭhima phalaṭṭhānaṃ tāneva attanā adhigata maggaphala nibbānā rammaṇāni.
anya-e0401n:217_59: “Jhānāni patthentī”ti āyatiṃ jhānalābhino bhaveyyāmāti patthanaṃ karonti. “Tesaṃ
anya-e0401n:217_60: pī”ti tesaṃ puthujjanānampi. “Te”ti te lokuttara dhammā. “Anubhontī”ti sampāpuṇanti.
anya-e0401n:217_61: “Navanipāte”ti aṅguttara nikāye navanipāte. Sesaṃ sabbaṃ suviññeyyameva.
anya-e0401n:218_0: 135. Vatthusaṅgahe. “Vatthū”ti nissaya viseso vuccati. Tāni nissaya vatthūni yesaṃ
anya-e0401n:218_1: tāni tabbatthukāni. “Tesañca saddo na yujjatī”ti tesaṃ vāde ca saddo na yujjati.
anya-e0401n:218_2: Na hi alutta ca kāraṃ dvanda padaṃ nāma atthīti. “Pubbapadesu ānetabbo”ti cakkhu
anya-e0401n:218_3: vatthu ca sotavatthu cātiādinā ānetabbo. Samāsa padaṃ na yujjati. Na hi samāsa padato
anya-e0401n:218_4: eka desaṃ aññattha ānetuṃ yujjatīti. Avibhattika niddeso nāma cakkhuṃ, sotaṃ, ghānaṃ,
anya-e0401n:218_5: jivhā, kāyo, hadayaṃ, vatthu cāti vattabbe pubbapadesu avibhattika niddeso. Evañcasati
anya-e0401n:218_6: vatthu saddo ca saddo ca pubbapadesu ānetuṃ labbhantīti. Kāmataṇhāya adhīnena āyattena
anya-e0401n:218_7: kāmāvacara kammena nibbattā kāmataṇhādhīna kamma nibbattā. “Rūpādīnaṃ paribhogo”ti
anya-e0401n:218_8: rūpādīnaṃ pañcakāmaguṇānaṃ paribhogo. “Parittakammaṃ pī”ti sabbaṃ kāmāvacara kammampi.
anya-e0401n:218_9: “Pūrayamānaṃ”ti paripūrentaṃ. Cakkhu dassanānuttariyaṃ nāma. Sotaṃ savanānuttariyaṃ
anya-e0401n:218_10: nāma. Sabbesaṃ dassana kiccānaṃ majjhe buddha dassanā divasena anuttaraṃ dassanaṃ
anya-e0401n:218_11: janetīti dassanānuttariyaṃ. Evaṃ savanānuttariyepi catusacca dhammassavanā divasenāti
anya-e0401n:218_12: vattabbaṃ. “Ajjhatta bahiddha santā nesu pī”ti ajjhatta santānepi bahiddha santānepi.
anya-e0401n:218_13: “Suddhe”ti kenaci ālokena ca andhakārena ca virahite. Āloko hi eko rūpa viseso. Tathā
anya-e0401n:218_14: andhakāro ca. Te ca tattha natthi. “Imasmiṃ saṅgahe”ti vatthu saṅgahe. Visiṭṭhaṃ
anya-e0401n:218_15: jānanaṃ vijānanaṃ. Tañca vijānanaṃ tīsu manodhātūsu natthīti vuttaṃ “vijānana kiccābhāvato”ti.
anya-e0401n:218_16: Āvajjana kiccaṃ kimetanti, manasikāra mattaṃ hoti. Sampaṭicchana kiccañca pañcaviññāṇehi
anya-e0401n:218_17: yathā gahitāneva pañcārammaṇāni sampaṭicchana mattaṃ hoti. Tenāha “visesajānana kiccāni
anya-e0401n:218_18: na hontī”ti. Dassanaṃ, savanaṃ, ghāyanaṃ, sāyanaṃ, phusana, nti imāni kiccāni thokaṃ
anya-e0401n:218_19: visesa jānana kiccāni hontīti vuttaṃ “paccakkhato dassanā divasenā”tiādiṃ. Thokaṃ
anya-e0401n:218_20: visesa jānana kiccāni honti. Tasmā tāni pañcaviññāṇānīti vuttāni. Avasesā pana santīraṇādayo
anya-e0401n:218_21: manoviññāṇadhātuyo nāmāti sambandho. Nanu mananaṭṭhena mano ca taṃ vijānanaṭṭhena
anya-e0401n:218_22: viññāṇañcāti vuttepi pañcaviññāṇehi viseso natthīti āha “atissaya visesa jānana dhātuyoti
anya-e0401n:218_23: attho”ti. Evaṃ santepi so attho saddayuttiyā siddho na hoti. Yadicchā vasena vutto
anya-e0401n:218_24: hotīti āha “pariyāya padānaṃ”tiādi. Etena so attho saddayuttiyā eva siddho. Na yadicchāvasena
anya-e0401n:218_25: vuttoti dasseti. “Visesana samāse”ti mano ca taṃ viññāṇañcāti manoviññāṇanti evarūpe
anya-e0401n:218_26: kammadhāraya samāse. “Padaṭṭhānaṃ”ti ettha padanti ca ṭhānanti ca kāraṇattha vacanāni,
anya-e0401n:218_27: tasmā pariyāya saddā nāma. Padañca taṃ ṭhānañcāti vutte atissaya kāraṇanti attho
anya-e0401n:218_28: viññāyati. Tathā dukkha dukkhaṃ, rūpa rūpaṃ, rāja rājā, devadevotiādīni. “Katthaci
anya-e0401n:218_29: dissati yujjati cā”ti na hi katthaci dissati ca. Sacepi katthaci disseyya, na hi
anya-e0401n:218_30: yujjati cāti attho. “Manaso viññāṇaṃ”ti ettha paṭisandhi cittato paṭṭhāya yāvacuti
anya-e0401n:218_31: cittā antare sabbaṃ citta santānaṃ satta viññāṇa dhātūnaṃ vasena vibhāgaṃ katvā attho
anya-e0401n:218_32: vattabbo. Pañcadvārā vajjanañca sampaṭicchana dvayañca manodhātu mattattā mano nāma.
anya-e0401n:218_33: Pañcaviññāṇāni viññāṇa mattāni nāma. Avasesāni sabbāni viññāṇāni manassa viññāṇanti
anya-e0401n:218_34: atthena manoviññāṇāni nāma. Tattha “manassa viññāṇaṃ”ti anantara paccaya bhūtassa
anya-e0401n:218_35: vā manassa paccayuppanna bhūtaṃ viññāṇaṃ. Ettha sampaṭicchana dvayaṃ paccayamano
anya-e0401n:218_36: nāma. Santīraṇato paṭṭhāya yāva dvārantare pañcadvārā vajjanaṃ nāgacchati, tāva antare
anya-e0401n:218_37: sabbaṃ manoviññāṇa santānaṃ paccayuppanna viññāṇaṃ nāma. Puna “manassa viññāṇa”nti
anya-e0401n:218_38: paccayuppanna bhūtassa manassa paccaya bhūtaṃ viññāṇaṃ. Ettha pañcadvārā vajjanaṃ
anya-e0401n:218_39: paccayuppanna mano nāma. Tato pure sabbaṃ manoviññāṇa santānaṃ paccaya mano nāma.
anya-e0401n:218_40: Sesaṃ suviññeyyaṃ. Avasesāpanātiādīsu. “Manoviññāṇadhātu bhāvaṃ sambhāvetī”ti avasesā
anya-e0401n:218_41: pana dhammā manoviññāṇadhātu ca nāma honti, hadaya vatthuñca nissāyayeva vattantīti
anya-e0401n:218_42: evaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ manoviññāṇadhātu bhāvañca sambhāveti, vaṇṇeti. Suṭṭhu pakāsetīti
anya-e0401n:218_43: attho. Ettha panātiādīsu. “Pāḷiyaṃ”ti indriya saṃyutta pāḷiyaṃ. Dutīyajjhāne eva
anya-e0401n:218_44: aparisesa nirodha vacanaṃ viruddhaṃ siyā. Kathaṃ, sace paṭigho anīvaraṇā vattho nāma
anya-e0401n:218_45: natthi. Pathamajjhānato pubbe eva so niruddho siyā. Atha dutīyajjhānupacārepi so
anya-e0401n:218_46: uppajjeyya, pathamajjhānampi parihīnaṃ siyā. Tasmiṃ parihīne sati, dutīyajjhānampi
anya-e0401n:218_47: nuppajjeyya. Evaṃ viruddhaṃ siyā. “Purima kāraṇamevā”ti anīvaraṇā vatthassa paṭighassa
anya-e0401n:218_48: abhāvatoti kāraṇaṃ eva. Paratoghoso nāma sāvakānaṃ sammādiṭṭhippaṭilābhāya padhāna
anya-e0401n:218_49: paccayo hoti. So ca arūpabhave natthi. Dhammābhisamayo nāma catusacca dhammappaṭivedho,
anya-e0401n:218_50: buddhā ca pacceka sambuddhā ca sayambhuno parato ghosena vinā dhammaṃ paṭivijjhanti.
anya-e0401n:218_51: Te ca tattha nuppajjanti. “Rūpavirāga bhāvanāyā”ti rūpavirāga bhāvanā balena. Tesaṃ
anya-e0401n:218_52: rūpāvacara cittānaṃ. “Samatikkantattā”ti tesu nikantippahānavasena suṭṭhu atikkantattā.
anya-e0401n:221_1: cittaṃ tāva catubbidhaṃ hoti kāmāvacaraṃ rūpāvacaraṃ, tiādinā iccevaṃ vuttappakārena.
anya-e0401n:221_2: “Pubbā paraniyāmitaṃ”ti vā dvattiṃsa sukha puññamhātiādinā nayena pubbā paraniyāmitaṃ. “Ārabbhagāthāyā”ti.
anya-e0401n:223: Pavatti saṅgaho nāma, sandhiyaṃ dāni vuccatī.ti
anya-e0401n:224_0: Evaṃ pavattikāle pavatti saṅgaho, paṭisandhikāle pavatti saṅgahoti siddho hoti. Keci
anya-e0401n:224_1: vāde “paṭisandhi pavattiyaṃ”ti niddhāraṇe gahite dvīsu paṭisandhi saṅgaha pavatti
anya-e0401n:224_2: saṅgahesu idāni pavatti saṅgahaṃ pavakkhāmi, pacchā paṭisandhi saṅgahaṃ pavakkhāmīti
anya-e0401n:224_3: attho hoti. Tattha “paṭisandhi saṅgaho”ti paṭisandhikāle saṅgaho. “Pavatti saṅgaho”ti
anya-e0401n:224_4: pavattikāle saṅgaho. So ca uparigāthāya na sametīti dassetuṃ “evaṃ satī”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n:224_5: “Tāni tīṇi chakkāni nikkhittānī”ti chakkamattāni nikkhittāni, na sakalaṃ. Vatthu
anya-e0401n:224_6: dvārā lambaṇa saṅgahoti adhippāyo. “Sā panā”ti sāvisayappavatti pana. “Kāci sīghatamā”ti
anya-e0401n:224_7: kāci atirekataraṃ sīghā. “Dandhā”ti saṇikā, cirāyikā. “Anupapannā”ti asampannā. Asampanna
anya-e0401n:224_8: doso āgacchatīti vuttaṃ hoti. “Dhātubhedaṃ”ti satta viññāṇa dhātūnaṃ vibhāgaṃ. “Dhātunānattaṃ”ti
anya-e0401n:224_9: dhāraṇa kiccanānattaṃ. Iti tasmā manodhātu visuṃ vuttāti sambandho. “Mananaṃ”ti vijānanabhāvaṃ
anya-e0401n:224_10: apattaṃ. Āvajjanamatta sampaṭicchanamatta saṅkhātaṃ jānanamattaṃ. “Yaṃ kiñci mananaṃ”ti
anya-e0401n:224_11: antamaso āvajjanamatta sampaṭicchanamattaṃ pīti adhippāyo. “Suddho pana manoviññāṇappabandho”ti
anya-e0401n:224_12: manodvāra vikāraṃ paṭicca pavatto manoviññāṇappabandho. Na bhavaṅga manoviññāṇappabandho.
anya-e0401n:224_13: So hi vīthimuttattā idha appasaṅgoti. Manodvāre pana dvidhāti sambandho. Buddhassa
anya-e0401n:224_14: bhagavato pathamābhinīhārakālo nāma sumedhatāpasakāle buddha bhāvāya kāya cittānaṃ
anya-e0401n:224_15: abhinīhārakālo. Ādisaddena pacchima bhave paṭisandhiggahaṇādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. “Jāti
anya-e0401n:224_16: phalikakkhandhā viya sampajjantī”ti tena obhāsena ajjhotthaṭattā jātiphalikakkhandha
anya-e0401n:224_17: sadisā hontīti adhippāyo. “Upapatti deva brahmānaṃ panā”ti upapattippaṭisandhikānaṃ
anya-e0401n:224_18: opapātika deva brahmānaṃ pana. “Pasāda nissaya bhūtānaṃ”ti cakkhādīnaṃ pasāda vatthūnaṃ
anya-e0401n:225_0: “Yāni panā”tiādīsu. Dvatti cittakkhaṇāni atikkamma āpātaṃ āgacchantīti yojanā. Evaṃ
anya-e0401n:225_1: paratthapi. Vibhūtassāti ca avibhūtassāti ca idaṃ ādimhi manodvāre pana vibhūtassāti
anya-e0401n:225_2: ca avibhūtassāti ca padānaṃ uddharaṇaṃ. “Rūpā rūpānaṃ”ti rūpa dhammānañca arūpa dhammānañca.
anya-e0401n:225_3: “Tāvā”ti vīthi cittappavatti dassanato pathamataraṃ evāti attho. “Addhāna paricchedaṃ”ti
anya-e0401n:225_4: khaṇakāla paricchedaṃ. Vibhāvanipāṭhe “atimahantā divasena visaya vavatthānaṃ hotī”ti
anya-e0401n:225_5: vacanena ādimhi ‘chavatthūni, cha dvārāni, cha ārammaṇāni, cha viññāṇāni, cha vīthiyo,
anya-e0401n:225_6: cha dhāvisayappavattī,ti evaṃ vuttesu chasu chakkesu chadhāvisayappavattīti padamattaṃ
anya-e0401n:225_7: saṅgaṇhāti. Taṃ anupapannaṃ hoti. Tenāha “evañhi satī”tiādiṃ. “Visaya vavatthānattha
anya-e0401n:225_8: mevā”ti atimahantādi visaya vavatthānatthameva vuttanti na ca sakkā vattuṃ. Rūpā
anya-e0401n:225_9: rūpa dhammānaṃ addhāna paricchedo nāma abhidhamme sabbattha icchitabbo. Tasmā tassa
anya-e0401n:225_10: dassanatthampi taṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Sabhāvappaṭilābho”ti cintana phusanādīnaṃ
anya-e0401n:225_11: pātubhāvo vuccati. “Anivattī”ti anantaradhānaṃ vuccati. “Parihāyitvā”ti jarā kiccaṃ
anya-e0401n:225_13: nāma abhidhamma ṭīkākāro vuccati. “Assā vijjuyāṭhiti nāma visuṃ na paññāyatī”ti vijjuppādaṃ
anya-e0401n:225_14: passantānaṃ na paññāyati. Tathā cittampi vaḍḍhanānantarameva bhijjatīti yojanā. Tenāha
anya-e0401n:225_15: “taṃ pī”tiādiṃ. Udayabhāgo nāma vaḍḍhanabhāgo, vayabhāgo nāma antaradhānabhāgo. “Evañca
anya-e0401n:225_16: katvā”ti laddhaguṇa vacanaṃ. “Ekaṃcittaṃ divasaṃ tiṭṭhatī”ti pucchā vacanaṃ. “Āmantā”ti
anya-e0401n:225_17: paṭiññā vacanaṃ. “Vayakkhaṇo”ti pucchā. “Na hevaṃ vattabbe”ti paṭikkhepo. Paccatta
anya-e0401n:225_18: vacanassa ekārattaṃ. Evaṃ navattabbanti attho. “Mahātherenā”ti moggali puttatissa
anya-e0401n:225_19: mahātherena. Nanu suttantesu vuttanti sambandho. “Nā”ti na upalabbhati. “Imassa vuttattā”ti
anya-e0401n:225_20: imassa vacanassa vuttattā. Saṅkhata lakkhaṇaṃ visayo yesaṃ tāni saṅkhata visaya lakkhaṇāni.
anya-e0401n:225_21: Saṅkhata dhammameva āhacca tiṭṭhati. Ayaṃ abhidhamme dhammatāti adhippāyo. “Saṅgaha
anya-e0401n:225_22: kārenā”ti ācariya buddhaghosattheraṃ vadati. “Atthikkhaṇaṃ”ti khaṇadvayameva vuccati.
anya-e0401n:225_23: Iti vatvā tamatthaṃ sādhentīti sambandho. Gāthāyaṃ. “Tassevā”ti tassā ṭhitiyā eva
anya-e0401n:225_24: bhedo. Sabbadā sabbapāṇinaṃ maraṇaṃ nāma vuccatīti yojanā. “Tamatthaṃ”ti tāni atthikkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0401n:225_25: upādāya labbhantīti atthaṃ. “Athavā”ti eko theravādo. “Santati vasena ṭhānaṃ”ti ṭhitāya
anya-e0401n:225_26: aññathattaṃ paññāyatīti ettha ṭhitabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ ṭhānaṃ santati ṭhitivasena veditabbanti
anya-e0401n:225_27: vadanti. “Imasmiṃ pana sutte”ti vedanāya uppādo paññāyati, vayo paññāyati, ṭhitāya
anya-e0401n:225_28: aññathattaṃ paññāyatīti idaṃ suttaṃ vadati. “Appaṭibāhetvā”ti anīvāretvā. Yāvaḍḍhanassa
anya-e0401n:225_29: nivatti nāma atthi. Udaya pariyanta mattabhūtā sā eva nivatti. “Dvīhi khandhehī”ti
anya-e0401n:225_30: rūpa jarā rūpakkhandhena saṅgahitā. Arūpa jarā saṅkhārakkhandhenāti evaṃ dvīhi khandhehi.
anya-e0401n:225_31: Yañca tattha vuttanti sambandho. Rūpassa uppādo dvidhābhinditvā desito. Kathaṃ, upacayo
anya-e0401n:225_32: santatī tiyojanā. “Vibhāgā rahassā”ti uppādo uppajja naṭṭhena eko samāno rūpānaṃ
anya-e0401n:225_33: vaḍḍhana samaye uppādo. Upari vaḍḍhanaṭṭhena upacayoti vutto. Avaḍḍhitvā ṭhita samaye
anya-e0401n:225_34: uppādo yathā ṭhita nīhārena cirakālaṃ pavatti atthena santatīti vutto. Evaṃ vibhāgā
anya-e0401n:225_35: rahassa. “Yathānuloma sāsanaṃ”ti vinetabba puggalānaṃ ajjhāsayānuloma sāsanaṃ.
anya-e0401n:226_0: “Arūpa”ntiādīsu. “Arūpaṃ”ti sabbaso rūpasaṇṭhāna rahitattā citta cetasikaṃ nāmaṃ
anya-e0401n:226_1: vuccati. “Arūpi sabhāvattā”ti arūpa dhamma sabhāvattā iccevattho. Tattha arūpa dhamma
anya-e0401n:226_3: nipāṭhe. “Gāhaka gahetabba bhāvassa taṃ taṃ khaṇavasena nipphajjanato”ti ettha pañcadvāra
anya-e0401n:226_4: vīthīsu vīthi cittānañca ārammaṇānañca visayī visayabhāvo gāhaka gahetabba bhāvo
anya-e0401n:226_5: nāma. “Taṃ taṃ khaṇavasena nipphajjanato”ti vīthi cittāni ca ekasmiṃ ārammaṇepi āvajjanādīhi
anya-e0401n:226_6: nānā kiccehi gaṇhantā eva gahaṇa kiccaṃ sampādenti. Nānā kiccāni ca nānā cittānaṃ
anya-e0401n:226_7: vasena sampajjanti. Ārammaṇāni ca purejātāni hutvā yāva tāni kiccāni sampajjanti,
anya-e0401n:226_8: tāva paccuppannabhāvena dharamānāni eva gahaṇaṃ sampādenti. Evaṃ sati, gāhakānaṃ
anya-e0401n:226_9: vīthi cittānañca khaṇattayāyukattā eva gāhaka kiccaṃ nipphajjati, sijjhati. Gahetabbānaṃ
anya-e0401n:226_10: ārammaṇānañca sattarasa cittakkhaṇāyukattā eva gahetabba kiccaṃ nipphajjati, sijjhati.
anya-e0401n:226_11: Evaṃ taṃ taṃ khaṇa vasena nipphajjanato. Viññatti dvayaṃ eka cittakkhaṇikaṃ. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n:226_12: cittānu parivatti dhammattā. “Uppādamattā”ti nipphanna rūpānaṃ uppādamattā. “Bhaṅgamattā”ti
anya-e0401n:226_13: tesameva bhaṅgamattā. “Rūpa dhammānaṃ”ti nipphanna rūpa dhammānaṃ. “Uppādanirodha
anya-e0401n:226_14: vidhānassā”ti uppāda nirodha vidhānabhūtassa mahāaṭṭhakathāvādassa paṭisiddhattāti
anya-e0401n:226_15: sambandho. “Taṃ”ti taṃ mahāaṭṭhakathā vacanaṃ. “Tasmiṃ vāde”ti tasmiṃ mahāaṭṭhakathāvāde.
anya-e0401n:226_16: “Tattha āgatā”ti tasmiṃ vāde āgatā. Yaṃ pana vibhāvaniyaṃ kāraṇaṃ vuttanti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:226_17: “Taṃ ṭīkānayaṃ”ti taṃ soḷasa cittakkhaṇāyuka dīpakaṃ mūlaṭīkānayaṃ. Tadatthaṃ sādhentena
anya-e0401n:226_18: vibhāvani ṭīkācariyena vuttanti sambandho. Saṅgahakārassa aṭṭhakathā cariyassa. “Upacarīyatī”ti
anya-e0401n:226_19: upacāra vasena voharīyati. Vibhāvanipāṭhe. “Etānī”ti ārammaṇāni. “Taṃ”ti taṃ eka
anya-e0401n:226_20: cittakkhaṇaṃ. “Te cā”ti rūpa dhammā ca. “Paripuṇṇa paccayūpaladdhā”ti paripuṇṇaṃ
anya-e0401n:226_22: pañcadvārika cittānaṃ gocarabhāvaṃ. “Purimāni dve”ti rūpasaddā rammaṇāni. “Nimitta
anya-e0401n:226_23: vasena ghaṭṭentī”ti ādāsaṃ passantassa mukhasadisaṃ mukhanimittaṃ mukhappaṭibimbaṃ
anya-e0401n:226_24: ādāse upaṭṭhāti. Evaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ cakkhupasāde saddārammaṇañca sotapasāde taṃ sadisa
anya-e0401n:226_25: nimitta vasena ghaṭṭenti. Navatthu vasena ghaṭṭenti. Sayaṃ gantvā na ghaṭṭentīti
anya-e0401n:226_26: adhippāyo. Asampattānaññeva ārammaṇānaṃ. “Nimittu paṭṭhāna vasenā”ti nimittassa upaṭṭhānavasena.
anya-e0401n:226_27: “Nimitta appanāvasenā”ti nimittassa pavesana vasena. Manodvāre pana asampattāniyeva
anya-e0401n:226_29: “Lañchanakkhandhaṃ”ti ayomayaṃ lañchanakkhandhaṃ. So ca lañchanakkhandho tālapaṇṇe
anya-e0401n:226_31: cakkhādīnaṃ visayakkhette. Na kevalaṃ attano dvāresu eva āpāta māgacchanti. Atha
anya-e0401n:226_32: kho manodvārepi āpāta māgacchanti. Na kevalaṃ bhavaṅga manodvāre eva āpāta māgacchantīti
anya-e0401n:226_33: yojanā. “Tesu panā”ti tesu ārammaṇesu pana. Tāni ārammaṇāni yesaṃ tāni tadā rammaṇāni.
anya-e0401n:226_34: Na ekakkhaṇe pañcasu ārammaṇesu vīthi cittāni pavattanti, ekekasmiṃ ārammaṇe evāti
anya-e0401n:226_35: vuttattā na dvīsu, na tīsu, na catūsūtipi vattabbaṃ. Bahucittakkhaṇātītāni pañcārammaṇāni
anya-e0401n:226_36: bahucittakkhaṇātīte pañcadvāreti yojanā. Pañcadvāreti ca pañcadvāresūti attho. “Evaṃ
anya-e0401n:226_37: satī”ti tesaṃ pasādānaṃ āvajjanena saddhiṃ uppattiyā sati. “Ādilakkhaṇaṃ”ti pañcārammaṇānaṃ
anya-e0401n:226_38: pañcadvāresu āpātā gamana saṅkhātaṃ visayappavattiyā ādilakkhaṇaṃ. Calanañca daṭṭhabbanti
anya-e0401n:226_39: sambandho. “Yathā gahitaṃ”ti paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya gahitappakāraṃ. Vibhāvanipāṭhe
anya-e0401n:226_40: “yogya desāvaṭṭhāna vasenā”ti āpātaṃ āgantuṃ yuttaṭṭhāne aveccaṭṭhāna vasena. Yujjanañca,
anya-e0401n:226_41: manthanañca, khobhakaraṇañca, ghaṭṭananti ca āpātā gamananti ca vuccatīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:226_42: Heṭṭhā vuttoyeva āpātā gamanañcetthātiādinā. “Nānā ṭhāniyesū”ti nānā ṭhānesu ṭhitesu.
anya-e0401n:226_43: “Eko dhammaniyāmo nāmā”ti yathā bodhisatte mātukucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhante dhammaniyāma
anya-e0401n:226_44: vasena sakale jātikkhette pathavikampanaṃ ahosi. Tathā idhapi pañcadvāresu ekekasmiṃ
anya-e0401n:226_45: dvāre ārammaṇe ghaṭṭente dhammaniyāma vasena bhavaṅga calanaṃ hoti. Ayaṃ dhammaniyāmo
anya-e0401n:226_46: nāma. “Sahevā”ti ekatoyeva. Kathaṃ hadaya vatthu nissitassa bhavaṅgassa calanaṃ siyāti
anya-e0401n:226_47: yojanā. Ettha ca pañcaviññāṇassa calanaṃ siyāti idaṃ na vattabbaṃ. Kasmā, tadā pañcaviññāṇassa
anya-e0401n:226_48: avijjamānattā. Yadā ca taṃ vijjati, tadā taṃ na calatīti na vattabbaṃ. Sabbampi hi
anya-e0401n:226_49: vīthicittaṃ nāma calati yevāti. Santati nāma pubbā parappabandho. Saṇṭhānaṃ nāma
anya-e0401n:226_50: sahappavattānaṃ ekato ṭhiti. Idha saṇṭhānaṃ adhippetaṃ. Pañcanissaya mahābhūtehi
anya-e0401n:226_51: saddhiṃ hadaya vatthu nissayabhūtānaṃ eka saṇṭhāna bhāvena ekābaddhattāti vuttaṃ
anya-e0401n:226_52: hoti. Tenāha “saṇṭhāna vasenāti pana vattabbaṃ”ti. “Tādisassa anukkama calanassā”ti
anya-e0401n:226_53: vibhāvaniyaṃ bherisakkharopamāya saddhiṃ rūpādinā pasāde ghaṭṭite tannissa yesu mahābhūtesu
anya-e0401n:226_54: calitesu anukkamena taṃ sambandhānaṃ sesarūpānampi calanena hadaya vatthumhi calite
anya-e0401n:226_55: tannissitassa bhavaṅgassa calanā kārena pavattitotīti evaṃ vuttassa anukkama calanassa.
anya-e0401n:226_57: idamevāti sanniṭṭhāpentaṃ. “Yoni somanasikārādivasenā”ti yoni somanasikāro kusala
anya-e0401n:226_58: javanuppattiyā paccayo. Ayoni somanasikāro akusala javanuppattiyā paccayo. Niranusaya
anya-e0401n:226_59: santānatā kriyajavanuppattiyā paccayo. Tesu ca somanassa javanādīnaṃ uppatti paccayopi
anya-e0401n:227_1: tadārammaṇato ca muñcitvā visuṃ kriyāmaya byāpārena ārammaṇantaraṃ gahetvā uṭṭhitaṃ
anya-e0401n:227_2: samuṭṭhitaṃ. Bhavaṅga calanampi uṭṭhānassa ādi hoti. Tasmā tampi uṭṭhite citta santāne
anya-e0401n:227_3: saṅgaṇhanto pathama bhavaṅga calanatoyeva vāti vuttaṃ. “Imasmiṃ ṭhāne”ti vīthi cittānaṃ
anya-e0401n:227_6: Makkaṭasuttopamā, ucchuyantopamā, jaccandhopamā. Tāsabbāpi aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ vipākuddhāra
anya-e0401n:227_7: kathāto gahetabbā. “Yatthahī”tiādīsu. “Kathaṃ cha chakka yojanā hotī”ti. Cakkhu vatthu
anya-e0401n:227_8: vacanañca, cakkhudvāra vacanañca, rūpā rammaṇa vacanañca, cakkhu viññāṇa vacanañca,
anya-e0401n:227_9: cakkhudvāra vīthi cakkhu viññāṇa vīthi vacanañca, atimahantā rammaṇa vacanañcā,ti
anya-e0401n:227_10: etāni chavacanāni. Tehi chachakkehi āharitvā imissaṃ vīthiyaṃ dassitāni. Sesavīthīsupi
anya-e0401n:227_11: yathālābhaṃ dassitabbāni. Evaṃ chachakkayojanā hoti. “Ettha ca yattakānī”tiādīsu.
anya-e0401n:227_12: “Ekūna paññāsa parimāṇesū”ti ekassanipphanna rūpadhammassa ekapaññāsa mattesu khuddakakkhaṇesu
anya-e0401n:227_13: uppādakkhaṇañca bhaṅgakkhaṇañca ṭhapetvā majjhe ekūna paññāsa mattāni ṭhitikkhaṇāni
anya-e0401n:227_14: santi. Tesu khaṇesu anukkamena uppannā ekūna paññāsa cakkhu pasādā ca santi. “Kismiñcī”ti
anya-e0401n:227_15: tesu katarasmiṃ nāma cakkhu pasāde na ghaṭṭentīti na vattabbāni. “Tesu panā”ti niddhāraṇe
anya-e0401n:227_16: bhummavacanaṃ. “Yadeva ekaṃ cakkhū”ti niddhāraṇīyaṃ. Taṃ pana katamanti. Atīta bhavaṅgena
anya-e0401n:227_17: saddhiṃ uppajjitvā taṃ atikkamma bhavaṅga calanakkhaṇe laddhaghaṭanaṃ ekaṃ cakkhu.
anya-e0401n:227_18: Taṃ pana cakkhu viññāṇassa vatthu bhāvañca dvārabhāvañca sādheti. Sesaviññāṇānaṃ
anya-e0401n:227_19: dvārabhāvaṃ sādhetīti. Tenāha “yathārahaṃ”ti. Etadeva etaṃ eva cakkhu kicca sādhanaṃ
anya-e0401n:227_20: nāma hoti vīthi cittuppattiyā vatthu kiccadvāra kiccānaṃ sādhanato. “Yaṃ majjhimāyukaṃ”ti
anya-e0401n:227_21: mandāyuka amandāyukānaṃ majjhe pavattattā yaṃ majjhimāyukanti vadanti. Taṃ kicca
anya-e0401n:227_22: sādhanaṃ nāmāti yojanā. “Itarāni panā”ti ekūna paññāsa parimāṇesu cakkhu pasādesūti
anya-e0401n:227_23: vuttāni, tesu ekaṃ kicca sādhanaṃ ṭhapetvā sesāni itarāni aṭṭha cattālīsa cakkhūni
anya-e0401n:227_24: moghavatthūni nāma honti. Rūpā rammaṇehi saddhiṃ laddha ghaṭṭanānampi sataṃ vīthi
anya-e0401n:227_25: cittuppattiyā vatthu kiccadvāra kiccarahitattā. Tesu katamāni mandāyukāni nāmāti
anya-e0401n:227_26: āha “tāni panā”tiādiṃ. Kicca sādhanato purimāni nāma atīta bhavaṅgato pure terasasu
anya-e0401n:227_27: bhavaṅgesu ādi bhavaṅgassa bhaṅgakkhaṇato paṭṭhāya khaṇe khaṇe uppannā sattatiṃsa
anya-e0401n:227_28: cakkhu pasādā. Tāni mandāyukānīti vadanti. Kasmā, kicca sādhanato appatarāyukattā.
anya-e0401n:227_29: Kicca sādhanato pacchimāni nāma atīta bhavaṅgassa ṭhitikkhaṇato paṭṭhāya khaṇe khaṇe
anya-e0401n:227_30: uppannā ekādasa cakkhu pasādā, tāni amandāyukānīti vadanti. Kasmā, kicca sādhanato
anya-e0401n:227_31: bahutarāyukattā. Tadubhayānipi aṭṭha cattālīsa mattāni veditabbānīti sambandho. “Tato”ti
anya-e0401n:227_32: tehi aṭṭhacattālīsa mattehi. “Purimatarānī”ti sattatiṃsa mandāyukehi purimatarāni.
anya-e0401n:227_33: Tāni hi cakkhu viññāṇassa uppādakkhaṇe ṭhiti bhāvena anupaladdhattā idha na gahitāni.
anya-e0401n:227_34: “Pacchimatarānī”ti ekādasa amandāyukehi pacchimatarāni. Tāni ca cakkhu viññāṇassa
anya-e0401n:227_35: uppādakkhaṇe uppannānipi tasmiṃ khaṇe ṭhiti bhāvena anupaladdhattā idha na gahitāni.
anya-e0401n:227_36: Kasmā pana cakkhuviññāṇassa uppādakkhaṇe ṭhiti bhāvena anupaladdhāni tadubhayāni
anya-e0401n:227_37: idha na gahitānīti. Cakkhu viññāṇassa uppādakkhaṇe ṭhiti bhāvena dharamānānaṃ aṭṭhacattālīsa
anya-e0401n:227_38: mattānaṃ cakkhūnaṃ majjhe eva katamaṃ cakkhu cakkhu viññāṇassa vatthu kicca dvāra
anya-e0401n:227_39: kiccaṃ sādhetīti āsaṅkitabbaṃ hoti. Ettha ca pañca vatthūni nāma attano ṭhitikkhaṇe
anya-e0401n:227_40: eva pañcaviññāṇānaṃ vatthudvāra kicca sādhakattā cakkhu viññāṇassa uppādakkhaṇe ṭhiti
anya-e0401n:227_41: bhāvena anupaladdhattā idha na gahitānīti ca, cakkhu viññāṇassa uppādakkhaṇe ṭhiti
anya-e0401n:228_0: “Ettha siyā”tiādīsu. “Imāya vīthiyā”ti imāya atimahantā rammaṇa vīthiyā. “Samudāyaggāhikā”ti
anya-e0401n:228_3: viyā”ti rattandhakāre eko alātaṃ gahetvā paribbhamati. Añño taṃ passanto cakkaṃ viya
anya-e0401n:228_4: maññati. Tattha alātassa gatagataṭṭhāne paccuppannaṃ rūpaṃ ārabbha cakkhudvāra vīthiyo
anya-e0401n:228_5: uppajjanti. Manodvāra vīthiyo pana purima purimāhi cakkhudvāra vīthīhi gahitāni atīta
anya-e0401n:228_6: rūpāni amuñcitvā ekato saṇṭhānañca santatiñca katvā gaṇhanti. Tadā passantassa cakkaṃ
anya-e0401n:228_7: viya upaṭṭhāti. Evaṃ ayaṃ samudāyaggāhikā daṭṭhabbā. “Natthi tadārammaṇuppādo”tiādīsu.
anya-e0401n:228_8: “Yassā”ti yassa ārammaṇassa. Cittānīti ca nānārammaṇānīti ca kammapadāni. Avasese
anya-e0401n:228_9: tasmiṃ ārammaṇe. “Saṅgaha kārenā”ti porāṇa aṭṭhakathāyo ekato saṅgahetvā katattā
anya-e0401n:228_10: buddhaghosattherena katā sabbā aṭṭhakathāyo saṅgahaṭṭhakathā nāma. So ca saṅgaha
anya-e0401n:228_11: kāroti vuccati. “Idha pī”ti imasmiṃ abhidhammattha saṅgahepi. “Therenā”ti anuruddhattherena.
anya-e0401n:228_12: “Ekampi icchati yevā”ti. “Yassa hi cattārī”tiādīsu yassa ārammaṇassa cattāri vā pañcavā
anya-e0401n:228_14: anuppajjitvāti padassa parato ‘yaṃ pavattatī’ti attano padhāna kriyāpadaṃ atthi.
anya-e0401n:228_15: Tena attano kriyāpadena saddhinti attho. “Katthaci vuttā”ti katthaci saddaganthesu
anya-e0401n:228_16: vuttā. Api ca, hetumhi tvāpaccayo lakkhaṇe hetumhi ca mānanta paccayā jotanīyaṭṭhena
anya-e0401n:228_17: vuttā, na vacanīyaṭṭhenāti daṭṭhabbā. “Pakati niyāmenā”ti etena paccaya visesesati,
anya-e0401n:228_18: cattāri vā pañcavā chavā javanāni uppajjantīti dīpeti. Tenāha “etthapanā”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:228_20: tikkhattuṃ vā”ti. “Voṭṭhabbanassa āsevanatā”ti āsevana paccayatāvā paccayuppannatāvā.
anya-e0401n:228_21: “Āvajjanāyā”ti ettha voṭṭhabbana kiccaṃ āvajjanampi saṅgaṇhāti. Idhapi ārammaṇa dubbalatāya
anya-e0401n:228_22: catuppañca javanuppatti icchi tabbāti yojanā. Tattha “idha pī”ti imasmiṃ parittā
anya-e0401n:228_23: rammaṇa vārepi. Tivoṭṭhabbanikā pañca parittā rammaṇa vīthiyoti yojanā. “Itarānī”ti
anya-e0401n:228_24: paritta mahantāti mahantā rammaṇāni. “Ubhayathāpī”ti āpātā gamana vasenapi ārammaṇa
anya-e0401n:229_2: yasmiṃ bhavaṅge. “Pañcadvārānu bandhakaṃ”ti pañcadvāra vīthi anugataṃ. Atītaṃ ālambaṇaṃ
anya-e0401n:229_3: pavatteti yevāti sambandho. “Yathāpātā gatamevā”ti pakatiyā āpātā gatappakārameva.
anya-e0401n:229_4: “Tathā tathā”ti diṭṭha sambandhādinā tena tena pakārena. “Kiñcī”ti kiñci ārammaṇaṃ.
anya-e0401n:229_5: “Disvā”ti paccakkhaṃ katvā. Pañcadvāraggahitañhi ārammaṇaṃ paccakkhakataṭṭhena diṭṭhanti
anya-e0401n:229_6: vuccati. Yaṃ kiñci ārammaṇaṃ. “Anumānentassā”ti evameva bhavittha, bhavissati, bhavatīti
anya-e0401n:229_7: anumānaññāṇena cintentassa. Taṃ sadisaṃ ārammaṇaṃ. “Parassa saddahanā”ti paravacanaṃ
anya-e0401n:229_8: sutvā yathā ayaṃ vadati, tathe vetanti saddahanā. “Diṭṭhi” vuccati ñāṇaṃ vā laddhi
anya-e0401n:229_9: vā. “Nijjhānaṃ”ti suṭṭhu olokanaṃ. “Khantī”ti khamanaṃ sahanaṃ. Aññathattaṃ agamanaṃ.
anya-e0401n:229_10: Diṭṭhiyā nijjhānaṃ diṭṭhinijjhānaṃ. Diṭṭhinijjhānassa khanti diṭṭhinijjhānakkhanti.
anya-e0401n:229_11: “Sesaṃ”ti nānākamma balenātiādikaṃ. “Devato pasaṃhāravasenā”ti devatā kadāci kesañci
anya-e0401n:229_12: supinante nānārammaṇāni upasaṃharitvā dassenti. Evaṃ devato pasaṃhāra vasenāpi. Anubodho
anya-e0401n:229_13: nāma lokiyaññāṇa vasena catussacca dhammānaṃ anubujjhanaṃ. Paṭivedho nāma lokuttaraññāṇa
anya-e0401n:229_14: kiccaṃ. Ananta rūpa nissaya paccayaggahaṇena pakatū panissaya paccayampi upalakkheti.
anya-e0401n:229_15: Citta santānassa anantarūpanissaya paccayabhāvo nāmāti sambandho. Ananta rūpa nissaya
anya-e0401n:229_16: paccayasatti nāma anantara parampara vippharaṇavasena mahāgatikā hotīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:229_17: Ananta rūpa nissaya paccayānu bhāvotipi yujjati. Kathaṃ mahāvipphāroti āha “sakiṃ
anya-e0401n:229_18: pī”tiādiṃ. “Suṭṭhu āsevitvā”ti ettha pacchā appamussamānaṃ katvā punappunaṃ sevanaṃ
anya-e0401n:229_19: suṭṭhu āsevanaṃ nāma. Na kevalaṃ purima citta santānassa so upanissaya paccayānubhāvo
anya-e0401n:229_20: eva mahāvipphāro hoti. Pakatiyā cittassa vicitta bhāva saṅkhātaṃ cintanā kiccampi
anya-e0401n:229_21: mahāvipphāraṃ hotīti dassetuṃ “cittañca nāmā”tiādivuttaṃ. Kathaṃ mahāvipphāraṃ hotīti
anya-e0401n:229_22: āha “kiñci nimittaṃ”tiādiṃ. “Kiñci nimittaṃ”ti diṭṭhādīsu nānā rammaṇesu kiñci appamattakaṃ
anya-e0401n:229_23: diṭṭhādikaṃ ārammaṇa nimittaṃ. “Tehi cakāraṇehī”ti tehi kattubhūtehi diṭṭhādīhi kāraṇehi.
anya-e0401n:229_25: cittassa ārammaṇaṃ nāma avibhūtaṃ hoti. Bhavaṅgaṃ cāletvā āvajjanaṃ niyojetīti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:229_26: “Laddha paccayesū”ti ālokādivasena vā diṭṭhādivasena vā laddha paccayavantesu. Tadabhininnākāro
anya-e0401n:229_27: nāma niccakālampi tesu ārammaṇesu abhimukhaṃ ninnākāro. Tena ākārena pavatto manasikāro.
anya-e0401n:229_28: Tena sampayuttassa. Etehi vacanehi suddhamanodvāre ārammaṇānaṃ apātāgamanañca bhavaṅga
anya-e0401n:229_29: calanañca na kevalaṃ laddha paccayānaṃ ārammaṇānaṃ vaseneva hoti. Tādisena pana manasikārena
anya-e0401n:229_30: yuttassa sayañca vīthi citta cintanā kiccassa cittassa vasenāpi hotīti siddhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:229_31: Na hi ārammaṇantare abhininnākāro nāma natthīti sakkā vattuṃ. Kasmā, abhāvita cittānaṃ
anya-e0401n:229_32: pamāda bahulānaṃ janānaṃ kadāci karahaci bhāvanā manasikāre karīyamānepi vīthi citta
