anya-e0401n:229_33: santānassa bahiddhā nānārammaṇesu abhininnākārassa sandissanatoti. “Yathā cetthā”ti
anya-e0401n:229_34: yathā ettha manodvāre rūpārūpa sattānaṃ vibhūtā rammaṇepi tadā rammaṇuppādo natthi,
anya-e0401n:229_35: evanti yojanā. Ñāṇavibhaṅgaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana voṭṭhabbanavāropi āgato. Yathāha supineneva
anya-e0401n:229_36: diṭṭhaṃ viya me, sutaṃ viya meti kathanakālepi abyākato yevāti. Tattha hi “abyākato
anya-e0401n:229_37: yevā”ti supinante manodvāre dvattikkhattuṃ uppannassa āvajjanassa vasena abyākatoyeva.
anya-e0401n:229_38: Tato paraṃ bhavaṅgapāto. Aṭṭhasāliniyampi vuttaṃ ayaṃ pana vāro diṭṭhaṃ viya me,
anya-e0401n:229_39: sutaṃ viya me tiādīni vadanakāle labbhatīti. Taṃ pana pañca dvāre parittārammaṇe
anya-e0401n:229_40: dvattikkhattuṃ uppannassa voṭṭhabbanassa vasena vuttaṃ. “Sopi idha laddhuṃ vaṭṭati
anya-e0401n:229_41: yevā”ti sopi vāro imasmiṃ manodvāre laddhuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. “Bhavaṅge calite nivattanakavārānaṃ”ti
anya-e0401n:229_42: dvikkhattuṃ bhavaṅga calanamatte ṭhatvā vīthi cittāni anuppajjitvā bhavaṅgapātavasena
anya-e0401n:229_43: nivattanakānaṃ moghavārānaṃ manodvārepi pamāṇaṃ na bhavissatiyeva. Atha imasmiṃvāre
anya-e0401n:229_44: vīthi cittappavatti natthi. Evaṃ sati, imasmiṃ vīthi saṅgahe so vāro na vattabboti
anya-e0401n:229_45: ce. Vattabboyeva. Kasmā, chadhā visayappavattīti imasmiṃ chakke saṅgahitattāti dassetuṃ
anya-e0401n:229_46: “visaye ca āpātāgate”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ārammaṇabhūtā visayappavatti. Ekekasmiṃ anubandhakavāre.
anya-e0401n:229_47: “Tadārammaṇa vārādayo”ti tadārammaṇa vāro javanavāro voṭṭhabbana vāro moghavāro.
anya-e0401n:229_48: Tesu pana tadā rammaṇavāro vatthuggahaṇe ca nāmaggahaṇe ca na labbhati. “Vatthū”ti
anya-e0401n:229_49: hi saṇṭhāna paññatti. “Nāmaṃ”ti nāma paññatti. Na ca tadā rammaṇaṃ paññattā rammaṇaṃ
anya-e0401n:229_50: hotīti. Tena vuttaṃ “yathārahaṃ”ti. “Tatthā”ti tesu diṭṭhavārādīsu chasu vāresu.
anya-e0401n:229_51: Etarahi pana keci ācariyāti pāṭhaseso. “Atīta bhavaṅga vasenā”ti ekaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ atikkamma
anya-e0401n:229_52: āpātā gate ārammaṇe eko vāro, dve bhavaṅgāni atikkamma āpātā gate ekotiādinā atīta
anya-e0401n:229_53: bhavaṅga bhedavasena. “Tadā rammaṇa vasenā”ti tadā rammaṇassa uppannavāro anuppanna
anya-e0401n:229_54: vāroti evaṃ tadā rammaṇa vasena. Kappenti cintenti, vidahanti vā. “Khaṇa vasena balavadubbalatā
anya-e0401n:229_55: sambhavo”ti yathā pañcadvāre atimahantā rammaṇesupi ārammaṇa dhammā uppādaṃ patvā
anya-e0401n:229_56: ādito ekacittakkhaṇamatte dubbalā honti. Attano dvāresu āpātaṃ āgantuṃ na sakkonti.
anya-e0401n:229_57: Eka cittakkhaṇaṃ pana atikkamma balavantā honti. Attano dvāresu āpātaṃ gantuṃ sakkonti.
anya-e0401n:229_58: Mahantā rammaṇādīsu pana dvi cittakkhaṇikamatte dubbalā hontītiādinā vattabbā. Na
anya-e0401n:229_59: tathā manodvāre ārammaṇānaṃ khaṇa vasena balavadubbalatā sambhavo atthi. Kasmā natthīti
anya-e0401n:229_60: āha “tadā”tiādiṃ. Tattha “tadā”ti tasmiṃ vīthi cittappavattikāle. “Tatthā”ti manodvāre.
anya-e0401n:230_0: “Ettha siyā”tiādīsu. “Siyā”ti kesañci vicāraṇā siyā. Ekaṃ āvajjanaṃ assāti ekāvajjanā.
anya-e0401n:230_1: “Vīthī”ti vīthicittappabandho. Ekāvajjanā ca sā vīthi cāti viggaho. “Āvajjanaṃ”ti
anya-e0401n:230_2: āvajjana cittaṃ. Taṃ vā āvajjatīti sambandho. “Taṃ taṃ javanenā”ti tena tena javanena
anya-e0401n:230_3: sahuppannaṃ vā parassa cittaṃ āvajjati kinti yojanā. “Kiñcetthā”ti ettha vacane kiñci
anya-e0401n:230_4: vattabbaṃ atthīti attho. Yadi tāva āvajjanañca javanāni cāti adhikāro. “Tañhi cittaṃ”ti
anya-e0401n:230_5: parassa cittaṃ. “Evampi bhinnamevā”ti javanānaṃ dhammato bhinnameva. Ettha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
anya-e0401n:230_6: vinicchitanti sambandho. Taṃ cittaṃ niruddhampi javanānampi paccuppannameva hotīti
anya-e0401n:230_7: yojanā. “Addhāvasena gahitaṃ”ti addhā paccuppanna vasena gahitaṃ. “Santativasena
anya-e0401n:230_8: gahitaṃ”ti santati paccuppannavasena gahitaṃ. Ācariyānandamate. Sabbesampi āvajjana
anya-e0401n:230_9: javanānaṃ. Cittameva hoti, tasmā dhammato abhinnaṃ. Paccuppannañca hoti, tasmā kālato
anya-e0401n:230_10: abhinnanti vuttaṃ hoti. Anantarapaccaye atīto ca paccuppanno ca khaṇa vasena yujjati.
anya-e0401n:230_11: Yadi addhāsantati vasena yujjeyya, paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa anantara
anya-e0401n:230_12: paccayena paccayoti vutto bhaveyya. Kasmā, ekāvajjana vīthiyañhi sabbāni cittāni
anya-e0401n:231_1: samatādīhī”ti saddhādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ aññamaññaṃ anati vattanavasena samatādīhi.
anya-e0401n:231_2: “Parito”ti samantato. “Upeccā”ti upagantvā. Appanaṃ vahituṃ janetuṃ samattha bhāvo
anya-e0401n:231_3: appanāvahasamatthabhāvo. “Yassa pavattiyā”ti yassa upacāra javanassa pavattito. “Aciraṃ
anya-e0401n:231_4: kālaṃ”ti acirekāle. Paritta jātikā nāma kāmāvacarajāti. “Gottaṃ”ti kammakattu padaṃ.
anya-e0401n:231_5: “Abhibhuyyatī”ti bhāvanā balena abhibhuyyamānaṃ hoti. Abhimaddīyamānaṃ hotīti attho.
anya-e0401n:231_6: “Chijjatī”ti idaṃ pana abhibhavanassa sikhāpatta dassanaṃ. Yāva taṃ gottaṃ chedaṃ
anya-e0401n:231_7: pāpuṇāti, tāva abhibhuyyati, maddīyatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Gottaṃ abhibhavatīti gotrabhūtipi
anya-e0401n:231_8: yujjati. “Pañcamaṃ”ti pañcame cittavāre. “Tadāhi javanaṃ patitaṃ nāma hotī”ti pakatiyā
anya-e0401n:231_9: javanappavattināma sattakkhattu paramo hoti. Catutthañca muddhapattaṃ. Pañcamato
anya-e0401n:231_10: paṭṭhāya patitaṃ. Tasmā tasmiṃ pañcamavāre javanaṃ patitaṃ nāma hoti. “Dutīyenā”ti
anya-e0401n:231_11: dutīyena eva saddena. “Dutīyaṃ”ti dutīye cittavāre. Tadā anulomaṃ pathamajavanaṃ
anya-e0401n:231_12: hotīti vuttaṃ “aladdhā sevanaṃ anuloma”nti. “Etenevā”ti etena eva sadda dvaye neva.
anya-e0401n:231_13: Aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ pana anuññātā viya dissati. Vuttañhi tattha. Mandapaññassa cattāri
anya-e0401n:231_14: anulomāni honti, pañcamaṃ gotrabhu, chaṭṭhaṃ maggacittaṃ, sattamaṃ phalanti. “Itaraṭṭhakathāsū”ti
anya-e0401n:231_15: vinayaṭṭha kathādīsu. “Paṭisiddhattā”ti pañcamaṃ gotra bhuppavattiyā paṭisiddhattā
anya-e0401n:231_16: ādimhi aṭṭhannaṃ aññatrasmiṃti vuttattā idha niruddheti padaṃ avassaṃ icchitabbamevāti
anya-e0401n:231_17: vuttaṃ “niruddhe anantaramevāti padacchedo”ti. Anantara saddassa ca niccaṃ sambandhāpekkhattā
anya-e0401n:231_18: tamevapadaṃ vibhatti pariṇāmena adhikatanti āha “niruddhassāti atthato laddhamevā”ti.
anya-e0401n:231_19: “Vasibhūtāpī”ti vasibhūtāpi samānā. “Ekavāraṃ javitvā”ti idaṃ lokiyappanāvasena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:231_20: Lokuttara appanāpana sattamampi uppajjatiyeva. Mūlaṭīkā pāṭhe “bhūmantarapattiyā”ti
anya-e0401n:231_21: gotrabhu cittaṃ kāmabhūmi hoti. Appanāpana mahaggatabhūmi vā lokuttarabhūmi vā hoti.
anya-e0401n:231_22: Evaṃ bhūmantarapattiyā. “Ārammaṇantara laddhiyā”ti phalasamāpatti vīthiyaṃ phalajavanaṃ
anya-e0401n:231_23: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tatthahi purimāni anuloma javanāni saṅkhārā rammaṇāni honti. Phalajavanaṃ
anya-e0401n:231_24: nibbānārammaṇaṃ. Idañca kāraṇamattameva. Yathāvutta leḍḍupamā eva idha yuttarūpāti
anya-e0401n:231_25: daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Na kho panetaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhabba”nti etaṃ atthajātaṃ na kho evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:231_26: “Anaddhanīyā”ti addhānaṃ dīghakālaṃ nakha mantīti anaddhanīyā. Asārā. Asārattā eva
anya-e0401n:231_27: sīghataraṃ ruhanti. Sīghataraṃ vuddhiṃ viruḷhiṃ āpajjanti. Sāravantā pana sārena
anya-e0401n:231_28: saha vaḍḍhamānattā sīghataraṃ naruhanti. Sīghataraṃ vuddhiṃ viruḷhiṃ nā pajjanti.
anya-e0401n:231_30: sattama javanesu. “Ettha cā”tiādīsu. “Supakkasālibhatta sadisānī”ti yathā sālibhattāni
anya-e0401n:231_31: supakkattā eva mudutarāni hutvā dubbalāni aciraṭṭhitikāni. Tasmiṃ divasepi pūtibhāvaṃ
anya-e0401n:231_32: gacchanti. Evaṃ appanā javanāni. “Yasmā cā”tiādīsu. “Duvidhassa niyamassā”ti javananiyamassa
anya-e0401n:231_33: ca kālaniyamassa ca. “Paṭisandhiyā anantara paccaya bhāvino”ti sattama javana cetanā
anya-e0401n:231_34: anantara paccayo, tadanantare pavattaṃ vipāka santānaṃ paccayuppanno, tameva ca avasāne
anya-e0401n:231_35: cuti cittaṃ hutvā bhavantare paṭisandhi cittassa anantara paccayo. Evaṃ paṭisandhi
anya-e0401n:231_36: cittassa anantara paccaya bhāvena avassaṃ bhavissamānassāti attho. Idañca kāraṇa
anya-e0401n:231_37: mattameva. Mahāṭīkāvacanaṃ pana kiñci vattabba rūpanti na paṭikkhittaṃ. “Nirantarappavattānaṃ”ti
anya-e0401n:231_38: ādīsu. Bhinnā asadisā vedanā yesaṃ tāni bhinnavedanāni. “Āsevana paccanīkānaṃ”ti
anya-e0401n:231_39: āsevana paccayappaṭi pakkhānaṃ. Abhinnā vedanā yesanti viggaho. Kriyajavanānantaraṃ
anya-e0401n:232_0: 139. “Sabbathā pī”tiādīsu. Loke majjhimake hi mahājanehi icchitampi kiñci ārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0401n:232_1: atiukkaṭṭhehi mandhātu rājādīhi icchitaṃ na hoti. Tathā tehi mahājanehi anicchitampi
anya-e0401n:232_2: kiñci ārammaṇaṃ atiduggatehi paccanta vāsīhi icchitaṃ hoti. Tasmā ārammaṇānaṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭha
anya-e0401n:232_3: vavatthānaṃ patvā atiukkaṭṭhehi ca atiduggatehi ca vavatthānaṃ na gacchati, majjhimakehi
anya-e0401n:232_4: eva vavatthānaṃ gacchati. Tenāha “tattha cā”tiādiṃ. “Ārammaṇaṃ”ti kattupadaṃ. “Vipākacittaṃ”ti
anya-e0401n:232_5: kammapadaṃ. “Kiñcī”ti kiñci rūpaṃ. “Kismiñcī”ti kasmiṃci ekasmiṃ pupphe. “Tena vā”ti
anya-e0401n:232_6: tena vā sukhasamphassena vatthena. Sesamettha suviññeyyaṃ.
anya-e0401n:233_0: “Vedanāniyamopanā”tiādīsu. “Ādāse mukhanimittassa viyā”ti yathā ādāse mukha nimittassa
anya-e0401n:233_1: calana cavanādiyogo nānāvaṇṇayogo ca yathāmukhameva siddho. Tathā vipākānaṃ. Vedanā
anya-e0401n:233_2: yogo pana yathārammaṇameva siddhoti yojanā. Tattha “vedanāyogo”ti nānāvedanāyogo.
anya-e0401n:233_3: “Kappetvā”ti cintetvā. “Pakappetvā”ti nānappakārato cintetvā. Na kevalañca vipākānaṃ
anya-e0401n:233_4: eva yathārammaṇaṃ vedanā yogo hotīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:234_1: tadārammaṇavasena pavattānanti pāṭhaseso. “Pañcannaṃ”ti somanassa santīraṇena saddhiṃ
anya-e0401n:234_2: cattāri mahāvipāka somanassāni sandhāya vuttaṃ. “Pakati nīhārenā”ti pakatiyā niccakālaṃ
anya-e0401n:234_3: pavattappakārena. Pāḷipāṭhe. Bhāvitāni indriyāni yenāti bhāvitindriyo. “Manāpaṃ”ti
anya-e0401n:234_4: manorammaṃ. “Amanāpaṃ”ti amanorammaṃ. Vihareyyanti sace kaṅkhatīti sambandho. “Paṭikūle”ti
anya-e0401n:234_5: amanāpe. “Appaṭikūla saññī”ti manāpasaññī. Evaṃ sesesu. “Tesaṃ”ti khīṇāsavānaṃ. Pāḷipāṭhe.
anya-e0401n:234_7: ayaṃ satto averohotūtiādinā mettācittena vā pharati. “Dhātuso upasaṃharatī”ti yathā
anya-e0401n:234_8: ma ma kāyopi catudhātu samussayo hoti. Tattha ekāpi dhātu nāma paṭikūlā vā appaṭikūlā
anya-e0401n:234_9: vā na hoti. Kevalaṃ tuccha suñña sabhāvamattā hoti. Evameva imassa sattassa kāyopītiādinā
anya-e0401n:234_10: dhātu so upasaṃharati. “Asubhāya vā”ti asubha bhāvanāya vā. Asubha bhāvanā cittena
anya-e0401n:234_11: vāti vuttaṃ hoti. “Asubhāyā”ti vā tassa asubhabhāvatthāya. Devanāṭakā devaccharā
anya-e0401n:234_12: nāma. Kuthitāni kuṭṭhāni yesaṃ tāni kuthita kuṭṭhāni. “Sarīrānī”ti kāyaṅgāni. Kuthita
anya-e0401n:234_13: kuṭṭhāni sarīrāni yassa so kuthitakuṭṭhasarīro. “Kuthitānī”ti abbhukkiraṇāni. Vedanā
anya-e0401n:234_14: yuttāni honti iti apare vadantīti yojanā. Tasmā paccayo hotīti sambandho. Kathaṃ
anya-e0401n:234_15: paccayo hotīti āha “yathā ānisaṃsa dassanenā”tiādiṃ. Tattha “aṭṭhakathāyaṃ”ti visuddhi
anya-e0401n:234_17: subuddhatā dassanena. “Attasampatti dassanenā”ti mayaṃ pana evarūpā dukkhā muttāmhāti
anya-e0401n:234_18: evaṃ attano sampatti dassanena. “Aṭṭhikaṅkalikapetarūpe”ti nimmaṃ salohite aṭṭhipuñjapetasarīre.
anya-e0401n:234_20: devacchara vaṇṇādike. Ati aniṭṭhe kuthitakuṭṭhasarīrādike. “Vatthu bhūto”ti uppattiṭṭhāna
anya-e0401n:234_21: bhūto. “Tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ”ti kattu atthesāmivacanaṃ. “Tadubhayaṃ pī”ti ubhayaṃ
anya-e0401n:234_22: taṃ gahaṇaṃpi. “Tesaṃ”ti tesaṃ lokiya mahājanānaṃ. “Vipallāsavaseneva hotī”ti devaccharavaṇṇādīsu
anya-e0401n:234_23: atiiṭṭhesu atiiṭṭhākārato gahaṇampi vipallāsa vaseneva hoti. Kasmā, devacchara vaṇṇādīsu
anya-e0401n:235_0: Vibhāvanipāṭhe. “Pavattiyā”ti pavattanato. Aṭṭhakathādhippāye ṭhatvā vuttattā aṭṭhakathāgāravena”taṃ
anya-e0401n:235_1: vicāretabba mevā”ti vuttaṃ. Atthato pana ayuttamevāti vuttaṃ hoti. Esanayo aññatthapi.
anya-e0401n:235_2: “Dhamma cakkhurahitā”ti dhamma vavatthānaññāṇa cakkhu rahitā. “Kusalākusalāni yevā”ti
anya-e0401n:235_3: tesaṃ dhamma cakkhu rahitānaṃ uppannāni kusalākusalāniyeva. Gāthāyaṃ. “Rūpā”ti rūpato
anya-e0401n:235_4: nappavedhantīti sambandho. “Saddā”tiādīsupi esevanayo. Nappavedhantīti ca na calanti,
anya-e0401n:235_5: na kampanti, cittaññathattaṃ na gacchanti. Tathā upekkhā kriyajavanānantarampi tadārammaṇāni
anya-e0401n:235_6: somanassu pekkhāvedanā yuttāni eva siyunti yojanā. Mūlaṭīkāpāṭhe. “Tadārammaṇatā”ti
anya-e0401n:235_8: ca tasmiṃ”ti tasmiṃ kriyajavanānu bandhake tadā rammaṇe vijjamāne sati. Etaṃ bhavaṅgañca
anya-e0401n:235_9: nāma anubandhatīti sambandho. Nadīsoto paṭisotagāmināvaṃ anubandhati viyāti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:235_10: “Savipphārikaṃ evajavanaṃ”ti kilesa dhammānaṃ vipallāsa dhammānañca vasena khaṇamattepi
anya-e0401n:235_11: anekasatesu ārammaṇesu vividhākārena pharaṇavegasahitaṃ kusalākusala javanameva anubandhatīti
anya-e0401n:235_12: yuttaṃ. Na pana kriyajavanaṃ anubandhatīti yuttanti yojanā. “Chaḷaṅgu pekkhāvato”ti
anya-e0401n:235_13: cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā neva sumano hoti, na dummano, upekkhako viharatī-tiādinā vuttāya
anya-e0401n:235_14: cha dvārikavasena chaḷaṅga samannāgatāya upekkhāya sampannassa. Vattanaṃ vutti. Santā
anya-e0401n:235_15: vutti assāti santa vutti. Taṃ vicārento “paṭṭhāne panā”tiādimāha. “Yadi cetaṃ vucceyyā”ti
anya-e0401n:235_16: ettha “etaṃ”ti kriyā byākatetiādikaṃ etaṃ vacanaṃ. “Tasmiṃ”ti tasmiṃ vacane. “Evamādinā”ti
anya-e0401n:235_18: vipassanā pavatti vasena. “Tesaṃ”ti somanassa domanassānaṃ. “Itarītarānantara paccayatā”ti
anya-e0401n:235_19: aññamaññānantara paccayatāti attho. “Therenā”ti anuruddhattherena. Sabbāni tadā rammaṇāni,
anya-e0401n:235_20: sabbāni bhavaṅgāni ca. “Samudā carantī”ti cirakālaṃ sañcaranti. “Etānihī”tiādinā
anya-e0401n:235_21: tesaṃ aṭṭhārasannaṃ javanānaṃ anantaraṃ tadārammaṇānaṃ aniyamato pavattiyā kāraṇayuttiṃ
anya-e0401n:235_22: dasseti. Sambhavati uppajjati etenāti sambhavo. Tadā rammaṇassa sambhavo tadā rammaṇa
anya-e0401n:235_23: sambhavo. Athavā, sambhavanaṃ uppajjanaṃ sambhavoti ime dve atthe dassetuṃ “tadā
anya-e0401n:235_24: rammaṇa sambhavo”tiādi vuttaṃ. “Yesaṃ panā”tiādīsu. “Yesaṃ”ti yesaṃ puggalānaṃ. “Itarānī”ti
anya-e0401n:235_25: upekkhā santīraṇa dvayato aññāni. “Na hontīti na vattabbānī”ti vuttaṃ. Evaṃsati,
anya-e0401n:235_26: kasmā therena idha na vuttānīti. Aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ avuttattā idha na vuttānīti. Aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ
anya-e0401n:235_27: pana kasmā na vuttāni. Yebhūyya niyamasote patitattā na vuttāni. Na pana alabbhamānattā
anya-e0401n:235_29: santīraṇa dvayameva vuttaṃ”ti āgantuka bhavaṅgabhāvena vuttaṃ. Yathāha athassa yadā
anya-e0401n:235_30: somanassa sahagatappaṭisandhikassa pavatte jhānaṃ nibbattetvā pamādena parihīnajjhānassa
anya-e0401n:235_31: paṇīta dhammo me naṭṭhoti paccavekkhato vippaṭisāri vasena domanassaṃ uppajjati,
anya-e0401n:235_32: tadā kiṃ uppajjati. Somanassānantarañhi domanassaṃ, domanassānantarañca somanassaṃ
anya-e0401n:235_33: paṭṭhāne paṭisiddhaṃ. Mahaggata dhammaṃ ārabbha javane javite tadā rammaṇampi tattheva
anya-e0401n:235_34: paṭisiddhanti. Kusala vipākāvā akusalavipākāvā upekkhā sahagatā hetukamanoviññāṇa
anya-e0401n:235_35: dhātu uppajjati. Kimassā rammaṇanti. Rūpādīsu paritta dhammesu aññataraṃ. Etesu hi
anya-e0401n:235_36: yadeva tasmiṃ samaye āpātamāgataṃ hoti. Taṃ ārabbha etaṃ cittaṃ uppajjatīti veditabbaṃ-ti.
anya-e0401n:235_37: Evaṃ domanassasahagata javanānurūpaṃ upekkhāsahagata santīraṇa dvayameva āgantuka
anya-e0401n:235_38: bhavaṅgabhāvena aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanti. “Etampi yujjati yevā”ti akusala javanāvasāne
anya-e0401n:235_39: etaṃ sahetukaṃ āgantuka bhavaṅgaṃpi yujjatiyeva. “Domanassa javanānantaraṃ bhavaṅga
anya-e0401n:235_40: pātova hotī”ti upekkhā sahagata mūlabhavaṅga pātova hoti. Āgantuka bhavaṅgena kiccaṃ
anya-e0401n:235_41: natthi. Kasmā, upekkhā paṭisandhikattā. Nevatadārammaṇa sambhavo atthi. Kasmā, tesu
anya-e0401n:235_42: ārammaṇesu tadārammaṇavārassa asambhavato. Na hi mahantārammaṇesu ca avibhūtārammaṇesu
anya-e0401n:235_43: ca tadārammaṇavāro sambhavati. Na ca mūlabhavaṅga sambhavo atthi. Kasmā, mūlabhavaṅgabhū
anya-e0401n:235_44: tassa somanassa bhavaṅgassa domanassa javanena saha viruddhattā. “Iti katvā”ti iminā
anya-e0401n:235_45: kāraṇena. “Ekaṃ”ti ekaṃ upekkhāsahagata vipākaṃ. Tathā tasseva domanassaṃ uppādentassa
anya-e0401n:235_46: neva tadārammaṇa sambhavo atthi. Na ca mūlabhavaṅga sambhavoti katvā domanassānantaraṃ
anya-e0401n:235_47: chasu…pe… pavattatīti yojanā. Tattha “tassevā”ti somanassappaṭisandhikasseva. Nevatadārammaṇa
anya-e0401n:235_48: sambhavo atthi. Kasmā, ārammaṇānaṃ atimahantattepi ativibhūtattepi sati somanassa
anya-e0401n:235_49: tadārammaṇassa javanena saha viruddhattā. Upekkhā tadā rammaṇassa ca ārammaṇena saha
anya-e0401n:235_50: viruddhattā. Na hi ati iṭṭhārammaṇe upekkhā tadārammaṇaṃ pavattati. Mahaggata paññattā
anya-e0401n:235_51: rammaṇesu pana ubhayampi tadārammaṇaṃ nuppajjatiyeva. Na ca mūlabhavaṅga sambhavo
anya-e0401n:236_0: “Ettha cā”tiādīsu. “Sabba dhammesū”ti sabbesu ārammaṇa dhammesu. “Pathama samannāhāro”ti
anya-e0401n:236_1: āvajjana kiccaṃ āha. Suttanta pāṭhe. “Tajjo”ti tena ārammaṇānaṃ āpātā gamanena jāto.
anya-e0401n:236_2: “Tajjo”ti vā tadanurūpotipi vadanti. “Viññāṇabhāgassā”ti cakkhu dvārika viññāṇa koṭṭhāsassa.
anya-e0401n:236_3: “Yato”ti yasmiṃ kāle. Kathaṃ āvajjanena vinā nuppajjatīti āha “sace āvajjanenā”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:236_4: “Ettha siyā”tiādīsu. Yathā pana nirāvajjanaṃ hoti bhinnā rammaṇañca, evaṃ tathāti
anya-e0401n:236_5: yojanā. “Ekassapī”ti ekassa āgantuka bhavaṅgassapi natthi doso. Mahāaṭṭhakathāyañca
anya-e0401n:236_6: natthi. Aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ pana atthiyeva. “Savipphandanattā”ti ettha attho savipphārikanti
anya-e0401n:236_7: pade vuttanayena veditabbo. “Itare sañcā”ti mahaggatalokuttara javanānañca. Kāni
anya-e0401n:236_8: ci parittārammaṇānipi samānāni. Yadi tadārammaṇū panissa yassa kāmabhavaṅgassa abhāvato
anya-e0401n:236_9: tadārammaṇāni rūpārūpa brahmānaṃ nuppajjanti. Evaṃ sati, cakkhusota dvārika cittānipi
anya-e0401n:236_10: rūpa brahmānaṃ nuppajjeyyunti āha “cakkhu sotaviññāṇāni panā”tiādiṃ. “Indriyappavatti
anya-e0401n:236_11: ānubhāvato”ti cakkhu vatthu sotavatthu saṅkhātānaṃ indriya vatthūnaṃ rūpa brahma
anya-e0401n:236_12: santāne pavattattā tesaṃ pavatti ānubhāvato cakkhu sotaviññāṇāni rūpabrahmānaṃ pavattantiye
anya-e0401n:236_14: kusalānaṃ viya vividhena ākārena kappetvā pakappetvā ārammaṇaggahasāmatthiyevāsati.
anya-e0401n:236_15: “Appanāpatta bhāvanā kammavisese vā”ti ettha abhiññā javanāni viya mahaggata vipāka
anya-e0401n:236_16: lokuttara vipākāni viya cāti vattabbaṃ. “Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ”ti paṭicca samuppāda vibhaṅgaṭṭhakathāyaṃ.
anya-e0401n:236_17: “Vibhāvaniyaṃ vutta kāraṇānī”ti aṭṭhakathāto āharitvā vibhāvaniyaṃ vuttāni ‘ajanakattā
anya-e0401n:237_0: 140. Javana niyame. Aṭṭhakathāyampi chakkhattuṃ pavatti vuttā. Yathāha sace pana
anya-e0401n:237_1: balavā rammaṇaṃ āpātāgataṃ hoti. Kriyamanodhātuyā bhavaṅge āvaṭṭite cakkhuviññāṇādīni
anya-e0401n:237_2: uppajjanti. Javanaṭṭhāne pana pathamakāmāvacara kusala cittaṃ javanaṃ hutvā chasattavāre
anya-e0401n:237_3: javitvā tadārammaṇassa vāraṃ detīti. “Mudutara bhāvenā”ti mātukucchimhi ṭhitakālevā
anya-e0401n:237_4: sampati jātakāle vā vatthussa atimudubhāvena. “Kenaciupadduta bhāvenā”ti bāḷhagelaññajātakāle
anya-e0401n:237_5: kenaci vātapittasemhādinā upadduta bhāvena. “Ajjhotthaṭa bhāvenā”ti tassa vevacanamattaṃ.
anya-e0401n:237_6: Mandībhūto vego yesaṃ tāni mandībhūta vegāni. “Asayha rūpehī”ti dukkhamasabhāvehi.
anya-e0401n:237_7: Abhibhūtānaṃ sattānaṃ. Tañca kho vacanaṃ pākatika sattānaṃ vaseneva vuttaṃ. Na sattavisesānaṃ
anya-e0401n:237_8: vasena. Evaṃ sati, sattavisesānaṃ vasena kathaṃ daṭṭhabbanti āha “ye panā”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:237_10: yugaḷavatthūnaṃ ekato pavatta acchariya kammaṃ. “Dve jhānaṅgānī”ti upekkhekaggatā jhānaṅgāni.
anya-e0401n:238_0: “Yogakammasiddhiyā”ti bhāvanānu yogakammasiddhassa. Iddhi vikubbanaṃ nāma iddhiyā
anya-e0401n:238_1: nānākammakaraṇaṃ. “Siddhiyā evā”ti sijjha natthāya eva. Attano anantare eva uppannaṃ
anya-e0401n:238_2: phalaṃ etissāti ānantarikapphalā. Maggacetanā. “Itī”ti tasmā. “Mandassā”ti manda
anya-e0401n:238_4: pathamajjhānato paṭṭhāya samatha vipassanāyuganandhappavatti saṅkhātassa pubbappayogābhisaṅkhārassa.
anya-e0401n:238_5: “Akatādhikārassā”ti āsanne purimabhave akata jhānaparikammassa puggalassa. Sabbesampi
anya-e0401n:240_0: 141. Duhetukādīsu. Jāti dvihetukādayo eva adhippetāti vuttaṃ “paṭisandhiviññāṇa sahagatā”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:240_1: “Tesaṃ dvinnaṃ pī”ti dvihetukānampi ahetukānampi. Bhusojhāna maggaphalāni vārenti
anya-e0401n:240_2: nīvārentīti āvaraṇāni. Vipākāni ca tāni āvaraṇāni cāti viggaho. “Vipākānī”ti ahetuka
anya-e0401n:240_3: dvihetuka vipākāni. Tehi gahitappaṭisandhikānaṃ imasmiṃ bhavejhāna maggaphalappaṭilābho
anya-e0401n:240_4: nāma natthi. Tenāha “vipākāvaraṇa sabbhāvato”tiādiṃ. “Tesaṃ”ti duggati ahetuka puggalānaṃ.
anya-e0401n:240_5: Puggalānanti vuttaṃ hoti. Na labbhantīti sambandho. “Itaresaṃ”ti tato aññesaṃ sugati ahetuka puggalānaṃ.
anya-e0401n:241_1: paṭisandhi cittaṃ hutvā āgate mūlabhavaṅge. “Yaṃ kiñcī”ti yaṃ kiñci bhavaṅgaṃ. “Vuccate”ti
anya-e0401n:241_2: visajjanā vuccate. “Sabba aṭṭhakathāsu paṭikkhitto”ti aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ tāva vipākuddhārakathāyaṃ
anya-e0401n:241_3: soḷasasu kāmāvacara kusala vipākesu aṭṭhannaṃ ahetuka vipākānaṃ eva āpāyikesu sattesu
anya-e0401n:241_4: uppattiṃ dasseti. Na aṭṭhannaṃ sahetuka vipākānaṃ. Tathā paṭicca samuppādaṭṭha kathāsu
anya-e0401n:241_5: ca viññāṇa padavaṇṇanāsu aññāsu ca abhidhammāvatārādīsūti evaṃ sabbaṭṭhakathāsu paṭikkhittā
anya-e0401n:241_6: nāma hoti. “Yogasā dhanīyattā”ti payogena sādhetabbattā. Kusalākusalāni hi vaḍḍhetuṃ
anya-e0401n:241_7: vā hāpetuṃ vā payoge kate vaḍḍhanti ceva hāyanti ca. Ñāṇavippayuttabhūtaṃ gahetuṃ
anya-e0401n:241_8: yuttaṃ. Kasmā, ahetukassa bhavaṅgassāti vuttassa mūlabhavaṅgassa ahetukattā. “Dvinnampi
anya-e0401n:241_9: ahetukānaṃ”ti duggati ahetukānañca sugati ahetukānañca. “Aparepanā”tiādi vibhāvaniyaṃ
anya-e0401n:241_10: āgato apare vādo. Vuttañhi tattha ‘aparepana yathā ahetukānaṃ sahetuka tadārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0401n:241_11: hoti, evaṃ dvihetukānaṃ tihetuka tadārammaṇaṃpī’ti vaṇṇenti. Tesaṃmatānurodhena ca
anya-e0401n:241_12: idhapi ñāṇasampayutta vipākappaṭikkhepo ahetukeyeva sandhāyāti vadantīti. Taṃ pana
anya-e0401n:241_13: vipākuddhārakathāyaṃ ‘ettheva dvādasa kamaggopī’ti ca, ettheva dasakamaggopī’ti ca
anya-e0401n:241_14: āgatehi na sameti. Tattha hi soḷasasukusalavipākesu dvihetuka kammanibbattānaṃ dvinnaṃ
anya-e0401n:241_15: dvihetukāhetuka puggalānaṃ cattāri ñāṇasampayutta vipākāni vajjetvā dvādasa kamaggo
anya-e0401n:241_16: nāma hoti. Puna sesesu dvādasa vipākesupi asaṅkhārika kammanibbattānaṃ dve ñāṇavippayutta
anya-e0401n:241_17: sasaṅkhārika vipākāni, sasaṅkhārika kammanibbattānañca dve ñāṇavippayutta asaṅkhārika
anya-e0401n:241_18: vipākāni vajjetvā dutiyatthera vāde dasakamaggo nāma hotīti. Ettha pana dvi hetukopi
anya-e0401n:241_19: puggalo adhikena chandena vā vīriyena vā cittena vā yutto pariyatti dhammaṃ vā nānāvijjāsippāni
anya-e0401n:241_20: vā bahuṃ gaṇheyya, suṇeyya, dhāreyya, vāceyya, cinteyya. Athassa ñāṇasampayutta javanaṃ
anya-e0401n:241_21: bahulaṃ samudā careyya. Tadā tassa nānākammena javanānu rūpaṃ ñāṇasampayutta tadārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0401n:241_22: na na sambhavatīti vuttaṃ. Taṃ yuttaṃ viya dissatīti. “Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pihi. La. Vuttā”ti
anya-e0401n:241_23: kathaṃ vuttā. Etāni hi manussesu ca kāmāvacara devesu ca puññavantānaṃ dvihetukati
anya-e0401n:241_24: hetukānaṃ paṭisandhikāle paṭisandhi hutvā vipaccantītiādinā vuttāti. Te pana tividhā,
anya-e0401n:241_25: navavidhāti sambandho. “Tesaṃ tabbhāvo”ti kusalānaṃ kusalabhāvo, akusalānaṃ akusalabhāvo.
anya-e0401n:241_26: “Sikkhana dhammayuttā”ti tīhi sikkhāhi pahātabbānaṃ kilesānaṃ atthitāya sikkhitabbatā
anya-e0401n:241_27: pakatiyaṃ ṭhitāti adhippāyo.“Heṭṭhimānañcā”ti heṭṭhima phalānañca. Yāniyānisakāni
anya-e0401n:241_29: sikkhā kiccaṃ nāma kilesa dhammānaṃ pahānatthāya eva hotīti tesu sabbaso pahīnesu
anya-e0401n:241_30: sikkhā kiccaṃ pariniṭṭhitaṃ hoti. Evaṃ pariniṭṭhita sikkhā kiccattā. Suṭṭhu bhabboti
anya-e0401n:241_31: sambhavo. Sambhavoti visesana padametanti āha “yathā sambhavaṃ”ti.
anya-e0401n:242_0: 142. “Etthevā”ti etasmiṃ kāmaloke eva. “Taṃ taṃ pasādarahitānaṃ”ti tenatena pasādena
anya-e0401n:242_1: rahitānaṃ. Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ dvāre uppannāni taṃ taṃ dvārikāni. Catusaṭṭhivīthi cittāni.
anya-e0401n:242_2: Dve cattālīsa vīthi cittāni. “Brahmaloke vā”tiādīsu. Idaṃ aṭṭhakathā vacanaṃ. Yathāha
anya-e0401n:242_3: rūpabhave catunnaṃ viññāṇānaṃ, tatheva paccayo. Pavatte, nopaṭisandhiyaṃ. Soca kho
anya-e0401n:242_4: kāmāvacare aniṭṭha rūpadassana saddasavanavasena, brahmaloke pana aniṭṭhā rūpādayo
anya-e0401n:242_5: nāma natthi. Tathā kāmāvacara devaloke pīti. Tāni cattāri cittāni. “Tatthā”ti tasmiṃ
anya-e0401n:242_6: rūpaloke. Vibhāvanipāṭhe. “Idhā”ti imasmiṃ vacane. “Taṃ taṃ bhūmi pariyāpanne”ti
anya-e0401n:242_7: tissaṃ tissaṃ bhūmiyaṃ pariyāpanne. Sesamettha suviññeyyaṃ.
anya-e0401n:245_2: tāyapaṭisandhiyā āsannatāya. “Taṃ gahaṇene vā”ti sandhiggahaṇena eva sandhivacanena
anya-e0401n:245_3: eva. “Visayappavatti nāmā”ti kamma kammanimittādīnaṃ visayānaṃ dvāresu āpātā gamana
anya-e0401n:245_4: vasena pavatti nāma. “Maraṇuppattiyaṃ eva siddhā”ti maraṇuppattiyaṃ javanesu eva
anya-e0401n:245_5: siddhā. Etena maraṇuppatti vidhānaṃ javanappadhānaṃ hoti, na cutippadhānanti dīpeti.
anya-e0401n:245_6: Na hi tasmiṃ vidhāne tassaṃ cutiyaṃ visayappavatti vacanaṃ nāma atthi. Javanesu eva
anya-e0401n:245_7: atthi. Sā pana cuti tasmiṃ bhave ādimhi paṭisandhi pavattiyā siddhāya sijjhati yevāti.
anya-e0401n:245_10: “Añchitā”ti gatā pavattā, āyatā vā. “Samānajātitāyā”ti tiracchāna gatajāti vasena
anya-e0401n:245_12: “Dibbantī”ti vijjotanti. “Iti katvā”ti iti vacanatthaṃ katvā uparidevā surāti vuccantīti
anya-e0401n:245_15: “Vemānikapete”ti vemānika nāmake pete. “Vinipātike”ti vinipātika nāmake duggata devajātike.
anya-e0401n:245_16: Tesaṃ pavatti upari ‘vinipātikāsurānañcā’ti pade āvi bhavissati. “Tepī”ti lokantarika
anya-e0401n:245_17: nerayika sattāpi. “Kālakañcikapete”ti kālakañcika nāmake pete. Evaṃ kathāvatthu pāḷiyaṃ
anya-e0401n:245_18: āgatā vessabhu ādayo yamarājānopanāti sambandho. Vessabhū ca notti ca somo ca yamo
anya-e0401n:245_19: ca vessavaṇo ca iti ime petti rājāno. “Rajja”nti rājabhāvaṃ rājakiccaṃ. Ye ca yakkharakkhasā
anya-e0401n:245_21: vimāne”ti revati vimāna vatthumhi. “Ito”ti manussa lokato, sugatibhavato vā. Tehi
anya-e0401n:245_22: yakkha rakkhasā nāma bhūmaṭṭhakāpi santi, ākāsaṭṭhakāpi. “Nānākammakāraṇāyo”ti dvattiṃsa
anya-e0401n:245_23: vidhāni kammakaraṇa kiccāni. Tesampi nirayapālānanti sambandho. “Tissannaṃ”ti tissannaṃ
anya-e0401n:246_0: Ussito mano etesanti vā, ussanno mano etesanti vā, dvidhāviggaho. “Ussito”ti uggato.
anya-e0401n:246_1: “Ussanno”ti vipulo. Kasmā tikkhatara cittā hontīti vuttanti āha “paripuṇṇānaṃ”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:246_2: Pubbavākye ananta cakkavāḷasādhāraṇa vasena vuttattā puna “imasmiṃ”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:246_3: Vattabbaṃ natthi. Idheva sabbaññu buddhādīnaṃ uppannatoti adhippāyo. “Adhiggaṇhantī”ti
anya-e0401n:246_4: adhikaṃ katvā gaṇhanti. “Sūrā”ti pāpakalyāṇa kammesu sūracittā. “Satimanto”ti vipulassatikā.
anya-e0401n:246_8: kuvuccati pathavī. Pathavi gatāni ratanabhaṇḍāni yesaṃ teti viggaho. “Dānavarakkhasā”ti
anya-e0401n:246_9: danunāmadevadhītāya apaccanti atthena dānava nāmakā rakkhasā. Avarujjhanti antarāyaṃ
anya-e0401n:246_11: katvā āgatā. Kācigandhappiyo jāyantīti sambandho. Yāgandhappiyo joginīti ca vuccanti,
anya-e0401n:246_12: juṇhāti ca vuccantīti sambandho. “Abhilakkhitarattīsū”ti abhiññātarattīsu. Uposatharattīsūti
anya-e0401n:246_14: Vasūni dhanāni dhārentīti vasundharā. Vasundharā ca te deva yakkhā cāti viggaho.
anya-e0401n:246_15: “Nāgātveva vuccantī”ti pāḷiyaṃ nāgesu saṅgayhantīti adhippāyo. “Yā”ti yā bhummadevayakkha
anya-e0401n:246_18: mantapadānī”ti yāsaṃ niggaha paggahapūjanādi vasena pavattāni mantapadāni. “Tesū”ti
anya-e0401n:246_20: khādanabhuñjana dhuttavasena. Soṇo vuccati sunakho. “Satte” nerayike vā petevā. “Kāmañca
anya-e0401n:246_22: paramparato āgatesu. “Devarājaṭṭhānesū”ti imasmiṃ cakkavāḷe tāvatiṃsābhavane devarājaṭṭhānesūti
anya-e0401n:246_23: adhippāyo. “Pāḷiyaṃ evā”ti dīghanikāye janavasabhasuttapāḷiyaṃ eva. Yacchanti niyacchanti
anya-e0401n:246_24: etthāti yāmo. “Niyacchantī”ti aññamaññaṃ issāmacchariya mūlakehi kalahabhaṇḍanādīhi
anya-e0401n:246_25: vigacchantīti attho. “Taṃ sahacaritattā”ti tena yāma nāmakena issaradevakulena niccakālaṃ
anya-e0401n:246_26: saha pavattattā. “Vasaṃ vattentī”ti icchaṃ pūrentīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:247_0: “Pure”ti sammukhaṭṭhāne. Taṃ pana ṭhānaṃ uccaṭṭhānaṃ nāma hotīti āha “ucceṭhāne”ti.
anya-e0401n:247_1: “Sahasso brahmā”tiādīsu attano sarīrobhāsena sahassaṃ cakkavāḷa lokaṃ pharanto sahassonāmāti
anya-e0401n:247_2: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ adhippetaṃ. Kuladevatāyo nāma kula parampara pūjita devatāyo nāma.
anya-e0401n:247_3: “Upaṭṭhahantī”ti yuttaṭṭhāne devavatthu devamālakāni katvā samaye samaye tattha gantvā
anya-e0401n:247_4: gandhamālādīhi pūjenti, vandanti, thomenti, varaṃ patthentīti attho. “Upaṭṭhakā evasampajjantī”ti
anya-e0401n:247_6: brahmabhūmīsu. Puna “tatthā”ti tasmiṃ dutīyatale. “Ābhā”ti sarīrābhā. Niccharanti
anya-e0401n:247_7: aṅgapaccaṅgehi niggacchanti. “Acala saṇṭhitā”ti dutīya tale viya calitā na hoti.
anya-e0401n:247_8: Atha kho acala saṇṭhitā. “Tesaṃ”ti tesaṃvādīnaṃ pāṭhe. Brahmapārisajjātiādikaṃ nāmaṃ
anya-e0401n:247_10: atthīti sambandho. “Āneñja jātikenā”ti acalanajātikena upekkhājhānena nibbattānaṃ
anya-e0401n:247_13: idaṃ pakatiyā oḷārika sabhāvatāya vuttaṃ. Na sukhumānaṃ atthitāya. Natthi vihaññanaṃ
anya-e0401n:247_14: etesanti avihā. Kiṃ vihaññanaṃ nāmāti āha “samathavipassanā kammesu avipphārikatā
anya-e0401n:247_15: pattī”ti. Cittassa avipphāratā pajjanaṃ nāma natthīti vuttaṃ hoti. “Pasāda dibba
anya-e0401n:247_16: dhamma paññā cakkhūhī”ti ‘pasāda cakkhu, dibbacakkhu, dhammacakkhu, paññā cakkhū,
anya-e0401n:247_17: hi. Tattha pasādacakkhu eva idha dibbacakkhūtipi vuccati. “Dhamma cakkhū”ti heṭṭhimamaggaññāṇaṃ.
anya-e0401n:247_18: “Paññā cakkhū”ti vipassanā ñāṇapaccavekkhanāñāṇehi saddhiṃ avasesaṃ sabbaññāṇaṃ.
anya-e0401n:249_0: 144. Bhavantare okkamanti etāyāti okkantīti piyujjati. “Sotarahito”ti pasādasotarahito.
anya-e0401n:249_3: sambhāra cakkhu vuccati. Tassa ādito paṭṭhāya vipannattā tena samannāgato puggalo
anya-e0401n:249_4: vatthuvipannoti vuccati. “Tassa tassā”ti cakkhuso tādikassa.“Pasūtiyaṃ yevā”ti vijāyamānakāleyeva.
anya-e0401n:249_6: puggalassa. Paññā saṅkhātaṃ veyyattiyaṃ assāti viggaho. Dvihetuka tihetukānaṃpi na
anya-e0401n:249_7: sakkā niyametunti sambandho. Kathaṃ na sakkāti āha “mātukucchimhi vipatti nāma natthī”ti.
anya-e0401n:249_8: Katamesaṃ vipattīti. Uppannānampi cakkhu sotānaṃ vipatti. Kenakāraṇena vipattīti.
anya-e0401n:249_9: Parūpakkamenavā mātuyā visama payogena vā nānābādhena vā vipattīti yojanā. Dhātupāṭhe
anya-e0401n:249_10: yakkha pūjāyaṃti paṭhitattā “pūjanīyaṭṭhenā”ti vuttaṃ. Etena yakkhitabbā pūjitabbā
anya-e0401n:249_11: yakkhāti dasseti. Ye pana kicchajīvikapattā vicaranti, te bhūmassitā nāma hontīti
anya-e0401n:249_12: yojanā. “Bhūmissitā”ti pāṭhe bhūmiyaṃ sitā nissitāti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “puññanibbattassā”tiādi
anya-e0401n:249_13: vuttaṃ. “Virūpā hutvā”ti te vaṇṇatopi dubbaṇṇā honti. Saṇṭhānatopi dussaṇṭhānā. Jīvikatopi
anya-e0401n:249_14: kicchajīvikātiādinā vipannarūpā hutvā. ‘Vivasā hutvā nipatantī’ti vinipātikātipi
anya-e0401n:249_15: vadanti. Vivasāti ca attano vasena icchāya vināti attho. “Vivittaṭṭhānesū”ti janavivittesu
anya-e0401n:249_16: ṭhānesu. Pariyesitvā vā jīvitaṃ kappenti. Pīḷetvā vā jīvitaṃ kappenti. Tāsetvā pīḷetvā
anya-e0401n:249_17: vā jīvitaṃ kappentīti yojanā. “Vemānikapetāpī”ti attano puññanibbattaṃ dibbavimānaṃ
anya-e0401n:249_18: yesaṃ atthi, te vemānikā. Te pana puññāpuññamissaka kammena nibbattattā keci divā
anya-e0401n:249_19: dibbasukhaṃ anubhavanti, rattiṃ petadukkhaṃ. Keci rattiṃ dibbasukhaṃ anubhavanti,
anya-e0401n:249_20: divā petadukkhanti. Parehi dattaṃ dinnaṃ puññapphalaṃ upanissāya jīvantīti paradattūpajīvino.
anya-e0401n:249_21: “Parehi dinnaṃ puññapphalaṃ”ti ñātakehi puññaṃ katvā idaṃ me puññaṃ petānaṃ kālaṅkatānaṃ
anya-e0401n:249_22: ñātīnaṃ dedhīti evaṃ dinnaṃ puññapphalaṃ. “Sakalacakkavāḷapariyāpannā ekabhūmakā”ti
anya-e0401n:249_23: yathā tāvatiṃsābhūmi nāma sabba cakkavāḷesupi atthi. Sabbāpi dibbena vassasahassena
anya-e0401n:249_24: ekaāyu paricchedo hoti. Imasmiṃ cakkavāḷe vattabbaṃ natthi. Na tathā nirayesu vā
anya-e0401n:249_25: tiracchāna yoniyaṃ vā pettivisayevā asurakāyevā manussesuvā bhummadevesu vā ekaparicchedo
anya-e0401n:249_26: nāma atthi. Catunnaṃ apāyānaṃ āyuppamāṇa gaṇanāya niyamo natthīti vuttaṃ, na nu brahma
anya-e0401n:249_27: saṃyutte kokālikaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha bhagavatā vutto dasannaṃ nirayānaṃ visuṃ visuṃ
anya-e0401n:249_28: atthīti. Saccaṃ atthi. Te pana dasanirayā avīciniraye pariyāpannā hutvā tassa padesamattā
anya-e0401n:249_29: honti. Na tehi pade samattehi sakalo avīcinirayo niyatāyu parimāṇoti sakkā vattuṃ.
anya-e0401n:249_30: Api ca sopi tesaṃ āyuparicchedo avīcibhūmiyā niyāmena siddho na hoti. Tena tena kammaviseseneva
anya-e0401n:249_31: siddho. Tasmā yaṃ vuttaṃ “tattha yebhūyyena kammappamāṇattā”ti, taṃ su vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:249_32: Tenāha “tattha nirayesū”tiādiṃ. “Evaṃ sante”ti na itara dīpavāsīnaṃ āyukappassa ārohaṇañca
anya-e0401n:249_33: orohaṇañca atthīti vutte satīti attho. Samācāro nāma dasasucaritāni. Visamācāro nāma
anya-e0401n:249_34: dasaduccaritāni. Tesaṃ nissandabhūtā sampattivipattiyoti sambandho. “Tesaṃ pī”ti
anya-e0401n:249_35: itara dīpavāsīnaṃpi. So evaparicchedoti āpajjati. Na ca sakkā tathā bhavituṃ. Ādikappakāle
anya-e0401n:249_36: sabbesampi catudīpa vāsīnaṃ asaṅkhyeyyāyukatā sambhavatoti. Atha itaradīpavāsīnampi
anya-e0401n:249_37: āyukappassa ārohaṇaṃ orohaṇañca atthi. Evaṃ sati, etarahipi tesaṃ āyukappo jambudīpavāsīnaṃ
anya-e0401n:249_38: āyukappena ekagatiko siyāti codanā. Nissandamattattātiādi parihāro. Natthi idaṃ mama
anya-e0401n:249_39: idaṃ mamāti pavattā pāṭipuggalikataṇhā etesanti “amamā”. “Apariggahā”ti puttadārādipariggaharahitā.
anya-e0401n:249_40: “Uparime cātumahārājike”ti ākāsaṭṭhakacātumahārājike. Dive devaloke siddhāni dibbāni.
anya-e0401n:249_41: “Yāva nimirājakālā”ti yāva amhākaṃ bodhisattabhūtassa nimirañño uppannakālā. Kassa
anya-e0401n:249_42: pabuddho purime antarakappe uppanno. Nimirājā pana imasmiṃ antara kappe uppanno.
anya-e0401n:249_43: “Manussa lokehi paññāsavassāni cātumahārājike ekodibbarattidivo hotī”tiādi abhidhamme
anya-e0401n:249_44: dhamma hadaya vibhaṅge āgatanayena vutto. Catugguṇavacane. “Uparimānaṃ”ti uparimānaṃ
anya-e0401n:249_45: devānaṃ. Ekaṃ vassasahassaṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ hotīti sambandho. “Dve”ti dve vassasahassāni.
anya-e0401n:249_47: uparimānaṃ devānaṃ. Yāme eko rattidivotiādinā yojetabbaṃ. “Cattārī”ti manussaloke
anya-e0401n:249_48: cattāri vassasatāni. Evaṃ sesesu. “Ādianta dassanavasenā”ti cātumahārājike manussavassagaṇanā
anya-e0401n:249_49: dassanaṃ ādidassanaṃ nāma. Idāni vasavattiyaṃ manussavassagaṇanā dassanaṃ anta dassanaṃ nāma.
anya-e0401n:250_0: Na atidubbalaṃti nātidubbalaṃ. “Taṃ”ti taṃ avitakka avicāramattajhānaṃ. “Bhūmantare”ti
anya-e0401n:250_1: pathamajjhānabhūmito aññissaṃ dutīyajjhānabhūmiyaṃ. Kappavacane. Kappīyati vassa,
anya-e0401n:250_2: utu, māsa, pakkha, ratti, divā, divasena paricchijjīyatīti kappo. Kappīyanti vā nānādhammappavattiyo
anya-e0401n:250_3: atītā divasena paricchijjīyanti etenāti kappo. Kālo. Mahanto kappoti mahākappo. Vassānaṃ
anya-e0401n:250_4: satabhāgehipi sahassabhāgehipi satasahassabhāgehipi saṅkhātuṃ asakkuṇeyyoti asaṅkhyeyyo.
anya-e0401n:250_5: Ekassa asaṅkhyeyyassa antare dissamāno kappo antarakappo. Sattānaṃ nānāāyuparicchedo
anya-e0401n:250_6: āyukappo. So pana manussānaṃ dasavassāyukakāle dasavassena paricchinno. Nevasaññā
anya-e0401n:250_7: devānaṃ niccakālaṃ caturāsīti kappasahassehi paricchinno. Antarakappo nāma cūḷakappā
anya-e0401n:250_8: vuccantīti sambandho. Vīsatippabhedā cūḷakappā vuccantīti keci vadantītiādinā yojanā.
anya-e0401n:250_10: Vaḍḍhamāno kappo vivaṭṭo. “Yathāvivaṭṭaṃ”ti vivaṭṭappakārena vivaṭṭappakatiyā. Accayena
anya-e0401n:250_11: atikkamanena. Haraṇena apanayanena. “Tatthā”ti tasmiṃ kappavacane. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
anya-e0401n:251_0: Gāthāsu. “Sattasattaggināvārā”ti sattasattavārā agginā vinassanti. Athavā, bhummatthe
anya-e0401n:251_1: paccattavacanaṃ. Sattasusattasuvāresu loko agginā vinassatīti yojanā. Tenāha “aṭṭhame
anya-e0401n:251_2: aṭṭhame”ti. “Dakā”ti udakena. Aṭṭhame aṭṭhamevāre loko dakena vinassatīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:251_3: Yadā catusaṭṭhivārā puṇṇā, tadā eko vāyuvāro siyā. Tattha “tadā”ti tasmiṃ catusaṭṭhivāre.
anya-e0401n:251_5: “Saṃvaṭṭatī”ti vinassati. “Dve asaṅkhyeyyānī”ti aḍḍhadvayaṃ ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyanti katvā
anya-e0401n:251_6: upacārena vuttaṃ. Yathātaṃ-ābhassarānaṃ aṭṭhakappānīti. “Upaḍḍhenā”ti udakavāre heṭṭhimabhūmīsu
anya-e0401n:251_7: udakena vinassamānāsu dutīyajjhānabhūmi na tāva vinassati. Saṃvaṭṭakappepi cirakālaṃ
anya-e0401n:251_8: tiṭṭhateyeva. Idaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Sabbañcetaṃ labbhamānattā vuttaṃ. Asaṅkhyeyyakappaṃ
anya-e0401n:253_1: upatthambhati. Ciraṭṭhitikaṃ karoti. “Upapīḷetī”ti janitaṃ upapīḷeti, parihāpeti.
anya-e0401n:253_3: “Kammapathapattāvā”ti ettha paṭisandhijanena sati, sabbampi kammaṃ kammapathapattaṃ
anya-e0401n:253_4: nāma hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Vipaccitthāti vipakkaṃ. Vipakkaṃ vipākaṃ yesanti vipakka
anya-e0401n:253_5: vipākā. Upatthambhamānā pavattati. Sayaṃpi paccayalābhe satīti adhippāyo. “Aladdhokāsassā”ti
anya-e0401n:253_6: idaṃ nidassana mattaṃ. Laddhokāsassapi upatthambhanaṃ nāma icchitabbameva. Aññaṃ
anya-e0401n:253_7: akusalakammaṃ okāsaṃ labhatīti yojanā. “Cāyaṃ”ti ce ayaṃ. “Kālaṅkariyā”ti kālaṃkareyya.
anya-e0401n:253_11: ritvā.“Etthā”ti upatthambhaka kammaṭṭhāne. Khandhasantānassa upabrūhananti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:253_13: sambandho. “Vuttappakārā”ti ‘vipaccituṃ aladdhokāsāvā vipakka vipākā vā sabbāpi kusalā
anya-e0401n:253_14: kusala cetanā’ti evaṃ vuttappakārā. “Dubbalataraṃ katvā vā vibādhamānā”ti upapīḷaka
anya-e0401n:253_15: kammakiccaṃ vuttaṃ. “Janaka kammassa dubbala āyūhanakāle”ti samuccayanakāle. “Vihata
anya-e0401n:253_17: tabbipariyāyena veditabbaṃ”ti upapīḷaka kammato vipariyāyena veditabbaṃ. ‘Uparibhūmi
anya-e0401n:253_19: samānaṃ uparibhūmiyaṃ nibbattetī’tiādinā vattabbanti adhippāyo. Ajātasatturājavatthumhi
anya-e0401n:253_20: tassa rañño pitughātakammaṃ mahāavīciniraye nibbattanakampi samānaṃ pacchā buddhu
anya-e0401n:253_21: paṭṭhāna kammena bādhīyamānaṃ vihatasāmatthiyaṃ hutvā taṃ ussadaniraye nibbatteti.
anya-e0401n:253_22: Khandhasantānassa vibādhanaṃ nāma sattassa dukkhuppatti karaṇanti sambandho. Kathaṃ
anya-e0401n:253_23: gomahiṃsādīnaṃ puttadārañātimittānañca vipattikaraṇaṃ tassa sattassa upapīḷaka kammakiccaṃ
anya-e0401n:253_24: bhaveyya. Aññohi so puggalo, aññe gomahiṃsādayo. Na ca aññena kataṃ kammaṃ aññesaṃ
anya-e0401n:253_25: sattānaṃ dukkhuppattiṃ vā sukhuppattiṃ vā kareyyāti codanā. Duvidhantiādinā taṃ vissajjeti.
anya-e0401n:253_26: Ānanda seṭṭhivatthumhi. Soseṭṭhi mahāmacchariyo ahosi. Aññepi dānaṃ dente nīvāresi.
anya-e0401n:253_27: So tato cavitvā ekasmiṃ gāmake ekissā itthiyākucchimhi jāto. Tassa jātakālato paṭṭhāya
anya-e0401n:253_28: tassa pāpakammena mātaraṃ ādiṃ katvā sakalagāmikānaṃ janānaṃ dukkhuppatti hotīti
anya-e0401n:253_29: dhammapada aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Tasmā nissandaphalavasena aññena kataṃ kammaṃ aññesaṃ
anya-e0401n:253_30: sattānaṃ dukkhuppattiṃ vā sukhuppattiṃ vā karoti yevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. [“Kammajasantati
anya-e0401n:253_31: sīsesū”ti paṭisandhikālato paṭṭhāya uppannā ekekā kammajarūpasantati nāma atthi.
anya-e0401n:253_32: Sā pacchā aparāparaṃ tādisāya kammajarūpasantatiyā pavattatthāya sīsabhūtattā santati
anya-e0401n:253_33: sīsanti vuccati. Yaṃ kiñci ekaṃ vākammajasantati sīsaṃ. Dve vākammajasantati sīsāni
anya-e0401n:253_34: ]. Visuddhimaggapāṭhe. “Tadevā”ti taṃ upaghātaka kammameva. “Idha cā”ti imasmiṃ abhidhammatthasaṅgahe.
anya-e0401n:253_35: “Imassa pī”ti imassa upaghātaka kammassapi. Duṭṭhagāmaṇi rañño vatthumhi ca soṇatthera
anya-e0401n:253_36: pituno vatthumhi ca tesaṃ maraṇāsannakāle pathamaṃ duggati nimittāni upaṭṭhahanti.
anya-e0401n:253_37: Pacchā rañño ekaṃ pubbakataṃ kalyāṇa kammaṃ anussarantassa therapitu ca taṅkhaṇe
anya-e0401n:253_38: eva ekaṃ kalyāṇa kammaṃ karontassa tāni duggati nimittāni antaradhāyanti. Sagganimittāni
anya-e0401n:253_39: pātubbhavanti. Ubhopi cavitvā sagge nibbattantīti. Kusalā kusala kammānaṃ khayaṃ
anya-e0401n:253_40: karotīti kusalā kusala kammakkhayakaro. “Āyu kammesu vijjamānesū”ti tassa sattassa
anya-e0401n:253_41: āyu paricchedo ca pariyanta gato na hoti, kammānubhāvo ca parikkhīṇo na hoti. Evaṃ
anya-e0401n:253_42: āyu kammesu vijjamānesu. “Aparādha kammassā”ti mātāpitūsuvā dhammikasamaṇa brāhmaṇesu
anya-e0401n:253_43: vā aparajjhanavasena katassa aparādhakammassa. “So panā”ti majjhimaṭṭhakathāvādo
anya-e0401n:253_45: panā”ti majjhimaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana. “Sabbañcetaṃ”ti sabbañca etaṃ suttavacanaṃ, vasena
anya-e0401n:253_46: vuttanti sambandho. Anicchantehi ṭīkā cariyehi. “Vipākaṃ paṭiicchitabbo”ti vipākaṃ
anya-e0401n:253_47: paṭicca icchi tabbo. Ettha “vipākaṃ”ti kammanibbattakkhandha santānaṃ vuccati. Tassa
anya-e0401n:253_48: janakaṃ kammaṃ janaka kammanti vuccati. Tasseva khandhasantānassa upatthambhakaṃ
anya-e0401n:253_49: tasseva upapīḷakaṃ tasseva upaghātakaṃ kammaṃ upaghātaka kammanti vuccatīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:253_50: “Sāketa pañhe”ti vipākuddhāre āgate sāketa pañhe. Dhammadinnāya nāma uggasena rañño
anya-e0401n:253_51: deviyā vatthumhi sādevī pubbe ekaṃ ajaṃ ghātesi, tena kammena apāyesu patitvā pacchā
anya-e0401n:253_52: pavatti vipākavasena bahūsu bhavesu ajasarīre lomagaṇanāmattaṃ attano sīsacchedana
anya-e0401n:253_53: dukkhaṃ anubhosīti. “Sā panā”ti sā ekā pāṇātipāta cetanā pana. Mahāmoggalāna vatthu
anya-e0401n:253_54: nāma pañcasata corānaṃ therassa ghāta na vatthu. Therohi attanā pubbakatena upacchedaka
anya-e0401n:253_55: kammena coraghātanaṃ labhitvā parinibbuto. Sāmāvatidevī ca vaggumudānaditīravāsino
anya-e0401n:253_56: pañcasata bhikkhū ca attano pubbakatehi upacchedaka kammehi tādisaṃ parūpakkamaṃ
anya-e0401n:253_57: labhitvā saggesu nibbattā. Dussimāro nāma kakusandha buddhakāle māradeva putto vuccati.
anya-e0401n:253_58: Kalāburājānāma khanti vāditā pasassa ghātako vuccati. Te pana taṅkhaṇe attanā katena
anya-e0401n:253_59: upacchedaka kammena taṅkhaṇe eva cavitvā avīcimhi nibbattā. Tattha purima vatthūsu
anya-e0401n:253_60: upacchedaka kammaṃ upacchindana mattaṃ karoti. Na attano vipākaṃ deti. Pacchimavatthūsu
anya-e0401n:253_61: pana upacchindanañca karoti, vipākañca detīti. Vibhāvanipāṭhe. “Upacchedana pubbakaṃ”ti
anya-e0401n:253_62: upacchedana pubbakaṃ vipākaṃ janetīti yojanā. Kammantarassa vipākaṃ upacchinditvāva
anya-e0401n:253_63: attano vipākaṃ janetīti adhippāyo. Tattha “attano vipākaṃ janetī”ti idha kadāci janeti,
anya-e0401n:253_64: kadāci na janetīti evaṃ vibhāgassa akatattā “taṃ na sundaraṃ”ti vuttaṃ. Tenāha “idha
anya-e0401n:253_65: pubbakatenā”tiādiṃ. “Aṭṭhakathāsuyeva āgatattā”ti tesu vatthūsu tejanā upacchedaka
anya-e0401n:253_66: kammena marantīti evaṃ vatvā āgatattā. Vipākaṃ nibbattetīti vipāka nibbattakaṃ. Tassa
anya-e0401n:253_67: bhāvo vipāka nibbattakattaṃ. Vipāka nibbattakattassa abhāvoti viggaho.
anya-e0401n:255_0: 136. “Nikanti balena vā paṭibāhiyamānaṃ vipākaṃ na detī”ti jhānalābhino hutvāpi maraṇakāle
anya-e0401n:255_1: uppajjituṃ nikantiyā sati, taṃ jhānaṃ vipākaṃ na detīti adhippāyo. “Ekassā”ti ekassa
anya-e0401n:255_2: puggalassa. “Tesaṃ”ti mahaggatakamma ānantariya kammānaṃ. Antima javanavīthiyaṃ kataṃ
anya-e0401n:255_3: nāma vatthu dubbalattā sayampi dubbalaṃ hoti. Paṭisandhiṃ na janeti. Tenāha “antima
anya-e0401n:255_4: javanavīthito pubbabhāge āsanne kataṃ”ti. Idañca kammasāmañña vasena vuttaṃ. Kammavisese
anya-e0401n:255_5: pana sati, na detīti na vattabbanti dassetuṃ “micchādiṭṭhikammaṃ panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:255_6: Kataṃ āsanna kammaṃ nāmāti gahetabbanti yojanā. Pāḷipāṭhe. Assapuggalassa maraṇakālevā
anya-e0401n:255_7: sammādiṭṭhi samattā samādinnā, micchādiṭṭhi samattā samādinnāti yojanā. Parato paripuṇṇaṃ
anya-e0401n:255_8: āgamissati. Somanassa janakaṃ paracetanā pavattivasena. Santāpa janakaṃ kukkuccavippaṭisārappavattivasena.
anya-e0401n:255_9: Idaṃ garuka catukkaṃ nāma anantare bhave vipaccanakānaṃ kammānaṃ vasena vuttanti
anya-e0401n:255_10: āha “upapajjavedanīya kammāni evā”ti. Kammaṃ nāma kusalaṃ vā hotu, akusalaṃ vā. Punappunaṃ
anya-e0401n:255_11: laddhā sevane sati, vipākaṃ deti. Asati na deti. Kāmāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa
anya-e0401n:255_12: katattā upacitattā vipākaṃ uppannaṃ hoti cakkhu viññāṇanti ca, akusalassa kammassa
anya-e0401n:255_13: katattā upacitattā vipākaṃ uppannaṃ hoti cakkhu viññāṇanti ca, pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ. Etthahi
anya-e0401n:255_14: katattāti vatvā puna upacitattāti vacanaṃ punappunaṃ vaḍḍhanasaṅkhāte āsevane sati
anya-e0401n:255_15: eva vipākaṃ detīti ñāpeti. Tasmā katamatta kammattā kaṭattā kammaṃ nāmāti vuttepi
anya-e0401n:255_16: anantarabhave vipaccanaka kammasseva idha adhippetattā punappunaṃ laddhā sevanameva
anya-e0401n:255_17: idha gahetabbanti dassetuṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “punappunaṃ laddhāsevanaṃ”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:256_0: “Evañca katvā”tiādīsu. “Yattha taṃ pubbakataṃ kammanti āgataṃ”ti yasmiṃ aṭṭhakathā
anya-e0401n:256_1: padese taṃ kaṭattā kammaṃ pubbakataṃ kammaṃti āgataṃ. “Kasmā idhā”tiādīsu. “Idhā”ti
anya-e0401n:256_2: imasmiṃ abhidhammattha saṅgahe. Pāḷiyaṃ. Yaṃ garukaṃ, taṃ vipākaṃ deti. Tasmiṃ asati,
anya-e0401n:256_3: yaṃ bahulaṃ. Tasmiṃ asati, yaṃ āsannaṃ. Tasmiṃ asati, yaṃ kaṭattā vā pana kammaṃ,
anya-e0401n:256_4: taṃ vipākaṃ detīti attho. Sesamettha suviññeyyaṃ.
anya-e0401n:257_1: tadatthavivaraṇaṃ. “Pariyattaṃ”ti samatthaṃ. Tambadādhikassa yāvajīvaṃ bahūni pāpakammāni
anya-e0401n:257_2: āciṇṇāni. Maraṇa divase pana sāriputtattherassa dhammadesanaṃ sutvā cavitvā tena
anya-e0401n:257_3: āsanna kammena sagge nibbatti. Vātakālassa yāvajīvaṃ bahūni kalyāṇa kammāni āciṇṇāni.
anya-e0401n:257_4: Maraṇa divasepana buddhasāsane viparīta saññaṃ katvā tena āsanna kammena apāye nibbatti.
anya-e0401n:259_0: 147. Diṭṭhadhammacatukke. Passitabboti diṭṭho. “Dhammo”ti khandhāyatana dhamma samūho.
anya-e0401n:259_1: Diṭṭho dhammoti diṭṭha dhammo. Vattamāno dhammasamūho. Yo attabhāvoti vuccati. Attasaṅkhātassa
anya-e0401n:259_2: diṭṭhiyā parikappitasārassa bhāvo pavatti kāraṇanti katvāti imamatthaṃ dassento “diṭṭha
anya-e0401n:259_3: dhammo vuccatī”tiādimāha. “Vipākaṃ paṭisaṃvedetī”ti etena kathaṃ kammasādhanaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0401n:259_4: Paṭisaṃvedana kriyāpade vipākanti kammapadaṃ disvā vipākaṃ nāma veditabbaṃ vedanīyaṃ.
anya-e0401n:259_6: upecca pajjitvā. Pāpuṇitvāti attho. Vibhāvanipāṭhe. “Diṭṭha dhammato”ti diṭṭha dhammassa.
anya-e0401n:259_7: Sāmiatthe pañcamī. Pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ. “Etthahī”tiādi pubbavākye vutta nayameva. Aparasaddo
anya-e0401n:259_8: niccaṃ apādānā pekkho. Tañca apādānaṃ nāma anantare vuttapadehi. “Diṭṭhadhammā nāgatānantara
anya-e0401n:259_9: bhavehī”ti diṭṭhadhammato ca anāgatānantara bhavato cāti attho. “Parivatto”ti pabandho.
anya-e0401n:259_10: Aparāpariyoti vā, aparo ca aparo ca aparāparo. Aparāpare pavatto aparāpariyoti attho.
anya-e0401n:259_11: “Upapajjabhavaṃ”ti anāgatānantarabhavaṃ. Ahosi kamme “ahosī”ti padaṃ aññāsi koṇḍaññoti
anya-e0401n:259_12: padeviya ruḷhīnāmapadanti āha “ahosi nāmakaṃ”ti. Taṃ pana ruḷhipadaṃ kutopavattaṃti
anya-e0401n:259_13: āha “ahosi kammaṃ”tiādiṃ. “Evaṃ vutta pāṭhavasenā”ti ettha idha vutto pāṭho sā vaseso.
anya-e0401n:259_14: Paripuṇṇapāṭho pana ahosi kammaṃ ahosi kamma vipāko, ahosi kammaṃ nāhosi kamma vipāko,
anya-e0401n:259_15: ahosi kammaṃ atthikamma vipāko, ahosi kammaṃ natthi kammavipāko, ahosikammaṃ bhavissati
anya-e0401n:259_16: kamma vipāko, ahosi kammaṃ na bhavissati kamma vipākotiādinā paṭisambhidā magge āgato.
anya-e0401n:259_17: “Sā”ti pathama javana cetanā. “Appatara vipākā cātī”ti ettha “itī”ti hetu atthe nipāto,
anya-e0401n:259_18: tasmā aciraṭṭhiti kattā diṭṭha dhamme eva phalaṃ datvā vigacchati, tasmā appatara
anya-e0401n:259_19: vipākattā ahetukamattaṃ phalaṃ datvā vigacchatīti yojanā. “Paccayoti cā”ti paccayaṃ
anya-e0401n:259_20: laddhāti vutto paccayoti ca. “So”ti mahantaṃ vutto paccayo. “Kākavaliyādīnaṃ viyā”ti
anya-e0401n:259_22: sattāhabbhantare eva seṭṭhiṭṭhānappaṭi lābhādivasena pākaṭatarapphaladānakaṃ kammavisesaṃ.
anya-e0401n:259_23: Kamma pathajavanasantāne pavattā pathamajavana cetanā vā itarāpi pathama javana cetanā
anya-e0401n:259_24: vāti yojanā. “Kācī”ti ekaccā pathamajavana cetanā. Sesāni diṭṭhadhamma vedanīya kammāni.
anya-e0401n:260_1: vuttaṃ hoti. Suṭṭhu niṭṭhāpetīti sanniṭṭhāpikā. “Sesāni pī”ti sesāni upapajja vedanīya
anya-e0401n:260_2: kammānipi. “Idhā”ti imasmiṃ manussa loke. “Missakakammānī”ti kusalā kusalamissakāni
anya-e0401n:260_3: kammāni. Vemānikapetavatthūni vimānavatthu pāḷiyaṃ āgatāni. “Sugatiyaṃ vipattiṃ anubhavantāni
anya-e0401n:260_4: vatthūnī”ti ettha “vipattiṃ”ti cakkhu sotādīnaṃ aṅga paccaṅgānaṃ vā vipattiṃ. Nānā
anya-e0401n:260_5: dukkhuppattibhūtaṃ vā vipattiṃ. “Duggatiyaṃ sampattiṃ”ti mahiddhīnaṃ nāgasupaṇṇādīnaṃ
anya-e0401n:260_6: sampattiṃ. “Yathā vutta vatthūhī”ti vemānika petavatthādīhi. Aṭṭhakathāpāṭhe. “Tesaṃ
anya-e0401n:260_7: saṅkamanaṃ natthī”ti tesaṃ kammānaṃ vipaccanakāla saṅkanti nāma natthi. “Yathāṭhāneyeva
anya-e0401n:260_8: patiṭṭhantī”ti tāni diṭṭha dhammaṭṭhānādivasena bhagavatā yathā vuttaṭṭhāne eva tiṭṭhanti.
anya-e0401n:260_9: “Evaṃ vuttaṃ”ti tesaṃ saṅkamanaṃ natthītiādinayena vuttaṃ. “Yuttiyā vā abhāvato”ti
anya-e0401n:260_10: ettha diṭṭha dhamma vedanīyassa paṭisandhi vipākādi yuttiyā abhāvato.
anya-e0401n:262_1: hoti. “Atipātentī”ti atikkamma payogena abhibhavitvā pātenti. Tenāha “atipātanañcetthā”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:262_4: parapariggahita bhāvato. “Acchindaka cetanā”ti parasantakassa attano santakakaraṇavasena
anya-e0401n:262_5: bhusaṃ parasantakā bhāvacchindaka cetanā. Viluppana cetanāti vuttaṃ hoti. “Maggena
anya-e0401n:262_6: maggappaṭipādakassā”ti attano maggena paramagga sampayojakassa. “Etthapī”ti yathā
anya-e0401n:262_7: adinnādāne parapariggahita saññinoti dutīyaṃ aṅgapadaṃ vuttaṃ. Evaṃ etthapi. Ettha
anya-e0401n:262_8: vadanti agamanīya vatthu vasena cittanti avatvā tasmiṃ sevana cittanti vuttaṃ. Tasmā
anya-e0401n:262_9: agamanīya vatthu saññitāti avuttampi vuttasadisaṃ hotīti. Na hoti. Na hi tasminti
anya-e0401n:262_10: vacanaṃ saññāvisesa sahitaṃ atthaṃ vadati. Īdisesu ca ṭhānesu sace saññāpadhānaṃ
anya-e0401n:262_11: hoti. Pāṇasaññitā, parapariggahita saññitā,ti aṅga padaṃ viya idhapi agamanīya vatthu
anya-e0401n:262_12: saññitāti dutīyaṃ aṅgapadaṃ avassaṃ vattabbaṃ hoti. Kasmā, aṅganiyamaṭṭhānattā. Tenāha
anya-e0401n:262_13: “etenā”tiādiṃ. “Caturaṅgīkova vutto”ti tassa cattāro sambhārā. Agamanīya vatthu,
anya-e0401n:262_14: tasmiṃ sevana cittaṃ, sevanappayogo, maggena maggappaṭipatti adhivāsananti. “Sā”ti
anya-e0401n:262_15: bhikkhunī. “Rakkhitāsu saṅgahitā”ti māturakkhita pitu rakkhitādīsu saṅgahitā. “Ṭīkāsu
anya-e0401n:262_16: panā”ti suttantaṭīkāsu pana. “Sā”ti bhikkhunī. Pāsaṇḍā vuccanti dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhigatādīni.
anya-e0401n:262_17: Taṃ vādino pāsaṇḍiyā nāma. Tesaṃ dhammo pāsaṇḍiya dhammo nāma. Micchācāropi dussīlāya
anya-e0401n:262_18: itthiyā vītikkamo appasāvajjo. Tato gorūpa sīlikāya mahāsāvajjo. Tato saraṇaṅgatāya,
anya-e0401n:262_19: pañca sikkhā padikāya, sāmaṇeriyā, puthujjana bhikkhuniyātiādi. Aṭṭhakathā pāṭhe.
anya-e0401n:262_20: “Etthā”ti imasmiṃ akusalakāyakamme. “Na gahitaṃ”ti therena vā aṭṭhakathācariyehi
anya-e0401n:262_21: vā na gahitaṃ. Surañca merayañca pivanti etenāti surāmeraya pānaṃ. Tadajjhoharaṇa
anya-e0401n:262_22: cetanā kammaṃ. “Sabba lahuko”ti sabbesaṃ surāpāna kamma vipākānaṃ majjhe yo vipāko
anya-e0401n:262_24: saṃvattaniko. “Pañcapī”ti surāpāna kammena saha pañcapi. Mūlaṭīkā vacane. “Tassā”ti
anya-e0401n:262_25: surāpāna kammassa. Paṭisambhidā maggaṭīkāyaṃ imassa vākyassa saṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanti
anya-e0401n:262_26: sambandho. Tattha “tabbi ramaṇādayo cā”ti tato surāpānato viramaṇādayo ca. “Madassā”ti
anya-e0401n:262_27: majjanassa. “Apuññapathassā”ti akusala kamma pathassa. “Tabbirati pī”ti tato surāpānato
anya-e0401n:262_29: kusalakamma pathassa. “Itī”ti tasmā. “Tānī”ti surāpāna kammatabbirati kammāni. “Na
anya-e0401n:262_30: itaraṃ”ti kammapathehi asambandhaṃ. Surāpānaṃ visuṃ paṭisandhiṃ na detīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:262_31: Tabbirati kamme pana sace idaṃ surāpānaṃ nāma pāpakammaṃ duccaritanti ñatvā samādāna
anya-e0401n:262_32: virati sampattavirati vasena taṃ sikkhāpadaṃ rakkhati. Taṃ sīlaṃ aññehi puññapathehi
anya-e0401n:262_33: asambandhampi visuṃ paṭisandhiṃ na detīti na vattabbaṃ. “Evamidaṃ pī”ti evaṃ idampi
anya-e0401n:262_34: surāpāna kammaṃ kamma pathapattassa kammassa parivārabhūtaṃ eva paṭisandhiṃ janetīti
anya-e0401n:262_35: yojanā. “Tatthā”ti kammapathasuttesu. Sarūpato na vuttanti ca sakkā vattunti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:262_36: “Yaṃ”ti yaṃ surāpāna kammaṃ. “Tatthā”ti tesu kammapathasuttesu. Kamma jananaṃ nāma
anya-e0401n:262_37: duccarita kammānaṃ jananaṃ. Sakkena devāna mindena tassa apāyagāmitā vuttāti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:262_38: Tassāsurāya puṇṇaṃ imaṃ surākumbhaṃkiṇātha. Mūlaṃ detha gaṇhāthāti attho. “Tassā”ti
anya-e0401n:262_39: surāpāna kammassa. Apāyaṃ gameti sampāpetīti apāya gāmī. “Yadidaṃ”ti yā ayaṃ yathālābha
anya-e0401n:262_40: yojanā atthi. Mūlaṭīkā vacane. “Kammasahajātā”ti akusala kammasahajātā taṇhā. “Tesaṃ”ti
anya-e0401n:262_41: tesaṃ pañcannaṃ kammānaṃ. “Koṭṭhāsato”ti dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṃ phasso hoti, vedanā hotītiādinā
anya-e0401n:262_42: vutte dhammuddesavāre jhānādikoṭṭhāsā nāma āgatā. Tesu pañca sikkhāpadā koṭṭhāsato
anya-e0401n:262_43: kammapatha koṭṭhāsikā eva. Kammapatha koṭṭhāse antogadhāti attho. “Purimānaṃ catunnaṃ”ti
anya-e0401n:262_44: pāṇāti pātādīnaṃ catunnaṃ kammānaṃ. “Paṭikkhitto”ti tassa kammapathabhāvo paṭikkhitto.
anya-e0401n:263_0: Kāyakammādīsu. Sasambhārakāyo nāma sakalo rūpakāyo. Pasādakāyo nāma kāyapasādo eva.
anya-e0401n:263_1: Kāya viññatti copanakāyo nāma. “Copana”nti ca calanaṃ vuccati. “So yevā”ti copanakāyoyeva.
anya-e0401n:263_2: Kāyakamma nāma lābho ca hoti, tasmā so kammānaṃ pavatti mukhanti vuccatīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:263_3: “Kammāni visesetuṃ”ti idaṃ kāyakammaṃ nāma, idaṃ vacīkammaṃ nāmāti visesetuṃ niyametuṃ.
anya-e0401n:263_4: “Sakkontī”ti kammāni visesetuṃ sakkonti. Tasmā kāyadvāre vuttitoti ca vacīdvāre vuttitoti
anya-e0401n:263_5: ca vuttanti adhippāyo. Micchācārassa vacīdvāre appavattito “purimāni dve”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:263_6: “Majjhimāni cattārī”ti musāvādādīni cattāri vacīkammāni. “Chabbidhāni tāni vajjānīti”ti
anya-e0401n:263_7: ‘kāyakammaṃ jaheyyu’ntiādīni chabbidhāni tāni vajjāni. Kathaṃ ekamekena bāhulla saddena
anya-e0401n:263_8: chabbidhāni tāni vajjetīti. Anvayato ca byatirekato ca vajjeti. Kathaṃ, pāṇātipāta
anya-e0401n:263_9: kammaṃ kadāci appakena vacīdvāre uppannampi kāyadvāre eva pavatti bahulattā kāyakammameva
anya-e0401n:263_10: hoti. Vacīkamma saṅkhyaṃ na gacchati. Dve vā assa nāmāni na bhavanti. Vacīdvāre pana
anya-e0401n:263_11: appakavuttittā vacīkammaṃ nāma na hoti. Kāyakammanti nāmaṃ na jahati. Dve vā assa
anya-e0401n:263_12: nāmāni na bhavantīti evaṃ ekena kāyadvāre bāhulla vuttivacanena pāṇātipāta kamme
anya-e0401n:263_13: chabbidhāni vajjāni vajjetīti. Evaṃ sesesu. Vanacarako nāma vanaluddako. So pana
anya-e0401n:263_14: kadāci appakena gāme carantopi vane bāhulla cārittā vanacarako eva hoti. Gāmacarakoti
anya-e0401n:263_15: nāmaṃ na labhati. Dve vā assa nāmāni na bhavanti. Evaṃ saṅgāmāvacarakāpi. Saṅgāmāvacaro
anya-e0401n:263_16: nāma saṅgāme bāhullāvacaro hatthī vuccati. Ettha manodvāraṃ sabba kamma sādhāraṇattā
anya-e0401n:263_17: kammāni visesetuṃ na sakkotīti vuttaṃ. Evañcasati, ‘abhijjhā byāpādo micchādiṭṭhi
anya-e0401n:263_18: ceti manasmiṃ vuttito manokammaṃ nāmā’ti idaṃ na vattabbanti. No na vattabbaṃ. Kamma
anya-e0401n:263_19: siddhiṃ paṭicca aññadvārehi asādhāraṇattā. Tenāha “manokammāni panā”tiādiṃ. “Siddhaṃ”ti
anya-e0401n:263_20: nibbattaṃ. “Kāyakammadvāraṃ”ti ettha tattha copanakāyo kāyakammānaṃ pavatti bahulattā
anya-e0401n:263_21: kāyakamma dvāraṃ nāma. Copanavācā tattha vacīkammānaṃ pavatti bahulattā vacīkammadvāraṃ
anya-e0401n:263_22: nāma. Kusalā kusala javana cittaṃ pana manokammānaṃ tattheva kamma kicca siddhito
anya-e0401n:263_23: manokamma dvāraṃ nāmāti evaṃ kammena dvāra vavatthānaṃ veditabbaṃ. “Tassa dvārassa
anya-e0401n:263_24: nāmaṃ bhindituṃ vā”ti kāyoti nāmaṃ bhindituṃ vā. “Attano nāmaṃ dātunti vā”ti vacīti
anya-e0401n:263_25: nāmaṃ tassa dātuṃ vā. “Brāhmaṇa gāmādīnaṃ brāhmaṇa gāmādibhāvo viyā”ti tasmiṃ aññakulesu
anya-e0401n:263_26: vasantesupi brāhmaṇa kulabahulattā brāhmaṇa gāmotveva nāmaṃ hoti. Tasmiṃ vane aññarukkhesu
anya-e0401n:263_27: santesupi khadīrarukkha bahulattā khadīravanantveva nāmaṃ hotīti vattabbanti. Kāyakammaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
anya-e0401n:264_0: 149. Vacīkamme. “Musā vadantī”ti abhūtato vadanti. Pisati etāyāti pisuṇā. “Nirutti
anya-e0401n:264_1: nayenā”ti ettha piyasuñña karaṇāti vattabbe akkhara lopakaraṇaṃ nirutti nayo nāma.
anya-e0401n:264_2: “Yenā”ti yenajanena. “Samphaṃ”ti ettha saṃsaddo sammati dukkhaṃ etenāti atthena sukhe
anya-e0401n:264_3: hite vattatīti āha “saṃ sukhaṃ hitañcā”ti. Kīdisaṃ sukhaṃ hitañcāti āha “sādhujanehi
anya-e0401n:264_4: adhigantabbaṃ”ti. Etena pāpajanehi adhigantabbaṃ hitasukhaṃ paṭikkhipati. Hitasukhassa
anya-e0401n:264_5: vināsanaṃ nāma tassa āgamana maggabhindananti āha “hitasukha maggaṃ bhindatī”ti.
anya-e0401n:264_6: “Taṃ vā”ti ettha “taṃ”ti hitasukhaṃ. “Attha dhammā pagatassā”ti atthato ca dhammato
anya-e0401n:264_7: ca apagatassa. “Paṭibhāṇa cittassā”ti suṇantānaṃ cittarati cittahāsavaḍḍhanatthāya
anya-e0401n:264_8: paṭibhāṇaññāṇena cittīkatassa. “Yatthā”ti yasmiṃ kathā magge. “Attha dhamma vinayapadaṃ”ti
anya-e0401n:264_9: attha padañca dhammapadañca vinaya padañca. Tattha attho nāma ārogyasampatti, mittasampatti,
anya-e0401n:264_10: paññāsampatti, dhana sampatti, bhogasampattiyo. Tāsu kosallajanakaṃ vākyapadaṃ atthapadaṃ
anya-e0401n:264_11: nāma. Idaṃ sucaritaṃ nāma saggasaṃvattanikaṃ, idaṃ duccaritaṃ nāma apāya saṃvattanikanti
anya-e0401n:264_12: evaṃ sabhāva dhammesu kosalla janakaṃ vākya padaṃ dhamma padaṃ nāma. Evaṃ cittaṃ
anya-e0401n:264_13: damitabbaṃ, evaṃ indriyāni damitabbāni, evaṃ rāgo vinetabbo, evaṃ doso vinetabbotiādinā
anya-e0401n:264_14: vinetabbesu vinaya kosallajanakaṃ vākyapadaṃ vinaya padaṃ nāma. Yattha evarūpaṃ attha
anya-e0401n:264_15: padañca dhamma padañca vinaya padañca kiñci natthi. Tassa vācā vatthumattassa etaṃnāmaṃ
anya-e0401n:264_16: hotīti yojanā. “Samphaṃ”ti vuttappakāraṃ niratthakavacanaṃ. “Tatthā”ti tesu vacīkammesu.
anya-e0401n:264_17: Visaṃvādanaṃ nāma virajjhā panaṃ. Visaṃvādako nāma virajjhāpanako. Atthaṃ bhañjati
anya-e0401n:264_18: vināsetīti attha bhañjanako. “Kammapathabhedo”ti paṭisandhi janako kammapathaviseso.
anya-e0401n:264_19: “Itaro”ti attha bhañjanakato añño musāvādo. “Kamma mevā”ti pavatti vipāka janakaṃ
anya-e0401n:264_20: vacīkammameva. “Rajānaṃ”ti dhūlīnaṃ. Tāsu sugati duggatīsu uppajjantīti taduppajjanakāni.
anya-e0401n:264_22: Mittaṃ bhindatīti bhedako. “Saṃkiliṭṭha cetanā”ti attha purekkhāra dhamma purekkhāra
anya-e0401n:264_23: vinaya purekkhāra anusāsani purekkhāra rahitā kevalaṃ bhedapurekkhāra cetanā saṃkiliṭṭha
anya-e0401n:264_24: cetanā nāma. “Pare bhinne yevā”ti parajane parajanena mithubhedavasena bhinneyeva.
anya-e0401n:264_25: “Yaṃ kiñcī”ti yaṃ kiñci akkosavatthu. “Ayaṃ pī”ti ayaṃ pharusavācāpi. Evaṃ akkosana
anya-e0401n:264_26: kammaṃpi akkositabbassa dūre ṭhitassapi matassapi sampajjatīti yojanā. Anatthaṃ niratthakavācā
anya-e0401n:264_27: vatthu mattaṃ viññāpetīti anatthaviññāpanako. “Saccato gaṇhante yevā”ti yathā so
anya-e0401n:264_28: katheti, tathā taṃ vatthu uppanna pubbanti evaṃ saccato gaṇhanteyeva. Keci saccato
anya-e0401n:264_29: gaṇhitvā kiñci vatthuṃ pūjanīya ṭhāne ṭhapetvā thomentā pūjentā vandantā pariharanti.
anya-e0401n:264_30: Samparāyi katthāya taṃ saraṇaṃ gacchanti. Sabbametaṃ niratthakaṃ hoti. “Tadassādavasenā”ti
anya-e0401n:264_31: taṃ rājakathādiṃ tattha cittaratiṃ labhitvā assādavasena kathentasseva kammaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:264_32: Anicca lakkhaṇa vibhāvanatthāya vā ratanattaya guṇavibhāvanatthāya vā pāpa garaha
anya-e0401n:264_33: kalyāṇa sambhāvanāya vā kathentassa pana satthakameva hotīti adhippāyo. Tenāha “attha
anya-e0401n:264_34: dhamma vinaya nissitaṃ”tiādiṃ. Sesamettha kāyadvāre dīpitameva.
anya-e0401n:265_0: 150. Manokamme. “Abhijhāyantī”ti atirekataraṃ jhāyanti, cintenti, olokenti vāti imamatthaṃ
anya-e0401n:265_2: Tañca āpādanaṃ na kāyavācāhi. Atha kho cittenevāti vuttaṃ “cintentī”ti. “Tabbi parītato”ti
anya-e0401n:265_3: sappurisa paññattito viparītena. “Tatthā”ti tesu manokammesu. “Idaṃ mamassā”ti idaṃ
anya-e0401n:265_4: santakaṃ mamasantakaṃ bhaveyya, aho sādhu vatāti yojanā. “Attano katvā”ti attano
anya-e0401n:265_5: santakaṃ katvā. “Lābhāvatime”ti ettha sulābhaṃ labhantīti lābhā. “Attano kareyyaṃ”ti
anya-e0401n:265_6: attano santakaṃ kareyyaṃ. Parabhaṇḍaṃ vatthu yassāti parabhaṇḍa vatthuko. “Vatthū”ti
anya-e0401n:265_7: ārammaṇabhūtaṃ vatthu. Yāva na pariṇāmeti, tāva na kammapathabhedo hotīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:265_8: “Vuttañhetaṃ aṭṭhakathāsū”ti adhikāro. “Ayaṃ”ti ayaṃ satto. “Tassā”ti tassa sattassa.
anya-e0401n:265_10: Dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhigatesu kācidiṭṭhiyo natthikādi sabhāvā honti. Idha pana tabbahulanayena
anya-e0401n:265_11: kammamevāti vuttaṃ. Yathāvuttoti sambandho. Gacchantassa puggalassa. “Cittuppādo”ti
anya-e0401n:265_12: maggacittuppāde. “Passanto”ti tīṇi lakkhaṇāni passanto. Vuttoti sambandho. “Niyāmaṃ”ti
anya-e0401n:265_13: sammatta niyāmaṃ. Aviparītaniyāmanti attho. Puna “niyāmaṃ”ti micchattaniyāmaṃ. Viparīta
anya-e0401n:265_14: niyāmanti attho. Tikicchituṃ asakkuṇeyyoti atekiccho. Ekantena apāyagāmī hotīti attho.
anya-e0401n:265_16: saddahana mattenāti adhippāyo. “Sakaṃ ācariyakaṃ”ti attano ācariyassa santakabhūtaṃ.
anya-e0401n:265_17: Ṭhito puggalo. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vutto, yathāha micchattatike micchāsabhāvāti micchattā.
anya-e0401n:265_18: Vipākadāne sati, khandhabhedānantarameva vipākadānato niyatā. Micchattā ca te niyatā
anya-e0401n:265_19: cāti micchattaniyatā. Sammāsa bhāvāti sammattā. Sammattā ca te niyatā ca anantarameva
anya-e0401n:265_21: “Etenā”ti etenapi saddena. “Imesaṃ”ti manokammānaṃ. “Etenā”ti manasmiṃ evāti vacanena.
anya-e0401n:265_23: “Atthantarappasaṅgo hotī”ti kathaṃ hoti. Evasaddena vinā pāṇātipāta kammaṃ kāyadvāre
anya-e0401n:265_24: bāhulla vuttito kāyakammaṃ nāmāti vutte idaṃ laddhātapatto rājakumāroti viya upalakkhaṇanayamattaṃ.
anya-e0401n:265_25: Tena sesadvāresupi bāhulla vuttiṃ upasallakkhetīti atthantarappasaṅgo siyāti. Evaṃ
anya-e0401n:265_26: sesanayesupīti. “Apicā”ti kiñci vattabbaṃ atthīti joteti. “Tesū”ti pāṇavadhādīsu.
anya-e0401n:265_27: “Ekaṃ aṅgaṃ”ti upakkamoti catutthaṃ aṅgaṃ. “Taṃ sahajātā cā”ti cetanā sahajātā ca.
anya-e0401n:265_28: Cetanā pakkhe bhavāti cetanā pakkhikā. Cetanā viya kāyakammabhāvaṃ gacchantīti vuttaṃ
anya-e0401n:265_29: hoti. “Abbohārikattaṃ gacchantī”ti manokammanti voharituṃ appahonakattaṃ gacchantīti
anya-e0401n:265_30: attho. Attā padhānaṃ yesaṃ te attappadhānā. Abhijjhādayo. Attappadhānā na honti.
anya-e0401n:265_31: Cetanā padhānā honti. Idheva te attappadhānā hontīti attho. “Tathā tathā”ti ahovata
anya-e0401n:265_32: idaṃ mamassātiādinā tena tena pakārena. “Tatthā”ti tesu manokammesu. “Sabbena sabbaṃ”ti
anya-e0401n:265_34: kiccavisesenā”ti ahovata idaṃ mamassātiādikena kicca visesena. Manokamma dīpanā niṭṭhitā.
anya-e0401n:266_0: 151. “Ettha ca dasannaṃ pī”tiādīsu. “Tāpī”ti tā pubbāparacetanāyopi. Ādito paṭṭhāya
anya-e0401n:266_1: pavattā tāpīti sambandho. “Yānipanā”tiādīsu. Eko ekassa vadati ahaṃ imaṃ sattaṃ māremi,
anya-e0401n:266_2: tvaṃ asukaṃsattaṃ mārehīti. Evaṃ vatvā ubhopi upakkamaṃ karonti. Kammaṃ pana ubhinnampi
anya-e0401n:266_3: na sijjhati. Tattha āṇāpakassa tvaṃ asukaṃ sattaṃ mārehīti āṇāpana kammaṃ sace sijjhati.
anya-e0401n:266_4: Vacīdvāre pavattaṃ kāyakammanti vuccati. Idha pana asiddhattā vacīdvāre dissa mānaṃ
anya-e0401n:266_5: vacīkammanti vuccati. Vacīduccaritamattanti vuttaṃ hoti. Esanayo sesesupi.
anya-e0401n:267_0: “Dosamūlenā”tiādīsu. Doso eva mūlaṃ dosamūlaṃ. Doso mūlaṃ massāti dosamūlaṃ. Taṃ
anya-e0401n:267_1: sampayutta cittanti dvidhā attho. Byāpādo nāma doso eva. So kathaṃ dosena mūlena
anya-e0401n:267_2: jāyeyyāti vuttaṃ “purimo byāpādavajjehī”ti. Parato abhijjhāyampi esanayo. Vibhāvanipāṭhe.
anya-e0401n:267_3: Nidhipāṭhakā nāma rājanidhi vidhāyakā. Tattha caṇḍo niggahetabboti āgatattā duṭṭhaniggahatthanti
anya-e0401n:267_4: vuttaṃ. Rājūnaṃ adinnādānaṃ mohamūlena jāyatīti yojanā. “Brāhmaṇānañcā”ti sakasaññāya
anya-e0401n:267_5: eva yaṃ kiñci harantānaṃ brāhmaṇānañca kammaphalasambandhāpavādīnañca. “Āharaṇaṃ”ti
anya-e0401n:267_6: adinnādānavasena haraṇaṃ. Avaharaṇanti vuttaṃ hoti. Yo pana moho rājūnaṃ uppanno,
anya-e0401n:267_7: yo ca brāhmaṇānaṃ uppanno, yo ca kamma phalasambandhā pavādīnaṃ uppannoti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:267_8: “Lobho nidānaṃ kammānaṃ samudayāyā”ti lobho kammānaṃ suṭṭhuvaḍḍhanāya nidānaṃ kāraṇaṃ
anya-e0401n:267_9: hotīti yojanā. Sañjātā kaṅkhāyesaṃ te sañjātakaṅkhā. Parito uṭṭhāti etthāti pariyuṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0401n:267_10: Kaṅkhāya pariyuṭṭhānaṃ kaṅkhāpariyuṭṭhānaṃ. Janānaṃ tānikammānīti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:269_0: 157. Kusalakamme. Ayaṃ pana evamādīsu suttapadesu āgatoti sambandho. “Mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ”ti
anya-e0401n:269_1: mettāsahagataṃ kāyakammaṃ. Evaṃ vacīkammepi. Cetanā hettha kammanti adhippetā. Manokamme
anya-e0401n:269_2: pana cetanāpi yujjati. Abyāpādopi yujjati. Ñāṇaṃ anuparivattīti ñāṇānuparivattaṃ.
anya-e0401n:269_3: Ñāṇānuparivattītipi pāṭho, so yevattho. “Padakkhiṇaṃ”ti pavaḍḍhitaṃ. Aparaṃ pariyāyaṃ
anya-e0401n:269_4: dasseti “yasmiṃ panā”tiādinā. Dussīlassa bhāvo dussilyaṃ. Pāṇātipātādikammaṃ. “Pavattamāne”ti
anya-e0401n:269_5: kāyadvāre pavattamāne. “Yaṃ pana kusalaṃ”ti pāṇāti pātādito virati kusalaṃ. “Pavattamānaṃ”ti
anya-e0401n:269_6: citte pavattamānaṃ. “Kicca sīsenā”ti kiccappadhānena. Kiccaṃ padhānaṃ katvāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:270_0: “Vacīkammepi esevanayo”ti yasmiṃ dussilye pavattamāne vācā aparisuddhā hoti. Vacī
anya-e0401n:270_1: saṃvaro bhijjatītiādinā vattabbaṃ. “Avasesaṃ panā”ti tīhi kāyakammehi catūhi vacīkammehi
anya-e0401n:270_2: avasesaṃ. Tattha “tīhi kāyakammehī”ti tīhi kāyaduccarita virati kammehi. “Catūhi
anya-e0401n:270_3: vacīkammehī”ti catūhi vacīduccarita virati kammehi. “Sabbaṃpi kalyāṇa kammaṃ”ti sabbampi
anya-e0401n:270_4: dānakammaṃ, sabbampi bhāvanā kammaṃ, apacāyana kammaṃ, veyyāvaccakammaṃ, pattidānakammaṃ,
anya-e0401n:270_5: pattānumodanākammaṃ, dhammasavana kammaṃ, dhamma desanā kammaṃ, sabbampi diṭṭhijukammaṃ
anya-e0401n:270_6: tīsudvāresu pavattampi manokammaṃ nāmāti yojanā. Imesu pana dvīsu pariyāyesu pacchimoyeva
anya-e0401n:270_7: padhānanti sambandho. “Yāva devā”ti antima pariccheda jotako nipāto. Matthakaparicchedenāti attho.
anya-e0401n:271_0: Sīlapade. “Sīlayatī”ti sammā dahati ca upadhāreti cāti dvidhā attho. “Susamāhitānī”ti
anya-e0401n:271_1: suppatiṭṭhitāni. “Uparime kusala dhamme”ti mahaggata lokuttara kusaladhamme. Sattasu
anya-e0401n:271_2: visuddhīsu uparime citta visuddhādi kusaladhamme. “Adhikusala dhamme”ti adhike bodhipakkhiya
anya-e0401n:271_3: kusala dhamme. Parehi dinnaṃ, tadeva pattiṃ. Sabbāni pana tāni dānādīni kusalāni.
anya-e0401n:271_4: Sodhenti sappurisājanā. Tāni evapuññāni. Ekamekaṃ puññakriyavatthu. “Iminā paccayenā”ti
anya-e0401n:271_5: cīvarādi paccayena, annapānādi paccayena, dhana dhanaññādipaccayena vā. “Sabbaṃpi
anya-e0401n:271_6: cetaṃ”ti sabbampi etaṃ dasavidhaṃ puññaṃ. “Hīnena chandenā”ti yasakāmatādivasena
anya-e0401n:271_7: hīnena chandena, hīnena cittena, hīnena vīriyena, hīnāya vīmaṃsāya. “Majjhimenā”ti
anya-e0401n:271_9: brūhanavasena paṇītena chandādinā pavatti taṃ paṇītanti yojanā. “Yasakāmatāyā”ti
anya-e0401n:271_10: kitti saddakāmatāya vā, parivārakāmatāya vā. “Puññapphalakāmatāyā”ti bhavasampatti
anya-e0401n:271_11: bhogasampattikāmatāya. “Ariyabhāvaṃ nissāyā”ti idaṃ dānaṃ nāma ariyānaṃ vaṃso. Ahampi
anya-e0401n:271_12: ariyo. Tasmā mayāpi kattabbamevidanti evaṃ ariyabhāvaṃ nissāyāti attho. Ettha ca
anya-e0401n:271_13: “ariyo”ti ācāra ariyopi yujjati dassana ariyopi. Tattha ācāra ariyo nāma sappuriso
anya-e0401n:271_14: puthujjana kalyāṇako vuccati. Dassana ariyo nāma paramattha ariyo. “Pāramitā dānaṃ”ti
anya-e0401n:271_15: sabbadānehi aggapattaṃ mahābodhi sattānaṃ pāraṅgatadānaṃ. Tañhi sabba sattavimokkhatthāya
anya-e0401n:271_16: pavatti tattā aggapattaṃ hoti, pāraṅgataṃ. Tato uttaritarassa kassacidānassa abhāvato.
anya-e0401n:271_17: Sesesupi puñña kriyavatthūsu. “Tikadvayaṃ”ti purimādi hīnādi tikadvayaṃ. “Antima
anya-e0401n:271_18: vatthunā”ti antima vatthu ajjhāpajjanena vā. “Dussīlo nāmā”ti dussīla bhikkhu nāma.
anya-e0401n:271_19: So hi yāvabhikkhuppaṭīññaṃ na vijahi. Tāva bhikkhu eva. Na sāmaṇero, na gihī. Taṃ
anya-e0401n:271_20: ce añño bhikkhu amūlakena antima vatthunā anuddhaṃseti. Anuddhaṃsentassa saṅghādi
anya-e0401n:271_21: seso. Omasavāde pācittiyaṃ. Sahaseyyaṭṭhāne tena saha atireka rattiṃ sayantassāpi
anya-e0401n:271_22: āpatti natthi. Tasmā so dussīla bhikkhutveva vattabboti. “Puna kammavācāya samādātabbanti
anya-e0401n:271_23: natthī”ti yathā sikkhaṃ paccakkhantassa sabbaṃ samādānaṃ bhijjati. Puna bhikkhubhāvaṃ
anya-e0401n:271_24: icchantena puna kammavācāya samādātabbaṃ hoti. Evaṃ puna kammavācāya samādātabbanti
anya-e0401n:271_25: natthi. “Itaresu panā”ti liṅganāsanaṅgato aññesu daṇḍakammaṅgesu. Niccasīlādīsu.
anya-e0401n:271_26: “Yaṃ niccameva vaṭṭatī”ti yaṃ pāṇātipāta virati sīlaṃ niccameva rakkhituṃ vaṭṭati.
anya-e0401n:271_27: Aniccaṃ na vaṭṭati. Kasmā, pāṇaghātādiṃ karontassa sabbakālampi duccarita sambhavato.
anya-e0401n:271_28: Tenāha “aniccaṃ sāvajjaṃ hotī”ti. Duccaritaṃ hotīti attho. “Yaṃ niccampi vaṭṭatī”ti
anya-e0401n:271_29: pakati gahaṭṭhānaṃ yaṃ vikāla bhojanādi virati sīlaṃ niccampi vaṭṭati. “Aniccampi
anya-e0401n:271_30: vaṭṭatī”ti samādāna divasaṃ atikkamitvā vikāla bhojanādiṃ karontassa vītikkama dosovā
anya-e0401n:271_31: duccarita doso vā natthīti adhippāyo. Tenāha “sāvajjaṃ na hotī”ti. Duccaritaṃ na
anya-e0401n:271_32: hotīti attho. Tathā dasasīlañca pakati gahaṭṭhānaṃ aniccasīlaṃ nāmāti yojanā. “Aniccasīlameva
anya-e0401n:271_33: hotī”ti pakati gahaṭṭhānaṃ taṃ dasasīlaṃ yāvajīvaṃ niccaṃ katvā samādiyitvā rakkhantānampi
anya-e0401n:271_34: apabbajitattā pabbajitesu jāti sabhāveneva siddhaṃ niccasīlaṃ nāma na hoti. Yāvajīvaṃ
anya-e0401n:271_35: katvā samādāna vaseneva niccaṃ hotīti adhippāyo. “Vesadhāraṇena saha siddhattā”ti
anya-e0401n:271_36: ettha kathaṃ vesadhāraṇena siddhaṃ hotīti. Vesadhāraṇaṃ nāma gihivatthaṃ pahāya kāsāya
anya-e0401n:271_37: vattha dhāraṇaṃ. Kāsāyavatthañca nāma arahattadhajo hoti. Na ca arahattadhajaṃ dhārentassa
anya-e0401n:271_38: sikkhāpadaṃ asamādiyantassapi vikāle bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Tathā naccādīni passituṃ,
anya-e0401n:271_39: mālādīni dhāretuṃ, uccāsayanādīsu vasituṃ, jātarūpādīni sādituṃ. Kasmā iti ce, tesañhi
anya-e0401n:271_40: taṃ taṃ yathāsakaṃ sīlaṃ niccaṃ suddhaṃ katvā rakkhitumeva vaṭṭatītiādinā kāraṇaṃ
anya-e0401n:271_41: heṭṭhā vuttamevāti. “Appanaṃ apattāva adhippetā”ti appanāpattānaṃ mahaggatabhāvanānaṃ
anya-e0401n:271_42: visuṃ upari vakkhamānattāti adhippāyo. “Etthevā”ti imasmiṃ bhāvanā kamme eva. “Te
anya-e0401n:271_43: saññevā”ti ratanattayādīnaṃ eva ca. Gantuṃ āraddho gamiko. Addhānaṃ dīghamaggaṃ gacchanto
anya-e0401n:271_44: addhiko. “Parisuddhenā”ti lābhasakkārādi nirapekkhatāya attukkaṃ sana paravambhanādi
anya-e0401n:271_45: rahitatāya ca parisuddhena. “Hitappharaṇa cittenā”ti mayi karonte imassa ettakaṃ
anya-e0401n:271_46: hitasukhaṃ bhavissatīti evaṃ tesaṃ hitasukhesu pharaṇa cittena. Mettacittenāti vuttaṃ
anya-e0401n:271_47: hoti. “Attano kiccesu viyā”ti etena tesaṃ sabbaṃ kiccaṃ attanobhāraṃ karotīti dīpeti.
anya-e0401n:271_48: “Sādhāraṇa karaṇaṃ”ti attano puññaṃ paresaṃ dānaṃ. Atta manatāpavedaniyādhusādhūti
anya-e0401n:271_50: “Yonisomanasikāre ṭhatvāti ettha silokādipakkhikaṃ ayonisomanasikāraṃ jahitvā suṇantassa
anya-e0401n:271_51: imaṃ dhammaṃ sutvā attharasadhammarasappaṭisaṃvedī bhavissāmīti, desentassa imaṃ
anya-e0401n:271_52: desento dhammassa ca suṇantānañca anuggahaṃ karissāmīti yonisomanasikāre ṭhatvā.
anya-e0401n:271_53: Lābha sakkārādi pakkhiko manasikāro ayoni somanasikāro nāma. Niyyānattha nissaraṇattha
anya-e0401n:271_54: pakkhiko yonisomanasikāro nāma. Niravajja kammāni nāma kasigorakkhādi kammāni. Niravajjasippāni
anya-e0401n:271_55: nāma vaḍḍhakisippādīni vejjasippādīni ca. Niravajja vijjāṭhānāni nāma parūparodhara
anya-e0401n:271_56: hitāni aṅgavijjā vedavijjā mantavijjādīni. “Vodāna karaṇaṃ”ti visesena visuddhakaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0401n:271_57: “Taṃ sabhāvattā”ti dānasabhāvattā. “Cāritta sīlattā”ti sappurisānaṃ pakati cāritta
anya-e0401n:271_58: sīlattā. Puna “taṃ sabhāvattā”ti bhāvanā sabhāvattā. Tathāhi desentassa ca suṇantassa
anya-e0401n:271_59: ca desanāsotānusārena cittabhāvanā ñāṇabhāvanāvahattā desanāsavanā sabhāvā honti.
anya-e0401n:271_60: Attano diṭṭhiṃ sayameva ujuṃ karontassa ca ñāṇabhāvanā kammameva. Tathā parassa dhammadesanaṃ
anya-e0401n:271_61: sutvā ujuṃ karontassāpīti. “Dhammo nāma natthī”ti desanā dhammo nāma natthi. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n:271_62: dānasīlāni desentenapi ante lakkhaṇattayena sahasaccappakāsanassa kattabbattā. Etena
anya-e0401n:271_63: desanāsavanā ante lakkhaṇattayānupassanā bhāvanā kammaṭṭhāne patiṭṭhitattā taṃ sabhāvā
anya-e0401n:271_64: hontīti dasseti. “Manokamma mevā”ti paduddhāro. “Manasmiṃ evā”ti manodvāre eva. “Kiccasiddhito”ti
anya-e0401n:271_65: appanākiccassa sijjhanato. “Aṅgabhāvā sambhavato”ti appanā kiccasiddhiyaṃ aṅgabhāvā
anya-e0401n:271_67: appavattanatoti idaṃ tāva yujjati. Sīlavasena appavattanatoti idaṃ pana pāḷiyā na
anya-e0401n:271_68: sameti. Pāḷiyañhi mahaggatajjhānesupi pahānaṃ sīlaṃ veramaṇi sīlantiādi vuttanti
anya-e0401n:271_69: codanā. Taṃ pariharanto “yaṃ panā”tiādimāha. “Pariyāyena vuttaṃ”ti kenapariyāyena
anya-e0401n:271_70: vuttanti. Pakati cārittaṃ sīlanti vuccati. Uppanne ca pathamajjhāne nīvaraṇānaṃ pahānaṃ
anya-e0401n:271_71: nāma pakaticārittameva pakati niyāmena pavattameva. Iti pakaticārittattā sīlanti
anya-e0401n:271_72: vuttaṃ. Puna nīvaraṇānaṃ pahānameva tehi vigamanaṭṭhena veramaṇīti ca, pidahanaṭṭhena
anya-e0401n:271_73: saṃvaroti ca, pahāna kiccaṃ avijahanaṭṭhena avītikkamoti ca, vuttaṃ. Cetanāsīlanti
anya-e0401n:271_74: ettha pana jhānasampayutta cetanā eva vuccati. Sā ca sīlajāti kattā sīlanti vuttāti
anya-e0401n:271_76: jhānabhedena pañcavidhaṃ, jhānameva pana jhānaṅgabhedena pañcavidhanti.
anya-e0401n:273_2: Pāḷipāṭhe. “Cittuppādā”ti cittacetasikā vuccanti. “Siyā”ti ekacceti atthe nipāta
anya-e0401n:273_3: padaṃ. Imesu chasu cittuppādesu ekacce cha cittuppādā sotāpatti maggena pahātabbā,
anya-e0401n:273_4: ekacce cha cittuppādā tīhi upari maggehi pahātabbāti attho. Tattha pathamapade “ekacce
anya-e0401n:273_5: cha cittuppādā”ti kammapathapattakammasahajātā cha cittuppādā. Dutīya pade “ekacce
anya-e0401n:273_6: cha cittuppādā”ti akammapatha pattā dhammikesu ṭhānesu assādanābhi nandādivasena
anya-e0401n:273_7: pavattā cha cittuppādā. “Tatthā”ti dhammasaṅgahe. “Itaratthā”ti itaresu bhāvanāya
anya-e0401n:273_9: paccayuppannehi sahajātā. “Nānakkhaṇikā”ti attano paccayuppannehi asahajātā atītakālabhūte
anya-e0401n:273_10: nānakkhaṇe pavattā pāṇātipātādi cetanā. “Yadi evaṃ”ti evaṃ yadi siyāti attho. Yadi
anya-e0401n:273_11: uddhacca cetanā dassana pade anuddhaṭattā paṭisandhiṃ nākaḍḍhatīti viññāyeyya. Evaṃ
anya-e0401n:273_12: satīti pāṭhaseso. “Ce”ti ce vadeyya. “Nā”ti na sakkā vattuṃ. “Tassā vipākassā”ti
anya-e0401n:273_13: tassā uddhacca cetanāya vipākassa. Pāḷipāṭhe. “Imesu dhammesu ñāṇaṃ”ti ime dhamme
anya-e0401n:273_14: ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppannaññāṇaṃ. “Tesaṃ vipāke”ti uddhacca sahagatānaṃ vipāke. “Ñāṇaṃ”ti
anya-e0401n:273_15: taṃ vipākaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppannaññāṇaṃ. “Sabba dubbalanti ca sakkā vattuṃ”ti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:273_16: “Ativiya kāḷakadhammattā”ti buddhādīsu mahantesu ṭhānesu saddhāratanassa antarāyaṃ
anya-e0401n:273_17: katvā pavattanato atiyevakaṇha dhammattā. Tassā vicikicchā cetanāya paṭisandhi ākaḍḍhanampi
anya-e0401n:273_18: viññātabbanti yojanā. “Sabhāva viruddhattā yevā”ti vicikicchā asanniṭṭhāna sabhāvā.
anya-e0401n:273_19: Adhimokkho sanniṭṭhāna sabhāvoti evaṃ sabhāva viruddhattāyeva.
anya-e0401n:274_0: “Sabbatthā”tiādīsu. “Vipaccatīti vipācetī”ti vadanti. Taṃ pana padarūpena na sametīti
anya-e0401n:274_1: aññaṃ atthaṃ vadanto “sabbampi vā”tiādimāha. “Mahāsampattiyo samuṭṭhāpetvā”ti devaloke
anya-e0401n:274_2: devasampatti sadisā dibbavimānādikā mahāsampattiyo samuṭṭhāpetvā. Idaṃ “okāsaṃ katvā”ti
anya-e0401n:274_3: pade visesanaṃ. Tattha “sukha vipākaṃ”ti idaṃ aṭṭha ahetuka vipākāni sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:274_4: Rūpaloke brahmānaṃ rūpakāyo rūpāvacara kammena nibbatto. So ca kāmāvacara dhamma
anya-e0401n:274_5: samūho eva. Evaṃ sante tasmiṃ loke pañca ahetuka vipākānipi rūpāvacara kammena nibbattāni
anya-e0401n:274_6: siyunti codanā. Taṃ pariharanto “rūpāvacara kusalaṃhī”tiādimāha. “Tānī”ti apāyabhūmiyaṃ
anya-e0401n:274_7: uppannāni aṭṭha ahetuka vipākāni. “Sabbasmiṃ kāmaloke”ti ekādasavidhe kāmaloke. “Tesu
anya-e0401n:274_8: cā”ti tesu aṭṭha ahetuka vipākesu ca. “Ārammaṇantare”ti kasiṇa nimittādito aññasmiṃ
anya-e0401n:274_9: ārammaṇe. “Nimittā rammaṇe”ti kasiṇa nimittādike nimitta paññattā rammaṇe. “Tāni
anya-e0401n:274_10: pañcavipākānī”ti cakkhu viññāṇādīni pañca ahetuka vipākāni kāmāvacara kusala kammasseva
anya-e0401n:274_11: vipākāni hontīti yojanā. “Soḷasaka maggo”ti soḷasakathā maggo kathāpabandho. Evaṃ
anya-e0401n:274_12: dvādasa kamaggo. “Ahetukaṭṭhaka”nti ahetuka vipākaṭṭhakaṃ. Sammā pakārena jānātīti
anya-e0401n:274_13: sampajānaṃ. Ñāṇaṃ. Sampajānena katanti viggaho. Na sampajānakataṃ asampajānakataṃ.
anya-e0401n:274_14: “Saddahitvā”ti etena diṭṭhuju kammañāṇa sampattiṃ dīpeti. Na hi tena ñāṇena asampanno
anya-e0401n:274_15: kammañca kammaphalañca saddahatīti. Jānitvāti vā pāṭho siyā. “Ekamekaṃ”ti ekamekaṃ
anya-e0401n:274_16: kusalakammaṃ. “Kusala samaye”ti kusala kamma karaṇakāle. Kusaluppattikāle vā. Yassame
anya-e0401n:274_17: īdisaṃ puññaṃ pasutaṃ. Tassame bhavalābho bhogalābho mittalābho sabbelābhā ekantena
anya-e0401n:274_18: sulābhāti attho. “Suladdhaṃ”ti idaṃ puññaṃ suladdhaṃ. Devesu ca manussesu saṃsaritvāti
anya-e0401n:274_20: ekavāraṃ piṇḍapātadāne. Saṃyuttaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Tasmā yaṃ vuttaṃ ‘ekā cetanā
anya-e0401n:274_21: ekameva paṭisandhiṃ detī’ti, taṃ suvuttanti adhippāyo. “Paṭipakkhehī”ti paṭipakkhehi
anya-e0401n:274_22: akusalehi. Visesena bhusaṃ muḷho byāmuḷho. Ativiya byāmuḷho atibyāmuḷho. Atibyāmuḷhatthāya
anya-e0401n:274_23: paccayabhūtanti viggaho. Atiduppaññāya paccayabhūtanti attho. So hi thero vadatīti
anya-e0401n:274_24: sambandho. “Iti katvā”ti evaṃ manasikaritvā. “Sannihitapaccayamattenā”ti āsanne saṇṭhitapaccaya
anya-e0401n:274_25: mattena. “Pubbapayoga paccayamattenā”ti vuttaṃ hoti. Balavakammavasena uppannattā
anya-e0401n:274_26: tikkhataraṃ vipākaṃ. Yadā payoga rahitena paccayagaṇena uppajjati, tadā asaṅkhārikaṃ
anya-e0401n:274_27: nāma. Yadā payogasahitena, tadā sasaṅkhārikaṃ nāma. Tattha asaṅkhārikaṃ tikkhaṃ nāma.
anya-e0401n:274_28: Sasaṅkhārikaṃ mandaṃ nāma. Tathā dubbala kammena uppanne mandavipākepi yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:274_29: Evaṃ tikkhamandānaṃ mandatikkhatāpatti nāma siyā. Na ca tathā sakkā bhavitunti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:274_30: Ettha siyā, yadi pubbakammavasena aṭṭhannaṃ mahāvipākānaṃ saṅkhārabhedo siddho siyā,
anya-e0401n:274_31: aṭṭhannaṃ ahetuka vipākānampi sosaṅkhārabhedo siddho bhaveyya. Tānipi hi kānici asaṅkhārikena
anya-e0401n:274_32: kammena nibbattāni, kānici sasaṅkhārikenāti codanā. Taṃ pariharanto “ahetuka vipākānaṃ
anya-e0401n:274_33: panā”tiādimāha. “Ubhayakamma nibbattanaṃ”ti tesaṃ saṅkhāra bhedarahitattā asaṅkhārika
anya-e0401n:274_34: kammenapi virodho natthi. Sasaṅkhārika kammenapi virodho natthi. Asaṅkhārika kammenapi
anya-e0401n:274_35: nibbattanti. Sasaṅkhārika kammenapi nibbattanti. Evaṃ ubhayakamma nibbattanaṃ yuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:274_36: “Iti adhippāyo”ti tassa therassa adhippāyo. “Na kammāgamana vasenā”ti kammasaṅkhātassa
