anya-e0401n:274_37: cirakālato āgamana paccayassa vasena. “Āgamanaṃ”ti ca āgacchati etenāti āgamananti
anya-e0401n:274_38: viggaho. “Kammabhave”ti atīte kammakaraṇabhave. “Kecanā”ti keci. Aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ pana
anya-e0401n:274_39: āgatāti ca. Paṭisambhidā magge pana dvihetukā vuttāti ca sambandho. Imasmiṃ ṭhāne
anya-e0401n:274_40: paṭisambhidā maggaṭṭhakathā vacanampi vattabbanti vadanto “tattha panā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n:274_42: abhidhammaṭīkākārāpana. “Sāvasesapāṭho”ti pāḷiyaṃ tihetukena kammena dvihetuka paṭisandhi,
anya-e0401n:274_43: dvihetukena kammena ahetuka paṭisandhi avasesā hoti. Evaṃ avasesa vākya sahito pāṭho.
anya-e0401n:274_44: Sarikkhameva sarikkhakaṃ. Kammena sarikkhakaṃ sadisaṃ kammasarikkhakaṃ. Vipākaṃ.
anya-e0401n:274_45: “Mahātherenā”ti sāriputta mahātherena. Evañca katvātiādinā ṭīkākārānaṃ vacanaṃ upatthambheti.
anya-e0401n:276_1: lābhasakkāra silokādi sāpekkhatāya hīnehi chandādīhi. “Te dhammā”ti chandādayo dhammā.
anya-e0401n:276_2: Tāni idha nādhippetāni. Kasmā, upapattippabhedassa asādhakattāti adhippāyo. “Imānevā”ti
anya-e0401n:276_3: imāni eva jhānāni. “Tividhāsū”ti ekasmiṃtale brahmapārisajjādi vasena tividhāsu.
anya-e0401n:276_4: “Aṭṭhārasappabhedena vibhajitvā”ti tīsu hīna majjhimapaṇītesu ekekasmiṃ hīna hīnaṃ
anya-e0401n:276_5: hīna majjhimaṃ hīna paṇītantiādinā vibhattena navavidhāni honti. Puna tesu tīṇi majjhimāni.
anya-e0401n:276_6: Majjhimahīnaṃ majjhimamajjhimantiādinā vibhattāni navavidhāni honti. Evaṃ aṭṭhārasabhedena
anya-e0401n:276_7: vibhajitvā. “Kammadvārāni nāmā”ti kammappavatti mukhāni nāma. “Imehi pabhāvitattā”ti
anya-e0401n:276_8: imehi pabhāvehi mūlakāraṇehi pabhāvitattā pavattāpitattā. “Aṭṭhārasakhattiyā”ti hīnamajjhimādibhedena
anya-e0401n:276_9: aṭṭhārasa khattiyā. Tathā aṭṭhārasa brāhmaṇādayo. Aṭṭha cattālīsa gottāni nāma hīnamajjhimā
anya-e0401n:276_10: divasena vibhattāni gotamagottādīni aṭṭhacattālīsa gottāni. Tesaṃ cāritta paṭipattibhūtāni
anya-e0401n:276_11: caraṇānipi aṭṭhacattālīsa hontīti. Ettha siyā. Purima vacane hīnādīni brahmaloke,
anya-e0401n:276_12: aṭṭhakathā vacanehīnādīni manussaloketi sādhetabbaṃ aññaṃ, sādhakaṃ aññanti codanā.
anya-e0401n:276_13: Taṃ pariharati “etenahī”tiādinā. “Upalakkhetī”ti paccakkhato pākaṭaṃ ekadesaṃ dassetvā
anya-e0401n:276_14: apākaṭe tādisepi jānāpetīti attho. “Samatthā samatthaṃ vā”ti samatthā samatthabhāvaṃ
anya-e0401n:276_15: vā. “Tathā hānenā”ti tathāhi anena ācariyena. Anuruddhā cariyenāti vuttaṃ hoti. Nāma
anya-e0401n:276_16: rūpa paricchede vuttanti sambandho. Samānāsevane laddhe sati, mahabbale vijjamāne
anya-e0401n:276_17: mahaggatakammaṃ vipākaṃ janeti. Tādisaṃ hetuṃ aladdhā alabhitvā abhiññā cetanā vipākaṃ
anya-e0401n:276_18: na paccatīti yojanā. Tattha “samānā sevane”ti bhūmisamānatā vasena samānāsevane.
anya-e0401n:276_19: Kāmajavanaṃ kāmajavanena samānāsevanaṃ. Rūpajavanaṃ rūpajavanena. Arūpajavanaṃ arūpajavanenāti
anya-e0401n:276_21: balavabhāvassa abhāvato. Ekavāramattabhūtā mahaggata cetanā ca. “Sabba pathamabhūtā”ti
anya-e0401n:276_22: samāpatti vīthīsu gotrabhussa anantare mahaggata javanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Lokuttara
anya-e0401n:276_23: maggacetanā kadācipi samānā sevanaṃ na labhati. Evaṃ santepi attano anantarato paṭṭhāya
anya-e0401n:276_24: yāvajīvampi bhavantarepi ariyaphalaṃ janetiyeva. Evamevāti vuttaṃ hoti. Idaṃ pavattiphalaṃ
anya-e0401n:276_25: nāma hoti, idha pana paṭisandhi phalaṃ vicāritaṃ, tasmā asamānaṃ idaṃ nidassananti
anya-e0401n:276_26: ce. Vuccate. Maggacetanā nāma taṇhā sahāyakaṃ vaṭṭagāmi kammaṃ na hoti. Ataṇhā sahāyakaṃ
anya-e0401n:276_27: vivaṭṭagāmi kammaṃ hoti. Tasmā paṭisandhiṃ na deti. Sace pana taṃ taṇhā sahāyakaṃ
anya-e0401n:276_28: vaṭṭagāmikammaṃ bhaveyya. Paṭisandhi kālepi phalaṃ dadeyya. Asamānā sevanatā pamāṇaṃ
anya-e0401n:276_29: na bhaveyya. Evaṃ aññakāraṇattā asamānaṃ nidassanaṃ hoti. Na asamānā sevanatāyāti
anya-e0401n:276_30: daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Upacitattā”ti punappunaṃ āsevana lābhena vaḍḍhitattā. “Sā cetanā”tiādikammikamahaggata
anya-e0401n:276_31: cetanā ca. “Nā”ti codanā, na siyāti attho. Na ca sāpi samānabhūmaka dhammato laddhā
anya-e0401n:276_32: sevanā hoti. Evaṃ santepi katattā bhāvitattāti vuttaṃ. Bhāvitattāti ca punappunaṃ
anya-e0401n:276_33: āsevana lābhena vaḍḍhitattā iccevattho. Tasmā viññāyati asamānabhūmikehi pubbabhāgappavattehi
anya-e0401n:276_34: kāmajavanehi paramparato punappunaṃ laddhā sevanatāya eva idha upacitattāti vuttanti.
anya-e0401n:276_35: Tena vuttaṃ “ubhayattha panā”tiādi. Tattha “ubhayatthā”ti ubhayesu katattā upacitattāti
anya-e0401n:276_36: ca katattā bhāvitattāti ca vuttesu pāṭhesu. “Pathama samannāhārato paṭṭāyā”ti mahaggatajjhāne
anya-e0401n:276_37: appanāvīthito pure dvīsu parikamma bhāvanā upacāra bhāvanāsu parikamma bhāvanaṃ bhāventassa
anya-e0401n:276_38: pathavī pathavītiādinā pathama samannāhārato paṭṭhāya. Lokuttara maggepana dasasu
anya-e0401n:276_39: vipassanā ñāṇesu sabbapathamaṃ sammasanaññāṇaṃ bhāventassa rūpaṃ aniccaṃ vedanā aniccātiādinā
anya-e0401n:276_40: pathama samannāhārato paṭṭhāyāti attho. Upacinitvāti ca bhāvetvāti ca vaḍḍhetvā icceva
anya-e0401n:276_41: attho. “Abbhuṇhā”ti abhinavāti vuttaṃ hoti. “Ayaṃ vādo”ti anuruddhā cariyassa vādo.
anya-e0401n:276_42: Yadi evaṃ, aṭṭhakathāsu saṅkhāra paccayā viññāṇa pada niddesesu abhiññā cetanā panettha
anya-e0401n:276_43: parato viññāṇassa paccayo na hotīti na gahitāti vuttaṃ. Tattha aññaṃ yuttaṃ kāraṇaṃ
anya-e0401n:276_45: abhidhammaṭīkākārā. “Tassā panā”tiādi attanovāda dassanaṃ. Sādhentiyā abhiññā cetanāya.
anya-e0401n:276_46: Acittakabhava patthanāsahitaṃ saññā virāganti sambandho. “Idhā”ti manussa loke.
anya-e0401n:277_1: Evaṃ vīriyādhikādīsupi. “Attanā laddha samāpattīnaṃ”ti ekassapi puggalassa bahūnaṃ
anya-e0401n:277_2: attanā laddha samāpattīnaṃ. Tesu puthujjana sotāpanna sakadāgāmīsu. “Puthujjano”ti
anya-e0401n:277_4: sotāpanna sakadāgāmino pana. Parihīnajjhānā eva tattha nibbattanti. Na nikanti balenāti
anya-e0401n:277_5: adhippāyo. Vibhāvanipāṭhe “tesaṃ pī”ti jhānalābhi sotāpanna sakadāgāmīnampi. Icchantena
anya-e0401n:277_6: ṭīkācariyena. Tathā nikantiyā sati puthujjanādayo kāmāvacara kamma balena kāmabhavepi
anya-e0401n:277_7: nibbattantīti yojanā. Cetopaṇidhi ijjhati. Kasmā, visuddhattā. Sīlavisuddhattāti
anya-e0401n:277_8: adhippāyo. “Te”ti jhānalābhi sotāpanna sakadāgāmino. Aṅguttara pāṭhe. “Sahadassanuppādā”ti
anya-e0401n:277_9: sotāpatti maggaññāṇaṃ dassananti vuccati. Dassanassa uppādakkhaṇena saddhiṃ. Natthi
anya-e0401n:277_10: tassa taṃ saṃyojanantipi pāṭho. “Imaṃ lokaṃ”ti imaṃ kāmalokaṃ. “Vipassanā nikanti
anya-e0401n:277_11: taṇhā”ti teneva dhammarāgena tāya dhamma nandiyāti evaṃ vuttā vipassanā sukhe nikanti
anya-e0401n:277_12: taṇhā. Paccaye sati kuppanti nassantīti kuppā. Kuppā dhammā yesaṃ te kuppa dhammā.
anya-e0401n:277_13: “Dhammā”ti mahaggata dhammā. Ime dve sotāpanna sakadāgāmino sīlesu paripūrakārino
anya-e0401n:277_14: nāma. Sīlappaṭi pakkhānaṃ kilesānaṃ sabbaso pahīnattā. Tasmā te sīlesu akuppa dhammāti
anya-e0401n:277_15: vuccanti. Samādhismiṃ pana kuppa dhammā eva. “Mahābrahmesu na nibbattantī”ti mahābrahmattaṃ
anya-e0401n:277_16: na labhantīti adhippāyo. “Hīnajjhāsayattā”ti ettha itthiyo nāma pakatiyāva hīnajjhāsayā
anya-e0401n:277_17: honti nīca chandā nīca cittā mandavīriyā mandapaññā. Kasmā, hīnaliṅgattā. Kasmā ca
anya-e0401n:277_18: tā hīnaliṅgā honti. Dubbala kammanibbattattā. Dubbala kammanti ca purisatta janakaṃ
anya-e0401n:277_19: kammaṃ upādāya vuccati. Brahmapurohitānampi saṅgahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Kasmā, brahmapārisajjānanti
anya-e0401n:277_20: aṭṭhakathā vacanassa yebhūyyavacanattā. Tenāha “na mahābrahmānaṃ”ti. Itarathā na
anya-e0401n:277_21: brahmapurohitānaṃ na ca mahābrahmānanti vuttaṃ siyā. Na ca tathā sakkā vattuṃ ‘brahmattanti
anya-e0401n:277_22: mahābrahmatta’nti iminā vacanena virujjhanato. Ayañca attho na kevalaṃ yebhūyyanayamattena
anya-e0401n:277_23: siddho. Atha kho byañjana sāmatthiyenāpi siddhoti dassetuṃ “tehī”tiādimāha. Tattha
anya-e0401n:277_25: tuyhaṃ paṭibhātu, pātubbhavatu. Kathetu icceva vuttaṃ hoti. “Brāhmaṇā”ti abhibhuṃ
anya-e0401n:277_26: bhikkhuṃ ālapati. “Brahmuno”ti mahābrahmuno atthāya. Evaṃ sesesu dvīsu. “Tesaṃ”ti
anya-e0401n:277_28: pulliṅga vacanattā puggalappadhānaṃ hoti. Nabhūmippadhānaṃ. Tasmā ayamattho yuttivasena
anya-e0401n:277_29: daṭṭhabboti. “Tīsubhavaggesū”ti vehapphalabhūmi puthujjanabhavaggo nāma hoti rūpaloke.
anya-e0401n:277_30: Tato upari puthujjanabhūmiyā abhāvato. Akaniṭṭhabhūmi ariyabhavaggo nāma. Tattha
anya-e0401n:277_31: ṭhitānaṃ ariyānaṃ tattheva niṭṭhānato. Nevasaññābhūmi lokabhavaggo nāma. Tato upari
anya-e0401n:279_1: ca kammassa ca. “Upaghātaka kammenā”ti balavantena pāṇātipātakammena. “Dussimāra
anya-e0401n:279_2: kalāburājādīnaṃ viyā”ti tesaṃ maraṇaṃ viya. Uparodhitaṃ khandha santāna massāti viggaho.
anya-e0401n:279_3: “Uparodhitaṃ”ti upagantvā nirodhāpitaṃ. Kammaṃ khiyyatiyeva. Evaṃ sati, sabbaṃpi
anya-e0401n:279_4: maraṇaṃ ekena kammakkhayena siddhaṃ. Tasmā ekaṃ kammakkhaya maraṇameva vattabbanti
anya-e0401n:279_5: vuttaṃ hoti. “Itarepi vuttā”ti itarānipi tīṇi maraṇāni vuttānīti codanā. Vuccate
anya-e0401n:279_6: parihāro. “Sarasavasenevā”ti attano dhammatāvaseneva. Nānā āyu kappaṃ vidahanti saṅkharontīti
anya-e0401n:279_7: nānāāyukappa vidhāyakā. “Sattanikāye”ti sattasamūhe. Niccakālaṃ ṭhitiṃ karontīti
anya-e0401n:279_8: ṭhitikarā. Kadāci vuddhiṃ karonti, kadāci hāniṃ karontīti vuddhikarā hānikarā ca.
anya-e0401n:279_9: “Tesaṃ vasenā”ti tesaṃ utu āhārānaṃ vasena. “Tayopi cete”ti etetayopi ṭhitikarādayo.
anya-e0401n:279_10: Kammaṃ vipaccamānaṃ datvā khiyyatīti sambandho. Etena evarūpeṭhāne kammaṃ appadhānanti
anya-e0401n:279_11: dīpeti. “Tadanurūpaṃ evā”ti taṃ dasavassakālānu rūpaṃ eva. “Bho gañcā”ti dhanadhaññādiparibhogañca.
anya-e0401n:279_12: Tesaṃ utuāhārānaṃ gati etesanti taggatikā. Tesaṃ utuāhārānaṃ gatiṃ anuvattantīti
anya-e0401n:279_13: vuttaṃ hoti. Tenāha “tadanuvattikā”ti. Saṅkhāravidūhi aññatrāti sambandho. Saṅkhāraviduno
anya-e0401n:279_14: ṭhapetvāti attho. Iddhiyā pakatāti iddhimayā. “Iddhiyā”ti deviddhiyāvā bhāvanāmayiddhiyāvā.
anya-e0401n:279_15: Vijjāya pakatāti vijjāmayā. “Vijjāyā”ti gandhārivijjāya. Aṭṭhi nhāru maṃsa lohitādikā
anya-e0401n:279_16: rasadhātuyo ayanti vaḍḍhanti etehīti rasāyanāni. Tāni vidahanti etehīti rasāyana
anya-e0401n:279_17: vidhayo. Nayūpadesā. Ciraṭṭhiti katthāya jīvitaṃ saṅkharonti etehīti jīvita saṅkhārā.
anya-e0401n:279_18: Iddhimaya vijjāmaya jīvita saṅkhāresu ca rasāyana vidhisaṅkhātesu jīvita saṅkhāresu
anya-e0401n:279_19: ca vidunoti samāso. “Dvi samuṭṭhānika rūpadhammesū”ti utusamuṭṭhānika rūpadhammesu
anya-e0401n:279_20: ca āhāra samuṭṭhānika rūpadhammesu ca. “Pariṇamantesū”ti vipariṇamantesu. Tenāha
anya-e0401n:279_22: atimahantampi. “Assā”ti kammassa. “Upacchedaka maraṇepi netabbo”ti balavante upacchedaka
anya-e0401n:279_23: kamme āgate yāvamahantampi janaka kammaṃ attano vipākādhiṭṭhāna vipattiyā khiyyatiyeva.
anya-e0401n:279_24: So cassakhayo na sarasena hoti, atha kho upacchedaka kamma balena hotīti idha upacchedaka
anya-e0401n:279_25: maraṇaṃ visuṃ gahitanti evaṃ upacchedaka maraṇepi netabbo. “Akāla maraṇaṃ”ti āyukkhayamaraṇādīni
anya-e0401n:279_26: tīṇi maraṇāni kālamaraṇāni nāma, maraṇā rahakāle maraṇānīti vuttaṃ hoti. Tato aññaṃ
anya-e0401n:279_27: yaṃ kiñci maraṇaṃ akāla maraṇanti vuccati. Tenāha “tañhi pavattamānaṃ”tiādiṃ. “Mūlabhedato”ti
anya-e0401n:279_28: mūlakāraṇappabhedato. Yasmā pana milinda pañhe vuttanti sambandho. Sannipatantīti
anya-e0401n:279_29: sannipātā. Sannipātehi uppannā sannipātikāti atthaṃ sandhāya “sannipatitānaṃ”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:279_30: Athavā. Sannipatanaṃ sannipāto. Dvinnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vā dosānaṃ missakabhāvo. Sannipātena
anya-e0401n:279_31: uppannā sannipātikātipi yujjati. “Anisammakārīnaṃ”ti anisāmetvā anupadhāretvā karaṇa
anya-e0401n:279_32: sīlānaṃ. Pavattā ābādhā visamaparihārajānāmāti yojanā. “Attanā vākatānaṃ payogānaṃ”ti
anya-e0401n:279_34: vālukavassādīni vassāpetvāvā samudda vīciyo uṭṭhāpetvāvā evarūpe mahante bhayupaddave
anya-e0401n:279_35: katvā vināsenti. “Manussa pathe”ti manussa padese. “Te”ti caṇḍā yakkhā. “Jīvitakkhayaṃ
anya-e0401n:279_36: pāpentī”ti manussānaṃ vā gomahiṃsānaṃ vā medalohitāni pātabyatthāya tesu nānārogantara
anya-e0401n:279_37: kappāni uppādetvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpentīti attho. “Vattabbameva natthī”ti sakalaṃ
anya-e0401n:279_38: rajjaṃ vā raṭṭhaṃ vā dīpakaṃ vā vināsentīti vutte sakalaṃ janapadaṃ vā nagaraṃ vā
anya-e0401n:279_39: nigamaṃ vā gāmaṃ vā taṃ taṃ puggalaṃ vā vināsentīti visuṃ vattabbaṃ natthīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:279_40: “Satthadubbhikkharogantara kappāpī”ti satthantara kappo dubbhikkhantara kappo rogantara
anya-e0401n:279_41: kappoti ime tayo antara kappāpi idha vattabbāti attho. Tesu pana rogantara kappo
anya-e0401n:279_42: yakkhā vāḷe amanusse ossajjanti, tena bahū manussā kālaṅkarontīti iminā ekadesena
anya-e0401n:279_43: vuttoyeva. “Upapīḷako paghātakānaṃ kammānaṃ vipaccanavasenā”ti ettha tesaṃ kammānaṃ
anya-e0401n:279_44: okāsappaṭilābhena sattasantāne sukhasantānaṃ vibādhetvā maraṇaṃ vā pāpetvā maraṇa
anya-e0401n:279_45: mattaṃ vā dukkhaṃ janetvā pīḷanañca ghātanañca idha vipaccana nāmena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:279_46: Vipākaṃ pana janentuvā, māvā, idha appamāṇanti. Ettha siyā. Aṭṭhasu kāraṇesu opakkamikaṭṭhāne
anya-e0401n:279_47: ‘kuppitāhi devatā sakalaṃ rajjādikaṃ asesaṃ katvā vināsentī’ti vuttaṃ. Tattha vināsitā
anya-e0401n:279_48: janā kiṃ nu kho attano attano kamma vipākajehi ābādhana daṇḍehi vā vinassanti, udāhu
anya-e0401n:279_49: visuṃ opakkamikehi ābādhana daṇḍehi vā vinassanti. Yañcettha vuttaṃ ‘evaṃ akāla maraṇaṃ
anya-e0401n:279_50: upacchedaka kammunā vā aññehi vā aneka sahassehi kāraṇehi hotī’ti. Tattha yassa upacchedaka
anya-e0401n:279_51: kammaṃ nāma natthi. Kiṃ tassa aññena kāraṇena akāla maraṇaṃ nāma bhaveyyāti. Ettha
anya-e0401n:279_52: vadeyyuṃ, tassa aññena kāraṇena akāla maraṇaṃ nāma na bhaveyya. Sabbe sattā kammassakā,
anya-e0401n:279_53: kammadāyādā, kammayonī, kamma bandhū, kammappaṭissaraṇātihi vuttaṃti. Tesaṃ taṃ vādaṃ
anya-e0401n:279_54: bhindanto “yehikeci loke dissantī”tiādimāha. Puna tadatthaṃ daḷhaṃ karonto “yathāhā”tiādiṃ
anya-e0401n:279_55: vadati. Tattha duvidhaṃ kammaphalaṃ, vipāka phalañca nissanda phalañca. Tattha vipāka
anya-e0401n:279_56: phalaṃ nāma vipākakkhandhā ca cakkhu sotādīni kaṭattā rūpāni ca. Taṃ yena pubbe kammaṃ
anya-e0401n:279_57: kataṃ, tasseva sādhāraṇaṃ hoti. Tassa santāne eva pavattati. Nissanda phalaṃ nāma
anya-e0401n:279_58: tassa sukhuppattiyā vā dukkhuppattiyā vā attano kammānubhāvena bahiddhā samuṭṭhitāni
anya-e0401n:279_59: iṭṭhārammaṇāni vā aniṭṭhā rammaṇāni vā. Taṃ pana aññesampi sādhāraṇaṃ hoti. Taṃ sandhāya
anya-e0401n:279_60: vuttaṃ “sakakammasamuṭṭhitā eva. La. Paresaṃ sādhāraṇā evā”ti. Loke aṭṭhaloka dhammā
anya-e0401n:279_61: nāma sabbe kamma vipākajā evāti na vattabbā. Ime ca sattā saṃsāre saṃsarantā aṭṭhasuloka
anya-e0401n:279_62: dhammesu nimmujjantā saṃsaranti, tasmā te vināpi upapīḷaka kammena aññehi kāraṇehi
anya-e0401n:279_63: nānādukkhaṃ phusantiyeva. Tathā vināpi upacchedaka kammena maraṇa dukkhaṃ pāpuṇantiyeva.
anya-e0401n:280_0: “Te uppajjantī”ti te nānārogādayo uppajjanti. “Na upāya kusalā vā”ti tato attānaṃ
anya-e0401n:280_1: mocetuṃ kāraṇa kusalā vā na honti. “Na ca paṭikāra kusalā vā”ti uppannaṃ rogādibhayaṃ
anya-e0401n:280_2: apanetuṃ vūpasametuṃ paṭikāra kammeti kicchakamme kusalā vā na honti. “Nāpi parihāra
anya-e0401n:280_3: kusalā vā”ti tato mocanatthaṃ pariharituṃ desantaraṃ gantuṃ kusalā vā na hontīti
anya-e0401n:280_4: attho. Sesamettha suviññeyyaṃ. “Rogādayo eva taṃ khepentā pavattantī”ti kathaṃ te
anya-e0401n:280_5: pubbakammaṃ khepentīti. Tassa vipākabhūtaṃ jīvita santānaṃ vināsentā khepenti. Vinaṭṭhehi
anya-e0401n:280_6: jīvita santāne taṃ bhavaṃ janentaṃ khiyyati yevāti. Tenāha “yathāhī”tiādiṃ. “Kammassapi
anya-e0401n:280_7: tathevā”ti tatheva pubbakammassapi tiṇagge ussāva bindusseva paridubbalatā siddhā
anya-e0401n:280_8: hoti. Jīvite parikkhīṇe taṃ bhavaṃ janentassa pubbakammassapi parikkhīṇattā. “Evañcetaṃ”ti
anya-e0401n:280_9: etaṃ kammappaṭi saṃyutta vacanaṃ idha amhehi vuttanayena sampaṭicchitabbaṃ. Sabbaṃ
anya-e0401n:280_10: pubbekatahetudiṭṭhi nāma sabbaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā sucaritaṃ vā duccaritaṃ vā pubbabhave
anya-e0401n:280_11: attanā katena pubbakammahetunā eva uppajjatīti evaṃ pavattā diṭṭhi. “Yaṃ kiñcāyaṃ”ti
anya-e0401n:280_12: yaṃ kiñci ayaṃ. Mahābodhisattānaṃ adhimuttikālaṅkariyā nāma idha me cirakālaṃ ṭhitassa
anya-e0401n:280_13: pāramipūraṇa kiccaṃ natthi, idāneva ito cavitvā manussaloke uppajjissāmi, uparujjhatu
anya-e0401n:280_14: me idaṃ jīvitanti adhimuñcitvā daḷhaṃ manasikaritvā kālaṅkariyā. “Sayameva satthaṃ
anya-e0401n:280_15: āharitvā”ti sayameva attano gīvaṃ satthena hanitvāti attho. “Etthevā”ti akālamaraṇe eva.
anya-e0401n:281_1: arahatta maggaṃ labhitvā maggapaccavekkhanavīthi eva maraṇāsannavīthiṃ katvā parinibbānattā
anya-e0401n:281_2: samaṃ sīsaṃ etesanti samasīsino. “Samaṃ sīsaṃ”ti jīvita santāna pariyantena samaṃ
anya-e0401n:281_3: vaṭṭadukkha santāna pariyantaṃ vuccati. “Sabbesaṃ pī”ti sabbesampi khīṇāsavānaṃ.
anya-e0401n:281_4: “Imaṃ suttapadaṃ”ti mahāparinibbānasutte āgataṃ suttapadaṃ. “Te”ti te vādino. “Tenā”ti
anya-e0401n:281_5: tena vādavacanena. Kriyamanodhātu nāma pañcadvārāvajjanaṃ. Kriyāhetukamano viññāṇadhātu
anya-e0401n:281_6: nāma hasituppādacittaṃ. “Assā”ti parinibbāyantassa buddhassa. “Na sameti yevā”ti
anya-e0401n:281_7: santiṃ anupādisesaṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvāti ettha parinibbāna javanehi ārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0401n:281_8: katvāti vuttepi na sametiyeva. Tenāha “tathāhī”tiādiṃ. “Bhavaṅgaṃ otaritvā parinibbāyatī”ti
anya-e0401n:281_9: ettha parinibbāna cuticittameva bhavaṅganti vuttaṃ. Cuticittanti ca bhavantaraṃ gacchantasseva
anya-e0401n:281_10: vuccati. Idha pana vohāra mattanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Vibhāvanipāṭhe. Cutipariyosānānaṃ
anya-e0401n:281_11: maraṇāsanna cittānaṃ. Yathā pana buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ yāvajīvaṃ uppannaṃ mahābhavaṅgacittaṃ
anya-e0401n:281_12: kammakammanimittādayo ārammaṇaṃ karotiyeva. Tathā parinibbāna cuticittaṃ pīti āha
anya-e0401n:281_13: “na hī”tiādiṃ. Nanu maraṇakāle kammakammanimittādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ nāma bhavantara gamanatthāya
anya-e0401n:281_14: hoti, buddhā ca bhavantaraṃ na gacchanti. Tasmā “na hi. La. Na karotī”ti idaṃ na
anya-e0401n:281_15: yuttanti. No na yuttaṃ. Bhavantara gamanatthāyāti idaṃ javanehi gahaṇe daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:281_18: “Aññenapi kāraṇa balenā”ti āciṇṇabhāvādikena kāraṇabalena. Gatinimittaṃ pana kammabalenevāti
anya-e0401n:281_19: yuttaṃ siyā. “Tathopaṭṭhitaṃ”ti antimavīthito pubbe bahūsuvīthīsu upaṭṭhitappakārantiattho.
anya-e0401n:281_21: maraṇakāle pāpapakkhiyānaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ katthaci sīhaḷaganthe vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:287_0: “Taṃ”ti vipaccamānakaṃ kammaṃ. “Niyāmaka sahakāri paccayabhūtā”ti ettha yathā nāvāyaṃ
anya-e0401n:287_1: niyāmako nāma nāvaṃ icchitadisābhimukhaṃ niyāmeti, niyojeti. Tathā ayaṃ taṇhāpi bhavanikanti
anya-e0401n:287_2: hutvā cittasantānaṃ gantabbabhavābhimukhaṃ niyāmeti, niyojeti. Kammassa ca accāyatta
anya-e0401n:287_3: sahāyabhāvena sahakārī paccayo hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Kusalākusala kammanimittāni vā”ti
anya-e0401n:287_4: aññāni kusalā kusalakammanimittāni vā. “Tadupatthambhikā”ti tassa kammassa upatthambhikā.
anya-e0401n:287_6: tiṭṭhamānaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhati. Amuñcitvā tiṭṭhatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Anubyañjanaṃ nāma piyasātarūpo
anya-e0401n:287_7: kathitalapitādi kriyāviseso. “Assa puggalassā”ti āsanna maraṇassa puggalassa. Aṭṭhakathā
anya-e0401n:287_8: pāṭhe. “Kilesa balavināmitaṃ”ti avijjā taṇhādīnaṃ kilesānaṃ balena vināmitaṃ. Paṭicchādikā
anya-e0401n:287_9: ādīna vā yassāti viggaho. “Taṃ”ti cittasantānaṃ. “Tasmiṃ”ti kammādivisaye. Aṭṭhakathāya
anya-e0401n:287_10: na sameti. Tasmiṃ visayetihi tattha vuttaṃ. Na vuttaṃ tasmiṃ bhaveti. “Tasmiṃ vuttā
anya-e0401n:287_11: naṃ”ti tasmiṃ ‘yebhūyyena bhavantare cha dvāraggahitaṃ’ti ṭhāne ṭīkāsu vuttānaṃ.
anya-e0401n:287_12: Taṃ sadisa javanuppatti nāma kammakaraṇakāle pavatta javanehi sadisānaṃ idāni javanānaṃ
anya-e0401n:287_13: uppatti. Bhavappaṭicchannañca kammaṃ apākaṭañca kammaṃ na tathā upaṭṭhāti. Kevalaṃ
anya-e0401n:287_14: attānaṃ abhinavakaraṇa vasena dvārapattaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhātīti adhippāyo. “Visīda pattā”ti
anya-e0401n:287_15: visaññībhāvena virūpaṃ hutvā sīdanapattā. “Tabbiparītena pāpakamma bahulāpi vattabbā”ti
anya-e0401n:287_16: tepivisīdantare āvudha hatthā pāṇaghātaṃ karontā gaṇhathabandhathāti ugghosantā duṭṭhacittā
anya-e0401n:287_17: hontītiādinā vattabbā. Aṭṭhakathā pāṭhesu. Ukkhitto asi yassāti ukkhittā siko. Patudanti
anya-e0401n:287_18: vijjhanti etenāti patodanaṃ. Pājanadaṇḍo. Tassa agge katā sūci patodana sūci. “Patodana
anya-e0401n:287_19: dukkhaṃ”ti vijjhana dukkhaṃ. Kathaṃ pana ukkhittāsikādibhāvena upaṭṭhānaṃ kammupaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0401n:287_20: nāma hoti. Kathañca taṃ paṭisandhiyā ārammaṇabhāvaṃ upetīti āha “so cā”tiādiṃ. Uppajjamānānaṃ
anya-e0401n:287_21: sattānaṃ. “Itaresaṃ panā”ti rūpārūpa bhavesu uppajjamānānaṃ pana. “Paripuṇṇaṃ katvā”ti
anya-e0401n:287_22: tadārammaṇa pariyosānāyavā suddhāya vā javanavīthiyāti evaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ katvā. Ayaṃ
anya-e0401n:287_23: pana bhavaṅgāvasāne cuticittuppatti nāma aṭṭhakathāsu natthi. Yañca bhavaṅgaṃ otaritvā
anya-e0401n:287_24: parinibbāyatītiādi tattha tattha vuttaṃ. Tatthapi “bhavaṅgaṃ”ti cuticittameva ṭīkāsu
anya-e0401n:287_25: vaṇṇenti. Tasmā “bhavaṅgakkhayevā”ti idaṃ kathaṃ yujjeyyāti āha “ettha cā”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:287_26: Anurūpaṃ setīti anusayo. Anubandho hutvā setīti anusayo. Anu anu vā setīti anusayo.
anya-e0401n:287_27: Ettha ca anusayo nāma javanasahajāto na hoti. Idha ca anusaya nāmena vuttaṃ. Nānājavana
anya-e0401n:287_28: sahajātā ca avijjā taṇhā paṭisandhiyā visesa paccayā honteva. Kathaṃ tā idha gahitā
anya-e0401n:287_29: siyunti āha “ettha cā”tiādiṃ. Evaṃ sante avijjā parikkhittena taṇhāmūlakenāti vuttesu
anya-e0401n:287_30: suṭṭhu yujjati. Anusayehi saha javanasahajātānampi laddhattā. Tasmā idha anusaya
anya-e0401n:287_31: vacanaṃ na yuttanti codanā. Yuttamevāti dassento “api cā”tiādimāha. “Pariyattā”ti
anya-e0401n:287_32: samattā. “So pī”ti phassādi dhamma samūhopi.“Tathā rūpā yevā”ti aggamaggena appahīna
anya-e0401n:287_33: rūpāyeva, anusayabhūtāyevāti vuttaṃ hoti. “Taṃ”ti citta santānaṃ. “Tatthā”ti tadubhayasmiṃ.
anya-e0401n:287_34: Kathaṃ taṃ tattha khipantīti āha “tasmiṃ”tiādiṃ. “Vijānanadhātuyā”ti viññāṇa dhātuyā.
anya-e0401n:287_35: Saṅkantā nāma natthi. Yattha yattha uppajjanti. Tattha tattheva bhijjantīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:287_36: Kuto maraṇakāle saṅkantā nāma atthi vijjantīti yojanā. Evaṃ sante idaṃ vacanaṃ anamataggiya
anya-e0401n:287_37: suttena viruddhaṃ siyāti. Na viruddhaṃ. Idañhi abhidhamma vacanaṃ, mukhyavacanaṃ,
anya-e0401n:287_38: anamataggiya suttaṃ pana suttanta vacanaṃ pariyāya vacananti dassento “yañcā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n:287_39: Pariyāyena vuttanti vatvā taṃ pariyāyaṃ dasseti “yesañhī”tiādinā. “So”ti so puggalo.
anya-e0401n:287_40: “Tesaṃ”ti avijjā taṇhā saṅkhārānañca paṭisandhi nāma rūpa dhammānañca. “Hetupphalasambandhena
anya-e0401n:287_41: bhavantaraṃ sandhāvati saṃsaratīti vuccatī”ti pubbe kammakaraṇakālepi te avijjā taṇhā
anya-e0401n:287_42: saṅkhārā eva so sattoti vuccanti. Pacchā tesaṃ phalabhūtāyaṃ paṭisandhiyā pātubhavanakālepi
anya-e0401n:287_43: sāpaṭisandhi eva so sattoti vuccati. Majjhe dhammappabandhopi so sattoti vuccati.
anya-e0401n:287_44: Evaṃ hetudhammehi saddhiṃ phaladhamme ekaṃ sattaṃ karontassa hetupphala sambandho
anya-e0401n:287_45: hoti. Evaṃ hetupphala sambandhena so eva kammaṃ karoti. Tena kammena so eva bhavantaraṃ
anya-e0401n:287_46: sandhāvati saṃsaratīti vuccati. Ettha ca anamataggo yaṃ bhikkhave. La. Avijjānīvaraṇānaṃ
anya-e0401n:287_47: sattānaṃti evaṃ sattavohārena vuttattā sādhammadesanā pariyāyadesanā hoti. Pariyāyadesanattā
anya-e0401n:287_48: ca sandhāvataṃ saṃsaratanti pariyāyopi sijjhati. Yassaṃ pana dhamma desanāyaṃ dhammadesanāti
anya-e0401n:287_49: vacanānu rūpaṃ dhammameva deseti, na sattaṃ, na puggalaṃ. Ayaṃ dhammadesanā eva mukhyadesanā
anya-e0401n:287_50: nāma hoti. Tattha desita dhammā pana pakatikālepi desantaraṃ kālantaraṃ khaṇantaraṃ
anya-e0401n:287_51: saṅkantā nāma natthi. Yattha yattha uppannā, tattha tattheva bhijjanti. Khayavayaṃ
anya-e0401n:287_52: gacchanti. Tena vuttaṃ ‘na hi uppannuppannā dhammā. La. Saṅkantā nāma atthī’ti. Paṭighoso
anya-e0401n:287_53: ca, padīpo ca, muddā ca. Ādisaddena paṭibimbacchāyā ca, bījasaṅkhāro ca, pāṭibhogo
anya-e0401n:287_54: ca, bālakumāra sarīresu upayuttā vijjāsipposadhā cāti evaṃ aṭṭhakathā yaṃ āgatāni
anya-e0401n:287_55: nidassanāni saṅgayhanti. “Nidassanā”nīti ca upamāyo vuccanti. Tattha “paṭighoso”ti
anya-e0401n:287_56: gambhīraleṇa dvāre ṭhatvā saddaṃ karontassa antoleṇe paṭighoso pavattati. Tattha
anya-e0401n:287_57: dvāre uppanno mūlasaddo antoleṇaṃ na gacchati, uppannaṭṭhāne eva nirujjhati. Paṭighoso
anya-e0401n:287_58: ca tato āgato na hoti. Na ca vinā mūlasadda + paccayena aññato pavattati. Mūlasaddapaccayā
anya-e0401n:287_59: eva tattha pavattatīti. Tattha mūlasaddo viya atīta kammaṃ. Paṭighoso viya anantare
anya-e0401n:287_60: paṭisandhi. Esanayo padīpa muddā paṭibimbacchāyāsu. Tattha “padīpo”ti pathamaṃ ekaṃ
anya-e0401n:287_61: padīpaṃ jāletvā tena aññaṃ padīpasatampi padīpa sahassampi jāleti. “Muddā”ti lañchanalekhā.
anya-e0401n:287_62: Tattha ekena lañchanakkhandhena, tena lañchanalekhāsatampi lañchanalekhā sahassampi
anya-e0401n:287_63: karoti. “Paṭibimbacchāyā”ti pasannesu ādāsapaṭṭesuvā udakesuvā uppannā sarīracchāyā.
anya-e0401n:287_64: Etehi nidassanehi phalaṃ nāma hetuto āgataṃ na hoti. Hetunā ca vinā na sijjhatīti
anya-e0401n:287_65: ettakamatthaṃ dīpeti. “Bījasaṅkhāro”ti kālantare uppannesu pupphaphalesu icchitavaṇṇa
anya-e0401n:287_67: paribhāvanā. Tattha tappaccayā kālantare pupphaphalesu uppannesu tevaṇṇagandharasā
anya-e0401n:287_68: pātubbhavanti. “Pāṭibhogo”ti kiñci atthaṃ sādhetuṃ parassa santike iṇaṃ gaṇhantassa
anya-e0401n:287_69: tavadhanaṃ saṃvaccharena vuḍḍhiyā saha dassāmi, sace nadadeyyaṃ. Asukaṃ nāma mamakhettaṃ
anya-e0401n:287_70: vā vatthuvā tuyhaṃ hotūti paṭiññāṭhapanaṃ. Tattha tappaccayā dhanaṃ labhitvā taṃ
anya-e0401n:287_71: atthañca sādheti. Kāle sampatte vuḍḍhiyā saha iṇañca sodheti. “Vijjāsipposadhā”ti
anya-e0401n:287_72: loke puttake yāvajīvaṃ hitatthāya daharakāle kiñci vijjaṃvā sippaṃvā sikkhāpenti.
anya-e0401n:287_73: Yāvajīvaṃ khararogānaṃ anuppādatthāya daharakāle ojavantaṃ kiñci osadhaṃ vā ajjhohārenti.
anya-e0401n:287_74: Tattha tappaccayā puttānaṃ yāvajīvaṃ hitappaṭilābho vā tādisānaṃ rogānaṃ anuppādo
anya-e0401n:287_75: vā hotiyeva. Etehi yathā kālantare asantesuyeva pāṭibhogādīsu mūlakammesu pubbabhāge
anya-e0401n:287_76: katapaccayā eva pacchā attha sādhanādīni sijjhanti. Tathā kusalā kusala kammāni katvā
anya-e0401n:287_77: kālantare tesu asantesupi pubbe katattā eva pacchā paṭisandhādīni phalāni pātubbhavantīti
anya-e0401n:287_79: tadā jīvitindriyassa dubbalattā kammampi dubbalameva hotīti katvā vuttaṃ. Kāmañcettha
anya-e0401n:287_80: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vatvā dassitaṃ, tathāpi sambhavatīti sambandho. Tattha “taṃ pī”ti gatinimittampi.
anya-e0401n:287_82: itthambhūtalakkhaṇe karaṇavacanaṃ. Gāthāyaṃ. Pañcadvāre paṭisandhikammaṃ vinā dvigocare
anya-e0401n:287_83: siyāti yojanā. Tattha “dvigocare”ti kammanimitta gatinimittabhūte dvigocare. Tattha
anya-e0401n:287_84: pañcadvāre paṭisandhi nāma pañcadvārika maraṇāsanna vīthicittānaṃ ante ca vantānaṃ
anya-e0401n:287_85: paṭisandhi. Sāpi gatinimittabhūte gocare siyāti vutte pañcadvārika vīthicittāni pañcārammaṇabhūtāni
anya-e0401n:287_86: gatinimittāni ārammaṇaṃ karontītipi siddhaṃ hoti. Evañca sati. Tesaṃ vīthicittānaṃ
anya-e0401n:287_87: ante acavitvā tadanubandhaka manodvārikavīthicittehipi kadāci kesañci ca vanaṃ nanasambhavatīti
anya-e0401n:287_88: sakkā vattuṃ. Tesu pana anubandhaka vīthīsu atītaggahaṇa samudāyaggahaṇehi ca vantānaṃ
anya-e0401n:287_89: atītānipi gatinimittāni labbhanti. Vatthuggahaṇanāmaggahaṇehi ca vantānaṃ dhammā
anya-e0401n:287_90: rammaṇaṃpi labbhatiyeva. Tasmā yaṃ vuttaṃ ācariyena kāmāvacara paṭisandhiyā cha dvāraggahitaṃ
anya-e0401n:287_91: kammanimittaṃ gatinimittañca paccuppannamatītā rammaṇaṃ upalabbhatīti. Taṃ suvuttamevāti
anya-e0401n:287_92: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yaṃ pana ‘tameva tathopaṭṭhitaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ārabbha cittasantānaṃ abhiṇhaṃ
anya-e0401n:287_93: pavattatī’ti evaṃ antimavīthito pubbabhāge bahūnaṃ vīthivārānaṃ pavattanaṃ ācariyena
anya-e0401n:287_94: vuttaṃ. Taṃ tathopaṭṭhitaṃ gatinimittaṃ ārabbhātipi laddhuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. Evañcasati,
anya-e0401n:287_95: gatinimittaṃpi atītaṃ labbhatīti dassetuṃ “yadāpanā”tiādi vuttaṃ. “Santati vasenā”ti
anya-e0401n:287_96: santati paccuppanna vasena. “Tassā”ti gatinimittassa. Yebhūyyena vutto, na sabbasaṅgāhikena
anya-e0401n:287_97: vuttoti adhippāyo. “Manodvārika maraṇāsanna javanānaṃpi icchitabbattā”ti purejātapaccaya
anya-e0401n:287_98: bhāvena icchitabbattāti adhippāyo. “Tadanubandhāyā”ti tāni manodvāri kamaraṇāsanna
anya-e0401n:287_99: javanāni anugatāya. “Paṭisandhiyāpi sambhavato”ti tassa purejāta paccayassa paṭisandhiyāpi
anya-e0401n:287_100: purejāta paccayatā sambhavato. Nanu therena bhinditvā avuttepi bhinditabbe sati,
anya-e0401n:287_101: bhindanameva yuttanti ce. Na yuttaṃ. Kasmā, kammanimittena samānagatikattā. Tenāha
anya-e0401n:287_102: “nacataṃ”tiādiṃ. Vibhāvaniyaṃ yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabbaṃti vatvā aparepana avisesatova
anya-e0401n:287_103: vaṇṇentīti aparevādopi vutto. Tattha “avisesato vaṇṇentī”ti abhinditvāva vaṇṇentīti
anya-e0401n:287_104: vuttaṃ hoti. Puna taṃ aparevādaṃ asampaṭicchanto “aṭṭhakathāyaṃ panā”tiādimāha. Idha
anya-e0401n:287_105: pana taṃ aparevādaṃ paggaṇhanto puna “yañca tatthā”tiādimāha. Tattha “tadārammaṇāyā”ti
anya-e0401n:287_106: taṃ gatinimittā rammaṇāya. “Tesaṃ vacanaṃ”ti aparesaṃ vacanaṃ. “Aññatra avicāraṇāyā”ti
anya-e0401n:287_107: kasmā vuttaṃ. Nanu aṭṭhakathāyaṃ panātiādi sabbaṃ vicāraṇā vacanameva hotīti. Saccaṃ
anya-e0401n:287_108: yathā diṭṭhapāṭhavasena, sāvasesa pāṭhabhāvaṃ pana na vicāretiyeva. Tasmā “aññatra
anya-e0401n:287_109: avicāraṇāyā”ti vuttaṃ. Ettha siyā. Aṭṭhakathāpāṭho sāvaseso hotu, mūlaṭīkāpāṭho pana
anya-e0401n:287_110: manodvāre yevāti niyametvā vuttattā kathaṃ sāvaseso siyāti. Niyametvā vuttopi idha
anya-e0401n:287_111: adhippetatthe aparipuṇṇe sāvaseso eva hotīti. Tena vuttaṃ “aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ natthi aññatra
anya-e0401n:287_113: ca vanaṃ hotīti yojanā. Evaṃ aparatthapi. Balavantepi sati. Tadārammaṇāvasānāya eva
anya-e0401n:287_114: vīthiyā. “Vuttattā panā”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ eva vuttattā pana. “Purimabhāge evā”ti pañcadvārika
anya-e0401n:287_115: antima vīthito pubbabhāge eva. “Tāhī”ti deyyadhammavatthūhi. “Yathātaṃ”ti taṃ atthajātaṃ
anya-e0401n:287_116: katamaṃ viyāti attho. “Ito”ti manussa bhavato. Nimitta sadisaṃ saddaṃ vaṇṇanti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:287_117: “Naṭṭhacakāraṃ”ti patitacakāraṃ. Aṭṭhakathāpāṭhe ñātakā mātādayo pañcadvāre upasaṃharantīti
anya-e0401n:287_119: pavatto paṭo cīnapaṭo. Tathā somārapaṭepi. “Tānī”ti rasaphoṭṭhabbāni. Phoṭṭhabbaṃ
anya-e0401n:287_120: pana aññaṃpi yujjateva. Atthidānīti manasikatattā paccuppannabhūtānīti vuttaṃ. “Arūpīnaṃ”ti
anya-e0401n:287_122: yesaṃ te vissaṭṭhajjhānā. “Tatoyeva cā”ti vissaṭṭhajjhānattāyeva ca. Ākaḍḍhitaṃ mānasaṃ
anya-e0401n:287_123: cittaṃ etesanti viggaho. Idañca hetuvisesana padaṃ. Ākaḍḍhitamānasattā kāmabhave
anya-e0401n:287_124: uppajjamānānanti dīpeti. Tesaṃ arūpīnaṃ. “Aññaṃ dubbala kammaṃ”ti upacārajjhānakammato
anya-e0401n:287_125: aññaṃ tihetukomakaṃ kammaṃ. “Tesaṃ”ti rūpalokato ca vantānaṃ. “Sato”ti santassa samānassa.
anya-e0401n:287_126: “Upatthambhane kāraṇaṃ natthī”ti idaṃ upacārajjhāna kammassa garuka kammagatikattā
anya-e0401n:287_127: vuttaṃ. Ekanta garukakammabhūtaṃpi pana mahaggatajjhāna kammaṃ nāma nānānikanti balena
anya-e0401n:287_128: paṭibāhīyamānaṃ paṭisandhiṃ na detiyeva. Upacārajjhāna kamme vattabbaṃ natthīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:287_129: “Tādisānī”ti tathā rūpāni dvihetukomaka kammāni tesaṃ okāsaṃ na labhanti. Nīvaraṇānaṃ
anya-e0401n:287_131: pī”ti upacārajjhāna kammato aññāni paccuppanna kammānipi atītabhavesu katāni aparapariyāya
anya-e0401n:287_132: kammānipi. “Yena cā”ti yena nānākammānampi okāsa lābhakāraṇena ca. “Te”ti rūpī brahmāno.
anya-e0401n:287_134: [ yasmā panātiādinā ca ] paribhāvita cittasantānattā’ti ca vuttanayeneva. “Taṃ kāraṇaṃ”ti
anya-e0401n:287_135: ahetuka paṭisandhiyā abhāva kāraṇaṃ. Parampara bhavesuca vīthimuttacittānaṃ pavattākāraṃ
anya-e0401n:287_136: dassetunti sambandho. “Yathā tāniyeva osadhānī”ti loke ekaṃ osadhaṃ labhitvātaṃ devasikaṃ
anya-e0401n:287_137: bhuñjati. Ekopathamadivase bhuñjantaṃ disvā katamaṃ nāma tvaṃ osadhaṃ bhuñjasīti
anya-e0401n:287_138: pucchi. Idaṃ nāma osadhaṃ bhuñjāmīti vadati. Punadivasesupi osadhaṃ bhuñjantaṃ disvā
anya-e0401n:287_139: tatheva pucchi. Tameva osadhaṃ bhuñjāmīti vadati. Tattha “tameva osadhaṃ”ti yaṃ pathamadivase
anya-e0401n:287_140: osadhaṃ tayāca pucchitaṃ. Mayā ca kathitaṃ. Tameva ajja bhuñjāmīti attho. Tattha
anya-e0401n:287_141: pana pathamadivase bhuttaṃ osadhaṃ aññaṃ. Ajja bhuttaṃ aññaṃ. Taṃsadisaṃ pana aññaṃpi
anya-e0401n:287_142: tamevāti loke voharanti tāniyeva osadhāni bhuñjāmīti. Evaṃ idhapi tassadise tabbohāro
anya-e0401n:287_143: daṭṭhabbo. “Tasmiṃ”ti bhavaṅgacitte. Avattamāne upapattibhavo occhijjati. Vattamāne
anya-e0401n:287_144: na occhijjati. Tasmā tassa upapatti bhavassa anoccheda aṅgatthāya kāraṇattā bhavaṅganti
anya-e0401n:287_145: vuccatīti adhippāyo. “Upapatti bhavo”ti ca kammajakkhandhasantānaṃ vuccati. “Parasamaye”ti
anya-e0401n:287_146: uccheda diṭṭhīnaṃ vāde. “Vaṭṭamūlānī”ti avijjātaṇhā vuccanti. Vaṭṭamūlāni suṭṭhuucchijjanti
anya-e0401n:287_147: etthāti viggaho. “Yassa atthāyā”ti saupādisesādikassa nibbānassa paṭilābhatthāya.
anya-e0401n:287_148: “Paṭṭhapīyantī”ti pavattāpīyanti. Pajjanti pāpuṇanti ariyā janā etthāti padaṃ. Parato
anya-e0401n:287_149: samantipade anupādisesassa gayhamānattā idha saupādisesanti vuttaṃ. Bujjhantīti budhā.
anya-e0401n:287_150: Suṭṭhu saddhiṃ ucchinnaṃ sinehabandhanaṃ yehi te susamucchinnasinehabandhanā. Kathañca
anya-e0401n:287_151: suṭṭhuucchinnaṃ, kehi ca saddhiṃ ucchinnantiāha “anusayamattaṃ pī”tiādiṃ. “Sesakilesehī”ti
anya-e0401n:287_152: taṇhāsineha bandhanato avasesa kilesehi. “Adhisayitaṃ”ti vikkhambhituṃpi asakkuṇeyyaṃ
anya-e0401n:287_153: hutvā atirekataraṃ sayitaṃ. “Adhigamāvahaṃ”ti adhigamo vuccati navavidho lokuttara
anya-e0401n:290_1: dvīhi pabhedasaṅgahapavatti saṅgahehi. “Ye vattantī”ti ye dhammā vattanti pavattanti.
anya-e0401n:290_3: icchantā ettakehi pañcahi paricchedehīti vaṇṇenti. Vacanavipallāsaṃ icchantātipi
anya-e0401n:290_4: yujjati. “Samuṭṭhātī”ti suṭṭhu uṭṭhāti, pātubbhavati, vijjamānataṃ gacchati. “Kammādī”ti
anya-e0401n:290_5: kammādipaccayo. “Piṇḍī”ti ekagghanatā vuccati. Upādāya mahantāni eva hutvāti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:290_7: virādhakaṭṭhena. Bhūtañca abhūtaṃ katvā abhūtañca bhūtaṃ katvā sandassakaṭṭhenāti
anya-e0401n:290_8: vuttaṃ hoti. Bhūtavajjappaṭicchādanakammaṃ mahāmāyā nāma. Māyaṃ karontīti māyākārā.
anya-e0401n:290_9: Āvisanaṃ nāma sattānaṃ sarīresu āvisanaṃ. Gahaṇaṃ nāma sattānaṃ attanovasaṃ vattāpanaṃ.
anya-e0401n:290_10: Tadubhayaṃ karontā kattha ṭhatvā karonti. Antovāṭhatvā karonti, bahivā ṭhatvā karontīti
anya-e0401n:290_11: pākatikehi manussehi jānituṃ passituṃ asakkuṇeyyattā acinteyyaṭṭhānaṃ nāma. “Vañcakaṭṭhenā”ti
anya-e0401n:290_12: etā pakatiyā atidubbaṇṇaṃ attānaṃ devaccharāvaṇṇaṃ katvā vañcenti. Vasanarukkhagumbaṃpi
anya-e0401n:290_13: dibbavimānaṃ katvā vañcenti. Evarūpena vañcakaṭṭhena. “Tenevaṭṭhenā”ti visaṃvādakaṭṭhādinā
anya-e0401n:290_14: tividheneva atthena. Tānipihi asattabhūtaṃyeva attānaṃ sattoti visaṃvādenti. Arukkhaṃyeva
anya-e0401n:290_15: attānaṃ rukkhoti visaṃvādenti. Aniṭṭhaṃ, akantaṃ, amanāpaṃyeva attānaṃ iṭṭho, kanto,
anya-e0401n:290_16: manāpoti vañcenti, tathā sahajātānañca tesaṃ aññamaññassa anto vā tiṭṭhanti. Udāhubahivātiṭṭhantīti
anya-e0401n:290_17: jānituṃ passituṃ asakkuṇeyyaṃ ṭhānaṃ hotīti. “Ubhayatthapī”ti māyākārādi mahābhūtesu
anya-e0401n:290_18: ca pathaviyādimahābhūtesu ca. “Abhūtānī”ti asantāni, asaccāni.“Abbhutānī”ti acchariyakammāni.
anya-e0401n:290_19: “Imasmiṃ pāṭhe”ti catunnaṃ mahābhūtānanti evaṃ sambandha padasahite pāṭhe. Aññattha
anya-e0401n:290_20: pana upādārūpaṃ anupādārūpantiādīsu yakāra viraho diṭṭhoti adhippāyo. Dhātūnaṃ anekatthattā
anya-e0401n:290_21: “pathayati pakkhāyatī”ti vuttaṃ. “Puthū”ti pāṭipadikapadaṃ. Tameva jātatthe niruttinayena
anya-e0401n:290_22: pathavīti siddhanti dassetuṃ “puthumahantī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Pakārena thavīyatīti atthe
anya-e0401n:290_23: pathavīti idaṃ ujukameva. “Āpetī”ti byāpeti. “Appāyatī”ti bhusaṃ pāyati, vaḍḍheti.
anya-e0401n:290_24: Tenāha “suṭṭhu brūhetī”tiādiṃ. Nisānatthavaseneva paripācanatthopi labbhatīti āha
anya-e0401n:290_25: “paripācetivā”ti. “Samīretī”ti suṭṭhu īreti kampeti. Vāyati vahatīti vāyo atthātissaya
anya-e0401n:290_26: nayena. “Vitthambhanaṃ”ti vividhena ākārena bhūtasaṅghāṭānaṃ thambhanaṃ vahanaṃ abhinīharaṇaṃ.
anya-e0401n:290_27: Kakkhaḷatā nāma kharatā pharusatā. Sahajātarūpānaṃ patiṭṭhānatthāya thaddhatā thūlatā.
anya-e0401n:290_28: Sā sesabhūtesu natthīti āha “sesabhūtattayaṃ upādāyā”ti. “Anavaṭṭhānatā”ti ettha
anya-e0401n:290_29: avaṭṭhānaṃ nāma acalaṭṭhānaṃ. Na avaṭṭhānanti anavaṭṭhānaṃ. Calananti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:290_30: Tenāha “mudubhūtāpī”tiādiṃ. Ābandhakaṃ nāma ābandhitabbe vatthumhi mudumhi sati,
anya-e0401n:290_31: daḷhaṃ na bandhati. Thaddhesati, daḷhaṃ bandhatīti idaṃ lokatova siddhanti āha “ābandhitabbāyā”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:290_33: suṭṭhuparipācakatā dassanatoti vadanti. Usati dahatīti uṇhaṃ. “Dahatī”ti ca uṇhatejopi
anya-e0401n:290_34: uṇhabhāvena dahati, sītatejopi sītabhāvena dahati. Uṇhena phuṭṭhaṃ vatthu uṇhattaṃ
anya-e0401n:290_35: gacchati, sītena phuṭṭhaṃ vatthu sītattaṃ gacchati. Yañca uṇhattaṃ gacchati, taṃ
anya-e0401n:290_36: uṇhatejo uṇhabhāvena dahatināma. Yañca sītattaṃ gacchati, taṃ sītatejo sītabhāvena
anya-e0401n:290_37: dahatināma. Evaṃ sītatejopi usatidahatīti atthena uṇhatta lakkhaṇonāma hotīti. Evaṃsante
anya-e0401n:290_38: nīlenavaṇṇena phuṭṭhaṃ vatthu nīlaṃ hoti. Pītena phuṭṭhaṃ pītaṃ hoti. Nīlaṃpi pītaṃpi
anya-e0401n:290_39: taṃ vatthuṃ dahatināmāti ce. Nīlena vaṇṇena phuṭṭhaṃnāma natthi. Tathā pītena. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n:290_40: nīlādīnaṃ upādārūpānaṃ phusana kiccā bhāvato. Sammissitaṃ nāma hoti. Na ca sammissanamattena
anya-e0401n:290_41: dahati. Phusanto eva dahati. Phusantānaṃpi pathavivātānaṃ dahanakiccaṃ natthi. Paripācanakiccaṃ
anya-e0401n:290_42: natthīti adhippāyo. Sace ghanathaddhe silāthambhe vitthambhanaṃ atthi, sakalo silāthambho
anya-e0401n:290_43: kappāsapicuguḷhoviya sithilo ca lahuko ca bhaveyya. Naca bhavati. Tasmā tattha vitthambhanaṃ
anya-e0401n:290_44: natthīti adhippāyena “so pana ghanathaddhesu silāthambhādīsu na labbhatī”ti codeti.
anya-e0401n:290_45: Tattha pana vitthambhanaṃ labbhamānaṃ adhimattena na labbhati, sahajātabhūtānaṃ upatthambhanamattena
anya-e0401n:290_46: labbhatīti dassento “nā”ti vatvā “tatthahī”tiādimāha. Tattha “vahatī”ti thaddhakakkhaḷa kiccaṃ vahati.
anya-e0401n:291_1: samapathañca visamapathañcāti evamādiṃ samavisamaṃ. “Ācikkhatī”ti ācikkhantaṃ viya
anya-e0401n:291_2: taṃ jānana kiccaṃ sampādeti. Tenāha “samavisamajānanassa taṃ mūlakattā”ti. “Anirākaraṇato”ti
anya-e0401n:291_3: appaṭikkhipanato. “Taṃ vā”ti rūpaṃ vā. Suṇanti janā. Suyyanti janehi. Evaṃ ghāyantītiādīsu.
anya-e0401n:291_6: Ime pana pañca cakkhu pasādādayoti sambandho. “Daṭṭhukāmatā”ti rūpataṇhā vuccati.
anya-e0401n:291_7: Ādisaddena sotukāmatā ghāyitukāmatā sāyitukāmatā phusitukāmatāyo saṅgayhanti. Atthato
anya-e0401n:291_8: saddataṇhā gandhataṇhā rasataṇhā phoṭṭhabbataṇhā eva. “Nidānaṃ”ti kāraṇaṃ. Daṭṭhukāmatādayo
anya-e0401n:291_9: nidāna massāti viggaho. Kusalā kusalakammaṃ. Samuṭṭhāti etenāti samuṭṭhānaṃ. Kammameva.
anya-e0401n:291_10: Daṭṭhukāmatādinidānakammaṃ samuṭṭhānaṃ yesanti samāso. Pathaviādīni bhūtāni. Tesaṃ
anya-e0401n:291_11: pasādo lakkhaṇaṃ etesanti viggaho. Dutīya vikappe. Rūpādīnaṃ pañcārammaṇānaṃ abhighātaṃ
anya-e0401n:291_12: arahatīti rūpādiabhighātāraho. Bhūtānaṃ pasādo bhūtappasādo. So lakkhaṇaṃ etesanti
anya-e0401n:291_13: viggaho. Cakkhu ūkāsirappamāṇe diṭṭha maṇḍale tiṭṭhatīti sambandho. “Diṭṭhamaṇḍale”ti
anya-e0401n:291_14: mahājanehi pakati cakkhunā diṭṭhe pasannamaṇḍale. Telaṃ sattapicupaṭalāni byāpetvā
anya-e0401n:291_15: tiṭṭhativiyāti yojanā. “Sotabilaṃ” nāma sotakūpo. “Aṅguliveṭhanā” nāma aṅgulimuddikā.
anya-e0401n:291_17: rāsīkataṃ tanutambalomaṃ etthāti viggaho. “Ajapadasaṇṭhānaṃ”ti ajassa pādena akkantapadasaṇṭhānavantaṃ.
anya-e0401n:291_18: “Uppaladalaṃ” nāma uppalapaṇṇaṃ. Uppaladalassa aggasaṇṭhānavantaṃ. “Vaṭṭi” nāma idha
anya-e0401n:291_19: manussānaṃ sarīrākārasaṇṭhitā āyatapiṇḍi. “Sukkhacammāni ca ṭhapetvā”ti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:291_20: Te pana pañcappasādā. Samudīraṇaṃ cañcalanaṃ. “Yathātaṃ”ti katamaṃ viya taṃ. Ime
anya-e0401n:291_21: pasādā vicittā, kathaṃvicittāti āha “aññamaññaṃ asadisā”ti. Kathaṃ asadisāti āha “tehī”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:292_0: Gocararūpesu. “Vaṇṇavisesaṃ”ti vaṇṇavisesatthaṃ. Vaṇṇavikāranti vuttaṃ hoti. Hadaye
anya-e0401n:292_1: gato pavatto bhāvo hadayaṅgatabhāvo. “Bhāvo”ti ca adhippāyo vuccati. Taṃ pakāseti,
anya-e0401n:292_2: mukhe vaṇṇavikāraṃ disvā ayaṃ me tussati, ayaṃ me ruccati, ayaṃ me kuppati, ayaṃ
anya-e0401n:292_3: somanassito, ayaṃ domanassitoti evaṃ jānanapaccayattā. “Pakatiyā pī”ti vaṇṇavisesaṃ
anya-e0401n:292_4: anāpajjitvāpīti adhippāyo. “Yaṃ kiñcidabbaṃ”ti saviññāṇakavatthuṃ. Samavisamaṃ pubbe
anya-e0401n:292_5: pakāsitaṃ. Taṃ taṃ atthaṃ vā ācikkhati taṃ sutvā tassa tassa atthassa jānanato. Attano
anya-e0401n:292_6: vatthuṃ vā ācikkhati taṃ sutvā tassa vatthussapi jānanato. “Attano vatthuṃ sūcetī”ti
anya-e0401n:292_7: idha idaṃ nāma atthīti pakāseti. “Phusīyatī”ti phusitvā vijānīyati. “Taṃ”ti phusanaṃ.
anya-e0401n:292_8: “Tassā”ti āpodhātuyā. “Dravatāvā”ti addatintarasatāvā. Phusitvā gayhati, sā ca āpodhātu
anya-e0401n:292_9: siyāti codeti. Vuccate parihāro. Evaṃ pana na labbhati, tasmā sā tejoyeva. Na āpoti.
anya-e0401n:292_10: Ettha evaṃ alabbhamānāpi sāsītatā āpoyeva, na tejo. Kasmā, āpassapi sītuṇhavasena
anya-e0401n:292_11: duvidhatā sambhavato. Tasmiñhi loharase uṇhatā uṇhaāpo, sītavatthūsu sītatā sītaāpoti
anya-e0401n:292_12: ce. Evaṃ pana sati tejo nāma natthīti āpajjatīti parihāro. “Saha appavattanato”ti
anya-e0401n:292_13: ekato appavattanato. “Orapārānaṃ viyā”ti nadiyaṃ tīraṃ nāma idaṃ orimatīraṃ, idaṃ
anya-e0401n:292_14: pārimanti niyamato natthi. Yattha sayaṃ tiṭṭhati, taṃ orimanti, itaraṃ pārimanti
anya-e0401n:292_15: voharati. Evaṃ orapārānaṃ anavaṭṭhānaṃ hotīti. Ettha ca “sītuṇhānaṃ saha appavattanato”ti
anya-e0401n:292_16: etena yadi te saha pavatteyyuṃ. Tattha sītatā āponāma, uṇhatā tejonāmāti vattabbā
anya-e0401n:292_17: siyuṃ. Na pana te saha pavattanti, tasmā tathā na vattabbā hontīti dasseti. Na na
anya-e0401n:292_18: vattabbā. Kasmā, uṇhatejena yuttohi āpo uṇhattameva gacchati. Yathātaṃ uṇhatejena
anya-e0401n:292_19: yuttā pathavīpi vāyopi uṇhattameva gacchantīti. Tasmā te saha na pavattanti. Saha
anya-e0401n:292_20: appavattesupi tesu aññattha sītavatthūsu sītatā āponāmāti vattabbameva hotīti codanā.
anya-e0401n:292_21: Evaṃsante tasmiṃ loharase sabbepi rūpadhammā uṇhattaṃ gacchantīti sabbepi tejobhāvaṃ
anya-e0401n:292_22: pāpuṇanti. ‘Uṇhatta lakkhaṇo tejo’tihi vuttaṃ. Yadi ca sītavatthūsu sītabhāvo nāma
anya-e0401n:292_23: siyā. Tatthapi tena yuttā sabbepi rūpadhammā sītataṃ gacchantiyeva. Tatthapi tavamatiyā
anya-e0401n:292_24: sabbepi āpobhāvaṃ pāpuṇanti. Na pana sakkā tathā bhavituṃ. Na hi evarūpaṃ lakkhaṇaññathattaṃ
anya-e0401n:292_25: nāma tesaṃ atthi. Bhāvaññathattameva atthi. Tattha “lakkhaṇaññathattaṃ” nāma pathavī
anya-e0401n:292_26: āpobhāvaṃ gacchati. Āpo pathavibhāvaṃ gacchatītiādi. “Bhāvaññathattaṃ” nāma pathavī
anya-e0401n:292_27: kadāci kakkhaḷā hoti. Kadāci mudukā. Āpo kadāci ābandhanamatto hoti. Kadāci paggharaṇako.
anya-e0401n:292_28: Tejo kadāci uṇho, kadāci sīto. Vāyo kadāci vitthambhanamatto, kadāci samudīraṇoti.
anya-e0401n:292_29: Evaṃ ekamekassā dhātuyā tikkha manda omattādhimattavasena kriyāsaṅkanti nāma atthīti.
anya-e0401n:292_30: Tasmā yaṃ vuttaṃ ‘uṇhatejena yuttohi āpo uṇhattameva gacchati, yathā taṃ uṇhatejena
anya-e0401n:292_31: yuttā pathavīpi vāyopi uṇhattameva gacchantī’ti. Taṃ lakkhaṇaññathattavacanaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:292_32: Na yujjati. Na hi uṇhatejena yuttā sabbetedhammā uṇhattaṃ gacchanti. Attano attano
anya-e0401n:292_33: sabhāvaṃ na vijahanti. Tathāhi tasmiṃ pakkuthite santatte loharase bhāvo uṇhattaṃ
anya-e0401n:292_34: na gacchati. Ābandhana sabhāvaṃ vā paggharaṇa sabhāvaṃ vā na vijahati. Yadi uṇhattaṃ
anya-e0401n:292_35: gaccheyya, taṃ sabhāvaṃ vijaheyya. Evaṃsati, tasmiṃ loharase ābandhanākāro vā paggharaṇākāro
anya-e0401n:292_36: vā na paññāyeyya. Sabberūpa dhammā vikkireyyuṃ. Vikkiritvā antaradhāreyyuṃ. Na ca
anya-e0401n:292_37: na paññāyati. Nāpi vikkiranti. Noca tattha ābandhanākāro uṇhattaṃ gacchati. Aññohi
anya-e0401n:292_38: ābandhanākāro, aññaṃ uṇhattaṃ. Ābandhanākāro āpo, uṇhattaṃ tejo. Tattha pathavivāyesupi
anya-e0401n:292_39: esevanayo. Tasmā yaṃ vuttaṃ “yadi te saha pavatteyyuṃ. Tattha sītatā āponāma, uṇhatā
anya-e0401n:292_40: tejo nāmāti vattabbā siyuṃ. Na pana te saha pavattanti. Tasmā tathā na vattabbā hontīti
anya-e0401n:292_41: dassetī”ti. Taṃ suvuttamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Tesaṃ anavaṭṭhānato”ti etena sace te sītuṇhā
anya-e0401n:292_42: avaṭṭhitā siyuṃ. Atha sabbakālepi sītatā āponāma, uṇhatā tejonāmāti vattabbā siyuṃ.
anya-e0401n:292_43: Na pana te avaṭṭhitā honti. Anavaṭṭhitā eva honti. Tasmā tathā na vattabbā hontīti
anya-e0401n:292_44: dasseti. Ettha ca anavaṭṭhitesu santesu yadi sītatā āpo nāma, uṇhatā tejonāmāti vadeyyuṃ.
anya-e0401n:292_45: Evañcasati, āpatejāpi anavaṭṭhitā siyuṃ. Yo idāni āpo, soyeva khaṇantare tejo nāma.
anya-e0401n:292_46: Yo vā idāni tejo, soyeva khaṇantare āpo nāmāti āpajjeyyuṃ. Na ca sakkā tathā bhavituṃ.
anya-e0401n:292_47: Lakkhaṇaññathatte asante vohāraññathattassapi asambhavato. Tena vuttaṃ “orapārānaṃ
anya-e0401n:292_48: viya tesaṃ anavaṭṭhānato ca viññāyatī”ti. Tattha “viññāyatī”ti sāsītatā tejoyeva,
anya-e0401n:293_0: “Atha panā”tiādīsu. Yaṃ pubbe parena vuttaṃ ‘nanu dravatā vā phusitvā gayhatī’ti.
anya-e0401n:293_1: Taṃ vicāretuṃ “atha panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha “atha panā”ti yadi pana gayhati, evaṃsatīti
anya-e0401n:293_2: ca. Evañcasati ārammaṇa bhūto eva siyāti sambandho. Ayaṃ panetthā dhippāyo. Sace
anya-e0401n:293_3: dravabhāvabhūto āpo phusitvā gayheyya. Evaṃ sati, ayopiṇḍādīsu ābandhanamattabhūto
anya-e0401n:293_4: āpopi phusitvā gahetabbo siyā. Kasmā, āpabhāvena ekattā. Evañcasati, tesu ayopiṇḍādīsu
anya-e0401n:293_5: so āpo tāni hatthena vā pādena vā phusantassa paharantassa vinā itara mahābhūtehi
anya-e0401n:293_6: visuṃ kāyika sukhadukkhānaṃ ārammaṇa paccayo siyā. Yathātaṃ, tesveva ayopiṇḍādīsu
anya-e0401n:293_7: pathavimahābhūtaṃ vinā itaramahābhūtehi visuṃ kāyikasukhadukkhānaṃ ārammaṇa paccayo
anya-e0401n:293_8: hoti. Evaṃ tejovāyesupīti. Na pana so visuṃ kāyikasukhadukkhānaṃ ārammaṇa paccayo
anya-e0401n:293_9: hoti. Tasmā so phoṭṭhabba sabhāvo na hoti. Yathā ca so phoṭṭhabbasabhāvo na hoti.
anya-e0401n:293_10: Tathā pakati udakādīsu dravabhāvabhūtopi āpo tāni phusantassa paharantassa kāyikasukhadukkhānaṃ
anya-e0401n:293_11: ārammaṇa paccayo na hoti. Na ca phoṭṭhabba sabhāvoti. Evañcasati, kathaṃ ayopiṇḍādīsu
anya-e0401n:293_12: ābandhanamattabhūto āpo kāyikasukhadukkhānaṃ paccayo na hoti. Kathañca tesu itaramahābhūtāni
anya-e0401n:293_13: visuṃ visuṃ kāyikasukhadukkhānaṃ paccayā hontīti. Taṃ dassetuṃ “yañhī”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n:293_15: vā. Saṇhapathavīsukhavedanāya thaddhapathavīdukkhavedanāya ārammaṇa paccayoti vuttaṃ
anya-e0401n:293_16: hoti. Evaṃ sesesu. “Abbhantaratthambhanassā”ti tesaṃ ayopiṇḍādīnaṃ abbhantare ṭhitassa
anya-e0401n:293_17: vitthambhana sabhāvassa. “No aññathā”ti tānitīṇi kāraṇāni ṭhapetvā ābandhana kriyaṃ
anya-e0401n:293_18: paṭicca kāyikasukhadukkhuppatti nāma natthīti adhippāyo. Idāni pakati udakādīsu dravabhāvabhūtaṃ
anya-e0401n:293_19: āpodhātumpi phusitvā jānantīti mahājanā maññanti. Tabbisodhanena saha laddhaguṇaṃ
anya-e0401n:293_20: dassetuṃ “tasmā”tiādimāha. Tattha “pathamaṃ dravatā sahitāni. La. Jānantī”ti idaṃ
anya-e0401n:293_21: padhāna vacanaṃ. Loke hatthena parāmasitvā vā cakkhunā disvā vā idaṃ rassaṃ, idaṃ
anya-e0401n:293_22: dīghaṃ, idaṃ vaṭṭaṃ, idaṃ maṇḍalantiādinā saṇṭhānaṃ jānantā hattha phusanena vā cakkhu
anya-e0401n:293_23: dassanena vā saheva taṃ jānantīti maññanti. Tattha pana purimabhāge kāyadvāravīthi
anya-e0401n:293_24: cittena paccuppannāni tīṇibhūtāni phusitvā vā cakkhudvāra vīthicittena paccuppannaṃ
anya-e0401n:293_25: rūpaṃ disvā vā pacchā vatthuggahaṇavīthiyā uppannāya eva saṇṭhānaṃ jānanti. Esevanayo
anya-e0401n:293_26: rattiyaṃ alātacakkasaṇṭhānaṃ jānantassapi. Tattha pana bahūnipi pubbāparavīthicittasantānāni
anya-e0401n:293_27: icchitabbāni. Tathā loke cakkhunā disvā dvāravātapānādīnaṃ chiddavivarāni jānantā
anya-e0401n:293_28: cakkhunā dassanena saheva tāni jānantīti maññanti. Tattha pana purimabhāge cakkhudvārikavīthi
anya-e0401n:293_29: cittena paccuppannāni kavāṭarūpabhitti rūpāni punappunaṃ disvā pacchā alātacakkassa
anya-e0401n:293_30: majjhe vivaraṃpi jānantā viya visuṃ uppannāya manodvārika viññāṇavīthiyā eva taṃ
anya-e0401n:293_31: chiddavivarabhūtaṃ ākāsaṃ jānanti. Tathā hatthena udakaṃ phusantassa pathamaṃ dravasahitāni
anya-e0401n:293_32: vilīnāni mudūni tīṇiphoṭṭhabba mahābhūtāni visuṃ visuṃ kāyadvārika vīthi cittehi
anya-e0401n:293_33: phusanakiccena ārammaṇaṃ karitvā pacchā visuṃ suddhāya manodvārika vīthiyā eva dravabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ
anya-e0401n:293_34: paggharaṇaka āpodhātuṃ jānanti. Evaṃ santepi taṃ dravabhāvaṃpi hatthena phusanena
anya-e0401n:294_0: Gāvo caranti etthāti āha “gunnaṃ caraṇaṭṭhānaṃ”ti. Akkhara vidū pana gosaddaṃ indriyatthepi
anya-e0401n:294_1: icchantīti āha “goti vā”tiādiṃ. Tāni cakkhādīni etesu rūpādīsu caranti, etāni vā
anya-e0401n:294_2: rūpādīni tesu cakkhādīsu caranti. Tattha purimena gāvo indriyāni caranti etesūti
anya-e0401n:294_3: gocarānīti dasseti. Pacchimena gosuindriyesu carantīti gocarānīti. Imāni pana pañca rūpādīni.
anya-e0401n:295_0: Bhāvadvaye. Icchanaṭṭhena ṭhānaṭṭhena ṭhapanaṭṭhena ca itthī. Sāhikāmarati atthāya
anya-e0401n:295_1: sayaṃpi aññaṃkāmikaṃ icchati. Sayañca kāmikena icchīyati. Añño ca kāmiko gharāvāsa
anya-e0401n:295_2: sukhatthāya tattha ṭhānaṃ upeti, patiṭṭhāti. Āyatiñca kulavaṃsappatiṭṭhānatthāya
anya-e0401n:295_3: tattha kulavaṃsa bījaṃ ṭhapetīti. Pūraṇaṭṭhena icchanaṭṭhena ca puriso. Sohi attahitañca
anya-e0401n:295_4: pūreti, parahitañca icchati. Idhalokahitañca pūreti, paralokahitañca icchati. Ubhayalokahitañca
anya-e0401n:295_5: pūreti, lokuttarahitañca icchati, esati, gavesatīti. Pumassasakaṃ puṃsakaṃ. Purisaliṅgādi.
anya-e0401n:295_6: Natthi puṃsakaṃ etassāti napuṃsakaṃ. “Yassa pana dhammassā”ti bhāvarūpadhammassa.
anya-e0401n:295_7: “Taṃ”ti khandhapañcakaṃ. Mahāsaṇṭhānaṃ sattānaṃ jātibhedaṃ liṅgeti ñāpetīti liṅgaṃ.
anya-e0401n:295_8: Lakkhaṇapāṭhakā niminanti sañjānanti kalyāṇa pāpakaṃ kammavipākaṃ etenāti nimittaṃ.
anya-e0401n:295_9: Kiriyā kuttaṃ. Āyukantaṃ kappīyati saṅkharīyatīti ākappo. Sabbepeteliṅgādayo. Soca
anya-e0401n:295_11: itthi saṇṭhāna purisasaṇṭhānādi atthesu ca. “Nimittasaddo viyā”ti nimitta saddo aṅgajāte
anya-e0401n:295_12: pākaṭo viyāti. Na pākaṭo diṭṭho. Apākaṭo pana katthaci diṭṭhoti adhippāyo. “Bhavanti
anya-e0401n:295_13: saddabuddhiyo”ti saddasatthanayo. “Bhavanti liṅgādīnī”ti aṭṭhakathānayo. Tattha hi
anya-e0401n:295_14: itthiliṅgādīnaṃ hetubhāva lakkhaṇanti vuttaṃ. “Etasmiṃ satī”ti ca jātiyā sati, jarāmaraṇaṃ
anya-e0401n:295_15: hoti. Asati na hotīti etthaviya hetu phalabhāvapākaṭatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:296_0: Vatthurūpe. Niruttinayena vacanatthā bhavanti. Dhātu dvayaṃ nāma manodhātu manoviññāṇadhātu
anya-e0401n:296_1: dvayaṃ. “Avatvā”ti hadaya vatthuṃ avatvā. “Taṃ”ti hadaya vatthu rūpaṃ. “Pañcā”ti
anya-e0401n:296_2: pañcavatthūni. “Tesaṃ”ti tesaṃ kusalādīnaṃ. “Tattha vuttaṃ”ti paṭṭhāne vuttaṃ. “Yaṃ
anya-e0401n:296_3: rūpaṃ nissāyā”ti yaṃ rūpaṃ nissāya manodhātu ca manoviññāṇadhātu ca vattantīti imaṃ
anya-e0401n:296_4: pāṭhaṃ niddisati. “Anañña sādhāraṇesu ṭhānesū”ti cakkhu vatthādīhi aññavatthūhi asādhāraṇesu
anya-e0401n:297_1: kiccaṃ vuccati. Na adhipati paccayakiccaṃ. “Jīvantī”ti haritabhāvaṃ na vijahantīti
anya-e0401n:297_2: vuttaṃ hoti. Na hi tāni ekantena jīvantāni nāma honti. Jīvita rūpassa ekanta kammajassa
anya-e0401n:297_3: bahiddhā anupaladdhattā. Kammajarūpāni jīvanti yevāti sambandho. “Kamme asantepī”ti
anya-e0401n:297_4: kammacetanāya pubbe niruddhattā vuttaṃ. Tadatthaṃ byatirekato pākaṭaṃ karonto “tathāhī”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n:297_5: “Itara rūpānī”ti cittajarūpādīni. Ekavīthivāro nāma pañcadvāravīthivāro. Manodvāravīthivāro
anya-e0401n:297_6: ekajavana vāroti vutto. Paricchinnaṃ hoti. Kasmā, ekekasmiṃ vīthivāre niruddhe bhavaṅga
anya-e0401n:297_7: samaye asadisassa rūpasantānassa pātubbhāvatoti adhippāyo. Tañca kho rūpavisesaṃ
anya-e0401n:297_8: jānantasseva pākaṭaṃ hoti. Ajānantassa pana taṅkhaṇamatte apākaṭaṃ. Kasmā, tādisassapi
anya-e0401n:297_9: utujarūpasantānassa thokaṃ pavattanato. Yassahi dosa samuṭṭhitena rūpasantānena mukharūpaṃ
anya-e0401n:297_10: dubbaṇṇaṃ hoti. Tassa dose niruddhepi taṃ rūpaṃ thokaṃ dubbaṇṇameva khāyatīti. “Utujāhārajānañca
anya-e0401n:297_11: santati paccuppannaṃ”ti adhikāro. Ekaṃ addhāpaccuppannameva hotīti vuttaṃ. Na nu
anya-e0401n:297_12: cakkhusotādīni kammajarūpasantānānipi pavattikāle kadāci suppasannāni, kadāci pasannāni,
anya-e0401n:297_13: kadāci appasannāni dissantīti. Saccaṃ, tathā pavatti pana santāna vicchedena na hoti,
anya-e0401n:297_14: nānāvicchinne ca ekekasmiṃ santāne tesaṃ punaghaṭanaṃ nāma natthi. Sakiṃ andho andhoyeva
anya-e0401n:297_15: hoti. Badhiroca badhiroyevāti adhippāyo. “Yadi evaṃ”ti evaṃ yadi siyāti attho. “Arūpa
anya-e0401n:297_16: dhammānaṃ santati paccuppannaṃ”ti adhikāro. “Vipākānī”ti bhavaṅgabhūtāni vipākāni.
anya-e0401n:297_17: Ekasantativasena pavattissantiyeva, tasmā tesaṃ nānāsantati paccuppannaṃ nāma na
anya-e0401n:297_18: vattabbaṃ. Kasmā, yāvajīvampi eka kammanibbattattāti adhippāyo. “Itarāni panā”ti
anya-e0401n:297_19: kusalā kusala kriyacittāni pana. “Tadārammaṇā”ti niruddhārammaṇā. Addhānappharaṇānubhāvena
anya-e0401n:297_20: pavattantiyeva. Na pana cittajarūpādīni viya attano janakapaccaye niruddhe nirujjhanti.
anya-e0401n:297_21: Ayaṃ arūpadhammānaṃ jīvantatte visesoti adhippāyo. “Ayamattho vattabbo”ti arūpa dhammānaṃ
anya-e0401n:297_22: jīvantatāviseso vattabbo. Yathā rūpasantatiyaṃ anantara paccayo nāma natthi. Cutikāle
anya-e0401n:297_23: bhavantararūpasantānassa kiñci paccayattaṃ anupagantvā nirujjhati. Tena bhavantara
anya-e0401n:297_24: pātubbhāvo nāma tesaṃ natthi. Na tathā arūpasantatiyaṃ. Tattha pana cuticittampi
anya-e0401n:297_25: paṭisandhiyā anantara paccayo hutvā nirujjhati. Tena bhavantarapātubbhāvo nāma tesaṃ
anya-e0401n:297_26: atthi. Ayampi arūpadhammānaṃ jīvantatte viseso. Tasmā arūpadhammānaṃpi kammajarūpānaṃ
anya-e0401n:297_27: viya niccaṃ jīvitayogena jīvantattā santati paccuppannaṃ nāma na bhaveyyāti na codetabbanti.
anya-e0401n:297_28: Kusalā kusala kriyacittāni nāma akammajāni honti. Cittajarūpādīni viya atītaṃ kammaṃ
anya-e0401n:297_29: anapekkhitvā taṅkhaṇikehi nānāpaccayehi uppajjanti. Tasmā tesaṃ jīvantānaṃpi sataṃ
anya-e0401n:297_30: ajīvantānaṃ cittajarūpādīnaṃ viya nānāsantati paccuppannaṃ nāma atthi. Jīvantatā
anya-e0401n:297_31: visesopi atthīti adhippāyo. Ettha keci vadanti. Rukkhādīsupi jīvitaṃ nāma atthi.
anya-e0401n:297_32: Yato tesaṃ haritatā ca aharitatā ca rūhanañca-arūhanañca dissatīti. Vuccate, yadi
anya-e0401n:297_33: tesaṃ jīvitaṃ nāma atthi, arūpajīvitaṃ vā siyā, rūpajīvitaṃ vā. Tattha sace arūpajīvitaṃ
anya-e0401n:297_34: hoti. Yathā tena samannāgato satto punappunaṃ maritvā punappunaṃ bhavantare pātubbhavanti.
anya-e0401n:297_35: Tathā rukkhāpi maritvā bhavantare pātubbhaveyyuṃ. Atha rūpajīvitaṃ siyā. Yathā sattānaṃ
anya-e0401n:297_36: cakkhādi aṅgesu jīvita santāne bhinne tāni aṅgāni puna jīvantāni kātuṃ na sakkonti.
anya-e0401n:297_37: Tathā rukkhāpi khandhesu vā sākhāsuvā chinnesu jīvitasantāne bhinne tekhandhāvā sākhāyo
anya-e0401n:297_38: vā puna aññattha ropetuṃ na sakkā bhaveyyuṃ. Sakkā eva bhavanti. Tasmā tadubhayaṃpi
anya-e0401n:297_39: jīvitaṃ nāma tesaṃ natthīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Vibhāvanipāṭhe. Na hi tesaṃ kammaṃyeva ṭhitikāraṇaṃ
anya-e0401n:297_40: hotīti ettha kammaṃ ṭhitikāraṇaṃ eva na hotīti yojetabbaṃ. Tenāha “āhārajādīnaṃ”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:297_41: Ekakalāpe gatā pavattā sahajāta paccayā, tehi āyattā paṭibaddhāti viggaho. Kammādīnaṃ
anya-e0401n:297_42: rūpajanakapaccayānaṃ janakānubhāvo nāma rūpakalāpānaṃ uppādakkhaṇe eva pharati, na
anya-e0401n:297_43: ṭhitikkhaṇe. Upacayasantatiyo ca uppādakkhaṇe labbhanti, na ṭhitikkhaṇe. Tasmā tā
anya-e0401n:297_44: janakapaccayānubhāvakkhaṇe laddhattā kutocijātanāmaṃ labhanti. Jaratāpana ṭhitikkhaṇe
anya-e0401n:297_45: eva labbhati, na uppādakkhaṇe. Tasmā sā kutocijāta nāmaṃ na labhati. Yadi pana āhārajādīnaṃ
anya-e0401n:297_46: rūpadhammānaṃ ṭhiti nāma āhārādi janakapaccayāyattā bhaveyya. Jaratāpi janakapaccayānubhāvakkhaṇeva
anya-e0401n:297_47: labbhamānā siyā. Evañcasati, sāpi kutocijāta nāmaṃ labheyya. Na pana labhati. Tasmā
anya-e0401n:297_48: tesaṃ ṭhiti nāma janakapaccayāyattā na hotīti imamatthaṃ dassento “itarathā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n:297_50: khaṇaṭhi tibhāvena pavattiatthāya upatthambhanti, anupāletīti yojanā. Sabbesaṃpi
anya-e0401n:298_0: Āhārarūpe. “Savatthukavacanaṃ”ti bhojanādi vatthunā saha pavattatīti savatthukaṃ.
anya-e0401n:298_1: Vacanaṃ. Na hi nibbattitaṃ āhāra rūpaṃ nāma kabaḷaṃ kātuṃ sakkā hotīti. “Vivecitānī”ti
anya-e0401n:298_2: pācana kiccena vibhajitāni. Visuṃ visuṃ katāni. “Pañcadhā vibhāgaṃ gacchantī”ti ekaṃ
anya-e0401n:298_3: bhāgaṃ pāṇakā khādanti. Ekaṃ bhāgaṃ udaraggi jhāpeti. Eko bhāgo muttaṃ hoti. Ekobhāgo
anya-e0401n:298_4: karīsaṃ. Ekobhāgo rasabhāvaṃ āpajjitvā soṇitamaṃsādīni upabrūhayatīti evaṃ vuttanayena
anya-e0401n:298_5: pañcadhā vibhāgaṃ gacchanti. “Loke”ti lokiya ganthe. “Tato”ti āmāsayato. Anupharanto
anya-e0401n:298_6: hutvā. “Tassā”ti rasabhāgassa. “Bhūtesū”ti mahābhūtesu. Saha indriyena vattatīti
anya-e0401n:298_7: sendriyo. Kāyo. Udayatīti ojā. Dakārassa jakāro. Avati janetīti ojā. Avasaddassa
anya-e0401n:299_0: “Aññāpadeso” nāma rūpassa lahutātiādīsu aññassa rūpassa kriyāmattabhāvena apadisanaṃ
anya-e0401n:299_1: vuccati. “Ujukatova nipphāditaṃ”ti mukhyatova janitaṃ. Yathāhi sabbaṃ anipphannarūpaṃ
anya-e0401n:299_2: ajāti dhammattā ujukato kammādīhi jātaṃ nāma na hoti. Kammādīhi jātaṃ pana nipphannarūpaṃ
anya-e0401n:299_3: nissāya dissamānattā ṭhānūpacārena viññatti dvayaṃ cittajaṃtiādinā vuccati. Na tathā
anya-e0401n:299_4: idaṃ nipphannarūpaṃ. Idaṃ pana jātidhammattā ujukatova kammādīhi paccayehi nipphāditaṃ
anya-e0401n:299_5: janitanti vuttaṃ hoti. “Rūpaṃ”ti vutte anipphannarūpaṃpi labbhatīti tato visesanatthaṃ
anya-e0401n:299_7: nāma sītuṇhādīhi vikārapattilakkhaṇaṃ. Tampana anipphanna rūpe mukhyato na labbhati.
anya-e0401n:299_8: Nipphannarūpe eva labbhati. Kasmā, nipphannarūpassahi nānāvikāro vikārarūpanti vuccati.
anya-e0401n:299_9: Lakkhaṇaṃ lakkhaṇa rūpanti vuccati. Vikārassa pana vikāro nāma natthi. Lakkhaṇassa
anya-e0401n:299_10: ca lakkhaṇaṃ nāma natthi. Yadi atthīti vadeyya. Vikārassa vikāro, tassa ca vikāro,
anya-e0401n:299_11: tassa ca vikāroti apariyantameva siyā. Tathā lakkhaṇepīti.
anya-e0401n:300_0: Ākāsadhātuyaṃ. “Pakāsantī”ti idaṃ ekaṃ idaṃ ekanti paññāyanti. “Paricchindatī”ti
anya-e0401n:300_2: Paricchindīyatīti paricchedoti āha “tehi vā”tiādiṃ. “Tehi vā”ti kalāpantarabhūtehi
anya-e0401n:300_3: vā. “Attano vā paresaṃ vā akatvā”ti attanopakkhikaṃ vā paresaṃ pakkhikaṃ vā akatvā.
anya-e0401n:300_4: Pariccheda kriyāmattaṃ paricchedoti āha “tesaṃ vā”tiādiṃ. “Tesaṃ vā”ti kalāpantarabhūtānaṃ
anya-e0401n:300_5: vā. “Ayaṃ panā”ti ayaṃ paricchedo pana. “Tassā”ti paricchedassa. So pāḷiyaṃ vuttoti
anya-e0401n:300_6: sambandho. “Iti katvā”ti evaṃ manasikatvā. “Etehī”ti etehi mahābhūtehi. “Aññamañña
anya-e0401n:300_7: abyāpitatā”ti dvinnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vā rūpakalāpānaṃ ekakalāpattūpagamanaṃ aññamañña byāpitā
anya-e0401n:300_8: nāma, tathā anupagamanaṃ aññamañña abyāpitatā nāma. Tenāha “ekattaṃ”tiādiṃ. “Tatthā”ti
anya-e0401n:300_9: tissaṃ pāḷiyaṃ. “Nānākalāpagatānaṃ bhūtānaṃ”ti etena kalāpapariyantatā eva vuttā hoti.
anya-e0401n:301_0: Viññatti dvaye. “Sayañcā”ti viññatti saṅkhātaṃ sayañca. “Tenā”ti calamānena kāyaṅgena.
anya-e0401n:301_1: “Tehī”ti paccakkhe ṭhitehi janehi. Tatthātiādīsu. “Kāyaṅgavikāraṃ karontassā”ti abhikkamanādi
anya-e0401n:301_2: atthāya hatthapādādīnaṃ kāyaṅgānaṃ calana saṅkhātaṃ vikāraṃ karontassa. Uppajjantā
anya-e0401n:301_3: ca sabbete cittajavātakalāpā yathādhippeta disābhimukhā eva uppajjantīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:301_4: “Yathā vā tathā vā anuppajjitvā”ti aniyamato anuppajjitvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Yassa copana
anya-e0401n:301_5: kāyassa. “Tehī”ti cittajavātakalāpehi. Niyāmako nāvāniyojako. “Te cā”ti tecittajavātakalāpasaṅghāṭā.
anya-e0401n:301_6: Etena sakalaṃ kāyaṅgaṃ nidasseti. Sakalakāyaṅgaṃ nāvāsadisanti vuttaṃ hoti. “Cāretvā”ti
anya-e0401n:301_7: viyūhitvā. Kathaṃ pana sā niyāmakasadisī hotīti āha “yathāhī”tiādi. Yadetaṃ sakkotīti
anya-e0401n:301_8: vacanaṃ vuttanti sambandho. “Katīpayajavana vārehī”ti dvatti javanavārehi. “Tato”ti
anya-e0401n:301_9: yasmiṃ vāre calana saṅkhātaṃ desantara pāpanaṃ jāyati. Tato calanavārato. Santhambhana
anya-e0401n:301_10: sandhāraṇāni eva sampajjanti, na calanasaṅkhātaṃ desantara pāpanaṃ. “Etthā”ti etissaṃ
anya-e0401n:301_11: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ. Nānājavanavīthīsu. La. Upatthambhane ca yujjatiyeva. Na ekissāya javanavīthiyaṃ
anya-e0401n:301_12: eva yujjatīti adhippāyo. Yadi nānājavanavīthīsu tathā upatthambhanañca gayheyya.
anya-e0401n:301_13: Evaṃsati, antarantarā bahū bhavaṅgavārāpi santi. Tattha kathaṃ tadupatthambhanaṃ
anya-e0401n:301_16: ākāra vantāni. Pacchima pacchimānaṃ rūpakalā pasaṅghāṭānaṃ aparāparaṃ uppajjananti
anya-e0401n:301_17: sambandho. Purimapurimānaṃ rūpakalāpasaṅghāṭānaṃ khaṇikadhammatā ca tesaṃ na siyā.
anya-e0401n:301_18: Na ca te khaṇikadhammā na honti. Aññathā desantara saṅkamanasaṅkhātaṃ calanaṃ eva
anya-e0401n:301_19: na siyā. Calanaṃ tihi nānākriyānaṃ pātubbhāvo vuccati. Nānākriyā ca nāma nānādhammā
anya-e0401n:301_20: eva. Yasmā ca aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ khaṇekhaṇe calanaṃ nāma loke paccakkhato diṭṭhaṃ. Tasmā
anya-e0401n:301_21: tesaṃ khaṇikadhammatāpi daṭṭhabbā hotīti. Etena tesaṃ khaṇikamaraṇaṃ dasseti, yaṃ
anya-e0401n:301_22: rūpārūpadhammānaṃ aniccalakkhaṇanti vuccati. Abyāpāra dhammatā ca avasavattitā ca
anya-e0401n:301_23: tesaṃ na siyā. Na ca te abyāpāra dhammā, na avasavatti dhammā ca na honti. Aññathā
anya-e0401n:301_24: paccayāyatta vuttitā eva tesaṃ na siyā. Paccayāyatta vuttitāti ca paccaye sati, te
anya-e0401n:301_25: vattanti, asati na vattantīti evaṃ pavattā paccayāyatta vuttitā yasmā ca paccayasāmaggiyaṃ
anya-e0401n:301_26: sati, te vattantiyeva. Tesaṃ vattanatthāya kenacibyāpārena kiccaṃ natthi. Te māvattantūti
anya-e0401n:301_27: ca attano vasena vattanti. Paccaye asati, na vattantiyeva. Tesaṃ avattanatthāya kenacibyāpārena
anya-e0401n:301_28: kiccaṃ natthi. Temāvattantūti ca attano vasenavattanti. Yasmā ca tesaṃ paccayāyatta
anya-e0401n:301_29: vuttitā nāma loke viññūnaṃ paccakkhatodiṭṭhā. Tasmā tesaṃ abyāpāratā ca avasavattitā
anya-e0401n:301_30: ca daṭṭhabbā hoti. Etena tesaṃ sabbehi sattapuggala attākārehi sabbaso suññaṃ dasseti,
anya-e0401n:302_1: nāma kammaja pathavīdhātuyo. Tāsu saṅghaṭṭananti sambandho. Attanā sahajātenayena
anya-e0401n:302_2: ākāravikārena upagacchati, yena ca upalabbhatīti sambandho. Ajjhatta santānagatā
anya-e0401n:302_3: sabbe catujarūpadhammāpi katthaci upādinnakāti vuccantīti āha “catujabhūtāya eva
anya-e0401n:302_4: vā”ti. Dvīsuṭhāna karaṇesu karaṇapakkhe calanākārappavattā cittajapathavīdhātu ṭhānapakkhe
anya-e0401n:302_5: pathavidhātuyaṃ saṅghaṭṭayamānā kammajapathaviyaṃ eva ghaṭṭeti. Itara pathaviyaṃ
anya-e0401n:302_6: na ghaṭṭetīti na sakkā vattuṃti katvā idha evaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ. “Vikāra dvayañcā”ti
anya-e0401n:302_7: kāyavikāra vacīvikāra dvayañca. Kathaṃ pana asammissaṃ katvā veditabbanti āha “etthacā”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:302_8: Yaṃ pana tāsaṃ ghaṭṭanappakāravidhānaṃ atthīti sambandho. “Tāsaṃ” cittajapathavīnaṃ.
anya-e0401n:302_9: “Taṃ taṃ vaṇṇattapattiyā”ti ka, khā, divaṇṇattapattatthāya. Yaṃ pana kāyaviññattiṭṭhāne
anya-e0401n:302_10: ‘ayañca attho upari akkharuppatti vicāraṇāyaṃ pākaṭo bhavissatī’ti vuttaṃ. Taṃ idha
anya-e0401n:302_11: pākaṭaṃ karonto “ettha cā”tiādimāha. Teneva hi mūlaṭīkāyaṃ vuttanti sambandho. “Ettha
anya-e0401n:302_14: paribyatta akkharappavattivīthiyaṃ uppannapathamajavana cittassapi. Tassa āsevanañca
anya-e0401n:302_15: nāma tato purimehi vīthivārehi eva laddhaṃ siyāti adhippāyo. “Āsevanaṃ”ti ca upacāra
anya-e0401n:302_16: vacanaṃ daṭṭhabbanti heṭṭhā vuttameva. “Tassā”ti paribyattakkharassa. Vuttañca saddasatthesu.
anya-e0401n:302_18: vīhidhaññapūro sakaṭo vīhivāho nāma. Vīhivāhānaṃ sādhike satasmiṃ. Abhimaññanaṃ abhimāno.
anya-e0401n:302_19: “Sesamettha kāyaviññattiyaṃ vuttanaye nā”ti tathāhi calanacittajarūpasantatiyaṃ pavattānītiādinā
anya-e0401n:302_20: vutta nayenāti attho. Idha pana vacībhedakara cittajasaddasantatiyaṃ pavattāni utujarūpasaṅghāṭānītiādinā
anya-e0401n:302_23: kāyaviññatti ca, suttanta sajjhāyanādīsu vacīviññatti ca paraṃ bodhetukāmatā rahitāti
anya-e0401n:302_25: Purimā kāyaviññatti, pacchimā ca vacīviññatti. Pacchā suddhena manodvārika javanena
anya-e0401n:302_26: eva viññāyati, na pañcadvārika javanenāti yojanā. Cakkhuviññāṇa vīthiyā gahetvāti
anya-e0401n:302_27: sambandho. “Kāyaviññāṇa vīthiyā”ti vacībhedaṃ akatvā hatthaggahaṇādi vasena adhippāya
anya-e0401n:302_28: viññāpane ayaṃ kāyaviññāṇavīthi daṭṭhabbā. Kasmā pana sayañcaviññāyatīti viññattīti
anya-e0401n:302_29: ayaṃ vikappo vuttoti āha “sāhi attānaṃ”tiādiṃ. “Majjhe”ti viññattiggahaṇavīthi adhippāyaggahaṇavīthinaṃ
anya-e0401n:302_30: majjhe. Kathaṃ pavattakaviññattīsu adhippāyaṃ viññāpeti, sayañcaviññāyatīti dve atthā
anya-e0401n:302_31: labbhantīti āha “dvīsu panā”tiādiṃ. Ayaṃ abhikkamati, ayaṃ paṭikkamatīti jānantā
anya-e0401n:302_33: parassavacanasaddaṃ. Rāgacittañca jānanti. Tena vuttaṃ mūlaṭīkāyaṃ paraṃ bodhetukāmatāya
anya-e0401n:302_34: vināpi abhikkamanādippavattanena socittasahabhuvikāro adhippāyaṃ. La. Dvidhāpi viññatti yevāti.
anya-e0401n:303_0: Vikārarūpesu. “Kammayogyaṃ”ti abhikkamanādikammesu yojetuṃ yuttaṃ. Adandhatā vuccati
anya-e0401n:303_1: sīghappavatti. Sā lakkhaṇaṃ assāti viggaho. Sarīra kriyānukulo kammaññabhāvo lakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0401n:303_2: yassāti samāso. “Dhātuyo”ti mahābhūtadhātuyo vā, pittasemhādidhātuyo vā. Pūtimukhasappasaṅkhātassa
anya-e0401n:303_3: āpassa pariyuṭṭhānanti vākyaṃ. Asayhabhāro nāma vahituṃ asakkuṇeyyabhāro. “Sā pavattatī”ti
anya-e0401n:303_4: kāyalahutā pavattati. Thaddhaṃ karonti sarīragatā dhātuyoti adhikāro. Bhusaṃ māretīti
anya-e0401n:303_5: āmariko. Dakāro āgamo. Gāmanigamaviluppako coragaṇo. Tassa bhayena pariyuṭṭhitaṃ.
anya-e0401n:303_6: “Vivaṭṭamānaṃ”ti virūpaṃ hutvā vaṭṭantaṃ. “Mūlabhūtā hotī”ti asappāya sevane sati,
anya-e0401n:303_7: sā pathamaṃ pariyuṭṭhāti. Sītādhikāvā hoti, uṇhādhikāvā. Tāya pariyuṭṭhitāya eva
anya-e0401n:303_8: sabbapariyuṭṭhānāni pavattantīti vuttaṃ hoti. “Imāpanatisso rūpajātiyo rūpakāyassa
anya-e0401n:303_9: visesākārā honti. Iti tasmā vikārarūpaṃ nāmāti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:304_2: vassasahassampi dīghakālaṃ attabhāvaṃ pūraṇavasena. “Tena pariyāyenā”ti upasaddassa
anya-e0401n:304_3: atthanānattaṃ acintetvā nibbattiṃ vaḍḍhiyaṃ antogadhaṃ katvā vuttena tenapariyāyena.
anya-e0401n:304_4: Tassa ca ekekassa santati paccuppannassa. Tattha cittajarūpesu assāsa passāsānaṃ
anya-e0401n:304_5: vā padavārahatthavārādīnaṃ vā akkharānaṃ vā nibbatti vaḍḍhi pavattiyo dissantiyeva.
anya-e0401n:304_6: Tathā nānācittasamuṭṭhitānaṃ nānārūpasantatīnaṃ pīti. Utujarūpesu iriyā pathanānattaṃ
anya-e0401n:304_9: vā sarīre uppannānaṃ nānārūpasantatīnampi cakkhurogādirūpānampīti. Āhārajarūpesu
anya-e0401n:304_10: āhāranānattaṃ paṭicca sarīre uppannānaṃ samavisamarūpasantatīnaṃti. “Ayaṃ nayo”ti
anya-e0401n:304_11: bahiddhāsantāne nidassana nayo. Tena ajjhattasantānepi sattasantānānaṃ hatthapādādisantānānaṃ
anya-e0401n:304_12: kesalomādi santānānañca nibbatti vaḍḍhipavattiyo nidasseti. “Jīraṇaṃ”ti abhinavāvatthato
anya-e0401n:304_13: hāyanaṃ. Pāḷipāṭhe. “Ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ”ti añño pakāro aññathā. Aññathā bhāvo aññathattaṃ.
anya-e0401n:304_14: Etena jarāvasenavā nānārogābādhādivasena vā vipariṇāmo vutto. “Tathā avatthābhedayogato”ti
anya-e0401n:304_15: jātirūpameva ādimhi nibbatti hoti. Tatoparaṃ tameva vaḍḍhi hoti. Tato paraṃ tameva
anya-e0401n:304_16: pavatti hotīti evaṃ tathā avatthābhedayogato. Tenāha “sāhī”tiādiṃ. “Pabandhayatī”ti
anya-e0401n:304_17: pabandhaṃ karoti. Saṅgahagāthādīsu pana suviññeyyā. “Ettha ca pacchimānī”tiādīsu.
anya-e0401n:304_18: Vohārasiddhamattabhāvaṃ”ti puggalo satto attā jīvotiādikā paññatti nāma vohāra siddhamattā
anya-e0401n:304_19: hoti. Sabhāvasiddhā na hoti. Sāhi mahājanehi khandha pañcakaṃ upādāya puggalo nāma
anya-e0401n:304_20: atthīti sammatattā voharitattā vohārasiddhā nāma. Sabhāvasiddhā pana na hoti. Tasmā
anya-e0401n:304_21: ariyānaṃ vohāre puggalo nāma natthīti sijjhati. Imāni pana rūpāni sabhāvasiddhattā
anya-e0401n:304_23: siddhenā”ti pathavīdhātu nāma suddhadhammo hoti. Sā uppādampi gacchati, jarampi gacchati,
anya-e0401n:304_24: bhedampi gacchati. Tasmā tassā uppādopi jarāpi bhedopi suddhadhammagatiyā siddho
anya-e0401n:304_25: nāma. Evaṃ lakkhaṇarūpānaṃ suddhadhammagatisiddhaṃ paramatthalakkhaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:304_26: Tathā viññatti dvayassapi vikārarūpattayassapi pariccheda rūpassapīti. Yathā ca imesaṃ
anya-e0401n:304_27: rūpānaṃ. Tathā nibbānassapi suddhadhammagatisiddhaṃ paramatthalakkhaṇaṃ atthiyeva.
anya-e0401n:304_28: Kilesadhammāhi ariyamagge abhāvite bhavaparamparāya uppādaṃ gacchantiyeva. Bhāvitepana
anya-e0401n:304_29: anuppādaṃ nirodhaṃ gacchantiyeva. Tasmā kilesadhammānaṃ anuppādanirodhopi suddhadhammagatiyā
anya-e0401n:304_30: siddho nāma. Evaṃ nibbānassapi suddhadhammagatisiddhaṃ paramatthalakkhaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:304_31: Atthi bhikkhave ajātaṃ abhūtanti idaṃ suttaṃpi ettha vattabbaṃ. Etena ariyavohāre
anya-e0401n:304_32: nibbānassa ekantena atthitā bhagavatā vuttā hoti. Tenāha “itarathā”tiādiṃ. “Nasabhāvato
anya-e0401n:304_33: anupaladdhattā anipphannāni nāma hontī”ti etena etāni asabhāvarūpānīti ca alakkhaṇa
anya-e0401n:304_34: rūpānīti ca asammasanarūpānīti ca na sakkā vattuṃtipi dīpeti. Kasmā, yathāsakaṃ sabhāvehi
anya-e0401n:304_35: sabhāvavantattā yathāsakaṃ lakkhaṇe hi salakkhaṇattā paṭisambhidāmagge sammasanaññāṇa
anya-e0401n:304_36: vibhaṅge jātijarāmaraṇānampi sammasitabbadhammesu āgatattāti. Aṭṭhasāliniyampi ayamattho
anya-e0401n:304_37: vuttoyeva. Yathāha parinipphannanti pannarasarūpāni parinipphannāni nāma. Dasarūpāni
anya-e0401n:304_38: aparinipphannāni nāma. Yadi aparinipphannāni nāma. Evaṃsati, asaṅkhatāni nāma siyuṃ.
anya-e0401n:304_39: Tesaṃyeva panarūpānaṃ kāyavikāro kāyaviññatti nāma. Vacīvikāro vacīviññatti nāma.
anya-e0401n:304_40: Chiddaṃ vivaraṃ ākāsadhātu nāma. Lahubhāvo lahutā nāma. Mudubhāvo mudutā nāma. Kammaññabhāvo
anya-e0401n:304_41: kammaññatā nāma. Nibbatti upacayo nāma. Pavatti santati nāma. Jīraṇākāro jaratā nāma.
anya-e0401n:304_42: Hutvā abhāvākāro aniccatā nāmāti sabbaṃ parinipphannaṃ saṅkhatamevāti. Tattha “tesaṃyeva
anya-e0401n:304_43: rūpānaṃ”ti niddhāraṇe bhummaṃ. Tesaṃyeva dasannaṃ rūpānaṃ majjheti vuttaṃ hoti. “Itisabbaṃ”ti
anya-e0401n:304_44: idaṃ sabbaṃ dasavidhaṃ rūpaṃ parinipphannameva saṅkhatamevāti attho. Khandhavibhaṅgaṭṭhakathāyampi
anya-e0401n:304_45: vuttova. Yathāha pañcavipanakhandhā parinipphannāva honti, no aparinipphannā. Saṅkhatāva,
anya-e0401n:304_46: no asaṅkhatā. Apica nipphannāpi hontiyeva. Sabhāvadhammesuhi nibbānamevekaṃ aparinipphannaṃ
anya-e0401n:304_47: anipphannañcāti ca. Nirodhasamāpatti ca nāma paññatti ca kathanti. Nirodhasamāpatti
anya-e0401n:304_48: lokiyalokuttarāti vā saṅkhatāsaṅkhatāti vā parinipphannāparinipphannāti vā na vattabbā.
anya-e0401n:304_49: Nipphannā pana hoti. Samāpajjantena samāpajjitabbato. Tathā nāmapaññatti, sāpihi
anya-e0401n:304_50: lokiyādibhedaṃ nalabhati. Nipphannā pana hoti. No anipphannā. Nāmaggahaṇañhi gaṇhantova
anya-e0401n:304_51: gaṇhātīti ca. Etena lakkhaṇarūpānampi nipphannatā siddhā hoti. Visuddhi maggepana
anya-e0401n:304_52: nipphannaṃ anipphannaṃtidukassa niddese. Aṭṭhārasavidhaṃ rūpaṃ paricchedavikāra lakkhaṇabhāvaṃ
anya-e0401n:304_53: atikkamitvā sabhāveneva pariggahetabbato nipphannaṃ, sesaṃ tabbiparītatāya anipphannanti
anya-e0401n:304_54: ca. Nipphannarūpaṃ pana rūparūpaṃ nāmāti ca. Yaṃ catūhi kammādīhi jātaṃ, taṃ catujaṃ
anya-e0401n:304_55: nāma. Taṃ lakkhaṇa rūpavajjaṃ avasesarūpaṃ. Lakkhaṇarūpaṃ pana na kutocijātanti ca
anya-e0401n:304_56: vuttaṃ. Sabbañcetaṃ ācariyehi gahitanāmamattattā vatticchānugataṃ hoti. Yaṃ ruccati,
anya-e0401n:306_0: 197. Rūpavibhāge.“Ekavidhanayaṃ tāva dassetuṃ”ti rūpavibhāgato pathamaṃ dassetuṃ.
anya-e0401n:306_1: Etena ekavidhanayo rūpavibhāgo nāma na tāva hotīti dasseti. Taṃ na sameti. Kena na
anya-e0401n:306_3: sabbaṃrūpaṃ ajjhattikabāhiravasena duvidhantiādiko duvidhanayo eva rūpavibhāganayo
anya-e0401n:306_4: nāmāti viññāyati. Tasmā tena na sametīti vuttaṃ hoti. Apica pāḷiyaṃ. Sahetukā dhammā,
anya-e0401n:306_5: ahetukā dhammātiādi dukesu sabbaṃrūpaṃ ahetukameva, na sahetukantiādi niyamakaraṇampi
anya-e0401n:306_6: rūpavibhāgo evāti katvā tathā vuttanti gahetabbaṃ. “Itarāni panā”ti kāmāvacarantiādīni
anya-e0401n:306_7: pana. “Janakena paccayenā”ti padhānavacanametaṃ. Upatthambhakādi paccayāpi gahetabbā
anya-e0401n:306_9: pī”ti chindanabhindanādivasena pahīnopi. “Tasmiṃ satī”ti samudayappahāne sati. Kiccapaccayānaṃ
anya-e0401n:306_10: arahatthassa ca sakkatthassa ca dīpanato duvidhaṃ atthaṃ dassetuṃ “aṭṭhānattā”tiādi
anya-e0401n:306_12: anāgatabhave puna anuppādatthāya idheva pahīnaṃ bhavissatīti attho. Tenāha “ucchinnamūlaṃ”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:306_14: puna abhāvaṃ kataṃ. “Pākaṭo”ti dassanādikiccavisesehi paññāto. “Tadupādāyā”ti taṃ
anya-e0401n:306_17: Taṃ na sundaraṃ. Kasmā, ajjhattadhamma ajjhattika dhammānañca aviseso āpajjatīti
anya-e0401n:306_18: vakkhamānakāraṇattā. “Dvārarūpaṃ nāmā”ti paduddhārapadaṃ. Kasmā dvārarūpaṃ nāmāti
anya-e0401n:306_20: rakkhaṇatthaṃ. Tattha desanābhedo nāma rūpakaṇḍe pañcaviññāṇānaṃ vatthu rūpañca,
anya-e0401n:306_21: na vatthu rūpañca, ārammaṇa rūpañca, na ārammaṇa rūpañca vatvā manoviññāṇassa na
anya-e0401n:306_22: vuttaṃ. Yadi vucceyya, ārammaṇaduke manoviññāṇassa ārammaṇa rūpaṃ, na ārammaṇa rūpanti
anya-e0401n:306_23: dukapadaṃ na labbheyya. Ayaṃ desanābhedo nāma. Vatthudukesu hadayavatthuvasena labbhamānaṃ
anya-e0401n:306_24: manoviññāṇadukaṃ na vuttanti. “Thūlasabhāvattā”ti sukhumarūpaṃ upādāya vuttaṃ. “Dūre
anya-e0401n:306_25: pavattassapī”ti yathā sukhumarūpaṃ attano sarīre pavattampi ñāṇena sīghaṃ pariggahetuṃ
anya-e0401n:306_26: na sakkā hoti, tathā idaṃ. Imassa pana dūre pavattassapi. “Gahaṇayogyattā”ti ñāṇena
anya-e0401n:306_28: nissaya mahābhūtavasena ca. Tattha sayaṃ sampattā nāma phoṭṭhabbadhātuyo. Nissayavasena
anya-e0401n:306_29: sampattā nāma gandharasā. Ubhayathāpi asampattā nāma cakkhu rūpa, sota saddā. Yo
anya-e0401n:306_30: paṭimukhabhāvo atthi, yaṃ aññamaññapatanaṃ atthīti yojanā. Na ca tāni aññappakārāni
anya-e0401n:306_31: eva sakkā bhavitunti sambandho. “Anuggaha upaghātavasenā”ti vaḍḍhanatthāya anuggahavasena,
anya-e0401n:306_32: hāyanādi atthāya upaghātavasena. “Yaṃ kiñcī”ti catusamuṭṭhānikarūpaṃ gaṇhāti. “Ādinnaparāmaṭṭhattā”ti
anya-e0401n:306_33: taṇhāmānehi etaṃ mama esohamasmītiādinnattā, diṭṭhiyā eso me attāti parāmaṭṭhattā
anya-e0401n:306_34: ca. “Niccakālaṃ pavattivasenā”ti ekena janakakammena paṭisandhikkhaṇato paṭṭhāya
anya-e0401n:306_37: vā visayassa asampajjanavasena. Tattha visayassa asampattaṃ dassento “tatthā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n:306_38: Tathā sotasaddesu ca aññamaññaṃ laggitvā uppajjamānesu. “Sampattiyā evā”ti sampajjanatthāya
anya-e0401n:306_39: eva. Tathā āpo ca sampattiyā eva paccayoti yojanā. Dubbalapathavī eva sannissayo
anya-e0401n:306_41: kathaṃ pākaṭaṃ. Sampattaggahaṇaṃ eva pākaṭanti dīpeti. Tenāha “tatthahī”tiādiṃ. Dakkhiṇapassato
anya-e0401n:306_42: vā suyyati, cetiyādikassa puratthimadisābhāge ṭhitānanti adhippāyo. “Paṭighaṭṭanānighaṃso”ti
anya-e0401n:306_43: sotesu paṭighaṭṭanavego. “Tesaṃ”ti āsannevā dūre vā ṭhitānaṃ. Hotu dūre ṭhitānaṃ
anya-e0401n:306_44: cirena sutoti abhimāno. Kasmā pana ujukaṃ asutvā dakkhiṇapassatovā uttarapassato
anya-e0401n:306_45: vā suṇeyya, asuyyamāno bhaveyyāti pucchā. Taṃ kathento “apicā”tiādimāha. Vibhāvanipāṭhe.
anya-e0401n:306_46: “Gantvā visayadesaṃ taṃ, pharitvā gaṇhatīti ce”ti taṃ cakkhusota dvayaṃ dūrevisayānaṃ
anya-e0401n:306_47: uppannadesaṃ pharitvā gaṇhatīti cevadeyyāti attho. Dūreṭhatvā passanto suṇanto ca
anya-e0401n:306_48: mahantampipabbataṃ ekakkhaṇe passati, mahantaṃpi meghasaddaṃ ekakkhaṇe suṇāti. Tasmā
anya-e0401n:306_49: ubhayaṃ asampattagocaranti viññāyati. Imasmiṃ vacane ṭhatvā idaṃ parikappavacanaṃ
anya-e0401n:306_50: dasseti taṃ dvayaṃ visayappadesaṃ gantvā mahantaṃpi pabbataṃ vā meghasaddaṃ vā pharitvā
anya-e0401n:306_51: gaṇhāti. Tasmā mahantaṃpi passati, suṇāti. Na asampattagocarattā mahantaṃ passati
anya-e0401n:306_52: suṇātīti koci vadeyyāti vuttaṃ hoti. Adhiṭṭhānavidhānepi tassa so gocaro siyāti.
anya-e0401n:306_53: Evaṃsati, dibbacakkhu dibbasotābhiññānaṃ adhiṭṭhānavidhānepi so rūpasaddavisayo tassa
anya-e0401n:306_54: pasādacakkhusotassa gocaro siyāti abhiññādhiṭṭhāna kiccaṃ nāma natthi. Cakkhusotaṃ
anya-e0401n:306_55: devalokampi gantvā dibbarūpampi dibbasaddampi gaṇheyya. Na pana gaṇhāti. Tasmā tassa
anya-e0401n:306_56: visayadesagamanañca mahantadesapharaṇañca na cintetabbanti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:308_0: 158. Rūpasamuṭṭhāne. Suttantesu cetanāsampayuttā abhijjhādayopi kammanti vuttā. Te
anya-e0401n:308_1: pana paṭṭhāne kammapaccayaṃ patvā tappaccayakiccaṃ na sādhenti, cetanā eva sādhetīti
anya-e0401n:308_2: āha “sā yevā”tiādiṃ. “Taṃ samuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ”ti hetūhi ca hetusampayuttakadhammehi
anya-e0401n:308_3: ca samuṭṭhānānañca rūpānanti atthavasena cetasikadhammānampi rūpasamuṭṭhāpakatā siddhā
anya-e0401n:308_4: hoti. So hi udayati pasavatīti sambandho. “Kappasaṇṭhāpanavasenā”ti kappappatiṭṭhāpanavasena.
anya-e0401n:308_5: Ajjhattikasaddo chasu cakkhādīsu ajjhattikāyatane sveva pavattati. Idha pana sakalaṃ
anya-e0401n:308_6: ajjhattasantānaṃ adhippetanti āha “ajjhatta santāneti pana vattabbaṃ”ti. “Khaṇe khaṇe”ti
anya-e0401n:309_0: Yamakapāṭhesu. Yassa vā pana puggalassa. “Nirujjhatī”ti bhaṅgakkhaṇa samaṅgitamāha.
anya-e0401n:309_1: “Uppajjatī”ti uppādakkhaṇa samaṅgitaṃ. “Itī”ti ayaṃ pucchā. “No”ti paṭikkhepo. Samudayasaccassa
anya-e0401n:309_2: bhaṅgakkhaṇe dukkhasaccabhūtassa rūpassavā nāmassavā uppādo nāma natthīti vuttaṃ
anya-e0401n:309_3: hoti. Yassa kusalā dhammā uppajjanti, yassa akusalā dhammā uppajjantīti dve pāṭhāgahetabbā.
anya-e0401n:309_4: “No”ti kusalākusala dhammānaṃ uppādakkhaṇe abyākatabhūtānaṃ rūpānaṃ vā nāmānaṃ vā
anya-e0401n:309_5: nirodho nāma natthīti vuttaṃ hoti. Tesupāṭhesu kesañcivādīnaṃ vacanokāsaṃ dassetuṃ
anya-e0401n:309_7: ca uddhaṭā siyunti sambandho. “Itarattha cā”ti tato itarasmiṃ yassa kusalā dhammātiādipāṭhe
anya-e0401n:309_8: ca. “Tampi nā”ti tampi vacanaṃ na vattabbanti attho. “Purimakoṭṭhāse”ti asaññasattānaṃ
anya-e0401n:309_9: tesaṃ tatthāti imasmiṃ purimapakkheti adhippāyo. “Pacchimakoṭṭhāse”ti sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ
anya-e0401n:309_10: pavatte cittassabhaṅgakkhaṇeti imasmiṃ pacchima pakkhe. Cavantānaṃ icceva vuttaṃ
anya-e0401n:309_11: siyā, na pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇeti, no ca na vuttaṃ, tasmā viññāyati pavatte
anya-e0401n:309_12: cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe rūpajīvitindriyampi na uppajjatīti. Rūpajīvitindriye ca anuppajjamāne
anya-e0401n:309_13: sati, sabbāni kammajarūpāni utujarūpāni āhārajarūpāni ca cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe nuppajjantīti
anya-e0401n:309_14: viññātabbaṃ hotīti adhippāyo. “Pacchimakoṭṭhāse”ti sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa
anya-e0401n:309_15: bhaṅgakkhaṇeti imasmiṃ pacchimapakkhe. Tattha ca pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇeti
anya-e0401n:309_16: idaṃ adhippetaṃ. Evaṃ pāḷisādhakaṃ dassetvā idāni yuttisādhakaṃ dassento “yasmā cā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n:309_17: “Tassā”ti ānandā cariyassa mūlaṭīkākārassa. Vibhāvaniyaṃ. Bhaṅge rūpassa nuppādo,
