anya-e0401n:309_18: cittajānaṃ vasena vā. Āruppaṃ vāpi sandhāya, bhāsito yamakassa hi. Na cittaṭṭhiti
anya-e0401n:309_19: bhaṅge ca, na rūpassa asambhavo. Ti vuttaṃ. Tattha “na hi na cittaṭṭhitī”ti cittassaṭhiti
anya-e0401n:309_20: nāma na hi natthi. “Bhaṅgecā”ti cittassabhaṅgakkhaṇe ca. Taṃ asambhāvento “yamakapāḷiyo
anya-e0401n:309_21: panā”tiādimāha. “Nānatthā nānābyañjanā”ti etena pāḷisaṃsandanā nāma garukattabbāti
anya-e0401n:309_22: dīpeti. “Gambhīro ca satthu adhippāyo”ti etena attānaṃ satthumataññuṃ katvā idaṃ
anya-e0401n:309_23: sandhāya etaṃ sandhāyāti vattuṃ dukkaranti dīpeti. “Suddhaṃ arūpamevā”ti suddhaṃ
anya-e0401n:309_24: arūpappaṭisandhiṃ eva. Cha cattālīsacittāni rūpaṃ janetuṃ na sakkonti. Evaṃ sati
anya-e0401n:309_27: Rūpārūpavirāgabhāvanābhūto maggo. Tena nibbattassa. Rūpokāso nāma kāmarūpabhavo.
anya-e0401n:309_28: Vibhāvanipāṭhe. “Ekūna na vutibhavaṅgasse vā”ti pavattikāle rūpajanakassa ekūna na
anya-e0401n:309_29: vutibhavaṅga cittassāti attho. Tattha pana arūpavipākaṃ pavattikālepi rūpajanakaṃ
anya-e0401n:309_30: na hotīti āha “tatthā”tiādiṃ. Keci pana paṭisandhi cittassa uppādakkhaṇe rūpaṃ pacchājāta
anya-e0401n:309_31: paccayaṃ na labhati. Ṭhitikkhaṇe rūpaṃ parato bhavaṅgacittato pacchājātapaccayaṃ
anya-e0401n:309_32: labhatīti vadanti. Taṃ na gahetabbanti dassetuṃ “na hi attanā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Sayaṃ
anya-e0401n:309_33: vijjamāno hutvā upakārako paccayo atthipaccayo. Pacchājāto ca tassa ekadeso. “Āyusaṅkhārānaṃ”ti
anya-e0401n:309_34: usmādīnaṃ. “Taṃ”ti khīṇāsavānaṃ cuticittaṃ. “Yathāhā”ti so thero kiṃ āha. “Vuttaṃ”ti
anya-e0401n:309_35: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Iti pana vacanato aññesaṃpi cuticittaṃ rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpetīti
anya-e0401n:309_36: viññāyatīti padhānavacanaṃ. Pana saddo aruci jotako. “Tathā vuttepī”ti joteti. Vacīsaṅkhāro
anya-e0401n:309_37: nāma vitakkavicāro. Kāyasaṅkhāro nāma assāsapassāsavāto. So sabbesaṃpi kāmasattānaṃ
anya-e0401n:309_38: cuti cittassa uppādakkhaṇe ca tato purimacittassa uppādakkhaṇe ca nanirujjhatīti
anya-e0401n:309_39: vacanena cuticittato pubbabhāgeyeva assāsapassāsānaṃ abhāvaṃ ñāpeti. Nanu imissaṃ
anya-e0401n:309_40: pāḷiyaṃ cutikāle assāsapassāsassa abhāvaṃ vadati. Aññesaṃ cittajarūpānaṃ abhāvaṃ
anya-e0401n:309_41: na vadati. Tasmā imāya pāḷiyā sabbesampi cuticittaṃ assāsapassāsaṃ na janetīti viññāyati.
anya-e0401n:309_42: Na aññāni cittajarūpānīti codanā. Taṃ pariharanto “na hī”tiādimāha. Na hi rūpasamuṭṭhāpakacittassa
anya-e0401n:309_44: gatassa assāsapassāso na uppajjati, tathā udake nimuggassa. Bāḷhaṃ visaññībhūtassa.
anya-e0401n:309_46: ṭhitassāti. Tasmā etegabbhagamanādayo assāsapassāsaṃ vinibaddhanti nīvārentīti gabbhagamanādivinibaddhā.
anya-e0401n:309_47: Tesaṃ abhāvoti viggaho. Vinā imehi kāraṇehi assāsapassāsassa ca aññacittajarūpānañca
anya-e0401n:309_48: viseso natthīti vuttaṃ hoti. Aññaṃpi yuttiṃ dasseti “cuto cā”tiādinā. Cuto ca hoti,
anya-e0401n:309_49: assa cittasamuṭṭhāna rūpañca pavattatīti na ca yuttanti yojanā. So ca suṭṭhu oḷāriko
anya-e0401n:309_50: rūpadhammo. Iti tasmā na sakkā vattuṃti sambandho. “Imassa atthassā”ti vatvā taṃ
anya-e0401n:309_53: pañcadvāresu āpātaṃ nāgacchanti. “Paccayaparittatāya vā”ti tadā pacchājātapaccayassa
anya-e0401n:309_54: alābhato vuttaṃ. Dubbalā honti. Tadā dubbalattā eva pañcārammaṇāni pañcadvāresu āpātaṃ
anya-e0401n:309_55: nāgacchanti. Pariyosānepi ekacittakkhaṇamatte. Vatthussa ādiantanissitāni paṭisandhikkhaṇe
anya-e0401n:309_56: ādimhi nissitāni. Maraṇāsannakāle ante nissitāni. Samadubbalāni eva honti. Tasmā
anya-e0401n:309_57: yathā sabbapaṭisandhicittampi rūpaṃ na janeti, tathā sabbacuticittampi rūpaṃ na janetīti
anya-e0401n:309_58: sakkā viññātunti. “Pāḷivirodhaṃ”ti pubbe dassitāya saṅkhāra yamakapāḷiyā virodhaṃ.“Kāraṇaṃ
anya-e0401n:309_59: vuttamevā”ti cittañhi uppādakkhaṇe eva paripuṇṇaṃ paccayaṃ labhitvā balavaṃ hotīti
anya-e0401n:309_60: vuttameva. “Taṃ”ti appanājavanaṃ. Acalamānaṃ hutvā. “Abbokiṇṇe”ti vīthicitta vārena
anya-e0401n:309_61: avokiṇṇe. Na tathā pavattamānesu aṅgāni osīdanti, yathā ṭhapitāneva hutvā pavattanti.
anya-e0401n:309_62: “Na tatoparaṃ”ti tato atirekaṃ rūpavisesaṃ na janeti. “Kiñcī”ti kiñcicittaṃ. “Uttarakiccaṃ”ti
anya-e0401n:309_63: uparūparikiccaṃ. “Aṭṭha puthujjanānaṃ”ti aṭṭha somanassa javanāni hasanaṃpi janenti.
anya-e0401n:309_64: Cha javanāni pañcajavanānīti adhikāro. Tesaṃ buddhānaṃ. Sitakammassāti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:309_65: Sitakammaṃ nāma mihitakammaṃ. “Kāraṇaṃ vuttamevā”ti ‘rūpassa pana upatthambhakabhūtā
anya-e0401n:309_66: utuāhārā pacchājātapaccaya dhammā ca ṭhitikkhaṇe eva pharantī’ti evaṃ kāraṇaṃ vuttameva.
anya-e0401n:309_67: “Utuno balavabhāvo”ti rūpuppādanatthāya balavabhāvo. Santatiṭhitiyā balavabhāvo pana
anya-e0401n:309_68: pacchājātapaccayāyatto hoti. Rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpeyya. No na samuṭṭhāpetīti āha “vakkhati
anya-e0401n:309_69: cā”tiādiṃ. Ajjhatta santānagato ca bahiddhāsantānagato ca duvidhāhāroti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:310_0: Etthacātiādīsu. Utu pañcavidho. Ajjhattasantāne catujavasena catubbidho, bahiddhā
anya-e0401n:310_1: santāne utujavasena eko. Tathā āhāropi pañcavidho. Tesu ṭhapetvā bahiddhāhāraṃ avasesānaṃ
anya-e0401n:310_2: ajjhatta santāne rūpasamuṭṭhāpane vivādo natthi. Bahiddhāhārassa pana ajjhattasantāne
anya-e0401n:310_3: rūpasamuṭṭhāpane vivādo atthīti taṃ dassetuṃ “ettha cā”tiādimāha. “Utuojānaṃ viyā”ti
anya-e0401n:310_5: panā”ti dantehi saṅkhāditvā vicuṇṇaṃ kataṃ pana. “Sitthaṃ”ti bhattacuṇṇasitthaṃ.
anya-e0401n:310_8: upatthambhanavasena samuṭṭhāpeti, janana vasena pana ajjhattikāhāro eva samuṭṭhāpetīti
anya-e0401n:310_9: adhippāyo. “Upādinnakā”ti ajjhatta sambhūtā vuccanti. Bahiddhā ojāpi rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti
anya-e0401n:310_11: ca ojāyā”ti ajjhatta ojāya. “Medasinehupacaya vasenā”ti medakoṭṭhāsarasasineha koṭṭhāsānaṃ
anya-e0401n:310_12: vaḍḍhanavasena. Itarāni pana tīṇirūpasamuṭṭhānāni. Pāḷipāṭhe. “Indriyānī”ti cakkhādīni
anya-e0401n:310_13: indriya rūpāni. “Vihāro”ti samāpatti eva vuccati. Samāpatti cittena jātattā tāni
anya-e0401n:310_14: indriyāni vippasanna nīti katvā kasmā vuttanti pucchati. “Upacaritattā”ti ṭhānūpacārena
anya-e0401n:310_15: voharitattā. “Tesaṃ na vannaṃ”ti indriyarūpānaṃ. Nidhikaṇḍapāṭhe. Sundaro vaṇṇo yassāti
anya-e0401n:310_16: suvaṇṇo. Suvaṇṇassa bhāvo suvaṇṇatā. Tathāsussaratā. “Saro”ti ca saddo vuccati. “Susaṇṭhānaṃ”ti
anya-e0401n:310_18: saṇṭhite sati. Tathā tena ākārena saṇṭhitā hotīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:311_0: Lahutādittaye. Dandhattādikarānaṃ dhātukkhobhānaṃ paṭipakkhehi paccayehi samuṭṭhātīti
anya-e0401n:311_1: viggaho. “Etassā”ti lahutādittayassa vuttā. Tasmā etaṃ lahutādittayaṃ kammasamuṭṭhānanti
anya-e0401n:311_2: vattabbanti adhippāyo. “Yamakesupi addhāpaccuppanneneva gahito”ti yassa cakkhāyatanaṃ
anya-e0401n:311_3: uppajjati, tassa sotāyatanaṃ uppajjatīti. Sacakkhukānaṃ asotakānaṃ upapajjantānaṃ
anya-e0401n:311_4: tesaṃ cakkhāyatanaṃ uppajjatītiādīsu uppādavāre paṭisandhivasena, nirodhavāre cutivasena
anya-e0401n:311_5: addhāpaccuppannaṃva vuttanti adhippāyo. Akammajānaṃ pavattikāle kālabhedo vuttoti.
anya-e0401n:311_7: vāta samuṭṭhitā ābādhā. La. Atthi kammavipākajā ābādhā’ti vuttaṃ. Tāni upapīḷakupaghātaka
anya-e0401n:311_8: kammānipi vipattiyo labhamānāni eva khobhetvā nānābādhe uppādentīti sambandho. Sarīre
anya-e0401n:311_9: ṭhanti tiṭṭhantīti sarīraṭṭhakā. “Tadanugatikāni eva hontī”ti kammajādīnipi khubbhitāni
anya-e0401n:311_10: eva hontīti adhippāyo. Etena aṭṭhasu kāraṇesu yenakenacikāraṇena cakkhurogādike ābādhe
anya-e0401n:311_11: jāte tasmiṃ aṅge pavattāni sabbāni rogasamuṭṭhānāni ābādhabhāvaṃ gacchantiyeva. Evaṃ
anya-e0401n:311_12: santepi tappariyāpannāni kammajarūpāni tadanugatikabhāvena ābādhabhāvaṃ gacchanti,
anya-e0401n:311_13: na ujukato kammavasenāti dīpeti. Kammasamuṭṭhāno ābādho nāma natthi. Tathāpi aṭṭhasu
anya-e0401n:311_14: ābādhesupi atthi vātasamuṭṭhānā ābādhātiādīsu viya atthi kammasamuṭṭhānā ābādhāti
anya-e0401n:311_15: avatvā atthi kammavipākajā ābādhāti vuttaṃ. Tattha upapīḷako paghātakakammānaṃvasena
anya-e0401n:311_16: uppanno yokocidhātukkhobho suttantapariyāye na kammavipākoti vuccatiyeva. Tato jāto
anya-e0401n:311_17: yokoci ābādho kammavipākajoti vuttoti. Sugambhīramidaṃṭhānaṃ. Suṭṭhuvicāretvā kathetabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:311_18: “Yato”ti yasmā kammasamuṭṭhānā bādhapaccayā. La. Labbhamāno siyā. Kevalaṃ so kammasamuṭṭhāno
anya-e0401n:311_19: ābādho nāma natthīti yojanā. “Avihiṃsā kammanibbattā”ti mettākaruṇākammanibbattā.
anya-e0401n:311_20: Suvidūratāyaceva nirābādhā hontīti sambandho. “Saṇṭhitiyā”ti dukkhobhanīye visesanapadaṃ.
anya-e0401n:311_21: Hetupadaṃ vā daṭṭhabbaṃ. Khobhetuṃ dukkarā dukkhobhanīyā. “Kāmaṃ”ti kiñcāpīti atthe
anya-e0401n:312_1: anupālanañca. Tattha jananakiccaṃ janetabbānaṃ jātikkhaṇe eva labbhati. Sesadvayaṃ
anya-e0401n:312_2: pana ṭhitikkhaṇepi labbhati. Bhaṅgakkhaṇe pana sabbaṃ paccayakiccaṃ natthi. Tattha
anya-e0401n:312_4: jaratā aniccatānañca. “Tesū”ti kutoci samuṭṭhānesu. Idha pana abhidhammattha saṅgahepana.
anya-e0401n:314_2: pavattanato. “Itī”ti tasmā. Upādārūpāni tveva vuccanti. “Evaṃ vikārapariccheda rūpāni
anya-e0401n:314_3: ca yojetabbānī”ti pañcavikārarūpāni kalāpasseva copanādisabhāvā honti, na ekamekassa
anya-e0401n:314_4: rūpassa. Tasmā tāni ekekasmiṃ kalāpe ekekāni eva honti. Paricchedarūpaṃ pana kalāpapariyāpannaṃ
anya-e0401n:314_5: rūpaṃ na hoti. Tasmā dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ kalāpānaṃ antarā taṃpi ekekameva hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:314_6: “Catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ nissayatā sambhavato”ti ettha catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃpi lakkhaṇamattena
anya-e0401n:314_7: nānattaṃ hoti, pavattivasena pana ekagghanattā saṅkhānaṭṭhenapi eko nissayoti vattabbameva.
anya-e0401n:314_8: Evañhisati ekasaddassa attha calanaṃ natthīti. “Tena saddenā”ti cittajasaddena. Attānaṃ
anya-e0401n:314_9: mocento “adhippāyenā”ti āha. Therassa adhippāyenāti vuttaṃ hoti. Attano adhippāyaṃ
anya-e0401n:314_11: vacīmayasaddenāti attho. “Viññattī”ti viññāpanaṃ iccevattho. Viññāpetīti viññāpito.
anya-e0401n:314_12: Tassa bhāvo viññāvitattaṃ. Vitakkavipphārasaddo nāma kassaci mahantaṃ atthaṃ cintentassa
anya-e0401n:314_13: sokavasena vā tuṭṭhivasena vā balavavitakko pavattati. So sokaṃ vā tuṭṭhiṃ vā sandhāre
anya-e0401n:314_14: tuṃ asakkonto dutīyena saddhiṃ mantento viya attano mukheyeva abyattaṃ saddaṃ katvā
anya-e0401n:314_15: samudīrati. Pakatijano taṃ saddamattaṃ suṇāti vā na vāsuṇāti. Suṇantopi akkharaṃ
anya-e0401n:314_16: vā atthaṃ vā adhippāyaṃ vā na jānāti. Dibbasotena vā vijjāsotena vāsuṇanto akkharaṃpi
anya-e0401n:314_17: atthaṃpi adhippāyaṃpi jānāti. Jānitvā evaṃpi te mano, itthaṃpi te manotiādisati.
anya-e0401n:314_18: Ayaṃ vitakkavipphārasaddo nāma. So viññattirahito sotaviññeyyoti mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
anya-e0401n:314_19: vutto. Saṅgahakāropana vacīmayasaddonāma viññattirahitoti vā asotaviññeyyoti vā natthīti
anya-e0401n:314_21: assasaccasaṅkhepassa dvīsuṭīkāsu. Akkharañca padañca byañjanañca attho cāti dvando.
anya-e0401n:314_23: milakkhūnaṃ. “Ukkāsitasaddo ca khipitasaddo ca vamitasaddo ca chaḍḍitasaddo cāti
anya-e0401n:314_24: dvando. Ādisaddena tādisā uggāra hikkāra hasita roditādayo saṅgaṇhāti. Sesametthasuviññeyyaṃ.
anya-e0401n:316: 161. Rūpappavattikkame. Napuggalavasena visesanaṃ hoti. Bhūmivasena visesanaṃ hoti. Tañca kho pavattikālavasenāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:317_0: Etthacātiādīsu. Purimesu dvīsu yonīsu pāḷinayena veditabbāti sambandho. Nikkhantā,
anya-e0401n:317_1: iti tasmā aṇḍajāti ca jalābujāti ca vuccanti. Kathaṃ ayaṃ nayo pāḷinayo nāma hotīti.
anya-e0401n:317_2: Pāḷiyaṃ aṇḍakosaṃ vatthikosaṃ abhinibbhijja abhinibbhijja jāyantīti vacanena aṇḍato
anya-e0401n:317_3: jalābuto jātā vijātā nikkhantāti attho viññāyati. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana aṇḍejātā jalābumhijātāti
anya-e0401n:317_4: vuttaṃ. Gabbhapaliveṭhanāsayo nāma yena paliveṭhito gabbho tiṭṭhati. Vibhāvanipāṭhe
anya-e0401n:317_6: vuttaṃ hoti. Abhirūpassa kaññā dātabbāti ettha kaññā dātabbāti sāmaññato vuttepi
anya-e0401n:317_7: abhirūpassa purisassāti vuttattā kaññāpi abhirūpakaññā eva viññāyati. Ayaṃ ukkaṭṭhanayo
anya-e0401n:317_8: nāma. “Tattha tāni sabbānī”tiādīsu. Tānisabbānipi cakkhu sota ghāna bhāva dvayāni
anya-e0401n:317_9: na omakena kammena labbhati. Ukkaṭṭhena kammena eva labbhatīti adhippāyo. Vibhaṅgapāṭhe.
anya-e0401n:317_10: Saddāyatanaṃ nāma paṭisandhikāle na labbhatīti vuttaṃ “ekādasāyatanānī”ti. Cakkhuvekallassa
anya-e0401n:317_11: dasa, sotavekallassa aparānidasa, cakkhu sotavekallassanava, gabbhaseyyassavasena
anya-e0401n:317_12: sattāyatanāni. Pāḷiyaṃ opapāti kagabbhaseyyakānaṃ eva vuttattā “pāḷiyaṃ avuttaṃpipanā”ti
anya-e0401n:317_13: vuttaṃ. Avuttampi cakkhādivekallaṃ. “Aññamaññaṃ avinābhāvavuttitā vuttā”ti kathaṃ
anya-e0401n:317_14: vuttā yassa ghānāyatanaṃ uppajjati, tassa jivhāyatanaṃ uppajjatīti, āmantā. Yassa
anya-e0401n:317_15: vā pana jivhāyatanaṃ uppajjati, tassa ghānāyatanaṃ uppajjatīti, āmantātiādinā vuttā
anya-e0401n:317_16: peyyālamukhena. Ācariyānandatthere na pana icchitanti sambandho. “Jivhāvekallatāviyā”ti
anya-e0401n:317_17: jivhāvekallatānāma natthi viya. “Ghānavekallatāpi atthīti yuttaṃ”ti ettha pāḷiyaṃ
anya-e0401n:317_18: aghānakānaṃ itthīnaṃ purisānaṃti idaṃ mātugabbhe ghānāyatane anuppanneyeva puretarañca
anya-e0401n:317_19: vantānaṃ itthipurisānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ. Na ghānavekallānaṃ atthitāyātipi vadanti.
anya-e0401n:317_20: Gabbhe sentīti gabbhasayā. Gabbhasayā eva gabbhaseyyā.
anya-e0401n:318_0: Pavattikāletiādīsu. Mūlaṭīkāpāṭhe. “Orato”ti paṭisandhiṃ upādāya vuttaṃ. Ekādasamasattāhe
anya-e0401n:318_1: anāgateti vuttaṃ hoti. Rūpāyatanaṃ nuppajjissati. No ca cakkhāyatanaṃ nuppajjissatīti
anya-e0401n:318_2: idaṃ addhāpaccuppannavasena vuttaṃ. Tasmā paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya uppannaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ
anya-e0401n:318_3: yāvajīvaṃpi uppannantveva vuccati. Na uppajjissamānanti. Cakkhāyatanaṃ pana ekādasamasattāhā
anya-e0401n:318_4: orato ṭhitassa na uppannaṃ. Tadā anuppannattā ekādasame sattāhe sampatte uppajjissatīti
anya-e0401n:318_5: vattabbaṃ hoti. Pacchima bhavikattā pana tadubhayampi bhavantare nuppajjissatiyevāti.
anya-e0401n:318_6: Ghānāyatanaṃ nibbattetīti ghānāyatanānibbattataṃ, kammaṃ. Tena kammena gahitappaṭisandhikānaṃ.
anya-e0401n:318_7: Idañca yadi tannibbattakena kammena paṭisandhiṃ gaṇheyyuṃ. Ghānāyatane anuppanne
anya-e0401n:318_8: antarā na kālaṅkareyyunti katvā vuttaṃ. Tannibbattakena kammena paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhantāpi
anya-e0401n:318_9: tato balavante upacchedakakamme āgate sati. Ghānāyatanuppattikālaṃ apatvā antarā
anya-e0401n:318_10: nakālaṅkarontīti natthi. “Cakkhughānesu vuttesū”ti ṭīkāyaṃ vuttesu. “Atthato siddhā
anya-e0401n:318_11: evā”ti ekādasamasattāhe uppannāti siddhā eva. “Īdisesuṭhānesū”ti sabhāvaṃ vicāre
anya-e0401n:318_12: tuṃ dukkaresu ṭhānesu. Aṭṭhakathāyeva pamāṇaṃ kātuṃ yuttāti adhippāyo. Aṭṭhakathāpāṭhe.
anya-e0401n:318_14: yathā pacchime taṇhāmūlake bhavacakke upapattibhavappavattiṃ vadantena bhavapaccayājātīti
anya-e0401n:318_15: evaṃ ekato katvā vuttā, na tathā purime bhavacakke. Tattha pana saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ,
anya-e0401n:318_16: viññāṇa paccayā nāma rūpantiādinā anupubbappavattidīpanato. “So paṭikkhittoyevā”ti
anya-e0401n:318_17: āyatanānaṃ kamato vinicchayaṭṭhāne desanākkamova yuttoti vatvā so uppattikkamo paṭikkhitto.
anya-e0401n:319_2: lomaṃsūhi. “Paripakkasamūhakaṃ”ti kalalato paraṃ thokaṃ paripakkañca samūhākārañca
anya-e0401n:319_3: hutvā. “Vivattamānaṃ tabbhāvaṃ”ti kalalabhāvaṃ vijahitvā vattamānaṃ. “Vilīnati pusadisā”ti
anya-e0401n:319_4: aggimhi vilīnatipurasasadisā. “Muccatī”ti kapāle nalaggati. Etānijāyantīti evaṃ aṭṭhakathāyañca
anya-e0401n:319_5: vuttaṃ. “Dvā cattālīsame sattāhe”ti navamāse atikkamma vīsatimedivase. Yadi evaṃ,
anya-e0401n:319_6: pañcamesattāhe pañcappasākhā jāyanti, ekādasamesattāhe cattāri āyatanāni jāyanti,
anya-e0401n:319_7: majjhepana pañcasattāhā atthi. Tattha kathanti āha “ettha cā”tiādiṃ. “Chasattāhā”ti
anya-e0401n:319_8: ekādasamena saddhiṃ chasattāhā. Ekādasamepi hi pacchimadivase jātattā chadivasāni
anya-e0401n:319_9: avasiṭṭhāni honti. “Pariṇatakālā”ti paripakkakālā. Paripākagatā eva hi kammajamahābhūtā
anya-e0401n:319_10: suppasannā honti. Tesañca pasādaguṇā pasādarūpā hontīti. “Tassā”ti kalalassa. Vaṇṇajātaṃ
anya-e0401n:319_11: vā saṇṭhānaṃ vāti sambandho. “Ākāsakoṭṭhāsiko”ti manussehi ākāsakoṭṭhāse ṭhapito.
anya-e0401n:319_12: Hutvāti pāṭhaseso. Kathaṃ paramāṇuto parittakaṃ siyāti āha “sohī”tiādiṃ. “So”ti paramāṇu.
anya-e0401n:319_13: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe kalalarūpaṃ kalāpattayaparimāṇaṃ. Paramāṇu pana ekūnapaññāsakalāpaparimāṇo.
anya-e0401n:319_14: Tasmā taṃ tato parittakanti vuttaṃ hoti. Paṭisandhikkhaṇato paraṃ pana taṃpi khaṇekhaṇe
anya-e0401n:319_15: upacitameva hoti. “Dhātūnaṃ”ti catudhātuvavatthāne āgatānaṃ catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ.
anya-e0401n:319_16: Kalalassavā upacitappamāṇaṃ gahetvā vuttantipi yujjati. “Vatthusmiṃ”ti abbudādivatthumhi.
anya-e0401n:319_17: “Jalābumūlānusārenā”ti jalābujātakāle tassa mūlānu sārenāti adhippāyo. Gāthāyaṃ.
anya-e0401n:319_19: Tenāha “mātuyā tirokucchi gato”ti. “Chiddo”ti sukhumehi chiddehi samannāgato. Laddhaṃvā
anya-e0401n:319_21: vuttamevā”ti rūpasamuṭṭhāne mūlaṭīkāvāda vicāraṇāyaṃ ‘yaṃ pitattha na ca yutta’ntiādinā
anya-e0401n:319_23: Abhāvaṃ vaṇṇeti. Kasmāpana vaṇṇeti, nanu vaṇṇentassa aṭṭhakathā virodho siyāti. Virodho
anya-e0401n:319_24: vā hotu, avirodho vā. Pāḷiyeva pamāṇanti dassento “rūpadhātuyā”tiādinā vibhaṅge pāḷiṃ
anya-e0401n:319_25: āhari. Tattha “rūpadhātuyā”ti rūpalokadhātuyā. Rūpa brahmaloketi vuttaṃ hoti. “Upapattikkhaṇe”ti
anya-e0401n:319_27: paṭikkhittepī”ti pañcāyatanānīti vā pañcadhātuyoti vā paricchedakaraṇameva paṭikkhi
anya-e0401n:319_28: panaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Kiccantara sabbhāvā”ti phoṭṭhabbakiccato kiccantarassa vijjamānattā.
anya-e0401n:319_29: Kimpana kiccantaranti. Rūpakāyassa pavattiyā hetupaccayakiccaṃ. Mahābhūtā hetū mahābhūtā
anya-e0401n:319_30: paccayā rūpakkhandhassa paññāpanāyāti hi bhagavatā vuttaṃ. Tattha hetukiccaṃ nāma
anya-e0401n:319_31: rūpajananakiccaṃ. Paccaya kiccaṃ nāma rūpūpatthambhana kiccaṃ. Kiccantaramevanatthīti
anya-e0401n:319_32: ghānādīnaṃ visaya gocarabhāvakiccaṃ tesaṃ kiccaṃ nāma, tato aññaṃ kiccaṃ nāma natthi.
anya-e0401n:319_33: “Yenā”ti kiccantarena. “Te”ti gandhādayo. Idāni aṭṭhaka tānugataṃ vādaṃ dassento
anya-e0401n:319_36: rūpaloke. “Nissanda dhammamattabhāvenā”ti ettha yathā aggimhi jāte tassa nissandā
anya-e0401n:319_37: nāma icchantassapi anicchantassapi jāyantiyeva. Vaṇṇopi jāyati, obhāsopi, gandhopi,
anya-e0401n:319_38: rasopi, dhūmopi, pupphullānipi kadāci jāyantiyeva. Tehi vaṇṇādīhi karaṇīye kiccavisese
anya-e0401n:319_39: satipi asatipi. Tathā mahābhūtesu jātesu tesaṃ nissandā nāma icchantassapi anicchantassapi
anya-e0401n:319_40: kiccavisese satipi asatipi jāyantiyeva. Evaṃ nissandadhammamattabhāvena. Anuppaveso
anya-e0401n:319_41: yutto siyā ajjhatta santāneti adhippāyo. Bahiddhā santāne pana vatthā bharaṇa vimānādīsu
anya-e0401n:319_42: tesaṃ bhāvo icchi tabbo siyā. Ajjhattepi vā kāyaṃ oḷārikaṃ katvā māpitakāleti. Ettha
anya-e0401n:319_43: ca “dhammāyatana dhammadhātūsu anuppaveso”ti ettha aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ tāva. Ye pana anāpātāgatā
anya-e0401n:319_44: rūpādayopi dhammārammaṇamicceva vadantīti vuttaṃ. Taṃ tattha paṭikkhittaṃ. Anāpātāgamanaṃ
anya-e0401n:319_45: nāma visayagocara kiccarahitatā vuccati. Tañca manussānampi devānampi brahmānampi
anya-e0401n:319_46: pasādarūpesu anāpātā gamanameva adhippetaṃ. Taṃ pana atthinatthīti vicāretvā kathetabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:319_47: Api ca nissandadhammā nāma oḷārikānaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ vividhākārāpi bhaveyyuṃ. Brahmānaṃ
anya-e0401n:319_48: pana ajjhatta rūpaṃ appanā pattakammavisesena pavattaṃ atisukhumaṃ hoti. Tasmā kāmasatta
anya-e0401n:319_49: santāne viya tattha paripuṇṇaṃ nissandarūpaṃ nāma vicāretabbameva. Dhammā rammaṇañca
anya-e0401n:319_50: mukhyadhammārammaṇaṃ anuloma dhammāyatananti pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ natthi yevāti. “Jīvita
anya-e0401n:319_51: chakkañcā”ti vattabbaṃ rūpaloke. “Tatthā”ti asaññasatte. Kāmaloke jīvitanavakaṃ kasmā
anya-e0401n:319_52: visuṃ na vuttanti. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe kasmā na vuttaṃ. Pavattikālepi visuṃ na vuttameva.
anya-e0401n:319_56: pācakaggismiñca kāyaggismiñca. Ātaṅko vuccati rogo. Bahuko ātaṅko yassāti viggaho.
anya-e0401n:319_59: cā”ti anuruddhattherena ca. “Etaṃ”ti jīvita navakaṃ. “Nirodhakkamo”ti maraṇāsannakāle
anya-e0401n:319_60: nirodhakkamo. “Etthā”ti rūpaloke. Kaḷevaraṃ vuccati matasarīraṃ. Tassa nikkhepo kaḷevaranikkhepo.
anya-e0401n:319_61: Aññesañca opapātikānaṃ kaḷevaranikkhepo nāma natthi. Kasmā pana tesaṃ kaḷevaranikkhepo
anya-e0401n:319_62: nāma natthīti āha “tesañhī”tiādiṃ. Vibhāvanipāṭhe. Sabbesaṃpi rūpabrahmānaṃ. Āhārasamuṭṭhānānaṃ
anya-e0401n:319_63: rūpānaṃ abhāvato tisamuṭṭhānānīti vuttaṃ. Asaññasatte cittasamuṭṭhānānampi abhāvato
anya-e0401n:319_64: dvisamuṭṭhānānīti vuttaṃ. “Tānī”ti maraṇāsanna cittasamuṭṭhānāni. Taṃ parimāṇaṃ assāti
anya-e0401n:319_66: ca tattha dandhattādikara dhātukkhobhapaccayānaṃ sabbaso abhāvato niccakālampi sakalasarīrassa
anya-e0401n:319_67: lahutādiguṇo vattatiyeva. Kiṃ tattha paṭipakkha dhammappavatti cintāya. Tathā asaññasattepi
anya-e0401n:321_0: 161. Nibbānasaṅgahe. Dvīsu nibbānapadesu pathamapadaṃ aviññātatthaṃ sāmañña padaṃ.
anya-e0401n:321_1: Dutīyaṃ viññā tatthaṃ visesapadaṃ. Kilese sametīti samaṇo. Ariyapuggalo. Samaṇassa
anya-e0401n:321_2: bhāvo sāmaññaṃ. Ariyamaggo. Sāmaññassa phalāni sāmaññaphalāni. Lokato uttarati atikkamatīti
anya-e0401n:321_3: lokuttaraṃ. Loke na paññāvīyatīti paññattīti imamatthaṃ sandhāya “nahī”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n:321_4: Cattārimaggaññāṇāni catumaggaññāṇanti evaṃ samāsavasena ekavacanantaṃ padaṃ vākyaṃ
anya-e0401n:321_7: avisayabhāvo viya. “Tassā”ti nibbānassa. Tattha “jaccandhānaṃ”ti avisayapade sāmipadaṃ.
anya-e0401n:321_8: “Tassā”ti bhāvapadaṃ. “Yaṃ kiñcī”ti kiñciyaṃ atthajātaṃ. Assanibbānassa siddhatanti
anya-e0401n:321_9: sambandho. Apākaṭassa dhammassa. Vāyāmopi nāma na atthi. Kuto tassa sacchikaraṇaṃ
anya-e0401n:321_10: bhavissatīti adhippāyo. “Yenā”ti vāyāmena. “Nibbānena vinā”ti nibbānārammaṇaṃ alabhitvāti
anya-e0401n:321_11: vuttaṃ hoti. “Akiccasiddhiṃ”ti kilesappahāna kiccassa asiddhiṃ. “Tato”ti tasmā. “Vadhāyā”ti
anya-e0401n:321_15: parinibbutā. Takārapaccayassa kālattayepi pavattanato. Yathā diṭṭhā, sutā, mutā,
anya-e0401n:321_16: viññātā,ti. Visiṭṭhaṃ katvā jānitabbanti viññāṇaṃ. Na nidassitabbanti anidassanaṃ.
anya-e0401n:321_17: Natthi anto etassāti anantaṃ. Sabbato pavattā guṇappabhā etassāti sabbatopabhaṃ.
anya-e0401n:321_18: “Bhagavatā vuttaṃ”ti dīghanikāye kevaṭṭasutte vuttaṃ. “Savantiyo”ti mahānadiyo vā
anya-e0401n:321_19: kunnadiyo vā. “Appentī”ti pavisanti. “Dhārāti” meghavuṭṭhidhārā. Buddhesu anuppajjantesu
anya-e0401n:321_20: ekasattopi parinibbātuṃ na sakkotīti idaṃ buddhuppādakappe eva pacceka sambuddhāpi
anya-e0401n:321_21: uppajjantīti katvā vuttaṃ. Apadāna pāḷiyaṃ pana buddhasuññakappepi paccekasambuddhānaṃ
anya-e0401n:321_22: uppatti āgatā eva. “Ekasattopī”ti vā sāvakasatto gahetabbo. Evañhi sati apadānapāḷiyā
anya-e0401n:321_23: avirodho hoti. “Ārādhentī”ti sādhenti paṭilabhanti. Sabbato pavattā guṇappabhā etassāti
anya-e0401n:321_24: atthaṃ sandhāya “sabbatopabhā sampannaṃ”ti vuttaṃ. “Joti vanta tarovā”ti obhāsavantataro
anya-e0401n:321_25: vā. Sabbattha pabhavati saṃvijjatīti sabbatopabhanti imamatthaṃ sandhāya sabbato
anya-e0401n:321_26: vā pabhutameva hotīti vuttaṃ. Tenāha “na katthaci natthī”ti. “Evaṃsante pī”ti evaṃ
anya-e0401n:321_28: tasmiṃ yevasutte puna kiṃ āha. Bhavaṃ netīti bhavanetti. Bhavataṇhā eva. “Samparāyikā”ti
anya-e0401n:321_29: cutianantare pattabbā. Dvinnaṃ khīṇāsavānaṃ anupādisesatā vuttāti sambandho. Ettha
anya-e0401n:321_31: kilesupādisesa vasena anupādisesatā vuttā. “Kilesupādiseso”ti ca kilesa saṅkhāto
anya-e0401n:321_32: upādiseso. Tathā khandhupādisesopi. Antarāparinibbāyītiādīsu parinibbānaṃ nāma kilesaparinibbānaṃ
anya-e0401n:321_33: vuttaṃ. Ubhato bhāga vimuttādīnaṃ padattho navamaparicchede āgamissati. “Kilesakkhayena
anya-e0401n:321_34: saheva khiyyantī”ti paccuppannabhave arahattamaggakkhaṇe kilesakkhayena saddhiṃ eva
anya-e0401n:321_35: khiyyanti. Anuppāda dhammataṃ gacchanti. Tathā anāgāmi puggalassa kāmapaṭisandhikkhandhāpi
anya-e0401n:321_37: sotāpatti maggakkhaṇe taṃ taṃ kilesakkhaye na saheva khiyyantīti. Paccuppannakkhandhā
anya-e0401n:321_38: pana kilesakkhayena sahakhiyyanti. Khandhupādisesā nāma hutvā yāvamaraṇakālā khīṇāsavānampi
anya-e0401n:321_39: pavattanti. Kasmā pavattantīti āha “yāvacutiyā pavattamānaṃ”tiādiṃ. Paccuppannakkhandhasantānaṃ
anya-e0401n:321_42: nīvārenti, santisukhassa antarāyaṃ karontīti palibodhā. Kilesābhisaṅkharaṇa kiccāni,
anya-e0401n:321_43: kammābhisaṅkharaṇakiccāni, khandhābhisaṅkharaṇa kiccāni ca. Palibodhehi saha vattantīti
anya-e0401n:321_44: sapalibodhā. Saṅkhāra nimittehi saha vattantīti sanimittā. Taṇhāpaṇidhīhi saha vattantīti
anya-e0401n:321_46: sakkotī”ti sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā niruddhāya te nirujjhanti. Aniruddhāya nanirujjhanti.
anya-e0401n:321_47: Tasmā sakkāyadiṭṭhi nirodho nibyāpāradhammopi samāno te palibodhe nirodheti nāma.
anya-e0401n:321_48: “Nirodhetuṃ sakkotī”ti ca abyāpāre byāpāraparikappanāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sakkāyadiṭṭhinirodhoyeva
anya-e0401n:321_49: te palibodhe nirodhetuṃ sakkotīti ettha dvinnampi nirodho ekoyeva. Evaṃ santepi avijjā
anya-e0401n:321_50: nirodhā saṅkhāra nirodhotiādīsu viya abhede bhedaparikappanā hotīti. Uppādo ca pavatto
anya-e0401n:321_51: ca uppādappavattā. Te mūlaṃ yassāti viggaho. Yena oḷārikākārena. Mārentīti mārā.
anya-e0401n:321_52: Vadhakapaccatthikāti vuttaṃ hoti. Kilesamārādayo. Mārā dahanti tiṭṭhanti etesūti
anya-e0401n:321_53: māradheyyā. Māreti cāveti cāti maccu. Maraṇameva. Maccudahati tiṭṭhati etesūti maccudheyyā.
anya-e0401n:321_54: “Natthi tasmiṃ nimittaṃ”ti vutte paññattidhammesupi uppādappavattamūlaṃ nimittaṃ
anya-e0401n:321_55: nāma natthi. Evaṃsati, tehi nibbānassa aviseso āpajjatīti codanā. Taṃ pariharanto
anya-e0401n:321_56: “tañhī”tiādimāha. Viddhaṃsetvāti ca sādhentanti ca atthavisesa pākaṭatthāya abyāpāre
anya-e0401n:321_57: byāpāra parikappanā eva. Paṇītādibhede. Idaṃ buddhānaṃ nibbānaṃ paṇītaṃ. Idaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ
anya-e0401n:321_58: nibbānaṃ majjhimaṃ. Idaṃ buddhasāvakānaṃ nibbānaṃ hīnanti bhinnaṃ na hotīti yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:321_59: Nānappakārena cittaṃ nidheti etenāti paṇihitaṃ. “Nidhetī”ti ārammaṇesu ninnaṃ poṇaṃ
anya-e0401n:321_60: pabbhāraṃ katvā ṭhapetīti attho. Tathā paṇidhānapaṇidhīsu. Atthato ekaṃ āsātaṇhāya
anya-e0401n:321_62: dhammattā”ti pātuṃ paribhuñjituṃ icchā pipāsā. Pipāsaṃ vineti vigametīti pipāsavinayo.
anya-e0401n:321_64: vedayitaṃ natthī”ti yasmā ettha vedayitaṃ natthi. Tasmā nibbāne sukhaṃ nāma katamanti
anya-e0401n:321_65: yojanā. “Etthā”ti etasmiṃ nibbāne. “Etadevetthā”tiādimhi. “Eta devā”ti esoeva. Yasmā
anya-e0401n:321_66: ettha vedayitaṃ natthi. Tasmā eso vedayitassa natthibhāvo eva etthanibbāne sukhanti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:322_0: “Ettha cā”tiādīsu. Yadetaṃ khiyyanaṃ nirujjhanaṃ atthīti sambandho. Keci pana taṃkhiyyana
anya-e0401n:322_1: nirujjhana kriyāmattaṃ nibbānaṃ na hoti. Abhāva paññattimattaṃ hotīti vadanti. Taṃ
anya-e0401n:322_3: vīriyaṃ daḷhaṃ karoti. Pahito attā anenāti pahitatto. “Pahito”ti padahito. Anivattabhāve
anya-e0401n:322_4: ṭhapito. Pesitotipi vaṇṇenti. “Kāyenā”ti nāmakāyena. Taṇhāvase vattantīti taṇhāvasikā.
anya-e0401n:322_5: “Tesaṃ pī”ti tesaṃ vādepi. Tasmiṃ khaya nirodhamatte anantaguṇā nāma natthīti imaṃ
anya-e0401n:322_6: vādaṃ visodhetuṃ “nibbānassa cā”tiādi vuttaṃ. “Paṭipakkhavasena sijjhantī”ti etena
anya-e0401n:322_7: vaṭṭadhammesu mahantaṃ ādīnavaṃ passantā eva tesaṃ nirodhe mahantaṃ guṇānisaṃsaṃ
anya-e0401n:322_8: passantīti dīpeti. Ye pana yathāvuttaṃ khayanirodhaṃ paramatthanibbānanti na jānanti,
anya-e0401n:322_9: tesaṃ vattabbameva natthi. Evaṃ guṇapadānaṃ gambhīrattā taṃkhayanirodhamattaṃ anantaguṇānaṃ
anya-e0401n:322_10: vatthu na hotīti maññanti. Idāni nibbānaṃ paramaṃ sukhanti vuttaṃ. Kathaṃ taṃ khayanirodhamattaṃ
anya-e0401n:322_11: paramasukhaṃ nāma bhaveyyāti imaṃ vādaṃ visodhetuṃ “santisukhañcanāmā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:322_12: Atthibhikkhaveti sutte. “Nocetaṃ abhavissā”ti etaṃ ajātaṃ noce santaṃ vijjamānaṃ
anya-e0401n:322_13: na bhaveyya. “Nayimassā”ti na imassa. Paccakkhabhūtaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ dassento “imassā”ti
anya-e0401n:322_14: vadati. Nissakkatthe ca sāmivacanaṃ. Imasmā jātā bhūtā katā saṅkhatā sattānaṃ nissaraṇaṃ
anya-e0401n:322_15: nāma na paññāyeyyāti yojanā. Paratthapi esanayo. Esanayo sabbesūtiādīsu. Duccarita
anya-e0401n:322_16: dhammā nāma paccaye sati, jāyanti. Asati, na jāyantīti evaṃ jātaṃ viya ajātampi tesaṃ
anya-e0401n:322_17: atthi. Yadi ca ajātaṃ nāma natthi. Jātameva atthi. Evaṃsati, attani duccaritānaṃ
anya-e0401n:322_18: ajātatthāya sammāpaṭipajjantānaṃpi sabbe duccarita dhammā attani jātāyeva siyuṃ,
anya-e0401n:322_19: no ajātā. Kasmā, ajātassa nāma natthitāyātiādinā yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:323_0: “Ettāvatā”ti, atthi bhikkhave ajātaṃtiādinā pāḷivacanena. Sabbesaṅkhārā samanti vūpasamanti
anya-e0401n:323_1: etthāti sabbasaṅkhāra samatho. Sabbe upadhayo ettha nissajjanti ariyājanāti sabbupadhinissaggo.
anya-e0401n:327_0: 162. Samuccayasaṅgahe. Attano āveṇikabhūtena sāmañña lakkhaṇenati ca sambandho. Aññāpadesena
anya-e0401n:327_1: eva tadubhayalakkhaṇena salakkhaṇāni nāma vuccantīti adhippāyo. “Nibbānassapi sarūpato
anya-e0401n:327_2: labbhamānasabhāvatā”ti aññanissaya rahitena labbhamānasabhāvatā. Nanu nibbānampi
anya-e0401n:327_3: rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayotiādinā aññanissayadassanaṃ atthi yevāti. Dassanamattaṃ
anya-e0401n:327_4: atthi. Nibbānaṃ pana rāgādīhi paṭibaddhaṃ na hoti. Atha kho tehi dūrataraṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:327_5: Paṭipakkhataraṃ, paṭiviruddhataraṃ. Yañhi rūpassa khayo vayo bhedo aniccāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:327_6: Tattha rūpassa uppajjitvā khayo vuttoti so rūpassa nissito eva hoti. Idha pana rāgādīnaṃ
anya-e0401n:327_7: puna uppādassapi abhāvo vuttoti so rāgādīsu anissito eva. Na kevalaṃ anissito. Atha
anya-e0401n:327_8: kho tehi dūrataro ca paṭipakkhataro ca tesaṃ paṭipakkhaguṇehi imassasiddhattāti.
anya-e0401n:327_9: Anipphannarūpānipi adhippetāni eva tesampi khandhāyatanadhātu saccesu saṅgahitattā.
anya-e0401n:328_1: “Parivāsaṃ gaṇhantī”ti dosavepullaṃ āpajjantīti vuttaṃ hoti. Puna “parivāsaṃ”ti duggandhatādiparivāsaṃ.
anya-e0401n:328_3: pāpentīti adhippāyo. “Bhavato”ti bhūmito iccevattho. Avadhīyati paricchindīyati etasmāti
anya-e0401n:328_4: avadhi. Apādānaṃ vuccati. Mariyādo nāma pariyantaparicchedo. Mariyādamattabhūto kriyāvisayo
anya-e0401n:328_5: mariyādavisayo. Avadhi nāma byāpana vidhānaṃ, kriyā byāpanassa visayo abhividhivisayo.
anya-e0401n:328_8: avadhibhūtaṃ atthaṃ. “Yaso”ti kittisaddo. “Itaraṃ”ti anabhividhivisayaṃ bahi katvā pavattati.
anya-e0401n:329_2: kammabhavaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. “Taṃ nibbattā”ti tena nibbattā. “Tadārammaṇā”ti duvidhabhavārammaṇā.
anya-e0401n:329_3: “Taṇhā evā”ti bhavataṇhā eva. “Bhavo evā”ti bhavārammaṇatāya bhavanāmikā taṇhā eva.
anya-e0401n:329_4: “Ime evā”ti taṇhādiṭṭhi avijjā eva. “Parivutthe satī”ti parivasite sati. “Kāmavisayā”ti
anya-e0401n:329_5: kāmadhammavisayā. “Tasmiṃ”ti kāmāsave. Bhavavisayā mānādayo parivutthā evātiādinā
anya-e0401n:330_1: māraṇaṭṭhena. Adhokatvā māraṇaṭṭhenātipi yujjati. “Duttaraṭṭhenā”ti tattha patantassa
anya-e0401n:331_1: padassa atthaṃ dasseti “tathā tathā kappetvā gahaṇa”nti. “Sāsane”ti pariyattisāsane
anya-e0401n:331_2: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ suttante. “Diṭṭhiyo diṭṭhupādānaṃ”ti diṭṭhivatthūsu daḷhaggāhaṭṭhena
anya-e0401n:331_3: diṭṭhiyo eva diṭṭhupādānaṃ. Attavādupādāne. Parikappa buddhi nāma micchāñāṇaṃ vuccati.
anya-e0401n:331_5: samuppannaṃ”ti ahetu apaccayā samuppannaṃ. “Accantasassataṃ”ti bhavaparamparāsu sassataṃ.
anya-e0401n:331_7: yatthakatthaci parammaraṇā ucchinnaṃ. Purāṇañcakammaṃ parikkhīṇaṃ, navañcakammaṃ
anya-e0401n:331_8: akataṃ. Evaṃ saṃsāra suddhītiādinā gahaṇanti attho. Santo kāyo sakkāyo. “Santo”ti
anya-e0401n:331_9: paramatthato vijjamāno. “Kāyo”ti rūpakāyo, nāmakāyo. Attano attano kāyo vā sakkāyo.
anya-e0401n:331_10: Paccattakāyo, pāṭipuggalika kāyoti vuttaṃ hoti. Yathāvuttakāya dvayameva. Sakkāye
anya-e0401n:331_11: diṭṭhi sakkāyadiṭṭhi. Tattha “sakkāye diṭṭhī”ti pubbantāparanta kappikānaṃ viya pubbantā
anya-e0401n:331_12: paranteacintetvā sabbasattānaṃpi attano khandhesu eva ‘rūpaṃ me attāti vā’ attā me
anya-e0401n:331_13: rūpavāti vā, attani me rūpanti vā, rūpasmiṃ me attāti vā, evamādinā dhammatā siddhā
anya-e0401n:331_14: diṭṭhīti vuttaṃ hoti. “Assutavā”ti khandhadesanādike suññatadhammappaṭisaṃ yutte
anya-e0401n:331_15: desanā dhamme assuta pubbattā natthi sutaṃ etassāti assutavā. “Puthujjano”ti lokiyamahājano.
anya-e0401n:331_16: Tattha pariyāpanno pana ekapuggalopi puthujjanotveva vuccati. So sutavāpi atthi,
anya-e0401n:331_17: assutavāpi atthi. Idha assutavā adhippeto. Ariya puggalo pana tattha pariyāpanno
anya-e0401n:331_18: na hoti. Ahantivā, mamāti vā, mayīti vā, meti vā, parāmasana padāni nāma. “Sesadhammevā
anya-e0401n:331_19: gahetvā”ti rūpato avasese nāmakkhandha dhamme attā meti gahetvā vā. “Dhamma muttakaṃ
anya-e0401n:331_20: vā attānaṃ gahetvā”ti pañcakkhandhadhammavimuttaṃ parikappasiddhaṃ attānaṃ vā gahetvā.
anya-e0401n:331_21: Catasso avatthā yassāti caturāvatthikā. Vedanāya sambhogarasattā “saṃbhuñjiṃ”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:331_22: “Sukhito”ti sukhavedanāya samaṅgīpuggalo. Dhammato khandha pañcakameva. Tattha pana
anya-e0401n:331_23: sukhavedanāpadhānattā tathā samanupassanto vedanaṃ attāti samanupassati nāma. “Samūhato
anya-e0401n:331_24: gahetvā”ti ahamasmi, ahaṃ eko sattotiādinā samūhato. “Vatthū”ti pañcakkhandhā vuccanti.
anya-e0401n:331_25: Ñātapariññādivasena apariññātāni vatthūni etehīti apariññātavatthukā. Ekamuhuttamattepi
anya-e0401n:331_26: kāle. Rūpaṃ attato samanupassatītiādikaṃ caturāvatthaṃ sandhāya “kadāci attato”tiādi
anya-e0401n:331_27: vuttaṃ. “Attanimittaṃ”ti abhikkamanādīsu kāyavacīmano kriyāsu ahaṃ abhikkamāmi, ahaṃ
anya-e0401n:332_1: cittacetasikānaṃ paṭikuṭanaṃ. Āpādīyate āpādanaṃ. Līnabhāvassa āpādananti viggaho.
anya-e0401n:332_2: “Tandī”ti ālasyaṃ vuccati. “Vijambhitatā” nāma kilesavasena kāyaṅgānaṃ vijambhanaṃ
anya-e0401n:332_3: samiñjanappasāraṇādikaraṇaṃ. Sā eva paccayo etassāti viggaho.
anya-e0401n:333_0: Anusayapadatthe. “Uppajjantī”ti uppajjituṃ sakkonti. Na pana ekantato uppajjanti.
anya-e0401n:333_1: Santesuhi ekantato uppajjantesu anusayā nāma na honti sayanakiccasseva abhāvato.
anya-e0401n:333_2: “Uppajjantī”ti vā uppajjituṃ pahonti. Patthodano bahūnaṃ janānaṃ pahotītiādīsu viya.
anya-e0401n:333_3: Paññattiyohi asabhāvadhammajātikattā kāraṇa lābhepi uppajjituṃ nappahonti. Ime pana
anya-e0401n:333_4: sabhāvadhammajātikattā kāraṇa lābhe sati uppajjituṃ pahontīti. Evañhisati, uppādaṃ
anya-e0401n:333_5: apattānaṃpi tesaṃ paramatthajātikatā siddhā hotīti. “Saha anusentī”ti ekato anusentīti
anya-e0401n:333_6: vuttā kāmarāgānusayo ca paṭighānusayo ca mānānusayo ca diṭṭhānusayo ca vicikicchānusayo
anya-e0401n:333_7: ca. Imesaṃ sattānaṃ sattasantāne anusayakiccamattaṃ ṭhapetvā ekato uppatti nāma natthi.
anya-e0401n:333_8: Yadi ekato uppajjeyyuṃ. Dvādasā kusalacittāni sattasantāne niccakālampi ekato uppajjeyyuṃ.
anya-e0401n:333_9: Na ca uppajjanti. Tasmā viññāyati uppajjanaṃ nāma appahīnaṭṭhena uppajjanārahabhāvo
anya-e0401n:333_10: vuttoti. Sentīti vatvā tadatthaṃ dasseti “visuṃ”tiādinā. “Avuṭṭhitā”ti uppādaṃ apattā.
anya-e0401n:333_13: sudantabhāvaṃ. “Tathā pavattā”ti cittasantānānusayanākārena pavattā. Tāavatthā yesaṃ
anya-e0401n:333_14: te tadavatthikā. Yadi te uppādaṃ apattā. Evaṃsati, te paramatthāpi nāma na bhaveyyunti
anya-e0401n:333_15: codanaṃ pariharati “te panā”tiādinā. Sace te kusalābyākata cittasantānampi anugatā.
anya-e0401n:333_16: Evaṃsati, te kusalābyākatāni nāma siyunti codanaṃ pariharati “na cā”tiādinā. Atha
anya-e0401n:333_17: te ekanta akusalā siyuṃ. Evaṃsati, kusalābyākatehi viruddhā bhaveyyuṃti codanaṃ pariharati
anya-e0401n:333_18: “nāpī”tiādinā. Yadi uppādaṃ apattā. Evaṃsati, kālavimuttā siyunti āha “nāpikālattaya
anya-e0401n:333_20: magguppādā”ti magguppādena saheva. “Tattha tattha vutto”ti aṭṭhakathāṭīkāsu vutto.
anya-e0401n:333_21: “Anāgatasāmaññaṃ”ti anāgatasadisaṃ. Na ekanta anāgatantipi vadanti. Kathaṃ te saṅkhatajātikā
anya-e0401n:333_22: hontīti āha “tehi magge”tiādiṃ. Vibhāvanipāṭhe. “Appahīnā”ti maggena appahīnā. “Tadavatthā”ti
anya-e0401n:333_24: anusayāti vuccanti. Anāgatā nāma na honti. Cittasantāne vattamānabhāvena siddhattā.
anya-e0401n:333_25: “Hañci pajahatī”ti yadipajahati. “Tenahī”ti tato eva. “Ratto”ti rāgasamaṅgī hutvā.
anya-e0401n:333_26: “Duṭṭho”ti dosasamaṅgī hutvā. “Muḷho”ti mohasamaṅgī hutvā pajahatīti doso āpajjatīti
anya-e0401n:333_27: vuttaṃ hoti. Pariyuṭṭhāna pattānaṃ rāgādīnaṃ. “Maggavajjhaṃ”ti maggena vadhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:333_29: ārammaṇaṃ paribhuñjitvā. Vigacchatīti vigataṃ. Bhutvā vigatañca taṃ uppannañcāti
anya-e0401n:333_30: bhutvā vigatuppannaṃ. Vipaccanatthāya okāsaṃ karontīti okāsakataṃ. Okāsakatañca taṃ
anya-e0401n:333_31: uppannañcāti okāsakatuppannaṃ. Samudācāro vuccati bhiyyo pavattanaṃ. Samudācāro ca
anya-e0401n:333_32: so uppannañcāti samudācāruppannaṃ. Khandhapañcaka saṅkhātaṃ bhūmiṃ labhatīti bhūmiladdhaṃ.
anya-e0401n:333_33: Bhūmiladdhañca taṃ uppannañcāti bhūmiladdhuppannaṃ. Ārammaṇaṃ adhikataraṃ gaṇhātīti
anya-e0401n:333_35: Mahaggatajjhānena avikkhambhitañca taṃ uppannañcāti avikkhambhituppannaṃ. Maggena
anya-e0401n:333_36: asamugghāṭitañca taṃ uppannañcāti asamugghāṭituppannaṃ. Evaṃ maggavajjhānaṃ anusayānaṃ
anya-e0401n:333_37: uppannabhāvena vuttattā paccuppannatā pariyāyova tesaṃ vattabboti. “Sekkhā”ti sattasekkhapuggalā.
anya-e0401n:334_0: Orambhāgo vuccati kāmalokoceva puthujjanabhāvo ca. Orambhāge sandissantīti orambhāgiyāni.
anya-e0401n:334_1: Uddhaṃbhāgo vuccati mahaggatabhāvoceva ariyabhāvo ca. Uddhaṃbhāge sandissantīti uddhaṃbhāgiyāni.
anya-e0401n:334_2: Tattha. Kāmacchando, byāpādo,ti imāni dvesaṃ yojanāni kāmalokasaṅkhāte orambhāge
anya-e0401n:334_3: eva sandissanti. Diṭṭhi, vicikicchā, sīlabbataparāmāso,ti imāni tīṇi puthujjanabhāva
anya-e0401n:334_4: saṅkhāte. Sesāni pana pañca mahaggatabhāvasaṅkhāte ca ariyabhāvasaṅkhāteca uddhaṃbhāgepi
anya-e0401n:334_5: sandissanti. Athavā. Purimāni pañcayassa tāni maggena appahīnāni, taṃ uparibhavagge
anya-e0401n:334_6: ṭhitaṃpi kāmalokasaṅkhātaṃ orambhāgaṃ ākaḍḍhanti, tasmā orambhāgāya saṃvattantīti
anya-e0401n:334_7: orambhāgiyāni. Pacchimāni pañca yassa tāni appahīnāni, taṃ kāmaloke ṭhitaṃpi uddhaṃbhāgaṃ
anya-e0401n:334_8: ākaḍḍhanti, tasmā uddhaṃbhāgāya saṃvattantīti uddhaṃbhāgiyāni. Tatthahi dverūpārūparāgā
anya-e0401n:334_9: ekantena mahaggatabhāvaṃ ākaḍḍhantiyeva. Māno ca uddhaccañca avijjācāti imāni ca
anya-e0401n:334_10: rūpārūparāgasahagatāni hutvā ākaḍḍhanti. Oraṃ heṭṭhimaṃ kāmalokaṃ bhajantīti orambhāgiyāni.
anya-e0401n:334_11: Uddhaṃ rūpārūpalokaṃ bhajantīti uddhaṃbhāgiyānītipi vaṇṇenti. “Itarāni panā”ti dve
anya-e0401n:334_12: issā saṃyojana macchariyasaṃyojanāni. “Kamopana dvinnaṃ pī”ti idha saṅgahe dvinnaṃpi anukkamopana.
anya-e0401n:337_1: cā”ti sugatibhava duggati bhavanibbānasaṅkhātāsu ca. Nibbānañhi vaṭṭato gigatattā
anya-e0401n:337_2: vivaṭṭanti vuccati. “Dassanādīhi evā”ti dassanasaṅkappanādīhi eva. Ujugati nāma hitasukhasaṃvattanikā
anya-e0401n:337_3: pavatti vuccati. Vaṅkagatināma ahita dukkhasaṃvattanikā pavatti. “Pathaṅgānī”ti pathassamaggassa
anya-e0401n:337_4: aṅgāni. Maggoti ca upāyo vuccatīti āha “upāyaṅgānī”ti. “Itarānī”ti sammādiṭṭhi sammāsaṅkappādīni
anya-e0401n:337_5: aṅgāni. Ujugatiyā gamanassa upāyaṅgāni. Imepi cattāro maggaṅga dhammā dhammā nāma
anya-e0401n:337_6: āgatā. “Tathā tathā pavattānaṃ”ti musāvādādivasena pavattānaṃ. “Nā nāmaggovā”ti micchāmaggo ca sammāmaggo ca.
anya-e0401n:338_0: “Attādhīnavuttike”ti attāyattappavattike. Attano gati nāma cakkhundriyādīnaṃ dassanādi
anya-e0401n:338_1: kiccameva vuccati. “Issarā adhipatino”ti idaṃ ādhippaccatthapākaṭatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Attho
anya-e0401n:338_2: pana bhāvappadhānavasena gahetabbo. Indriyaṃ issariyaṃ ādhippaccantihi ime ekatthāti.
anya-e0401n:338_5: Mano vijānanakicce sampayuttadhammānaṃ issaro hoti anaññābhibhavanīyabhāvena pavattanatoti
anya-e0401n:338_7: citte buddhaguṇādhikassa ārammaṇassa upaṭṭhāne. “Catusaccadhammo”ti tena puggalena
anya-e0401n:338_8: anaññāta pubbo catusacca dhammo. Anaññāta pubbaṃ amataṃ vā padaṃ. Anaññātaṃ ñassāmi
anya-e0401n:338_9: iti pavattaṃ indriyanti samāso. Paṭipannassāti pana atthato siddhattā vuttaṃ. “Vippakatabhāvenā”ti
anya-e0401n:338_10: aniṭṭhaṅgatabhāvena. Punappunaṃ jānanakiccayuttānaṃ majjhe channaṃsekkhānaṃ. Etena
anya-e0401n:338_11: avasaddassayāva sabbakilesappahānā jānananti atthaṃ dīpeti. Pathama maggena ñātaṃ
anya-e0401n:338_12: mariyādaṃ anatikkamma jānanantipi vaṇṇenti. Ājānitatthāti aññātāvī. Arahā khīṇāsavo
anya-e0401n:338_13: katakicco vusita brahmacariyo. Aññātāvino indriyanti aññātāvindriyanti atthaṃ dassetuṃ
anya-e0401n:338_17: karaṇatthe, hetu atthe vā karaṇavacanaṃ. “Vodānapattiyā”ti sāmiatthe sāmivacanaṃ.
anya-e0401n:339_1: samantato senti parivārentīti parissayā. Assaddhassa bhāvo assaddhiyaṃ. Kosajjasaṅkhātena
anya-e0401n:339_2: paṭipakkhadhammena. Muṭṭhā naṭṭhā sati yassāti muṭṭhassati. Muṭṭhassatissa bhāvo
anya-e0401n:340_0: Gahapati, jāyampatī, tiādīsu viya patisaddo sāmiissara pariyāyoti āha “patīti sāmiissaro”ti.
anya-e0401n:340_1: “Paresaṃ”ti sahajātesu paresaṃ indriyānaṃ. “Parehī”ti kammatthe karaṇavacanaṃ. Pare
anya-e0401n:340_2: sahajāte indriya dhammeti attho. “Adhiko”ti adhikataro. “Attādhīna vuttīnaṃ”ti attāyattavuttīnaṃ.
anya-e0401n:340_3: “Chandāgamanavasena vā”ti ettha āgacchati phalaṃ etenāti āgamanaṃ. Ādikāraṇaṃ, mūlakāraṇaṃ,
anya-e0401n:340_4: pabhavakāraṇaṃ. Chando eva āgamanaṃ chandāgamanaṃ. Tenāha “pubbe atītabhavesū”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:340_5: Sampayutta dhamme attaparādhīne katvāti sambandho. Mahogho tiṇapaṇṇakasaṭe attaparādhīne
anya-e0401n:340_6: karonto viyāti yojanā. Tattha “attaparādhīne”ti attasaṅkhātoparo attaparo. Attaparena
anya-e0401n:340_7: adhīnā attaparādhīnāti attho. “Sesesupī”ti sesesu vīriya citta vīmaṃsādhipatīsupi.
anya-e0401n:340_8: Etena ‘vīriyameva adhipati vīriyādhipati. Vīriyavato kiṃ nāma kammaṃ na sijjhatīti
anya-e0401n:340_9: evaṃ pubbābhisaṅkhāravasena vā pubbe atītabhavesu suṭṭhu āsevitavīriyāgamanavasena
anya-e0401n:340_10: vā tesu tesu kalyāṇa pāpakammesu sampayutta dhamme mahogho viya tiṇapaṇṇakasaṭe attaparādhīne
anya-e0401n:340_11: niccaṃ paggahitadhurekatvā pavattaṃ vīriya’ntiādinayaṃ atidisati. “Pacchimā tayo
anya-e0401n:340_12: dhammā”ti vīriya citta vīmaṃsā dhammā. Paravasepi vattanti, tadā tesaṃ adhipatibhāvo
anya-e0401n:340_13: natthīti codanā. Adhipati kiccaṃ nāma dhuravāhitāti sambandho. “Taṃ taṃ kicca visesaṃ
anya-e0401n:340_14: anapekkhitvā”ti cakkhundriyaṃ dassana kicce issaro, sotindriyaṃ savana kiccetiādīsu
anya-e0401n:340_15: taṃ taṃ kiccavisesaṃ apekkhati, tathā anapekkhitvā. “Vijānanādi kiccaṃ”ti ‘mano ārammaṇa
anya-e0401n:341_0: Bhuso haranti vahantīti āhārā. “Bhuso”ti atirekataranti attho. Kathaṃ pana bhuso
anya-e0401n:341_1: harantīti āha “sahajātādī”tiādiṃ. Tete paccaya dhammā tete paccayuppanna dhammā cāti
anya-e0401n:341_2: yojanā. “Etthā”ti imissaṃ pāḷiyaṃ. “Paccayāhāro vā”ti ettha hetu ārammaṇādiko sabbopaccayo
anya-e0401n:341_3: paccayāhāro nāma. Āhāra paccayopana visuṃ eko paccayaviseso. “Paccayaṭṭhenā”ti hetu
anya-e0401n:341_6: ṭhitatthāya. Imesattā vaṭṭe pavattantīti sambandho. Sesamettha suviññeyyaṃ. “Pakkhe
anya-e0401n:341_7: viyūhitvā”ti pakkhe sañcāletvāti vuttaṃ hoti. “Pakkhe”ti vā pakkhehi vātaṃ byūhitvā.
anya-e0401n:341_8: “Tadanusayitassā”ti tasmiṃ vipāka santāne anusayi tassa. “Vibhāvetvā”ti paccakkhato
anya-e0401n:341_9: vibhūtaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā. “Alabhitvā”ti cakkhumhi alabhitvā. Apassitvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:341_10: “Tatthevā”ti nivāsaṭṭhāne eva. “Sampayuttā”ti viññāṇena sampayuttā. Bhaviṃsu vaḍḍhiṃ
anya-e0401n:341_11: sūti bhūtā. Sambhavaṃ vuḍḍhikāraṇaṃ esanti gavesantīti sambhavesino. “Vuttanayenā”ti
anya-e0401n:341_12: ‘yathā yavabījānaṃ vā sālibījānaṃ vā’tiādinā vuttanayena. “Āhāretī”ti pavatteti.
anya-e0401n:341_14: kāmabhavādike upapattibhave. Ṭhitiyāti ca anuggahāyāti ca vuttaṃ. Itarathā uppattiyāti
anya-e0401n:342_1: “Abhinipāta mattāni hontī”ti dassana savanādi mattāni hontīti adhippāyo. “Vitakka
anya-e0401n:342_2: pacchimakaṃ jhānaṃ”ti jhānāni nāma vitakkassa pacchānugataṃ hotīti attho. “Tatthā”ti
anya-e0401n:342_3: tesupañcaviññāṇesu. “Tā”ti vedanā ekaggatā. “Taṃ”ti jhānakiccaṃ. Ekaggatā balavatī
anya-e0401n:342_4: na hotīti sambandho. “Maggindriya balabhāvāyā”ti maggindriya balabhāvatthāya. Lokuttaravipākāni
anya-e0401n:342_5: javanakiccāni ca sādhipatikāni ca hontīti vuttaṃ “tibhūmakānī”tiādi. Sesamettha subodhaṃ.
anya-e0401n:344_1: āha “pamukhā padhānā hutvā”ti. Ṭhāsaddo gatinivatti atthoti āha “cittagamanaṃ nivattetvā
anya-e0401n:344_2: pavattantī”ti. “Kāye anupassanā”ti kāye pavattā anupassanā. Punappunaṃ passanti yogino
anya-e0401n:344_3: etāyāti anupassanā. Katamaṃ passantīti āha “assāsapassāsādikassā”tiādiṃ. Kathañcataṃ
anya-e0401n:344_4: passantīti vuttaṃ “taṃ taṃ kāyabhāvenā”tiādi. Idāni punappuna saddassa atthaṃ dassento
anya-e0401n:344_5: “yāvā”tiādimāha. Vedanānu passanādīsupi esevanayo. Taṃ na sundaraṃ. Kasmā, sakalassa
anya-e0401n:344_6: rūpakāyassa adhippetattā. Sesamettha suviññeyyaṃ. Yadi evantiādīsu. “Itarāpi siddhā”ti
anya-e0401n:344_7: kāyānupassanādayopi siddhā. Kasmā, dhammānupassanāya antogadhattā. “Tathā anupassantassā”ti
anya-e0401n:344_9: samūhabhūtassa rūpa dhammassa vasena. “Subhādivipallāsassā”ti subha sukha niccavipallāsassa.
anya-e0401n:345_2: Uppannasaddena atīta kilesāpi paccuppanna kilesāpi gahetabbā hontīti āha “asukasmiṃ
anya-e0401n:345_3: kāle”tiādiṃ. “Mayhaṃ uppannaṃ”ti idāni uppannaṃ. “Pahānāyā”ti ettha samucchedappahānaṃ
anya-e0401n:345_4: adhippetanti āha “anuppāda dhammatāpādanakaraṇatthaṃ”ti. Tattha anuppādo dhammo yesaṃ
anya-e0401n:345_5: te anuppāda dhammā. Maggena pahīnā akusala dhammā. Anuppāda dhammānaṃ bhāvoti viggaho.
anya-e0401n:345_6: Anuppāda dhammatāya āpādanaṃ. Tassa karaṇanti samāso. “Disvā”ti tesaṃ uppatti vatthuṃ
anya-e0401n:345_9: ariyamaggasaṅkhātaṃ sammattaniyāmaṃ na okkamanti. Nappavisanti. Kilesehi akopetabbatāya
anya-e0401n:345_10: akuppo dhammo yassāti akuppa dhammo. Khīṇāsavo. Akuppa dhammassa bhāvo akuppa dhammatā.
anya-e0401n:345_11: Arahatta phalaṃ. “Tesaṃ”ti kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ. Uppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ pahānāyāti katvā
anya-e0401n:345_12: visuddhidhammesu yogaṃ karontassa anukkamena bhāvanā kamme matthakaṃ patteādito paṭṭhāya
anya-e0401n:345_13: uppannāpi pāpakā pahiyyanti. Anuppannāpi nuppajjanti. Anuppannāpi kusalā uppajjanti.
anya-e0401n:345_14: Uppannāpi bhāvanā pāripūriṃ gacchanti. Esanayo anuppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ anuppādāyātiādīsu.
anya-e0401n:345_15: Evaṃ catūsu mukhesu ekekamukhenapi sammā padahantassa sammappadhānaṃ catukiccasādhakaṃ
anya-e0401n:346_0: Abhivisiṭṭhena dhammavavatthānaññāṇena ñātabbā sabbe paramattha dhammā abhiññeyyā
anya-e0401n:346_1: nāma. “Abhiññā siddhī”ti abhijānana kiccasiddhi. Visuṃ visuṃ paricchinditvā ñātabbā
anya-e0401n:346_2: catusacca dhammā pariññeyyā nāma. Tehi dukkhasacca dhammā pariññātabbabhāvena, samudaya
anya-e0401n:346_3: sacca dhammā pahātabba bhāvena, nirodhasacca dhammā sacchikātabba bhāvena, maggasacca
anya-e0401n:346_4: dhammā bhāvetabbabhāvena ñātabbā hontīti. “Bhāvanāsiddhī”ti bhāvanākicca siddhi.
anya-e0401n:346_5: Taṃ saṃyuttake imāyapāḷiyā sametīti sambandho. “Vibhaṅge panā”ti iddhipādavibhaṅge
anya-e0401n:346_6: pana. “Citta cetasikarāsī”ti saha pubbabhāgabhāvanāya uttari manussa dhammapariyā
anya-e0401n:346_7: pannā cittacetasikarāsi. “Tattha panā”ti vibhaṅge tasmiṃ uttaracūḷabhājanīye pana.
anya-e0401n:347_0: Cattāri sotāpattiyaṅgāni nāma buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato. Dhamme, saṅghe,
anya-e0401n:347_1: ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgatoti evaṃ vuttāni sotāpattiyā aṅgāni. Tattha “ariyakantehī”ti
anya-e0401n:348_0: “Soḷasahikiccehī”ti ekekasmiṃ sacce cattāri cattāri katvā soḷasahi kiccehi. Pīḷanaṭṭho,
anya-e0401n:348_1: saṅkhataṭṭho, tiādīhi soḷasahi atthehīti vuttaṃ hoti. Te ca atthā parato āgamissanti.
anya-e0401n:348_2: Sati eva sambojjhaṅgoti vuttaṃ, kathaṃ pana sāsati sambodhiṃ samuṭṭhāpetīti āha “sāhī”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:348_4: kosajjapakkhaṃ”ti līnapakkha saṅkoca pakkhakosajja pakkhaṃ. Dhuraṃ suṭṭhu paggaṇhāti
anya-e0401n:348_6: ukkaṇṭha pakkhaṃ”ti aratipakkha nibbidāpakkhaṃ. Dhamme rati dhammarati. Dhamme nandī
anya-e0401n:348_7: dhammanandī. Dhamme ārāmo dhammārāmo. “Sārambho” nāma cittavihesā. “Daratho” nāma
anya-e0401n:348_8: cittasantāpo. Samāhito bhikkhave yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti passatīti vacanato paññāya
anya-e0401n:348_9: samādhi pādakatā pākaṭāti vuttaṃ “tassā”tiādiṃ. Samaṃ avisamaṃ attano kiccaṃ vahati
anya-e0401n:349_0: Sā pana catubbidhā hotīti sambandho. “Tassā”ti sammādiṭṭhiyā. “Visākhā”ti ālapana
anya-e0401n:349_1: padaṃ. ‘Sabbe lokuttare hontī’ti vacanassa sambandhaṃ dassetuṃ “te pana sattatiṃsappabhedā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n:349_2: Na vaṭṭhānāni assa atthīti navaṭṭhānikaṃ. “Lokuttare”ti lokuttara citte. “Attappaṭipakkhānaṃ”ti
anya-e0401n:349_3: attanā ujuppaṭipakkhānaṃ. “Te”ti bodhipakkhiya dhammā. Etena dassetīti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:349_4: “Kuṇḍaliyā”ti evaṃ nāmakaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ālapati. “Vijjā”ti maggavijjā. “Vimuttī”ti phalavimutti.
anya-e0401n:351_2: ca bhinnānaṃ. “Upapatti dvāresū”ti cakkhādi dvāresu. “Kammadvāresū”ti kāyakammadvārādīsu.
anya-e0401n:351_4: sādhāraṇa kiccānivā. Pāḷipāṭhe. “Kiñcā”ti kasmā ca. “Saṅkhārevadethā”ti saṅkhārā
anya-e0401n:351_5: saṅkhārā iti tumhe vadetha. “Kiñcasaṅkhataṃ”ti katamañcasaṅkhataṃ. “Rūpaṃ rūpatthāyā”ti
anya-e0401n:351_6: rūpavikatiyā jātatthāya rūpasaṅkhātaṃ saṅkhataṃ abhisaṅkharontīti attho. Upabhogo
anya-e0401n:351_7: nāma vatthābharaṇādiko antobhogo. Paribhogo nāma mañcapīṭhādiko bāhira paribhogo.
anya-e0401n:351_8: Samparāyikañca vedananti adhikāro. Sesesupi saññāsaṅkhāra viññāṇesupi. “Dānaṃ dānatthāyā”ti
anya-e0401n:351_9: dānapuññassa jātatthāya. Dānasaṅkhātaṃ saṅkhataṃ abhisaṅkharontīti attho. Athavā
anya-e0401n:351_10: dānassa attho dānattho. “Attho”ti ca vipākattho phalattho. Dānavipākatthāya dānaphalatthāya
anya-e0401n:351_11: dānapuññasaṅkhātaṃ saṅkhataṃ abhisaṅkharontīti attho. Evaṃ sesesupi. “Anuyuñjantā”ti
anya-e0401n:351_12: vipassanā kammaṃ anuyuñjantā. “Tīsu dhammesu kilamissantī”ti vuttaṃ. Kathaṃ kilamissantīti
anya-e0401n:351_15: sukhasaññitaṭṭhānaṃ hoti. Tasmā tattha dukkhānupassanāñāṇaṃ atirekataraṃ pavattetabbanti
anya-e0401n:351_16: tadatthāya bhagavā taṃ vedanaṃ visuṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ katvā khandha desanaṃ desetīti
anya-e0401n:351_18: attānaṃ katvā”ti loke viññuttaṃ paramaṃ hoti, tasmā vijānanaṃ paramaṃ attānaṃ katvā.
anya-e0401n:351_20: bhuñjati. “Yañca bhuñjatī”ti yañca bhojanaṃ bhuñjati. “Yena ca bhuñjatī”ti yenabyañjanena
anya-e0401n:351_21: bhuñjati. “Yo ca bhojako”ti samīpe ṭhatvā parivesako. “Yo ca bhuñjitā”ti yo ca bhuñjako.
anya-e0401n:352_0: “Sāsavā evā”ti sāsavā nāma lokiya dhammā. “Ussāhantā viya hontī”ti abyāpāra dhammattā
anya-e0401n:352_1: vuttaṃ. Na hi abyāpāra dhammānaṃ ekantena ussāho nāma atthi. Phalassa nibbattanato
anya-e0401n:352_2: phalatthāya ussāhantā viya hontīti. “Ākiritvā”ti pattharitvā. Sesamettha subodhaṃ.
anya-e0401n:353_0: Dhātusaṅgahe. “Attano eva sabhāvaṃ”ti attano sabhāvaṃ evātipi yujjati. “Īhā ca byāpāro
anya-e0401n:353_1: cā”ti abhikkamāmi paṭikkamāmītiādinā ussāho ca, abhikkamanādi byāpāro ca. “Na ca
anya-e0401n:353_2: jīvayogā”ti na ca lokiyamahājana sammatena jīvena yuttā. Aṭṭhakathāpāṭhe. Yāyati
anya-e0401n:353_3: etthāti yantaṃ. Udukkhalaṃ. Yanta cakkayaṭṭhināma yanta cakkasambandhā musalayaṭṭhi.
anya-e0401n:353_4: Araṇī vuccati agginibbattakatthāya katā dve sāraghaṭikā. Adharāraṇī nāma heṭṭhāraṇī.
anya-e0401n:353_6: viya. “Āturāviyā”ti tehisallasūlehi viddhagilānā viya. Ayathābhucca nimittaṃ nāma
anya-e0401n:353_7: ayathābhūtaṃ sattapuggalādinimittaṃ. “Vanamigo viyā”ti tiṇa rūpe purisa saññālābho
anya-e0401n:353_9: upaddavānaṃ uppatti paccayato. “Vanamakkaṭo viyā”ti vanavānaro viya. Dukkhena damanaṃ
anya-e0401n:353_10: assāti duddamano. “Assakhaḷuṅko”ti duṭṭha asso. “Yattha kāmanipātito”ti yasmiṃ yasmiṃ
anya-e0401n:353_11: ārammaṇe patituṃ kāmeti icchati, tattha tattha nipātito. Puggalavase avattitvā ārammaṇesu
anya-e0401n:353_12: yadicchakaṃ nipatanatoti vuttaṃ hoti. “Raṅganaṭo viyā”ti samajjanaṭako viya. Sabhāvato
anya-e0401n:353_13: atthi saṃvijjatīti santo. Tathoti ca avitathoti ca atthato ekaṃ. Añño pakāro aññathā.
anya-e0401n:353_14: Natthi aññathā assāti anaññathaṃ. Dukkhadukkhaṃ nāma kāyikadukkha cetasikadukkhaṃ.
anya-e0401n:353_16: puretarameva. “Uppannaṃ pī”ti uppannampi cakkhu. “Pavattiyā”ti santānaṭṭhitiyā ṭhitatthāya.
anya-e0401n:353_17: “Paṭijaggana dukkhaṃ”ti sodhana dukkhaṃ. Paccayavekallaṃ nāma āhāracchedādikaṃ. Nanu
anya-e0401n:353_18: bhijjanabhayena pageva paccayasampādanaṃ nāma saṅkhāra dukkhameva siyāti. Saccaṃ.
anya-e0401n:353_19: Idha pana āsanne bhijjananimittaṃ disvā kataṃ paccaya sampādanaṃ adhippetaṃ. “Rakkhāvaraṇagutti
anya-e0401n:353_20: saṃvidhāna dukkhaṃ”ti nānābhayato rakkhaṇassa ca āvaraṇassa ca gopanassa ca saṃvidhāna
anya-e0401n:353_21: dukkhaṃ. “Tadubhayena saheva sijjhatī”ti kasigorakkhādīni saṅkhāra kammāni vā rakkhāvaraṇa
anya-e0401n:353_22: guttisaṃ vidhānādīnivā karontānaṃ taṃ dukkha dukkhaṃ tadubhayena dukkhena saheva
anya-e0401n:353_23: sijjhati. “Tesaṃ”ti cakkhādīni assādentānaṃ na muccatīti sambandho. “Pavatti nirodha
anya-e0401n:353_24: bhūtassā”ti pavattiyā nirodha bhūtassa. “Taṃ pajahati yevā”ti taṃ lobhaṃ pajahatiyeva.
anya-e0401n:353_25: “Yāvadevā”ti uparimapariyantena. Ahaṃ asmīti pavatto māno asmimāno. Tassa samugghātanaṃ
anya-e0401n:353_26: samucchindanaṃ. “Pariññātesū”ti tesu anusayitāya taṇhāya pahānavasena pariññātesu.
anya-e0401n:353_27: “Tabbiparītena panā”ti tato viparītena pana. Asmimānassa anadhiṭṭhānabhūtātiādi atthena.
anya-e0401n:353_28: Anindriyabaddha dhammā nāma pathavīpabbatādīsu pavattā rūpa dhammā.
anya-e0401n:354_0: Satte anukkaṇṭhamāne karotīti sambandho. “Itī”ti tasmā. Tesaṃ sattānaṃ. Dujjaho nāma
anya-e0401n:354_1: natthi. Tasmā lobhoyeva dukkhasamudayāriya saccaṃ nāmāti yojanā. Sāsavā kusalā kusala
anya-e0401n:354_2: dhammā samudayasaccaṃ nāma, dukkha saccabhūtānaṃ vipākakkhandhakaṭattā rūpānaṃ samudayattā
anya-e0401n:354_5: pabhavabhūtā, padhānabhūtā. “Pabhavabhūtā”ti ca pathamuppattihetubhūtā. “Tesaṃ”ti dukkha dhammānaṃ.
anya-e0401n:356_0: “Pariṇāmo”ti pariṇamanaṃ aññathābhāvo. “Taṃ samaṅgīnaṃ”ti tehi cakkhādīhi samaṅgīnaṃ
anya-e0401n:356_2: agginā. Tathā ariyamaggo vipariṇāma dhammo ca hoti. Sovipariṇāma dukkhenapi puggalaṃ
anya-e0401n:356_3: bhusaṃ pīḷetiyevāti yojanā. “Nā”ti na siyā. Samanaṃ vūpasamanaṃ santi. Sabbadukkhānaṃ
anya-e0401n:356_4: santīti viggaho. Sabbaṃ vaṭṭadukkhanti sambandho. “Tassā”ti ariyamaggassa. “Pavattamānā
anya-e0401n:356_5: cā”ti santatiṭhitivasena vattamānā ca. “Mahantaṃ pariḷāhadukkhaṃ”ti soka parideva
anya-e0401n:356_6: dukkha domanassupāyāsānaṃ pavattivasena mahantaṃ pariḷāha dukkhaṃ. Nibbānassa anuppāda
anya-e0401n:356_7: dhammattā uppādatthāya paccayo nāma natthi. Tathā appavatti dhammattā pavattatthāya.
anya-e0401n:356_8: Sampāpuṇitabbattā pana sampāpanatthāya paccayo atthīti āha “sampāpaka paccayābhisaṅkharaṇalesaṃ”ti.
anya-e0401n:356_9: Sampāpaka paccayā nāma ariya maggo ca tassa paccayā ca.
anya-e0401n:357_1: eva. Anupunappunaṃ padīyate anuppadānaṃ. “Niyyātanaṭṭho”ti handa gaṇhāti sampaṭicchāpanaṭṭho.
anya-e0401n:357_3: “Nissaraṇavimuttiyā”ti nissaraṇa saṅkhātāya vimuttiyā. Saṅkhāra dukkhassa abhāvaṭṭho.
anya-e0401n:357_4: “Sammohassa pahānavasenā”ti etena idha dassanaṃ nāma ito paṭṭhāya catūsu saccesu
anya-e0401n:357_5: asammoha bhāvapatti eva ālokapatti eva vuccatīti dasseti. Tenāha “paṭivijjhanaṭṭho”ti.
anya-e0401n:357_6: Taṇhāya dāso taṇhādāso. Taṇhādāsassa bhāvo taṇhādāsabyaṃ. Paravasato vimuttivasena
anya-e0401n:357_7: aparādhīnatā bhujissabhāvo nāma. Lokiyamaggāhi taṇhādāsabyaṃ nātivattanti. Taṇhāvasaṃ
anya-e0401n:357_8: pūrayamānā taṇhāvisayaṃ vipākaṃ janenti. Ayaṃ ariyamaggo eva taṇhāya anārammaṇabhāve
anya-e0401n:357_9: ṭhito taṇhādāsabyaṃ ativattati. Taṇhāvasaṃ bhindamāno taṇhāya avisayaṃ vipākaṃ janetīti
anya-e0401n:357_11: Sesamettha subodhaṃ. “Khayavirāga nirodha bhūto”ti ettha kilesa dhammānaṃ virajjanaṃ
anya-e0401n:357_12: vigamanaṃ antaradhānaṃ virāgo. “Anattha padānī”ti ahitapadāni. Bhayādīnavapadāni.
anya-e0401n:357_14: ārammaṇa chakkanti na vattabbaṃ dhammārammaṇassa visuṃ gahitattāti. No navattabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:357_15: Kasmā, dvārachakkato sesānaṃ dhammārammaṇānaṃ atthitāyāti dassetuṃ “ettha cā”tiādi
anya-e0401n:361_0: 166. Yehipakārehi yathā. Tesaṃ vibhāgo taṃ vibhāgo. Ayañcaniddeso ekasesaniddeso,
anya-e0401n:361_2: tīhi-ya-saddehi dassitānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ atthānaṃ-ta-saddattha sambhavato. Ta-saddatthānañca
anya-e0401n:361_3: anusandhiyaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ katvā vattabbato. “Samuppajjatī”ti suṭṭhu paripuṇṇaṃ katvā
anya-e0401n:361_4: uppajjati, pātubhavati. “Avinā”ti avinā hutvā. “Sahajāta dhammehī”ti avijjā paccayā
anya-e0401n:361_5: saṅkhārātiādīsu saṅkhārādīnaṃ sahajāta dhammehi saheva uppajjanaṃ. “Kalāpavasenā”ti
anya-e0401n:361_6: suddha dhamma kalāpavasena. “Sāmañña lakkhaṇaṃ”ti sādhāraṇa lakkhaṇaṃ. “Attho”ti
anya-e0401n:361_8: ayaṃbhāvasādhanattho paṭikkhitto. “Ayamevā”ti ayaṃ bhāvasādhanattho eva. Jarāmaraṇaṃ
anya-e0401n:361_9: sambhavatīti yojanā. “Uppādāvā tathāgatānaṃ”ti sammāsambuddhānaṃ uppādevā sati. “Anuppādāvā”ti
anya-e0401n:361_10: anuppādevā sati. “Ṭhitāva sādhātū”ti jātiyā sati jarāmaraṇassa pavattisabhāvo loke
anya-e0401n:361_11: ṭhitoyeva. Katamā pana sādhātūti āha “dhammaṭṭhitatā”tiādiṃ. Tattha “dhammaṭṭhitatā”ti
anya-e0401n:361_13: tasmiṃ sāmaññalakkhaṇe saṅkhata dhammānaṃ tathatā. Sāmañña lakkhaṇameva paṭiccasamuppādo
anya-e0401n:361_14: nāmāti dasseti, na avijjādiko paccaya dhammo. Kasmā, tehi vacanehi dhammaniyāmatā
anya-e0401n:361_15: mattassa dassitattā. Avijjādīnaṃ dhamma sarūpānaṃ adassitattā. “Dhammaniyāmatāmattaṃ”ti
anya-e0401n:361_16: ca yathā vuttasāmañña lakkhaṇameva vuccati. Yadi bhāvasādhanaṃ iccheyya, bhāvasādhanaṃ
anya-e0401n:361_17: nāma katturahitaṃ bhaveyya. Katturahite ca sati, kathaṃ paṭicca kriyāya samānakattukatā
anya-e0401n:361_18: labbhati. Aladdhe ca samānakattukatte kathañca pubbakāletvā paccayasambhavoti. Ayaṃ
anya-e0401n:361_19: bhāvasādhanaṃ icchantassa byañjanayuttivirodho. Taṃ pariharanto na cetthātiādimāha.
anya-e0401n:361_20: Gambhīrocānanda paṭiccasamuppādo gambhīrāva bhāsocāti bhagavatā vuttaṃ. Bhāvasādhane
anya-e0401n:361_21: ca kate uppajjana kriyāmattaṃ nāma visuṃ eko dhammo na hotīti kathaṃ taṃ gambhīraṃ
anya-e0401n:361_22: siyāti. Ayaṃ bhāvasādhanaṃ icchantassa gambhīravacana virodho. Taṃ pariharanto “saṅkhata
anya-e0401n:361_23: dhammesu cā”tiādimāha. Api ca saṅkhata lakkhaṇaṃ nāma saṅkhata dhammatopi gambhīraṃ
anya-e0401n:361_24: hoti. Tathāhi cittaṃ nāma saṅkhata dhammo. Tañca atthi mecittaṃ nāmāti sattānaṃ pākaṭaṃ
anya-e0401n:361_25: hoti. Tassa pana aniccatā saṅkhātaṃ saṅkhata lakkhaṇaṃ apākaṭaṃ hoti suṭṭhu santatiyā
anya-e0401n:361_26: paṭicchannaṃ. Tathā vedanā nāma sukhāvā dukkhāvā saṅkhata dhammo. Sā ca atthi mevedanāti
anya-e0401n:361_27: sattānaṃ pākaṭā hoti. Tassā pana aniccatā saṅkhātaṃ saṅkhata lakkhaṇaṃ apākaṭaṃ hoti
anya-e0401n:361_28: suṭṭhu santatiyā paṭicchannaṃ. Evaṃ sesesu nāmadhammesu ca rūpadhammesu ca. Yato
anya-e0401n:361_29: sattasu visuddhīsu saṅkhata dhamma vavatthāna saṅkhātaṃ diṭṭhivisuddhiñāṇañca avijjādipaccaya
anya-e0401n:361_30: pariggaha saṅkhātaṃ kaṅkhāvitaraṇa visuddhiñāṇañca pathamaṃ sampādetvā pacchā dasavidhāni
anya-e0401n:361_31: saṅkhata lakkhaṇānupassanā ñāṇāni sampādetabbāni hontīti. Yathā ca aniccatā saṅkhātaṃ
anya-e0401n:361_32: saṅkhata lakkhaṇaṃ saṅkhata dhammato gambhīraṃ hoti. Tathā idampi paṭiccasamuppāda
anya-e0401n:361_33: saṅkhātaṃ saṅkhata lakkhaṇaṃ saṅkhata dhammato gambhīraṃ hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:362_0: “Tabbhāvabhāvībhāvo”ti ettha bhavati saṃvijjatīti bhāvo. So so avijjādiko bhāvo tabbhāvo.
anya-e0401n:362_1: Tabbhāve bhavanti sambhavanti sīlenāti tabbhāvabhāvino. Saṅkhārādayo. “Bhāvo”ti uppattikāraṇaṃ.
anya-e0401n:362_2: Tabbhāvabhāvīnaṃ bhāvoti tabbhāvabhāvi bhāvoti imamatthaṃ dassento “tasmiṃ tasmiṃ”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n:362_3: Api ca “bhāvo”ti vijjamānatā vuccati. Tassa tassa paccaya dhammassa bhāvoti tabbhāvo.
anya-e0401n:362_4: Tabbhāve sati bhavanti sambhavanti dhammatāyāti tabbhāvabhāvino. Tesaṃ bhāvotipi
anya-e0401n:362_5: yujjatiyeva. “Hetvādi paccaya sattiniyāmaṃ”ti hetupaccayo, ārammaṇa paccayo, tiādīsu
anya-e0401n:362_6: hetusadda ārammaṇa saddādayo lobhādīnaṃ rūpārammaṇādīnañca dhammānaṃ taṃ taṃ paccaya
anya-e0401n:362_7: sattivisesaṃ dīpenti. Tesañca so so paccaya sattiviseso visuṃ dhammaniyāmo hoti,
anya-e0401n:362_8: evaṃ hetvādi paccayasattiniyāmaṃ nivatteti. “Tathā tathā”ti mūlaṭṭhagocaravisayaṭṭhādikena
anya-e0401n:362_9: tena tena paccayākārena. So hi vuccatīti sambandho. “Paccaya dhammuddhāra matte aṭhatvā”ti
anya-e0401n:362_10: paccaya dhammānaṃ nāma saññāvasena uddharaṇamattaṃ akatvāti adhippāyo. “Āhaccā”ti
anya-e0401n:362_11: āhanitvā taṃ taṃ paccayasatti visesaṃ pāpetvāti attho. Tenāha “matthakaṃ pāpetvā”ti.
anya-e0401n:362_12: Paccayasatti viseso hi hetuphaladīpane tato uttari vattabba kiccābhāvato matthakaṃ
anya-e0401n:362_13: nāma hotīti. “Anosakkamānā”ti anivattamānā. “Etāyā”ti paccaya sattiyā. Papañcente ācariye.
anya-e0401n:363_0: Etasmā kāraṇā phalaṃ etadeva paṭicca anāgatapakkhato paccuppannapakkhaṃ āgacchati
anya-e0401n:363_1: pātubbhavatīti paccayo. Uppattikāraṇaṃ pavattikāraṇañca. Tattha uppattikāraṇaṃ janakapaccayo.
anya-e0401n:363_2: Pavattikāraṇaṃ upatthambhaka paccayo. “Etenā”ti hetunā. “Kāyavacī manokammaṃ”ti ettha
anya-e0401n:363_3: “kammaṃ”ti kriyāvuccati, gamana ṭhāna nisajjasayanādikaṃ kāyika kriyañca. Ālāpa sallāpa
anya-e0401n:363_4: kathana sajjhāyana gāyanādikaṃ vācasika kriyañca. Vijānana cintana vīmaṃsanādikaṃ
anya-e0401n:363_6: kusala cetanā dhammehi. Api ca saṅkharonti sattā etehīti saṅkhārā. “Saṅkharontī”ti
anya-e0401n:363_7: kiṃ saṅkharonti. Attabhāvaṃ saṅkharonti. Bhavābhavaṃ saṅkharonti. Diṭṭhadhammikampi
anya-e0401n:363_8: atthaṃ vā anatthaṃ vā saṅkharonti. Samparāyikampi atthaṃ vā anatthaṃ vā saṅkharontītiādinā.
anya-e0401n:363_9: Cakkhumpi saṅkharonti, sotaṃpi saṅkharontītiādinā. Dassanampi saṅkharonti, savanampi
anya-e0401n:363_10: saṅkharontītiādinā ca vattuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. “Vijānātī”ti vividhena jānāti. Bhūtenapi
anya-e0401n:363_11: jānāti, abhūtenapi jānāti. “Namatī”ti gocara visayatthāya namati. “Ruppatī”ti kuppati,
anya-e0401n:363_12: khobhati. “Phusatī”ti saṃhanati. “Vedayatī”ti viditaṃ karoti. Taṃ taṃ ārammaṇaṃ lagganavasena
anya-e0401n:363_13: bhusaṃ nahati bandhati, muñcituṃ na detīti taṇhātipi yujjati. “Upādiyatī”ti daḷhaṃ
anya-e0401n:363_14: gaṇhāti. Tenāha “amuñcaggāhaṃ gaṇhātī”ti. Bhavatīti bhavo. Upapattibhavo. Bhavanti
anya-e0401n:363_15: etenāti bhavo. Kammabhavo. “Jananaṃ”ti abhinavassa pātubbhavanaṃ. “Jīraṇaṃ”ti abhinavabhāvato
anya-e0401n:363_18: hutvā cittassasīdanaṃ. Thāmabalakhiyyanaṃ. Yato assāsapassāsānaṃ virūpappavattivā
anya-e0401n:363_19: taṅkhaṇe sabbaso uparujjhanaṃ vā hotīti. “Kenaci sukhenā”ti dukkhasaccato vimuttena
anya-e0401n:364_3: maggasseva dukkhanirodha maggabhāvappaṭicchādikā. Pubbanto vuccati atītekāle bhavaparamparā.
anya-e0401n:364_4: Aparanto vuccati anāgate bhavaparamparā. Pubbantā paranto vuccati tadubhayaṃ. “Paṭiccasamuppādappaṭicchādikā”ti
anya-e0401n:364_6: vibhaṅge suttanta bhājanīyaṃ nāma āgataṃ. Tena suttanta bhājanīyanayena. Sāsavā kusalā
anya-e0401n:364_7: kusala cetanā saṅkhārā nāmāti yojanā. “Abhidhammanayenā”ti vibhaṅge abhidhammabhājanīyanayena.
anya-e0401n:364_8: Aṭṭhakathāpāṭhe. Avijjā kiriya dhammānaṃ neva upanissaya paccayattaṃ labhati. Kusalā
anya-e0401n:364_9: kusalamūlāni kiriya dhammānaṃ na upanissaya paccayattaṃ labhantīti yojanā. Kiriya
anya-e0401n:364_10: dhammā avijjāto ca kusalā kusala mūlehi ca upanissaya paccayaṃ na labhantīti vuttaṃ
anya-e0401n:364_11: hoti. “Paccayākāro”ti paṭicca samuppādo. “Avijjāvirāgā”ti avijjā vigamanato. Tesaṃpikiriya
anya-e0401n:364_12: dhammānaṃ. Viññāṇādīsupi kiriya viññāṇaṃ, kiriya nāmaṃ, kiriya manāyatanaṃ, kiriyaphasso,
anya-e0401n:364_13: kiriya vedanāti atthitāya “esanayo viññāṇādīsupī”ti vuttaṃ. “Kusalā kusala vipākasampayuttaṃ”ti
anya-e0401n:364_14: kusala viññāṇa sampayuttaṃ, akusalaviññāṇasampayuttaṃ, vipāka viññāṇa sampayuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:364_15: “Taṃ anupapannaṃ”ti pavattivipākaviññāṇa sahagatassa khandhattayassa taṃ sahajātassa
anya-e0401n:364_16: cittajarūpassa ca avasiṭṭhattā taṃ na sampannaṃti attho. Tattha hi viññāṇapade pavattivasena
anya-e0401n:364_17: dvattiṃsavidhaṃ vipākacittaṃ viññāṇaṃ nāmāti vuttaṃ. Evañcasati, nāma rūpapadepi
anya-e0401n:364_18: pavattivasena tadubhayaṃ pavattiviññāṇasahagataṃpi gahetabbamevāti. “Taṃ taṃ viññāṇa
anya-e0401n:364_20: cha taṇhā rūpataṇhā saddataṇhādivasena. Cattāri upādānāni kāmupādānādivasenāti evaṃ
anya-e0401n:365_0: “Khandhadukkhe”ti paccakkhandhasaṅkhāte dukkhasacce. Khandhappavatti maggo nāma taṇhāsamudayo
anya-e0401n:365_1: eva. Khandhanirodha maggo nāma ariyamaggo. “Khandha samudayabhūtā”ti khandhappavattiyā
anya-e0401n:365_3: maggena appahīna bhavapatthanānaṃ. Appahīnabhavataṇhānanti vuttaṃ hoti. “Vibandho”ti
anya-e0401n:365_5: taṇhāya paccayo hotīti vuttaṃ “sukhavedanāsadiso”tiādi. Domanassānaṃ pana tassā paccayabhāvo
anya-e0401n:365_6: parato pariyeṭṭhitaṇhāyaṃ pākaṭo bhavissati. Upekkhā vedanāpi dukkhena pīḷitassa
anya-e0401n:365_7: sukhaṭhāne tiṭṭhati. Sukhaṃ viya taṃ patthetīti. Samudā caritvā paricayitvā. “Taṇhā
anya-e0401n:365_8: evā”ti kāmataṇhā eva. “Attani cā”ti diṭṭhiyañcāti adhippāyo. “Attano ārammaṇesū”ti
anya-e0401n:365_9: atta jīva lokādīsu diṭṭhiyāgahitā rammaṇesu. “Assādana khamanarocanabhūtāyā”ti sādhuvatāyaṃ
anya-e0401n:365_10: mamadassananti evaṃ rajjana tussana kantibhūtāya. “Upādānīyassā”ti daḷhaṃ gahetabbassa.
anya-e0401n:365_11: “Atthassā”ti attano attādikassa atthassa. Gāthāyaṃ.“Bhavaṃ hotī”ti bhavanto vaḍḍhanto
anya-e0401n:366_0: “Addhānavante dhamme”ti tekālikasaṅkhata dhamme. Apatamāne katvāti pāṭhaseso. Yathā
anya-e0401n:366_1: upādānaṃti disvā upādārūpaṃti pade ādāsaddo viññāyati. Na upubba padasaddo. Itarathā
anya-e0401n:366_2: upādānanti nasijjhati. Evaṃ addhā, addhāna, padesupi. Tenāha “addhānaṃ”ti nasijjhatīti.
anya-e0401n:366_3: Saṃkhipanti vīsatākārā etesūti saṅkhepā. Saṅgahā. “Vaṭṭadhammā”ti saṅkhārādayo dhammā.
anya-e0401n:366_6: Tattha hetu ca desetabbo hoti. Itarathā issaranimmānadiṭṭhi ahetuka diṭṭhīnaṃ okāso
anya-e0401n:366_7: siyāti. Phalañca desetabbaṃ hoti. Itarathā ucchedadiṭṭhiyā okāso siyāti. “Addhuno”ti
anya-e0401n:366_8: dīghakālassa. “Nivattetī”ti samucchindati. “Ahetū apaccayā sattā pavattantī”ti pubbaheturahitā
anya-e0401n:366_9: pubbapaccayarahitā hutvā imesattā pavattanti. “Avijjādīhi sādhetabbo na hotī”ti bhavaparamparāsu
anya-e0401n:366_10: nicco hutvā sandhāvantassa avijjādīhi kattabba kiccaṃ na hotīti adhippāyo. “Kesañci
anya-e0401n:366_11: na sambhavantiyevā”ti anāgāmīnaṃ arahantānañca na sambhavantiyeva. Mahāādīnavarāsidassanatthaṃ
anya-e0401n:366_12: sokādivacanaṃ hotīti yojanā. “Tesaṃ”ti aññesaṃ paccayānaṃ. “Laddhā”ti atthato laddhā.
anya-e0401n:366_13: “Tadavinābhāvibhāvalakkhaṇenā”ti ettha tena tena paccayena avinābhāvīnaṃ bhāvo, so
anya-e0401n:366_14: eva lakkhaṇanti viggaho. “Parattha pī”ti ito paresu taṇhupādāna bhavaggahaṇenātiādīsupi.
anya-e0401n:366_17: saddhiṃ dutīyassa saṅkhepassa ekā sandhītiādinā yojetabbaṃ. “Lokassa pākaṭa vohārenā”ti
anya-e0401n:366_18: kilesadhammā kammadhammā ca loke hetūti pākaṭā honti. Vipākadhammā pana phalanti
anya-e0401n:366_19: pākaṭā. Evaṃ loke pākaṭa vohārena. Idha pana kilesadhammakammadhammā vā hontu, vipākadhammā
anya-e0401n:366_20: vā, yo yo paccayapakkhe ṭhito, so so hetūtipi vattabboyeva. Yo yo paccayuppanna pakkhe
anya-e0401n:366_21: ṭhito, so so phalantidassento “hetuphalasaddāpanā”tiādimāha. Aṭṭhakathā pāṭhe. “Sajjantassā”ti
anya-e0401n:366_22: saṃvidahantassa. “Āyūhana saṅkhārā nāmā”tiādito paṭṭhāya samuccayanasaṅkhārā nāma.
anya-e0401n:366_23: “Dakkhiṇaṃ”ti dānavatthuṃ. Dakkhiṇodakaṃ vā. “Ettha cā”ti imasmiṃ tatīyapañcake ca.
anya-e0401n:366_25: paccayacetanā bhavo nāmā”ti idaṃ uddesapāḷiyaṃ yathādiṭṭhapāṭhavaseneva vuttaṃ. Tathā
anya-e0401n:366_26: purimakammabhavasmiṃ idha paṭisandhiyā paccayacetanā saṅkhārā nāmāti idañca. Idha
anya-e0401n:366_27: pana pubbeyeva dvīsuhetupañcakesu dvinnaṃ saṅkhāra kammabhavānaṃ saṅgahitattā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
anya-e0401n:366_28: vuttanayeneva dvinnaṃ saṅkhāra kammabhavānaṃ viseso yutto. Tenāha “taṃ idha na yujjatī”ti.
anya-e0401n:366_30: vibhaṅge bhavapade upapattibhavassapi vibhattattā evaṃ vibhattassa dhammavibhāgassa
anya-e0401n:366_31: rakkhaṇatthaṃ. Phalapañcakato anaññaṃpi upapattibhavaṃ aññaṃviya katvā ‘upapattibhavasaṅkhāto
anya-e0401n:366_32: bhavekadeso’ti vuttaṃ. So ca upapattibhavo nāma paccuppannahetūhi nibbattattā catutthe
anya-e0401n:366_33: phalapañcake eva saṅgahito. Tasmā tena upapattibhavasaddena catuttha pañcakameva
anya-e0401n:366_34: gahitanti yuttaṃ. Itarathā dve phalapañcakāni vipākavaṭṭanti vutte siddhameva hoti.
anya-e0401n:366_35: Evañcasati avasesā cāti ettha dutīyaphalapañcakameva avasiṭṭhaṃ hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:366_36: “Avijjā nāma moho, so ca akusala mūla”ntiādi abhidhamme mūlayamake mūlanāmena āgatattā
anya-e0401n:366_37: vuttaṃ. Dvīsupanabhava cakkesu purimacakke avijjā ādi hoti. Pacchimacakke taṇhā.
anya-e0401n:366_38: Ādi ca nāma mūlanti ca sīsanti ca vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti pariyāyaṃ dassetuṃ “athavā”tiādi
anya-e0401n:366_39: vuttaṃ.“Āgamanasambhāresū”ti atītabhavato imaṃbhavaṃ āgamanasambhāresu. Taṇhā eva
anya-e0401n:366_40: sīsaṃ katvā vuttāti yojanā. “Tesaṃ antare”ti avijjāsaṅkhārānaṃ antare. Taṇhāya okāso
anya-e0401n:366_41: natthīti kasmā vuttaṃ. Nanu avijjāya sati, taṇhā nāma ekantena sambhavatiyeva. Sā
anya-e0401n:366_42: ca saṅkhārānaṃ balavapaccayo hoti. Tasmā sā avijjā paccayā taṇhā, taṇhā paccayā saṅkhārāti
anya-e0401n:366_43: vattabbā siyāti. Taṃ pariharituṃ “ayañhī”tiādivuttaṃ. Paṭilomapaṭiccasamuppādo nāma
anya-e0401n:366_46: vacananti katvā vuttaṃ. “Uparivaṭṭamūla dhammappaṭipādakānaṃ”ti upari dutiyānāgatabhāvādīsu
anya-e0401n:366_47: avijjātaṇhā saṅkhātānaṃ vaṭṭamūladhammānaṃ niyojakānaṃ. “Te pī”ti sokādayo dukkhadhammāpi.
anya-e0401n:366_52: nānābyasanehi phuṭṭhassa, vihiṃsitassa. “Yato”ti yaṃ kāraṇā, avijjātaṇhānaṃ vaḍḍhanakāraṇā.
anya-e0401n:366_53: “Vaṭṭaṃ”ti saṅkhārādikaṃ bhavacakkaṃ. Saṃmuyhanaṃ sammoho. Pariyesanaṃ pariyeṭṭhi.
anya-e0401n:366_54: Vipaccatīti vipāko. Vipāko eva vepakkaṃ. Sammoho vepakkaṃ assāti sammohavepakkaṃ.
anya-e0401n:366_55: Tathā pariyeṭṭhive pakkañcāti imamatthaṃ dasseti “tadubhayaṃ”tiādinā. Tadubhayaṃ
anya-e0401n:366_56: vipākaṃ etassāti katvā dukkhaṃ sammohavepakkanti ca pariyeṭṭhivepakkanti ca vuccatīti
anya-e0401n:366_57: yojanā. Api ca, sammohaṃ vipāceti sañjanetīti sammoha vepakkaṃ. Evaṃ pariyeṭṭhivepakkantipi
anya-e0401n:366_58: yujjati. “Kicchaṃ”ti kasiraṃ dukkhaṃ āpanno. “Miyyatī”ti marati. “Ca vatī”ti saṅkamati.
anya-e0401n:366_59: “Upapajjatī”ti bhavantaraṃ upeti. “Atha ca panā”ti evaṃbhūtassa sato. “Jarāmaraṇassā”ti
anya-e0401n:366_60: jarāmaraṇa saṅkhātassa imassa dukkhassāti sambandho. “Nissaraṇaṃ”ti niggamanaṃ. “Nappajānātī”ti
anya-e0401n:366_61: ayaṃ loko nappajānāti. “Āgatiyā”ti imasmiṃ bhave paṭisandhiviññāṇuppattivasena āgamanena.
anya-e0401n:366_62: “Gatiyā cā”ti anāgatabhave jātipātubbhāvavasena gamanena ca. Ādisaṅkhāto pubbapariyanto
anya-e0401n:366_63: yassa atthītiādimantaṃ. Na ādimantaṃ anādimantaṃ. “Vaṭṭappavattassā”ti tividhavaṭṭasaṅkhātassa
anya-e0401n:366_64: pabandhappavattassa. Jātiyā vuttāya sabbāni tassā nidānāni vuttāni eva hontīti katvā
anya-e0401n:366_65: “jātiyā eva vā”ti vuttaṃ. “Iccevaṃ”ti iti evaṃ. Tattha avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārātiādinā
anya-e0401n:366_66: nayena paṭṭhapesi mahāmunīti sambandho. Ācariya vādepana “iccevaṃ”ti jarāmaraṇa mucchāyātiādinānayena.
anya-e0401n:366_67: Ābandhaṃ anādikanti sambandho. Idhapi tameva sambandhaṃ gahetvā yojeti “iccevaṃ ābandhanti.
anya-e0401n:366_68: La. Punappunaṃ ābandhaṃ”ti. Avijjā ādimhi vuttā. Tasmā sā sayaṃ ahetu apaccayā hutvā
anya-e0401n:366_69: vaṭṭassa ādipaccayabhūtā hotīti codanā. Taṃ pariharati “vaṭṭassā”tiādinā. “Vaṭṭakathāya
anya-e0401n:366_70: sīsabhūtattā”ti vaṭṭassa ādināma natthi. Tassa pana pavatti nivattiyo atthi. Jānantehi
anya-e0401n:366_71: tāsaṃ pakāsanatthāya paṭiccasamuppādakathānāma vaṭṭakathā ekantena kathetabbā hoti.
anya-e0401n:366_72: Kathentehi ca vaṭṭadhammānaṃ majjhe katamassa dhammassa kiccaṃ vaṭṭappavattatthāya
anya-e0401n:366_73: padhānataraṃ hotīti jānitabbaṃ hoti. Tadā kiccavasena padhānataraṃ ekaṃ dhammaṃ mūlaṃ
anya-e0401n:366_74: sīsaṃ katvā vaṭṭakathā kathetabbāti. Idaṃ vaṭṭakathāya sīsaṃ nāma. Tattha avijjā
anya-e0401n:366_75: nāma moho. So ca muyhanakiriyā. Andhabhāvakaraṇañcassa kiccaṃ. Na ca paññā cakkhussa
anya-e0401n:366_76: andhabhāvakaraṇa sadisaṃ aññaṃ vaṭṭassa pavattatthāya padhānakiccaṃ nāma atthi. Tasmā
anya-e0401n:366_77: avijjā evettha sabbappadhāna kiccattā vaṭṭakathāya sīsabhūtā hoti. Evaṃ vaṭṭakathāya
anya-e0401n:366_78: sīsabhūtattā sā ādimhi vuttāti. “Anādikabhāvo eva dassito”ti anādikabhāvo dassito
anya-e0401n:366_79: eva. No na dassitoti attho. Iti etaṃ atthajātaṃ paccakkhato siddhaṃ. “Idhā”ti imasmiṃbhave.
anya-e0401n:366_80: “Tassā”ti atīta bhavapariyāpannāya avijjāya. “Aññāya avijjāya evā”ti atītabhavatopi
anya-e0401n:366_81: purimabhave siddhāya aññāya avijjāya eva. “Tassāpī”ti purimatarabhave avijjāyapi.
anya-e0401n:366_83: andhabhāvakaraṇa kiccattā vaṭṭappavattiyā padhāna paccayabhūtā hoti. Evaṃ padhānapaccayabhūtattā.
anya-e0401n:366_84: “Tassa tassāti niṭṭhānameva na paññāyeyyā”ti tassa paccayassa paccayo vattabbo. Tassapi
anya-e0401n:366_85: paccayassa paccayo vattabboti evaṃ vassasatampi vassasahassaṃpi niṭṭhānameva na paññāyeyya.
anya-e0401n:366_87: dhammā avijjāya āhāroti vacanīyaṃ bhaveyya. Tattha “āhāro”ti balavapaccayo vuccatīti.
anya-e0401n:368_0: 167. Paṭṭhānanaye. “Hetu ca so paccayo cā”ti ettha lobho hetujātikattā hetu ca hoti.
anya-e0401n:368_1: Ārammaṇānantarādi paccayena aññadhammassa paccayo ca hotīti atthassa sambhavato “hetu
anya-e0401n:368_2: hutvā paccayo”ti vaṇṇeti. Evaṃ vaṇṇitepi “hetu hutvā paccayo”ti hetu honto paccayoti
anya-e0401n:368_3: atthe sati, so yevattho sambhavatīti “puna hetubhāvena paccayo”ti vaṇṇeti. Ettha
anya-e0401n:368_4: siyā, hetu ca so paccayo cāti ettha pada dvayaṃ ekadhammādhikaraṇattā tulyādhikaraṇaṃ
anya-e0401n:368_5: hoti. Hetubhāvena paccayoti ettha pana padadvayaṃ tulyādhikaraṇaṃ na hoti. Purima
anya-e0401n:368_6: padañhi dhamma bhāvappadhānaṃ, pacchimaṃ dhammappadhānanti. Evaṃ sante tulyādhikaraṇaṃ
anya-e0401n:368_7: vākyaṃ bhinnādhikaraṇaṃ katvā vaṇṇetīti na yuttametanti. No na yuttaṃ. Mukhyopacāramattena
anya-e0401n:368_8: nānatthattā. Pacchimavākyaṃhi mukhyavacanaṃ. Purimavākyaṃ upacāra vacanaṃ. Upacāravacane
anya-e0401n:368_9: ca upacārattho yujjati. Mukhyavacane mukhyatthoti. “Heṭṭhāvuttamevā”ti pakiṇṇakasaṅgahe
anya-e0401n:368_10: vuttameva. Hinonti etthāti hetu. Hinonti etenāti hetu. Tattha “hinontī”ti suṭṭhupatiṭṭhahanti.
anya-e0401n:368_11: Ke patiṭṭhahantīti āha “sahajāta dhammā”ti. Kathañca suṭṭhupatiṭṭhahantīti āha “vuddhi
anya-e0401n:368_12: viruḷhi vepullapattavasenā”ti. Kasmā te suṭṭhu patiṭṭhahantīti. Patiṭṭhitaṭṭhānassa
anya-e0401n:368_13: patiṭṭhitakāraṇassa vā thāmabalasampannattāti dassetuṃ “ārammaṇe daḷhanipātinā thāmabalasampannenā”ti
anya-e0401n:368_14: vuttaṃ. Hetuvisesanañcetaṃ. Ārammaṇe daḷhanipātimhi thāmabalasampanne ettha dhammetipi
anya-e0401n:368_15: yojetabbaṃ. Upakārakoti ca upaladdhiyevāti sambandho. “Yādisenasabhāvenā”ti hetubhāvādisabhāvena.
anya-e0401n:368_16: “Upaladdhiyevā”ti kasmā vuttaṃ. Nanu upakāraka saddo kattāraṃ vā kāretāraṃ vā vadatīti.
anya-e0401n:368_17: Vohāramattena vadati. Dhammato pana kattā vā kāretā vā natthīti dassetuṃ “na hi sabhāva
anya-e0401n:368_18: dhammesū”tiādimāha. Yadi dhammato kattāvā kāretāvā natthi. Kasmā upakārakoti vuccatīti
anya-e0401n:370_1: vā garukatā. “Sāmino viya dāse”ti sāmino attanodāse attanovase vattayamānā viya.
anya-e0401n:370_2: Sahajātādhipati pana heṭṭhā samuccaya saṅgahe vuttoti idha na vutto.
anya-e0401n:371_2: nāmakkhandha dhammantarassa. “Anantara paccayatā”ti anantarapaccaya kiccanti vuttaṃ
anya-e0401n:371_3: hoti. Yaṃ kiñci dhammantaraṃ. “Purimapacchimabhāgappavattānaṃ”ti nirodhassa asaññībhavassa
anya-e0401n:371_4: ca purimabhāge ca pacchimabhāge ca pavattānaṃ. “Cittuppādānaṃ pī”ti nirodhassa pubbabhāge
anya-e0401n:371_5: nevasaññānāsaññāyatana kusala kriya cittuppādānaṃ. Pacchābhāge anāgāmiphala arahattaphalacittuppādānaṃ.
anya-e0401n:371_6: Asaññībhavassa pubbabhāge kāmabhave cuti cittuppādānaṃ. Pacchābhāge kāmabhave eva
anya-e0401n:371_7: paṭisandhi cittuppādānaṃ. Tesu pana kathaṃ anantaraṃ nāma siyā. Dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ purimabhāga
anya-e0401n:371_8: pacchima bhāgānaṃ majjhe acittakassa kālassa acittakassa rūpasantānassa ca antarikattāti
anya-e0401n:371_9: codanā. Taṃ pariharituṃ “na hi abhāvabhūto”tiādi vuttaṃ. “Tesaṃ”ti dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ
anya-e0401n:371_10: cittuppādānaṃ. Rūpadhammo antaraṃ na ca karoti nāma. Arūpadhammānaṃ anantaratā nāmātiādinā
anya-e0401n:371_11: yojanā hoti. “Tathāpavattana samatthatā”ti ekībhūtānaṃ viya attano anantare dhammantaraṃ
anya-e0401n:372: Sahajātapaccaye. “Ye pana dhammā”ti paccayuppanna dhammā. “Attanī”ti paccaya dhammo vuccati.
anya-e0401n:373_0: “Aññamaññaṃ upatthambhantaṃ tidaṇḍaṃ viyā”ti bhūmiyaṃ aññamaññaṃ nissāya ussitā tayodaṇḍā
anya-e0401n:373_1: aññamaññaṃ upatthambhantā viya. “Purimenā”ti purimena sahajāta paccayena. “Itarītaro
anya-e0401n:374_3: bhusaṃ kato. Tenāha “suṭṭhukato”ti. Karaṇañca attano santāne suṭṭhuuppādanañca suṭṭhuupasevanañca
anya-e0401n:375_0: “Nissayārammaṇa dhammā evā”ti nissaya paccaya dhamma ārammaṇa paccaya dhammā eva.
anya-e0401n:375_2: nāma natthīti dasseti. Visuṃ purejātasatti nāma atthītipi vadanti. Taṃ vādaṃ dassetuṃ
anya-e0401n:375_3: “ācariyānandattherenā”tiādimāha. Ettha pañcavatthūni ca pañcārammaṇāni ca purejātattā
anya-e0401n:375_4: eva suṭṭhubalavatāya pañcaviññāṇānaṃ vatthu kicca ārammaṇa kiccāni sādhenti. Tathā
anya-e0401n:375_5: hadayavatthu ca manodhātu manoviññāṇadhātū nanti. Ayaṃ visuṃ purejātasatti visesoti
anya-e0401n:375_6: vadeyya. Saccaṃ. Suddhamano dvārepana idha ṭhatvā nirayesu evarūpāni nirayaggirūpāni
anya-e0401n:375_7: atthi. Idāni devesu ca evarūpāni dibbarūpāni atthīti cintayantānampi, tesu pure evarūpāni
anya-e0401n:375_8: uppajjiṃsūti vā, tesu anāgate evarūpāni uppajjissantīti vā cintayantānaṃpitāni rūpāni
anya-e0401n:375_9: nibbisesāni hutvā manoviññāṇānaṃ ārammaṇa paccayattaṃ gacchanti. Tattha pure jātāni
anya-e0401n:375_10: hutvā tadā vijjamānāni paccuppannarūpāni ārammaṇa purejātapaccayo. Itarāni ārammaṇa
anya-e0401n:375_11: paccayo eva. Na cettha purejātānaṃ paccuppannarūpānaṃ purejātattena viseso atthi.
anya-e0401n:375_12: Na ca tāni purejātapaccayo na honti. Yadi visuṃ purejātasattiviseso purejātapaccayoti
anya-e0401n:375_13: vadeyya. Tāni purejātapaccayo nāma na bhaveyyuṃ. Kasmā, tādisassa visesassa natthitāya.
anya-e0401n:375_14: Na ca nabhavanti. Kasmā, purejātamattavisesassa atthitāya. Ettha vadeyyuṃ, pañcadvāresu
anya-e0401n:375_15: pana pubbe vuttanayena visuṃ purejātasattiviseso dissatīti. Kiñcāpidissati. So pana
anya-e0401n:375_16: bahuvidhānaṃ nissaya paccaya ārammaṇapaccayānaṃ majjhe nissaya sattiviseso eva, ārammaṇa
anya-e0401n:375_17: sattiviseso eva cāti. Api ca visuṃ purejāta sattiviseso nāma natthīti idaṃ yathāvutte
anya-e0401n:375_18: suddhamanodvāre tabbisesābhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Visuṃ purejāta sattiviseso nāma
anya-e0401n:375_19: atthīti idaṃ pañcadvāresu tabbisesassa atthibhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttanti. Yaṃ ruccati, taṃ gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:376_0: Pacchājātapaccaye. “Rukkhapotakānaṃ viyā”ti pacchā āsiñciyamānaṃ udakaṃ rukkhapotakānaṃ
anya-e0401n:376_1: vuddhaviruḷhabhāvaṃ pāpetvā upatthambhanavasena upakārako viyāti yojanā. Āhāraṃ āsiṃ
anya-e0401n:376_2: satīti āhārāsā. Jighacchā, pipāsā, taṇhā. Tāya sampayuttā cetanāti viggaho. Sā pana
anya-e0401n:376_4: vutto ayamattho. Sabbācesāvicāraṇā gijjhopamāya upamāmattabhāvaṃ nīvāretā hotīti.
anya-e0401n:377_0: Āsevanti taṃ paccaya dhammaṃ paccayuppannā dhammāti āsevanaṃ. Etena bhuso paccayuppanna
anya-e0401n:377_1: dhammehi āsevitabbattā āsevananti vuccatīti dassetīti. “Taṃ”ti taṃ purimaṃ purimaṃ
anya-e0401n:377_2: paccaya dhammaṃ. “Bhajantī”ti upenti. Ke bhajantīti āha “aparāparaṃ uppajjamānā dhammā”ti.
anya-e0401n:377_3: “Dhammā”ti ca anantaruppannā cittacetasikā dhammā. Kathañca taṃ tebhajantīti āha
anya-e0401n:377_4: “suṭṭhusevamānā viya bhajamānā viya pavattantī”ti. Viya saddena loke kiñcijanaṃ kecijanā
