anya-e0401n:377_5: kenaci atthena suṭṭhusevantā viyāti dasseti. Kathaṃ suṭṭhuseviyamānā viya hontīti
anya-e0401n:377_6: āha “tassa purimassā”tiādiṃ. Purimassa anantarassa cittuppādassāti attho. “Sabbaparipūraṃ
anya-e0401n:377_7: ākāraṃ”ti javavegasahitehi vijānana phusanādīhi sāvajjāna vajjādīhi ca sabbehi javanaguṇehi
anya-e0401n:377_8: paripūraṃ ākāraṃ. “Āsevetī”ti maṃ suṭṭhu sevathāti niyojentaṃ viya hoti. Tenāha “attano
anya-e0401n:377_9: vāsaṃ”tiādiṃ. Tattha “vāsaṃ”ti vāsanaṃ. “Suṭṭhu gāhāpetī”ti paripuṇṇaṃ detīti vuttaṃ
anya-e0401n:377_10: hoti. Etena yathā loke eko paresaṃ yathicchitaṃ deti. Evaṃ dentaṃ pana pare bhajantiyeva.
anya-e0401n:377_11: Maṃ bhajathāti niyojanakiccaṃ natthi. Evameva idhapi suṭṭhuvāsadānameva bhajāpanaṃ
anya-e0401n:377_12: nāmāti dasseti. “Vaḍḍheti vā”ti etena āsevanā bhāvanā vaḍḍhanāti imaṃpariyāyatthaṃ
anya-e0401n:377_13: vadati. Purimābhiyogo nāma ādito paṭṭhāya sajjhāyanādikammesu yathāsatti yathābalaṃ
anya-e0401n:377_14: vā yāmakaraṇaṃ. Tathā karontassa taṃ uggahaṇa kammaṃ uparūpari paguṇabhāvaṃ gacchatīti.
anya-e0401n:378_4: tassa kāyaṅgādikassa abhisaṅkharaṇavegena janitaṃ kiriyāvisesa nidhānakiccanti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:379_0: Vipaccanabhāvo ca nāma pātubhāvoti sambandho. Nirussāha santabhāvo nāma kusalā kusalānaṃ
anya-e0401n:379_1: viya kāyaṅgavācaṅgābhisaṅkharaṇa kiccesu ca āyatiṃ vipaccana kiccesu ca nirussāhabhāvena
anya-e0401n:379_2: santabhāvo. Na kilesu pasantabhāvena. Cittābhisaṅkharaṇa kiccesupana sampayuttacetanāvasena
anya-e0401n:379_3: yathopaṭṭhitesu ārammaṇesu sampayuttadhammānaṃ ekato sannipātagamanussāhamattaṃ atthi.
anya-e0401n:379_4: Tatoparaṃ pana supina dassana kiccaṃpi natthīti. “Mandamandākārenā”ti mandato atimandākārena.
anya-e0401n:379_5: Kiñcijānana cittaṃ nāma kammādi ārammaṇaṃ appamattakaṃpi jānanaṃ vīthicittaṃ. Tassa pavattiyā.
anya-e0401n:380: “Arūpino”ti arūpalakkhaṇa samaṅgino. Nāmalakkhaṇa samaṅgīnoti vuttaṃ hoti. “Janayantāpī”ti sahajāta dhamme janentāpi. “Santānaṭṭhitiyā”ti pabandhappatiṭṭhānassa.
anya-e0401n:381_1: imasmiṃ indriyapaccaye. Kasmā na gahitaṃ. Nanu itthiliṅgādīnaṃ pavattikāraṇattā idha
anya-e0401n:381_2: gahetabbamevāti adhippāyo. Janakattaṃ nāma janaka kiccaṃ. Evaṃ sesesupi. “Etaṃtayaṃpi
anya-e0401n:381_3: natthī”ti janakattādikiccattayaṃpi natthi. Evaṃsantekathaṃ liṅgādīnaṃ pavattikāraṇaṃ
anya-e0401n:381_4: hotītiāha “kevalaṃ panā”tiādiṃ. “Dvayaṃ”ti itthibhāvapumbhāva dvayaṃ. Na indriya
anya-e0401n:381_5: paccayattena indriyaṃ nāma hoti. Yathāhi eko rājā attano vijite gehāni karonti. Evaṃ
anya-e0401n:381_6: karontūti gehasaṇṭhānaṃ paṭṭhapeti. Sabbejanā tatheva karonti, no aññathā. Tattha
anya-e0401n:381_7: rājā gehuppattiyā ca gehaṭṭhitiyā ca kiñci kiccaṃ na karoti. Gehasāmikāvā gehavaḍḍhakino
anya-e0401n:381_8: vā karonti. Karontā pana raññā paṭṭhapitaṃ saṇṭhānaṃ anatikkamitvāva karonti. Evameva
anya-e0401n:381_9: midaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Upagantvā jhāyanaṭṭhenāti sambandho. Upasaddo upanissaya padeviya
anya-e0401n:381_10: upari attho. “Uparī”ti ca thāmabalavuddhivasenāti āha “tasmiṃ vā”tiādiṃ. “Tasmiṃ”ti ārammaṇe.
anya-e0401n:382_0: “Sugati duggati nibbāna sampāpakaṭṭhenā”ti vuttaṃ. So attho abyākatamaggaṅgesu natthi.
anya-e0401n:382_1: Evañcasati tāni kathaṃ maggapaccayattaṃ gacchantīti āha “ettha cā”tiādiṃ. “Sammādassanādinā”ti
anya-e0401n:382_2: sammādassana saṅkappanādinā. “Tesaṃ”ti sammādiṭṭhīnaṃ. “Tesaṃ pī”ti abyākata bhūtānaṃ
anya-e0401n:382_4: sugati nibbāna sampāpakaṭṭhene vāti attho. Evañcasati sahetukā vipāka kriyā byākatadhammāpi
anya-e0401n:382_5: tenevaṭṭhena sabbaso kusalasadisā siyunti. Na siyuṃ, paccaya vekallattā. Vipākābyākatāhi
anya-e0401n:382_6: kammavegena santāne patitamattattā nirussāhasantasabhāvato taṃ sampayuttā cetanā
anya-e0401n:382_7: nānakkhaṇika kammapaccayattaṃ na gacchati. Kiriyābyākatā ca niranusayasantāne uppannattā
anya-e0401n:382_8: taṃ sampayuttacetanāpi tappaccayattaṃ na gacchatiyeva. Tasmā tesu vipāka kriyābyākatesu
anya-e0401n:382_9: sammādiṭṭhādīnipi sugati sampāpakaṭṭhaṃ na sādhenti. Kilesappahāna kiccassa abhāvato
anya-e0401n:382_10: nibbāna sampāpakaṭṭhampi nasādhenti. Sabhāva lakkhaṇavekallatāpana tesaṃ sammādiṭṭhādīnaṃ
anya-e0401n:382_11: natthiyeva. Tasmā tāni maggapaccaye saṅgahitānīti. Indriya dhammesu arūpindriyānaṃ
anya-e0401n:382_12: ādhippacca kiccaṃ arūpadhamme sveva pharati. Rūpadhammā pana taṃ samuṭṭhitattā eva
anya-e0401n:382_13: tappaccayuppannesu vuttā. Tathā hetu kamma magga jhānesu. Tena vuttaṃ “esanayo kammindriyajhānapaccayesupī”ti.
anya-e0401n:383_0: “Sampayuttāsaṅkā sambhavatī”ti sahajātā nāmadhammā taṃ samuṭṭhāna rūpehi, pacchājātā
anya-e0401n:383_1: ca attano attano paccayuppannarūpehi, vatthu dhammā ca tannissitanāmadhammehi kālato
anya-e0401n:383_2: ca ṭhānato ca eka sambandhattā tesu sampayuttāsaṅkā sambhavati. “Vippayuttapaccayappasaṅgo
anya-e0401n:383_3: natthī”ti ārammaṇānantarādipaccayāpi attano paccayuppannehi sampayuttā na honti.
anya-e0401n:383_4: Tasmā tepi vippayuttapaccaya bhāvena vattabbāti evarūpo vippayuttapaccayappasaṅgo
anya-e0401n:384_0: “Heṭṭhāvuttappakāresu evā”ti ettha evasaddena paccayantaraṃ na hotīti dasseti. Yadi
anya-e0401n:384_1: paccayantaraṃ na hoti, na vattabboyeva. Kasmā, desakassa punaruttiniratthakavāditā
anya-e0401n:384_2: pattitoti. No na vattabbo. Kasmā, loke yo sayaṃ natthi, vigato hoti. So kassa paccayo
anya-e0401n:384_3: bhavituṃ arahatīti evarūpassa micchābhinivesassa pahānato. Tena imamatthaṃ ñāpeti,
anya-e0401n:384_4: loke kecidhammā sayaṃ atthikāle eva aññesaṃ paccayā honti, no natthikāle. Keci dhammā
anya-e0401n:384_5: sayaṃ natthikāle eva aññesaṃ paccayā honti, no atthikāleti ayañcavibhāgo avassaṃ
anya-e0401n:384_6: icchitabbo yevāti. “Okāsadānasaṅkhātenā”ti tassa aññassa cittuppādassa uppattiyā
anya-e0401n:385_0: Suttante, atthīti aya meko antoti sattānaṃ seṭṭhasārabhūto attānāma anamatagge saṃsāre
anya-e0401n:385_1: niccakālaṃ atthi. Ucchedo vā vimokkho vā sabbaso natthi. Ayaṃ sassatavādo nāma ekovisamanto
anya-e0401n:385_2: ekāvisamākoṭi. Natthīti sattonāma ekabhavaparamo hoti, maraṇato paraṃ natthi. Ekantena
anya-e0401n:385_3: ucchijjati. Ayaṃ ucchedavādo nāma dutīyo visamanto dutīyāvisamakoṭi. Ime paṭicca
anya-e0401n:385_4: samuppādaṃ ajānantānaṃ ubhovisamantā nāma. Jānantānaṃ pana tādiso attānāma natthi,
anya-e0401n:385_5: yo atthīti vā natthīti vā vattabbo bhaveyya. Suddhadhammappabandho eva atthi. Tassa
anya-e0401n:385_6: ca yāva avijjā appahīnā hoti, tāva ucchedo nāma natthi. Avijjāya pana pahīnāya tatoparaṃ
anya-e0401n:385_7: na pavattati. Atthi nāma na hoti. Ayaṃ antadvayamutto majjhimañāyo nāma. Bahuṃ nānattha
anya-e0401n:385_8: sambhavaṃ vaṇṇentiyeva. Vaṇṇentānaṃpi tesaṃ bahu payojanaṃ natthi yevāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:387_2: koci cittuppādo aviruddhassa yassa kassaci cittuppādassa paccayo na na hotīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:387_3: “Punuppannānaṃ”ti nirujjhitvā puna uppannānaṃ. “Purimāni javanānī”ti ettha maggo
anya-e0401n:387_4: gotrabhuto āsevana paccayaṃ labhati. Phalassa pana so bhinnajātikattā āsevana paccayo
anya-e0401n:387_5: na hoti. Phalaṃ pana sabbaso āsevana muttaṃ hoti. Tasmā tadubhayaṃ idha purimajavanasaṅkhyaṃ
anya-e0401n:387_6: na gacchatīti vuttaṃ “magga phalajavanavajjānī”ti. Phalajavanavajjānaṃ pacchimānaṃ
anya-e0401n:387_8: Abhinnā eva siyuṃ. Na pana bhinnā honti. Kadāci kecibhinnā eva honti. Tasmā bhinnajātikā
anya-e0401n:387_9: dhammā. La. Na sakkontīti yojanā. “Kāmāvacarabhāvato mahaggatānuttarabhāvapatti nāmā”ti
anya-e0401n:387_10: cittasantānassāti adhippāyo. Gotra bhucittaṃ kāmabhūmi. Jhānacittaṃ mahaggatabhūmi.
anya-e0401n:387_11: Maggacittaṃ lokuttara bhūmi. Kammacetanāya niruddhāyapi tassā pavattākāro nanirujjhati.
anya-e0401n:387_12: Cittasantānaṃ anugacchati. So eva āyatiṃ vipākadhammarāsi hutvā pātubbhavati. Tasmā
anya-e0401n:387_13: so vipākassa bījasaṅkhyaṃ gacchati. So ca yāva na vipaccati. Tāva saṃsārappavattiyā
anya-e0401n:387_14: sati, antarā vinaṭṭho nāma na hoti. Tasmā kammacetanā uppajjamānā cittasantāne tassa
anya-e0401n:387_15: bījassa nidhānatthāya uppajjati, nirujjhamānā ca nidahitvā eva nirujjhatīti vuttaṃ
anya-e0401n:387_17: hoti. Purejātā sālarukkhapotakā paccayā hontīti sambandho. Purimacittakkhaṇesu uppannā
anya-e0401n:387_19: “Pacchā jātenā”ti pacchājātapaccayena payojanaṃ natthi. Jiṇṇapatarukkhassa udakāsiñcanaṃ
anya-e0401n:387_20: viya hotīti adhippāyo. “Yadaggenā”ti yenakāraṇa koṭṭhāsena. “Vatthu rūpaṃ”ti nirodhāsannaṃ
anya-e0401n:387_21: hadayavatthu rūpaṃ. “Evamayaṃ pī”ti evaṃ ayaṃ pacchājātapaccayopi. Vividhena ākārena
anya-e0401n:387_22: pharaṇaṃ kālantara desantara gamanaṃ vipphāro. Mahanto vipphāro yassāti samāso. “Vatthumhī”ti
anya-e0401n:387_23: hadayavatthumhi. Pañcahi khandhehi vokiṇṇo sammissoti pañcavokāro. Kāma rūpabhavo.
anya-e0401n:387_24: Vinā uppajjituṃ na sakkoti. Rūpavirāgabhāvanābalena rūpassa avikkhambhitattāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:387_25: “Purejātaṃ vā”ti ekacittakkhaṇātīte purejātaṃ vā. “Vaḍḍhanapakkhe ṭhitaṃ vā”ti tato
anya-e0401n:387_26: pacchā yāva aṭṭhama cittakkhaṇā vaḍḍhanapakkhe ṭhitaṃ vā. “Uppannaṃ vatthū”ti uppannaṃ
anya-e0401n:387_27: vatthurūpaṃ. “Etthā”ti imasmiṃ purejāta paccaye. Kiñcāpi dissatīti sambandho. “Paccanīye”ti
anya-e0401n:387_28: paccanīya vāre. “Taṃ”ti ārammaṇapurejātaṃ. Tassa ārammaṇassa aparibyattattāvāti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:387_29: Kāraṇaṃ vadanti paṭṭhānaṭīkācariyā. Arūpabhave maraṇāsannakāle kassaci gatinimittu
anya-e0401n:387_30: paṭṭhānaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu vuttameva. Evañcasati, tattha ārammaṇa purejātaṃ laddhabbameva.
anya-e0401n:387_31: Paṭṭhānepana tasmiṃbhave sabbaṃ purejātapaccayaṃ paṭikkhipati. Kasmā iti ce, vatthu
anya-e0401n:387_32: purejātapaccayassa tattha aladdhabbattāti iminā adhippāyena “āruppeviyā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:387_33: Ettha ca paṭṭhāne arūpabhave dvepi purejātapaccayā paṭikkhittā, tasmā sabbepi arūpa
anya-e0401n:387_34: puggalā sabbaṃpi rūpadhammaṃ ārammaṇaṃ na karontītipi vadanti. Evañca katvā ārammaṇa
anya-e0401n:387_35: saṅgahadīpaniyaṃ ‘asaññībhavato cutānaṃ viya arūpabhavato cutānaṃpi gatinimittabhūtaṃ
anya-e0401n:387_36: kāmapaṭisandhiyā ārammaṇaṃ bhavantare kenacidvārena aggahitaṃ, kevalaṃ kammabaleneva
anya-e0401n:387_37: upaṭṭhāpita’nti vuttaṃ. “Gūthakuṇapādīnī”ti gūthañca matapūtisarīrāni ca. “Evaṃ vuttehī”ti
anya-e0401n:387_38: paṭṭhāne vuttehi. Te pana akusalā dhammā kathaṃ catubhūmika kusalānaṃ upanissaya
anya-e0401n:387_39: paccayā hontīti āha “tattha ānantariya vajjānī”tiādiṃ. Tattha ānantariya kammakatānaṃ
anya-e0401n:387_40: kilesāvaraṇa kammāvaraṇehi samannāgatattā jhānamaggappaṭilābho nāma natthīti vuttaṃ
anya-e0401n:387_41: “ānantariya vajjānī”ti. “Tānī”ti rāgādīni akusalāni catubhūmika kusalānaṃ uppattiyā
anya-e0401n:387_42: balavanissayā hontīti yojanā. “Samatikkamamukhenā”ti paṭṭhāne akusalo dhammo kusalassa
anya-e0401n:387_43: dhammassa upanissaya paccayena paccayoti etassa pañhassa vibhaṅge pāṇaṃ hantvā tassa
anya-e0401n:387_44: paṭighā tatthāya dānaṃ deti, sīlaṃ samādiyati, uposathakammaṃ karoti, jhānaṃ uppādeti,
anya-e0401n:387_45: maggaṃ uppādeti, abhiññaṃ uppādetīti vuttaṃ. Tattha “tassa paṭighātatthāyā”ti tassa
anya-e0401n:387_46: pāṇātipātakammassa paṭihananatthāya pahānatthāya samatikkamanatthāyāti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:387_47: So ce pāṇātipātī puggalo puna saṃvegaṃ āpajjitvā tassa kammassa samatikkamanatthāya
anya-e0401n:387_48: dānaṃ deti, sīlaṃ samādiyati, uposatha kammaṃ karoti. Tadā taṃ pāṇāti pātakammaṃ
anya-e0401n:387_49: taṃ puggalaṃ dānakammeniyojeti nāma. Tathā sīlakamme uposatha kammeti. Yathāhi rājā
anya-e0401n:387_50: evaṃ vadeyya imasmiṃ divase yo uposathaṃ nupavasati, taṃ ghātessāmīti. Tadā sabbepi
anya-e0401n:387_51: nāgarā uposathaṃ upavaseyyuṃ. Evamidaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Rājāviya hi tassa pāṇātipātakammaṃ.
anya-e0401n:387_52: Nāgarā viya so pāṇaghātako. Uposatha kamma kusalāni viya tassa dānasīla uposatha
anya-e0401n:387_53: kamma kusalānīti. “Jhānaṃ uppādeti, maggaṃ uppādeti, abhiññaṃ uppādetī”ti padesupi
anya-e0401n:387_54: esevanayo. Evaṃ samatikkamamukhena ekaṃpi akusalaṃ sabbāni catubhūmika kusalāni upanissaya
anya-e0401n:387_55: sattiyā janeti pavattetīti veditabbaṃ. “Tāniyeva sabbānī”ti ānantariya kammasahitānisabbāni
anya-e0401n:387_56: akusalāniyeva sabbesaṃ akusalānaṃ abyākata dhammānaṃ uppattiyā balavanissayā hontīti
anya-e0401n:387_57: yojanā. Dānasīlādayo kusalā dhammā. Suṭṭhu balavaṃ kammaṃ adhippetaṃ, na dubbalaṃ.
anya-e0401n:387_58: Upanissayaṭṭhānattā. Tesaṃpi rūpadhammānaṃ balavanissayā nanuhontīti sambandho. Kathaṃ
anya-e0401n:387_60: bījāni rukkhatiṇādīnaṃ balavanissayā honti. Mūlabhesajjādīni ajjhattaṃ santānaṃ balavanissayā
anya-e0401n:387_61: hontīti yojanā. “Pakatassevā”ti pathamataraṃ katassa uppādanādikammasseva. “Na evaṃ
anya-e0401n:387_62: rūpasantānenā”ti evaṃ rūpasantānena uppāditā upasevitā dhammā natthi. “Taṃ”ti utubījādikaṃ.
anya-e0401n:387_63: Kammādikañca. “Pakataṃ”ti puretaraṃ uppāditañca upasevitañca. Sacetanasseva cetanaṃ
anya-e0401n:387_64: pakappanaṃ pakaraṇanti sambandho. Cetanaṃ pakappanaṃ pakaraṇaṃ nāmāti attho. “Pakappanaṃ”ti
anya-e0401n:387_65: ca saṃvidhānaṃ. “Kiñcī”ti kiñcikammādikaṃ utubhojanādikañca. Attano ca uppannā rāgādayo
anya-e0401n:387_66: parassa ca santāne parassa ca uppannā rāgādayo attano ca santāneti yojanā. “Nidassanaṃ”ti
anya-e0401n:387_67: udāharaṇaṃ hoti. Manopadosikadevā aññamaññaṃ disvā attano manaṃ padūsenti. Bāḷhaṃ
anya-e0401n:387_68: issādhammaṃ uppādenti. Tasmiṃyeva khaṇe cavanti. Tesaṃ dve issādhammā aññamaññassa
anya-e0401n:387_69: balavanissayā hontīti. Kāmāvacara kusalassa balavanissayā hontītiādinā yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:387_70: Vibhāvanipāṭhe. Jhāna magga phala vipassanādibhedaṃ ālambaṇaṃ paccavekkhana assādanādi
anya-e0401n:387_71: dhamme attādhīne karotīti yojanā. “Attādhīne”ti attāyatte attābaddhe. Paṭṭhāne pañhavāre
anya-e0401n:387_72: dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃsamādiyitvā uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati.
anya-e0401n:387_73: Pubbe suciṇṇāni garuṃ katvā paccavekkhantītiādinā āgatattādāna sīla. La. Nibbānāni
anya-e0401n:387_74: cevāti vuttaṃ. Rāgaṃ garuṃkatvā assādenti, abhinandatītiādinā, cakkhuṃ garuṃ katvā
anya-e0401n:387_75: assādentītiādinā ca āgatattā “rāga diṭṭhi cakkhu sotādīnicā”ti vuttaṃ. “Parattha
anya-e0401n:387_76: pī”ti parato nissaya paccayādīsupi. “So evā”ti paccupatthambhako eva. “Kiñcī”ti kiñcimattaṃpi.
anya-e0401n:387_77: Mahābhūte kiñci upatthambhetuṃ na sakkontīti yojanā. Nanu āhāra rūpaṃ mahābhūte upatthambhetuṃ
anya-e0401n:387_78: sakkoti. Jīvitarūpañca kammajamahābhūte anupāletunti. Saccaṃ. Idha pana sahajātapaccaya
anya-e0401n:387_79: kiccaṃ adhippetaṃ. Tesañca dvinnaṃ sahajātapaccaya kiccaṃ natthi. Taṃ parato āvī
anya-e0401n:387_80: bhavissatīti. “Vatthu vipākānaṃ”ti vatthurūpaṃ vipākānaṃ. Paṭṭhānapāṭhe. Ārammaṇañca,
anya-e0401n:387_81: nissayo ca, purejātañca, vippayutto ca, atthi ca, avigato cā,ti chasupaccayesu ghaṭitesu
anya-e0401n:387_82: tīṇi visajjanāni labbhantīti yojanā. Tīṇi visajjanāni nāma vatthu kusalānaṃ khandhānaṃ
anya-e0401n:387_83: cha hi paccayehi paccayo. Vatthu akusalānaṃ, vatthu abyākatānanti. Ettha ca attano
anya-e0401n:387_84: ajjhattaṃ vatthuṃ ārabbha vatthu me aniccantiādinā sammasantassa vatthurūpaṃ kusalānaṃ
anya-e0401n:387_85: khandhānaṃ chahi paccayehi paccayo. Etaṃ mama, eso hamasmi, eso me attā,ti upādiyantassa
anya-e0401n:387_86: vatthu rūpaṃ akusalānaṃ. Ubhayatthapi āvajjanakkhaṇe abyākatānaṃ. Arahato pana taṃ
anya-e0401n:387_87: aniccantiādinā sammasantassa kriyābyākatānaṃ khandhānanti. Tenāha “paccuppannaṃ vatthuṃ”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:387_88: Tattha “paccuppannaṃ vatthuṃ”ti attano paccuppannaṃ vatthuṃ. Adhiṭṭhānavidhāne pana
anya-e0401n:387_89: ākāsa gamane rūpakāyaṃ ārabbhacittaṃ viya kāyaṃ lahukaṃ adhiṭṭhahantassa tappariyāpannaṃ
anya-e0401n:387_90: vatthu abhiññācitta dvayassāti yojetabbaṃ. “Aniṭṭheṭhāne”ti javanacittassa āvajjanena
anya-e0401n:387_91: vinā uppajjanaṃ nāma katthaci icchitabbaṃ hoti. Katthaci anicchitabbaṃ. Tattha nirodhasamāpattito
anya-e0401n:387_92: vuṭṭhāne, maggavīthīsu gotrabhuvodānaṭṭhāne, āgantuka bhavaṅgaṭṭhāneti idaṃ icchitabbaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0401n:387_93: nāma. Ito aññaṃ anicchitaṭṭhānaṃ nāma. Evaṃ anicchitabbe ṭhāneti attho. “Pakatikāle”ti
anya-e0401n:387_95: vā”ti vatthuto aññaṃ rūpādikaṃ vā. “Bhinnārammaṇāni nāmā”ti aññaṃ āvajjanassa ārammaṇaṃ,
anya-e0401n:387_96: aññaṃ javanānanti evaṃ javanāni āvajjanena bhinnārammaṇāni vā. Tena vuttaṃ “pacchāuppannānī”tiādi.
anya-e0401n:387_97: “Tesaṃ”ti vīthicittānaṃ. “Tadevā”ti taṃ evavatthu rūpaṃ. “Vatthu cā”ti nissayo ca.
anya-e0401n:387_98: “Tesaṃ”ti aṭṭhakathācariyānaṃ. Na hi gahetuṃ sakkontīti sambandho. Sesamettha subodhaṃ.
anya-e0401n:387_101: evaṃ duvidhena. Athavā “duvidhenā”ti ajjhattāhārassa upatthambhanaṃ bahiddhāhārassa
anya-e0401n:387_104: vatthurūpaṃ vipākānaṃ. “Sabbathā”ti abyāyapadaṃ. Tañca sabbavibhattiyuttaṃ. Idha
anya-e0401n:387_105: pana paccattavacananti āha “sabbathā”ti sabbappakāranti. Pakāro ca veditabboti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:387_107: saṅgahetabbaṃ. Sahajananaṃ nāma attanā saha janentassa sahajananaṃ. Tañca kammacittādīnaṃ
anya-e0401n:387_108: viya visuṃ jananakiccaṃ na hoti. Attani uppajjante eva itarāni rūpāni uppajjanti.
anya-e0401n:387_109: Anuppajjante na uppajjantīti evarūpaṃ jananakiccaṃ veditabbaṃ.“Vināva sahuppādanakiccenā”ti
anya-e0401n:387_110: attanā sahuppādanakicce āhārassa byāpāro natthīti adhippāyo. Teneva sahajātāni upatthambhantopi
anya-e0401n:387_111: sahajātapaccayattaṃ na gacchatīti. Esanayo rūpajīvitindriyepi. Tena vuttaṃ “jīvitaṃpī”tiādi.
anya-e0401n:387_112: “Tīsū”ti ārammaṇañca upanissayo ca atthicāti imesu tīsu. Ārammaṇādhipatimhi purejātā
anya-e0401n:387_113: rammaṇādhipatipi atthi. So purejātatthi paccayo evāti atthipaccaye saṅgahito. “Tasmiṃ
anya-e0401n:387_114: kate pavattamānānaṃ”ti tasmiṃ kamme kate tassa katattā eva pavattamānānaṃ. Ārammaṇākāro
anya-e0401n:387_116: ārammaṇapaccaya kamma paccayā. “Akāliko”ti maggacetanāvasena akāliko. Sohi attano
anya-e0401n:387_117: anantarephalaṃ janeti. Tasmā āgametabbassa āyatikālassa abhāvā akālikoti vuccati.
anya-e0401n:387_120: hetubhūtassa kammassa nāmaṃ phalamhi āropetvā vohārena sabbepi tevīsatipaccayā kammasabhāvaṃ
anya-e0401n:387_121: nātivattantīti yojanā. Kammapaccaya saṅkhyaṃ gacchantīti vuttaṃ hoti. “Vijjamānā
anya-e0401n:387_122: yevā”ti atthipaccayā evāti vuttaṃ hoti. “Sāsanayuttiyā viruddhamevā”ti ettha sāsanayutti
anya-e0401n:387_123: nāma tīṇipiṭakāni. “Viruddhamevā”ti ārammaṇa paccayabhūtā sabbe pathavī pabbata nadīsamudda
anya-e0401n:387_124: ajaṭākāsādayo ca sabbāpaññattiyo ca nibbānañca kammasaṅkhyaṃ gacchantīti vadanto
anya-e0401n:387_125: ca, sabbe atītānāgata dhammā atthipaccayā evāti vadanto ca, tīhi piṭakehipi virujjhatiyeva.
anya-e0401n:387_126: Paṭṭhānapāḷiyā pana vattabbameva natthi. Atthi saddohi paṭṭhāne paccuppannabhāvena
anya-e0401n:387_127: vijjamānattho. Na paramattha dhamma bhāvena. Nāpiloka sammutivasena. Na hi paramattha
anya-e0401n:387_128: dhamma bhūtāpi atītānāgatadhammā idha atthi saṅkhyaṃ gacchanti. Nāpipaññatti hoti.
anya-e0401n:387_130: “Yato”ti yamhāpaṭisandhi viññāṇato. “Yato”ti vā yamhāsīsato, yamhābījato nibbattīti
anya-e0401n:387_131: yojanā. “Bījato viya mahārukkhassā”ti bījapaccayā kaḷīraṅkurādikassa mahārukkhasantānassa
anya-e0401n:387_132: nibbattiviya. Pāḷipāṭhe. “Na okkamissathā”ti sace na okkameyya. “Samuccissathā”ti
anya-e0401n:387_133: apinukho samucceyya, vaḍḍheyya. “Vokkamissathā”ti sace vigameyya, vināseyya. “Abhinibbattissathā”ti
anya-e0401n:387_135: apinukho āpajjeyya. “Yadidaṃ”ti yaṃ idaṃ. “Idaṃ”ti nipātamattaṃ. “Viññāṇaṃ”ti paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ.
anya-e0401n:387_136: Yaṃ viññāṇaṃ atthi. Eseva viññāṇa dhammoti yojanā. “Rūpuppattiyā”ti rūpuppādassa.
anya-e0401n:387_137: Viññāṇaṃ paccayo etassāti viññāṇa paccayā. Rūpuppatti. “Rūpappaveṇiyā”ti kammajarūpasantatiyā.
anya-e0401n:387_138: “Utuāhārāpī”ti ajjhatta utuajjhatta āhārāpi. Idañca sambhavayutti vasena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:387_139: Atthato pana purimuppannāya rūpappaveṇiyā asati, ajjhattaṃ te utuāhārāpi natthiyeva.
anya-e0401n:387_140: Bahiddhā utupana asatipi purimuppannāya rūpappaveṇiyā rūpaṃ na janetīti na vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:387_142: atthī”ti pacchimarūpuppattiyā paccayasatti atthi. Kasmā viññāyatīti ce. “Puttassā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n:387_144: “Yathā vā tathā vā”ti aniyamatoti vuttaṃ hoti. “Yonibhāvasaṅkhātaṃ”ti taṃ taṃ gottakulajātīnaṃ
anya-e0401n:387_145: jātibhāvasaṅkhātaṃ. “Niyāmarūpaṃ”ti utuvisesa saṅkhātaṃ niyāmarūpaṃ. Sadisāni rūpasaṇṭhānāni
anya-e0401n:387_146: yesanti viggaho. “Paṭisandhirūpasseva ānubhāvo”ti kalalakālādīsu uppannassa paṭisandhirūpasseva
anya-e0401n:387_147: ānubhāvo. Puna tamevatthaṃ visesetvā dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādimāha. “Samudāgataṃ”ti suṭṭhu
anya-e0401n:387_149: nānāvaṇṇasaṇṭhānādīnaṃ niyāmakaṃ. “Tattha imasmiṃ bhave”tiādīsu. Dhanañca dhaññañca
anya-e0401n:387_150: tato avasesā sabbeupabhogaparibhogācāti viggaho. Vijjā ca sippañca nānābahussutañca
anya-e0401n:387_151: pariyatti cāti dvando. “Anāgatānaṃ tāsaṃ”ti tāsaṃ abhinavadhanadhaññādisampattīnaṃ.
anya-e0401n:387_152: “Upanissaya paccayatā”ti pubbayogakammassa upanissaya paccayatā. Tattha dhanadhaññabhogānaṃ
anya-e0401n:387_153: paṭilābhatthāya pubbayogakaraṇaṃ nāma kasikamma vāṇijjakammādīnaṃ karaṇaṃ. Tattha
anya-e0401n:387_154: kasikamme tāva dhanadhaññabhogānaṃ paṭilābhatthāya kasikammakaraṇe dhanadhaññabhogā
anya-e0401n:387_155: anāgatūpanissaya paccayo. Idāni kasikammakaraṇaṃ tassa paccayuppannaṃ. Dhanadhañña
anya-e0401n:387_156: bhogānaṃ paṭilābhaparibhogakālesu kasikammakaraṇaṃ atītūpanissaya paccayo. Tesaṃ
anya-e0401n:387_157: paṭilābho ca paribhogo ca tassa paccayuppanno. Kasikammakaraṇakkhaṇe pana khetta,
anya-e0401n:387_158: vatthu, bīja, meghavuṭṭhiyo ca naṅgalādīni kasibhaṇḍāni ca gomahiṃsā ca kammakāraka
anya-e0401n:387_159: purisā ca paccuppannūpanissayo. Kasikammakaraṇaṃ tassa paccayuppannaṃ. Kammasādhikassa
anya-e0401n:387_160: mātāpitādayo pubbapurisā tassa kammassa atītūpanissaya paccayo. Taṃ kammaṃ tassa
anya-e0401n:388_1: sabbesaṃ rūpasaṇṭhānānaṃ bhāvo saṇṭhānattaṃ. “Bhāvo”ti ca tesaṃ pavatti vuccati.
anya-e0401n:388_2: “Pavatti hetū”ti ca paramattha rūpa dhammā eva. “Anupagamanato”ti ettha sabhāvato
anya-e0401n:388_3: atisukhumattā anupagamanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Adhivacanasaṅkhātaṃ nāmābhidhānanti viggaho.
anya-e0401n:388_5: ca nāmapaññatti vuccati. “Gahetabba bhāvo”ti idaṃ cittaṃ nāma, ayaṃ phassonāmātiādinā
anya-e0401n:388_6: kathentānaṃ santikā nāmābhidhānaṃ sutvā tadanurūpassa sabhāvatthassa jānanavasena
anya-e0401n:388_7: ñāṇena gahetabbabhāvo. Nāma paññattānusārena jānitabbattā nāmanti vuccatīti vuttaṃ
anya-e0401n:388_8: hoti. Ārammaṇe namatīti nāmaṃ. Ārammaṇika dhammā vā ettha namantīti nāmantipi yujjati.
anya-e0401n:389_0: Imasmiṃ paccayasaṅgahe paccayadhammesu paññattīnaṃpi saṅgahitattā paññatti saṅgahopi
anya-e0401n:389_1: therena idha nikkhitto. Tattha “paññāvīyatī”ti ettha paññāpanaṃ nāma vohāraṭṭhapanaṃ.
anya-e0401n:389_2: Tañcaṭhapanaṃ dvīhikāraṇehi sijjhati vadantānaṃ vohārena ca, suṇantānaṃ sampaṭicchanena
anya-e0401n:389_3: cāti dassetuṃ “ayaṃ pī”tiādimāha. “Sampaṭicchīyatī”ti yathā pubbapurisehi voharīyati,
anya-e0401n:389_4: tathā pacchima janaparamparāhi voharīyatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Pakārena ñāpīyatīti paññattītipi
anya-e0401n:389_5: yujjati. “Byañjanattho”ti manussa, deva, pathavī, pabbatādiko saddattho. “Paññā pīyantī”ti
anya-e0401n:389_6: pakārena ṭhapīyanti. Saddapaññattiṃ āhāti adhikāro. Adhimattabhāvappakāro nāma pathavīpabbatādīsu
anya-e0401n:389_7: pathavīdhātuyā adhimatta bhāvaviseso. Nadī samuddodakādīsu āpodhātuyā. Aggikkhandhesu
anya-e0401n:389_8: tejodhātuyā. Vātakkhandhesu vāyodhātuyāti evaṃ adhimatta bhāvaviseso. Vividhena pakārena
anya-e0401n:389_9: pariṇamanaṃ vipariṇāmoti āha tathā tathā vipariṇāmākāranti. Pathavīpabbatādivohāro
anya-e0401n:389_10: saṇṭhitākāraṃ nissāya pavatto na hoti. Pathavī nāma evaṃ saṇṭhānā, pabbato nāma evaṃ
anya-e0401n:389_11: saṇṭhānoti saṇṭhānaniyamo natthi. Paṃsusilānaṃ rāsipuñjappavattimattena vohāro siddhoti
anya-e0401n:389_12: vuttaṃ “na hi idha saṇṭhānaṃ padhānaṃ”ti. “Kaṭṭhādayo eva vuccantī”ti te evasaṇṭhānanānattaṃ
anya-e0401n:389_13: paṭicca nānāvohārena vuccanti. Pathavī pabbata nadī samuddādīsu viya bhūtānaṃ pavattivisesākārenāti
anya-e0401n:389_14: vuttaṃ “na hi idha samūho padhānaṃ”ti. “Upādāpaññattī”ti pañcakkhandha dhamme upādāya
anya-e0401n:389_15: tehi anaññaṃ ekībhūtaṃ katvā paññatti. Na ākāsa paññatti disādesapaññattiyo viya
anya-e0401n:389_16: tehi khandhehi muñcitvā paññatti. “Yato”ti yamhādisato. “Laddhappakāsattā”ti laddhappabhāsattā.
anya-e0401n:389_18: manasikarontassapi nimittaṃ upaṭṭhahantaṃ bhūtavikārappakārena upaṭṭhahatīti katvā
anya-e0401n:389_20: bhūmipabbatādikānaṃ attha paññattīnaṃ. “Tathā tathā”ti ayaṃ bhūmi, ayaṃ pabbato,
anya-e0401n:389_21: tiādinā tena tena vohārena. Atthānaṃ paramatthānaṃ chāyāti atthacchāyā. “Chāyā”ti
anya-e0401n:389_22: ca nimittacchāyāyo vuccanti. Atthacchāyānaṃ ākāro atthacchāyākāro. “Ākāro”ti ca nānāsamūha
anya-e0401n:389_23: nānāsaṇṭhānādiko ākāro. Atthoti vā saddābhidheyyo vacanattho. Soyeva samūhākārādi
anya-e0401n:389_24: nimitta mattattā atthacchāyākāroti vuccatīti imamatthaṃ dasseti “saddābhidheyya saṅkhātenā”tiādinā.
anya-e0401n:389_26: “Gaṇanūpagaṃ katvā”ti aya meko attho, idamekaṃ vatthūti evaṃ gaṇanūpagaṃ katvā. “Imechā”ti
anya-e0401n:389_27: ime chasaddapaññatti vohārā nāma nāmakammādi nāma. “Attanī”ti nāmapada saṅkhāte attani.
anya-e0401n:389_28: Attha visayaṃ eva hutvā pavattati bhāsaññūnanti adhippāyo. “Nāme satī”ti akkharasamūho
anya-e0401n:389_29: padaṃ, padasamūho vākyanti evaṃ vutte nāmapade vijjamāne sati. “Taduggaṇhantānaṃ”ti
anya-e0401n:389_30: taṃ taṃ nāmapadaṃ vācuggatakaraṇa vasena uggaṇhantānaṃ janānaṃ. “Tadatthā”ti tassa
anya-e0401n:389_31: tassa nāma padassa atthā. “Āgacchanti yevā”ti bhāsaññūnaṃ ñāṇābhimukhaṃ āgacchantiyeva.
anya-e0401n:389_32: Etena attani atthassa nāmanaṃ nāma atthajotana kiccamevāti dīpeti. “Suṇantānaṃ ñāṇaṃ”ti
anya-e0401n:389_33: ettha “ñāṇaṃ”ti upalakkhaṇa vacanaṃ, akusala viññāṇassapi adhippetattā. “Taṃ taṃ
anya-e0401n:389_34: atthābhimukhaṃ nāmetī”ti ārammaṇa karaṇavasena nāmeti. “Nāmaggahaṇa vasenā”ti ayaṃ
anya-e0401n:389_35: asukonāma hotūti evaṃ nāmaggahaṇavasena. “Dhārīyatī”ti yāvajīvaṃpi appamussamānaṃ
anya-e0401n:389_36: katvā dhārīyati. Nīharitvā vuccati attho etāyāti nirutti. “Etāyā”ti karaṇabhūtāya
anya-e0401n:389_38: aviditapakkhato ñāṇena nīharitvā. “Kathīyatī”ti taṃ sutakāle vadantena suṇantassa
anya-e0401n:389_39: ācikkhīyati jānāpīyati. “Atthassā”ti aviditapakkhe ṭhitassa atthassa. “Etasse vā”ti
anya-e0401n:389_40: nāmapadasseva. Nāmapadanti ca kriya padaṃpi, upasaggapadampi, nipātapadampi, pāṭipadikapadaṃpi,
anya-e0401n:389_42: atthā visesanā nāma. Evaṃ visesanabhūtānaṃ. “Puggalassā”ti aññapadatthabhūtassa abhiññālābhī
anya-e0401n:389_43: puggalassa. “Vadantī”ti ānandācariyaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. So hi dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṃ paññattidukaniddese
anya-e0401n:389_44: mūlaṭīkāyaṃ tathā vadati. “Tabbhāvaṃ”ti akkhara padabyañjanabhāvaṃ. “Assā”ti nāmapaññattiyā.
anya-e0401n:389_45: Akkharapadabyañjanaṃ gocaro ārammaṇaṃ assāti viggaho. “Anusārenā”ti anugamanena.
anya-e0401n:389_47: nāmaṃ imassatthassa nāmaṃ, ayamattho imassa nāmassa atthoti evaṃ puretaraṃ lokasaññāṇa
anya-e0401n:389_48: jānanakaññāṇaṃ. “Atīta saddamattārammaṇā”ti sotaviññāṇa vīthiyā ārammaṇaṃ hutvā niruddhaṃ
anya-e0401n:389_49: atīta saddamattaṃ kurumānā. “Tena vuttavacane”ti tena sikkhaṃ paccakkhantena bhikkhunā
anya-e0401n:389_50: sikkhaṃ paccakkhāmīti vuttavacane. Paccuppannaṃ saddaṃ sotaviññāṇa vīthiyā, atītañca
anya-e0401n:389_51: saddaṃ manoviññāṇa vīthiyāti yojanā. “Tāni akkharānī”ti sikkhaṃ paccakkhāmīti vākye
anya-e0401n:389_52: avayavakkharāni. “Ayaṃ akkhara samūho”ti idaṃ nāmapadanti vuttaṃ hoti. Etassa atthassa.
anya-e0401n:389_54: ekakkhare paññatti sadde. “Yā”ti nāma paññatti. “Vadantassa manasā”ti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:389_55: “Pubbabhāge”ti yaṃ kiñci atthaṃ paresaṃ vattukāmo vadanto tassa tassa atthassa nāmaṃ
anya-e0401n:389_56: pathamaṃ manodvāravīthiyā niyametvā eva vadati, taṃ nāmaṃ pubbabhāge vadantena manasā
anya-e0401n:389_58: aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ. Tathā addhamattikanti ca vuttanti sambandho. “Vuttaṃ”ti ca saddasatthesu vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:390_0: Gāthāyaṃ. “Mattā”ti ekavijjuppādakkhaṇaṃ vuccati. Ekā mattāyassāti ekamatto. “Dīghamuccate”ti
anya-e0401n:390_1: dīgho nāma vuccate. “Pluto”ti nānappakārena ruto gāyitoti paruto. So eva rakārassa
anya-e0401n:390_2: lakāraṃ katvā pakāre ca saralopaṃ katvā plutoti vuccati. Gītanti vuttaṃ hoti. “Paramattha
anya-e0401n:390_4: cittānī”ti javanavīthīnaṃ antarantarā bhavaṅgacittehi saddhiṃ anekakoṭisatasahassāni cittāni.
anya-e0401n:394_0: 170. Kammaṭṭhānasaṅgahe. Vidito viññāto nāmarūpa vibhāgo yenāti viggaho. Yogī puggalo.
anya-e0401n:394_1: “Kilese sametī”ti kāmacchandādike nīvaraṇakilese upasameti. “Tathā pavatto”ti bhāvanāvasena
anya-e0401n:394_2: pavatto. Vūpasamanavasena vā pavatto. “Tāyā”ti tāyabhāvanā paññāya, passantīti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:394_3: “Passitaṃ”ti samanupassitaṃ. Kathaṃ kasiṇabhāvanādikaṃ yogakammaṃ attāva attano ṭhānaṃ
anya-e0401n:394_5: etena tiṭṭhati anivattamānaṃ pavattati etenāti ṭhānanti atthena padaṭṭhānameva ṭhānanti
anya-e0401n:394_7: mukhyato vā upacārato vā dvidhāpi atthaṃ dassetuṃ “dasakasiṇānī”tiādi vuttaṃ. “Sesānipī”ti
anya-e0401n:394_8: appamaññādīni sesakammaṭṭhānānipi. Yaṃ yaṃ anurūpaṃ yathānurūpaṃ. “Samudācaraṇaṃ”ti
anya-e0401n:394_9: punappunaṃ bhusaṃ pavattanaṃ. “Saṃsagga bhedo”ti ekamekassa puggalassa kassaci dvecariyā,
anya-e0401n:394_10: kassaci tissotiādinā sammissa vibhāgo. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ”ti visuddhimagga aṭṭhakathāyaṃ.
anya-e0401n:394_11: “Sabbāyapi appanāyā”ti jhānappanāya ca maggappanāya ca phalappanāya ca. “Yā āsanne
anya-e0401n:394_12: pavattā dūre pavattāti adhikāro. “Itarā panā”ti dūre pavattāpana. “Tāsaṃ panā”ti
anya-e0401n:394_13: tissannaṃ bhāvanānaṃ pana. “Tesaṃ pī”ti dvinnaṃ nimittānaṃpi. “Vidatthicaturaṅgulaṃ”
anya-e0401n:394_14: nāma vitthārato caturaṅgulādhikaṃ vidatthippamāṇaṃ. Vidatthippamāṇaṃ vā caturaṅgulappamāṇaṃ
anya-e0401n:394_15: vātipi yujjati. Tathāhi visuddhimagge vāyokasiṇa vidhāne caturaṅgulappamāṇaṃ sīsaṃ
anya-e0401n:394_16: vātena pahariyamānaṃ disvāti vuttaṃ. Khalamaṇḍalaṃ nāma kassakānaṃ kassamaddanabhūmibhāgamaṇḍalaṃ.
anya-e0401n:394_17: “Kataṃ vā”ti nīlādivaṇṇavisesarahitaṃ aruṇavaṇṇaṃ mattikakkhaṇḍaṃ udakena madditvā
anya-e0401n:394_18: cakkamaṇḍalaṃ viya parimaṇḍalaṃ sumaṭṭhatalaṃ pathavimaṇḍalaṃ karonti. Evaṃ kataṃ
anya-e0401n:394_19: vā. “Akataṃ vā”ti katthaci bhūmibhāge kenaci akataṃ sayaṃ jātaṃ vā. “Kasiṇena jambudīpassā”ti ettha.
anya-e0401n:395: Buddhoti kittayantassa, kāye bhavati yā pīti;
anya-e0401n:397_0: Gāthāseso. Tattha jambudīpassa kasiṇato sāpītivarā evāti yojanā. “Kasiṇato”ti ca
anya-e0401n:397_1: sakalamaṇḍalato. Sakalassa jambudīpamaṇḍalassa issariyādhipatito pīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:397_3: nimittapaññatti eva vuccati. “Phuṭṭhaṭṭhāne”ti kāyevā rukkhaggādīsuvā vātena pahataṭṭhāne.
anya-e0401n:397_4: “Vāyu vaṭṭī”ti vātaparimaṇḍalaṃ. Candasūriyānaṃ aggissa ca obhāsena visiṭṭhāti samāso.
anya-e0401n:398_0: “Dhūmātaṃ”ti dhūmāyitaṃ. Dhūmapūritapaṭaṃ viyāti vuttaṃ hoti. Tenāha “sūnabhāvaṃ
anya-e0401n:398_1: gataṃ”ti. Ante kakāro nindatthajotakoti vuttaṃ “kucchitattā”ti. Jegucchi tabbattāti
anya-e0401n:398_3: vicchinnakaṃ nāmāti sambandho. Tattha visesena nīlantivinīlaṃ. Tameva kucchitattā
anya-e0401n:398_4: vinīlakaṃ. “Tadeva puna paccitvā”ti vinīlakasarīrameva puna kālātikkame paccitvā.
anya-e0401n:398_5: Pūtilohitānaṃ paripakkabhāvaṃ patvāti attho. Tato tato dvāracchiddato. Yuttaṃ tadeva
anya-e0401n:398_6: sarīranti sambandho. Vicchinnakaṃ nāma, vicchiddakantipi paṭhanti. “Apakaḍḍhitvā”ti
anya-e0401n:398_7: khaṇḍāni sarīrato mocetvā taṃ taṃ padesaṃ kaḍḍhitvā. “Paggharitalohita sarīraṃ”ti
anya-e0401n:399_0: “Buddhānussatī”ti ettha buddhasaddo guṇyūpacāra vacanaṃ hoti. Guṇino dabbassa nāmena
anya-e0401n:399_1: guṇānaṃ gahetabbattāti vuttaṃ “buddhaguṇassa anussati buddhānussatī”ti. Esanayo dhammānussatādīsu.
anya-e0401n:399_2: “Arahatādī”ti arahatādiguṇo. Vigatāni dussilyādi malāni ca maccherañca yassa taṃ
anya-e0401n:399_3: vigatamalamaccheraṃ. Tassa bhāvoti viggaho. “Attanā adhigatanibbānañcā”ti etena ariyapuggalānaṃ
anya-e0401n:399_4: kilesānaṃ accantavūpasamo vutto. “Yaṃ ārabbhā”ti yaṃ puggalaṃ ārabbha. Hitūpasaṃhāro
anya-e0401n:399_5: nāma ayaṃ puggalo avero hotu, abyāpajjo hotūtiādinā averatādīni hitasukhāni tasmiṃ
anya-e0401n:399_6: puggale cittena upasaṃharaṇaṃ. Karuṇā, muditā, heṭṭhā cetasikasaṅgahe vuttatthā eva.
anya-e0401n:399_7: Hitūpasaṃhāro ca hitamodanā ca ahitāpanayanañcāti dvando. Tattha hitūpasaṃhāro mettāya
anya-e0401n:399_8: kiccaṃ. Hitamodanā muditāya. Ahitāpanayanaṃ karuṇāya kiccaṃ. Tattha paraṃ hitasukhasampannaṃ
anya-e0401n:399_9: disvā tena parahitena attani pītipāmojjavaḍḍhanaṃ hitamodanā nāma. Paraṃ dukkhitaṃ
anya-e0401n:399_10: disvā ayaṃ imamhādukkhā muccatu, mākilamatūti evaṃ cittena parasmiṃ ahitassa dukkhassa
anya-e0401n:399_11: apanayanaṃ ahitāpanayanaṃ nāma. “Tesaṃ”ti parasattānaṃ. Sassa attano idanti sakaṃ.
anya-e0401n:399_12: “Idaṃ” sukhadukkhakāraṇaṃ. Attanā katakammaṃ eva sakaṃ yesaṃ te kammassakā. Parasattā
anya-e0401n:399_13: eva. Tesaṃ bhāvo. Tassa anubrūhananti viggaho. “Sīmasambhedo”ti attā ca piyapuggalo
anya-e0401n:399_14: ca majjhattapuggalo ca veripuggalo cāti catasso sīmā. Sambhindanaṃ sambhedo. Sammissanaṃ
anya-e0401n:399_15: anānattakaraṇanti attho. Sīmānaṃ sambhedo sīmasambhedo. Sabbā itthiyo, sabbepurisātiādinā
anya-e0401n:399_16: odhiso paricchedato pharaṇaṃ odhisopharaṇaṃ nāma. Sabbesattā, sabbepāṇā, sabbebhūtātiādinā
anya-e0401n:399_17: anodhiso aparicchedato pharaṇaṃ anodhisopharaṇaṃ nāma. Puratthimāyadisāya sabbesattā
anya-e0401n:399_18: averāhontūtiādinā disāvibhāgavasena pharaṇaṃ disāpharaṇaṃ nāma. “Taṃ samaṅgīno cā”ti
anya-e0401n:399_19: tāhi appamaññāhi samaṅgīno puggalā. “Niccaṃ sommahadayabhāvenā”ti sabbakālaṃ santasītala
anya-e0401n:399_20: hadayabhāvena. Brahmasaddo vā seṭṭhapariyāyo ‘brahmaṃ puññaṃ pasavatī’tiādīsu viya.
anya-e0401n:399_21: Asitabbaṃ bhuñjitabbanti asitaṃ. Pañcabhojanaṃ. Pātabbanti pītaṃ. Aṭṭhavidhaṃ pānaṃ.
anya-e0401n:399_22: Dantena khāyitabbaṃ khāditabbanti khāyitaṃ. Pūvakkhajjaphalakkhajjādikaṃ nānākhādanīyaṃ.
anya-e0401n:399_23: Aṅgulīhipi gahetvā sāyitabbaṃ lehitabbanti sāyitaṃ. Madhupphāṇitādikaṃ sāyanīyaṃ.
anya-e0401n:399_24: Sarasappaṭikūlatā nāma attano sabhāvato paṭikūlatā. Catubbidhopi hi āhāro bhājanesu
anya-e0401n:399_25: vā hatthamukhādīsu vā yattha yattha sammakkheti, laggati, limpati. Taṃ udakena dhovitabbaṃ
anya-e0401n:399_26: hoti. Adhotaṃ pana tampi jegucchanīyaṃ hoti. Āsayato paṭikūlatā nāma tassa ajjhoharīyamānassa
anya-e0401n:399_27: kaṇṭhādīsu ṭhitehi pittasemhādīhi āsayehi sammissanavasena paṭikūlatā. Nidhānato
anya-e0401n:399_28: paṭikūlatā nāma nidhānato paṭikūlatā. “Nidhānaṃ”ti ca āmāsayo vuccati. Pakkato paṭikūlatā
anya-e0401n:399_29: nāma tassa nidhānagatassa paripakkakāle gūthamuttādibhāvapattito paṭikūlatā. Apakkato
anya-e0401n:399_30: paṭikūlatā nāma tasmiṃ aparipakke ajiṇṇe sati sarīre nānāroguppattivasena paṭikūlatā.
anya-e0401n:399_31: Phalato paṭikūlatā nāma tassa paripakkakālato paṭṭhāya sarīre kesalomādīnaṃ paṭikūlarāsīnaṃ
anya-e0401n:399_32: vaḍḍhanavasena paṭikūlatā. Nissandato paṭikūlatā nāma tassa na vahidvārehi vā lomakūpehivā
anya-e0401n:399_33: aññehi nānāvaṇamukhehi vā uggharaṇa paggharaṇādivasena paṭikūlatā. “Tatthā”ti tasmiṃ
anya-e0401n:399_35: putta maṃsakhādane viya ati manuññepi āhāre rasataṇhā pahānavasena pavattā saññā.
anya-e0401n:399_37: karaṇatthe, itthambhūtalakkhaṇevā karaṇa vacanaṃ. Tattha karaṇatthetāva “rāgena caratī”ti
anya-e0401n:399_38: catūsu iriyāpathesu yebhūyyena rāgacittena carati. Rāgacittena niyyamāno vicaratīti
anya-e0401n:399_39: vuttaṃ hoti. Itthambhūta lakkhaṇe pana “rāgena caratī”ti tesu rāgaketu rāgadhajo
anya-e0401n:399_40: hutvā vicaratīti vuttaṃ hoti. “Assā”ti tassapuggalassa. “Ussanno”ti uggato pākaṭataro.
anya-e0401n:399_41: Bahutarotipi vadanti. “Pahānāyā”ti ettha itisaddo ādi attho. Tena karuṇā bhāvetabbā
anya-e0401n:399_42: vihiṃsāya pahānāya. Muditā bhāvetabbā aratiyā pahānāyāti imaṃ pāḷisesaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
anya-e0401n:399_43: “Nissaraṇatāvacanato”ti nissaraṇañhetaṃ byāpādassa yadidaṃ mettāceto vimutti. Nissaraṇañhetaṃ
anya-e0401n:399_44: vihesāyayadidaṃ karuṇā cetovimutti. Nissaraṇañhetaṃ aratiyā yadidaṃ muditā ceto vimuttīti
anya-e0401n:399_45: evaṃ nissaraṇa bhāvavacanato ca. Catasso appamaññāyo. La. Dosa caritassāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:399_46: “Dosa vatthuttābhāvato cā”ti dosuppattiyā vatthu bhāvassakaraṇa bhāvassa abhāvato
anya-e0401n:399_47: ca. Nīlādīni cattāri kasiṇāni dosa caritassāti vuttaṃ. Kasmāpanettha dosa caritassa
anya-e0401n:399_48: upekkhā sappāyakāraṇaṃ visuṃ na vuttanti. Aññakāraṇattā na vuttanti dassento “ettha
anya-e0401n:399_50: ca hotīti adhikāro. “Tassā”ti pamāda bahulassa vikkhittacittassa ca puggalassa. Vuttaṃ
anya-e0401n:399_51: siyā. Visuddhi magge pana evaṃ vuttaṃ natthīti adhippāyo. Vibhāvanipāṭhe. “Buddhivisaya
anya-e0401n:399_52: bhāvenā”ti vuttaṃ. Yadi buddhivisayattā mohacaritassa sappāyaṃ. Buddhivisayabhūtāni
anya-e0401n:399_53: maraṇa upasamasaññā vavatthānānipi mohacaritassa sappāyāni siyunti vuttaṃ “evañhisatī”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:399_55: kammaṭṭhānesupi. Evaṃsati vaṇṇakasiṇānaṃ puthulakhuddakatāpi ettha saṅgahitā hotīti.
anya-e0401n:399_56: “Mahantaṃ”ti vidatthi caturaṅgulato mahantaṃ. Yadi evasaddo yathārutameva yujjeyya.
anya-e0401n:399_57: Evaṃsati khuddakaṃ vitakkacaritasseva sappāyaṃ, na buddhicaritādīnanti evamatthopi
anya-e0401n:399_58: gaṇheyya. Atha buddhicaritassa pana asappāyaṃ nāma natthīti aṭṭhakathāvacanena virujjheyyāti
anya-e0401n:399_59: iminā adhippāyena “khuddakanti padeyujjatī”ti vuttaṃ. Athavā, puthulaṃ mohacaritassa,
anya-e0401n:399_60: khuddakaṃ vitakkacaritasseva, namohacaritassāti atthe sati, buddhicaritādīnaṃ pana
anya-e0401n:399_61: puthulaṃpi khuddakaṃpi anuññātaṃ hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Sabbañcetaṃ”ti sabbañca etaṃcaritavibhāgavacanaṃ.
anya-e0401n:399_62: Ujuvipaccanīkavasena tīsu akusala caritesu puggalesu. Vitakka carite ca atisappāyatāya
anya-e0401n:399_63: saddhābuddhi caritesūti adhippāyo. Tenāha “rāgādīnaṃ pana avikkhambhikā”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:400_0: “Buddhadhamma. La. Guṇānaṃ”ti ettha guṇasaddo pubbapadesu yojetabbo buddhaguṇānañca
anya-e0401n:400_1: dhammaguṇānañcātiādinā. “Tatthā”ti tasmiṃ guṇapade. Na tappetīti atappanīyo. Tappanaṃ
anya-e0401n:400_2: santuṭṭhiṃ na janetīti attho. Saṃvejanaṃ saṃvegaṃ janetīti saṃvejaniyo. “Dhammo”ti
anya-e0401n:400_3: sabhāvo. Saṃvejaniyo dhammo yassāti saṃvejaniya dhammaṃ. Maraṇaṃ. “Pañcamajjhānasamādhissā”ti
anya-e0401n:400_6: kassāti vuttaṃ hoti. Tenāha “gūtharāsi dassane viyā”ti. Na te kadāci somanassena
anya-e0401n:400_7: vinā appanaṃ pāpuṇanti. Byāpādavihiṃsā aratīnaṃ dūribhāvena somanassuppattiyā atisukarattā
anya-e0401n:400_9: “Daḷhaṃ”ti bhusaṃ. “Vibhūtaṃ”ti pākaṭaṃ. Nimittaṃ daḷhavibhūtaṃ katvā gahaṇaṃ daḷha
anya-e0401n:400_11: ettha paṭibhāgasaddo tassa dise pavattoti āha “tādise”tiādiṃ. “Taṃsaṇṭhāne”ti etena
anya-e0401n:400_12: pathavimaṇḍalādīsu viya saṇṭhānākārena ṭhitesu sabhāva dhamma puñjesu eva tassadisaṃ
anya-e0401n:400_13: paṭibhāganimittaṃ nāma sijjhatīti dasseti. “Eva”nti samathasaṅgahe tāva dasakasiṇāni,
anya-e0401n:400_15: bhikkhunā ācariyassa santike sabbassa kammaṭṭhāna vidhānassa uggahaṇaṃ uggaho. Tasmiṃ
anya-e0401n:400_16: kosallaṃ uggahakosallaṃ. Apicettha. Sabbaṃ uggahituṃ asakkontena yaṃ attanā ārabhissati.
anya-e0401n:400_17: Tassa ekassa vidhānaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ uggahetabbaṃ. “Uggaṇhantassā”ti ettha ukāro upari
anya-e0401n:400_18: attho. “Gahaṇaṃ”ti ca yathā citte avinassamānaṃ hutvā labbhati, tathā katvā cittena
anya-e0401n:400_20: cakkhunā dassanasadisaṃ karontassa. Parito samantato karaṇaṃ parikammaṃ. Tasmiṃ nimittaggahaṇakamme
anya-e0401n:400_21: yaṃ yaṃ kattabbavidhānaṃ atthi, taṃ taṃ paripuṇṇaṃ katvā gahaṇanti vuttaṃ hoti. Bhāvanāti
anya-e0401n:400_23: rattidivaṃ nirantaraṃ ārabhantassa. Uggaha nimitte saṇṭhānaṃ gaṇhantopi vaṇṇarūpādinā
anya-e0401n:400_24: sabhāva dhammena saheva gaṇhāti. Paṭibhāganimitte pana sabhāvadhammaṃ muñcitvā tassa
anya-e0401n:400_25: disaṃ nimitta paññatti saṅkhātaṃ suddhasaṇṭhānameva gaṇhāti. Ettha siyā, paṭibhāganimittepi
anya-e0401n:400_26: vaṇṇo nāma sandissati yevāti. Saccaṃ. So pana paṭibhāgamattaṃ hoti. Na ekantavaṇṇo.
anya-e0401n:400_28: bhāvanācittassa abbhantare pakkhittaṃ viya hotīti adhippāyo. Obhāsatīti obhāso. Obhāso
anya-e0401n:400_29: hutvā jātanti obhāsajātaṃ. Obhāsanaṃ vā obhāso. Jāto obhāso assāti obhāsajātaṃ. “Pātentī”ti
anya-e0401n:400_30: paṭipātenti. Puna uppajjanavasena uṭṭhātuṃ na denti. “Etāyā”ti kattu atthe karaṇavacanaṃ.
anya-e0401n:400_32: palibodha dhammehi rakkhaṇatthaṃ. Katame pana tesattavidhā palibodhadhammā nāmāti.
anya-e0401n:400_33: Idha amhehi vattabbaṃ natthi. Visuddhi magge eva te vuttāti dassetuṃ gāthamāha. “Āvāso”ti
anya-e0401n:400_36: sevanavasena paṭipajjantassa. “Kāmataṇhāya visayabhāvaṃ atikkamitvā”ti etena kāmabhūmi
anya-e0401n:400_37: kāmabhavasamatikkamo, rūpabhūmirūpabhava okkamo ca vutto. Vasanaṃ vasī. Satti. Sāmatthiyanti
anya-e0401n:400_38: attho. Vasiṃ bhūtaṃ pattanti vasibhūtaṃ. Vasī eva vasitā. Yathā pāramitāti. “Tato
anya-e0401n:400_39: vicāranti” ettha itisaddo ādiattho. Tena tato pītiṃtiādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Icchantānaṃ
anya-e0401n:400_41: “Dandhāyitattaṃ”ti dandhaṃ hutvā ayati pavattatīti dandhāyitaṃ. Tassa bhāvo dandhāyitattaṃ.
anya-e0401n:400_43: kriyāvisesanapadāni. “Yatthicchakaṃ”ti yattha yattha ṭhāne icchānu rūpaṃ. Yadicchakantiyasmiṃ
anya-e0401n:400_44: yasmiṃ khaṇe icchānu rūpaṃ. “Yāvaticchakaṃ”ti yattakena pamāṇena icchānu rūpaṃ. “Vitakkādikaṃ
anya-e0401n:400_45: oḷārikaṅgaṃ pahānāyā”ti ettha kassa balena pahānaṃ hoti. Taṃ taṃ virāga bhāvanā balena
anya-e0401n:400_46: pahānaṃ hoti. Kāca taṃ taṃ virāgabhāvanā nāma hoti. Ajjhāsaya visesa pariggahitā
anya-e0401n:400_47: upacārabhāvanā evāti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “pathamajjhānaṃ tāvā”tiādi vuttaṃ. “Ātāpavīriyaṃ”ti
anya-e0401n:400_48: yenavīriyena yogino attānaṃ vā kilesa dhamme vā ātāpenti paritāpenti. Taṃ ātāpavīriyaṃ
anya-e0401n:400_49: nāma. Ugghāṭīyamānampi ākāsameva hoti. Taṃ ārabbha uparijhānantaruppattiyā bhāvanaṃ
anya-e0401n:400_50: karontassapi punappunaṃ tameva pañcamajjhānaṃ uppajjati. Ārammaṇe ca anatikkante
anya-e0401n:400_53: thometvā. Sammā anussaraṇaṃ samanussaraṇaṃ. “Itaresaṃpi vā”ti puthujjana paṇḍitānaṃpi
anya-e0401n:400_54: vā. Maraṇa saññā vavatthānesu parikammañca samādhiyati, upacāro ca sampajjatīti yojanā
anya-e0401n:400_55: tikkhapaññānaṃ pana puthujjanānaṃpi sataṃ buddhaguṇādīsupi upacāra sambhavo aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
anya-e0401n:400_56: vuttoyeva. “Samathajjhānesū”ti idaṃ adhikāravasena vuttaṃ. Vipassanā kammaṃpi gahetabbamevāti
anya-e0401n:400_57: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Pubbedānaṃ datvā iminā puññena āyatiṃ jhānābhiññāyo vā maggaphalāni vā
anya-e0401n:400_58: paṭilabhissāmīti patthanaṃ katvā āgatopi katādhikāro evātipi vadanti. Katamo pana
anya-e0401n:400_59: katādhikāro nāmāti āha “āsannabhave”tiādiṃ. Aṭṭhavidhesu catukkanayavasena, navavidhesu
anya-e0401n:400_60: pañcakanayavasena vuttoti tesaṃ vādīnaṃ sādhakavacanaṃ. Vicāretvā pana gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:400_61: Ākāsa kasiṇena vinā arūpajjhānāni labhitvā puna abhiññatthāya parikammekate ākāsakasiṇepi
anya-e0401n:400_62: kattabbattā tassa abhiññāpādakatā sambhavo vuttoti atthassa sambhavato. Pubbe abhāvita
anya-e0401n:400_63: bhāvanoti ca akatādhikāroti ca atthato ekaṃ. “Ādikammiko”ti abhiññākamme ādikammiko.
anya-e0401n:400_64: “Tādisānaṃ”ti pubbe akatādhikārānaṃ abhāvitabhāvanānaṃ idāni iddhivikubbanaṃ karissāmīti
anya-e0401n:400_66: ca upalakkhaṇavacanaṃ. Dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ savanaṃ karissāmītiādikaṃpi gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:400_67: Idañca ādikammikavidhānādhikārattā vuttaṃ. Abhiññāsu vasipattānampi taṃ pañcamajjhānaṃ
anya-e0401n:400_69: sataṃ hotu sahassaṃ hotūtiādinā cittena abhividhātabbaṃ. Abhinīharitabbanti vuttaṃ
anya-e0401n:400_70: hoti. “Sataṃ homi, sahassaṃ homīti vā”ti attānaṃ sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vā nimminanavasena
anya-e0401n:400_71: vuttaṃ. Sesaṃ pana aññathānimminanavasena. Sotuṃ vā saddaṃ, passituṃ vā rūpaṃ, jānituṃ
anya-e0401n:400_72: vā paracittaṃ. Anussarituṃ vā pubbenivutthaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāpāṭhe. “Adhiṭṭhātī”ti abhiññāya
anya-e0401n:400_73: adhiṭṭhāti. Abhividhāti nibbattetīti vuttaṃ hoti. Duvidhaṃhi adhiṭṭhānaṃ parikammena
anya-e0401n:400_74: adhiṭṭhānaṃ abhiññāya adhiṭṭhānanti. Idha pana abhiññāya adhiṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ. “Adhiṭṭhāna
anya-e0401n:400_75: cittenā”ti abhiññācittenāti vuttaṃ hoti. “Parikammacittassā”ti pubbabhāge āvajjana
anya-e0401n:400_76: parikamma adhiṭṭhānaparikammacittassa. Pacchimaṃ pana pādakajjhāna samāpajjanaṃ.
anya-e0401n:400_77: Parikammacittassa samādhānatthāyāti vuttaṃ. Parikammacitte samāhite kiṃ payojananti
anya-e0401n:400_79: samādhiññāṇasotena āsanne dibbavisayaṃpi saddaṃ suṇātītiādinā vattabbo. “Iti katvā”ti
anya-e0401n:400_80: iti manasikatvā. “Taṃ”ti pacchimaṃ pādakajjhāna samāpajjanaṃ. “Idha nagahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ”ti
anya-e0401n:400_81: therassa matena daṭṭhabbanti adhippāyo. Idha pana ādikammikavidhānappadhānattā pacchimaṃpi
anya-e0401n:400_82: pādakajjhāna samāpajjanaṃ vattabbamevāti. “Kāyagatikaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā”ti ayaṃ kāyo
anya-e0401n:400_83: viya idaṃ cittaṃpi dandhagamanaṃ hotūti evaṃ cittaṃ kāyagatikaṃ karaṇena adhiṭṭhahitvā.
anya-e0401n:400_84: “Dissamānena kāyenā”ti dandhagamanena gacchantattā bahujanānampi dissamānena rūpakāyena.
anya-e0401n:400_85: Tabbi parītena sīghagamanaṃ veditabbaṃ. “Ārammaṇamattaṃ hotī”ti anipphannarūpaṃ sandhāya
anya-e0401n:400_86: vuttaṃ. “Ārammaṇa purejātaṃ”ti nipphannarūpaṃ. Itaraṃ pana hadaya vatthurūpaṃ sandhāya
anya-e0401n:400_87: vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Paracitta vijānanaṭṭhāne aṭṭhakathāṭīkācariyānaṃ vicāraṇā atthīti
anya-e0401n:400_88: taṃ dassetuṃ “ettha ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ tāvā”tiādi vuttaṃ. “Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ”ti dhammasaṅgaṇi
anya-e0401n:400_90: Āvajjane niruddheti sambandho. “Ekaṃ cittaṃ”ti parassa cittaṃ. Tadeva atītaṃ cittaṃ
anya-e0401n:400_92: aññathā santati addhāvasena vuttanti gahite sati. Vutto siyā. Kasmā, santati addhāvasena
anya-e0401n:400_93: paccuppanne gahite sati, sabbāya ekajavanavīthiyā ekapaccuppannattā. “Sabbāni cittānī”ti
anya-e0401n:400_94: javanacittāni. “Sahuppannānī”ti idaṃ sahuppannānaṃpi atthitāya vuttaṃ. Āvajjanādīni
anya-e0401n:400_95: pana khaṇabhedaṃ nagaṇhanti. Sabbaṃ parassa cittaṃ ekacittamiva gaṇhanti. Tasmā kālabhedopi
anya-e0401n:400_96: natthīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Nibbānañcā”ti vuttaṃ, kathaṃ nibbānaṃ pubbenivutthaṃ nāma siyāti.
anya-e0401n:400_97: Atīte parinibbutānaṃ maggaphalāni anussaraṇakāle tesaṃ ārammaṇabhūtaṃ nibbānaṃpi
anya-e0401n:400_98: anussaratiyeva. Tattha tesaṃ maggaphalānaṃ atītattā nibbānaṃpi pubbenivutthaṃ nāma hotīti.
anya-e0401n:401_0: “Yaṃ yaṃ adhiṭṭhātī”ti yaṃ yaṃ satādikaṃ saṃvidhāti. “Yathā yathā adhiṭṭhātī”ti yena
anya-e0401n:401_2: pakativaṇṇasseva. Devānaṃ pasādasotanti sambandho. “Ārammaṇa sampaṭicchana samatthaṃ”ti
anya-e0401n:401_3: ārammaṇassa upaṭṭhānaṃ sampaṭicchana samatthaṃ. Tadeva cetopariyañāṇantipi vuccatīti
anya-e0401n:401_4: sambandho. “Ceto”ti cittaṃ. “Paricchijjā”ti idaṃ sarāgacittaṃ, idaṃ virāgacittantiādinā
anya-e0401n:401_5: paricchinditvā. “Gocara nivāsavasenā”ti gocaraṃ katvā nivasanavasena. Sabbaññutaññāṇagatikaṃ
anya-e0401n:401_6: sabbaññubuddhānaṃ anāgataṃ saññāṇanti adhippāyo. Anāgate sattadivasato orimā cittacetasika
anya-e0401n:401_7: dhammā cetopariyaññāṇassa visayoti katvā anāgate sattadivasatoti vuttaṃ. Paṭṭhāya
anya-e0401n:401_8: pavattamānāti pāṭhaseso. Imasmiṃ divase ca anāgatapakkhe sabbaṃpi ārammaṇaṃ pakatiñāṇassa
anya-e0401n:401_9: visayoti katvā “dutīyadivasato paṭṭhāyā”ti vuttaṃ. “Etaṃ”ti etaṃ anāgataṃ saññāṇaṃ.
anya-e0401n:401_10: “Yathā cetaṃ”ti yathā ca etaṃ imasmiṃ bhave anāgata dhamme jānāti. “Asādhāraṇakālavasenā”ti
anya-e0401n:403_1: nāma sattapuggalādinimittameva. Sattanimittañhi paññatti dhammattā khaṇekhaṇe khayavayabhedābhāvato
anya-e0401n:403_2: so evagacchati so eva tiṭṭhatītiādinā niccākārasaṇṭhitaṃ hotīti. “Dhuvanimittaṃ”ti
anya-e0401n:403_3: thiranimittaṃ. Idampi so gacchantopi nanassati, tiṭṭhantopi nanassatītiādinā thirākārasaṇṭhitaṃ
anya-e0401n:403_6: gantuṃ icchanto gacchati, ṭhātuṃ icchanto tiṭṭhatītiādinā vasavattanākāra saṇṭhitaṃ
anya-e0401n:404_0: Visujjhatīti visuddhi. Visodhetīti vā visuddhi. Sīlameva visuddhi sīlavisuddhīti
anya-e0401n:404_2: adhiṭṭhāna kiccasādhakattā idha adhippetanti vuttaṃ “niccasīlamevā”ti. Samādhi adhippeto.
anya-e0401n:404_3: Vakkhatihi “duvidhopi samādhi cittavisuddhi nāmā”ti. Etena visujjhati etāyāti visuddhi.
anya-e0401n:404_4: Cittassa visuddhi cittavisuddhi. Samādhi evātipi dīpeti. Visujjhanaṃ vā visuddhi.
anya-e0401n:404_5: Cittassa visuddhi cittavisuddhi. Atthatopana visuddhacittameva vuccatītipi yujjati.
anya-e0401n:404_6: Visuddhisadda sampanne hi sati, cittavisuddhi icceva vuccati. Na samādhivisuddhīti.
anya-e0401n:404_7: “Soḷasavidhaṃ kaṅkhaṃ”ti ahosiṃ nu kho aha matītamaddhānantiādinā suttanteāgataṃ
anya-e0401n:404_8: soḷasavidhaṃ vicikicchaṃ. “Aṭṭhavidhaṃ vā kaṅkhaṃ”ti sattharikaṅkhatītiādinā abhidhamme
anya-e0401n:404_9: āgataṃ aṭṭhavidhaṃ vicikicchaṃ. Visamahetudiṭṭhi nāma sattānaṃ uppattiyā akāraṇameva
anya-e0401n:404_11: Anupāyabhūto manasikāro nāma niccādivasena manasikāro. Adhimānavatthu nāma obhāsādīni.
anya-e0401n:404_14: sammohamalato. Nanu dassananti ñāṇameva. Evaṃsati, ñāṇanti vutte siddhe katvā dassanasaddena
anya-e0401n:404_15: saha ñāṇadassananti vuttanti āha “etthacā”tiādiṃ. “Sutamayādivasenā”ti sutamaya cintāmayavasena.
anya-e0401n:404_16: Tattha yathāsutassa pāḷidhammassa atthamattajānanaṃ sutamayaññāṇaṃ nāma. Atthaṃ ñatvā
anya-e0401n:404_17: atthānurūpassa sabhāvalakkhaṇassa cintanāvasena uppannaṃ ñāṇaṃ cintāmayaññāṇaṃ nāma.
anya-e0401n:404_20: sabbesu ṭhānesu. Ettha ca dasasu vipassanāñāṇesupi vipassanā vacanena paccakkhadassanameva
anya-e0401n:404_21: adhippetanti katvā sabbatthaggahaṇaṃ katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sammasanaññāṇato paṭṭhāya
anya-e0401n:404_22: hi dassanameva adhippetaṃ. Na sabhāvajānanamattaṃ. Yato cakkhunā passantasseva suṭṭhu
anya-e0401n:404_23: paccakkhato dassanatthāya punappunaṃ bhāvanā kammaṃ nāma tattha icchitabbaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:405_0: “Dhammā”ti saṅkhata dhammā. Aniccatā eva lakkhaṇanti aniccalakkhaṇaṃ. Aniccānaṃ vā
anya-e0401n:405_2: yathā sīghasotāyaṃ nadiyaṃ nāvāya uddhaṃ gacchantaṃ sānāvā abhisaṅkharaṇadukkhena
anya-e0401n:405_3: abhiṇhaṃ suṭṭhu paṭippīḷeti. Kasmā, asati abhisaṅkhāre taṅkhaṇe eva adhovuyhanato.
anya-e0401n:405_4: Adhovuyhanañhi nāvāya pakati kiccaṃ. Uddhaṃ ārūhanaṃ abhisaṅkhāra siddhaṃ. Evamevaṃ
anya-e0401n:405_5: sīghasote saṃsāre attabhāvena uddhaṃ khaṇato khaṇaṃ divasato divasaṃ gacchantaṃ puggalaṃ
anya-e0401n:405_6: ayaṃ attabhāvo abhisaṅkharaṇa dukkhena abhiṇhaṃ suṭṭhu paṭippīḷeti. Kasmā, asati
anya-e0401n:405_7: abhisaṅkhāre, paccayavekalle ca sati, taṅkhaṇe eva vipariṇamanato. Vipariṇamanañhi
anya-e0401n:405_8: attabhāvassa pakati kiccaṃ. Uddhaṃgamanaṃ abhisaṅkhāra siddhaṃ. Evaṃ abhiṇha sampaṭippīḷanaṃ
anya-e0401n:405_9: veditabbaṃ. Ettha ca saṃsārassa sīghasotatā nāma attabhāvapariyāpannānaṃ nāma rūpadhammānaṃ
anya-e0401n:405_10: pavattinivatti sīghatā vuccati. Ettha ca maraṇaṃ duvidhaṃ sammuti maraṇañca paramattha
anya-e0401n:405_11: maraṇañca. Tattha sammuti maraṇaṃ nāma sammuti saccabhūtassa sattassa maraṇaṃ. Taṃ
anya-e0401n:405_12: ekabhavapariyante sandissati. Paramattha maraṇaṃ nāma paramattha saccabhūtānaṃ nāmarūpa
anya-e0401n:405_13: dhammānaṃ maraṇaṃ. Idameva ekantamaraṇaṃ, saccamaraṇaṃ, sabhāvamaraṇaṃ hoti. Imasmiṃ
anya-e0401n:405_14: vipassanā kamme idaṃ paramattha maraṇaṃ eva aniccatāti ca vuccati. Dhammānaṃ susānakkhettanti
anya-e0401n:405_15: ca susānabhūmīti ca vuccatīti. Sā ca susānabhūmināma sattānaṃ paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya
anya-e0401n:405_16: santānaṃ anubandhatiyeva. Anubandhattā ca sattānaṃ paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya so nāma
anya-e0401n:405_17: samayo natthi, yattha sattā na marantīti. Idañca anubandhanaṃ sattānaṃ abhiṇhasampaṭippīḷanameva
anya-e0401n:405_18: hoti. Tesaṃ sabbiriyāpathesu jīvitassa ca aṅgapaccaṅgānañca kāyavacīmano kammānañca
anya-e0401n:405_19: sambādhapattito. Avasavattanākāro pana abhisaṅkhāra dukkhaṃ abhiṇhaṃ paccanubhavantānaṃ
anya-e0401n:405_20: pākaṭoyeva. Vasavattanehi sati, abhisaṅkharaṇa kiccassa okāso natthi. Vasavattaneneva
anya-e0401n:405_21: yathicchi tassa kiccassa sampajjanato. Lokasmiñhi sabbaṃpi abhisaṅkhāra kiccaṃ nāma
anya-e0401n:405_22: antamaso assāsanapassāsana kiccaṃ upādāya dhammānaṃ vasavattanābhāvato karontīti.
anya-e0401n:406_0: Aniccassa dhammassa anuanupassanāti sambandho. “Anuanupassanā”ti ca ñāṇacakkhunā
anya-e0401n:406_1: punappunaṃ nijjhāyanā olokanā. “Dhammānaṃ”ti pañcakkhandha dhammānaṃ. “Yattha yatthā”ti
anya-e0401n:406_2: yasmiṃ yasmiṃ sarīraṅge. “Purāṇa dhammānaṃ”ti purāṇānaṃ pātubbhūtānaṃ, vaḍḍhitānañca
anya-e0401n:406_3: dhammakoṭṭhāsānaṃ antaradhānaṃ vayo vuccati. Vipassanā kammaṃ patvā khaṇikavasena
anya-e0401n:406_4: ekekadhammavibhāgavasena ca anupassanā kiccaṃ natthīti āha “samūha santativasena
anya-e0401n:406_5: panā”ti. Ekekadhammavibhāgavasena anupassanāpi pana pakatiyā supākaṭesu cittavedanādīsu
anya-e0401n:406_6: icchitabbāyeva. “Aniccatāya paramākoṭī”ti tato uttari aniccatā nāma natthīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:406_7: Dhammānaṃ tathā tathā bhāyitabbappakāro nāma pañcakkhandhe ‘aniccato, dukkhato, rogato,
anya-e0401n:406_8: gaṇḍato, sallato, aghato, ābādhato, tiādinā vutto bhāyitabbappakāro. Tassa samanupassanāñāṇaṃ
anya-e0401n:406_9: bhayañāṇaṃ. Etena apāyadukkha saṃsāra dukkhabhīrukehi janehi bhāyitabbanti bhayaṃ.
anya-e0401n:406_10: Te vā bhāyanti etasmāti bhayaṃ. Bhayassa samanu passanāñāṇaṃ bhayañāṇanti imamatthaṃ
anya-e0401n:406_13: Ukkaṇṭhatā nāma cittassa viruddhatā nikkhamābhimukhatā. “Cattālīsāya ākārehī”ti pañcakkhandhe
anya-e0401n:406_14: ‘aniccato, dukkhato, rogato, gaṇḍato, sallato, aghato, ābādhato, parato, palokato,
anya-e0401n:406_15: ītito,. Upaddavato, bhayato, upasaggato, calato, pabhaṅguto, addhuvato, atāṇato,
anya-e0401n:406_16: aleṇato, assaraṇato, rittato,. Tucchato, suññato, anattato, ādīnavato, vipariṇāma
anya-e0401n:406_17: dhammato, asārakato, aghamūlato, vadhakato, vibhavato, sāsavato,. Saṅkhatato, mārāmisato,
anya-e0401n:406_19: dukkhadomanassa dhammato, upāyāsa dhammato, saṃkilesika dhammato, passanto suññato
anya-e0401n:406_20: lokaṃ avekkhatīti evaṃ mahāniddese moghapañhaniddese āgatehi cattālīsāya ākārehi.
anya-e0401n:406_21: Tattha pañcakkhandhe aniccato passantotiādinā yojetabbaṃ. “Aniccato”ti ca aniccabhāvenāti
anya-e0401n:406_22: attho. Sabbepi pañcakkhandhā aniccā evāti passantoti vuttaṃ hoti. Kathaṃ pana aniccato
anya-e0401n:406_23: passanto suññato lokaṃ avekkhatīti. Niccaguṇa suññatāya suññato pañcakkhandhabhūtaṃ
anya-e0401n:406_24: lokaṃ avekkhati. Sesapadesupi esevanayo. Tattha “aniccā evā”ti paṭisandhikkhaṇato
anya-e0401n:406_25: paṭṭhāya yadākadāci maraṇa dhammattā aniccā eva. “Dukkhā evā”ti anicca dhammattāyeva
anya-e0401n:406_26: dukkhā eva. Yadaniccaṃ, taṃ dukkhaṃtihi vuttaṃ. Dukkha saccadhammattā vā. “Rogā evā”ti
anya-e0401n:406_27: rogajātikattā rogā eva. Yehi keci loke cakkhu rogādikā anekasahassā rogā nāma sandissanti.
anya-e0401n:406_28: Sabbete imepañcakkhandhā eva. Ito aññokoci rogo nāma natthi. Tasmā te ekantena rogajātikā
anya-e0401n:406_29: evāti. Api ca, dukkhasacca dhammattātīhi dukkhatāhi catūhi dukkhaṭṭhehi ca abhiṇhasampaṭippīḷanato
anya-e0401n:406_30: rujjanaṭṭhena rogā eva. Tattha “tīhi dukkhatāhī”ti dukkhadukkhatā saṅkhāra dukkhatā
anya-e0401n:406_31: vipariṇāma dukkhatāti imāhi tīhidukkhatāhi. “Catūhi dukkhaṭṭhehī”ti dukkhassa pīḷanaṭṭho,
anya-e0401n:406_32: saṅkhataṭṭho, santāpaṭṭho, vipariṇāmaṭṭho,ti imehi catūhi dukkhaṭṭhehi. Dukkha kiccehīti
anya-e0401n:406_33: attho. Esanayo gaṇḍādīsu. Tattha gaṇḍonāma pīḷakābādho. Sallaṃ nāma vijjhanaṭṭhena
anya-e0401n:406_34: kilesa sallañca dukkhasallañca. Aghanti niratthakaṃ. Ime ca khandhā vipattipariyosānattā
anya-e0401n:406_35: niratthakā eva honti. Sabbāsampattiyo vipattipariyosānāti hi vuttaṃ. Avissāsikaṭṭhena
anya-e0401n:406_36: pare eva. Na hi te etaṃ mama, eso hamasmi, eso me attāti evaṃ vissāsaṃ arahanti.
anya-e0401n:406_37: Tathā vissāsaṃ karontassa nānādukkhehi niccaṃ vihiṃsanato. Paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya
anya-e0401n:406_38: yadākadāci palujjanadhammattā palokadhammā eva. “Ītī”ti antarāyo vuccati. Khandhā
anya-e0401n:406_39: antarāya jātikā evāti vuttaṃ hoti. Ajjhattabhāvaṃ upagantvā dutattā vibādhakattā
anya-e0401n:406_40: upaddavā eva. Bhāyitabbattā bhayā eva. Anattā eva samānā ajjhattabhāvaṃ upagantvā
anya-e0401n:406_41: sajjanato lagganato dummo cayato upasaggā eva. Niccakālaṃ lokadhammehi calanattā
anya-e0401n:406_42: vipphandanattā calāeva. Nānappakārena bhañjanadhammattā pabhaṅguno eva. Khaṇamattampi
anya-e0401n:406_43: athirattā addhuvā eva. Jarāmaraṇādito apāyavinipatanādito bhayato tāyati rakkhatīti
anya-e0401n:406_44: tāṇaṃ. Te ca khandhā kassacitāṇā na honti. Tesañca kiñcitāṇaṃ nāma natthi. Tasmā
anya-e0401n:406_45: atāṇā eva. Bhayato bhīrukā janā līyanti nilīyanti etthāti leṇaṃ. Te ca kassacileṇā
anya-e0401n:406_46: na honti. Tesañca kiñcileṇaṃ nāma natthi. Tasmā aleṇā eva. Bhayaṃ saratihiṃsatīti
anya-e0401n:406_47: saraṇaṃ. Te ca kassacisaraṇaṃ na honti. Tesañca kiñcisaraṇaṃ nāma natthi. Tasmā assaraṇā
anya-e0401n:406_48: eva. Niccatādīhi sabbehi sobhaṇaguṇehi sabbaso rahitattā tucchattā suññattārittā
anya-e0401n:406_49: eva. Tucchā eva. Suññā eva. Attā vuccati yassakassaci koci sārabhūto paṭissaraṇo.
anya-e0401n:406_50: Te sayañca kassaci attāna honti. Attano ca koci attānāma natthi. Tasmā anattā eva.
anya-e0401n:406_51: Aniccatādīhi ādīnavehi dosehi sampuṇṇattā ādīnavā eva. Vipariṇāma sabhāvattā vipariṇāmā
anya-e0401n:406_52: eva. Sārabhūtassa kassaci adhiṭṭhānassa abhāvā asārāeva. Aghassa sabbaniratthakassa
anya-e0401n:406_53: patiṭṭhānattā aghamūlā eva. Te sayaṃ maraṇa dhammasamaṅgīno hutvā tena maraṇasatthena
anya-e0401n:406_54: maraṇāvudhena saṃsāre sattānaṃ niccaṃ mārakattā jīvitindriyupacchedakattā vadhakā
anya-e0401n:406_55: eva. Niccasukhahita vuḍḍhivigatattā vibhavā eva. Āsavehi pariggahitattā sāsavā eva.
anya-e0401n:406_56: Niccakālaṃ paccayāyattavuttikattā saṅkhatā eva. Kilesamāramaccumārānaṃ āmisāhārattā
anya-e0401n:406_57: mārāmisā eva. Anicchantasseva sato cakkhurogādibhāvena apāyabhavādibhāvena jātasabhāvattā
anya-e0401n:406_58: jātidhammā eva. Anicchantasseva sato hāyanamaraṇasabhāvattā jarāmaraṇa dhammā eva.
anya-e0401n:406_59: Sokādīnaṃ vatthubhāvena dhāraṇattā sokādi dhammā eva. Taṇhā saṃkilesa diṭṭhisaṃkilesa
anya-e0401n:406_60: duccarita saṃkilesehi niyuttattā saṃkilesika dhammā evāti. Tena vuttaṃ “cattālīsāya
anya-e0401n:407_0: Loke attajīvā nāma sattānaṃ ajjhatta dhammesu sāradhammā honti. Tesu vigatesu sesadhammā
anya-e0401n:407_1: nissatta nijjīvabhāvaṃ patvā pheggubhūtā kacavarabhūtāti lokassa abhimāno. Te ca
anya-e0401n:407_2: attajīvā nāma sabbaso natthīti diṭṭhe khandhesu kacavarabhāvadassanaṃ attajīva suññatā
anya-e0401n:407_3: dassanaṃ nāma. “Vimuccamāno”ti etena vimuccatīti vimokkhoti atthaṃ dasseti. Vimuccanti
anya-e0401n:407_4: etenāti vimokkhotipi yujjati. “Nimittānī”ti vipallāsadhammehi nimmitāni niccanimitta
anya-e0401n:407_5: sukhanimitta attanimitta jīvanimittāni. Satta puggala itthi purisa hattha pāda sīsa
anya-e0401n:407_6: gīvādīni nimittāni ca. Tattha saṅkhārānaṃ khaṇika dhammattā aniccānaṃyeva sataṃ santati
anya-e0401n:407_7: ghanena paṭicchannattā hiyyopi so eva, ajjapi so evātiādinā niccākārena upaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0401n:407_8: niccanimittaṃ nāma. Kilesamalehi pariggahitattā asubhānaṃyeva sataṃ avijjāya paṭicchannattā
anya-e0401n:407_9: idaṃ iṭṭhaṃ, kantaṃ, manāpaṃ, piyarūpa, ntiādinā subhākārena upaṭṭhānaṃ subhanimittaṃ
anya-e0401n:407_10: nāma. Bhayaṭṭhena akhemaṭṭhena dukkhānaṃpi sataṃ tāyeva paṭicchannattā idaṃ sukhaṃ,
anya-e0401n:407_11: nibbhayaṃ, khemaṃ, sātarūpa, ntiādinā sukhākārena upaṭṭhānaṃ sukhanimittaṃ nāma.
anya-e0401n:407_12: Paccayā yattavuttikattā paccayena vinā kevalaṃ attano vasāyattavuttitā bhāvato anattānaṃyeva
anya-e0401n:407_13: sataṃ attano icchāvasena karoti, katheti, cinteti, gantuṃ icchanto gacchati, ṭhātuṃ
anya-e0401n:407_14: icchanto tiṭṭhatī, tiādinā vasavattanākārena upaṭṭhānaṃ attanimittaṃ nāma. Tathā
anya-e0401n:407_15: sattonāma sattāhaṃpi jīvati, māsaṃpi jīvati, saṃvaccharaṃpi jīvatītiādinā jīvākārena
anya-e0401n:407_16: upaṭṭhānaṃ jīvanimittaṃ nāma. Nanu cettha attano icchāvasena karotītiādīsu icchānāma
anya-e0401n:407_17: taṇhāvāchando vā. Tadubhayampi cittasampayuttaṃ. Karaṇañca nāma kāyikakriyābhūtānaṃ
anya-e0401n:407_18: cittajarūpakalāpānaṃ pavattiviseso. Evañcasati tesaṃ cittavasena pavattattā attano
anya-e0401n:407_19: icchāvasena karotīti idaṃ abhidhammaviruddhaṃ na hotīti. Na na hoti. Attanoti ca
anya-e0401n:407_20: karotīti ca vuttattā. Na hi attānāma atthi, yo attanoti vucceyya. Na ca kattānāma
anya-e0401n:407_21: atthi, yo karotīti vucceyya. Idha pana tasmiṃ samaye pavattaṃ khandhapañcakameva
anya-e0401n:407_22: attāti ca kattāti ca gahetvā attanoti ca karotīti ca vuttaṃ. “Avassayo hotī”ti patiṭṭhā
anya-e0401n:407_23: hoti. “Vidhamitvā”ti ñāṇena antaradhāpetvā. Sabhāvato vijjamānāni na hontīti dassanañāṇena
anya-e0401n:407_24: vinicchayaṃ pāpetvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Bhāvadassanaṃ nāma sokadukkhādīnaṃ abhāvadassanaṃ.
anya-e0401n:408_0: “Taṃ taṃ ghanavinibbhujjanavasenā”ti samūhasantati ghanādīnaṃ bhindana chindanavasena.
anya-e0401n:408_1: Tattha samūhaghanabhindanaṃ ādito dhammavavatthānañāṇakiccaṃ. Tadā attadiṭṭhi vikkhambhitā
anya-e0401n:408_2: hoti. Jīvadiṭṭhi ca nāma sukhumatarā attadiṭṭhi eva vuccati. Maggakkhaṇaṃ patvā eva
anya-e0401n:409_0: “Pātimokkha”nti ettha “patī”ti jeṭṭhako vuccati. “Mukhaṃ”ti mūlakāraṇaṃ. Pati ca
anya-e0401n:409_1: so mukhañcāti patimukhaṃ. Patimukhameva pātimokkhanti imamatthaṃ dassento “taṃ hī”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n:409_2: Sabbalokiyasīlāni nāma catupārisuddhisīlāni. Tesaṃ majjhe. “Jeṭṭhakattā”ti jeṭṭhakasīlattā.
anya-e0401n:409_4: dhammānaṃ. “Vipphanditāni nāmā”ti vippakiṇṇāni nāmāti adhippāyo. Tenāha “lolāni nāmā”ti.
anya-e0401n:409_8: sannissitañcāti imehi tividhehi kuhanavatthūhi. Tividhehi acchariya kammavidhānehīti
anya-e0401n:409_9: vuttaṃ hoti. Parisujjhatīti parisuddhi. Parisuddhi eva pārisuddhi. “Sammohassā”ti
anya-e0401n:409_11: kassaviya gedhassa, abhikaṅkhassa. “Madassā”ti lābhasakkārā dimūlakassa mānamadassa.
anya-e0401n:409_12: “Pamādassā”ti kusalesu dhammesu pamādassa muṭṭhassaccassa. Taṃ taṃ payojana mariyādo
anya-e0401n:409_13: nāma cīvarapaccaye tāva sītappaṭighātādiko payojanamariyādo. “Mariyādo”ti ca yāvadevāti
anya-e0401n:409_14: padena dassito sītappaṭighātādiko cīvarappayojana paricchedo. So ca cīvarapaccaye
anya-e0401n:409_15: sammohādike sāvajjapakkhe apatanatthāya ṭhapito. Tena vuttaṃ “sammohassa gedhassa
anya-e0401n:409_16: madassa pamādassa pahānatthaṃ”ti. Esanayo piṇḍapātapaccayādīsupi. Etena paccavekkhanāpāṭhesu
anya-e0401n:409_17: ayamattho dassito. Idha bhikkhu cīvaraṃ paṭisevati yāvadeva sītassa paṭighātāya uṇhassa
anya-e0401n:409_18: paṭighātāyātiādīsu yāvadeva sītassa paṭighātāya paṭisevati. Na tato uttari sammohatthāya
anya-e0401n:409_19: gedhatthāya madatthāya pamādatthāya paṭisevatītiādi. Evañcasati, yaṃ cīvaraṃ paṭisevantassa
anya-e0401n:409_20: sammohagedhamadappamādā uppajjanti. Taṃ na sevitabbaṃ. Itaraṃ sevitabbanti dassitaṃ hotīti.
anya-e0401n:410_1: kāriyaṃ. Āsannapphalaṃ. Tenāha “aggissadhūmoviyā”ti. Āsannakāraṇaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ nāma
anya-e0401n:410_2: aggikārako viya. Pajjati gacchati pavattati phalaṃ etenāti padaṃ. Tiṭṭhati phalaṃ
anya-e0401n:410_3: etthāti ṭhānaṃ. Ubhayaṃpi kāraṇa pariyāyo eva. Tena atissayatthopi sijjhatīti āha
anya-e0401n:410_5: Diṭṭhivippayuttā pana saññā citta vipallāsā vikkhambhituṃ sakkotīti na vattabbā.
anya-e0401n:410_6: “Sāsana dhamme”ti anattalakkhaṇa suttantādike suññata dhammappaṭisaṃyutte desanādhamme.
anya-e0401n:410_7: “Diṭṭhivipallāso vikkhambhito”ti tādisaṃ dhammadesanaṃ sutvā desake satthari ca desite
anya-e0401n:410_8: dhamme ca saddhaṃ paṭilabhitvā saccameva bhagavā āha, ahaṃ pana etaṃ mama, esohamasmi,
anya-e0401n:410_9: eso me attā,ti gaṇhāmi, micchāvatāyaṃ mamagāhoti evaṃ vikkhambhito hoti. Tato paṭṭhāya
anya-e0401n:410_10: eso me attāti vadantopi diṭṭhisampayuttacittena na vadati. Diṭṭhivippayuttacittena
anya-e0401n:410_11: eva vadatīti adhippāyo. Idampana daḷhaggāha vikkhambhanamattaṃ eva. Na attadassana
anya-e0401n:410_12: vikkhambhanaṃ. Taṃ pana dhammavavatthānaññāṇe siddhe eva sijjhatītipi vadanti. Catunnaṃ
anya-e0401n:410_13: āhārānaṃ vasena catudhā nāmarūpaṃ pariggahetabbameva. Kasmā, cattāro āhāre pariggahetvā
anya-e0401n:410_15: siddhattāti adhippāyo. Pañcadhātiādīsu esanayo. Ādikammikānaṃ avisayo, visuṃ visuṃ
anya-e0401n:410_16: lakkhaṇa rasādīhi pariggahetuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā. Pariggahaṇe sakkontassapi vipassanā
anya-e0401n:410_17: kamme visuṃ visuṃ passituṃ asakkuṇeyyattā ca. Tathāhi vakkhati “kalāpavasena saṃkhipitvā”ti.
anya-e0401n:410_18: “Aññassa kassacī”ti attajīvādikassa. So karoti kusalākusalaṃ kammaṃ. So paṭisaṃvedeti
anya-e0401n:410_19: bhavantaraṃ patvā tabbipākaṃ. Saṃsarati bhavato bhavaṃ. Sandhāvati kammavegena khitto.
anya-e0401n:410_20: Suddhe nāme eva vā rūpe eva vā īhābyāpārānaṃ abhāvadassanatoti yojanā. Puggalasattānaṃ
anya-e0401n:410_21: kriyāyoti saññitāti viggaho. “Attāti pavattā diṭṭhī”ti kāraka diṭṭhi. “Tadatthā bhinivesavasenā”ti
anya-e0401n:410_22: satto, puggalo, tiādi vohārassa sabbhāvato tassa atthabhūto sattapuggalādikopi sabhāvato
anya-e0401n:410_23: atthiyeva. No natthīti evaṃ daḷhaṃ hadaye sannidhānakaraṇa vasena. “Atidhāvanañcā”ti
anya-e0401n:410_24: vohāra paññattimatte aṭṭhatvā taṃ atikkamitvā pañcakkhandhe sattādibhāvena gahaṇañcāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:411_0: “Kammacittotukāhāravasenā”ti ettha kakāro sandhi vasena āgamo. Kammavasena cittavasena
anya-e0401n:411_1: utuvasena āhāravasenāti attho. Anurūpānaṃ paccayānaṃ sāmaggīti viggaho. “Aññathā
anya-e0401n:411_3: sambhārapaccayehi. Janaka paccayā hetupaccayā nāma. Parivārapaccayā sambhārapaccayā
anya-e0401n:411_5: Ekassa sattassa anamatagge saṃsāre saṃsarantassa rūpakāyopi atthi nāmakāyopi atthi.
anya-e0401n:411_6: Tato añño kocisabhāvo nāma natthi. Dve ca kāyā pañcavokāre saṃsarantassa ekato pavattanti.
anya-e0401n:411_7: Asaññasatte saṃsarantassa rūpakāyo eva pavattati. So eva tattha ekosattoti saṅkhyaṃ
anya-e0401n:411_8: gacchati. Arūpe saṃsarantassa nāma kāyo eva pavattati. So eva tattha eko sattoti
anya-e0401n:411_9: saṅkhyaṃ gacchati. “Saṅkhyaṃ gacchatī”ti ca paññattimattaṃ gacchatīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:411_10: Tesu ca kāyesu rūpakāye cuti paṭisandhīnaṃ aññamaññaṃ anantara paccayatā nāma natthi.
anya-e0401n:411_11: Ekamekasmiṃ bhave ekameko hutvā cutikāle bhijjati. Rūpasantati chijjati. Paṭisandhirūpena
anya-e0401n:411_12: saha paccaya paccayuppannatā pabandho nappavattati. Nāma kāye pana cuti paṭisandhīnaṃ
anya-e0401n:411_13: aññamaññaṃ anantarapaccayatā atthi. Cutikālepi nāmasantati na chijjati. Paṭisandhi
anya-e0401n:411_14: nāmena saha paccaya paccayuppannatā pabandho pavattatiyeva. Tattha paṭiccasamuppāda
anya-e0401n:411_15: kusalo bhikkhu paṭiccasamuppādaññāṇe ṭhatvā ekasmiṃbhave ekassa sattassa pavattiṃ
anya-e0401n:411_16: passanto sattaṃ nāma na passati. Puggalaṃ nāma na passati. Ahantipi na passati. Parotipi
anya-e0401n:411_17: na passati. Ahaṃ atītesu bhavesu ahosintipi na passati. Imasmiṃbhave asmītipi na
anya-e0401n:411_18: passati. Anāgatesu bhavissāmītipi na passati. Atha kho avijjā paccayā saṅkhārā pavattanti.
anya-e0401n:411_19: Saṅkhāra paccayā bhavantare viññāṇaṃ pavattatītiādinā nayena nāmarūpa dhammānaṃ hetuphala
anya-e0401n:411_20: paramparāvasena avicchedappavattimeva passati. Ekasmiṃbhave pavattiṃ passante sati,
anya-e0401n:411_21: anamataggesaṃsāre anantesu bhavesu tassa sattassa pavatti diṭṭhā eva hoti tatthapi
anya-e0401n:411_22: evameva, tatthapi evamevāti. Tadā tassa soḷasavidhā kaṅkhā pahīyatīti imamatthaṃ
anya-e0401n:411_23: “dassento anamatagge saṃsāre”tiādimāha. Tattha katamā soḷasavidhā kaṅkhāti. Ahosiṃ
anya-e0401n:411_24: nu kho ahaṃ atītamaddhānaṃ. Na nu kho ahosiṃ. Kiṃ nu kho ahosiṃ. Kathaṃ nu kho ahosiṃ.
anya-e0401n:411_25: Kiṃ hutvā kiṃ ahosiṃ nu kho ahaṃ atītamaddhānanti evaṃ pubbante pañcavidhā kaṅkhāvuttā.
anya-e0401n:411_26: Bhavissāmi nu kho ahaṃ anāgatamaddhānaṃ. Na nu kho bhavissāmi. Kiṃ nu kho bhavissāmi.
anya-e0401n:411_27: Kathaṃ nu kho bhavissāmi. Kiṃ hutvā kiṃ bhavissāmi nu kho ahaṃ anāgatamaddhānanti
anya-e0401n:411_28: evaṃ aparante pañcavidhā kaṅkhā vuttā. Ahaṃ nu kho smi. No nu kho smi. Kinnu kho
anya-e0401n:411_29: smi. Kathaṃ nu kho smi. Ahaṃ nu kho satto kuto āgato. So kuhiṃ gāmī bhavissāmīti
anya-e0401n:411_30: evaṃ paccuppanne chabbidhā kaṅkhā vuttā. Imā soḷasavidhā kaṅkhāti. Tattha ahosiṃ
anya-e0401n:411_31: nu kho, na nu kho ahosinti iminā padadvayena atītakāle attano atthi natthibhāve kaṅkhati.
anya-e0401n:411_32: Sace atthi, kiṃ nu kho ahosinti kaṅkhati. Kenaci hetunā paccayena vā ahosiṃ. Kenaci
anya-e0401n:411_33: iddhimantena vā nimmito ahosiṃ. Ahetu apaccayā vā animmito vā sayaṃjāto ahosinti
anya-e0401n:411_34: attho. Yadi tesupakāresu aññatarena ahosiṃ. Kathaṃ nu kho ahosiṃ. Apādakovā ahosiṃ.
anya-e0401n:411_35: Dvipādako vā. Catuppādakovā. Bahuppādakovā. Rūpīvā. Arūpīvā. Saññīvā. Asaññīvā iccādi.
anya-e0401n:411_36: Atha tesu apādakādīsu aññataro ahaṃ ahosiṃ. Kiṃ hutvā kiṃ ahosiṃ. Pathamabhave kiṃ
anya-e0401n:411_37: hutvā dutīya bhavādīsu kiṃ ahosinti idaṃ bhavaparamparāvasena vuttaṃ. Esanayo aparantepi.
anya-e0401n:411_38: Paccuppanne “ahaṃ nu kho smi, no nu kho smī”ti yathā khuddakavatthu vibhaṅge aṭṭhasatataṇhāvicaritesu.
anya-e0401n:411_39: Satasmīti hoti. Sītasmīti hotīti vuttaṃ. Tattha “satasmī”ti ahaṃ sassato vā bhavāmi.
anya-e0401n:411_40: “Sītasmī”ti ahaṃ ucchinnovā bhavāmīti attho. Yathā ca. Atthīti kho eko anto. Natthīti
anya-e0401n:411_41: kho dutīyo antoti vuttaṃ. Tattha “atthī”ti attānāma bhavābhavesu niccakālaṃ atthi.
anya-e0401n:411_42: “Natthī”ti tathā natthi, ucchijjati. Na hoti parammaraṇāti attho. Tathā idhāpi ahaṃ
anya-e0401n:411_43: nu kho smi. No nu kho smīti kaṅkhati. Tattha “ahaṃ nu khosmī”ti ayaṃ ahaṃ nāma bhavābhavesu
anya-e0401n:411_44: niccakālaṃ asmi nu kho, mama attānāma sassato hutvā sabbakālaṃ atthi nu khoti vuttaṃ
anya-e0401n:411_45: hoti. “No nu kho smī”ti tathā no asmi nu kho. Mama attā tathā natthi nu khoti attho.
anya-e0401n:411_46: Ettha ca “bhavābhavesū”ti pavattepi paccuppanne vattamānaṃ attānaṃ gahetvā pavattā
anya-e0401n:411_47: paccuppanne saṅgahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Kiṃ nu kho smī”ti ahaṃ nāma santo jāto kiṃ
anya-e0401n:411_48: nu kho asmi. Kenaci hetunā paccayena vā asmi nu kho. Kenaci iddhimantena vā nimmito
anya-e0401n:411_49: bhavāmi nu kho. Udāhu ahetu apaccayā vā kenaci animmito vā sayaṃ nu kho bhavāmi nu
anya-e0401n:411_50: khoti attho. “Kathaṃ nu kho smī”ti ettha pana apadādīhi ayojetvā ahaṃ nu kho kiṃ
anya-e0401n:411_51: gotto bhavāmi. Gotamagotto vā vāseṭṭha gotto vā tiādinā yojetabbaṃ. Ādi kappakāle
anya-e0401n:411_52: tāni gottāni etarahi sambhedaṃ gacchanti. Tasmā tesu kaṅkhanto kaṅkhatiyeva. “Ahaṃ
anya-e0401n:411_53: kuto āgato”ti ahaṃ atīte kutobhavato āgato asmi. “Sokuhiṃgāmī bhavissāmī”ti so ahaṃ
anya-e0401n:411_54: āyatiṃ bhave kuhiṃ gāmiko bhavissāmīti kaṅkhati. “Kaṅkhāya atikkamo”ti so bhikkhu
anya-e0401n:411_55: paṭiccasamuppāde avijjādikaṃ atītahetu pañcakaṃ passanto tasmiṃbhave sabbaṃpi paṭiccasamuppādaṃ
anya-e0401n:411_56: passatiyeva. Evaṃ passanto na tattha ahaṃ nāma koci atthi, yaṃ paṭicca atīta visayā
anya-e0401n:411_57: pañcavidhā kaṅkhā uppajjati. Dhamma mattameva tattha atthīti evaṃ atīte kaṅkhā vatthussa
anya-e0401n:411_58: abhāvadassanena pañcavidhāya kaṅkhāya atikkamo hoti. Nanu tathā passantassapi kathaṃ
anya-e0401n:411_59: nu kho smi, kiṃ hutvā kiṃ ahosiṃ nu khoti ayaṃ kaṅkhā atthiyeva. Tathā passantopi
anya-e0401n:411_60: hi vinā pubbenivāsaññāṇena atīte bhave ahaṃ dvipādako ahosintivā catuppādako ahosinti
anya-e0401n:411_61: vā tato cuto asukabhave uppannoti vā na jānāti na passatīti. Vuccate. Sā pana kaṅkhā
anya-e0401n:411_62: dhamma mattappavatti dassanato paṭṭhāya antarāyika kaṅkhā na hoti. Vicikicchā paṭirūpikā
anya-e0401n:411_63: eva. Sā hi ariyānaṃpi labbhati yevāti. Tathā anāgate phalapañcakaṃ passanto aparante
anya-e0401n:411_64: pañcavidhaṃ kaṅkhaṃ atikkamati. Paccuppanne phalapañcakañca hetupañcakañca passanto
anya-e0401n:411_65: paccuppanne kaṅkhā chakkaṃ atikkamati. Sesaṃ sabbaṃ pubbante vuttanayamevāti. Aṭṭhavidhāya
anya-e0401n:411_66: kaṅkhāya atikkamane pana paṭiccasamuppādaṃ anulomappaṭilomaṃ passanto desanā dhamme
anya-e0401n:411_67: ca lokuttara dhammesu ca kaṅkhaṃ atikkamati. Dhamme kaṅkhātikkamanena saheva desente
anya-e0401n:411_68: satthari ca, yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipanne saṅghe ca, tīsu sikkhāsu ca, yathāvutte pubbante
anya-e0401n:411_69: ca, aparante ca, pubbantā parantesu ca, paṭiccasamuppādena saha paṭiccasamuppannesu
anya-e0401n:411_70: dhammesu ca sabbaṃ kaṅkhaṃ atikkamatiyeva. Tenāha “sabhāva dhammappavattiyā”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:411_72: ca. Dhammasu dhammatā nāma desanā dhammassa svākkhātatādibhāvena sundara dhammatā.
anya-e0401n:411_73: Anavajjadhammatā. Buddhasubuddhatā nāma taṃ dhammaṃ desentassa buddhassa sabbaññubuddhatā.
anya-e0401n:412_0: Pariyuṭṭhitānaṃ diṭṭhivicikicchānaṃ vikkhambhanaṃ nāma heṭṭhā dhammavavatthāna vasena
anya-e0401n:412_1: paccayapariggahavasena ca sijjhati. Vipassanā kammaṃ pana anusayabhūtānaṃ diṭṭhivicikicchānaṃ
anya-e0401n:412_3: tasmiṃ paṭisambhidā magge pana. Vibhattesūti pāṭhaseso. “Yassā”ti yogī puggalassa.
anya-e0401n:412_4: “Yaṃ dūre santikevā”ti yaṃ dūre pavattaṃ rūpaṃ vā, santike pavattaṃ rūpaṃvāti pāṭhaseso.
anya-e0401n:412_6: suṭṭhuvibhūtaṃ katvāti adhippāyo. Idāni yaṃ yaṃ daḷhaṃ gahetabbaṃ. Taṃ taṃ sarūpato
anya-e0401n:412_7: dassetuṃ “tatthā”tiādimāha. Puna daḷhaṃ gahitassa rūpassa aniccalakkhaṇaṃ dassetuṃ
anya-e0401n:412_8: “sā ca kriyā”tiādi vuttaṃ. “Nassantī”ti bhijjanti. Aniccataṃ gacchanti. “Vitthambhana
anya-e0401n:412_9: kriyā”ti ettha vividhena thambhanaṃ vitthambhanaṃ. Nānādisābhimukhavasena thambhanaṃ
anya-e0401n:412_10: vahananti attho. “Imāsañcā”ti catunnaṃ mahābhūtānañca. Visuṃ visunti vuttattā tāsaṃ
anya-e0401n:412_11: aññamaññañca sahajātesu gahaṇaṃ sambhavatīti vuttaṃ “āpādīnaṃ”ti. Āpādīnaṃ sesamahābhūtānañcāti
anya-e0401n:412_12: attho. Santatiyā sarīrāni santati sarīrāni. “Tathā tathā kappetvā”ti rūpadhammānaṃ
anya-e0401n:412_13: santati parivatti nāma abhikkamantassa evaṃ bhaveyya, paṭikkamantassa evaṃ bhaveyya,
anya-e0401n:412_14: tathā samiñjantassa pasārentassātiādinā parikappetvā. “Sesakhandhesupi taṃ taṃ santati
anya-e0401n:412_15: nānattaṃ”ti vedanākkhandhe tāva kāye kāyikasukhasantati dukkhasantatīnaṃ nānattaṃ.
anya-e0401n:412_16: Citte somanassa domanassa santatīnaṃ. Upekkhā santati pana avibhūtā hoti. Kappetvā
anya-e0401n:412_17: gahetabbā. Yadā citte somanassa domanassāni na sandissanti, tadā idāni upekkhā me
anya-e0401n:412_18: vedanā pavattatīti vā, yadā tāni sandissanti, tadā sā nirujjhatīti vā evaṃ takketvā
anya-e0401n:412_19: sammasitabbāti vuttaṃ hoti. Saññākkhandhe rūpasaññāsaddasaññādīnaṃ vasena. Saṅkhārakkhandhe
anya-e0401n:412_20: rūpasañcetanā saddasañcetanādīnaṃ vasena, nānāvitakka vicārādīnaṃ vasena, lobhālobha
anya-e0401n:412_21: dosādosa mohāmohādīnaṃ vasena ca. Viññāṇakkhandhe cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ, kusalā kusalaviññāṇādīnañca
anya-e0401n:412_22: vasena santati nānattaṃ veditabbaṃ. Vissāsaṃ karotīti vatvā tadatthaṃ vivarati “etaṃ
anya-e0401n:412_23: me”tiādinā. Tattha tayovissāsā taṇhāvissāso, mānavissāso, diṭṭhivissāso. Tattha etaṃ
anya-e0401n:412_24: mamāti taṇhāvissāso. Esohamasmīti mānavissāso. Eso me attāti diṭṭhivissāso. “Pariharatī”ti
anya-e0401n:412_26: Ajjhattasārabhāvenāti vuttaṃ hoti. “Pariggahito”ti eso me attāti diṭṭhipariggahena
anya-e0401n:412_27: pariggahito. Tayo hi pariggahā taṇhā pariggaho, mānapariggaho, diṭṭhipariggahoti.
anya-e0401n:412_28: Vase sabbaso vattanto nāma kevalaṃ vasāyattavuttiko eva siyā, na paccayāyattavuttikoti
anya-e0401n:412_30: kammābhisaṅkharaṇādīhi. “Tathāpariggahetabbo”ti eso me attāti evaṃ paramajjhattabhāvena
anya-e0401n:412_31: pariggahetabbo. Tathā hi yo attano vasena vattati, tasmiṃ attano sāmibhāvo natthi.
anya-e0401n:412_32: Yasmiñca sāmibhāvo natthi, tasmiṃ rūpādike dhamme attānaṃ sāmikaṃ katvā eso mama
anya-e0401n:412_33: attāti pariggaho nāma micchā eva. Tathā yo ca khaṇika dhammo hoti, khaṇe khaṇe bhijjati,
anya-e0401n:412_34: taṃ rūpādikaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ attano sāraṃ katvā tathā pariggahopi micchā eva. Ettha
anya-e0401n:412_35: ca “micchā evā”ti paramattha saccaṃ patvā micchā eva. Vipallāso evāti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:412_36: “Sukhaṃ viddhaṃsetī”ti kāyikasukhañca cetasika sukhañca viddhaṃseti. Vināseti. “Nānādukkhaṃ
anya-e0401n:412_37: janetī”ti kāyikadukkhañca cetasika dukkhañca janeti uppādeti. “Idañca rūpaṃ edisameva
anya-e0401n:412_38: hotī”ti kathaṃ hoti. Manussattabhāve ṭhitānaṃ sattānaṃ yathāpavattaṃ manussa sukhaṃ
anya-e0401n:412_39: viddhaṃseti, jiṇṇabhinnabhāvaṃ pāpeti, nānādukkhaṃ janeti. Sayaṃ apāyattabhāvaṃ gahetvā
anya-e0401n:412_40: tesaṃ nānāapāya dukkhaṃ janeti. Tathā devattabhāve sakkattabhāve brahmattabhāve ṭhitānantiādinā
anya-e0401n:412_41: vattabbaṃ. Tathā manussattabhāve ṭhitānaṃ nānāvipariṇāma kiccehi yathāpavattaṃ sukhaṃ
anya-e0401n:412_42: viddhaṃseti, nānāpaccayābhisaṅkharaṇakiccehi nānādukkhaṃ janeti. Tena vuttaṃ “idañca
anya-e0401n:412_43: rūpaṃ edisamevā”ti. “Sāronāma thāmabalaviseso vuccatī”ti etena thāmabalavisesena
anya-e0401n:412_44: sampannaṃ vatthuṃpi saṅgaṇhāti. “Asārakaṭṭhenā”ti ettha sāro eva sārakaṃ, na sārakaṃ
anya-e0401n:412_45: asārakanti imamatthaṃ sandhāya “rūpaṃ pana sayaṃpi evarūpo sāro na hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:412_46: Sattānaṃ attasāro jīvasāro na hotīti attho. Natthi sāro etassāti asārakanti imamatthaṃ
anya-e0401n:412_47: sandhāya “na ca evarūpena sārena yuttaṃ”ti vuttaṃ. Attasārena jīvasārena saṃyuttaṃ
anya-e0401n:412_48: hotīti attho. Tattha purimo attho rūpaṃ attato samanupassatīti idaṃ sandhāya vutto.
anya-e0401n:412_49: Pacchimo rūpavantaṃ vā attānaṃ, attani vā rūpaṃ, rūpasmiṃ vā attānaṃti imāni sandhāya
anya-e0401n:412_50: vutto. Etena asārakaṭṭhenāti asārabhāvena, asārayuttabhāvena vāti ca. Anattāti etthapi
anya-e0401n:412_51: na attā anattā, natthi attā etassāti vā anattāti ca dvidhā attho sijjhati. “Yañcā”ti
anya-e0401n:412_52: yañca rūpaṃ. “Pīḷetī”ti taṃ samaṅgī puggalaṃ pīḷeti. Etena anattabhāve siddhe dukkhabhāvopi
anya-e0401n:412_53: siddhoti dasseti. “Tiṇṇaṃ vayānaṃ vasena addhābhedo yojetabbo”ti pathamavaye pavattaṃ
anya-e0401n:412_54: rūpaṃ dutīyavayaṃ na pāpuṇāti, pathamavaye eva nirujjhatītiādinā addhāpaccuppanne
anya-e0401n:412_56: ekībhūtā santati sabhāgekasantati. “Sabhāgānaṃ dhammānaṃ”ti ca cittajesutāva nirantarappavattena
anya-e0401n:412_57: lobhasampayuttacittena sahajātā rūpadhammā sabhāgarūpadhammā nāma. Tathā nāma dhammā
anya-e0401n:412_58: ca. Evaṃ dosasampayuttādīsupi. Utujesu nirantarappavattena sītautunā samuṭṭhitā rūpadhammā
anya-e0401n:412_59: sabhāgarūpa dhammā nāma. Tathā uṇhautunā samuṭṭhitā. Esanayo āhārajesupīti evaṃ sabhāgekasantativasena.
anya-e0401n:412_61: sammasanaṃ visesato adhippetaṃ. Evañca katvā heṭṭhā aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhenāti pade catunnaṃ
anya-e0401n:412_62: mahābhūtānaṃ santati vibhāganayo suṭṭhu dassitoti. “Aniccalakkhaṇa dassanameva padhānaṃ”ti
anya-e0401n:412_63: imasmiṃ ñāṇepi udayabbayaññāṇepi bhaṅgaññāṇepi aniccalakkhaṇa dassanameva padhānaṃ.
anya-e0401n:412_64: Bhayaññāṇe ca ādīnavaññāṇe ca nibbidāñāṇe ca dukkhalakkhaṇa dassanaṃ padhānaṃ. Upari
anya-e0401n:412_65: catūsu ñāṇesu anattalakkhaṇa dassanaṃ padhānanti. “Samuditesū”ti aññamaññaṃ avinābhāvasahāyabhāvena
anya-e0401n:412_66: samuppannesu. Idañca avijjāsamudayā rūpasamudayo. Taṇhāsamudayā upādāna samudayo.
anya-e0401n:412_67: Āhāra samudayā rūpasamudayoti pāḷivasena vuttaṃ. Appahīna vasenāti pāḷipade pana
anya-e0401n:412_68: avijjā taṇhā diṭṭhānusayānaṃ appahīnaṭṭhena santāne vijjamānatā eva pamāṇanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:412_69: “Samudentī”ti paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya ekato udenti. Uparūpari enti. Āgacchantīti attho.
anya-e0401n:412_71: pavaḍḍhamānā savanti, pavattanti, sandanti. “Tesu panā”ti avijjā taṇhupādāna kammesu.
anya-e0401n:412_72: “Nirujjhantī”ti tasmiṃbhave eva nirujjhanti. Tasmiṃ bhave nirodho nāma bhavantare
anya-e0401n:412_73: puna anuppādo yevāti vuttaṃ “bhavantare”tiādi. “Taṃ santatiyaṃ”ti tasmiṃ paccuppanna
anya-e0401n:412_74: bhaveti vuttaṃ hoti. “Puna anuppādasaṅkhātaṃ nirodhaṃ”ti santati nirodho nāma vutto.
