anya-e0401n:412_75: Na nibbāna nirodho. Etāhi paccaye sati, bhavantare uppajjīssanti yevāti. Idāni yathāpavatta
anya-e0401n:412_76: santatīsu pariyāpannānaṃ sabbapacchimānaṃ nāmarūpānaṃ khaṇikanirodhavasena atthaṃ
anya-e0401n:412_77: vadanto “yathāpavatta santatiyo vā chijjanti bhijjantī”ti vuttaṃ. “Udayabbayaṃ samanupassantassa
anya-e0401n:412_78: cā”ti ettha katamo udayo nāma, katamo vayo nāma, kathañca tadubhayaṃ samanupassatīti
anya-e0401n:412_79: āha “udayabbayaṃ passantassāti ettha yathā nāmā”tiādiṃ. Tattha “tamo khandho”ti tamorāsi.
anya-e0401n:412_80: “Vetī”ti vigacchati. Antara dhāyati.“Udayo”ti uppādo ceva vaḍḍhi ca. “Vayo”ti vigamanaṃ,
anya-e0401n:412_82: nānāsantatīnaṃ udayañca udayato. Vayapakkhānaṃ nānāsantatīnaṃ vayañca vayatoti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:413_0: Bojjhaṅga dhammehi sampannattā ārādheti attano cittaṃti āraddho. Tuṭṭhacittoti attho.
anya-e0401n:413_1: Vipassatīti vipassako. Āraddho hutvā vipassako āraddhavipassako. Duvidhohi vipassako
anya-e0401n:413_2: taruṇa vipassako ca āraddha vipassako ca. Tattha khandhānaṃ udayabbayaṃ suṭṭhu apassanto
anya-e0401n:413_3: dubbalavipassako taruṇa vipassako nāma. Khandhānaṃ udayabbayaṃ suṭṭhu passanto vipassanā
anya-e0401n:413_4: kamme ārādhita citto balavavipassako āraddhavipassako nāma. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:416: Amānusī ratī hoti, samma dhammaṃ vipassato,ti ca.
anya-e0401n:419: Ekāhaṃ jīvitaṃ seyyo, passato udayabbayaṃ,ti ca.
anya-e0401n:420_0: Ayamidha adhippeto. Vipassanaṃ upecca kilesenti, malīnabhāvaṃ gamentīti vipassanupakkilesā.
anya-e0401n:420_1: Paribandhanti nīvārentīti paribandhakāti heṭṭhā vuttameva antarāyika dhammānaṃ nāmaṃ.
anya-e0401n:420_2: “Sarīrobhāso”ti sakalasarīrato nikkhanto obhāso. “Pañcavidhā pītī”ti khuddikā pīti,
anya-e0401n:420_3: khaṇikā pīti, okkantikā pīti, ubbegā pīti, pharaṇā pītīti. “Duvidhā passaddhī”ti
anya-e0401n:420_4: atibalavantī kāyapassaddhiceva cittapassaddhi ca. Vipassanā kamme okappanākārappavattā
anya-e0401n:420_5: saddhāeva adhimuccanaṭṭhena adhimokkho saddhādhimokkho. “Vīriyaṃ”ti tasmiṃ kamme
anya-e0401n:420_8: kamme appamuṭṭhā sati. “Tatramajjhattupekkhā”ti cittassa līnuddhaccādīhi visamantehi
anya-e0401n:420_11: missakattā idaṃ akusalantipi jānituṃ asakkuṇeyyā sukhumataṇhā. “Na vatame”ti mama
anya-e0401n:420_12: na uppannapubbovatāti yojanā. “Assādasahitā”ti obhāsādīsu assādataṇhā sahitā. “Adhimāna
anya-e0401n:420_15: “Handā”ti cittavissaṭṭhakaraṇe nipātapadaṃ. Idāneva naṃ visodhemi, na ciraṃ pavattituṃ
anya-e0401n:420_16: dassāmīti imamatthaṃ dīpeti. “Tesvevā”ti tesuobhāsādīsu eva. Aṭṭhakathāya na sameti.
anya-e0401n:420_17: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ nikanti vikkhambhanassa visuṃ vuttattāti adhippāyo. Vipassanāparipāko
anya-e0401n:420_19: Vuṭṭhānagāmini vipassanābhāvapattenāti vuttaṃ hoti. “Dve vipassanā cittānī”ti upacārānulomacittāni.
anya-e0401n:420_20: So hi vuṭṭhānanti vuccatīti sambandho. Saṅkhāra nimittato vā vuṭṭhāti. Nibbānaṃ ārabbha
anya-e0401n:420_21: pavattito. Yadi evaṃ gotrabhupi vuṭṭhānaṃ nāma siyāti. Na siyā. Maggassa āvajjanamatte
anya-e0401n:420_22: ṭhitattā. Paṭivedhakiccassaca sammoha samucchedakiccassa abhāvato. “Sayaṃ”ti maggasaṅkhāto
anya-e0401n:420_23: sayaṃ. “Taṃ samaṅgīpuggalaṃ vā”ti tena maggena samaṅgīpuggalaṃ vā. “Vaṭṭappavattato
anya-e0401n:420_24: cā”ti āyatiṃ bhavesu apāyavaṭṭappavattato vā, aṭṭhama bhavato paṭṭhāya kāmasugati
anya-e0401n:420_25: vaṭṭappavattato vā. Avassaṃ vuṭṭhānaṃ gameti sampāpetīti vuṭṭhānagāminīti vacanattho.
anya-e0401n:420_26: “Avassaṃ vuṭṭhānaṃ gacchantī”ti idha ṭhitānaṃ vuṭṭhānato nivatti nāma natthīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:420_27: Idañca paccekabuddhānaṃ buddhasāvakānañca vasena daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sabbaññu bodhisattā
anya-e0401n:420_28: pana pubbabuddhānaṃ sāsane pabbajitvā vipassanā kammaṃ ārabhantā anulomaññāṇaṃ āhacca
anya-e0401n:420_29: ṭhapentīti aṭṭhaka thāsu vuttaṃ. Tattha “āhaccā”ti idaṃ saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇassa matthakapattidassanatthaṃ
anya-e0401n:420_30: vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Āvajjanaṭṭhāniyaṃ”ti tato pubbabhāge kenaci cittena aggahite
anya-e0401n:420_31: nibbānā rammaṇe āvajjanaṭṭhāniyaṃ. “Taṃ”ti gotrabhuññāṇaṃ. Gottaṃ bhavati abhibhavati
anya-e0401n:420_32: chindatīti gotrabhu. Gottaṃ vā abhisambhuṇāti pāpuṇātīti gotrabhūti vacanattho. Kathaṃ
anya-e0401n:420_33: pana gotrabhu cittaṃ gotrabhuññāṇaṃ puthujjanagottaṃ chindati, ariyagottaṃ pāpuṇātīti
anya-e0401n:420_34: yujjeyya, sohi puggalo tasmiṃkhaṇe puthujjanagottapariyāpannoevāti. Saccaṃ. Attani
anya-e0401n:420_35: pana chinnattā sayaṃ chindati nāma. Nibbānassa ca ariyagocarattā taṃ ārammaṇa karaṇavasena
anya-e0401n:420_36: ariyagottaṃ pāpuṇāti nāmāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Paccayasattivisesena attano anantare ariyagottaṃ
anya-e0401n:420_37: bhāveti, pātubhāvetīti gotrabhūtipi yujjati. “Paricchijjā”ti paricchinditvā. Diṭṭhivicikicchādīhi
anya-e0401n:420_38: sabbavipphandanehi muñcitvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Sammohassa pahānameva daṭṭhabbaṃ. Na te
anya-e0401n:420_39: dhamme ārammaṇa karaṇa vasena jānanaṃ. Kathaṃ te dhamme ārammaṇaṃ akaronto maggo
anya-e0401n:420_40: te dhamme parijānāti nāmāti. Kiccasiddhi vasena. So hi sammohaṃ pajahanto ārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0401n:420_41: karontānipi hi pubbabhāgaññāṇāni tappahānakiccassa asādhakattā dukkha saccaṃ parijānantānīti
anya-e0401n:420_42: na vuccanti. Maggo pana ārammaṇaṃ akarontopi tappahānakiccassa sādhakattātaṃ saccaṃ
anya-e0401n:420_43: parijānātīti vuccati. Kasmā. Tato paṭṭhāya tassapuggalassa sabbakālaṃ tasmiṃsacce
anya-e0401n:420_44: parijānana kiccassa siddhattā. Yathāhi eko puriso cakkhumhi pittasemhādidosehi palibuddhattā
anya-e0401n:420_45: andho hoti. Na kiñci passati. Yadā pana so ekaṃ tejavantaṃ añjanaṃ labhitvā cakkhuṃ
anya-e0401n:420_46: añjayanto sabbarattiṃ niddāyati. Tassa niddāyantasseva cakkhumhi sabbadosā nassanti.
anya-e0401n:420_47: Cakkhu vippasannaṃ hoti. Taṅkhaṇato paṭṭhāya so niddāyantopi rūpāni passatīti vuccati.
anya-e0401n:420_48: Kasmā, andhabhāvavigamena dassanakiccassa siddhattā. Evamevamidaṃ daṭṭhabbanti. Ekadesena
anya-e0401n:420_49: vā heṭṭhimamaggesu, anavasesena vā arahattamagge. “Apacchāvattikaṃ”ti ettha pacchato
anya-e0401n:420_50: āvattanaṃ pacchāvattaṃ. Natthi pacchāvattaṃ assāti apacchāvattikanti viggaho. “Puna
anya-e0401n:420_51: anuppādadhammatāpattivasena nirodhasaṅkhātaṃ”ti maggakkhaṇe eva tānivaṭṭāni puna
anya-e0401n:420_53: bhāvanāyā”ti etena maggassa ekacittakkhaṇikattā vaḍḍhanasaṅkhātāya bhāvanāya okāso
anya-e0401n:420_54: natthīti katvā vuttaṃ. Ariyamaggaṃ paṭilābhatthāya pana pavattitā pubbabhāgabhāvanāpi
anya-e0401n:420_55: maggabhāvanā eva. Sā ca ariyamaggaṃ patvā matthakapattā hoti. Tasmā ariyamaggo eva
anya-e0401n:420_56: matthakapatto bhāvanānuttaro hotīti imināpariyāyena vaḍḍhana saṅkhātāya bhāvanāyātipi
anya-e0401n:420_57: yujjatiyeva. Attano anantare pavattaṃ ānantarikaṃ. Ānantarikaṃ phalaṃ etassāti viggaho.
anya-e0401n:420_58: Tassa ca tatoparaṃ dve vā tīṇi vā phalacittāni pavattantīti iminā sambandho. Apanīto
anya-e0401n:420_59: aggi etasmāti apanītaggiko. “Nibbāpento viyā”ti etena paṭippassambhanappahānakiccena
anya-e0401n:420_60: maggānukulappavattiṃ dasseti. “Tesaṃ”ti tesaṃ cakkhūnaṃ. Taṃ rūpaṃ tassa pākaṭaṃ
anya-e0401n:420_61: na tāva hotīti sambandho. “Tassā”ti tassa puggalassa. “Paccavekkhanavāresū”ti ettha
anya-e0401n:420_62: pasādacakkhunā diṭṭhe pavattā anubandhaka vīthiyopi saṅgayhanti.
anya-e0401n:421_1: asukākilesā pahīyantīti evaṃ kilesavibhāgesu. “Pāḷiyaṃ”ti paṭisambhidā maggapāḷiyaṃ.
anya-e0401n:421_2: Vuccamāne pana vattabbanti sambandho. Maggaṅgabojjhaṅgādīnaṃ paccavekkhanaṃ nāma
anya-e0401n:421_3: maggapaccavekkhanameva. Tathā pacchā vā pavattatīti siddhaṃ. “Aviruddhā hotī”ti visuddhimaggena
anya-e0401n:421_6: ariyabhūto bhikkhu. “No laddhuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti aladdhuṃ na vaṭṭatīti attho. Laddhuṃ
anya-e0401n:421_7: no na vaṭṭatīti vā yojanā. Catubbidhaṃ maggaññāṇaṃ gahitaṃ. Ñāṇadassanavisuddhi nāmāti vuttattā.
anya-e0401n:422_1: tassa pavattanaṃ viya. “Kevalaṃ paccayāyatta vuttitāya adiṭṭhattā”ti etena eso me
anya-e0401n:422_2: attā, na parassa attāti evaṃ attānaṃ attassa sāmikaṃ katvā gahaṇakāraṇaṃ vadati.
anya-e0401n:422_3: Tattha kevalasaddena paramattha saccaṃ patvā attasseva abhāvato khandhapañcakassa
anya-e0401n:422_4: attanovasāyatta vuttitaṃ nivatteti. Sammuti saccaṃ pana patvā attassa vijjamānattā
anya-e0401n:422_5: mahājano attano khandhapañcakaṃ attano vasāyatta vuttiṃ maññamāno eso me attāti gaṇhāti.
anya-e0401n:422_6: “Khaṇabhaṅgassa ca adiṭṭhattā”ti etena eso me sāraṭṭhena attā. Eso mama sāro. Etaṃ
anya-e0401n:422_7: mama sarīraṃ. Yāva vassasataṃpi vassasahassampi etaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ na bhijjati,
anya-e0401n:422_8: na vinassati. Tāva ahaṃ na marāmi. Yadā etaṃ bhijjati, vinassati. Tadā ahaṃ marāmi.
anya-e0401n:422_9: Ahañca mama khandhapañcakañca advayaṃ anānattanti evaṃ gahaṇakāraṇaṃ vadati. Tattha
anya-e0401n:422_10: “khaṇabhaṅgassā”ti nāmarūpadhammānaṃ khaṇe khaṇe bhañjanassa bhijjanassa maraṇassa.
anya-e0401n:422_11: Idampanamaraṇaṃ sammuti sacce natthi. Paramattha sacce eva atthi. Tasmā taṃ apassanto
anya-e0401n:422_12: mahājano attano khandhapañcakaṃ attanosāraṃ maññamāno eso me attāti gaṇhātīti. “Taṃ
anya-e0401n:422_13: dvayaṃ sudiṭṭhaṃ katvā”ti khandhapañcakassa kevalaṃ paccayāyatta vuttitañca khaṇabhaṅgañca
anya-e0401n:422_14: ñāṇa cakkhunā suṭṭhudiṭṭhaṃ katvā. Tattha pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṃ
anya-e0401n:422_15: suṭṭhupassanto kevalaṃ paccayāyatta vuttitañca avasāyatta vuttitañca suṭṭhu passati.
anya-e0401n:422_16: Yo ca attano vasāyattavutti na hoti. So paramatthasaccaṃ patvā eso mama santakantipi
anya-e0401n:422_17: vattuṃ nārahati. Kuto mama attāti. Api ca, satto nāma sabhāvato natthi. Paññattimattaṃ
anya-e0401n:422_18: hoti. Yo ‘ahanti vā, meti vā, mamāti vā, gayheyya. Asante ca attasmiṃ ko mama attā
anya-e0401n:422_19: nāma bhaveyyāti. Khaṇabhaṅgo hoti. Khaṇe khaṇe bhijjati. Satto ca nāma ekasmiṃbhave
anya-e0401n:422_20: ādimhi sakiṃ eva jāyati. Ante sakiṃ eva marati. Antarā vassasataṃpi vassasahassaṃpi
anya-e0401n:422_21: maraṇaṃ nāma natthi. Aññāhi khaṇikadhammānaṃ gati. Aññā sattassa. Evaṃsante kathaṃ
anya-e0401n:422_22: khaṇikadhammā sattassa sāraṭṭhena attānāma bhaveyyunti. Tasmā te avasavattanaṭṭhena
anya-e0401n:422_23: asārakaṭṭhena ca anattā eva. Apica “avasavattanaṭṭhenā”ti ettha vaso nāma sattasantāne
anya-e0401n:422_24: eko padhānadhammo. Sace attānāma atthi. So eva padhānabhūtassa vasassapi attā bhaveyya.
anya-e0401n:422_25: Evaṃsati, yo vaso, so attā. Yo attā, so vasoti bhaveyya. Tathā ca sati, rūpaṃ attāti
anya-e0401n:422_26: gaṇhanto rūpañca vasañca attānañca ekattaṃ katvā gaṇhāti nāma. Tathā vedanaṃ attāti.
anya-e0401n:422_27: Saññaṃ, saṅkhāre, viññāṇaṃ attāti gaṇhantepi. Evañcasati, satto ca khandhapañcakañca
anya-e0401n:422_28: vaso ca attā ca sabbametaṃ ekattaṃ gacchati, eko sattoti saṅkhyaṃ gacchati. Na hi
anya-e0401n:422_29: imasmiṃ vasavattanaṭṭhe ekassasattassa dve attā tayo attā bahūattāti sakkā bhavituṃ.
anya-e0401n:422_30: Atha yathā yathā sattassa vaso vattati, icchā pavattati. Tathā tathā khandhapañcakampi
anya-e0401n:422_31: niccakālaṃ sattassavasaṃ anugaccheyya. Kasmā, sattassa ca khandhapañcakassa ca vasassa
anya-e0401n:422_32: ca nānattābhāvato. Evaṃ anugacchante sati. Rūpaṃ me attā, vedanā me attātiādiggahaṇaṃ
anya-e0401n:422_33: vaṭṭeyya. Sabhāvato aviruddhaṃ bhaveyya. Na pana tathā anugacchati. Na hi dubbaṇṇo
anya-e0401n:422_34: durūpo puriso attano rūpakāyaṃ attano vaseneva suvaṇṇaṃ surūpaṃ kātuṃ sakkoti. Tathā
anya-e0401n:422_35: dussaddovā susaddaṃ, duggandhovā sugandhaṃ. Na ca andhovā anandhaṃ. Badhirovā abadhiraṃ.
anya-e0401n:422_36: Rogīvā arogaṃ. Kuṭṭhīvā akuṭṭhaṃ. Gaṇḍīvā agaṇḍaṃ. Jiṇṇovā taruṇaṃ. Ajaraṃ vā amaraṇaṃ
anya-e0401n:422_37: vā kātuṃ sakkoti. Nāpi apāyesu ca apatantaṃ. Patitvā vā tato vimuttaṃ kātuṃ sakkoti.
anya-e0401n:422_38: Tathā devo vā devattā acāvetuṃ. Sakkovā sakkattā, māro vā mārattā, brahmā vā brahmattāti.
anya-e0401n:422_39: Esanayo sesakhandhesupi. Tathā pana avasānugamanato paramattha saccaṃ patvā khandhapañcake
anya-e0401n:422_40: attano sāmikiccaṃ issarakiccaṃ nāma natthi. Asāmikameva taṃ hoti, anissaraṃ. Tathā
anya-e0401n:422_41: ca sati, attānaṃ tassa sāmiṃ issaraṃ katvā rūpaṃ me attāti gahaṇaṃ micchāgahaṇaṃ
anya-e0401n:422_42: nāma hotīti. Loke pana mahājano dhammānaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṃ na jānanti, na passanti,
anya-e0401n:422_43: na paṭivijjhanti. Tesaṃ parampara paccayavasena pavattamāne khandhasantāne sammuti
anya-e0401n:422_44: saccavasena nānāvasavattanākārā nāma santi. Nānāsāmi issarādhipativohārā ca loke
anya-e0401n:422_45: sandissanti. Te sammuti saccavasena uppannesu tesu sāmiissarādhipati vohāresu vohāramatte
anya-e0401n:422_46: aṭhatvā sabhāvasaccaṃ maññantā micchāgahaṇaṃ gaṇhanti. Ettha siyā. Na nu vasonāma
anya-e0401n:422_47: icchā. Satto ca gantuṃ icchanto gacchati. Ṭhātuṃ icchanto tiṭṭhati. Evaṃsati. Tassa
anya-e0401n:422_48: khandhapañcakaṃ tassa vasāyatta vutti eva hotīti. Na hoti. Kasmā, paccayāyatta vuttittā
anya-e0401n:422_49: eva. Tathāhi gantuṃ icchānāma bahiddhā dhanahetuvā uppajjeyya. Nānābhogahetu vā.
anya-e0401n:422_50: Aññena vā nānākāraṇena. Tattha yesaṃ dhane asati, yaṃ yaṃ dukkhaṃ āgaccheyya kāyikaṃ
anya-e0401n:422_51: vā cetasikaṃ vā. Tesaṃ taṃ taṃ dukkhapaccayā dhanicchā nāma uppajjati. Dhanicchā
anya-e0401n:422_52: paccayā ganticchādayo uppajjanti. Tathā nānābhogicchā nānākammicchāsu cāti. Nānādukkhabhayupaddavamūlikāsu
anya-e0401n:422_53: icchāsu vattabba meva natthi. Tathā nānārammaṇānaṃ palobhana dukkhamūlikāsu ca nānāvitakkānaṃ
anya-e0401n:422_54: vipphandanamūlikāsu ca icchāsu. Evaṃ vasopi paccayāyatta vuttiko eva hoti. “Gamanaṃ”ti
anya-e0401n:422_55: gamanākārena pavattaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ. Yenayenadhanādihetunā so so vaso uppajjati.
anya-e0401n:422_56: Gamanampi tena teneva uppajjati āhārupatthambhanādipaccayena ca. Vaso pana gamanassa
anya-e0401n:422_57: paccayeka desamattaṃ hoti. So hi tadaññapaccayehi vinā sayaṃ uppajjituṃ na sakkoti.
anya-e0401n:422_58: Kuto gamanaṃ uppādetuṃ. Evaṃ ṭhānādīsu. Evañca sati, idaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ paccayāyatta
anya-e0401n:422_59: vuttikanticceva vattuṃ arahati. No vasāyatta vuttikanti. Api ca gantuṃ icchanto gacchatīti
anya-e0401n:422_60: paññatti mattabhūto satto gacchati. Khandhapañcakaṃ pana khaṇika dhammattā na gacchati.
anya-e0401n:422_61: Uppannuppannaṃ tattha tattheva bhijjati. Santati vasena gamanākāra nimittaṃ paññāyati.
anya-e0401n:422_62: Evaṃ avasavattanaṃ hotīti. Hotu tattha tattheva bhijjanaṃ. Avicchedappavattiyā sati,
anya-e0401n:422_63: gamanaṃ sampajjatiyeva. Gamane ca sampajjamāne khaṇikabhijjanena doso natthīti ce.
anya-e0401n:422_64: Atthi. Khaṇikamaraṇañhi sattassa susānabhūmi nāma hoti. Antarāyevā āgate pakkhalante
anya-e0401n:422_65: vā sati, gacchanto satto yadā kadāci maraṇaṃ vā nigacchati maraṇa mattaṃ vā dukkhanti.
anya-e0401n:422_66: Kilese nimināti pavattetīti nimittanti vacanattho. “Vipallāsanimittaṃ”ti ca vipallāsa
anya-e0401n:422_67: dhammānaṃ vasena upaṭṭhitaṃ kicca nimittaṃ. Taṇhā eva paṇidhīti sambandho. Mahantānaṃ
anya-e0401n:422_68: ādīnavānaṃ rāsi mahāādīnavarāsi. Khandhesu suññatalakkhaṇaṃ nāma ati gambhīraṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:422_69: Ñāṇasseva visayabhūtaṃ. Suññata dassanañca diṭṭhiyā ujuppaṭipakkhanti āha “saṅkhāresu
anya-e0401n:422_71: atthassa siddhi nāma. Attāti abhiniveso attābhiniveso. Gaṇhātīti gāho. Upādīyatīti
anya-e0401n:422_72: attho. Diṭṭhisaṅkhāto gāho diṭṭhiggāho. Atthābhiniveso ca so diṭṭhiggāho cāti viggaho.
anya-e0401n:422_73: Tassa paṭipakkhaṃ anattānupassanāñāṇaṃ. Anu anu bhavanaṃ ānubhāvo. Paramparato vaḍḍhananti
anya-e0401n:422_74: attho. “Tathā samanupassitvā”ti suññatā kārena samanupassitvā. Vimuñcantassa ariyapuggalassa.
anya-e0401n:422_75: “Aniccalakkhaṇaṃ nāma nāti gambhīraṃ hoti. Saddhāyapi visayabhūtaṃ. Unnatilakkhaṇo
anya-e0401n:422_76: ca ahaṃ māno khandhesu niccadhuvavipallāsamūlako saddhāya ca paṭipakkhoti āha “aniccadassanavasenā”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:422_78: mānasaṅkhātassa gāhassa. “Saddhāya pī”tipisaddena ñāṇaṃ sampiṇḍeti. Dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0401n:422_79: nāma bhayasaṃvega janakaṃ hoti. Ārammaṇesu taṇhālolassa taṇhāvipphandanassa paṭipakkhaṃ.
anya-e0401n:422_80: Visesato samādhissa anurūpanti āha “dukkhadassana vasenā”tiādiṃ. “Tiṇṇaṃ dhammānaṃ”ti
anya-e0401n:422_81: paññindriya saddhindriya samādhindriya saṅkhātānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ indriya dhammānaṃ. “Vipassanā
anya-e0401n:422_82: gamanavasene vā”ti vuṭṭhānagāmini vipassanā saṅkhātassa āgamana kāraṇassa vaseneva.
anya-e0401n:423_0: Idāni pubbe yaṃ vuttaṃ ‘sattaariya puggalavibhāgassa paccayabhāvapattiyā cā’ti. Tattha
anya-e0401n:423_1: satta ariyapuggalavibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ “tatthā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Dhammānusārī nāmāti ettha
anya-e0401n:423_2: “dhammo”ti paññā vuccati ‘saccaṃ, dhammo, dhīti, cāgo,ti ettha viya. Tikkhataraṃ
anya-e0401n:423_3: dhammaṃ anussaratīti dhammānusārī. Paññābalānusārena ādimhi maggaṃ labhatīti vuttaṃ
anya-e0401n:423_4: hoti. Athavā. “Dhammo”ti nissattanijjīvaṭṭhena saṅkhāra dhammo vuccati. Suññatadassanañca
anya-e0401n:423_5: nāma visesato suddhadhamma dassanaṃ nāma. Iti suddhadhammaṃ anussarati, ñāṇagatiyā
anya-e0401n:423_6: anugacchatīti dhammānusārī. Diṭṭhipattoti ettha diṭṭhināma dassanaññāṇaṃ vuccati.
anya-e0401n:423_7: Ādito paṭṭhāya parisuddha dassanasampannattā diṭṭhibaleneva sukhena taṃ taṃ maggaphalaṃ
anya-e0401n:423_8: pattoti diṭṭhipatto. Teneva dassana paññābalena kilesabandhanato vimuttoti paññāvimutto.
anya-e0401n:423_9: Saṅkhāra dhammānaṃ khaṇika dhammabhāve suṭṭhu saddahanaṃ aveccappasādo saddhā nāma.
anya-e0401n:423_10: Tattha “aveccappasādo”ti ñāṇasampayuttappasādo. “Ñāṇaṃ”ti ca saṅkhāra dhammānaṃ khaṇikabhāvanimittānaṃ
anya-e0401n:423_11: dassanaññāṇaṃ. Tādise hi ñāṇe sati, tattha aveccappasādo nāma jāyati, no aññathāti.
anya-e0401n:423_12: Saddhaṃ anussaratīti saddhānusārī. Saddhābaleneva ādimhi ariyamaggaṃ pāpuṇātīti vuttaṃ
anya-e0401n:423_13: hoti. Saddhābalena vimuttoti saddhāvimutto. “Kāyasakkhi nāmā”ti ettha sakkhaṃti sandiṭṭhaṃ.
anya-e0401n:423_14: Yaṃ sādhakantipi vuccati. Attano kāye eva laddhaṃ sakkhaṃ yassāti kāyasakkhī. Dukkhānu
anya-e0401n:423_15: passī puggalo hi saṃvega bahulo hoti. Saṃvego ca padhāna vīriyassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Saṃviggo
anya-e0401n:423_16: yoniso padahatīti hi vuttaṃ. Tasmā so saṃvegavasena bhāvanaṃ anuyuñjanto yaṃ yaṃ
anya-e0401n:423_17: purisathāmena pattabbaṃ hoti. Taṃ taṃ pāpuṇāti. Pāpuṇanto ca attano kāye eva sakkhaṃ
anya-e0401n:423_18: labhati. Sandiṭṭhaṃ jhānasukhaṃ vā maggaphalasukhaṃ vā labhatīti vuttaṃ hoti. “Ubhatobhāga
anya-e0401n:423_19: vimutto”ti arūpajjhānehi rūpakāyato arahattamaggaphalehi nāmakāyatoti evaṃ ubhohi
anya-e0401n:423_20: kāyabhāgehi vimutto. Ettha ca tayo ariyapuggalā paññādhiko ca saddhādhiko ca vīriyādhiko
anya-e0401n:423_21: ca. Tattha dhammānusārī ca diṭṭhipatto ca paññāvimutto ca paññādhiko nāma. Saddhānusārī
anya-e0401n:423_22: ca saddhāvimutto ca saddhādhiko nāma. Kāyasakkhī ca ubhatobhāgavimutto ca vīriyādhiko
anya-e0401n:423_23: nāmāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ayañca puggalavibhāganayo paṭisambhidāmagganayena vutto. Abhidhamme
anya-e0401n:423_24: pana puggala paññattiyaṃ saddhāvimutto ca kāyasakkhī ca dvepuggalā sekkhesu eva vuttā.
anya-e0401n:423_25: Arahattaṃ pattā pana ete dvepi paññāvimuttā evāti daṭṭhabbā. Ettha siyā, saṅkhāra
anya-e0401n:423_26: dhammānaṃ khaṇika dhammabhāve suṭṭhu saddahanaṃ aveccappasādo saddhā nāmāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:423_27: Kiṃ pana tādisena saddhāmattena sotāpatti maggaṃ pāpuṇātīti. Ettha amhehi vattabbaṃ
anya-e0401n:423_28: natthi. Bhagavatā eva vuttaṃ. Yathāha mahāvagge okkanta saṃyutte cakkhu bhikkhave
anya-e0401n:423_29: aniccaṃ vipariṇāmī aññathābhāvī, yo evaṃ saddahati, evaṃ adhimuccati. Ayaṃ vuccati
anya-e0401n:423_30: saddhānusārī. Okkanto ariyabhūmiṃ. Atikkanto puthujjanabhūmiṃ. So yenakammena apāyaṃ
anya-e0401n:423_31: duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ uppajjeyya. Na taṃ kammaṃ karotīti. Sotaṃ bhikkhave aniccaṃ. Vipariṇāmī
anya-e0401n:423_32: aññathābhāvītiādinā dvādasāyatanāni vitthāre tabbāni. Tattha “vipariṇāmī”ti vipariṇāmo
anya-e0401n:423_33: yassa atthīti vipariṇāmī. Vipariṇāmoti ca khaṇe khaṇe jīraṇatā bhijjanatā vuccati.
anya-e0401n:423_35: dīpeti. Sā eva sotāpattiyaṅgesu buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato, dhamme, saṅghe
anya-e0401n:423_36: aveccappasādena samannāgatoti vuttā. Tattha ñāṇasampayuttasaddhā nāma cakkhādīnaṃ
anya-e0401n:423_37: aniccanimitta dassanaññāṇena sampayuttā okappanasaddhā. Aniccanimittañca nāma rūpaṃ
anya-e0401n:423_38: aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhenātipade vuttanayena cakkhādinissayānaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ santati parivattanādikaṃ
anya-e0401n:423_39: vuccati. Tañhi passanto cakkhādīnaṃ aniccabhāve saddahati, adhimuccati. Tānipi khaṇe
anya-e0401n:423_40: khaṇe ekantena bhijjati yevāti saddhādhimokkhaṃ saddhāvinicchayaṃ paṭilabhatīti attho.
anya-e0401n:423_41: “Buddhe aveccappasādenā”ti ettha pana arahatā sammāsambuddhatādīnaṃ buddhaguṇādīnaṃ
anya-e0401n:423_42: dassanaññāṇena sampayutto pasādo aveccappasādo nāma. Ariyabhūmi nāma diṭṭhānusaya
anya-e0401n:423_43: vicikicchānusayehi parisuddhā avatthābhūmi vuccati. Tehi sahitā avatthābhūmi puthujjanabhūmi
anya-e0401n:423_44: nāma. Kathaṃ pana tassa puggalassa puthujjanabhūmiṃ atikkantatā ariyabhūmiṃ okkantatā
anya-e0401n:423_45: ca viññāyatīti āha “so yenā”tiādiṃ. Yo attano jīvitahetupi kiñci kammapathapattaṃ
anya-e0401n:423_46: apāyagāmi kammaṃ na karoti. So ekantena puthujjanabhūmiṃ atikkanto, ariyabhūmiṃ okkantoti
anya-e0401n:423_47: viññāyatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Idaṃ saddhānusārisuttaṃ. Aparaṃpi vuttaṃ cakkhu bhikkhave
anya-e0401n:423_48: vipariṇāmī aññathābhāvī. Yassa evaṃ mattaso nijjhānaṃ khamati. Ayaṃ vuccati dhammānusārī
anya-e0401n:423_49: tiādi. Tattha “mattaso nijjhānaṃ khamatī”ti saddhānusārīviya saddahanamatte aṭṭhatvā
anya-e0401n:423_50: cakkhādīnaṃ tādisaṃ aniccataṃ samanupassanto thokaṃ thokaṃ dassanaṃ labhatiyeva.
anya-e0401n:423_51: Evaṃsati, cakkhādīni tassa puggalassa nijjhānaṃ olokanaṃ mattaso khamanti nāma. Idaṃ
anya-e0401n:423_52: dhammānusārisuttaṃ. Aparaṃpi vuttaṃ cakkhu bhikkhave aniccaṃ vipariṇāmī aññathābhāvī.
anya-e0401n:423_53: Yo evaṃ pajānāti passati. Ayaṃ vuccati sotāpanno tiādi. Tattha “pajānāti passatī”ti
anya-e0401n:423_54: dhammānusārīviya mattaso nijjhānakkhamamatte aṭṭhatvā paññāya pajānāti, ñāṇacakkhuno
anya-e0401n:423_55: paccakkhato passatīti attho. Idaṃ diṭṭhipattādīnaṃ suttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:424_0: “Yathā sakaṃ phalaṃ”ti ettha sassa attano idaṃ sakaṃ. Yaṃ yaṃ sakaṃ yathāsakanti
anya-e0401n:424_1: atthaṃ dasseti sotāpannassātiādinā. Phalasamāpatti vīthiyaṃ pana anulomajavanāni
anya-e0401n:424_2: eva phalānaṃ āsannakāraṇāni, na maggajavanānīti āha “na maggāgamanavasenā”ti. “So”ti
anya-e0401n:425_0: Aniccānupassanā kiccato animittā hoti. Sabhāvato sanimittāeva. Niccanimittasahitāeva.
anya-e0401n:425_1: Yato sā esohamasmītiggahaṇaṃ labhati. Idaṃpi vipassanāñāṇaṃ aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhenāti
anya-e0401n:425_2: samanupassitabbā ca hotīti. Tattha ca abhidhammaṃ patvā sabhāvappadhānaṃ hoti, na
anya-e0401n:425_3: kiccappadhānaṃ. Tasmā abhidhamma nayena vipassanā attano nimitta nāmaṃ maggassa dātuṃ
anya-e0401n:425_4: na sakkoti. Ayaṃ aṭṭhakathāya adhippāyo. Kilesa dhammā nāma yassa uppajjanti, taṃ
anya-e0401n:425_5: puggalaṃ palibundhanti. Sambādhaṃ karonti. Tasmā palibodhakarānāma. Taṃ puggalaṃ
anya-e0401n:425_6: niccanimitta subhanimitta sukhanimitta attanimittāni gāhenti. Tasmā nimittakarānāma.
anya-e0401n:425_7: Taṃ puggalaṃ ārammaṇesu bhusaṃ nihitaṃ niviṭṭhaṃ karonti. Tasmā paṇidhikarānāma.
anya-e0401n:425_8: Te ca maggaphalāni ārammaṇaṃ na karonti. Maggaphalehi ca sampayogaṃ na gacchanti.
anya-e0401n:425_9: Evaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇā divasena maggaphalesu tesaṃ abhāvo. Abhāvattāeva ca tāni maggaphalāni
anya-e0401n:425_10: attano dhammatāya tīṇināmāni labhantīti dassetuṃ “ārammaṇa karaṇavasenavā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:426_0: “Attadiṭṭhiyā uppannāya uppajjantī”ti idaṃ tāsaṃ diṭṭhivicikicchānaṃ attadiṭṭhiyā
anya-e0401n:426_1: avinābhāvaṃ dīpeti. Na pana attadiṭṭhiyā tāhi avinābhāvanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Vipaccantīti
anya-e0401n:426_2: apāyesu vipaccanti. Apāyapaṭisandhiṃ janenti. Diṭṭhasaccānañca ariyapuggalānaṃ. Diṭṭhivicikicchāsampayuttā
anya-e0401n:426_5: bhavehī”ti kriyāpavagge karaṇavacanaṃ. Yathā sattahi māsehi vihāraṃ niṭṭhāpetīti.
anya-e0401n:426_8: dhammo”ti virūpaṃ hutvā patanaṃ vinipāto. Apāyanipātoti vuttaṃ hoti. “Dhammo”ti sabhāvo.
anya-e0401n:426_9: Natthi vinipāto dhammo yassāti viggaho. “Niyato”ti sugatibhavesu niyata gatiko. Sammā
anya-e0401n:426_10: bujjhatīti sambodhi. Maggaññāṇaṃ. “Parāyanaṃ”ti parabhāge gantabbaṭṭhānaṃ vuccati.
anya-e0401n:426_12: vuttaṃ hoti. Vā saddatthesu ca aniyamattho. Na vikappattho. Vikappatthehi sati dve
anya-e0401n:426_13: eva sattakkhattuparamā labbhanti. Missakabhavona labbhati. Aniyamatthe tayopi labbhanti.
anya-e0401n:426_14: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana samuccayatthassa gahitattā eko missakabhavo eva labbhati. Nanu
anya-e0401n:426_15: ca saddo nāma samuccayatthe pākaṭo, na aniyamatthe. Tasmā samuccayatthova idha yuttoti
anya-e0401n:426_16: ce. Na yutto. Kasmā. Dvinnaṃ asaṅgahitattā. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana samuccayatthaṃ gahetvā
anya-e0401n:426_17: te dve puggalā imasmiṃ pāṭhe asaṅgahitāti vuttaṃ. Yadi te imasmiṃ pāṭhe asaṅgahitā.
anya-e0401n:426_18: Katthate saṅgahitā bhaveyyuṃ. Na hi koci sattakkhattu paramo nāma idha asaṅgahitoti
anya-e0401n:426_19: yuttoti. “Assā”ti tassapāḷipāṭhassa. “Ettha ca yasmā. La. Paramo nāma vutto”ti idaṃ
anya-e0401n:426_20: upari ‘ye kāmabhave yevā’tiādinā ‘yediṭṭha dhamme vā’tiādinā ca yojetabbaṃ. So ca
anya-e0401n:426_21: sukkhavipassako vā parihīnajjhāno vā daṭṭhabboti sambandho. “Pāḷiyaṃ”ti puggalapaññatti
anya-e0401n:426_22: pāḷiyaṃ. “Idha niṭṭhā”ti imasmiṃ kāmaloke āsavakkhayaṃ patvā khandhaparinibbānapatti
anya-e0401n:426_23: vasena niṭṭhā. Niṭṭhānaṃ pariyosānanti attho. Kulato kulaṃ gacchatīti kolaṃkolo.
anya-e0401n:426_24: Bhavato bhavaṃ gacchatīti attho. Ekameva paṭisandhisaṅkhātaṃ bhavabījaṃ assa atthīti
anya-e0401n:426_25: ekabījī. Yo ca diṭṭheva dhamme arahā. Tassa ca idha niṭṭhāti yojanā. Kena pana tiṇṇaṃ
anya-e0401n:426_26: sotāpannānaṃ viseso katoti. Sattakkhattu paramo tāva kevalaṃ pathamamagga sampayuttehi
anya-e0401n:426_27: indriyehi kato. Itare dve uparimaggatthāya pavattitehi vipassanindriyehi katoti.
anya-e0401n:426_28: Tattha sattakkhattu paramo sabbamuduko hoti. Tato kolaṃkolo tikkho. So pana cha bhaviko,
anya-e0401n:426_29: pañcabhaviko, catubhaviko, tibhaviko, dvibhavikoti pañcavidho. Tattha pañcabhaviko
anya-e0401n:426_30: tikkho. Sesā anukkamena tikkhatarāti daṭṭhabbā. Ekabījī pana ekabhaviko sabbatikkho.
anya-e0401n:426_31: Tattha sattakkhattu paramo kevalena pathamamaggānubhāvena siddhattā sabbamuduko hoti.
anya-e0401n:426_32: Itare dvepakatiyā sattakkhattu paramabhāve ṭhatvā uparimaggatthāya vipassanā kammaṃ
anya-e0401n:426_33: paṭṭhapenti. Tadā tesaṃ indriyāni puna visesa pattāni honti, tikkhāni. Tasmā te sattakkhattu
anya-e0401n:426_34: paramato tikkhānāma hontīti. “Sattavārato oraṃ vā”ti idaṃ kolaṃkola ekabījino sandhāya
anya-e0401n:426_35: vuttaṃ. “Upari tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ vipassanā niyāmetī”ti idaṃ uparime dvesotāpanne sandhāya
anya-e0401n:426_36: vuttaṃ. Sattakkhattu paramopana pathamamaggeneva niyamitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tathāhi soyeva
anya-e0401n:426_37: saṅgahapāṭhe sarūpato āgato sotāpatti maggaṃ bhāvetvā diṭṭhivicikicchāpahānena pahīnāpāyagamano
anya-e0401n:426_38: sattakkhattu paramo sotāpanno nāma hotīti. Itare pana dve pāḷiyaṃ sotāpanna puggalavibhāgaṭṭhānesveva
anya-e0401n:426_39: āgatāti. “Ye panā”ti ye sotāpanna puggalāpana. Gāthāyaṃ “itosattā”ti imasmiṃ manussaloke
anya-e0401n:426_40: satta saṃsarāni. “Tatosattā”ti tasmiṃ devaloke sattāti attho. Aṅguttarapāṭhe “tenacittappasādenā”ti
anya-e0401n:426_41: mahāsahassilokadhātuṃ sarena viññāpetuṃ samatthassa satthuguṇe cittappasādo jāyati.
anya-e0401n:426_42: Tena cittappasādena. “Tena pariyāyenā”ti sace so devesu eva saṃsarati. Sattakkhattuṃ
anya-e0401n:426_43: opapātika paṭisandhiyo gaṇhitvā tattheva parinibbāyissati. Yadi manussesu eva saṃsarati.
anya-e0401n:426_44: Sattagabbhaseyyaka paṭisandhiyo gaṇhitvā ettheva parinibbāyissati. Evaṃ desanā vārena
anya-e0401n:426_45: cuddasa katvā desitena pariyāyenāti attho. “Taṃ vīmaṃsitabbaṃ”ti vadantena ṭīkācariyena
anya-e0401n:426_46: sayaṃ cuddasapaṭisandhiyova icchatīti dīpeti. Idāni taṃ cuddasapaṭisandhivādaṃ paṭikkhipanto
anya-e0401n:426_48: aṭṭhānaṃ. “Ṭhānaṃ”ti mūlakāraṇaṃ. Natthi avakāso assāti anavakāso. “Avakāso”ti paccayakāraṇaṃ.
anya-e0401n:426_49: “Yaṃ”ti kriyāparāmasanaṃ. Yaṃ nibbatteyya, taṃ nibbattanaṃ aṭṭhānaṃ. So nibbattana
anya-e0401n:426_50: dhammo anavakāsoti yojanā. “Abhisaṅkhāra viññāṇassā”ti sattabhavato uddhaṃ kāmabhave
anya-e0401n:426_51: paṭisandhijanakassa kusalā kusalakamma viññāṇassa. “Nirodhenā”ti sotāpatti maggakkhaṇe
anya-e0401n:426_52: eva nirodhanena. Nirujjhantīti sambandho. “Nāmañca rūpañcā”ti ye nāma rūpadhammā
anya-e0401n:426_53: uppajjeyyuṃ. Ete nāma rūpadhammā ettha etasmiṃ abhisaṅkhāra viññāṇa nirodhakkhaṇe
anya-e0401n:426_55: “Tadekaṭṭhamohassā”ti tena rāgena tena dosena ekasmiṃ citte ekato ṭhitassa mohassa.
anya-e0401n:426_56: Na diṭṭhivicikicchā sampayuttassa mohassa. Tassa pathamamagge eva pahīnattā. Nāpi
anya-e0401n:426_57: uddhaccacittasampayuttassa mohassa. Tassa catutthamagge eva pahātabbattā. Uppajjantā
anya-e0401n:426_58: rāgadosamohā. “Dhammikesū”ti dhammena samena uppannesu. “Yato”ti yaṃkāraṇā. Balavantakāraṇāti
anya-e0401n:426_59: attho. “Tesaṃ”ti sotāpannānaṃ. “Sallikhana vasenā”ti bahalapakkhaṃ thūlabhāgaṃ suṭṭhulikhanavasena.
anya-e0401n:426_60: Adhiccuppatti nāma pubbe yathāpavattaṃ kālaṃ adhicca atikkamma uppatti. Uppajjantānampi
anya-e0401n:426_62: jāyampatīnaṃ methunakammasamāyogo nāma sakadāgāmīnaṃ atthīti icchito. Therohi adhiccuppattimattaṃ
anya-e0401n:426_63: icchati. Pariyuṭṭhānamandataṃ na icchati. Sakadāgāmīnaṃ puttadhītaropi sandissantīti
anya-e0401n:426_64: vadati. “Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ paṭikkhitto”ti therassa manorathamattaṃti vatvā paṭikkhitto.
anya-e0401n:426_65: Idaṃ sabbaṃ aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ vuttaṃ. “Chakkanipāte”ti aṅguttare chakkanipāte. “Migāsāḷavatthumhī”ti
anya-e0401n:426_66: migāsāḷanāmikāya upāsikāya vatthumhi. Keci imaṃ vatthuṃ disvā mahāaṭṭhakathāvādaṃ
anya-e0401n:426_67: na rocenti. Mahāsivattheravādaṃ rocenti. “Abrahmacārino”ti methuna dhammā appaṭiviratassa.
anya-e0401n:426_68: “Sakadāgāmittaṃ byākataṃ”ti tasmiṃ kālaṅkate so brāhmaṇo idha sakadāgāmibhāvaṃ patvā
anya-e0401n:426_69: tusitākāyaṃ upapannoti evaṃ tassa yaṃ sakadāgāmittaṃ bhagavatā byākataṃ. “Adhigamavasenā”ti
anya-e0401n:426_70: sakadāgāmibhāvaṃ paṭilābhavasena. Na pana abrahmacārino sato adhigamavasenāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:426_71: Maraṇāsannakālepi hi sikkhāpadādhiṭṭhānena saha uparimaggaphalādhigamanaṃ nāma tikkhapaññassa
anya-e0401n:426_72: ariyasāvakassa na dukkaranti. Etena kesañci theravādarocanaṃ paṭikkhittaṃ hoti. “Sakiṃdeva
anya-e0401n:426_73: imaṃlokaṃ āgantvā”ti etena ito paralokaṃ gamanassa ca tato puna idhāgamanassa ca
anya-e0401n:426_74: siddhattā ayaṃ puggalo suddhena magganiyāmena kāmabhave dvikkhattu paramonāma hotīti
anya-e0401n:426_75: siddho. Kathaṃ. Idha patvā tattha nibbattitvā idha parinibbāyī, tattha patvā idha
anya-e0401n:426_76: nibbattitvā tattha parinibbāyīti. Sesāpana cattāro vipassanāniyāmena siddhā hontīti
anya-e0401n:426_77: viññāyati. Katame cattāro. Idha patvā idha parinibbāyī. Tattha patvā tattha parinibbāyī.
anya-e0401n:426_78: Idha patvā tattha parinibbāyī. Tattha patvā idha parinibbāyīti. Ettha ca tīsu sotāpannesu
anya-e0401n:426_79: ekosattakkhattu paramo eva magganiyāmena siddho. Sesā pana dve sotāpannā vipassanāniyāmena
anya-e0401n:426_80: siddhā. Cha sakadāgāmīsu dve eva magganiyāmena siddhā. Sesā pana cattāro vipassanāniyāmena
anya-e0401n:426_81: siddhā. Tattha maggasiddhesu sotāpanna sakadāgāmīsu saṅkaro natthi. Vipassanāsiddhesu
anya-e0401n:426_82: pana saṅkaro atthi. Atthato aviruddhe sati, vohāramattena saṅkare doso natthīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:426_83: Āgantvāti pāṭhavasena āgamanatoti vuttaṃ. Āgantāti pana pāṭho yutto. Āgamanasīlo
anya-e0401n:426_84: āgamana dhammo hutvā sakadāgāmī nāmāti attho. Anāgantvā itthattanti etthapi esevanayo.
anya-e0401n:426_85: Arahato bhāvo arahattaṃ. Arahatta maggaṃ. Dakkhiṇāya vipattikarānāma appapphala appānisaṃsakarā.
anya-e0401n:426_86: Sampattikarā nāma mahapphala mahānisaṃsakarā. Sīlakkhandhādiguṇā nāma sīlakkhandha
anya-e0401n:426_88: dakkhiṇāraha puggalesu. “Dhuraṃ”ti padhānasīsaṭṭhāniyaṃ vuccati. Saddhā eva dhuraṃ
anya-e0401n:426_89: assāti saddhādhuro. Evaṃ paññādhuro. Kasmā panettha vīriyadhuro na gahitoti. Pāḷiyaṃ
anya-e0401n:426_90: saddhāvāhī maggaṃ bhāveti, paññāvāhī maggaṃ bhāvetīti vuttaṃ. Na pana vuttaṃ vīriyavāhī
anya-e0401n:426_91: maggaṃ bhāvetīti. Tasmā na gahitoti. Kasmā pana vīriyavāhī maggaṃ bhāvetīti na vuttanti.
anya-e0401n:426_92: Vuccate. Maggaṃ bhāventassa nāma ādimhi diṭṭhivicikicchānaṃ pahānāya kammaṃ mahantaṃ
anya-e0401n:426_93: hoti. Kasmā, apāyamūlakattā. Tattha saddhā ca vicikicchā ca dve ujuppaṭipakkhā honti.
anya-e0401n:426_94: Yasmiṃ ārammaṇe saddhā nivisati, tasmiṃ vicikicchā natthi. Yasmiṃ vicikicchā nivisati,
anya-e0401n:426_95: tasmiṃ saddhā natthi. Tathā paññādiṭṭhiyo ca ujuppaṭipakkhā. Yattha paññā, na tattha
anya-e0401n:426_96: diṭṭhi. Yattha diṭṭhi, na tattha paññāti. Api ca saddhā attano visaye diṭṭhiṃ vidhamatiyeva.
anya-e0401n:426_97: Paññāya vicikicchāvidhamane vattabbameva natthi. Tasmā āraddha vipassako aniccādīsu
anya-e0401n:426_99: pasīditvā saddhāvimuttabhāvañca pāpuṇāti. Paññāya aniccādīni nijjhānakkhamaṃ katvā
anya-e0401n:426_100: dhammānusāribhāvañca suṭṭhutaraṃ passitvā diṭṭhipattapaññā vimuttabhāvañca pāpuṇāti.
anya-e0401n:426_101: Vīriyaṃ pana diṭṭhivicikicchānaṃ paṭipakkhamattampi na hoti. Atha kho tāsaṃ sahāyopi
anya-e0401n:426_102: hoti, dhurabhūtañca. Paggahalakkhaṇañhi vīriyaṃ. Taṃ saddhaṃpi paggaṇhāti, paññaṃpi
anya-e0401n:426_103: paggaṇhāti, diṭṭhiṃpi paggaṇhāti, vicikicchampi paggaṇhātiyeva. Kutopana attano sabhāvena
anya-e0401n:426_104: diṭṭhivicikicchāyo pajahituṃ sakkhissati. Tasmā imasmiṃ ṭhāne vīriyavāhīti ca vīriyadhuroti
anya-e0401n:426_105: ca na vuttoti. Kāyasakkhimhi pana saddhā ca paññā ca samabalā honti. Vīriyañca sayaṃ
anya-e0401n:426_106: sammappadhānaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā tadubhayaṃ upabrūheti. So ca puggalo tadubhayabalena diṭṭhivicikicchādayo
anya-e0401n:426_107: pajahitvā kāyasakkhibhāvaṃ pāpuṇāti. Aṭṭhavimokkhe vā uppādetvā ubhatobhāga vimuttabhāvaṃ
anya-e0401n:426_108: pāpuṇāti. Imesu pana dvīsu puggalesu vīriyassa thāmo suṭṭhu pākaṭo. Tasmā ime dve
anya-e0401n:426_109: vīriyādhikātveva vattabbā. Na vīriyadhuroti. Catuppaṭipadā nāma dukkhāpaṭipadā dandhābhiññā.
anya-e0401n:426_110: Dukkhāpaṭipadā khippābhiññā. Sukhāpaṭipadā dandhābhiññā. Sukhāpaṭipadā khippābhiññā.
anya-e0401n:426_111: Tividhavimokkho nāma suññato vimokkho. Animitto vimokkho. Appaṇihito vimokkho. “Tayo
anya-e0401n:426_112: antarā parinibbāyino”ti ettha āyukappassa pariyantaṃ apatvā antarā eva kilesaparinibbānapattā
anya-e0401n:426_113: antarāparinibbāyī nāma. So tividho. Āyukappassa pathamabhāge parinibbāyī, dutīyabhāge,
anya-e0401n:426_114: tatīyabhāgeti. Ime tayo antarā parinibbāyino nāma. Upahaccaparinibbāyī nāma āyukappa
anya-e0401n:426_115: pariyante parinibbāyī. Uddhaṃ mukho vaṭṭasoto etassāti uddhaṃsoto. Akaniṭṭhaṃ avassaṃ
anya-e0401n:426_116: gamissatīti akaniṭṭhagāmī. Vipassanā kammaṃ sasaṅkhāraṃ sappayogaṃ katvā parinibbāyī
anya-e0401n:426_117: sasaṅkhāra parinibbāyī. Saṅkhārarahitena sukhena vipassanā kammena parinibbāyī asaṅkhāra
anya-e0401n:426_118: parinibbāyī. “Dvādasa sotāpannā”ti ekabījikā tayo. Te eva catūhi paṭipadāhi guṇitā
anya-e0401n:426_119: dvādasa. Dvādasa sakadāgāmino pubbe vuttanayā eva.
anya-e0401n:427_0: Ekaccānaṃ eva anāgāmi arahantānaṃ eva. “Ajjhositassā”ti adhiositassa. Mamevidanti
anya-e0401n:427_1: niṭṭhānaṃ katvā ṭhapitassa. Gilitvā ṭhapitassāti vuttaṃ hoti. Bahalena thūlena kāmarāgena
anya-e0401n:427_2: vimuttā bahalarāgavimuttā. Āruppesu ca tasso arūpasamāpattiyo eva atthi. Na catasso
anya-e0401n:427_3: rūpasamāpattiyo. Tasmā tattha anupubbanirodho na labbhati. “Ādito paṭṭhāyā”ti aṭṭhasu
anya-e0401n:427_4: samāpattīsu pathamajjhāna samāpattiādi. Tato paṭṭhāya. Anupubbanirodho nāma pathamajjhāne
anya-e0401n:427_5: paṭighasaññānānattasaññānaṃ nirodho. Paṭighasaññā nāma pañcaviññāṇasaññā. Nānattasaññā
anya-e0401n:427_6: nāma kasiṇa nimittato aññesu nānārammaṇesu pavattamanoviññāṇa saññā. Dutīyajjhāne
anya-e0401n:427_7: vitakka vicārānaṃ nirodhotiādinā anupubba nirodho. “Tato pañcamajjhānaṃ”ti pañcakanayena
anya-e0401n:427_8: vuttaṃ. Aṭṭhasamāpatti vacanaṃ pana catukkanayena vuttaṃ. Tadubhayaṃpi puggalānurūpaṃ
anya-e0401n:427_9: labbhatiyeva. Yuganandhaṃ nāma dvandabandhanaṃ, samathavipassanānaṃ yuganandhanti
anya-e0401n:427_10: viggaho. “Samāpajjana vuṭṭhāna vipassanāvasenā”ti ettha vasibhāvapattaṃ samāpajjanañca
anya-e0401n:427_11: vuṭṭhānañca gahetabbaṃ. Attano sarīrā baddhesu parikkhāresu samāpattibaleneva antarāyābhāvato
anya-e0401n:427_12: visuṃ adhiṭṭhātabba kiccaṃ natthīti vuttaṃ “attano sarīrābaddhe parikkhāre ṭhapetvā”ti.
anya-e0401n:427_13: “Nānābaddhānī”ti nānāṭhānehi ābaddhāni. Nānāṭhānesu ṭhapitānīti vuttaṃ hoti. “Parissayenā”ti
anya-e0401n:427_14: antarāyena. Māvinassantūti vā nānābaddha avikopanaṃ adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ. Tadā vuṭṭhahāmītivā
anya-e0401n:427_16: attano jīvitakālassa upaparikkhaṇaṃ. Maraṇañhi nāma samāpattibalenapi paṭibāhituṃ
anya-e0401n:427_17: na sakkāhoti. Anto samāpattiyañca maraṇe sati sabrahmacārīsu kattabbavattaṃ na kareyya.
anya-e0401n:427_18: Etañhi vattaṃ yaṃ ariyasāvakānaṃ maraṇāsanne sabrahmacārīnaṃ vā upaṭṭhākānaṃ vā appamādakathānu
anya-e0401n:427_19: sāsanikammaṃ. Samāpattiyaṃ vā aññatitthiyānaṃ garahā vivajjanatthaṃ. Evañhi te garaheyyuṃ.
anya-e0401n:427_20: Gotamasāvakānaṃ nirodhasamāpatti nāma ekaṃ maraṇamukhaṃ. Yaṃ samāpajjanto asuko bhikkhu
anya-e0401n:428_0: “Yadatthaṃ”ti paṭipatti rasassādatthaṃ. “Tadatthe”ti tasmiṃ atthe. Nirāmisa sukhaṃ
anya-e0401n:428_1: nāma āmisarahita sukhaṃ. Duvidhañhi sukhaṃ sāmisasukhañca nirāmisasukhañca. Tattha
anya-e0401n:428_2: ye loke iṭṭha kanta manāpiyā pañcakāmaguṇā nāma atthi. Te kilesehi āmasitabbattā
anya-e0401n:428_3: āmisā nāma. Yañcasukhaṃ te āmise paṭicca uppajjati, taṃ sāmisasukhaṃ nāma. Yaṃ loke
anya-e0401n:428_4: dibbaṃ sukhaṃ mānusakaṃ sukhanti mamāyanti. Yañca anubhavantaṃ mahājanaṃ sabbāni
anya-e0401n:428_5: apāyabhaya vaṭṭabhayāni samparivārenti. Jhānasukha maggasukha phalasukha nibbānasukhaṃ
anya-e0401n:428_6: pana nirāmisasukhaṃ nāma. Yaṃ nekkhammasukhanti ca pavivekasukhanti ca upasamasukhanti
anya-e0401n:428_7: ca sambodhisukhanti ca vimuttisukhanti ca ariyasukhanti ca anavajjasukhanti ca vuccati.
anya-e0401n:428_8: Yañca anubhavantaṃ ariyajanaṃ sabbāni apāyabhaya vaṭṭabhayāni samparivajjanti. “Assāditabbaṭṭhenā”ti
anya-e0401n:428_9: kilesapalibodhehi vimuttattā vipula gambhīra santa paṇītarasattā ca ahosukhaṃ ahosukhanti
anya-e0401n:431_1: āgatena ācārena. “Ñāti mitta dhana bhogasampattiyā”ti hetuatthe karaṇavacanaṃ. “Visāle”ti
anya-e0401n:431_2: vipule. “Tenā”ti tassapadassa vibhatyanta dassanaṃ. “Saddhāyā”ti ratanattaye aveccappasādasaddhāvasena.
anya-e0401n:431_5: dosehi parisuddhānañca. Naṃ naṃ janaṃ pātirakkhatīti nampo. Diṭṭhadiṭṭhesu mettāvihārīti
anya-e0401n:431_6: vuttaṃ hoti. Āvhātabboti avhayo. Nāmaṃ. Nampo iti avhayo assāti nampavhayoti vacanattho.
anya-e0401n:431_8: tassa padassa pariyāyadassanametaṃ. “Attano mandabuddhīnaṃ”ti paccakkhe dharamānānanti
anya-e0401n:431_9: adhippāyo. Tenāha “pacchima janānaṃ vā”ti. Anukampanaṃ anukampo. Kathaṃ nu kho ime
anya-e0401n:431_10: janā abhidhammatthesu sukhena ājāneyyunti evaṃ pavatto cittabyāpāro. Atthato anudayasaṅkhātā
anya-e0401n:431_11: karuṇāyeva. Tenāha “anudayaṃ kāruññaṃ”ti. “Patthitaṃ”ti vā sādhuvatassa yaṃ thero
anya-e0401n:431_12: evarūpaṃ pakaraṇaṃ kareyyāti evaṃ cirakālaṃ patthitaṃ āsiṃsitanti attho. “Khuddasikkhāṭīkāyaṃ”ti
anya-e0401n:431_13: porāṇaṭīkaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Somavihārotveva paññāyittha tasmiṃ dīpeti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:431_14: Gāthāyaṃ “athā”ti tasmiṃkāle. “Etthā”ti etasmiṃ nagare. “Saddo”ti kasmā rājā evarūpaṃ
anya-e0401n:431_15: maṅgalahatthiṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ adāsi. Netaṃ patirūpaṃ yaṃ raññā katanti evaṃ pavatto
anya-e0401n:431_17: “Raṭṭhavaḍḍhane”ti raṭṭhaṃ vaḍḍhetīti raṭṭhavaḍḍhano. Hatthināgo. So hi lakkhaṇasampanno
anya-e0401n:431_18: ājāniyo hoti. Yasmiṃ raṭṭhe taṃ abhimaṅgalaṃ karonti, tasmiṃ raṭṭhe devo sammā vassati,
anya-e0401n:431_19: nānābhayupaddavā tasmiṃ nuppajjantīti lokasammato maṅgalahatthī hoti. Tena vuttaṃ
anya-e0401n:431_21: Dhanīyanti mahājanehi daṭṭhuṃ patthīyantīti dhaññā. Mahiddhikā. Adhivasanti etthāti
anya-e0401n:431_22: adhivāso. Dhaññānaṃ adhivāsoti samāso. Ajjhāvasiṃsu etthāti ajjhāvutthaṃ. Kittiguṇavasena
anya-e0401n:431_23: udenti uggacchantīti uditā. Uditānaṃpi uditoti viggaho. Tenāha “nabhamajjhe”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:431_24: Sārajjanaṃ sārado. Vigato sārado yassāti visārado. Visāradassa bhāvo vesārajjaṃ.
anya-e0401n:431_26: Taṃ ādi etissā paññāyāti pariyattivesārajjādi paññā. Pāpato lajjanasīlāti lajjinoti
anya-e0401n:431_27: āha “pāpagarahino”ti. Pāpaṃ dhammaṃ garahantiādīnavaṃ kathayanti sīlenāti pāpagarahino.
anya-e0401n:431_28: “Anussarantū”ti punappunaṃ sarantu. Visesena bhavanti vepullaṃ gacchantīti vibhavā.
anya-e0401n:431_29: Puññāni ca tāni vibhavācāti puññavibhavā. Vipulapuññānīti dassetuṃ “vipulānaṃ”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n:431_30: Anuttariya dhammā nāma dassanānuttariya savanānuttariyādayo. Loke bahūsu dassanesu
anya-e0401n:431_31: ito uttaraṃ aññaṃ dassanaṃ nāma natthīti dassanānuttariyaṃ. Ratanattayadassanaṃ.
anya-e0401n:431_33: savanānuttariyaṃ nāma. Tesu ratanattayādīsu saddhā paṭilābho lābhānuttariyaṃ nāma.
anya-e0401n:431_34: Tesameva punappunaṃ saraṇaṃ anussatānuttariyaṃ nāma. Ratanattaye catūhi paccayehi
anya-e0401n:431_35: vā vattappaṭivattakaraṇena vā paricaraṇaṃ pāricariyānuttariyaṃ nāma. Buddhapaññattāsu
anya-e0401n:431_36: tīsu sikkhāsu samādāya sikkhanaṃ sikkhānuttariyaṃ nāma. Tādise paññāvadātaguṇasobhādike
anya-e0401n:431_37: guṇe avassaṃ bhajanti pāpuṇantīti tādisaguṇabhāgino. “Bhavissāmā”ti bhavituṃ ussāhaṃ
anya-e0401n:433_1: dvisaṅkhyāya. Ekañca dukañca suññañca aṭṭhacāti gaṇanakkamo. Sahassa dvisata aṭṭhasaṅkhāte
anya-e0401n:433_2: sāketi attho. Esanayo parato “navapañca cammekamhī”ti padepi. Gāthāvaṇṇanāsu. Nagarati
anya-e0401n:433_3: na cavatīti nagaraṃ. Thāvariyanti vuttaṃ hoti. “Rañjetī”ti rameti. Khemasubhikkhatādiguṇehi
anya-e0401n:433_4: anāgate jane gamāpeti, āgate aññattha gantuṃ na detīti vuttaṃ hoti. Rohitamigā nāma
anya-e0401n:433_5: suvaṇṇavaṇṇamigā. “Sāke”ti sākanāmena raññā puna saṅkhatattā imaṃ kaliyugaṃ sākanti
anya-e0401n:433_6: vuccati. Yaṃ etarahi sākrarājantipi voharanti. Sākarājā ca nāma uttarāpathesu eko
anya-e0401n:433_7: gandhārarājā. Yaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā bhinnaladdhikā vajjībhikkhū imaṃ dhamma vinayaṃ
anya-e0401n:433_8: mahāsaṅghīkaṃ nāma saṅgahaṃ āropenti. So ca dhammavinayasaṅgaho uttarāpathesu vattati.
anya-e0401n:433_9: Vesāliyaṃ yasatthera saṅgaho pana dakkhiṇāpathesūti. Cattāriyugāni nāma loke paññapenti
anya-e0401n:433_10: satyayugaṃ, dvāparayugaṃ, tetrayugaṃ, kaliyuga,nti. Yuganti ca āyuparimāṇaṃ vuccati.
anya-e0401n:433_11: Idānipana kaliyugaṃ vattati. Tena vuttaṃ “sāketi kaliyuge”ti. Pāpayugeti attho. “La
anya-e0401n:433_12: tī”ti sālikkhettānaṃ sodhanaṭṭhānattā evaṃ mrammadesavohārena laddhanāmaṃ araññaṃ.
anya-e0401n:433_13: Taṃ pana muṃrvānagarassa esanne pañcadhanusatike padese jātaṃ. “Vissute”ti visesena
anya-e0401n:433_14: kittite. Sārañca asārañca vivecenti vicāretvā jānantisīlenāti sārāsāra vivekinoti vacanatthoti.
anya-e0401n:435: 1. Paramatthadīpanī nāma, yena therena sā katā.
anya-e0401n:436: Teneve sā katā hoti, ayaṃ tassānu dīpanī.
anya-e0401n:438: Kāḷe navamiyaṃ divā, majjhanhike niṭṭhaṃ gatā.
